verse_text: Me a bol ma nywolirok pa Yesu Kristo, nyakwar Daudi, nyakwar Ibrayimu:
Ibrayimu onywolo Isaka, Isaka to nywolo Yakobo, Yakobo to nywolo Yuda gi wutumin go;
Yuda to nywolo Perez gi Zera i yoki jo Tamar, Perez to nywolo Heziron, Heziron to nywolo Ram;
Ram to nywolo Aminadab, Aminadab to nywolo Nason, Nason to nywolo Salmon;
Salmon gi chiege Rahab to jonywolo Bowaz, Bowaz gi chiege Ruth to jonywolo Obed, Obed to nywolo Yese;
Yese to nywolo Daudi Kere. Daudi to nywolo Solomon ma min oido chipa Uriya;
Solomon to nywolo Rehobowam, Rehobowam to nywolo Abiya, Abiya to nywolo Asa;
Asa to nywolo Yehosafat, Yehosafat to nywolo Yoram; Yoram to nywolo Uziya;
Uziya to nywolo Yotham, Yotham to nywolo Ahaz, Ahaz to nywolo Hezekiya;
Hezekiya to nywolo Manase; Manase to nywolo Amos, Amos to nywolo Yosiya;
Yosiya to nywolo Yekoniya gi wutumin go, gikenyo to itero jo paka ŋechin yu Babilon;
Munyo otyek tero jo yu Babilon, Yokoniya onywolo Salutyel, Salutyel to nywolo Zerubabel;
Zerubabel to nywolo Abiwud, Abiwud to nywolo Elyakim, Elyakim to nywolo Azor;
Azor to nywolo Zadok; Zadok to nywolo Akim, Akim to nywolo Eliyudi,
Eliyudi to nywolo Elyazar; Elyazar to nywolo Mathan, Mathan to nywolo Yakobo;
Yakobo to nywolo Yozefu, mobedo chwor Marya, monywolo Yesu milwoŋo ni Kristo.

Ri ameno, wok kwoŋ Ibrayimu tundo kwoŋi Daudi, obedo luse ji apar g'aŋwen; odoko wok kwoŋ Daudi, tundo munyo oter jo yu Babilon, obedo luse ji apar gaŋwen; kendo wok munyo oter jo yu Babilon tundo kwoŋ Kristo, bende obedo luse ji apar g'aŋwen.
Me apaka nywolirok pa Yesu Kristo obedo: Munyo Yozefu fuodi oido nyaka jochikere nywomirok kodi Marya min Yesu, ma fuodi korwako go i ot, to nenere ni go oido otyeko gamo iye i men pa Chuny Maleŋ.
Gikenyo Yozefu chwore, rupiri oido obedo dhano motire aka komito miyo go wichkwot, oido paro weyo go nyaliŋliŋ.
Neni, munyo fuodi go paro ameno, malaika pa Ruoth to bino ri go i lek, to wacho ri go ni, “Yozefu wuodi pa Daudi, ikiri ilwor rwako Marya bedo dhako perin, rupiri go yach gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ.
Go bino nywolo nyathi ma jayach, aka ibino chwoko nyinge ni Yesu; rupiri go ama bino botho ji pere kwoŋ recho pajo.”
Gino jye otimere, ŋey gima jatuchi wach Were oluwo wotundi i kare ni,
“Nyako ma fuodi kuya jachwo bino gamo iye, to nywolo nyathi ma jayach, ma ibino chwoko nyinge ni Emanwel,” dwoŋ mere ni, “Were ni gi wan.”
Yozefu munyo ochiew, to timo paka malaika pa Were owacho ri go, to tero Marya bedo chiege;
aka koŋeyere gine tundo munyo ochowo nywolo nyathi no to chwoko nyinge ni Yesu.
Munyo otyek nywolo Yesu i tindi ma Bethlehem, i Yudeya i ndir ma Herode oido kere, joryeko mogo ma jofuonjere kwoŋ michalin jowok yu Wokchieŋ to jobino Yerusalem;
aka jopenjo ni, “Nikune nyathi monywol bedo kere pa Joyudaya? Waneno michala pere munyo owok yu Wokchieŋ amomiyo onyo wabino lamo go.”
Munyo Kere Herode owinjo gime, obwok, aka kir gi ji man jye i Yerusalem.
Go olwoŋo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jye kodi jofuonji ma Chik kanyachiel to penjo jo ni, “Ibino nywolo Kristo kune?”
Jodwoko ni, “I tindi ma Bethlehem, i Yudeya.” Me a gima jatuchi wach Were ondiko ni,
“In Bethlehem, i piny pa Yuda, iŋati ikiasa thin i dyer jodhum ma Yuda; kole kwoŋin ama jatel bino wok'iye, ma bino bedo jakwath pa Joisrael.”
Gikenyo Herode olwoŋo wendo ma jowok yu Wokchieŋ no i romo ma nyaliŋliŋ, aka oŋeyo kwoŋ jo ndir won ma michala no omenyer'iye ri jo.
Gikenyo ooro jo Bethlehem gi wach me: “Kidhi win wirangi kama di nyathi no maber aka ka winwaŋo go wimiyan ŋeyo, ŋey abende abin alam go.”
Gi wach me joeye kenyo, aka munyo oido jowotho i royo, joneno michala ma ndir cha joneno yu Wokchieŋ, motelo jo chuka otundo to chungo kama nyathi no oido ni iye.
Josangala swa, kendo jowinjo maber moasere munyo joneno michala no!
Jodonjo i ot to joneno nyathi bongi Marya yokimere. Joguro chongi gin piny jolamo go, to joyawo migowe pajo, to jochwayo mich: zawabu, buban, kodi mo maŋwe kur.
Were onyutho jo i lek nike jokiri jogiki kendo pa Herode, ri ameno jodok yu piny pajo gi royo man.

Munyo jotyeko kadho, malaika pa Ruoth omenyere ri Yozefu i lek munyo wacho ni, “Ayi malo ikwanyi nyathi gi yokimere wiringi i piny Misir, aka wibedi koro nyuka anowachi ri win ndir ma dwoko. Herode lerango nyathi no munyo mito neko.”
Amomiyo Yozefu oay malo okwanyo nyathi gi yokimere, to joay wor kidho yu Misir;
kama go obed'iye chuka Herode otho. Meno omiyo gima jatuchi wach Were owacho chon otundo i kare ni, “Alwoŋo wuodan wok Misir.”

Munyo Herode oneno ni joryeko ma jowok yu Wokchieŋ jothumo ri go ryeko, keme omako go to wodho or nike woneki woko nyithindho mayach jye ma joromo oro aryo gik chien, i Bethlehem kodi loka mothenere gine. Otimo gino jye chungo kwom gima go oido otyeko ŋeyo kwoŋ ndir ma go openj'iye joryeko cha kwoŋ menyirok pa michala.
Ameno gima Yeremiya jatuchi wach Were owacho otundo i kare ni,
“Derino winjere yu Rama, derino ma ywak malith gi ndur. Rakel ywako nyithindho pere. Kiyey wokwey chunye, rupiri ongoye modoŋ.”
Munyo Herode otyeko tho, malaika pa Ruoth omenyere ri Yozefu i lek yu Misir;
aka owacho ni, “Ayi malo ikwanyi nyathi gi yokimere widoki i piny Israel rupiri joma oido jorango neko go jotyeko tho.”
Amomiyo Jozefu oay malo, okwanyo nyathi gi yokimere to jodok yu piny Israel.
Munyo Yozefu owinjo ni Akelayus ama olunjo kom pa bamere Herode paka kere ma Yudeya, lworo omako go dok kendo kenyo. Were omedo menyo rigo i lek, amomiyo go okidho i adech ma Galileya,
to gero pecho pere i tindi ma Nazareth. Go otimo ameno ma miyo gima jatuchi wach Were owacho wotundi ni, “Ibino lwoŋo go ni Janazareth.”
I hongo no Yohana Jakibatisa obino to chako tito wach Were i thim ma Yudeya munyo wacho ni:
“Ŋuti win, rupiri Ker ma polo ni chiegin!”
Yohana oido a ŋata Isaya jatuchi wach Were chango oluwo kwoŋe chon munyo wacho ni: “Nyatoro koko i thim ni: Yiki win royo pa Ruoth, Tiri win rigo royo pere.”
Ruuk pa Yohana oido otim ma yer ŋamira, aka go oido tweyo pyere gi del ma pyen, aka chiemo pere oido obedo bonyo kodi mo kich.
Ji jobino bonge wok Yerusalem, wok i adech ma Yudeya, kodi wok i adeche jye mothoko jwom Yordan.
Jotucho gimarecho pajo aka omiy jo batisimo i Yordan.
Munyo Yohana oneno kweth Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo jobino bonge limo batisimo, owacho ri jo ni, “Win nyithindhi thwole, ŋata onyutho win ryeko ma both kwoŋ keme pa Were ma chiegin bino?
Timi win gima nyutho nike wityeko ŋuto gimarecho mewin kichutho.
Aka wikiri wipar ni winyalo nwaŋo kagoŋirok munyo wiwacho ni, ‘Ibrayimu obedo kwari wan.’ Awacho ri win ni Were nyalo kwanyo kada telin me to loko nyikway Ibrayimu!
Kada pama le otyek yiko ma toŋo yen gi i tyendi gin! Yath jye ma kinyak gimaber ibino toŋo woko tibolo i mach!
Amiyo win batisimo kodi pi ma nyutho nike wityeko ŋuto; to ŋata bino luwan chien bino miyo win batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ kodi mach. Go loyan gi dwoŋ tektek ma akiripi kada tiŋo war pere.
Go nitye g'odher pere ma yeko nyingi kal jye; go bino choko kal pere malilo to konjo i dero pere, to waŋo woko chuŋ i mach makitho.”
I hongo no Yesu owok Galileya to kidho Yordan to bino bongi Yohana ni womiy go batisimo.
To Yohana otemo juko go ka wacho ri go ni, “Aŋata oido aripo limo batisimo bongin, odoko ibino bongan ayino!”
To Yesu odwoko go ni, “Weyi watim ameno pama. Kole i tim me wabino tiro gimoro jye ma Were yenyo.” To Yohana yeyo.
Tekin Yesu chowo limo batisimo, owok i pi. Gikenyo polo oyawere ri go aka oneno Chuny Maleŋ loro piny i chal pa akuru to pye kwoŋe.
Gikenyo dwondi nyatoro oluwo wok i polo ni, “Me a Wuodan won mamaro, aka asangala gine.”
Gikenyo Chuny Maleŋ otero Yesu i thim ŋey jwogi wotem go.
Munyo go ochowo odyechieŋ gi wor pyero aŋwen munyo riyo, Yesu owinjo kech.
Jwogi obino bonge to wacho ni, “K'inen ibedo Wuodi Were adyeri, ere apawiri telin me wolokere chiemo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ondik ni, ‘Dhano kinyal kwo gi chiemo kende, to gi wach jye mawok i dhoki Were.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi otero Yesu i tindi maleŋ to ketho go wi kisul ma Ot pa Were,
to wacho ri go ni, “K'inen ibedo Wuodi Were ere paporiye piny, kole ondik ni, ‘Were bino oro rin jomalaika pere, ma jobino byelin i chingi gin, aka ikibino chadho tyendin kwoŋ tele.’ ”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kole ondik bende ni, ‘Ikiri item Ruoth Were perin.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi otero Yesu wi got mabor swa, to nyutho go ker ma piny jye, gi dwoŋ mani iye jye.
Jwogi owacho ni, “Abino miyin gigo jye, ka iryewere ruwaŋan t'ilaman.”
Gikenyo Yesu odwoko ni, “Eye bongan Sitan! Ondik ni, ‘Lami Ruoth Were perin aka itiy ri go won kende.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi oweyo go; aka jomalaika jobino jomiyo go kony.
Munyo Yesu owinjo ni otwey Yohana, go oay to kidho Galileya.
Go oeye Nazareth, to kidho Kapernaum, tindi ma dho jwom Galileya, i adech mapa Zebulun kodi Naftal.
Gime otimere ma miyo gima Isaya jatuchi wach Were owacho wotundi i kare ni,
“Piny pa Zebulun, piny pa Naftal, thenge ma yu wakawaka, i thengi Yordan, Galileya, pa Jopath!
Ji moido jonitye i mudho joneno lero madwoŋ; Aka ri joma oido jonitye i piny ma mudho ma tho, lero otyeko menyere.”
Wok i hongo no kadho yuwaŋe Yesu ochako fuonjo ka wacho ni, “Ŋuti win recho rupiri Ker ma polo ni chiegin.”

Munyo Yesu oido wotho dho Wakawaka Galileya, go oneno wutimere aryo ma jokitoga, Simon (milwoŋo ni Petro) kodi Andereya omin go, munyo oido jochiko rech i wakawaka gi bwoo rupiri oido jobedo jokitoga.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Biye luwan win aloki win jokitoga ji.”
Piyo piyo jono joweyo bwoo pajo, to joluwo go.
Yesu omedere woth aka oneno wutimere aryo man, Yakobo kodi Yohana, yach pa Zebedayo. Onwaŋo jonitye i yee pajo gi baa gin Zebedayo joyiko bwoo pajo, to lwoŋo jo.
Piyo piyo jono joweyo yee pajo gi baa gin, to joluwo Yesu.
Yesu owotho i Galileya parom, munyo fuonjo Wach Maber kwoŋ Ker pa Were i kalamo pa Joyudaya, gi botho two kodi ramirok ma nger jye.

Wach ma mako kwoge onyay i piny Sirya gipi, momiyo ji jokelo ri go ji jye monwaŋo jotwo kiti two mopokere jye, kodi ramirok ma nger jye moido chando jo: ji ma jwogi ni kwoŋ gin, joma tho fum, kodi jonyaŋinya; to Yesu botho jo jye.
Kweth ji moasere joluwo go wok Galileya kodi Dekapoli (tindi mochokere apar) wok Yerusalem, Yudeya, kodi piny ma loka Yordan.
Yesu oneno kitipa ji, to idho wi got, aka munyo otyeko bedo piny, jofuonjirok pere jobino bothe;
aka ochako fuonjo jo ni:
“Josilwany a joma chandere i chuny gin, rupiri Ker ma polo obedo apa jo.
“Josilwany a joma ywak, rupiri ibino kweyo chuny jo.
“Josilwany a joma mwol, rupiri jobino lunjo piny.
“Josilwany a joma nitye g'awanya madwoŋ ma timo gima Were yenyo, rupiri ibino yeŋo jo.
“Josilwany a joma nyutho jowoti gin wor, rupiri Were bino nyutho jo bende wor.
“Josilwany a joma chuny gin olony, rupiri jobino neno Were.
“Josilwany joma kweyo piny, rupiri ibino lwoŋo jo ni nyithindho pa Were.
“Josilwany a joma ilwenyo gi jo ru timo gima Were yenyo, rupiri Ker ma polo obedo apa jo!
“Win wi josilwany ka ji joyeto win aka jolwenyo gi win, ka jowacho wach jye kwoŋ win rupiri wibedo joma luwan.
Yodere win aka wisangala, rupiri kemba mewin obedo moasere i polo. Me apaka chango jotimo kir ri jotuchi wach Were machon.
“Wibedo kado chumbi ma piny. To ka kado chumbi orwenyo woko chwe mere, aŋo ma nyalo miyo go bedo mamit kendo? Lokere gima ongoye kony; amomiyo ikonjo woko to ji nyono gi tyendi gin.
“Win wiŋati wibedo lero ma piny. Tindi moger wi tendere madwoŋ kipanere.
Ongoye ŋata chwinyo tala to ryewo i agono; kuchiel go ripo ŋawo tala no malo kuma nyalo miyo lero ri ji jye ma ot.
Ri ameno lero mewin bende ripo menyo iye jye ŋey ji jowoneni gima beyo ma witimo to jopako Baa win mani polo.
“Wikiri wipar nike abino ka kwanyo woko Chik pa Musa kodi fuonji pa jotuchi wach Were, to abino nyutho dwoŋ mere maradyeri ayin.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ka polo gi piny fuodi nitye, ongoye kada gimathin kosa adech mondhilo kwoŋ Chik mibino kwanyo woko, to bino bedo ama tundo kama gimoro jye otyeko timer'iye.

Amomiyo nyatoro jye mokweri winjo kada gimoro nyaka mathin kwoŋ Chik aka ofuonji joman bende timo ameno, bino bedo ŋata loyo thino i Ker ma polo. Kuchiel nyatoro jye mowinji Chik aka ofuonji joman bende timo ameno, bino bedo ŋata dwoŋ swa i Ker ma polo.
Amomiyo, awacho ri win ni wikibino nyalo donjo i Ker ma polo kwanyo woko ka wibedo gi leŋo ma kalo apa jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo i timo gima Were yenyo.
“Wityeko winjo ni chango owach ri ji machon ni, ‘Ikiri ineki, aka nyatoro jye ma janek ibino tero go ruwaŋ jathum banja.’

To pama onyo awacho ri win ama: ŋata omaki nge g'omin bino bedo gi banja kapido. Ŋata otim rooro kwoŋ omin ibino tero go ruwaŋ jothumi banja, aka ŋata oyeti omin ni, ‘Mamiŋ ma bu kony,’ ibino bolo go i mach makitho.
Amomiyo ka onwaŋo itero mich perin ri Were wi alitar to gikenyo ipoyo nike omerin nitye gi dhaw kodin,
weyi mich perin i nyim alitar kenyo, kutho ikidhi iyiki wach g'omerin aka nyaka idwoki imiyi Were mich perin.

“Ka dhano ni gi wach moro kodin aka mito terin kapido, yiki gine wach no ma fuodi hongo nitye, ka fuodi wikitundo kapido. Ka winotundi kenyo, go bino bolin i chingi jathumi banja, ma bino kethin i chingi joserikale ma katwech titweyin.
Ibino bedo kenyo, awacho rin, nyuka inochul kir pesa machowe mothumi rin.
“Wityeko winjo paka chango owach ni, ‘Ikiri itim chot.’
To pama awacho ri win ama: ŋata ŋiyo dhako moro aka chunye wanya go, meno otyeko timo gine chot gi i chunye.
Amomiyo k'inen waŋin marachuch miyin timo gimarach, goli woko iboli woko! Kole ber ikeŋi adech moro ma delkwoŋin loyo nwaŋo delkwoŋin gipi tibolo i mach makitho.
K'inen chingin marachuch miyin timo gimarach, ŋondi ibol woko! Rupiri ber iremi chingin achiel loyo delkwoŋin gipi kidho i mach makitho.
“Chango chon owach ni, ‘Nyatoro ma ryemo woko chiege ripo miyo go balwa ma ryemo go i ndiiko.’
To pama awacho ri win ni: nyatoro jye moryemi chiege ri wach moro jye ma kobedo wach ma kidakana, meno go miyo chiege donjo i chot. Aka ŋata nywomo dhako ma pameno, meno bende timo gine chot.
“Wityeko winjo paka chango chon owach ni, ‘Ikiri ikwoŋere ma twodo, to timi gima ikwoŋere timo i nyim Ruoth.’
To pama awacho ri win ni: ikiri ikwoŋere kada mathin ka itimo chikirok, ikiri ikwoŋere gi polo, rupiri meno kom pa Were,
kosa gi piny, rupiri meno kaywomo tyende, kosa gi Yerusalem, rupiri meno obedo tindi pa Kere madwoŋ;
Odoko ikiri ikwoŋere gi wiyin, rupiri ikinyal loko kada yer achiel matar wobedi machol kosa machol wobedi matar;
Wachi nyaka ni, ‘Ey’ kosa ‘Be’; gima kalo kenyo man m'inowachi meno wok bongi Ŋatarach.
“Wityeko winjo chango chon paka owach ni, ‘Waŋ chulo kwor gi waŋ, lak bende gi lak.’
To onyo pama awacho ri win ni: ikiri ichul kwor kwoŋ ŋata timo rin marach. Ka nyatoro ogoyo lembin marachuch g'adhoŋ, weyi wogoyi lembin maracham bende.
Aka ka nyatoro oterin i kapido ru yenyo sat perin, weyi go woteri kir kot perin bende.
Aka ka nyatoro oromin wothi mairo achiel, wothi gine mairo aryo.
Ka dhano okwayin gimoro, miyi go, aka ka nyatoro mito gimoro mochiko chulo, miyi go.
“Wityeko winjo chango chon paka owach ni, ‘Mari mere perin, aka dakere kodi jakwor perin.’
To onyo pama awacho ri win ni, mari win jokwor mewin, odoko kwayi win ri joma timo ri win marach,
aka nyaka wibino bedo nyithindho pa Baa win mani polo; kole go miyo chieŋ pere lyel ri ji marecho kodi mabeyo ma rom, aka go miyo joma beyo gi joma recho jye koth.
Raŋo ma di wigen ni womiy win kemba ka wimaro ji ma bende jomaro win won kende? Jochoki misolo bende jokitim ameno?
To ka wimothere wiwegi gi wegi, meno witimoye aŋo mopokere kodi gima ji man jotimo? Jopath bende jokitim ameno?
Bedi win maleŋ paka Baa win mani polo leŋ.
“Gwokere win wikiri winyuthi tim mewin mabeyo i waŋi ji ni aka ji jowoneni to jofuoyo win. Ka witimo ameno i dyer ji wikolim kemba bongi Baa win mani polo.

“Amomiyo ka wimiyo jachandi gimoro, wikiri wiasa nyutho kamaler, paka joma rendere jotimo i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi i royo mokare i tindi. Jotimo ameno nike ji jowopaki jo. Adyeri awacho ri win, otyek miyo jo kemba pajo mopoŋ.
To ka ichwayo ri jachandi gimoro, konyi go ma kada mere perin ma kachunyin koŋeyo,
ŋey wobedi gima nyaliŋliŋ, aka Benin, ma neno gima itimo nyaliŋliŋ, ama bino miyin kemba.

“Ka ikwayo, ikiri ichale kodi joma jorendere! Jomaro chungo ka jokwayo i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi i thengi royo mokare ma tindi ŋey dhano jye wonen jo. Adyeri awacho ri win, ameno jotyeko limo kemba pajo kichutho.
To ka ikwayo, donji i ot perin ichiegi thigo, aka ikway Benin, ma kinenere kamaler. Aka Benin, ma neno gima itimo nyaliŋliŋ bino miyin kemba.
“I kwayo perin, ikiri ior wach kweth mongoye kony paka jokafiri jotimo; ato joparo ni Were bino winjo jo ru kwayo pajo maboyo.
Amomiyo wikiri wichale gi jo; kole Baa win mani polo oŋeyo gima wichando kada ma fuodi wikikwayo go.
Me apaka wiripo kwayo, ‘Bawan mani polo, Nyingin wolwor
Ker perin wobin, Gima iyenyo wotimere i piny paka timere i polo.
Miyi waye konon chiemo mawan ma noknok;
Chwaki ri wan gimarecho mawan; Paka wachwako ri joma timo ri wan marach.
Ikiri iter wan ka ratem, to bothi wan ayino kwoŋ Ŋatarach, [rupiri ker obedo aperin, kodi men, kodi dwoŋ, chil gi chil.] Ameno.’
“Kole ka wichwako ri ji recho ma jotimo ri win, Baa win mani polo bende bino chwako win.
To ka wikichwaki recho pa joman, ameno Baa win mani polo bende kibino chwako ri win recho ma wityeko timo.
“Aka ka wiriyo kech, wikiri winenere pa wigut paka joma rendere. Ato jonyieko waŋ gin ŋey ji jye jowoŋey nike joriyo kech. Adyeri awacho ri win, ameno jotyeko limo kemba pajo mopoŋ.
To ka iriyo kech, lwoki waŋin kendo iyiki wiyin,
aka joman jokiri jowoneni nike iriyo kech; Benin kende ma kinenere kamaler ama bino ŋeyo. Aka Benin, ma neno gima itimo nyaliŋliŋ, ama bino miyin kemba.
“Wikiri wikan ŋaŋo mewin i piny ka, kama masirigi kodi nyal jobino nyiek'iye, aka jokwo jobino donj'iye to jokwalo woko;
to kuchiel, kani win ŋaŋo mewin i polo, kama masirigi kodi nyal jokibino nyiek'iye, aka jokwo jokibino donj'iye kwalo.
Kole kama di ŋaŋo perin ama chunyin bed'iye ndir jye.
“Waŋ meno tala ma del; ka waŋin olama, delkwoŋin gipi lero bino poŋ'iye;
to ka waŋin kolama, delkwoŋin bino bedo i mudho. Amomiyo ka lero ma kwoŋin olokere mudho, mudho bino asere marom nedi?
“Ongoye ŋata nyalo tiyo ri ruodhe aryo; go bino maro achiel to dak man, kosa nyalo tiyo ri achiel to chayo man. Ikinyal tiyo ri Were kodi ri lim bende.
“Amomiyo awacho ri win gime: wikiri wirembi kwoŋ girachama kodi giramadha ma wiyenyo ma kwo, kosa ruk ri delkwoŋ win. Adyer kwo pa dhano kiloy chiemo, odoko delkwoŋe kiloy ruk?
Neni win winyin ma joucho malo, jokipidhi kodhi, jokichoki chiemo jokethi i dere, to kole Baa win mani polo kuro jo! To kere win wikiloy winyin no bori?
Ŋa kwoŋ win ma nyalo medo kiyindira i kwo pere ru rembo ri gikipiny no?
“To raŋo ma wirembo ri ruk? Neni win thiwi dudi paka jodongo; jokichwer kwok i tich odoko wegi jokitim ruk pajo.
To awacho ri win kada Solomon, ma chango oŋaŋ moasere, kobedo gi ruk mabeyo paka nyaka achiel kwoŋ thiwi dudi me.
To k'inen meno apaka Were ruko lum, ma konon nitye to yawere mere thwo tiwaŋo i kendo, go koruki win maloyo kenyo, a ji ma yeyo pajo nok me!
Amomiyo wikiri wichaki rembo, ka wiwacho ni, ‘Wanocham aŋo?’ kosa ni ‘Wanomadhi aŋo?’ kosa ni ‘Wanoruki aŋo?’
Kole me a gikipiny ma jokafiri joyenyo hongo jye; aka Baa win mani polo oŋeyo nike wiyenyo gigo jye.
To kutho rangi win Ker pa Were kodi tiro ma go yenyo, aka go bino miyo win gikipiny me jye.
Amomiyo wikiri wirembi ri gima dikin; kole kis ndelo won yawere gi wach mere. Kiyenyere medo teko man wi teko ma piny moyawere kelo.
“Wikiri withum banja ri jowoti win, aka bende Were kothum ri win banja.
Kwoŋbedo ibino thumo ri win banja i yo achiel ma withumo gine banja ri jowoti win, aka ibino tiyo kwoŋ win gi chik ma witiyo gine kwoŋ jowoti win.
Amomiyo, raŋo m'iŋiyo nyaka yath mondhilo mani manitye i waŋ omerin, t'ikidew kwoŋ thwon kasik manitye i waŋin won?
Iere nedi wacho ri omerin ni, ‘Mondo, weyi akwany woko nyaka yath mondhilo no i waŋin,’ mato iwon bende initye gi thwon kasik i waŋin?
In, jarendirok! Kutho kwanyi woko thwon kongolo kasik i waŋin, aka nyaka ibino neno maber ŋey inokwany woko yath mondhilo i waŋ omerin.
“Ikiri imiy gwokere gikipiny maleŋ, jobino wire rin to jokayin ayino; kendo ikiri ibol gee mawelo ri mbiji, jobino nyono anyona ayino.
“Kwayi, aka inolim; rangi, aka inonwaŋ; gudi thigo aka ibino yawo rin.
Kole dhano jye ma kwayo, limo; aka ŋata rango, nwaŋo, aka ŋata gudo thigo, iyawo ri go.
Ŋa kwoŋ win bachere ji ka ma di miy wuode tele, ka okwayo mugat?
Kosa di miy go thwol, ka okwayo rech?
Kole kada wirecho ameno, wiŋeyo miyo nyithindho mewin gikipiny mabeyo. Aka Baa win mani polo oloy win didi i miyo joma kwayo go, gikipiny mabeyo!
“Timi win ri jowoti win gima wimito jowotim ri win: me a dwoŋ Chik pa Musa kodi fuonji pa jotuchi wach Were.
“Donji gi i waŋkach madiny, rupiri waŋkach malach ni gi royo mayot luwo, to tero jo i reyirok, aka joma thoth joluwo royo no.
Waŋkach madiny ni gi royo matek luwo, to tero jo i kwo, aka ji manok ama jonwaŋo royo no.
“Gwokere win kwoŋ jotuchi wach matwodo, ma jobino bongi win i chal pa rombo gi woko, to iyadyeri mere jobedo arara i chuny gin.
Ri ameno wibino ŋeyo jo kwoŋ gimanyak wok i tim pajo. Kudho oryaŋ bende chiene nyak vini? Odoko kudho alwi bende chiene nyak nyandere?
Kole yath maber nyak gimaber, aka yath marach bende nyak gimarach.
Yath maber kinyal nyak gimarach, aka yath marach kinyal nyak gimaber.
Yath jye ma kinyak gimaber itoŋo woko tibolo i mach.
Amomiyo wibino ŋeyo jotuchi wach matwodo chungo kwoŋ gimanyak ma nenere i tim pajo.
“Ki dhano jye ma lwoŋan ni, ‘Ruoth, Ruoth,’ ma bino donjo i Ker ma polo, kende ŋata timo gima Baba mani polo yenyo.
I ndelo no, joma thoth jobino wacho ni, ‘Ruoth, Ruoth, kole watucho mikwenda pa Were i nyingin, waryemo woko jwogi i nyingin aka watimo giraura madongo momore i nyingin!’
Gikenyo abino wacho ri jo ni, ‘Akuya win, kendo eye win bongan win wijotimi recho me.’
“Amomiyo dhano jye ma winjo wach paran me aka tiyo gine bino chale gi dhano maryek mogeto ot pere wi tele.
Koth ochwe, mikula omol, aka asur okudho ot no matek. To ot no kopodho, kwoŋbedo oger wi tele.
To ŋata winjo wach paran me aka kitiy gine, chalo dhano mamiŋ mogero ot pere i kwoyo.
Koth ochwe, mikula omol, asur okudho ot no matek, to podho. Podho no oasere marom kune!”
Munyo Yesu ochowo wacho gime, kweth ji jouro swa kite ma go ofuonjo gine.
Go onwaŋo kichale kodi jofuonji ma Chik, rupiri go ofuonjo pa ŋata oido ni gi men.
Munyo Yesu oloro wi got, kweth ji joluwo go.
Gikenyo jadhowo moro obino bonge, oryewere piny runyime, to wacho ni, “Jadwoŋ ka iyenyo inyalo bothan.”
Yesu ochwayo chinge to geyo go munyo wacho ni, “Ayenyo, bothi!” Gikenyo dhowo pere ochango i hongo no won.

To Yesu wacho ri go ni, “Neni! Ikiri iwachi ri nyatoro, to kidhi titir bongi jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, go wokaŋasa in, aka imiy mich ma chowirok ma nyutho dhano jye nike iboth, paka mitere i Or ma Musa ondiko.”
Munyo Yesu odonjo Kapernaum, jaserikale madwoŋ ma Jaroma oromo gine to kwayo kony ni,
“Jadwoŋ, jatich paran ni pecho two nyaŋinya i kanindo, kinyal ay, aka nitye i litho madwoŋ swa.”
Yesu owacho ni, “Abino kidho botho go.”
Jaserikale odwoko ni, “Be Jadwoŋ, kiripi ran in donjo i ot paran, wachi nyaka wach achiel to jatich paran both.
Kole abende anitye gi jodongo ma jotelan, aka nitye joserikale ma bende joluwan; ka awacho ri me ni kadhi, to kadho; ri man ni biye, to bino; aka ka aoro jago paran ni, timi gimanyo, to go timo.”
Yesu ouro munyo owinjo gime, omiyo owacho ri ji monwaŋo joluwo go ni, “Awacho ri win, fuodi akineno kiti yeyo me i nyatoro jye i Israel.
Poyi win gime! Joma thoth jobino wok yu Wokchieŋ kodi yu Podhochieŋ to jobedo dhower i Ker ma polo kodi Ibrayimu, Isaka, kodi Yakobo.
To joma oido joripere bedo i Ker ibino bolo jo woko i mudho kama jobino ywak'iye to jomwodo laki gin.”
Aka Yesu owacho ri jaserikale ni, “Doki pecho, paka iyeyo, gima iyenyo wotimere rin.” Aka jatich pa jaserikale oboth sawa no won.
Yesu okidho pecho pa Petro, aka kenyo or Petro mobedo min chiege oido ni kanindo kwoŋe oowere.
Gikenyo go ogeyo chingi dheno, to two weyo go; aka oay malo to chako rweyo go.
Munyo piny oyutho, ji jokelo bongi Yesu ji ma jwogi ni kwoŋ jo. Yesu oryemo woko jwogi gi wach pere to botho jotwo jye.
Go otimo ama ma miyo gima jatuchi wach Were Isaya owacho ni, “Go won okwanyo woko nyapo mawan, to tiŋo two mawan,” wotundi i kare.
Munyo Yesu oneno kweth ji jothoko go, owodho or ni jowopori loka man ma wakawaka.
Jafuonji ma Chik moro obino bonge to wacho ni, “Jafuonji ayikere kidho kodin kama inochom'iye jye.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Kibwe jonitye gi kero pajo, aka winyin bende jonitye gi odi gin, to Wuodi Dhano ongoye kodi kama go othen'iye wiye.”
Achiel kwoŋ jafuonjirok pere owacho ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi kutho akidhi ayiki baba.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Luwan. Weyi jomotho wegi jowoyiki jomotho pajo.”
Munyo Yesu odonjo i yee, jofuonjirok pere jokadho gi go.
Piyo piyo no asur madwoŋ obino i wakawaka momiyo pi matula oido umo woko yee aka Yesu oido nindo.
Jofuonjirok jokidho bonge to jochiewo go ka jowacho ni, “Bothi wan, Ruoth! Wachiegin tho!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Wibwok ameno raŋo! Apaka yeyo mewin nok ama!” Gikenyo go oay malo to oro asur kodi wakawaka moido tula kwe; aka gimoro jye okwe maber.
Dhano jye odhyer. Jowacho ni, “Me kiti dhano manedi? Kir asur kodi kitula pa pi jye winjo go!”
Munyo Yesu obino i adech ma Gadara, yu loka man ma wakawaka, ji aryo moido jo ni gi jwogi aka jowok i ŋungu miyik'iye ji, joromo gine. Jono oido joger swa, amomiyo ji bin jolworo luwo royo no.
Piyo piyo no jokoko malo ni, “Iyenyo timo aŋo gi wan, Wuodi Were? Ibino chando wan ma fuodi ndir motire kotundo?
Chiegin kenyo, oido nitye sidwol mbiji ma chiemo.”
Gikenyo to jwogi jokwayo Yesu ni, “Ka imito ryemo wan woko, ere dhiri wan i sidwol mbiji no.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi win.” Gikenyo jowok to jodonjo i sidwol mbiji. Sidwol gi bee oloro piny wok wi tendere to jomunyere i pi.
Ji monwaŋo jokwayo mbiji joringo to jokidho i tindi, to jowacho ri ji ma kenyo gimoro jye motimere ri joma onwaŋo jwogi ni kwoŋ jo.
Gino omiyo dhano jye ma tindi owok kidho romo gi Yesu; aka munyo joneno go, jokwayo go ni woeye i adech pajo.
Yesu odonjo i yee to chiewere gik yu loka man ma wakawaka, to bino i tindi ma thugin won.
Kenyo, jomogo jokelo ri go dhano moido two nyaŋinya ma jotiŋo wi kitanda. Munyo Yesu oneno kiti yeyo pa jono, owacho ri ŋata two nyaŋinya ni, “Ikiri irembi, wuodan; gimarecho perin ochwak rin.”
Gikenyo jofuonji ma Chik wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Ŋat me kole luwo marach kwoŋ Were!”
Yesu oŋeyo gima oido joparo to wacho ni, “Raŋo ma wiparo gikipiny marecho ameno?
Mene mayot, wacho ni, ‘Gimarecho perin ochwak rin,’ kosa wacho ni, ‘Ayi malo iwothi?’
Amomiyo ere abino nyutho win ni Wuodi Dhano ni gi men i piny ka ma chwako gimarecho.” Gikenyo go owacho ri dhano moido two nyaŋinya ni, “Ayi malo, itiŋ kitanda perin, idok pecho.”
Jalo oay malo to doki pecho.
Munyo kweth ji moido ni kenyo joneno gino, jouro swa, to jopako Were momiyo dhano kiti men machal ameno.
Yesu oeye kenyo, aka munyo wotho, oneno jachoki misolo ma nyinge Mathayo obedo piny kama go oido tiyo iye. Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Luwan.” Mathayo oay malo to luwo go.
Munyo Yesu oido chiemo modyechieŋ i ot pa Mathayo, jochoki misolo mathoth kodi joma recho jobino to jobedo gi Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere dhower.
Munyo Jofarisayo mogo joneno gime, jowacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Raŋo ma jafuonji mewin chiemo gi jochoki misolo kodi joma recho?”
Yesu owinjo jo to wacho ni, “Jomolama ama jokiyeny jamilerwa, to joma two ayino ama joyenyo.
Kidhi win winiaŋ atoŋa momiyo ondik ni, ‘Ayenyo wor ayino, ma kiweno rachow ma lee.’ Kole akibino lwoŋo ji motire, to joma recho ayino.”
Gikenyo joma luwo Yohana Jakibatisa jobino bongi Yesu gi penji ni, “Raŋo wan kodi Jofarisayo wariyo kech noknok, to jofuonjirok perin jokiriy kada dichiel?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Chiene wendo ma kalima ma nywomirok bende jobedo gi rem ma fuodi jamweha nitye gi jo? Kinyalere! To ndir bino tundo ma ibino kwany'iye woko jamweha bongi jo nyaka to joriyo kech.
“Ongoye nyatoro ma kwoyo kot moti gi kiremo manyien, rupiri kiremo no leywayo kot to kamoyech medere bedo madwoŋ ayino.

Odoko ongoye nyatoro ma konjo medho vini manyien i migowa pyendere machon. Ka otimo ameno, pyendere lemwoch woko, to vini oy woko, to pyendere bende nyiekere. Kuchiel, ripere vini manyien wokonji i migowa pyendere manyien, ŋey nyaka gigo jaryo no jye bino kurere maber.”
Munyo Yesu oido fuodi wacho ri jo gime, jaserikale madwoŋ ma Jayudaya obino bonge, to ryewo chonge piny runyime ka wacho ni, “Nyaran nyaka owok tho won; to biye kethi chingin kwoŋe, aka go bino kwo.”
Gikenyo Yesu oay malo oluwo go, kanyachiel gi jofuonjirok pere.
Dhako moro, moido remo madit oy kwoŋe oro apar g'aryo gipi obino yu ŋey Yesu to geyo dhoki nanga pere.
Dheno owacho gi i chunye ni, “Bedi ayanja agey kada nyaka nanga pere won, d'abedo maber.”
Yesu owire to neno go to wacho ni, “Ikiri irembi, nyaran! Yeyo perin otyeko bothin.” I hongo no won to dheno bedo maber.
Gikenyo Yesu okidho i ot pa jaserikale madwoŋ. Aka munyo oneno jokudhi madundo, kodi kweth ji moido joucho, owacho ni,
“Ngoye win ka wijojye; nyathi ma nyako no kotho, go nindo ayino!” To jono jonyiero go.
Aka munyo otyek wodho ji jye woko, Yesu odonjo i ot to mako chingi nyathi manyako no to nyalo ay malo.
Wach no olak i adech ma piny no gipi.
Yesu oeye kenyo, aka munyo kadho, ji aryo ma waŋ gin otho jochako luwo go munyo jokoko ni, “Timi ri wan wor, Wuodi pa Daudi!”
Munyo Yesu odonjo i ot, joma waŋ gin otho no jobino bonge to go penjo jo ni, “Wiyeyo ni anyalo timo gino?” To jodwoko ni, “Ey jadwoŋ.”
Gikenyo go ogeyo waŋ jo aka owacho ni, “Ere, wobedi ameno chungo kwoŋ yeyo mewin!”
Waŋ jono ochako neno. To Yesu chiko jo teltel ni, “Wikiri wiwachi ri nyatoro.”
To joeye kenyo munyo jonyayo wach kwoŋ Yesu i adech jye ma piny no.
Munyo ji oido jokadho, jomogo jokelo ri Yesu obadha ma jwogi oido ni kwoŋe.
Tekin otyek ryemo woko jwogi no, ŋato ochako luwo, to dhano jye dhyer. Jowacho ni, “Fuodi wakineno gima chalo ama i Israel!”
To Jofarisayo jowacho ni, “Ruodhi jwogi ama miyo go men ma ryemo woko jo.”
Gikenyo Yesu okidho i tindi jye kodi loka jye. Go ofuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya munyo tito Wach Maber ma Ker, aka obotho ji kwoŋ kiti two kodi ramirok jye.
Munyo go oneno kweth ji, wor opoŋ i chunye ri jo, rupiri oido jonitye i rembo aka kony ongoye pa roombo ma bu jakwath.
Ri ameno go owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Kecho opikere, to jotich ama nok;
amomiyo kwayi win Ruoth ma won kecho wodhiri jotich jowokechi ri go.”
Yesu olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere apar g'aryo kanyachiel to miyo jo men ma ryemo woko chuny mochido kodi ma botho kiti ramirok jye kodi two jye.
Me a nyingi jomoor apar g'aryo: Marapena Simon (milwoŋo ni Petro) kodi Andereya omin go; Yakobo kodi Yohana omin go, woti Zebedayo;
Filipo kodi Batholomayo; Thoma kodi Mathayo, jachoki misolo; Yakobo wuodi pa Alfayo kodi Thadeyo;
Simon ma wok Kana ma jalwenyi ri piny pere; kodi Yuda Iskaryot mochamo sereko ri Yesu.
Yesu ooro japar g'aryo no gi fuonji me: “Wikiri wikidhi i piny pa Jopath kosa i tindi moro jye ma Samarya,
kwanyo woko, kidhi win bongi roombo morwenyo ma ot pa Joisrael.
Kidhi wifuonji ni, ‘Ker ma polo ni chiegin.’
Bothi win jotwo, chierino win jomotho, lonyi win jodhowo, ryemi win jwogi. Wilimo ma bu chul, amomiyo bende miyi win ji ma bu chul.
Wikiri witiŋ zawabu kada feza, kosa dome moro i migowa mewin.
Wikiri witiŋ migowa ma kwach i woth mewin, kosa sat man, kosa war, kosa luth. Jatich ripo limo gima go tiyo rigo.
“Ka witundo i tindi kosa loka moro, donji win aka wirangi ŋata yeyo jolo win, aka wibedi gi go chuka winoeye kenyo.
Ka widonjo i ot, mothi win jo ni, ‘Syem wobedi kodi win.’
Ka ji ma kenyo jojolo win, weyi syem mewin wodoŋi kenyo; to ka jokojolo win, syem mewin wodwoki ri win.
Aka ka nyatoro kojolo win, kosa okwero chiko ithe ri win, ka wiwok pecho no kosa i tindi no, witeŋ woko fukefuke ma tyendi win.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ndelo ma thumo banja bino bedo marach ri tindi no loyo Sodom kodi Gomora.
“Neni win! Onyo adhiro win paka roombo i dyer arara. Wiripo bedo maryek pa thwol odoko mamwol pa akuru.
Kure win, rupiri ji jobino mako win to jotero win i kapido, aka jobino chwado win i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Ibino tero win bongi jodhum madongo kodi kerin kwoŋ bedo an, ŋey wititi Wach Maber ri jo kodi ri Jopath bende.
Ka oter win kapido, wikiri wirembi gima wibino wacho kosa paka winoluw. Ato ibino miyo win gima winowachi.
Kole wach ma winowachi kobedi mewin; to bino wok bongi Chuny pa Baa win ma bino luwo i win.
“Omin dhano won ama bino tero omin go woneki, aka bachere bende jobino timo ameno ri nyithindho pajo; nyithindho bende jobino wire ri jonywol pajo to jomiyo ineko jo.
Dhano jye bino mon gi win, kwoŋbedo an. To ŋata ochir chuka gike bino both.
Aka ka ilwenyo gi win i tindi achiel, ringi win i man. Awacho ri win, wikochow tich mewin i tindi jye ma Israel ma fuodi Wuodi Dhano kobino.
“Ongoye jafuonjirok ma loyo jafuonji pere gi dwoŋ, aka ŋecha bende kiloy ruoth pere gi dwoŋ.

Ripo ka jafuonjirok odongo to chale kodi jafuonji pere, kendo ŋecha bende wochale gi ruoth pere. Aka kotyek lwoŋo won pecho ni Belzebul, kosa to joma ni pecho pere olwoŋ jo gi nyingijo marecho manedi!
“Amomiyo, wikiri wilwor ji. Ongoye gimoro jye moum ma koyaw, kosa nyaliŋliŋ moro jye ma kothangi kamaler.
Gima onyo awacho ri win i mudho wiripo medo wacho odyechieŋ. Aka gima wiwinjo omwoŋ liŋliŋ wiripo wacho gi i tipin wiy ot.
Wikiri wilwor joma neko del to jokinyal neko chuny; to lwori win Ŋat ma nyalo nyieko woko kwo madel kodi chuny jye i mach makitho.
Obicho aryo kinyew nyaka siringi achiel be? To kada achiel kwoŋ jo kinyal podho piny ma Baa win koŋeyo.
Aka kole kir yewiy win jye otyek kwano.
Amomiyo wikiri wibedi malwor; welo mewin loyo apa obicho kweth.
“Ŋata otuchan i dyer ji nike go ŋata luwan, abende abino tucho nyinge ameno i nyim Baba mani polo.
To ŋata okwedere kwoŋan i dyer ji nike go kobedo aparan, abende abino kwedere kwoŋe i nyim Baba mani polo.
“Wikiri wipar nike abino kelo syem i piny; be, akibino kelo syem, to abor ayino.
Abino thuyo woti ji gi bachere pajo, nyigi ji gi megi jo, mondiwoti ji kodi adhachere pajo;
jakwor pa dhano bino bedo joma ot pere won.
“Ŋata omari bamere kosa yokimere loyan koripi bedo aparan, odoko bende ŋata omari wuode kosa nyare loyan koripi bedo aparan.
Moro jye ma kotiŋ musalaba pere to luwan koripi bedo aparan.
Ŋata won otemi gwoko kwo pere bino rwenyo woko, to ŋata oboli woko kwo pere kwoŋbedo an, bino limo.
“Ŋata jolo win, meno jolan, aka ŋata jolan meno jolo ŋata ooran.
Ŋata jolo jamikwenda pa Were rupiri go jamikwenda bino limo kemba machale g'apa jamikwenda. Ŋata jolo dhano maleŋ rupiri go leŋ, bino limo kemba pa ŋataleŋ.
Aka adyeri awacho ri win, ŋata omiyi achiel kwoŋ nyithindho ma joluwan me kada nyaka pi maŋich rupiri go obedo ŋata luwan, ŋato kibino keŋ kemba pere.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo fuonjo jofuonjirok pere apar g'aryo, oeye kenyo to kidho fuonji gi tito Wach Maber i tindin ma chiegin gi kenyo.
Aka munyo Yohana Jakibatisa owinjo gi i twech kwoŋ tich pa Kristo, ooro jofuonjirok pere megi bonge.
Jopenjo Yesu ni, “Wachi ri wan, in a ŋata owach nike lebino kosa wakur ŋat man?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Giki wiwachi ri Yohana gima pama wiwinjo kodi ma wineno.
Joma waŋ gin otho joneno, jomoŋol jowotho, jodhowo jolony, joma ithi gin otho jowinjo, aka jomotho ichierino jo, aka ifuonjo jochandi Wach Maber.
Jasilwany a ŋata kibedi gi kiganagana kwoŋan!”
Munyo jofuonjirok pa Yohana joay jodok, Yesu oluwo ri kweth ji kwoŋ Yohana ni, “Munyo wikidho both Yohana i thim, onwaŋo wigeno neno aŋo? Midole ma koyo yengo?
To aŋo won ma wikidho yu koro neno? Neno dhano morukere i nengin mabeyo mayomi? Kole joma ruko nengin mayom no jonwaŋere i udi pa kerin ayino.
To yagi, aŋo won motero win korago? Neno jatuchi wach Were? Adyeri awacho ri win, go loyo kir jatuchi wach Were.
Me a ŋata ondik kwoŋe ni, ‘Eno adhiro jamikwenda paran yu wiyin, ma bino yiko rin royo.’
Adyeri awacho ri win, kwoŋ woti mon jye, ongoye motyeko yudhere malo i dwoŋ loyo Yohana Jakibatisa. Kuchiel, kada ŋata oasa thin i Ker ma polo jye loyo go gi dwoŋ.
Wok i ndir pa Yohana Jakibatisa chuka tundo konon, otyek mwonjo Ker ma polo gi maker, aka ji ma jomaker jodonj'iye gi mbaka.
Ato jotuchi wach Were jye kodi Chik pa Musa, joluwo kwoŋ Ker pa Were tundo ndir pa Yohana;
aka ka wiyeyo gima awacho, go ama obino paka Eliya monwaŋo ripo bino.
Ŋata ni gi ithe wowinji!
“To onyo anopima luse ji ma pama g'aŋo? Jochalo nyithindho ma jo ni dyer kisya. Bwora achiel koko ri nyawote ni,
‘Wakudho ri win madundo mamit, to wikwero myel! Wawero ri win wer tho, to wikwero ywak!’
Neni Yohana obino ma riyo kech aka kimedhi, to jowacho ni, ‘Nigi jwogi kwoŋe.’

Onyo wuodi Dhano obino ma chiemo aka oro giramadha, to jowacho ni, ‘Panen jaworo ma jamadhi vini, jawodhi jochoki misolo kodi joma recho!’ Kuchiel ryeko pa Were ineno adyeri mere chungo kwoŋ tim ma wok'iye.”
Gikenyo Yesu ochako kwoŋo tindin ma go oasa tim'iye giraura rupiri ji jokoŋuto gimarecho pajo.
“Kidamba otundi ri win, Korazin! Kodi Bethsaida! Kole bedi giraura motim i win tim i Tire kodi Sidon, di ji ma kenyo joruko kutya, to jobukere gi buru ma nyutho ni joŋuto gimarecho pajo.
To awacho ri win, ndelo ma thumo banja bino bedo ma dhey ye ri Tire kodi Sidon loyo ri win.
Aka in, Kapernaum, oido imito wotiŋin malo kir i polo? Ilebolin i piny pa jomotho ayino. Ato bedi giraura motyek timo rin tim i Sodom ayin, kole di Sodom fuodi nitye kir konon.
To awacho rin, i ndelo ma thumo banja Sodom bino limo girachula ma dhey ye loyin.”
I hongo no Yesu owacho kamaler ni, “Afuoyin Baba, Ruoth ma polo gi piny, rupiri ipano gikipiny me ri joma ryek kodi jomofuonjere tiwodho kamaler ri nyithindho ayino.
Ey, Baba, kole ama apaka chunyin osangala ni wotimere.
Baba otyeko miyan gimoro jye, aka onyo ongoye ŋatoŋeyo Wuode kwanyo woko Bamere, kendo ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo Bamere kwanyo woko Wuode kodi joma Wuode odyero nyutho jo kamaler.
Biye win bongan wijojye ma wiol aka wilachere i tiŋo byeto mapek, lebino miyo win ywomirok.
Byeli win okol paran i ŋuti win aka wifuonjere kwoŋan; kole abedo moth aka abwonere iyi adundo paran; aka wibino nwaŋo ywomirok i chuny win.
Kole okol paran yot aka byeto paran sew.”
Munyo hongo moro okadho, Yesu oluwo gi i ndelin ma ŋano; jofuonjirok pere oido jowinjo kech, to jochako fuono withi ŋano gi chamo.
To munyo Jofarisayo joneno, jowacho ri go ni, “Panen, kole jofuonjirok perin jotimo gima koyey timo i Sabato.”
Go owacho ri jo ni, “Fuodi wikisoma gima Daudi otimo, kodi joma oido nigi go;
paka go odonjo i ot pa Were to jochamo mugat momiy Were moido kiripi ni go kosa joma oido ni gine jowochami, kwanyo woko jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kende?
Kosa fuodi wikisoma i Chik pa Musa, paka kis ndelo ma Sabato jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma Ot pa Were joturo chik ma Sabato, to kikwan ri jo recho?
Awacho ri win, kole gimadwoŋ ma kalo Ot pa Were ni ka.
Aka bedi wityeko ŋeyo dwoŋ wach me ni, ‘Ayenyo wor ayino ma kiweno rachow ma lee’, d'onyo wikithum banja ri jomongoye gi recho moro.
Kole Wuodi Dhano obedo Ruoth ma Sabato.”
Yesu oeye kenyo to kidho donjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya moro,
kama onwaŋ'iye dhano ma chinge otho. To jopenjo go ni, “Chik yeyo botho dhano i Sabato?” Jopenjo ameno ni aka ŋey jowokethi kwoŋe recho.
To go owacho ri jo ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ win ma ka rombo pere achiel opodho i bur i ndelo ma Sabato weyo kenyo ma kofudho woko?
Onyo welo dhano kalo apa rombo kadidi? Ri ameno kitur Chik timo gimaber i Sabato.”
Gikenyo owacho ri jal ma chinge otho no ni, “Ryeyi chingin!” To jalo ryeyo chinge no to bende lokere maber paka nyawote ma kuchiel.
Gikenyo Jofarisayo joay jokadho to jotimo chan ma neko Yesu.
Munyo Yesu oŋeyo gino, oeye kenyo. Ji mathoth joluwo go, to botho jotwo jye,
aka omiyo jo or ni kiri jowowachi ri joman kwoŋ go.
Owach ameno ŋey gima jatuchi wach Were Isaya owacho wotundi ni:
“Panen jatich paran ma atyeko yero ma amaro aka chunyan sangala gine. Abino ketho Chuny Maleŋ paran i go, aka go bino tucho tiro ri nonin jye.
Go kibino pyemo kosa koko, kosa luwo malo i royo mokakere ma tindi.
Go kibino turo midole mokom, kosa neko tala maliel ma nimnim. Go bino riwin chuka omiyi tiro oloyi lweny.
Nonin jye jobino ketho geno pajo i nyinge.”
Gikenyo jomogo jokelo ri Yesu obadha ma waŋe otho aka oido kinyal luwo ru jwogi moido ni kwoŋe. Yesu obotho ŋato to nyalo luwo kir gi neno.
Kweth ji jodhyer swa, to jowacho ni, “Kosa me nyalo bedo Nyakwar Daudi?”
To munyo Jofarisayo jowinjo gime jodwoko ni, “Go ryemo woko jwogi gi men pa Belzebul, ruoth pa jwogi.”
Yesu oŋeyo gima oido joparo to wacho ri jo ni, “Piny moro jye ma tyakere bwora gi bwora aka wegi jolwenyo, bino podho.
Amomiyo ka Sitan oere ryemo woko Sitan i ker pa jwogi dwoŋ mere ni won otyeko kelo tyakirok, onyo ker pere ochungi nedi?
K'inen aryemo woko jwogi gi men pa Belzebul, kere onyo men pa ŋa ma joma luwo win joryemo gine jo? Amomiyo joma luwo win won ama jobino thumo banja woloyi win!
To k'inen aryemo woko jwogi gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ, nyutho ni kere onyo Ker pa Were otyeko tundo bongi win.
“Ongoye ŋata nyalo turo ot pa jameni to nyaga lim pere, kwanyo woko ka okutho otweyo jameni no aka ŋey wonyali kinyaga gima ni ot pere.
“Ŋata kitiyere kodan meno lwenyo kodan, aka adyeri ŋata kikonyan gi choko gikipiny, meno kedho woko ayino.
Amomiyo awacho ri win, ibino chwako ri ji recho kodi gima kotire ma joluwi kwoŋ Were; to ŋata oluwi gima kotire kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ, kibin chwako go i hongo ma pama kir gi i mabino yuwaŋe jye.
Moro jye ma luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Wuodi Dhano ibino chwako go, to ŋata oluwi gima kotire kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ kibin chwako go, pama kendo gi i kare mabino jye.
“Ka iyenyo olemo maber, iripo bedo gi tyendi yath olemo bende maber; to ka ini gi tyendi yath marach, bende ibino nwaŋo olemo marach. Kole bero pa yath iŋeyo kwoŋ gimanyak kwoŋe.
Win nyithindhi thwole! Di winyal luwo nedi wach maber mato wirecho? Kole wach ma dhano luwo meno gima opoŋ i chunye.
Dhano maber wodho gikipiny mabeyo wok kwoŋ gikipiny mabeyo mopoŋ i chunye; aka dhano marach bende wodho gikipiny marecho wok kwoŋ recho mopoŋ i chunye.
“Aka awacho ri win, i ndelo ma thumo banja, dhano jye bino tito wach jye masisiri ma go otyeko luwo.
Kole wach perin ama nyalo miyo ikwanyo woko kwoŋin banja, kosa iketho kwoŋin banja.”
Gikenyo jofuonji ma Chik mogo kodi Jafarisayo joluwo malo ni, “Jafuonji wayenyo neno ranyuth m'itimo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Luse ji marecho ma kigenere i waŋ Were ama kwayo ranyuth. Ongoye ranyuth m'ilemiyo win kwanyo woko apa Yona jatuchi wach Were.
Paka Yona ochowo odyechieŋ adek kodi wor adek i iyi rech, apaka bende Wuodi Dhano bino chowo odyechieŋ adek gi wor adek i iyi lowo.
I ndelo ma thumo banja, ji ma Nineve jobino chungo gi luse ji ma pama to jothumo banja loyo jo, rupiri joŋuto gimarecho pajo munyo jowinjo Yona fuonjo; to kole ŋat ma loyo Yona gi dwoŋ ee ni ka!

I ndelo ma thumo banja kere ma dhako ma wok Sheba i thenge ma yu Tyendi piny bino chungo to thumo banja woloyi win, rupiri go owotho othoko piny wok kama bor bino winjo ryeko pa Solomon; aka kole ŋat ma loyo Solomon gi dwoŋ ee ni ka!
“Ka chuny mochido owok kwoŋ dhano, wotho i piny mothwo ka rango kabedo maywomirok to kinwaŋ.
Ri ameno ka konyalo nwaŋo, won wacho ni, ‘Abino gik i ot paran ma awok'iye.’ Ka odwoko to nwaŋo ot no ni nono kendo olony aka oyik maber,

gikenyo go lewok to kidho kelo chuny mochido wadi man abiryo marecho loyo go, to jobino donjo gi bedo kenyo. Kwo pa ŋato bino lokere marach loyo paka onwaŋo nitye chon. Meno apaka bino timere ri ji marecho ma pama.”
Munyo Yesu fuodi oido luwo gi ji, min kodi wutimin jotundo. Jochungo woko, aka jokwayo luwo gi go.
Ri ameno ŋatachiel moido ni kenyo owacho ri go ni, “Panen, yokin kodi wutimerin jochungo woko, aka jomito luwo kodin.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ŋa ma yokan? Jokune ma wutimera?”
Gikenyo go ochimo jofuonjirok pere to wacho ni, “Panen! Jome a mama gi wutimera!
Kole ŋata timo gima Baba mani polo yenyo wotimi, meno ama obedo omera, nyamera, gi yokan.”
I ndelo no won, Yesu owok i ot to kidho i thengi wakawaka kama go obed'iye piny wofuonji ji.
Paka muma ji mothoko go onwaŋo oasa dwoŋ, go odonjo i yee to bed'iye, kareno ji jye jochungo i thengi pi.
Go ooro agechin munyo luwo ri jo kwoŋ gikipiny madit ama: “Onwaŋo nitye dhano mokidho chwoyo.
Munyo go bayo kodhi i ndelo, megi opodho i thengi yo to winyin jobino to jochamo woko.
Megi opodho i lowo ma wi tele, kama lowo oido rep'iye. Kodhi no okwako twi, rupiri lowo oido rep.
Aka munyo chieŋ olyel, gimotwi no oner woko; odoko paka tyendi gimotwi no onwaŋo fuodi kodonjo bor i lowo, gino jye othwo woko mayot.
Kodhi megi opodho i kudhin, to kudhin no dongo to diyo woko gimotwi no.
To kodhi megi podho i lowo ma diwa, to nyak: megi nyinge miya achiel, megi pyero auchiel, megi pyero adek.”
Gikenyo to Yesu wacho ni, “Ŋata ni gi ithe wowinji!”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jobino bongi Yesu to jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo ma ioro agechin ma luwo gi jo?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ryeko ma nyaliŋliŋ ma Ker ma polo omiy win, to komiy jo.
Kole dhano ma nitye gi gimoro ibino medo go man to bedo kodi gima kalo ma go yenyo, to ŋata ongoye gi gimoro ibino kwanyo woko kwoŋe kada nyaka mathin ma go oido ni gine.
Me ama omiyo aoro agechin ka aluwo gi jo, rupiri joŋiiyo to jokineen, jochiko ithi gin to jokiwinji, odoko jokiniaŋ dwoŋ mere.
Amomiyo wach pa Isaya jatuchi wach Were otundo i kare ni, ‘Adyeri wibino chiko ithi win, to wikoniaŋ; odoko wibino ŋiiyo, to wikoniaŋ dwoŋ gima wineno.

Rupiri chuny jome olokere manwaŋ, ithi gin onyo kiwinji, aka waŋ gin jomiyo woko Kole waŋ gin d'onyalo neno odoko ithi gin d'onyalo winjo, kendo paro pajo d'onyalo niaŋ dwoŋ wach to jogik bongan, aka ameno d'abotho jo.’
To win wijosilwany swa! Waŋ win neno aka ithi win winjo.
Adyeri awacho ri win! Jotuchi wach Were mathoth kodi ji pa Were mathoth chango joyenyo swa neno gima wineno, to jokonyalo neno, kodi winjo gima wiwinjo, to jokonyalo winjo.
“Onyo chiki win ithi win aka wifuonjere dwoŋ agecha pa jachwoyo.
Ka nyatoro winjo mikwenda kwoŋ Ker to kiniaŋ dwoŋ mere, jwogi bino to mayo go woko gima onwaŋo ochwoy i adundo pere; me a kodhi mopodho i thengi royo.
Kodhi mopodho i lowo ma wi tele nyutho joma jolo mikwenda gi kisangala tekin jowinjo.
To wach no kirochi i chuny jo. Amomiyo ka teko kosa chandirok moro obino ru wach no, jonyochere piyo.
Kodhi mopodho i kudhin nyutho joma winjo mikwenda, to rembo ri kwo ma piny kodi maro ŋaŋo, diyo wach no piny to lokere gima kinyak.
Aka kodhi mochwoy i lowo ma diwa nyutho joma winjo mikwenda to joniaŋ dwoŋ mere; jonyak gimabeyo, megi miya achiel, megi pyero auchiel, megi pyero adek.”
Yesu oluwo ri jo i agecha man ama: “Ker ma polo chalo dhano mochwoyo kodhi maber i ndelo pere.
Obedo wor achiel, munyo dhano jye oido nindo, jakwor obino to chwoyo weeyo i dyer ŋano no, to kadho.
Munyo gima ochwoy odongo to chako ŋok, weeyo bende to nenere.
Jotich pere jobino bonge to jowacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, kole ichwoyo kodhi maber i ndelo perin; to weeyo odoko owok yu kune?’
Go odwoko ni, ‘Jakwor moro am'otimo ameno.’ To jopenjo go ni, ‘Iyenyo wakidhi wafudhi woko weeyo no?’
Go odwoko ni, ‘Be, rupiri ka wiero choko weeyo no winyalo fudho gi ŋano bende.

To weyi kutho jojye jowodongi kanyachiel chuka ndelo ma kecho otundi, aka anowachi ri joma kecho ni: kutho fudhi win woko weeyo witwey kanyachiel i wich ma bolere i mach, ŋey gikenyo nyaka wichoki ŋano to wiketho i dero paran.’ ”
Yesu oluwo ri jo i agecha man ama: “Ker ma polo chalo kodhi kalantus, moasa thin kwoŋ kodhi man jye;
dhano kwanyo to pidho i ndelo pere, aka ka otyeko dongo loyo gimatwi jye gi dwoŋ. Go lokere yath ma winyin jobino to jogero odi gin i jange.”
Yesu odoko oluwo ri jo i agecha man ama: “Ker ma polo chalo thow ma dhako nyalo kwanyo to ruwo gi moko i nywero chuka moko gipi yenyo.”
Yesu oluwo ri muma ji i agechin i gikipiny mowach me jye; go kowacho gimoro ri ji ma kooro agecha.
Go otimo ameno ma miyo gima jatuchi wach Were owacho wotundi i kare ni, “Abino oro agechin ka aluwo gi jo, abino wacho ri jo gima oido opanere wok i chwech pa piny.”
Gikenyo Yesu oeye bongi muma ji to donjo i ot. Jofuonjirok pere jobino bonge to jowacho ni, “Tuchi ri wan dwoŋ agecha ma weeyo mani i ndelo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ŋata ochwoyo kodhi maber, meno Wuodi Dhano;
ndelo, meno piny me; kodhi maber meno nyithidho ma Ker pa Were; weeyo meno nyithidho pa jwogi;
aka jakwor mochwoyo weeyo meno jwogi won. Ndelo ma kecho meno giki ndir, aka jokecho meno jomalaika.
Aka paka weeyo ichoko aka iwaŋo i mach, apaka bende bino bedo i hongo ma giki ndir:
Wuodi Dhano bino oro jomalaika bino choko wok i ker pere gimoro jye ma miyo ji timo gimarach, kodi joma recho jye,
to jobolo jo i kendo madwoŋ ma mach, kama jobino ywak'iye kareno jokayo laki gin.
Aka joma jotire jobino lyel pa mach i Ker pa Baa jo. Amomiyo winji win ka winitye gi ithi win!
“Ker ma polo chalo ŋaŋo mopan i ndelo. Dhano moro ochombo kwoŋe, gikenyo to umo kendo. Go odok gi kisangala momiyo go okidho to tana woko gikipiny man jye ma go oido ni gine, to gik nyiewo ndelo no.
“Ker ma polo bende chalo janyiew ma rango gee mawelo.
Ka go onwaŋo mawelo tektek, go kidho to tana woko gikipiny man jye ma go oido ni gine, to gik nyiewo gee no.
“Ker ma polo bende chalo bwoo ma jokitoga jobolo i wakawaka, to jomako rech ma nger jye.
Ka otyeko poŋ, jokitoga joywayo wi geŋin i thengi pi to jobedo piny poko rech: mabeyo mere iketho i kibumbulu, aka mongoye kony mere ibolo woko.
Meno apaka bende bino bedo i ndelo ma rumachien: jomalaika jolebino to jokwanyo woko joma recho bongi jomotire,
to jobolo jo i kendo madwoŋ ma mach. Kenyo jobino ywak'iye kareno jokayo laki gin.”
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Winiaŋ dwoŋ gikipiny me?” Jodwoko ni, “Ey.”
Gikenyo go odwoko ni, “Amomiyo, jafuonji jye ma Chik motyek fuonjo go kwoŋ Ker ma polo, chale gi won pecho ma wodho gikipiny machon kodi manyien jye wok i dero pere.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo wacho agechin me, oeye kenyo,
to gik i tindi pajo. Go ofuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya, aka joma jowinjo fuonji pere jodhyer swa. Jopenjo ni, “Go onwaŋo kune ryeko me kodi men ma timo giraura?
Me won kobedo wuodi pa japachi? Yokimere ki Marya, aka Yakobo, Yozefu, Simon, kodi Yuda meno ki wutimin go?
Nyimin go jye jokinitye ka gi wani? Go onwaŋo gime jye kune?”
Gikenyo jokwero go. Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Jatuchi wach Were imiyo dwoŋ iye jye kwanyo woko i tindi pajo won kodi i pecho pajo won.”
Go kotimo giraura madit kenyo kwoŋbedo onwaŋo jongoye gi yeyo.
I ndir ma Herode oido obedo ruoth ma Galileya, owinjo kwoŋ Yesu.
Go wacho ri joserikale pere ni, “Me Yohana Jakibatisa won ama ochierino, amomiyo men ma timo giraura me nitye i go.”
Ato Herode ama ndir cha owodho or ni womaki Yohana wotwey, tiketho go i ka twech. Go otimo ameno ru wach pa Herodya, chipa omin go milwoŋo ni Filipo,
rupiri Yohana omena wacho ri Herode ni, “Kobedo gimotire bedo gi dhako no!”
Herode oyenyo neko go to oido lworo Joyudaya, rupiri oido jotero Yohana paka jatuchi wach Were.
I ndelo ma poyo nywolirok pa Herode, nyapa Herodya omyelo i nyim wendo gi bee. Herode osangala gine swa,
momiyo ochiko nyano ni, “Akwoŋere nike abino miyin gimoro jye m'inokwayan!”
Paka yokimere omiyo go ryeko, go okwayo ni, “Miyan wich Yohana Jakibatisa i sen ka!”
Kere ogut, to ru kwoŋirok pere ma go oido otyeko timo i nyim wendo pere gi bee, go owodho or nike gima nyano oyenyo womiy go.
Ameno go ooro ji kidho ŋondo wich Yohana i katwech.
Wich no okel i ot i sen timiyo nyano to tero bothi yokimere.
Jofuonjirok pa Yohana jobino, jokwanyo delkwoŋe, to joyiko aka jokidho to jowacho ri Yesu.
Munyo Yesu owinjo wach no, oeye kenyo gi yee to kidho kakende. Munyo ji jowinjo gino, joluwo go wok i tindin pajo.
Yesu owok i yee, aka munyo oneno kweth ji, omako wor i chunye gi jo, to botho jotwo pajo.
Othyeno no, jofuonjirok pere jokidho bonge to jowacho ni, “Kole piny otyeko yutho, aka ka dyer thim. Sewila ji jowokidhi loka jowonyiew chiemo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Jokiripi eye ka. Wiwegi miyi win jo chiemo moro jowochami.”
Jodwoko ni, “Gima wanitye gine ka obedo nyaka mugat abich kodi rech aryo kende.”
Yesu owacho ni, “Keli gino jye bongan ka.”
Gikenyo ooro ji bedo piny i lum, aka okwanyo mugat abich gi rech aryo no, oŋiyo malo i polo, to fuoyo Were. Go oturo mugat no to miyo jofuonjirok, aka jofuonjirok jokwanyo to jopoko ji.
Dhano jye ochiemo to yeŋ. Rumachien jofuonjirok jochoko ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ to poŋo aditin apar g'aryo.
Welo chwo ma jochiemo onwaŋo romo chiegin gana abich, ma kokwan mon gi nyithidho.
Gikenyo Yesu omiyo jofuonjirok pere donjo i yee jowoteli kidho ri go yu loka ma kocha ma wakawaka, ka fuodi go won oido sewila ji.
Munyo otyeko kisewila ji, go okutho oidho wi got kende kwayo. Munyo piny otundo othyeno, Yesu oido ni kenyo kende,
kareno yee otundo bor i wakawaka lwenyo gi pi ma tula, aka asur oido kudho wok yu wiye.
I dyer sawa abuŋwen kodi apar g'aryo modikini, Yesu obino bongi jo munyo wotho wi pi.
Munyo jofuonjirok joneno go wotho wi pi, lworo omako jo. Jowacho ni, “Manago yamo!” To jokoko gi lworo.
Piyo piyo no to Yesu luwo gi jo munyo wacho ni, “Wikiri wirembi, me an. Wikiri wilwor.”
Gikenyo Petro oluwo malo ni, “Ruoth, ka meno in adyeri, oran awoki abin bongin wi pi.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Biye”, to Petro wok i yee to wotho wi pi munyo kidho bongi Yesu.
To tekin go neno asur, lworo omako go to chako munyirok i pi. Gikenyo go okoko ni, “Ruoth! Bothan!”
Yesu ochwayo chinge mayot to mako go munyo wacho ni, “Ijayeyo mathin. Raŋo ma iganagana?”
Aka munyo jotyeko donjo i yee to asur kwe.
Joma onwaŋo ni yee jolamo go ka jowacho ni, “Adyeri, in i Wuodi Were.”
Jochiewere aka jotundo loka ma Genesaret.
Munyo ji ma kenyo joŋeyo ni meno Yesu, jodhiro wach ri ji ma jo ni gi jotwo i adech ma piny no to jokelo jotwo bongi Yesu.
Jokwayo go nike woyeyi jotwo jowogeyi kada nyaka dhoki nanga pere won; aka joma jogeyo go jye jobedo maber.
To Jofarisayo megi gi jofuonji ma Chik jobino bongi Yesu wok Yerusalem to jo penjo go ni,
“Iraŋo jofuonjirok perin jochayo kula pa kwarere mawan? Jokilogi chingi gin paka mitere ka jokidho chiemo!”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “To iraŋo ma wichayo Or pa Were to wiluwo kula mewin wiwegi?
Kole Were owacho ni, ‘Wori benin gi yokin’, aka, ‘Ŋata yeto bamere kosa yokimere ibino neko.’
To win wifuonjo ni ka nyatoro owacho ri bamere kosa yokimere ni, ‘Kony moro jye ma d'amiyin onyo obedo mich moyik ri Were ayin’, gikenyo go onyo kiripi woro bamere kosa yokimere.
Me apaka wilwogo woko Or pa Were, kareno wiluwo fuonji mewin wiwegi.
Win wijorendirok! Isaya otucho wach ma mako kwoŋ win me motire ni,
‘Ji me jomiyan dwoŋ gi dhoki gin kende, to chuny gin ni bor kodan!
Ongoye kony ri jo laman, kwoŋbedo jofuonjo or mobedo apa dhanadhana.’ ”
Gikenyo Yesu olwoŋo kweth ji bonge to wacho ri jo ni, “Chiki win ithi win, aka winiaŋi!
Gima donjo i dhoki dhano ama kiloki go makoch: to gima wok i dhoke ama loko go makoch.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok pere jobino bonge to jowacho ni, “Iŋeyo paka Jofarisayo chuny gin oramo jo i gima iwacho no?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Gimoro jye ma twi ma Baba mani polo ama kopidho ibino fudho woko.
Weyi ri win jo! Jobedo jotel ma waŋ gin otho; aka ka jathowaŋ achiel ama kodo jathowaŋ man, jaryo jye jopodho i bur.”
Petro oluwo malo ni, “Titi ri wan dwoŋ agecha me.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kere wibende fuodi wikiniaŋ gimoro?
Wikiniaŋ ni gimoro jye ma donjo i dhoki dhano donjo i iye, aka kadho akadha to wok woko?
To gikipiny ma wok i dhoki dhano wok i chunye; gikipiny ma chalo ameno ama loko dhano makoch.
Ato i adundo ama wok'iye paro marecho ma rwako go i nek, timo chot, kodi kidakana, kwo, rooro, gi nyieko nyingi joman.
Me a gikipiny ma loko dhano makoch. To chiemo ma kologi chingi jo paka jowacho ni iripo timo no ama kiloki dhano makoch.”
Yesu oeye kenyo to kadho i adech ma chiegin gi tindi ma Tire kodi Sidon.
Dhako Jakanan moro ma wok i adech no obino bonge to ywakere ni, “Nyakwar Daudi, timi reye wor! Nyaran jwogi ni kwoŋe aka nitye marach tektek.”
Yesu kodwoko go gimoro. To jofuonjirok pere jobino bonge to jokwayo go ni, “Sewila go wokadhi, rupiri go eno luwo wan aka koko kichar!”
Gikenyo Yesu odwoko ni, “Ooran nyaka bothi roombo morwenyo ma ot pa Israel kende.”
Munyo dheno owinjo ameno, obino to guro chonge katyendi Yesu munyo wacho ni, “Ruoth, konyan!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kotire kwanyo chiemo pa nyithindho tibolo ri gwokere.”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Meno adyeri, jadwoŋ, to kole kada gwokere bende jochamoye ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ ma podho wok i meza pa jodongo pajo.”
Gikenyo Yesu odwoko go ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, ini gi yeyo madwoŋ! Gima iyenyo wotimere rin.” Aka i hongo no won ama nyare obed'iye maber.
Yesu oeye kenyo to luwo gi i thengi wakawaka ma Galileya munyo kadho. Kenyo go oidho tendere moro to bedo piny.
Kweth ji jobino bonge munyo jokelo jomoŋol, joma waŋ gin otho, joma tyendi gin owiyere, obadhin kodi joma two mathoth, kareno joketho jo katyendi Yesu, to go botho jojye.
Ji jodhyer swa munyo joneno obadhin joluwo, joma tyendi gin owiyere jolama, jomoŋol jowotho, aka joma waŋ gin otho joneno; aka jopako Were pa Israel.

Yesu olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere bonge to wacho ri jo ni, “Chunyan raman ri ji me, rupiri jotyeko bedo kodan ndelo adek aka onyo jongoye kodi girachama. Akimiti wisewila jo ma wakipidho jo, rupiri limbuju nyalo redho jo piny i royo ka jodok pecho.”
Jofuonjirok jopenjo ni, “Wanonwaŋ chiemo kune i thim ka ma nyalo pidho kweth ji me?”
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Winitye gi mugat adi?” Jodwoko ni, “Nyaka mugat abiryo won kodi rech mathindhothindho manok.”
Gikenyo Yesu ooro kweth ji no bedo piny.
To go kwanyo mugat abiryo gi rech manok no, aka munyo otyeko fuoyo Were, oturo chiemo no mathindhothindho, to miyo jofuonjirok pere jowopoki jono.
Jojye jochiemo to joyeŋ. Rumachien jofuonjirok jochoko ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ to poŋo aditin abiryo.
Welo chwo ma jochiemo obedo gana aŋwen, ma kokwan mon gi nyithindho.
Gikenyo Yesu osewila ji to donjo i yee to kidho i adech ma Magadan.
Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo mogo jobino bongi Yesu munyo joyenyo chiiko go, to jokwayo go ni wotim giraura ri jo mowok i polo.
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Ka waŋchieŋ kidho podho wiwacho ni, ‘Piny kidho kwe, rupiri pondeponde obokere.’
Aka odikini maŋich wiwacho ni, ‘Koth lechwe, rupiri pondeponde obokere aka piny odisa.’ Wiŋeyo tito chal pa piny i ŋiyo pondeponde; to wikinyal tito ranyuth ma mako kwoŋ ndir ma pama!
Kole luse ji marecho ma jokidew kwoŋ Were kada mathin ama rango ranyuth ma giraura. Ongoye giraura mibino miyo win kwanyo woko giraura pa Yona kende.” Gikenyo go oweyo jo to kadho.
Munyo jofuonjirok jochiewere to jokidho loka ma wakawaka man, wiyi gin owil gi tiŋo mugat moro.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Gwokere win, odoko kure win kwoŋ thow pa Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo.”
Jochako luwirok wegi kendigin ni, “Go wacho ama kwoŋ bedo wakitiŋo mugat moro.”
Yesu oŋeyo gima onwaŋo jowacho, to penjo jo ni, “Raŋo ma wiluwere kendiwin ni wingoye kodi mugat moro? Apaka yeyo mewin nok ama?
Fuodi wikiniaŋi? Wikipoy ndir ma atur'iye mugat abich ri chwo gana abich, kodi aditin adi ma wichoko?
Aka mugat abiryo ri chwo gana aŋwen? Wipoŋo aditin adi?
Wibedo nedi ma wikiniaŋ ni oido akiluw kwoŋ mugat? Gwokere win kwoŋ thow pa Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo.”
Gikenyo nyaka jofuonjirok joniaŋ ni go onwaŋo kiwachi ri jo kurok kwoŋ thow mioro i mugat, to kwoŋ fuonji pa Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo ayino.
Yesu okidho i adech ma chiegin kodi Keserya Filipya kama go openj'iye jofuonjirok pere ni, “Ji jowacho ni Wuodi Dhano obedo ŋa?”
Jodwoko ni, “Joman jowacho ni go Yohana Jakibatisa, joman ni Eliya, kareno joman jowacho ni go Yeremiya kosa ni jatuchi wach Were moro.”
Aka go openjo jo ni, “To win wiwacho ni an ŋa?”
Simon Petro odwoko ni, “In ibedo Kristo Wuodi Were makwo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Simon wuodi pa Yona, i jasilwany swa! Adyeri me kobino rin wok bongi dhano moro, to Baba ma ni polo ama onyuthin.
Amomiyo awacho rin, in i Petro, aka wi tele me abino ger'iye kitipa pa jomoyeyo paran, ma kada tho kibino nyalo loyo kitipa no.
Abino miyin rayaw ma yawo Ker ma polo; gima inotwey i piny ka, ibino tweyo i polo; odoko gima inogony i piny ka, ibino gonyo i polo.”
Gikenyo Yesu ochiko jofuonjirok pere ni kiri jowotuchi ri moro nike go obedo Kristo.

Wok i hongo no kadho malo, Yesu ochako wacho kamaler ri jofuonjirok pere ni go ripo kidho Yerusalem wochandere tektek i chingi jotel pa ji kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, kodi jofuonji ma Chik. Jola neko go, aka i ndelo maradek ibino chierino go kendo.
Petro otero go gichien to chako ayi kwoŋe ni, “Were wogeŋi gino, Ruoth! Gime wokiri wotimere rin!”
Yesu owire to wacho ri Petro ni, “Eye bongan, Sitan! Iriwere ran i royo, rupiri paro perin me kiwoki bongi Were, to wok bongi dhano ayin.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Ka moro mito luwan, go won kutho ripo kwerere kende, wotiŋi musalaba pere, aka woluwan.
Aka ŋata omiti botho kwo pere won bino rwenyo kwo; to ŋata orweny kwo pere kwoŋbedo an bino nwaŋo kwo.
Bero aŋo ma dhano olim ka oloki piny gipi apere to rwenyo kwo pere won? Kosa aŋo ma dhano owili gi kwo pere?
“Kole Wuodi Dhano lebino gi dwoŋ pa Bamere gi jomalaika pere, aka bino chulo dhano jye kemba pere chungo kwoŋ tim pere.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, nitye joma jochungo ka ma jokibino tho ma fuodi jokoneno Wuodi Dhano ka bino i Ker pere.”
Rumachien ma ndelo auchiel, Yesu okwanyo Petro kodi wutimere Yakobo gi Yohana, to tero jo wi got mabor kakendigin.
To go lokere ruwaŋ jo kenyo: waŋe olokere malyel pa waŋchieŋ, aka nengin pere olokere matar pa lero.
Gikenyo jofuonjirok no joneno menyirok pa Musa kodi Eliya munyo joluwo gi Yesu.
Gino omiyo Petro oluwo ka wacho ri Yesu ni, “Ruoth, ber wabedi ka; k'iyenyo, abino gero ka kayindin adek, achiel aperin, man apa Musa, gi man apa Eliya.”
Munyo go oido fuodi luwo, pondeponde matar obino to thoko jo aka dwondijo mowok i pondeponde owacho ni, “Me Wuodan ma amaro kendo asangala gine; winji win go!”
Munyo jofuonjirok jowinjo dwondijo me, jogore piny ma jokulo wiy gin kareno lworo omako jo.
Yesu obino bongi jo to geyo jo, to wacho ni, “Ayi win malo. Wikiri wibedi malwor!”
Aka munyo joŋiyo malo jokoneno dhano moro jye kwanyo woko Yesu won kende.
Munyo jotyeko loro wok wi got, Yesu ochiko jo teltel ni, “Wikiri wiwachi ri moro kwoŋ gima onenere me chuka Wuodi Dhano otyeki chierino kwoŋ jomotho.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jopenjo Yesu ni, “Raŋo ma jofuonji ma Chik jowacho ni Eliya kutho ripo pen bino?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Eliya ama kutho pen bino, aka go ripo yiko kis gimoro wobedi i kare.
To awacho ri win, Eliya otyeko kir bino to ji jokoŋeyo go, aka jotimo ri go paka joyenyo. I royo achiel Wuodi Dhano bende bino chandere i chingi jo.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok joniaŋ nike go luwo ri jo kwoŋ Yohana Jakibatisa.
Munyo jotundo bongi kweth ji, jal moro obino bongi Yesu, ogoyo chonge ruwaŋe,
aka owacho ni, “Jadwoŋ, timi wor ri wuodan! Go tho fum ma mwonjo go marach aka miyo go podho noknok i mach kosa i pi.
Akelo go bongi jofuonjirok perin to jokonyalo botho go.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “A ji ma bu yeyo ma jokotire! Anobedi gi win kir keraŋo? Anodiy chunyan gi win kir keraŋo? Keli jayach no bongan ka!”
Yesu ooro jwogi no wok to wok, to jayach no both gi i hongo no won.
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jobino bongi Yesu nyaliŋliŋ to jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo ma wakinyalo ryemo woko jwogi no?”

Yesu odwoko ni, “Ru yeyo mewin manok. Adyeri awacho ri win, bedi winitye gi yeyo marom kodi nyingi kalantus, di winyalo wacho ri got me ni, ‘Eye ka ikadhi yukocha,’ to timo ameno; aka ongoye gima do konyalere ri win.”
[“To jwogi nger me, kiwoki kwanyo woko ka kwayo gi riyo obedo.”]
Munyo jofuonjirok jye jobino kanyachiel i Galileya, Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wuodi Dhano ichiegin kisita go tiketho go i chingi ji,
aka jobino neko go; to ndelo maradek ibino chierino go kwoŋ jomotho.” Jofuonjirok chuny gin oramo jo swa.
Munyo Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere jobino Kapernaum, jochoki misolo ma Ot pa Were jobino bongi Petro to jopenjo go ni, “Jafuonji mewin chulo misolo ma ot pa Were?”
Petro odwoko ni, “Go chulo.” Munyo Petro odonjo i ot, Yesu ama open luwo malo ni, “Simon, iparo nedi? Kerin ma piny jochoko tonton kosa misolo kwoŋ jokune? Kwoŋ ji pajo wegi kosa kwoŋ jowiloka?”
Petro odwoko ni, “Kwoŋ jowiloka.” Ana Yesu, “Amomiyo, dwoŋ mere ni ji ma piny no jonitye i syem, jokichul.

To wakimiti ramo chuny jome, amomiyo kidhi i wakawaka ibol'iye siraget; kwanyi rech minoyway marapena, aka i dhoke ibino nwaŋ'iye pesa ma feza ma roman kodi win chulo misolo ma Ot pa Were; kwanyi ichuli jo misolo mawan.”
I hongo no jofuonjirok jobino bongi Yesu, to jopenjo go ni, “Ŋata dwoŋ loyo wadi jye i Ker ma polo?”
Yesu olwoŋo nyaka nyathi, to ketho go chungo i nyim jo,
aka owacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win ni, wikodonji i Ker ma polo, kwanyo woko ka wiwire aka wilokere paka nyithindho.
Ŋata dwoŋ loyo wadi jye i Ker ma polo obedo ŋata bwonere paka nyathi me.
Aka ŋata jolo nyaka nyathi ma nger me i nyingan, meno jolan.”
“Aka ŋata omiyi joma thindho ma joyeyan me timo recho d'ober ri go ka otwey kidi madwoŋ i ŋute tibolo go i wakawaka maluth.
Rach adyeri ri piny nike nitye gikipiny ma miyo ji timo recho! Gikipiny ma chalo ameno bino timere ndir jye, to bino racho loyo ri ŋata miyo kiti gikipiny no timirok!
“Ka chingin achiel kosa tyendin miyin timo gimarach, toŋi woko ibol woko! Ber rin donjo i kwo ma bu chingin kosa tyendin loyo bedo gi chingin jye kodi tyendin jye tibolin i mach makitho.
Aka ka waŋin miyin itimo gimarach, goli iboli woko! Ber rin swa donjo i kwo gi nyaka waŋin achiel loyo bedo gi waŋin aryo jye tibolin i mach makitho.
“Neni ni wikichay nyaka joma thindho me; kole awacho ri win, i polo koro jomalaika pajo jonitye ruwaŋ Baba mani polo hongo jye.
[Kole Wuodi Dhano obino botho jomorwenyo.]
“Wiparo nedi? Aŋo ma dhano di tim ka go nitye gi roombo miya achiel to achiel kwoŋ jo rwenyo? Go kiwey pyero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen jochiemo wi tendere kenyo to kidho rango nyaka rombo achiel morwenyo no?
Aka k'onwaŋo rombo no, awacho ri win, go kole bedo gi kisangala madwoŋ ri rombo no loyo pyero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen ma jokorwenyo cha.
I royo achiel, Baa win mani polo bende kiyeny achiel kwoŋ joma thindho me rwenyo.
“Ka omerin timo rin marach, kidhi bonge inyuthi go recho pere. To timi ameno nyaliŋliŋ, nyaka i dyer wijaryo. Ka go owinjin, meno ityeko dwoko omerin bongin.
To ka go okwer winjin, kwanyi ŋatachiel kosa ji man aryo ikidhi gi jo, aka ŋey wach moro jye woridho munyo ji aryo kosa adek jothyelo paka ondik.
To ka kowinjo jo bende, ere tuchi gimoro jye ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo. Aka ka go okwer winjo kir kitipa pa jomoyeyo bende, onyo teri go paka jakichar kosa jachoki misolo.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, gima winotwey i piny ka ibino tweyo i polo, gima winogony i piny ka ibino gonyo i polo.
“Aka awacho ri win kendo, ka ji aryo kwoŋ win i piny ka joyeyere i gimoro ma jokwayi, Baba mani polo bino timo ri jo gino.
Ato kama ji aryo kosa adek jochoker'iye i nyingan, meno anitye i dyer jo kenyo.”
Gikenyo Petro obino bongi Yesu to penjo go ni, “Ruoth, ka omera timo ran marach, anochwaki go didi? Dibiryo?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Be, ki dibiryo, to di pyero abiryo di biryo.
Ato Ker ma polo chalo kere mochano kidho penjo jotich pere jowotiti ri go kwoŋ lim pere ma jotich pere no jo ni gine.
Go onwaŋo nyaka chako timo amanago tikelo achiel kwoŋ jomoido joni gi banja pere ma muma pesa gana apar.
To paka ŋato oido ongoye gi nger ma chulo banja no, ruoth pere owodho or nike wotana go, kodi chiege kodi nyithindho pere kodi lim pere jye, wochuli banja no.
Jatich no ogoyo chonge piny i nyim kere, to kwayo go ni, ‘Diyi chunyin kodan, abino chulin gimoro jye.’
Ruoth pere chunye oramo ri go, amomiyo ochwako go banja no to weyo go kadho.
“To munyo jatich no oido kadho, oromo gi jatich nyawote monwaŋo ni gi banja pere ma muma pesa miya achiel, go omako ŋato to chako deyo. Owacho ni, ‘Chulan pesa paran m'ikopa!’
Jatich nyawote ogore piny to kwayo go ni, ‘Diyi chunyin kodan, abino chulin!’
To go koyeyo; kuchiel omiyo obol ŋato i twech chuka wochuli banja no.
Munyo jotich man joneno gime paka otimere, chuny gin oramo jo swa, to jokidho bongi ruoth pajo to jowacho ri go gimoro jye motimere.
Gikenyo ruoth olwoŋo jatich no to wacho ni, ‘In i dhano marach! Achwakin banja monwaŋo initye gine bongan gipi rupiri iywakere ran;
onyo in di ikimakoye wor gi jatich nyawotin, paka atimo rin?’
Nge omako ruoth swa to bolo jatich no i katwech chuka bende ochuli penzi kir machowe.”
Yesu ochowo wach ni, “Meno apaka Baba mani polo bino timo ri win ka wikichwaki omin win, gi chuny win jye.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo wacho gikipiny me, oweyo Galileya to kidho i adech ma Yudeya, loka man ma jwom Yordan.
Kweth ji joluwo go kenyo, to botho jo.
Jofarisayo megi jobino bonge to jotemo chiiko go munyo jopenjo go ni, “Chik mawan yeyo dhano ryemo chiege ru wach moro jye?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Fuodi wikisoma ndiiko ma wacho ni ŋata ochweyo jo wok i chakirok ochweyo jachwo gi dhako,
to wacho ni, ‘Ru atoŋa me jachwo bino weyo bamere gi yokimere to chwire kwoŋ chiege, aka jaryo jobino lokere del achiel.
Amomiyo onyo jokibedi ji aryo, to del achiel.’ Ri ameno gima Were otyeko riwo kanyachiel, moro wokiri wopoki.”
Jofarisayo jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo to ma Musa omiyo or ni jachwo womiyi chiege balwa ma ridho ni jopokere ka ryemo go?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Musa oyeyo win ryemo mon mewin rupiri chuny win nwaŋ. To oido kobedo ameno wok i ndelo ma chwech.
Awacho ri win, ŋata ryemo chiege ma kobedo rupiri otimo chot, to nywomo dhako man, meno otimo chot. [Kendo ŋata onywomo dhako moryemi bende meno otimo chot.”]
Jofuonjirok pere jowacho ni, “Ka meno a gima nitye i dyer jachwo gi dhako, kere ber loyo ka dhano konywomo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ongoye ŋata nyalo yeyo fuonji me, kwanyo woko joma Were omiyo jo kende.

Kole nitye wach mopekere ma miyo ji weyo ma jokunywomo: jomegi rupiri onywol jo ameno, joman kwoŋbedo ji jokolo toloko jo ameno; aka joman jokinywom ro miyo kwo pajo ri tich ma Ker ma polo. Ŋata nyalo niaŋ wojoli fuonji me.”
Jomogo jokelo nyithindho bongi Yesu nike go wikethi chinge i wiy jo wokwayi ri jo, to jofuonjirok joay kwoŋ ji.
Yesu owacho ni, “Weyi win nyithindho jowobin bongan, aka wikiri wijuki jo, rupiri Ker ma polo obedo ri joma pameno.”
Gikenyo go oketho chinge kwoŋ jo to kadho.
Ndelo moro jayach moro obino bongi Yesu to penjo go ni, “Jafuonji, bero aŋo ma aripo timo aka alim kwo makirumi?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Raŋo m'ipenjan kwoŋ gimaber. Nitye ŋatachiel kende maber. Maki or ka imito donjo i kwo.”
Go openjo ni, “Or mene?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Ikiri ineki, ikiri itim chot, ikiri ikwali, ikiri ichwayi misegey ma twodo,
lwori benin gi yokonin; odoko mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.”
Jayach no odwoko ni, “Atyeko mako or no jye. Aŋo modoko odoŋ ran atima?”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ka iyenyo bedo ŋataber kichutho, kidhi itana gimoro jye mini gine aka pesa mere imiy jochandi, aka ibino bedo gi ŋaŋo i polo; ŋey nyaka ibin iluwan.”
Munyo jayach no owinjo wach no, okadho mogut kwoŋ bedo go oido ni gi ŋaŋo madit swa.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, bino bedo matek swa ri jaŋaŋo donjo i ker ma polo.
Odoko awacho ri win, yot ri ŋamira donjo i yore piso loyo ri jaŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were.”
Munyo jofuonjirok jowinjo gime, jodhyer tektek. Jopenjo ni, “Ka ameno onyo ŋa won ma nyalo both?”
Yesu oŋiyo jo tirtir aka odwoko ni, “Gime kinyalere ri ji; to ri Were gimoro jye nyalere.”
Gikenyo Petro oluwo malo ka wacho ni, “Panen, watyeko weyo gimoro jye to waluwin. Wanolimi aŋo?”

Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, i ndir manyien, ma Wuodi Dhano bino bed'iye wi kom pere madhum ma di dwoŋ, gikenyo wijapar g'aryo ma wiluwan bende wibino bedo wi kombere madhum apar g'aryo, kareno withumo banjin ri nonin apar g'aryo ma Israel.
Aka nyatoro jye moweyo udi, kosa wutimin, kosa nyimin go, kosa bamere, kosa min, kosa nyithindho, kosa ndelin kwoŋbedo an, bino limo kendo di miya achiel, kanyachiel gi kwo makirum.
Aka ji mathoth ma pama jobedo marapena jobino bedo machowe, aka ma jobedo machowe ama jobino bedo marapena.”
“Ker ma polo chalo won ndelo vini moay odikini worwor ketho ji mogo tich i ndelo pere ma vini.
Go ochikere kodi jo ni bino chulo jo kemba ma ndir jye, siringi achiel ndelo achiel, to dhiro jo i ndelo pere.
Go odoko oay to kidho i katale sawa adek to neno jomogo jochungo kenyo ma bu tich.
Omiyo go owacho ri jo ni, ‘Wibende kidhi win witiy i ndelo paran ma vini, aka abino miyo win gima ripere jye.’
To jono jokidho. Aka sawa auchiel kodi sawa abuŋwen go odoko otimo ameno.
Dho kapa sawa apar g'achiel go okidho i katale kendo to neno ji mogo ma fuodi oido jochungo kenyo. Go openjo jo ni, ‘Raŋo ma winyieko ndelo gipi ma wikitim gimoro?’
Jodwoko ni, ‘Fuodi ongoye ŋat'omiyo wan tich.’ Gikenyo go owacho ri jono ni, ‘Ere wibende kidhi win witiy i ndelo vini paran.’
“Aka munyo piny otundo othyeno, won ndelo owacho ri jakuri jotich pere ni, ‘Lwoŋi jotich imiy jo kemba pajo, ichaki kodi jom'oketh i tich ma chowe, aka ichowi kodi joma open ketho jo i tich.’
Joma nende jochako sawa apar g'achiel, omiy jo siringi achielechiele.
Meno omiyo munyo joma jopen i tich jobino limo kemba pajo, joparo ni di jonwaŋo madwoŋ loyo, to jo bende omiy jo siringi achielechiele won.
Jojolo pesa pajo to jochako kiŋunyaŋunya gi won tich.
Jowacho ni, ‘Jome, moketh jo i tich ma chowe me, kole jotiyo nyaka sawa achiel won kende, to neni wan wathyele gi tich mapek ndelo gipi i min chieŋ, ama odoko ichulo jo marom gi wani!’
Won ndelo odwoko ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo ni, ‘Nyawotan akibuyin pesa. Kole nende wayeyere kodin timo tich odyechieŋ gipi kwoŋ siringi achiel.
In maki kemba perin idoki pecho; an awon ayero miyo ŋata aketho i tich ma chowe me kemba marom kodi mamiyin.
Iparo ni angoye kodi thwolo timo paka ayenyo gi pesa paran woni? Kosa nyieko makin nyaka ni rupiri atimo bero ri ŋat man?’ ”
Aka Yesu omedo ni, “Amomiyo joma chowe ama jobino bedo marapena, aka joma rapena jobino bedo ma chowe.”
Munyo Yesu onwaŋo kidho Yerusalem, otero jofuonjirok japar g'aryo gichien to luwo gi jo nyaliŋliŋ.
Owacho ri jo ni, “Ato onyo wakidho Yerusalem kama ibino bol'iye Wuodi Dhano i chingi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik to jothumo rigo banja ma tho.
Aka jobino ketho go i chingi Jopath wonyieri go, wochwadi go, tiguro go kwoŋ musalaba, aka i ndelo maradek ibino chierino go.”
Gikenyo min woti Zebedayo obino bongi Yesu gi wote aryo to goyo chonge ruwaŋe munyo kwayo go gimoro.
Yesu openjo go ni, “Aŋo m'iyenyo?” Go odwoko ni, “Timi chikirok ni wotan me jobedi yu rachuch kodi yu racham perin k'ilokere Kere.”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Wikuya gima wikwayo. Winyalo madho agwata ma akidho madho?” To jodwoko ni, “Wanyalo”.
Yesu owacho ni, “Adyeri winyalo ri win madho agwata paran, to angoye kodi men ma yero joma jobedi yu rachuch kodi yu racham paran. Kabedo me obedo apa joma Baba oyiko ri jo.”
Munyo jofuonjirok wadi gin apar jowinjo kwoŋ gino, nge omako jo gi wutimere aryo no.
To Yesu olwoŋo jojye kanyachiel bonge, to wacho ni, “Wiŋeyo nike joma dhumo Jopath jodhumo gi maker, aka jotel pajo jodhumo gi mbaka.
To kobedi i dyer win ameno. Kuchiel ka moro kwoŋ win mito bedo madwoŋ, go ripo bedo ŋecha mewin;
aka ŋata yenyo bedo marapena i dyer win, ripo bedo ŋecha mewin,
paka Wuodi Dhano ma kobino ka ni wotiy ri go, to ni wotiyi ri ji gi miyo kwo pere paka chul ri ji mathoth.”
Munyo Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere joeye Yeriko, kweth ji joluwo go.
Ji aryo ma waŋ gin otho oido jobedo i thengi royo; munyo jowinjo ni Yesu oido kadho, jochako koko ni, “Wuodi pa Daudi! Makiye kodi wan wor!”
Kweth ji no joay kwoŋ jo ka jowacho ni jowoliŋi! To jome jomedo koko malo loyo ni, “Nyakwar Daudi, makiye kodi wan wor!”
Gikenyo Yesu ochungo to lwoŋo jo to penjo jo ni, “Wimito atim ri win aŋo?”
Jodwoko ni, “Ruoth, wayenyo waŋ wan woneen.”
Yesu omako gi jo wor, aka tekin ogeyo waŋ jo to jochako neno to joluwo go.
Munyo joriko Yerusalem, jobino Bethfage, wi got Olivet, to Yesu oro jofuonjirok pere aryo yu wiye gi wach me:
“Kidhi win loka ma yu wiy win kama wibino nwaŋ'iye mapiyo, punda motwey i loch gi nyathi mere. Gonyi win jo wikel ran.
Aka ka ŋat moro owacho ri win gimoro, wachi win ri go ni, ‘Jadwoŋ ama yenyo jo,’ aka go bino weyo jowokadhi mayot.”
Gime otimere ma miyo gima jatuchi wach Were owacho wotundi i kare ni,
“Wachi ri tindi ma Zayun ni, Neni kere perin bino bongin. Go mwol aka obedo wi punda, wi nyathi punda, wi punda mathin.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jokadho yu wiye to jotimo paka Yesu ooro jo;
jokelo punda gi nyathi mere, joketho kwoŋ jo nangin pajo, to jomiyo Yesu bedo wiye.
Muma ji madwoŋ jopedho nangin pajo i royo, kareno joman jotoŋo jangi yen aka jopedho i royo.
Muma ji moido wotho yu wiy Yesu kodi moido luwo go chien jochako koko ni, “Ozana! Pak wobedi ri Nyakwar Daudi! Were womiyi ŋata bino i nyingi Ruoth silwany! Ozana! Pak wobedi malo swa i polo!”
Munyo Yesu odonjo Yerusalem, ji ma tindi gi bee jochako woy, kareno jopenjo ni, “Me ŋa?”
Muma ji odwoko ni, “Me Yesu jatuchi wach Were, mawok Nazareth ma Galileya.”
Yesu odonjo i Ot pa Were aka oryemo woko joma oido jonyewere kosa jotana gikipiny i Ot pa Were; oŋilo woko mezin pa joma wilo pesa kodi kombere pa joma oido jotana akurin.
To wacho ri jo ni, “Ondik i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni Were owacho ni, ‘Ot paran ibino lwoŋo ni ot ma kwayo,’ ama onyo wiloko ŋungu pa jokwo ayino!”
Joma waŋ jo otho kodi jomoŋol jobino bonge i Ot pa Were to botho jo.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik nge omako jo munyo joneno giraura ma go otimo, kareno nyithindho jokoko i Ot pa Were ni, “Wopak Nyakwar Daudi!”
Gikenyo jopenjo Yesu ni, “Iwinjo gima jowacho?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Awinjo maber. Fuodi wikisoma ndiiko ma wacho ni, ‘I dhoki nyithindho kodi nyithindho maŋich ama owok'iye pak maber ma kichutho?’ ”
Yesu oweyo jo to wok i tindi no kareno chomo yu Bethaniya, to nindo korago.
Munyo Yesu ogik i tindi odikini yawere mere, go oido winjo kech.

Go oneno kiti makuyu moro michamo i thengi royo to kidho i tyende, to konwaŋo kwoŋe gimonyak kwanyo woko bokee kende. Gikenyo go owacho ri makuyu ni, “Ikodoko inyak gimoro!” Piyo piyo to makuyu no thwo.
Jofuonjirok joneno gime to jodhyer. Jopenjo ni, “Othwo mayot nedi ama?”

Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, ka wibedo gi yeyo, aka wikiganagana, wibino nyalo timo gima atimo ri makuyu me; ki meno kende, wibino nyalo wacho ri got me ni, ‘Ayi ka ibolere i nam,’ to timo ameno.
Ka wini gi yeyo, wibino limo gimoro jye ma wikwayo Were.”
Yesu odonjo i Ot pa Were aka munyo go fuonjo, jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa Joyudaya jobino bonge to jopenjo go ni, “Men aŋo m'ini gine ma timo gikipiny me? Ŋa m'omiyin men no?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Abende abino penjo win gimoro, ka widwokan aka abende anowachi ri win kama anwaŋ'iye men ma atimo gine gikipiny me.

Men pa Yohana mamiyo ji batisimo owok kune; owok bongi Were kosa bongi dhano?” Wegi jochako pyem kendigin ni, “Wawachi aŋo? Ka wadwoko ni, ‘Owok bongi Were,’ go bino penjo wan ni, ‘To raŋo ma wikiyeyo Yohana?’
To ka wadwoko ni, ‘Owok bongi dhano,’ walworo gima ji jonyalo timo, kwoŋbedo ji jye joridho ni Yohana oido obedo jatuchi wach Were.”
Ri ameno jodwoko Yesu ni, “Wakuya.” Gikenyo go bende owacho ri jo ni, “Abende akowachi ri win kama anwaŋ'iye men ma atimo gine gikipiny me.”
“Onyo wiparo nedi? Jal moro oido ni gi wote aryo. Go okidho bongi wuode madwoŋ to wacho ni, ‘Wuodan, kidhi itiyi reye i ndelo konon.’
Go odwoko ni, ‘Akotim ameno,’ to rumachien odoko owiro paro to kidho tich i ndelo vini.
Gikenyo baa jo okidho bongi wuode man, to kwayo go bende ameno. Wuode no odwoko ni, ‘Alekidho, jadwoŋ,’ to go kokidho.

Mene kwoŋ jaryo no motimo gima bamere oyenyo?” To jodwoko ni, “Wuode madwoŋ”. Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, jochoki misolo kodi mon ma jotana delkwoŋ jo i timo gi wichkwot ama jolekidho i Ker pa Were to widoŋ.

Kole Yohana obino i dyer win kareno nyutho win royo motire ma wiluw, to wikwero yeyo go; to jochoki misolo kodi mon ma jotana delkwoŋ jo i timo gi wichkwot ama joyeyo go. Odoko kada munyo wichowo neno ameno jye fuodi wikiwiro paro mewin wiyey go.”

Yesu owacho ni, “Winji win agecha man: obedo won lowo moro mopidho vini pere i ndelo, ogoyo chiel othoko gine, okunyo bur ma biyo medho ma vini, to gero ot achurchur makur. Gikenyo go oketho ndelo vini no i chingi jotich to eye pecho kidho woth.
Munyo ndir otundo ma fuono vini, go ooro ŋechin pere bongi jotich nike jowomiyi go vini pere.
