Jotich jomako ŋechin pere no, jogoyo achiel, joneko man, to jogoyo man gi telin.
Go odoko ooro ŋechin man mathoth loyo joma rapena, to jotich jotimo jo ameno bende.
Machowe, go ooro ri jo wuode won ka wacho ni, ‘Waŋin jobino woro wuodan.’
To munyo jotich joneno wuode, jowacho i dyer gin wegi ni, ‘Me won a wuode ma bino lunjo gikipiny pere. Waneki go win eno, aka wakwanyi lim pere!’
Ri ameno jomako go, jobolo go woko ma ndelo vini, to joneko go.
“Onyo ka won ndelo vini obin, otim aŋo ri jotich no?”
Jodwoko Yesu ni, “Go adyeri bino neko ji marecho no to ketho ndelo vini i chingi jotich man ma jobino miyo go vini pere mofuon i ndir motire.”
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Fuodi wikisoma i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni, ‘Kole tele won ma jogeto jochayo ni bu kony ama olokere tele ma thyelo kindi ot. Me obedo tich pa Ruoth; aka neno maber swa ri wan!’
“Amomiyo awacho ri win, Ker pa Were ibino kwanyo woko kwoŋ win timiyo ji ma jobino nyak gimotire.
[Ŋata opodhi wi tele me bino ŋadere wolokere mathindhothindho; aka ŋata tele me opodhi kwoŋe tele me opodhi kwoŋe, tele bino ŋinyo go loko go pa fukefuke.”]
Jotel pa Jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi Jofarisayo jowinjo agechin pa Yesu to joŋicho nike go oido luwo kwoŋ jo.
Ri ameno jotemo mako go, to jolworo muma ji ma joyeyo ni Yesu obedo jatuchi wach Were.
Yesu odoko ooro agechin munyo luwo gi jo ka wacho ni,
“Ker ma polo chalo kere moyiko kalima ma nywomirok ri wuode.
Ooro jotich pere wacho ri wendo molwoŋ ni jowobin i kalima; to jokomito bino.

Ri ameno go odoko ooro jotich man gi mikwenda me: ‘Wachi win ri jomolwoŋ ni atyeko yiko kis gimoro i kalima paran; megikwe paran kodi dhok machwe otyek neko, aka gimoro jye onyo oyikere. Biye win i kalima ma nywomirok.’
To jomolwoŋ jo jokodewo, jokadho i tich pajo ayino; achiel okadho i ndelo pere, ŋat man i mitan pere;
aka joman jomako jotich no, jogoyo jo, to joneko jo.
Nge omako kere no swa, to oro joserikale pere to joneko woko jonek no, kir gi waŋo tindi pajo.
Gikenyo go olwoŋo jotich pere to wacho ni, ‘Kalima ma nywomirok onyo otyeko yikere, to paka ji moido alwoŋo jokiripi gine,
ere onyo kidhi win i royo mokakere i tindi, wilwoŋ ji mathoth ma winonwaŋ jye jowobin i kalima paran.’
Gikenyo jotich no jokidho i royo mokakere i tindi to jochoko ji jye ma jonyalo nwaŋo, mabeyo gi marecho parom; aka ot ma kalima opoŋ ji.
“To munyo kere odonjo kikaŋasa wendo, oneno kenyo nyatoro ma koruko nanga ma kalima.
To penjo go ni, ‘Nyawotan, idonjo ka nedi ma bu nanga ma kalima ma nywomirok?’ To ŋato ngoye gi girawacha.
Gikenyo kere owacho ri jotich ni, ‘Tweyi win chinge gi tyende wibol go i mudho kuma nitye iye ywakirok gi kayo lak.’ ”
Yesu ochowo ni, “Kole jomilwoŋo thoth to jomiyero bedo manok.”
Jofarisayo jokadho to jochano nger ma chiiko Yesu i penji.

Gikenyo jooro jofuonjirok pajo mogo kodi jopa Herode mogo bongi Yesu. Jowacho ni, “Jafuonji, waŋeyo nike ibedo dhano motire: ifuonjo royo pa Were g'adyeri, m'ikidew kwoŋ gima ji paro, rupiri ikidew kwoŋ dwoŋ pa dhano.
Onyo wachi ri wan paro perin. Bedo gimotire i Chik mawan chulo misolo pa Kaisar, kosa be?”
Yesu oŋeyo chan pajo marach no to wacho ni, “Jorendirok! Raŋo ma witemo chiiko an?
Nyuthan win pesa ma wichulo gine misolo!” Jokelo ri go pesa mothedhi,
to penjo jo ni, “Chal pa ŋa kodi nyingi ŋa mani kwoŋe me?”
Jodwoko ni, “Apa Kaisar.” Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Amomiyo, miyi win Kaisar gipa Kaisar, aka Were bende miyi win go gipa Were.”
Munyo jowinjo gime, jouro swa; to joweyo go to jokadho.
Ndelo no won Josadukayo ma jowacho ni ji jokichierino kwoŋ jomotho jobino bothi Yesu,
to jopenjo go ni, “Jafuonji, Musa ofuonjo ni ka dhano mongoye gi nyithindho otho, omin ripo lunjo chi tho no wonywoli gine nyithindho ri ŋatotho no.
Onwaŋo nitye wutimere abiryo ma yado jobedo i dyer wan ka: Marapena onywomo, to tho ma kolimo nyithindho, ameno go oweyo chiege ri omin.
Gino odoko otimere ri omin mararyo, gi maradek, tundo kwoŋ wutimere abiryo jye.
Rumachien, to dhako no won tho.
Onyo, i ndelo ma rumachien munyo jomotho jochierino, dheno obedi chipa ŋa kwoŋ ji abiryo no, rupiri jojye chango jobedo gine.”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Wipodho swa, rupiri wikuya Ndiiko Maleŋ kosa men pa Were,
rupiri i chierino pa ji kobed'iye nywomirok kosa nywom, to jobino chalo jomalaika pa Were i polo.
Onyo ma mako kwoŋ chierino: fuodi wikisoma gima Were owacho ri win munyo wacho ni,
‘Abedo Were pa Ibrayimu, Were pa Isaka, kodi Were pa Yakobo.’ Dwoŋ mere ni go obedo Were pa joma kwo ma kiweno apa jomotho.”
Munyo kweth ji jowinjo gime jodhyer swa.
Munyo Jofarisayo jowinjo ni Yesu omiyo Josadukayo jorumo kodi girawacha, jochokere kanyachiel.
Aka achiel kwoŋ jo, mobedo jafuonji ma Chik, openjo go ma chiiko go ni,
“Jafuonji, or mene maloyo dwoŋ i Chik?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “ ‘Mari Ruoth Were perin g'adundo perin jye, gi chunyin jye, gi paro perin jye.’
Me a Or maloyo jye gi dwoŋ kendo ama telo.
Aka Or mararyo ma chale gi meno ee: ‘Mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.’
Chik pa Musa gi bee kodi fuonji pa jotuchi wach Were jye thenere kwoŋ or aryo me.”
Munyo Jofarisayo jochokere kanyachiel, Yesu openjo jo ni,
“Wiparo aŋo kwoŋ Kristo? Go nyakwar ŋa?” Jodwoko ni, “Go nyakwar Daudi.”
Aka Yesu openjo ni, “To raŋo gi kony pa Chuny Maleŋ Daudi olwoŋo go ni, ‘Ruoth?’ munyo wacho ni,
‘Ruoth owacho ri Ruoth paran ni, Bedi yu rachuch paran chuka anoloki jokwor perin paka kor kasik, ma nyono gi tyendin.’
“Amomiyo, ka Daudi olwoŋo go ni Ruoth, nyalere nedi Kristo odoko bedo nyakwar Daudi?”
Ongoye ŋata onyalo dwoko Yesu kada wach achiel, aka wok ndelo no ongoye moro mobedo gi miseni ma penjo go wach moro kendo.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri kweth ji kodi jofuonjirok pere ni,
“Jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo jonitye i kabedo pa Musa ma fuonjo Chik;
amomiyo wiripo timo gi mako gimoro jye ma jowacho ri win, to wikiri witim paka jotimo, rupiri jokikethi i tim gima jofuonjo.
Jotweyo gimapek to joŋawo i goki ji, kareno jokitem kada geyo gimapek no gi lwet chingi gin.
Gimoro jye ma jotimo, jotimo nyaka ni ji jowoneni jo. Neni paka joyaro migowa miketh'iye ndiiko, jojaŋo gimondik ru nyim gin kodi i badijo! Aka jotimo tyendi kanzo pajo bedo de malach aka maboyo!
Jodyero kabedo mabeyo i kalima kodi kombere mamalo i kalamo pa Joyudaya;
jomaro jolo moth kwoŋ ji i katale; kodi ka ji kero jo ni Jafuonji! Jafuonji!
To kiripi lwoŋo win ni ‘jafuonji,’ rupiri winitye gi jafuonji achiel kende, Kristo, aka wijojye wutimere.
Aka wikiri wilwoŋ moro i piny ka ni ‘baba’, rupiri winitye gi Baa win achiel kende mani polo.
Odoko kiripi lwoŋo win ni ‘jatel,’ rupiri wini gi jatel achiel kende, Kristo.
Ŋata loyo dwoŋ kwoŋ win ripo bedo jatich mewin.
Ŋata won miyere dwoŋ ibino dwoko go piny, aka ŋata won dwokere piny ama ibino loko go madwoŋ.
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Wichiego ri ji dhoot ma donjo i Ker ma polo, aka wiwegi wikidonj'iye, odoko wikiyey joma mito donjo jowodonji.
[“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Wimayo mon tho udi pajo, aka nyaka wirendere gi kwayo maboyo! Amomiyo wibino limo girachula marach loyo!]

“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo! Wiwotho wi lowo kendo wichiewere wi pi to wipor loka man chuka wiwiro kada nyaka dhano achiel i din mewin; to ka wityeko wiro go, wimiyo ŋato lokere jakidhi i mach makitho kalo chal mewin diryo!
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jotel ma waŋ gin otho! Wifuonjo ni, ‘Ka dhano okwoŋere gi Ot pa Were, kwoŋirok no kitim gimoro, to ka okwoŋere gi zawabu ma Ot pa Were, meno aka mako go.’
Jomamiŋ ma waŋ jo otho! Aŋo ma loyo dwoŋ, zawabu kosa Ot pa Were ma loko zawabu no maleŋ?
Wifuonjo bende ni, ‘Ka dhano okwoŋere g'alitar, kwoŋirok no kitim gimoro, to ka okwoŋere gi mich mani wi alitar aka mako go.’
Waŋ win otho adyeri! Aŋo ma loyo dwoŋ, michi kosa alitar ma loko mich no maleŋ?
Kole ka dhano okwoŋere g'alitar, meno kwoŋere gine kodi gima ni iye bende.
Odoko ka dhano okwoŋere gi Ot pa Were, meno kwoŋere gi Ot no kodi Were mabed'iye bende.
Aka ka dhano okwoŋere gi polo, meno kwoŋere gi kom pa Were kodi Were won mabedo i kom no bende.

“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Wimiyo Were achiel kwoŋ apar ma gichielirok masisiri paka: katungulu, binzari, kodi gikipiny maŋwe kur man, to wijala gikipiny madongo kwoŋ Chik paka: bedo gi tiro, wor, kodi genirok i waŋ Were; gikipiny me onwaŋo wiripo ketho i tim, ma wikijala giman megi.
Wijotel ma waŋ gin otho! Wichunga pi ni wikiri wimadh'iye magunju moro, mato kuchiel wichalo joma mwonyo ŋamira gipi, ma bende koch chungo kwoŋ Chik mewin!
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Kole wilwoko ŋey kikopo kodi sen, to iye opoŋ akaka kodi woro.
Jofarisayo ma waŋ gin otho! Lwoki win iyi kikopo kutho aka ŋeye bende bino bedo molony.
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Kole wichalo kalyele matar molwok, ma neno maŋon yu woko, to iye opoŋ'iye chokin pa jomotho kodi kocho jye.
I yo achiel wibende wichal jomotire giwoko, mato i chuny win koro rendirok kodi recho ama opoŋ'iye.
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo, jorendirok! Kole wigero kalyele pa jotuchi wach Were, odoko wiyiko maŋon kalyele pa jomotire,
ka wiwacho ni, ‘Bedi chango wakwo i ndir pa bachere mawan, di wakiriwere gi jo i oyo remo pa jotuchi wach Were.’
Meno kole onyo wiwegi witucho gi dhoki win nike wibedo nyikway joma chango joneko jotuchi wach Were.
Amomiyo kere onyo medere win timo gima bachere mewin chango jotyeko chako gine.
Wibedo thwole, nyithindhi malasaŋ, winobothi nedi banja ma tero win i mach makitho?

Amomiyo abino dhiro ri win jotuchi wach Were kodi joma ryek, kodi jofuonji ma Chik, ma megi kwoŋ jo wibino neko gi guro kwoŋ musalaba, aka joman wibino chwado i kalamo mewin, gi chando jo wok i tindi achiel tundo i man,
ŋey remo pa jomotire jye mooy piny wokwan kwoŋ win, wok i remo pa Abel tundo i remo pa Zekariya wuodi pa Berekiya, ma wineko i dyer Kabedo Maleŋ kodi alitar.
Adyeri awacho ri win, girachula me jye bino bedo ri luse ji ma pama me.
“A ji ma Yerusalem, ma joneko jotuchi wach Were modhir ri jo aka jochadho megi gi telin! Didi ma atyeko temo choko win bongan aumi win pa min gweno ma umo nyithindhe i bwombe, to wikwero?
Kole Ot pa Were mani kenyo ibino jwango.
Aka awacho ri win, wikonenan kendo chuka winowachi ni, ‘Jasilwany a ŋata bino i nyingi Ruoth.’ ”
Yesu owok i Ot pa Were aka munyo onwaŋo kadho jofuonjirok pere jobino nyutho go paka Ot no oger.
To go odwoko jo ni, “Wineno gikipiny me jye, kameno? Adyeri awacho ri win, ongoye ka tele kada achiel mibino weyo wi nyawote ma kokedhi woko.”
Munyo go obedo wi got Olivet, jofuonjirok jobino bonge nyaliŋliŋ to jokwayo go ni, “Wachi ri wan ndir ma gikipiny me bino timer'iye, aka ranyuth aŋo mobedi kwoŋ bino perin, kodi apa giki piny?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Gwokere win moro wokiri wowondi win,
rupiri ji kweth jolebino gi nyingan, munyo jowacho ni, ‘An a Kristo,’ aka jobino wondo ji mathoth.
Aka wibino winjo kwoŋ lweny kuma chiegin kodi kuma bor; to wikiri wibedi gi rembo rupiri gikipiny me ripo timere, to kareno giki piny fuodi.
Kole nono bino lwenyo gi nono man, to ker achiel lwenyo gi ker man, aka kech bino bedo kodi yengirok pa piny i kabedo momore;
me jye chakirok pa chandirok, paka litho matelo ka fuodi nyathi konywol.
“Gikenyo jobino ketho win i teko, to joneko win; aka nonin jye bino dak win kwoŋbedo an.
Gikenyo joma thoth jobino podho i yeyo pajo to josegeya jowoti gin, to jodakere.
Aka jotuchi wach matwodo mathoth jobino tundo to jowondo ji mathoth.
Aka paka tim marecho medere, mar paji mathoth ri wadi jo bende bino rumo woko.
To ŋata ochir teko no kir i gike ama bino both.
Aka Wach Maber kwoŋ Ker pa Were me, ibino fuonjo i piny gipi paka ranyuth ri nonin jye, aka nyaka giki piny bino tundo.
“Amomiyo ka wineno Giramyen Madwoŋ ma Daniel jatuchi wach Were chango oluwo kwoŋe ojengi i Ot pa Were (ŋata soma wach me woŋeyi dwoŋ mere),
gikenyo joma nitye Yudeya joworingi wi gote;
aka ŋata ni wi ot wokiri wolori piny kwanyo gima ni ot pere;
aka ŋata ni ndelo wokiri wogiki pecho kwanyo ruk pere.
Aka kidamba madwoŋ bino bedo ri mon mayach, kodi mon ma joni gi nyithindho maŋich ma fuodi jodhoth i ndir no!
Kwayi win ni ŋwech mewin wokiri wobedi i ndir ma chwir munyo pe oŋicho piny, kosa i Sabato.
Ato i hongo no chandirok madwoŋ kidho bedo, ma fuodi yado kobedoye wok i chakirok pa piny tundo pama, aka gima pameno odoko kobedi kendo.
Aka bedi Were kotyeko kimojaye woko ndelo no, onwaŋo ongoye dhano ma d'oboth; to ri bero pa jomoyer, Were bino kimojaye woko ndelo no.
“I hongo no, ka moro owachi ri win ni, ‘Panen, Kristo ee!’ kosa ni ‘Go dicha,’ wikiri wiyey.
Kole Kristo matwodo kodi jotuchi wach matwodo jobino tundo to jotimo ranyuth madongo kodi giraura ma wondo ji, bedi nyalere di jowondo kir jomoyer.
Neni win, eno atyeko wacho ri win gime ma fuodi ndir no kotundo.
Amomiyo, ka jowachi ri win ni, ‘Panen, go nitye i thim,’ wikiri wikidhi yu korago; ka jowacho ni, ‘Panen go dicha i kisika ma ot,’ wikiri wiyey.
Kole paka lithkoth wok yu Wokchieŋ aka menyo piny kir yu Podhochieŋ, apaka bino pa Wuodi Dhano bende lebedo.
Kama gimoro otho iye, ama achut jochoker'iye.
“Aka ka tekin chandirok ma ndir no rumo, waŋchieŋ bino lokere machol aka dwe kolyeli. Michalin jobino oy wok i polo, aka men ma polo bino yengere.
I hongo no, nyaka ranyuth pa Wuodi Dhano bino nenere i polo, aka nonin jye ma piny jobino ywak, aka jobino neno Wuodi Dhano ka dwoko i pondeponde ma polo gi men kodi dwoŋ moasere;
gikenyo go bino oro jomalaika pere kudho gwara maywak malo, aka jobino choko jomoyer pere wok i tum aŋwen ma koyo, wok i tyelo achiel ma polo tundo i man.
“Fuonjere win kwoŋ makuyu, tekin jange loth to wodho bokee mayom, wiŋeyo ni ndir ma chieŋ onyo chiegin tundo.
Amomiyo bende ka wineno gikipiny me jye, wibino ŋeyo nike go chiegin tundo, ni dho waŋkach won.
Adyeri awacho ri win, luse ji ma pama me korum woko ma fuodi gikipiny me jye kotimere.
Polo gi piny bino reyere woko, to wach paran koreyere woko.
“To ndelo no kosa hongo mere ongoye ŋat'oŋeyo, kada jomalaika ma polo, kada Wuodi Were, kwanyo woko Bamere kende.
Paka chango obedo i ndir pa Nowa, apaka bende bino pa Wuodi Dhano bino bedo.
Ato i ndir ma fuodi mikula komadh'iye piny, ji oido jochiemo, jomedho, chwo jonywomo, nyir jonywomere, chuka ndelo ma Nowa odonj'iye i yee,
aka jokoŋeyo chuka mikula obino to mol gi jo; apaka bende bino pa Wuodi Dhano bino bedo.
I hongo no chwo aryo jobino bedo i ndelo; ibino kwanyo achiel tiweyo nyawote.
Mon aryo jobino rego wi kidi; ibino kwanyo achiel to iweyo nyawote.
Amomiyo yikere win, rupiri wikuya ndelo ma Ruoth obin'iye.
To ŋeyi win gime, ni bedi won pecho ŋey hongo ma jakwo bin'iye dyer wor, d'oyikere aka di koyeyo jakwo turo ot.
Amomiyo, wibende yikere win, rupiri Wuodi Dhano lebino i hongo ma wikigen.
“Ŋatobedo jatich maryek ma genere ma ruoth pere nyalo ketho go kuro pecho pere? Meno ŋata miyo jopecho chiemo i hongo motire.
Jatich no jasilwany ma ruoth pere ka dwoko, bino nwaŋo go timo ameno.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ruoth pere bino ketho go kuro lim pere jye.
To ka jatich marach won owachi kende ni, ‘Ruoth paran ogalo,’
to chako goyo jotich wadi, to chiemo to medho kodi jomero,
ruoth pere bino dwoko i ndelo ma go kareno kigen, kodi i hongo ma go kuya;
to miyo go girachula, to ketho go i chandirok kanyachiel gi jorendirok, kuma ji jobino ywak'iye gi kay'iye lak.
“Ker ma polo chale kodi nyir apar ma jotiŋo talin pajo to jokidho romo kodi jamweha.
Jabich oido jomiŋ, jabich joryek.
Nyir mamiŋ mere jotiŋo talin pajo, to jokotiŋo mo;
to nyir maryek mere jotiŋo chupa mo.
Paka jamweha ogalo gi tundo, jojye jonur to jonindo.
To i dyer wor denge aka okoki ni, ‘Neni, jamweha ee otundo, woki win wijoli go.’
Gikenyo nyir no jye joay to jochwinyo talin pajo.
Aka nyir mamiŋ jowacho ri maryek ni, ‘Miyi waye win mo kwoŋ mewin, kole talin mawan kidho tho.’
To nyir maryek jodwoko ni, ‘Ipoyo miti mo ma wani gine konyal romo wan gi win; amomiyo ber wikidhi bongi jomiten winyew mewin.’
Aka munyo jotyeko kadho nyiewo mo, to janyako tundo, kendo joma onwaŋo jochowo yikirok cha ama jodonjo gi go i kalima ma nywomirok; tichiego dhoot.
Rumachien nyaka nyir cha jodwoko to jowacho ni, ‘Ruoth, yawi ri wan.’
To go odwoko ni, ‘Adyeri awacho ri win, akuya ran win.’
Amomiyo yikere wini, rupiri wikuya ndelo kosa hongo.
“Ker ma polo bino chale kodi jadwoŋ moro mokidho woth bor to lwoŋo jotich pere, to ketho lim pere i chingi jo;
go omiyo ŋatachiel mugowe abich ma zawabu, ŋat man aryo, ŋat man achiel chungo kwoŋ nyalo pa kis dhano, to go kadho woth.
Ŋat'omiy mugowe abich okadho mayot wirok gine, to limo mugowe man abich.
Ŋata'omiy mugowe aryo, bende olimo mugowe man aryo.
To ŋata omiy mugowa achiel, okidho to kunyo piny to yiko pesa pa jadwoŋ pere.
Rumachien munyo hongo okadho malach, ruoth pa jotich no odwoko to kaŋasa kwan ma gikipiny no gi jo.
Ŋat'omiy mugowe abich odonjo to wodho mugowe man abich to wacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ imiyan mugowe abich, to ee alimo abich man i wiy m'imiyan cha.’
Ruoth pere owacho ri go ni, ‘Walwa gi tich, i jatich maber ma genere; ibedo gi genirok i gimathin, abino ketho i chingin madit; donji ibedi i kisangala pa ruoth perin.’
Ŋat'omiy mugowe aryo bende odonjo to wacho ni, ‘Ruoth, imiyan mugowe aryo; ee alimo aryo man.’
Ruoth pere owacho ni, ‘Walwa gi tich, i jatich maber odoko magenere; ibedo gi genirok i gimathin, abino ketho i chingin madit; donji i kisangala pa ruoth perin.’
Ŋat'omiy mugowa achiel to bende donjo ka wacho ni, ‘Ruoth, aŋeyo ni i dhano ma kite tek, ikecho kama iŋati ikichwoy'iye gimoro, aka ichoko kama iŋat ikikonj'iye gimoro;
amomiyo lworo omakan, to akidho to akano mugowa pesa perin i lowo; onyo maki giperin ee adwoko rin.’
To ruoth odwoko go ni, ‘Ijatich marach, odoko manyap. Kere ka nende iŋeyo nike akecho kama aŋata akichwoy'iye gimoro, aka ajowo kama aŋata akikonj'iye gimoro,
iraŋo ma ikikano pesa paran i ka kan pesa, aka d'onyo ka adwoko d'alimo giparan momedereye?
Ka ameno, onyo kwanyi win woko kwoŋe mugowa pesa no, wimiy jamugowe apar ayin.
Kole dhano jye ma nitye gi gimoro ibino medo go man, aka go bino bedo kodi ma kalo gima go yenyo; to ŋata bu gimoro, kada gima go oido ni gine ibino kwanyo kwoŋe.
Aka boli win woko jatich mongoye kony no i mudho ma gichien, kuma ji jobino ywak'iye gi litho ma dit.’
“Ka Wuodi Dhano dwoko gi dwoŋ pere, kodi jomalaika pere jye, go bino bedo wi kom pere madhum.
Nonin jye jobino chokere runyime, aka go bino poko jo kadiryo paka jakwath poko roombo gi dyegi,
Go bino ketho roombo yu chinge marachuch, to ketho dyegi yu racham.
Gikenyo Kere bino wacho ri joma ni chinge marachuch ni, ‘Biye win, josilwany pa Baba, lunji win Ker moyik ri win wok i chwech pa piny;
kole munyo kech onwaŋo nekan wimiyan chiemo, munyo riyo nekan wimiyan giramadha, munyo abedo wendo wijolan,
munyo angoye gi ruk wirukan, munyo atwo wiliman, munyo ani twech wiliman.’
Gikenyo joma beyo no jobino dwoko go ni, ‘Ruoth, keraŋo ma waneno munyo kech oido nekin to wamiyin chiemo, kosa ini gi riyo to wamiyin giramadha?
Odoko keraŋo ma wanenin munyo itwo kosa ingoye gi ruk aka warukin?
Odoko keraŋo ma wanenin munyo itwo kosa ini twech aka walimin?’
Kere bino dwoko jo ni, ‘Adyeri awacho ri win, munyo witimo gino kada ri achiel moasa thin kwoŋ jowotan me, meno witimo ran.’
Gikenyo go bino wacho ri joma nitye yu racham pere ni, ‘Eye win bothan jomolam, kendo donji win i mach makitho moyik, ri jwogi kodi jomalaika pere.
Kole munyo kech onwaŋo nekan wikimiyan chiemo, munyo riyo nekan wikimiyan giramadha,
munyo abedo wendo wikijolan, munyo angoye gi ruk wikirukan, munyo atwo kendo munyo oido ani twech wikiliman.’
Gikenyo jo bende jobino dwoko ni, ‘Ruoth, keraŋo ma wanenin munyo kech kosa riyo oido nekin, kosa ibedo jakichar, kosa ingoye gi ruk, kosa itwo kosa ini twech aka wakikonyin?’
Gikenyo go bino dwoko jo ni, ‘Adyeri awacho ri win, munyo wikitimo gino ri kada achiel moasa thin kwoŋ jowotan me, meno wikitimo ran.’
Gikenyo jobino eye bonge to jodonjo i girachula makirum, aka joma beyo jobino donjo i kwo makirum.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo wacho gikipiny me jye, owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni,
“Wiŋeyo ni ka ndelo aryo orumo, kalima ma Kadho bino tundo, aka ibino ketho Wuodi Dhano i chingi joma joleguro go kwoŋ musalaba.”
Gikenyo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji jochokere i dyedipo pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar milwoŋo ni Kaifas,
aka jochano mako Yesu nyaliŋliŋ jowoneki go.
“Wakiri watim gime i ndelo madwoŋ, rupiri ji jonyalo chako woy.”
Munyo Yesu oido nitye Bethaniya i ot pa Simon jadhowo,
dhako moro obino bonge kodi chupa mo mawelo kendo maŋwe kur, to konjo i wiye, kama go onwaŋo obed'iye dhower.
To munyo jofuonjirok joneno ameno, joramere, to jowacho ni, “Onyiek mo me raŋo?
Kole gime d'onyal kitana pesa madit, timiyo jochandi.”
To Yesu, paka oŋeyo gime, owacho ri jo ni, “Wikwinyo dhakodwoŋ me raŋo. Kole go ee otimo ran gimaber tektek.
Winitye gi jochandi noknok, to wikilebedo kodan noknok.
Kole go okonjo mo me kwoŋan ma yiko gine delkwoŋ mikidho yiko i kalyel.
Adyeri awacho ri win, kamoro jye ma Wach Maber me ofuonji iye i piny gipi, gima go otimo me ibino wacho ma poyo go.”
Gikenyo achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok apar g'aryo, milwoŋo ni Yuda Iskaryot okidho bongi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar,
to penjo ni, “Wibino miyan aŋo ka aketho Yesu i chingi win?” To jokwano rigo pesa ma feza pyero adek to jomiyo go.
Wok i hongo no Yuda odwaro royo ma nyalere ma ketho Yesu i chingi jo.
I ndelo marapena ma kalima ma mugat ma bu thow, jofuonjirok jobino bongi Yesu to jopenjo go ni, “Imito ni wayiki rin chiemo ma kalima ma Kadho gi kune?”
To wacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi win i tindi i pecho pa nyatoro wiwachi ri go ni, ‘Jafuonji wacho ni, hongo paran otundo; alechamo kalima ma Kadho kodi jofuonjirok paran i ot perin.’ ”
Jofuonjirok jotimo paka Yesu owacho ri jo to joyiko chiemo ma kalima ma Kadho.
Munyo hongo mothyeno otundo, Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere apar g'aryo jobedo piny chiemo.
Aka munyo jochiemo Yesu owacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, achiel kwoŋ win bino chamo ran sereko.”
Jofuonjirok jodhyer swa to jochako penjo go, achielechiele ni, “Ruoth, iwachani?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ŋata opilo chiemo i sen achiel kodan ama bino chamo ran sereko.
Wuodi Dhano bino tho paka Ndiiko Maleŋ wacho, to kidamba bino bedo marach ri ŋat mochami ri go sereko! D'ober loyo bedi chango konywol go!”
Gikenyo Yuda, jacham sereko, oluwo malo ni, “Adyeri Jafuonji, meno miti ikiwachani?” To Yesu dwoko ni, “Eno i won iwacho.”
Munyo jochiemo, Yesu okwanyo mugat, to miyo silwany to turo, to poko jofuonjirok pere munyo wacho ni, “Kwanyi win wicham; me delkwoŋ.”
To kwanyo agwata, aka munyo otyeko miyo silwany, omiyo jo munyo wacho ni,
“Madhi win gima n'iye, wijojye; rupiri vini me obedo remo paran ma ridho chikirok manyien ma Were otimo gi ji pere, mooy ri ji mathoth ma chwako gimarecho.
Awacho ri win, akibino madho vini me kendo chuka ndelo ma anomadh'iye vini manyien gi win i Ker pa Baba.”
Aka munyo jotyeko wero wer ma pako Were, jowok woko to jokidho i got Olivet.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wijojye wibino ringo to wiweyan wor ma konon, kole ndiiko wacho ni, ‘Abino neko jakwath to roombo tyakere woko.’
To ka atyeko chierino, abino telo kidho ri win Galileya.”
Petro owacho ri go kamaler ni, “Kada jojye joweyin, an akibino weyin.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Adyeri awacho rin, wor ma konon won me, ma fuodi wuodi gweno kukoko, ibino kwedere kwoŋan didek.”
Petro odwoko go ni, “Kada bedi ni aripo tho kodin, akokwedere kwoŋin.” Aka meno apaka jofuonjirok man jye bende jowacho.
Gikenyo Yesu okidho gi jo kama ilwoŋo ni Gethsemane, to wacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Bedi win ka, fuodi akidhoye gichien kwayo.
Go okwanyo Petro kodi woti Zebedayo jaryo. Gikenyo chunye ochako ramo to bedo gi rembo madwoŋ.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, ‘Chunyan raman tektek, pa kidho nekan. Bedi win ka, aka wibedi waŋ win kodan.’
Aka munyo go omedere yu malo nyaka mathin, opodho gi nyime to kwayo. To wacho ni, ‘Baba, ka nyalere, weyi agwata me woeye bongan. To weyi wobedi paka iyenyo ma kiweno paka an ayenyo.’ ”
Go ogik bongi jofuonjirok pere to nwaŋo jonindo, to wacho ri Petro ni, “Adyeri wikinyalo bedo waŋ win kodan kada nyaka ma sawa achiel woni?
Bedi win waŋ win wikway aka ŋey wikiri widonji i karatem. Chuny win yenyo, to del ama nyap.”
Odoko madiryo, oeye to kidho kwayo. To wacho ni, “Baba, ka agwata me kibino eye kwoŋan ma akimadho, wey gim'iyenyo wotimere.”
Go odoko odwoko to nwaŋo jonindo, rupiri nindo oido dit swa i waŋ jo.
Munyo oweyo jo kenyo, oeye kendo to kidho kwayo madidek, gi wach achiel no won.
Gikenyo go ogik bongi jofuonjirok pere, to wacho ni, “Fuodi winindo aninda wiywomere? Hongo onyo otundo mibino cham'iye ri Wuodi Dhano sereko tibolo go i chingi joma recho.
Ayi win wakadhi! Jachami ran sereko eno otyeko rikere chiegin.”

Munyo go fuodi luwo, Yuda, achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok apar g'aryo otundo. Go oido nitye gi muma ji madwoŋ ma jotiŋo abor kodi abirin, aka jowok bongi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa Joyudaya.
Jachami sereko oido otyeko chano gi muma ji no ranyuth ni, “Ŋata anochwiy lembe meno a ŋata wiyenyo; kendo ama wimaki.”
Yuda otundo to kidho titir bongi Yesu to wacho ni, “Syem wobedi kodin, Jafuonji,” to chwiyo lembe.
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Jawodhan, timi gim'okelin ka ayin.” Gikenyo jobino to jomako Yesu jowokadhi gine.
Ŋatachiel monwaŋo nitye gi Yesu oyuyo abor to toŋo ithi ŋecha pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar to chodo woko.
To Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Dwoki abor perin i ode, kole ji jye ma jooro abor jobino tho g'abor.
Wikuya nike d'anyalo kwayo Baba ni womiyan kony, piyo piyo no to go dhiro ran lwak jomalaika malwenyo apar g'aryo.
Ka ameno onyo Ndiiko Maleŋ ma wacho ni gime ripo wotimere otundi nedi i kare?”
Gikenyo Yesu oluwo kodi muma ji no ni, “Oido ripere ni wibin kodi abirin makan, igani a jakwo? Kole ndelo jye abedo i Ot pa Were afuonjo to wikimakan.
To gime jye otimere ŋey gima jotuchi wach Were jondiko wotundi.” Gikenyo jofuonjirok jye joweyo go to joringo.
Joma jomako Yesu jotero go i ot pa Kaifas, jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, kama jofuonji ma Chik kodi jotel pa ji oido jochoker'iye.
Petro oluwo go gi bor tundo i dyedipo ma ot pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar. Go odonjo i dyedipo to bedo piny kodi jokur kareno mito neno paka gimoro jye obedi.
Jatel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jopido jotemo rango giranena matwodo kwoŋ Yesu, ma d'omiyo woneki go;
to jokonwaŋo atoŋa moro, kada joma thoth jotemo nyayo wach matwodo kwoŋe. Rumachien ji aryo jochungo,
to jowacho ni, “Ŋat me owacho ni, ‘Anyalo turo woko Ot pa Were me to agero man i ndelo adek.’ ”
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ochungo to penjo Yesu ni, “Ingoye gi radwok kwoŋ wach mokel kwoŋin me?”
To Yesu oliŋaliŋa. Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar odoko oluwo gine ni, “I nyingi Were makwo, pama onyo akethin i kwoŋirok; wachi ri wan k'inen ibedo Kristo, Wuodi Were.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Ato eno iwacho. To awacho ri win ni rumachien wibino neno Wuodi Dhano munyo obedo yu chingi Jameni jye marachuch, odoko wibino neno ka bino i pondeponde ma polo.”
Ru wach me jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar oyecho nengin pere to wacho ni, “Me luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were! Maraŋo ma wayenyo jokony man kendo? Eno wityeko winjo wach pere marecho!
Wiparo nedi?” Jodwoko ni, “Banja oloyo go, aka go ripo tho.”
Gikenyo joŋulo i waŋe law to jogoyo go. Joman jogoyo lembe g'adhoŋ kareno jowacho ni,
“Tuchi ri wan, Kristo! Tuchi ri wan ŋata ogoyin!”
Petro onwaŋo obedo piny i dyedipo, to achiel kwoŋ jotich ma nyir mapa jatel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar obino bonge to wacho ni, “Ibende oido initye gi Yesu Jagalileya.”
To go okwero i waŋ jojye ni, “Akuya gima iluwo kwoŋe,”
to ay to kidho dho waŋkach ma dyedipo. Jatich manyako man oneno go kenyo to wacho ri ji mani kenyo ni, “Jame oido nitye gi Yesu Janazareth.”
Petro odoko okwero ni, “Akwoŋere, akuya ran ŋato!”
Munyo hongo okadho machiek, ji moido jochungo kenyo jobino bongi Petro to jowacho ni, “Adyeri in achiel kwoŋ jo. Odoko paka in iluwo wodhin awodha kamaler!”
Gikenyo Petro ochako kwedirok gi kwoŋirok ni, “Akuya ran jalo!” I hongo no won to wuodi gweno koko.
Gikenyo Petro opoyo wach pa Yesu ni, “Ka fuodi wuodi gweno kukoko, ibino kwedere kwoŋan didek.” Ri ameno go owok woko to ywak ywak malith swa.
Odikini munyo piny oyawere, jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jye kodi jotel pa ji joyiko chan ma neko Yesu.
Jotweyo go jokadho gine, to joketho go i chingi Pilato, jadhum ma Roma.
Munyo Yuda, jachami ri Yesu sereko oniaŋ ni otyek thumo ri Yesu banja ma tho, owinjo malith i chunye to dwoko pesa ri jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar gi jotel pa ji ka wacho ni,
“Atyeko timo gimarach i chamo sereko ri dhano mongoye gi racho ni woneki.” To jono jowacho ni, “Wan wadewo ri waye kwoŋ gino? Meno makin.”
To Yuda bolo jegejege pesa no i Ot pa Were kenyo to kadho; to kidho dere.
To jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jokwanyo pesa no munyo jowacho ni, “Wakiripi ketho pesa me i kakan ma Ot pa Were rupiri obedo pesa ma remo.”
Ri ameno joyeyere to jonyiewo gine ndelo pa jachwech degi moro, paka kayikirok pa jokichar.
Amomiyo ndelo no ilwoŋo ni, “Ndelo ma Remo” kiri konon.
Gikenyo gima Yeremiya jatuchi wach Were owacho otundo i kare ni, “Jokwanyo jegejege pesa ma feza pyero adek, welo ma Joisrael joyeyere gine ma nyiewo kwo pere,
aka jooro ma nyiewo ndelo pa jachwech degi, paka Ruoth ooran.”
Yesu ochungo runyim jadhum ma Roma mopenjo go ni, “Ibedo Kere pa Joyudaya?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Ato eno iwacho.”
To munyo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji josegeya go, kodwoko gimoro kwoŋ wach pajo.
Ri ameno Pilato openjo go ni, “Ikiwinji paka joketho kwoŋin wach kwethi?”
To Yesu kodwoko wach moro; gime omiyo Gavana no ouro go tektek
Ndir jye, i kis kalima madwoŋ ma Kadho, jadhum madwoŋ ma Roma yado maro gonyo jatwech moro achiel ma muma ji okwayo.
I hongo no oido nitye jatwech moŋeyere milwoŋo ni Baraba.
Amomiyo munyo muma ji ochokere, Pilato openjo jo ni, “Wiyenyo agony ri win ŋa? Baraba kosa Yesu milwoŋo ni Kristo?”
Ato go onwaŋo oŋeyo maber nike jokelo Yesu bongi go ru nyieko momako jo gine.
Munyo Pilato oido obedo i ot wothumi banja, chiege odhiro ri go mikwenda, ni “Ikiri itim gimoro kwoŋ dhano ma bu racho no, rupiri nende wor achandere swa i lek ma mako kwoŋe.”
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji jodwoŋo ji ni jowokwayi Pilato wogonyi Baraba ayin aka woneki Yesu.
To Pilato odoko openjo jo ni, “Kwoŋ jaryo me, ŋa ma wiyenyo agony ri win?” To jodwoko ni, “Baraba!”
Aka Pilato openjo jo ni, “To atim aŋo gi Yesu milwoŋo ni Kristo?” Jodwoko ni, “Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!”
To Pilato penjo jo ni, “Racho aŋo ma go otimo?” Gikenyo jochako koko gi dwondi gin mamalo swa ni, “Wogur go kwoŋ musalaba!”

Gikenyo munyo Pilato onwaŋo ni ongoye kony medirok gi penji aka kuchiel ji oido jomedo ameda woy ayino, okwanyo pi to logo chinge ruwaŋ ji, munyo wacho ni, “Tho pa ŋatin kimaki kwoŋan; me obedo tim mewin wiwegi!”
Muma ji odwoko ni, “Remo pere wobedi kwoŋ wan gi nyithindho mawan!”
Gikenyo Pilato ogonyo Baraba ri jo; ooro jo chwado Yesu to chwayo go ri jo ni wogur kwoŋ musalaba.
Gikenyo joserikale jotero Yesu i chiel pa Gavana, aka kitipa pajo gipi ochokere to thoko go.
Jolunyo nengin pere to joruko ri go kanzo mobokere.
Gikenyo jodolo thach okudho i wiye pa sangarya to joketho midole i chinge marachuch pa kere; aka joguro chongi gin piny to joloko go ginyiero munyo joŋalo go ni, “Kere pa Joyudaya woyindira!”
Joŋulo kwoŋe law, aka jokwanyo midole no to jogoyo gine wiye.
Munyo jotyeko nyiero go, jolunyo kanzo no to joruko ri go nengin pere won, aka jowodho go woko kidho guro go kwoŋ musalaba.
Munyo jokadho, joromo kodi nyatoro mowok Sireno ma nyinge Simon, to jomiyo go chukirok gi tiŋo musalaba pa Yesu.
Jotundo kama ilwoŋo ni Golgotha, dwoŋ mere ni, “Kama di Kahanga wich ji.”
Kenyo jomiyo go vini moruw gi pigi yath ma kech pa kedhino ni womadhi ma konyo go; to munyo go otyeko bilo, koyeyo madho.
Joguro go kwoŋ musalaba, to jopoko nengin pere munyo jogoyo kwir.
Rumachien jobedo piny kenyo kuro go.
Yu wiye malo ondik wach moosa gine go ni, “Me Yesu, Kere pa Joyudaya.”
Gikenyo joguro jokwo mogo aryo kwoŋ musalaba gi Yesu, ŋatachiel yu rachuch, ŋat man yu racham pere.
Joma kadho kenyo joyengo wiy gin aka joyeto Yesu ni,
“In monwaŋo ikidho kedho Ot pa Were t'igero man i ndelo adek, onyo iwon bothere! Aka k'inen ibedo Wuodi Were adyeri ere lori wi musalaba wanen!”
Meno bende apaka jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik kodi jotel pa ji joyeto go.
Jowacho ni, “Go obotho joman to won kinyal bothere. Go a Kere pa Joisrael. Ere wolori wi musalaba no aka wanoyey wach pere.
Kole go geno Were; aka owacho ni go Wuodi Were. Ere weyi wanen ka Were yenyo botho go pama!”
Aka kir jokwo mogur jo gine kwoŋ musalaba bende joyeto go i yo achiel no won.
Wok sawa auchiel tundo sawa abuŋwen modyechieŋ, piny gipi mudho oumo chowo hongo ma sawa adek.
Dho kapa sawa abuŋwen, Yesu okoko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Eli, Eli, lema sabachthani?” ma dwoŋ mere ni, “Were paran, Were paran, ijwangan raŋo?”
Aka munyo jomegi kwoŋ jomochungo kenyo jowinjo gime, jowacho ni, “Jame lwoŋo Eliya.”
Ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo oringo mayot, okwanyo changwe, obilo i vini, to ketho wi luth, aka otemo miyo go ni womadhi.
To joman jowacho ni, “Kuri win, wanen ye ka Eliya bino botho go!”
Yesu odoko okoko malo aka nyaka oweyo chunye ochot, to tho.
Gikenyo nanga molyer i Ot pa Were oyech aryo wok malo kir piny. Piny oyengere, telin obare,
Kalyele obare, aka ji pa Were mathoth jochierino i kwo kendo.
Jowok i kalyele, aka munyo Yesu ochierino kwoŋ jomotho, jokidho i Tindi Maleŋ, kuma ji mathoth jonen'iye jo kendo.
Munyo jaserikale madwoŋ kodi joma onwaŋo ni bonge munyo jokuro Yesu joneno yengirok pa piny kodi giman jye motimere, lworo omako jo to jowacho ni, “Adyeri me oido Wuodi Were.”
Kenyo oido bende nitye mon mathoth moido joneno gima timere gibor; jome joluwo Yesu wok i Galileya munyo jokonyo go.
I dyer jo obedo Marya ma wok Magdala, Marya min Yakobo gi Yozefu, kodi min woti Zebedayo.
Munyo piny oyutho, jaŋaŋo moro ma wok Arimatheya milwoŋo ni Yozefu otundo; aka go oido bende olokere jafuonjirok pa Yesu.
Go okidho bongi Pilato to kwayo delkwoŋ Yesu. Pilato owodho or ni womiy Yozefu delkwoŋ Yesu.
Yozefu okwanyo del no, oboyo gi suka manyien,
to ketho i kalyel pere won, moido go nyaka ogworo i kor tele. Gikenyo go oŋilo kidi madwoŋ, ochulo gine dhoki kalyel no to kadho.
Marya ma wok Magdala kodi Marya man oido jobedo piny kenyo joŋiyo kalyel.
Yawere mere, i ndelo moluwo ndelo ma yikirok, jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi Jofarisayo joromo kodi Pilato to jowacho ri go ni,
“Jadwoŋ, wapoyo ni munyo jatwodo no oido fuodi kwo owacho ni, ‘Abino chierino i ndelo maradek.’

Amomiyo, wodhi or ma kuro kalyel pere tundo i ndelo maradek, ŋey jofuonjirok pere jokiri jowonyali kidho kwalo go, to jowacho ri ji ni go ochierino kwoŋ jomotho, aka twodo machowe me bino loyo motelo.”
Pilato owacho ri jo ni, “Teri win jokur wikur kalyel no matek paka winyalo jye.”
Gikenyo jokidho to jomwono tele ma dhoki kalyel matek, to joweyo jokur mogo kenyo.
Munyo Sabato orumo, kareno chieŋ nyaka gulo i ndelo marapena ma tich, Marya ma wok Magdala kodi Marya man jokidho neno kalyel.
Gikenyo yengirok pa piny madwoŋ obedo; aka malaika pa Ruoth oloro piny wok i polo, oŋilo woko kidi ma dhoki kaliel, to bedo wiye.
Go oido chalo lithkoth aka nengin pere oido tar pa pe.
Lworo omako jokur swa momiyo jokirin, to jolokere pa jomotho.
To malaika no owacho ri mon no ni, “Wikiri wilwori. Aŋeyo ni wirango Yesu ma chieŋino ogur kwoŋ musalaba.
Go ongoye ka, otyeko chierino paka owacho won. Biye winen kama oido oketh'iye go.
Onyo kidhi win mayot, wiwachi ri jofuonjirok pere ni, ‘Go otyeko chierino kwoŋ jomotho aka onyo telo kidho ri win Galileya; kenyo ama wibino nen'iye go. Eno atyeko wacho ri win.’ ”
Gikenyo munyo fuodi lworo opoŋ kwoŋ jo aka josangala, mon no joredo wok i kalyel to joringo kidho wacho gino ri jofuonjirok.
Gikenyo jopoyo ka Yesu oromo gi jo to motho jo ni, “Syem wobedi gi win.” Jodhire bonge, jomako tyende, to jolamo go.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wilwori. Kidhi wiwachi ri jomoyeyo jowokidhi Galileya, aka jobino nenan yu koro.”
Munyo mon no fuodi jowotho jokadho, joserikale megi kwoŋ jokuri kalyel jogik i tindi to jowacho ri jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar gimoro jye motimere.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar no joromo kodi jotel pa ji to jotimo chan pajo. Jomiyo joserikale no pesa kweth,
ka jowacho ni, “Wiripo wacho ni jofuonjirok pere jobino wor to jokwalo delkwoŋe munyo wagalo nindo.
Aka ka Gavana owinji gime wabino ridho ri go ni wingoye gi racho, aka wikibino podho i teko moro jye.”
Jokur jokwanyo pesa no to jotimo paka owachi ri jo. Aka meno wach mochwogi ma Joyudaya jonyayo kir konon me.
Jofuonjirok apar g'achiel jokidho wi tendere i Galileya kama Yesu ochano romo iye gi jo.
Munyo joneno go, jolamo go, kada nende joman kwoŋ jo oido fuodi joganagana.
Yesu ochore chiegin to wacho ri jo ni, “Otyek miyan men i polo kodi i piny.
Amomiyo kidhi win wiloki nonin jye jofuonjirok paran; wimiy jo batisimo i nyingi Baba gi Wuode gi Chuny Maleŋ.
Aka wifuonji jo mako or jye ma amiyo win. Aka ŋeyi win nike abino bedo gi win ndir jye, tundo i giki piny.”
Me a chakirok ma Wach Maber mapa Yesu Kristo Wuodi Were paka
ondik i kitawo pa Isaya jatuchi wach Were ni, “Neni aoro jamikwenda paran, ma bino yiko rin royo wotelin.
Dwondijo moro koko i thim ni, ‘Yiki win royo pa Ruoth, tiri win royin pere mathindho thindho jye.’ ”
Ameno Yohana Jakibatisa onenere i thim, ka miyo ji batisimo, aka fuonjo jo ni jowoŋuti gimarecho pajo aka ŋey Were wochwaki jo.
Ji mawok i adeche jye ma Yudeya kodi Yerusalem jokidho bonge, aka go omiyo jo batisimo i jwom Yordan, munyo jotucho gimarecho pajo.
Ruk pa Yohana oido obedo pyen ŋamira kareno tweyo pyere gi del ma pyen, aka chamo bonyo kodi mo kich.
Yohana ofuonjo ka wacho ni, “Nyatoro luwan chien, ŋato loyan swa gi dwoŋ, ma akiripi kada luŋirok piny gonyo ri go thol war pere.
An amiyo win batisimo gi pi kende, to go bino miyo win batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ.”
I hongo no ama Yesu owok'iye Nazareth i piny Galileya aka Yohana omiyo go batisimo i jwom Yordan.
Tekin Yesu wok i pi, oneno polo oyawere, to Chuny Maleŋ pye kwoŋe i chal pa akuru.
Aka dwondijo moro owok i polo ma wacho ni, “In i Wuodan mamaro, asangala kodin.”
Gikenyo Chuny Maleŋ otero Yesu i thim kuma di ogwange.
Yesu otyeko kenyo ndelo pyero aŋwen, munyo Sitan temo go; aka jomalaika jokonyo go.
Munyo otyek mako Yohana otwey go, to Yesu kidho Galileya. Kenyo go ofuonjo Wach Maber mawok bongi Were.
Go owacho ni, “Ndir otundo, aka Ker pa Were ochore chiegin. Ŋuti win gimarecho mewin, aka wiyeyi Wach Maber.”
Munyo Yesu wotho dho thengi wakawaka ma Galileya, oneno jokitoga, Simon kodi Andereya omin go, munyo oido jochiiko bwoo pajo i wakawaka.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Luwan win abino loko win jokitoga ji.”
Piyo piyo no joweyo bwoo pajo, to jochako luwo go.
Munyo owotho nyaka mathin, odoko oneno Yakobo gi Yohana woti Zebedayo munyo oido jobedo i yee pajo joyiko bwoo pajo.
Piyo no to lwoŋo jo, to joweyo baa gin Zebedayo kodi jotich pere i yee to joluwo go.
Gikenyo Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jokidho Kapernaum; aka i ndelo ma Sabato, Yesu odonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya to fuonjo.
Ji jouro swa, rupiri go ofuonjo pa ŋata ni gi men, ma kiweno paka jofuonji ma Chik.
Piyo piyo no dhano ma chuny mochido oido ni kwoŋe odonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya ni pil, to chako koko ni,
“Imito timo wan nedi, Yesu Janazareth? Ibino ka reyo wan woko? Aŋeyin, i ŋataleŋ pa Were.”
Yesu oay kwoŋe munyo wacho ni, “Liŋi kendo woki woko i eye kwoŋe.”
Gikenyo chuny mochido no oyengo ŋato gi men to wok kwoŋe munyo koko gi derino madwoŋ.
Gino omiyo ji jye dhyer tektek to wegi jopenjere kendigin ni, “To me aŋo? Kole me fuonji manyien! Go oro kir chuny mochido wok aka jowinjo go!”
Gikenyo nyinge olak i adech ma Galileya jye parom.
Tekin jowok i kalamo pa Joyudaya, Yesu kodi Yakobo jokidho kodi Andereya pecho pa Simon.
Or Simon ma dhako onwaŋo nitye i kanindo kwoŋe oowere, to jowacho ri Yesu mayot paka dhako dwoŋ no two.
Yesu okidho bonge, omako chinge, to dheno ay malo. Ameno two no oweyo go, to go chako rweyo jo.
Othyeno no, munyo waŋchieŋ otyeko podho, ji jokelo ri Yesu jotwo jye, kodi joma onwaŋo jwogi ni kwoŋ jo.
Ji ma tindi gipi to jowura ri go dhoot.
Yesu obotho ji madit monwaŋo joramere gi two mopekere opokere: aka oryemo woko jwogi bende, ma koyeyo jo luwo, rupiri oido joŋeyo go.
Yawere mere odikini, ma piny fuodi kochot, Yesu ochiew to wok i ot no, to kidho gichien kwayo.
To Simon gi wadi jowok rango go,
aka munyo jonwaŋo go, jowacho ri go ni, “Dhano jye dwarin.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ere wakidhi win i tindi man, afuonji korago bende; kole gino ama okelan.”
Owotho Galileya munyo fuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya, kendo munyo ryemo woko jwogi kwoŋ ji.
Gikenyo jadhowo moro obino bothi Yesu, to guro chonge piny, to kwayo go ni, “Ka iyeyo, inyalo bothan.”
Yesu omako gine wor, aka ochwayo chinge ogeyo go, to wacho ni, “Ayeyo; bothi.”
Gikenyo won, dhowo no oeye kwoŋ ŋato, to kwoŋe chango molony.
Yesu ochiko go teltel munyo sewila go ni,
“Ikiri iwachi ri nyatoro gime; kidhi inyuthere i waŋ jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, aka imiy go mich paka Musa oketho i chik, aka dhano jye woŋeyi ni ityeko both adyeri.”
To jalo ochako nyayo wach no iye jye, momiyo Yesu odoko konyalo donjo i tindi kamaler, to obedo gichien kuma ongoye iye ji, aka kenyo ama ji jobino iye bonge wok kaman man jye.
Munyo ndelo okadho manok, Yesu ogik Kapernaum, aka wach olak ni go odwoko yu pecho.
Gikenyo ji jochokere kir i dhoot mongoye ka leŋo, to go fuonjo jo.
Munyo fuodi go fuonjo, ji aŋwen jokelo nyatoro ma two nyaŋinya.
To paka muma ji koyeyo jo baro royo ma rwako go bongi Yesu, jomwomo wiy ot kama otitere gi Yesu, aka munyo joyawo hola ma romo, jochwayo kitanda ma janyaŋinya no oido onind'iye nyuka otundo piny.
Munyo Yesu oneno yeyo pajo, owacho ri janyaŋinya no ni, “Nyathi paran, gimarecho perin ochwaki rin.”
Kenyo onwaŋo nitye jofuonji ma Chik mogo, to wegi joparo kendigin ni,
“Raŋo ma ŋatin luwo ama? Kole go luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were? Ŋata bende nyalo chwako gimarecho ma kiweno Were won?”
Yesu oŋeyo ni meno a paro moido jo ni gine, to wacho ri jo ni, “Raŋo ma wibedo gi paro no i chuny win?
Aŋo mayot wacho? Wacho ri janyaŋinya ni, ‘Gimarecho perin ochwaki rin,’ kosa ni, ‘Ayi malo, itiŋ kitanda perin iwothi?’
Ere wey anyuthi win ni Wuodi Dhano ni gi men i piny ka ma chwako gimarecho.” Gikenyo owacho ri janyaŋinya no ni,
“Awacho rin, ayi malo, tiŋi kitanda perin idoki pecho.”
Jalo oay malo, otiŋo kitanda pere, to wotho i waŋ ji jye, aka jojye jodhyer to jopako Were munyo jowacho ni, “Fuodi oido wakineno gima chalo ama.”
Yesu odoko okidho dho thengi wakawaka ma Galileya, aka kweth ji jochokere bonge, to fuonjo jo.
Aka munyo wotho, oneno Levi jachoki misolo, wuodi pa Alfayo, obedo piny i ot ma misolo, to wacho ri go ni, “Luwan.” Jalo oay malo to luwo Yesu.
Rumachien, Yesu okidho pecho pa Levi gi jofuonjirok pere, to bedo dhower. Jochoki misolo kweth kodi jomarecho bende joluwo go yu koro. Jojye bende jochiemo kanyachiel gi Yesu.
Munyo jofuonji ma Chik ma dyer Jofarisayo joneno Yesu chiemo kodi jomarecho gi jochoki misolo, jopenjo jofuonjirok pere ni, “Raŋo ma go chiemo gi jochoki misolo Kodi jomarecho?”
Munyo Yesu owinjo gino, odwoko jo ni, “Jomolama ama jokiyeny jamilerwa, to jomatwo ayino ama joyenyo: kole akibino lwoŋo jomabeyo, to abino lwoŋo jomarecho ayino.”

Ndelo moro munyo jofuonjirok pa Yohana Jakibatisa kodi apa Jofarisayo onwaŋo joriyo kech, jomogo jobino to jopenjo Yesu ni, “Raŋo ma jofuonjirok pa Yohana Jakibatisa kodi apa Jofarisayo joriyo kech aka aperin jokiriy?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “To, wendo ma jonitye i kalima ma nywomirok jonyalo nedi riyo kech mato jamweha fuodi nitye gi jo? I hongo ma go fuodi ni gi jo jokiriy kech be.
To ndir bino tundo ma jamweha bino ey'iye bongi jo, meno aka nyaka jochaki riyo kech.
“Ongoye ŋata kwoyo kiremo nanga ma fuodi nyien wi nanga moti. Ka otimo ameno, kiremo manyien bino ywayo woko kasegere nanga no to medo yech malach loyo waŋe machon.
Ongoye ŋata konjo vini manyien i mugowa pyen mere moti; ka otimo ameno, mugowa pyen bino yech to vini oy, to go keŋ vini kir gi mugowa no jye. To, vini manyien bende ikonjo i migowa pyen manyien!”
Ndelo ma Sabato moro, Yesu onwaŋo wotho i ndelo ŋano, to jofuonjirok pere jochodo withi ŋano malomalo.
Gino omiyo Jofarisayo jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo ma jofuonjirok perin joturo Chik ma Sabato?”
Go odwoko ni, “Fuodi wikisomaye gima chango Daudi otimo munyo go kodi ji pere oido jongoye gi girachama:
paka go odonjo i Ot pa Were i ndir pa Abiyathar, jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar aka ochamo mugat ma jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kende ama oyey jo chamo, to miyo ji pere bende?”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Sabato oketh ma bero pa dhano, to dhano kochwey ri Sabato;
amomiyo Wuodi Dhano dhumo kir Sabato bende.”
Gikenyo Yesu odoko odonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya, aka dhano ma chinge otho onwaŋo nitye kenyo.
Kenyo bende oido nitye jomogo ma jokiyo neno ni kono Yesu obothi ŋato i ndelo ma Sabato, ŋey jowokethi kwoŋe banja.
Yesu owacho ri ŋata chinge otho no ni, “Biye ka. Chungi, ji jye jowonenin.”
To Yesu penjo jo ni, “Chik yeyo wan timo bero i ndelo ma Sabato, kosa racho ayin? Botho kwo, kosa neko ayin?” To joliŋ aliŋa.
Yesu ogawo jo gi keme, rupiri chuny jo oido nwaŋ, aka owacho ri ŋato ni, “Ryeyi chingin.” Ŋato oryeyo chinge, to chinge bedo maber kichutho.
Gikenyo Jofarisayo jowok woko, aka piyo piyo no jo kodi jopa Herode jochako thumo ryeko ma neko Yesu.
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jokidho dho wakawaka. Aka kweth ji joluwo go ji ma jowok Galileya kodi Yudeya,
i tindi ma Yerusalem kodi i adech ma Idumeya, gi ma loka Yordan, gi ma yu tindi Tire kodi Sidon. Kweth ji me jobino munyo jowinjo gima Yesu oido timo.
Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere dwaro ri go yee wobed'iye, munyo oneno ni kweth ji no jonyalo diyo go;
ato go oido otyeko botho ji mathoth, amomiyo dhano jye monwaŋo ni gi two orire bonge ni wonyali geyo go.
Aka bin chuny mochido mani kwoŋ ji ka joneno Yesu, jogore piny dhowaŋe to jokoko ni, “In i Wuodi Were”.
Yesu ochiero chuny mochido kichutho miyo ji ŋeyo go.
Yesu okidho wi got, to lwoŋo bonge joma go won omito, to jobino bothe.
Go oyero ji apar g'aryo bedo bonge, g'atoŋa ma oro jo fuonji rumachien,
gi nwaŋo men ma ryemo woko jwogi.
Me a japar g'aryo ma go oyero: Simon m'omiyo nyinge ni Petro;
Yakobo gi Yohana woti Zebedayo m'omiyo jo nyingi gin ni “Bonages”, dwoŋ mere ni joma mwoch pa lithkoth,
Andereya, Filipo, Batholomayo, Mathayo, Thoma, Yakobo wuodi pa Alfayo, Thadeyo, Simon Jalweny ri nono pere,
kodi Yuda Iskaryot mochamo ri go sereko.
Yesu odok pecho, aka kweth ji odoko jochokere bothe ma jokonyalo yeyo jo kada chiemo.
Munyo wade pere jowinjo wach no, jobino ni jowomaki go, rupiri ji oido jowacho ni wiye onyiekere.
Jofuonji ma Chik ma jowok Yerusalem joero wacho ni, “Belzebul ni kwoŋe, aka ryemo jwogi gi men pa Belzebul.”
Gikenyo Yesu olwoŋo jo bonge to chako bolo ri jo agechin mogo ni, “Sitan nyalo ryemo woko Sitan nyawote nedi?”
Ka ker moro won otyakere munyo ji mere wegi jolwenyo kendigin, kole ker no kinyal chungo.
Ka pecho moro otyakere munyo ji ma kenyo wegi jolwenyo kendigin, pecho no bende kinyal chungo.
Aka ka Sitan onyo won owire lwenyo gi wadi, kole meno ker pere otyakere kinyal chungo, aka chiegin tur.
Ongoye nyatoro ma nyalo donjo i ot pa dhano ma jameni, to nyaga gikipiny pere, ma kokutho otweyo ŋato aka nyaka onyali kinyaga gikipiny pere.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, gimarecho pa ji jye ibino chwako ri jo, kada luwo gima kotire kwoŋ gimaleŋ;
To moro ma luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ, kocwaki go; meno otimo gimarach ma chil gi chil.”
Yesu oluwo ameno rupiri jomogo oido jotyeko wacho ni chuny mochido ni kwoŋe.
Yoki Yesu gi wutimin go bende jotundo to jochungo woko aka jodhiro wach ni jomito neno go.
Muma ji onwaŋo obedo piny othoko go; to jowacho ri go ni: “Yokin kodi wutimerin ichade jochungo woko jomito nenin.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Jokune ma mama gi wutimera?”
Aka obolo waŋe oŋiyo jomobedo piny thoko go, to wacho ni, “Kole jome a mama gi wutimera.
Dhano jye ma timo gima Were mito, ŋato ama obedo omera, kodi nyamera kodi mama.”
Yesu odoko ochako fuonjo ji i thengi wakawaka ma Galileya. Kweth ji moasere jochokere bothe, amomiyo go odonjo i wakawaka to bedo i yee. Aka ji jye jobedo dho thengi wakawaka.
Yesu ofuonjo gikipiny madit munyo luwo i agechin, aka i fuonji pere owacho ni,
“Winji win! Dhano moro okidho chwoyo.
Aka munyo bayo kodhi, megi opodho i thengi royo, to winyin jobino jodimo woko.
Kodhi megi opodho wi tele kuma lowo rep'iye; jokwako twi, rupiri lowo oido rep.
To munyo chieŋ olyel, orewo jo, to paka tyendi gin oido orawere, joner to jothwo woko.
Kodhi megi opodho kuma di kudhin, aka kudhin odongo gi jo to mwonyo jo woko ma jokonyalo nyak gimoro.
Aka kodhi megi opodho i lowo maber ma diwa, to jonyak withi gin, ma megi nyingi gin pyero adek, megi pyero auchiel, megi miya achiel.”
Aka Yesu owacho ni, “Ŋata ni gi ithe ma winjo wowinji.”
Gikenyo munyo Yesu oido ni kende, joma onwaŋo jo ni bonge, kanyachiel gi jofuonjirok pere apar g'aryo, jopenjo go tyendi agecha me.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Otyek miyo win ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma Ker pa Were,
to jonicha ma jo ni woko iwacho ri jo gikipiny g'agechin, ŋey nyaka, ‘Kada jotem ŋiyo jokonyal neno, kada jotem winjo jokonyal niaŋ, Ipoyo di jonyalo gik bongi Were to chwako jo.’ ”
Gikenyo Yesu openjo jo ni, “Kere wikuya dwoŋ agecha me? Onyo winoŋey nedi dwoŋ agechin man?
Jachwoyo chwoyo wach pa Were.
Dichieŋ wach megi podho thengi royo; meno ji ma jowinjo wach no, to tekin jotyeko winjo, to Sitan bino to kwalo woko wach monwaŋo ochwoy i chuny gin.
Ji man jochale kodi kodhi mopodho wi tele ma lowo rep'iye. Me a joma tekin jowinjo wach to jojolo gi kisangala.
To wach no kimoki i chuny jo, aka bedo ye i chuny jo nyaka hongo machiek. To ka teko kosa achanda mogo obino, ro wach no, jono jopodho mayot.
Ji man jochalo kodhi mochwoy kama di kudhin. Me a joma jowinjo wach,
to rembo ri kwo ma piny me, kodi awanya ma ŋaŋo ma piny kodi giman mathoth jomwonyo wach to kinyak gimoro.
To ji megi jochalo kodhi mochwoy i lowo maber ma diwa. Jowinjo wach, jojolo, aka wach nyak: megi pyero adek, megi pyero auchiel, megi miya achiel.”
Gikenyo Yesu omedo wacho ni, “Tala bende odoko iryewo iyagono nedi? Kosa iketho nedi i tyendi kitanda, ma kolyer malo wi akare mere?
Kole gima opan jye ibino wodho kamaler, aka gima oum ibino yawo kamaler.
Ŋata ni gi ithe ma winjo gima afuonjo wowinji.”
To wacho ri jo ni, “Kethi win i tim gima wiwinjo; paka ipima gima imiyo ji, apaka bende ibino kipima rin gima ibino miyin, aka ibino medin kir man.
Aka ŋata nitye gi gikipiny mathoth ibino medo go man, ŋata ongoye gine ibino mayo go kada nyaka mathin monwaŋo go ni gine.”
Yesu owacho ni, “Ker pa Were chalo dhano mochwoyo kodhi i ndelo pere.
Go nindo wor, to chiew odikini to yindin odyechieŋ gipi, kareno kodhi twi to dongo. Go kiŋey kada paka gino dongo.
Lowo won miyo gimopidhi dongo to nyak.
Gino kutho turo thyaŋ to ŋok, rumachien withe gi nyinge tegino. Ka kal ochiek i ndelo, won ndelo kwanyo athero, rupiri kecho otundo.”
Yesu odoko owacho ama: “Di wawachi ni Ker pa Were chalo aŋo? Kosa agecha aŋo ma wanoori ma tito?
Gime chalo nyaka kodhi mondhilo ma i ndir ma pidho thin swa loyo kodhi man jye ma piny.
To ka otyek pidho, twi to dongo madwoŋ loyo yen wadi jye; ryeyo jange madongo, aka winyin jonyalo geto odi gin i jange.”
Yesu bin fuonjo ji munyo bolo agechin mathoth thoth paka meno.
Oluwo gi jo i royo mamiyo jowoniaŋi wach. Go koluwo gi jo mongoye agechin; to ka nitye gi jofuonjirok pere wegi kakendigin, tito ri jo gimoro jye gi thenethene mere.
Munyo piny oumere, Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Wapori win loka makocha ma wakawaka.”
Joweyo kweth ji, to jodonjo i yee kendigin, to jochako chiewirok. Yee megi oido bende nitye kenyo.
Gikenyo koyo madwoŋ obino gi men to yengo wakawaka, to miyo pi tula to chako donjo i yee pa kidho poŋo.
Yesu oido nitye chien i yee, otheno wiye nindo. Jochiewo go to jowacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, ikidew ni wachiegin tho?”
Yesu ochiew, oay kwoŋ koyo no, to wacho ri wakawaka ni, “Kudere! Kwe!” Aka koyo okwe to wakawaka jye pye.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Wibwok aŋo? Wingoye gi yeyo kada masisiri?”
Jodhyer swa to wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Me ŋa ma kir koyo gi wakawaka jye winjo wach pere!”
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jopor loka man ma wakawaka ma Galileya, to jodonjo i piny ma Gerasa.
Tekin Yesu wok i yee, dhano moro mowok i ŋungu miyik'iye ji oromo gine.
Ŋato oido nitye gi chuny mochido, aka oido bedo i kalyele. Ongoye moro monwaŋo nyalo tweyo go kada gi lijegere aka bedi liŋ.
Ndir mathoth onwaŋo itweyo chinge gi tyende, to hongo jye chodo woko lijegere, to ŋinyo woko okol ma tyende.
Odyechieŋ gi wor jye go oido helahela i kalyele kodi wi tendere munyo hola aka yaŋere gi telin.
Munyo fuodi ŋato oido nitye gi borbor, oneno Yesu; piyo piyo to tukere gi ŋwech, to bino guro chonge piny dhowaŋ Yesu,
to koko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Yesu, Wuodi Were Madwoŋ Maloyo! Iyenyo aŋo kwoŋan? Mondo aywakere rin i nyingi Were, ikiri imiyan chandirok.”
(Go owacho ama rupiri Yesu oido otyeko wacho ri go ni, “Chuny mochido, eye woko kwoŋ jame.”)
Gikenyo Yesu openjo go ni, “Nyingin ŋa?” Ana go: “Nyingan Lwak, kole wamore swa.”
Omedo ywakirok ri Yesu nike wokiri woryem jo woko i piny no.
Sidwol mbiji madwoŋ onwaŋo nitye kenyo i thengi tendere chiemo.
Chuny mochido no jokwayo Yesu ni, “Dhiri wan i sidwol mbiji no, iyey wadonji i jo.”
Yesu oyeyo jo. Chuny mochido jowok kwoŋ jalo to jodonjo i mbiji. Sidwol mbiji gi bee, ma romo chiegin gana aryo gipi jomwomere gi ŋwech wok dho thengi tendere to jomunyere i wakawaka.
Jokwath mbiji jokedhere gi ŋwech to jonyayo wach no i tindi kodi i ndelin kama ji onwaŋo jotiy'iye. Aka ji jokidho neno gimotimere.
Jobino bongi Yesu to joneno jal ma yado lwak ma jwogi ni kwoŋe. Go oido obedo piny kenyo, orukere maber, aka wiye onyo otire; lworo omako jo jye tektek.
Joma joneno gime jowacho ri joman gimotimere kwoŋ jal ma yado jwogi opoŋ kwoŋe no, kodi gimotimo mbiji.
Gikenyo jokwayo Yesu nike woeye i piny pajo.
Munyo Yesu donjo i yee, jal ma yado jwogi opoŋ kwoŋe no okwayo go ni, “Yeyan aluwin.”
To Yesu koyeyo go; kuchiel owacho ri go ni, “Doki pecho thuwin iwachi ri jopecho gima Ruoth otimo rin, kendo paka go otimo rin wor madwoŋ swa.”
Gikenyo ŋato omako royo to wotho i tindin apar (milwoŋo ni Dekapoli), munyo wacho ri ji gima Yesu otimo ri go; aka ji jye ma jowinjo jouro tektek.
Munyo Yesu odoko opor loka man gi yee, aka oido obedo thengi wakawaka, kweth ji jothoko go kenyo.
Yayiro, ruoth ma kalamo pa Joyudaya, bende obino.
Aka munyo oneno Yesu, oryewere piny dho tyende to kwayo go gi geregere ni, “Nyaran two swa, mondo bowe ikidhi ikethi chingin kwoŋe wobedi maber.”
Yesu omako royo gi go. Aka muma ji madwoŋ oluwo go to thoko go ni rap.
Kenyo onwaŋo nitye dhako moro moido otyeko chandere gi remo ma oy chowo hongo ma oro apar g'aryo gipi;
aka go onwaŋo otyeko temo woth kwoŋ jomilerwa momore ma go fuodi chandere achanda. Dheno oido otyeko nyieko lim ma go oido ni gine jye, to kabedo ma chango, two omedere ayino.
Go oido otyekoye winjo kwoŋ Yesu, ri ameno orire i dyer ji yu ŋeye to geyo nanga pere.
Ato owacho g'ichunye ni, “Ka anogey kada nyaka nanga pere won, abino bedo maber.”
Go ogeyo kanzo pa Yesu, to remo chok gi kenyo won, aka won bende owinjo ni two pere otyeko chango.
Munyo Yesu owinjo meni owok kwoŋe, owire piyo i dyer ji to penjo ni, “Ŋata ogeyo nengin paran?”
Jofuonjirok pere jodwoko ni, “Ineno kweth ji jodire kwoŋin ama aka odoko fuodi ipenjo ni, ‘ŋat'ogeyan?’ ”
To Yesu medo rango gi waŋe thenge gi thenge munyo mito neno ŋata ogeyo go.
Gikenyo dhako no owok kamaler gi lworo kodi kirin, rupiri oŋeyo gima go otimo; aka opodho katyendi Yesu to tito ri go gimoro jye.
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Nyaran, yeyo perin obothin; doki pecho i syem, aka two perin no woweyin kichutho.”
Munyo Yesu fuodi luwo, jomogo jokonjere ma jowok pa yayiro, ruoth ma kalamo pa Joyudaya, to jowacho ni, “Nyarin otyeko tho, odoko ichando jafuonji raŋo?”
To Yesu kere onwaŋo winjo, amomiyo owacho ri ruoth ma kalamo pa Joyudaya ni, “Ikiri ilwori, bedi gi yeyo ayin.”
Yesu koyeyo moro oluwo go, kwanyo woko Petro gi Yakobo kodi Yohana omin go.
Munyo jotundo pecho pa ruoth no, Yesu oneno paka jokalyel joywak gi geregere, jogoyo ndur, aka jowoy.
Aka munyo go odonjo i ot, owacho ri jo ni, “Woy gi ywak me jye maraŋo? Nyathi me kotho, go nindo ayin.”
Gikenyo jonyiero Yesu ayino, amomiyo go oryemo jojye woko, to kwanyo baa nyathi gi yokimere kodi jofuonjirok pere, to donjo gi jo kuma opyel'iye nyathi no.
Go omako chingi nyathi no to wacho ri go ni, “Talitha, kumi!” Dwoŋ mere ni, “Nyathi manyako, awacho rin, ay malo.”
Piyo piyo no nyako no oay malo ni sew to chako woth; aka nyako nago no onwaŋo romo oro apar g'aryo. Ji jobedo gi dhyer swa munyo gime otimere.
Yesu ochiko jo teltel ni kiri jowowachi ri nyatoro; to oro jo miyo nyano girachama.
Yesu okidho i tindi ma thugin kodi jofuonjirok pere.

I ndelo ma Sabato, go ochako fuonji i kalamo pa Joyudaya aka munyo kweth ji monwaŋo ni kenyo jowinjo go, jouro swa. Jowacho ni, “Go onwaŋo kune fuonji me jye? Ryeko aŋo ni momiy go? Go nyalo nedi timo giraura?
Me won ki japach, wuodi pa Marya, omin Yakobo kodi Yose kodi Yuda kodi Simon? Aka nyimin go jongoye bongi wan won ka?” Ameno to jokwero yeyo go.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Jatuchi wach Were kichay kaman, kwanyo woko i piny pere won, kodi bongi wade pere won kodi bongi jothugin wegi.”
Yesu konyalo timo kenyo giraura madwoŋ, kada nende obotho nyaka jotwo mogo manok munyo ketho chinge kwoŋ jo.
Yesu ouro swa paka jono jongoye gi yeyo.
Yesu okidho loka moro ma chiegin to fuonjo ji kenyo. Go olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere apar g'aryo, to miyo jo men ma ryemo woko chuny mochido;
aka omiyo jo or ni, “Wikiri witiŋ gimoro jye kwanyo woko luth, kendo wikiri witiŋ mugat kada mugowa moro kosa pesa.
Ruki win war, to wikiri wiruki nengin aryo.”
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Ka widonjo pecho moro, bedi win kenyo chuka winowoki i adech no.
Ka witundo kamoro to jokwero jolo win, kosa winjo fuonji mewin, ka wikadho teŋi win woko fukefuke ma tyendi win, paka ranyuth ma theko win gi jo.”
Gikenyo jochako woth pajo munyo jofuonjo ji ni jowoŋuti gimarecho pajo.
Joryemo woko jwogi mathoth, aka jowiro jotwo mathoth gi mo to jobotho jo.
Kere Herode owinjo kwoŋ gino, rupiri nyingi Yesu oido otyeko ŋeyere kamoro jye. Ji megi oido jowacho ni, “Yohana Jakibatisa osukina kendo amomiyo go nitye gi men ma timo giraura.”
To joman jowacho ni, “Go Eliya.” Joman jowacho ni, “Go achiel kwoŋ jotuchi wach Were machon.”
Munyo Herode owinjo gino, owacho ni, “Yohana, ma ndir cha aŋondo woko ŋute, ama odoko osukina kendo!”
Herode won gipi ama ooro ji mako Yohana ni wobol katwech. Go otimo ameno ru wach pa Herodya, ma go onywomo, mato meno oido chipa Filipo, omin go.
Yohana onwaŋo omena wacho ri Herode ni, “Kobedo gimotire in nywomo chipa omerin!”
Gikenyo Herodya omako nge gi Yohana aka oido yenyo neko go, to konyalo timo ameno.

Herode onwaŋo lworo Yohana, rupiri oŋeyo ni Yohana obedo dhano maber kendo maleŋ. Amomiyo oido kuro go ma racho moro di konyalo podho kwoŋe. Herode onwaŋo omaro winjo luwo pa Yohana kada nende hongo jye chunye onwaŋo waŋo go swa ka owinjo gima go wacho.
Rumachien Herodya olimo hongo maber. Ndelo ma poyo nywolirok pa Herode otundo, aka Herode otimo kalima madwoŋ ri ruodhe madongo, kodi jotel pa lwak jolweny, kodi ji ma joŋeyere ma Galileya.
Nyar Herodya odonjo kuma wendo oido jo ni iye to myelo, to sangala Herode kodi wendo jye tektek. Gikenyo Herode owacho ri nyano ni, “Imito amiyin aŋo? Abino miyin gimoro jye minokway.”
Owacho ri nyano gi kwoŋirok ni, “Achikere miyin gimoro jye minokway, kada adech ma ker paran!”
Gikenyo nyano owok woko to penjo min ni, “Akway aŋo?” Min odwoko ni, “Wich Yohana jakibatisa.”
Nyano ogik mayot bongi kere to wacho ni, “Amito imiyan wich Yohana jakibatisa i sen pama won me!”
Wach no omiyo kere kwoŋe okwe tektek, to konyalo thwono go, rupiri oido otyeko kwoŋirok i waŋ wendo pere jye.
Amomiyo kere ooro jago pere kelo wich Yohana Jakibatisa.
Jago okelo wich Yohana i sen to miyo nyako no, aka nyano omiyo yokimere.
Munyo jofuonjirok pa Yohana jowinjo gime, jobino to jokwanyo delkwoŋ Yohana to joyiko.
Jomoor jodwoko bongi Yesu to jowacho ri go gimoro jye ma jotimo gi ma jofuonjo.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Biye wakidhi win kamoro kakendiwan wiywomereye mathin,” rupiri ji kweth oido jobino aka joman jokadho moido jomono kir jomoor chiemo.
Gikenyo jodonjo i yee, to jokidho kama bu ji, kama di jonyalo bed'iye kendigin.
To ji mathoth joneno munyo jokadho, aka joŋeyo jo, ri ameno joredo korago gi ŋwech wok i tindi jye, aka jotelo kir tundo kenyo ri Yesu gini.
Munyo Yesu otundo loka, oneno kweth ji to mako wor gi jo, kwoŋbedo oido jochalo roombo ma bu jakwath, amomiyo ochako fuonjo jo gikipiny momore.
Munyo piny onwaŋo chiegin yutho, jofuonjirok pere jobino bonge to jowacho ri go ni, “Kole ka dyer thim, aka piny chiegin yutho;
sewila ji jowokidhi loka kodi i tindi ma chiegin jowonyiew chiemo achama.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Win ama wimiy jo chiemo achama.” Jopenjo go ni, “Imito wakidhi wanyiew mugat ma siringi gana pyero aŋwen wamiy jo jowochami?”
Gikenyo Yesu openjo jo ni, “Winitye gi mugat adi? Kidhi win winen.” Munyo jonwaŋo mugat jowacho ri go ni, “Mugat abich gi rech aryo.”
Gikenyo Yesu ooro ji bedo piny i lum, i kitipin.
Ji jobedo piny, i kitipin ma ji miya achielechiele kodi ma pyero abichabich.
Gikenyo Yesu okwanyo mugat abich gi rech aryo no, oŋiyo polo, to ketho Were walwa, aka oturo mugat to miyo jofuonjirok pere poko ji. Opok ji jye, rech aryo no bende.
Dhano jye ochiemo oyeŋ.
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jochoko ŋinjeŋinje mugat gi rech modoŋ poŋ aditin apar g'aryo.
Chwo ma jochiemo jobedo gana abich.
Ma piyo, Yesu ooro jofuonjirok pere donjo i yee jowoteli kadho yu loka Bethsaida, kareno go fuodi sewila kweth ji.
Munyo otyeko kisewila jofuonjirok pere, okidho wi tendere kwayo.
Munyo piny oyutho, yee onwaŋo nitye i dyer wakawaka, kareno Yesu ni kende kamothwo.

Go oneno jofuonjirok pere jofamba gi chiewo yee, rupiri koyo oido owok yu wiy jo dwoko jo chien. Munyo piny otundo keko, i dyer sawa abuŋwen kodi apar g'aryo, Yesu obino bongi jo munyo wotho wi pi. Onwaŋo go kadho kwoŋ jo,
to joneno go wotho wi pi. Joparo ni go yamo to jokoko,
rupiri munyo joneno go, lworo omako jo swa. Yesu oluwo gi jo mayot, ka wacho ni, “Wikiri wirembi, me an. Wikiri wilwori!”
Gikenyo go odonjo i yee bongi jo, to koyo kwe. Jofuonjirok jodhyer swa,
rupiri fuodi oido jokoniaŋ odocho kwoŋ giraura ma mugat; oido tek ri jo niaŋ gino.
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jokalo wakawaka to jotundo loka Genesaret, kuma jotwey'iye yee pajo kwoŋ loch.
Munyo jowok i yee, ji joŋeyo Yesu mayot.
Ji joringo, jothoko piny i adech no parom, to jokelo ri go jotwo ma jotiŋo i par, kama jowinjo ni go ni iye.

Aka kama Yesu okidh'iye jye, i adech moro, i tindi, kosa loka moro, ji jokelo ri go jotwo i katale, to jokwayo go ni woyeyi jotwo jowogeyi kada nyaka dhoki nanga pere won; aka joma jogeyo dhoki nanga pere jye jobedo maber.
Jofarisayo kodi jofuonji ma Chik megi ma jowok Yerusalem jochokere bongi Yesu,
aka joneno jofuonjirok pere megi jochiemo gi chingi gin ma di chilo, dwoŋ mere ni jokologo maber andha, aka chik pa Joyudaya kiyeyi gino.
(Ato Jofarisayo kodi Joyudaya joluwo kite pa kwarerejo machon, ma oido kichiem ma fuodi kologi paka chik mere wacho.
Ka jowok i katale jokichiem ma fuodi jokolwoko kor chingi jo gipi paka chik wacho. Odoko nitye kite man ma thoththoth ma jomako paka lwoko kikopere, degi, kodi atewe.)
Amomiyo Jofarisayo me kodi jofuonji ma Chik jopenjo go ni, “Raŋo ma jofuonjirok perin jokiluw kite pa kwarerewan machon, kabedo ma chiemo gi chingi gin ma di chilo?”
To go wacho ni, “Kere Isaya chango oluwo giradyeri kwoŋ wijorendirok i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni, ‘Ji me jomiyan dwoŋ gi dhoki gin kende, to chuny gin nitye bor kodan.
Jokilaman g'adyeri aka gima jofuonjo obedo nyaka kula ma ji wegi ama joketho.’
“Wibolo gichien or pa Were to wichwire kwoŋ kula paji ayino.”
Yesu omedere gi wacho ni, “Wiryek swa ri nwaŋo royo ma bolo gichien chik pa Were, ŋey witiy gi kula mewin wegi!
Kole Musa chango owodho chik ni, ‘Lwori benin gi yokin,’ gi man ni,

‘Ŋata luwo marach kwoŋ bamere kasa yokimere wonek woko.’ To win wifuonjo ni ka moro nitye gi gimoro ma go oido nyalo konyo gine bamere kosa yokimere, to wacho ni, ‘Me Korban,’ (dwoŋ mere ni gipa Were)
meno go onyo otyeko limo ka goŋirok ma kwero konyo bamere kosa yokimere.
Ameno wichayo wach pa Were gi kula ma wiwegi wifuonjo ji, aka winitye gi gikipiny man mathoth ma chale gi me ma wikethere timo.”
Yesu odoko olwoŋo ji bonge to wacho ri jo ni, “Chiki win ithi win wijojye aka winiaŋ gima akidho wacho.
Gima woko ma donjo i dhano ama kiloki go makoch, to gima wok i chunye ama loko go makoch.
[Ŋata ni gi ithe ma winjo wowinji. ”]
Munyo go oeye bothi kweth ji to donjo i ot, jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go dwoŋ agecha no.
Yesu owacho ni, “Kere wibende wikuya? Fuodi wikiniaŋ kwoŋ gime? Wikiniaŋi ni gima woko ma donjo i dhano ama kiloki go makoch,
rupiri kidonji i chunye, to donjo i iye ayino aka rumachien wok woko?” (Gi wach no, Yesu onyutho ni chiemo jye ber achama.)
Aka omedo wacho ni, “Kole gima wok i dhano ama loko go makoch,
rupiri i chuny dhano ama recho chakere iye: chot, kwo, nek, turo chik ma nywomirok,
woro, recho, twodo, kidakana, nyieko, kedho recho pa joman, pakirok kodi timo gimiŋo.
Recho me jye wok i dhano aka loko go makoch.”
Yesu oeye kenyo to kidho i adech ma chiegin gi tindi ma Tire kodi Sidon. Go odonjo i ot, aka komito ni nyatoro woŋeyi ni go nitye kenyo, to konyalo muŋere.
Gikenyo dhako moro, ma chuny mochido oido ni kwoŋ nyare, owinjo kwoŋ Yesu to bino bonge mayot, to podho katyende.
Dheno onwaŋo obedo Japath, anywola ma Fonisya ma wok Sirya. Go okwayo Yesu nike woryemi woko jwogi no kwoŋ nyare.
To Yesu dwoko ni, “Weyi kutho watel pidho nyithindho; kobedo gimotire kwanyo chiemo pa nyithindho gi bolo ri gwokere.”
Ana dheno, “Ey, Jadwoŋ, to kole kada gwokere ma tyendi meza bende jochamoye kada nyaka ŋinjeŋinje chiemo ma nyithindho jochamo odoŋ!”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ro luwo perin me, ere doki pecho, jwogi otyeko wok kwoŋ nyarin!”
Dhako no odok pecho to nwaŋo nyare i kanindo kareno jwogi adyeri otyeko wok kwoŋe kichutho.
Yesu owok i adech ma Tire to luwo royo ma Sidon, i adech ma Dekapoli, munyo kidho dho wakawaka ma Galileya.
Jomogo jokelo ri go obadha ma ithe otho aka lewe odole, to jokwayo Yesu ni wokethi chinge kwoŋe.
Yesu okwanyo ŋato otero gichien, aka oketho lwet chinge i ithe aryo jye, to ŋulo law i chinge to geyo gine lew ŋato.
Gikenyo Yesu oŋiyo malo i polo, to omo chunye tektek, aka owacho ri ŋato ni, “Efufata,” nyaka ni “Yawere.”
Piyo piyo no ithi ŋato oyawere, tyendi lewe ogonyere, to chako luwo maber.
Yesu ochiko jo teltel ni kiri jowowachi ri nyatoro. To paka omedo chiko jo, apaka bende jomedo nyayo wach no iye jye.
Ji jye ma jowinjo wach no jouro swa. Jowacho ni, “Go otimo gimoro jye maber; go miyo kir joma ithi gin otho winjo wach, kodi obadhin luwo.”
Rumachien ma ndelo manok, muma ji man madwoŋ odoko ochokere kanyachiel. Munyo chiemo orumo kwoŋ jo, Yesu olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere to wacho ri jo ni,
“Chunyan raman ri ji me, rupiri jotyeko bedo kodan ndelo adek gipi, aka onyo pama jongoye gi girachama.
Ka anowachi ri jo dok pecho ma akikutho amiyo jo chiemo, jobino loch i royo to jopodho, aka megi kwoŋ jo jowok kama bor tektek.”
Jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go ni, “Kune i thim ka ma dhano nyalo nwaŋ'iye chiemo ma yeŋo ji me jye?”
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Winitye gi mugat adi?” Jodwoko ni, “Mugat abiryo.”
Gikenyo go ooro muma ji bedo piny. Aka okwanyo mugat abiryo no, oketho Were walwa, oturo, to miyo jofuonjirok pere poko ji, to jofuonjirok jotimo ameno.
Jo onwaŋo jo ni gi nyaka ongwek mathindho thindho manok bende. Munyo Yesu otyeko ketho Were walwa, oturo rech no bende, aka owacho ri jofuonjirok poko ji.
Dhano jye ochiemo oyeŋ; aka jochoko ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ,
to poŋo aditin abiryo.
Piyo piyo no Yesu odonjo i yee gi jofuonjirok pere, to jokidho i adech ma Dalmanutha.
Jofarisayo mogo jobino bongi Yesu to jochako pyem gine, to jokwayo go ni wotimi giraura ma nyutho ni men pere wok bongi Were. Oido chiko go.
Yesu oywe ywe mabor aka owacho ni, “Raŋo ma luse ji me jokwayo ranyuth? Adyeri awacho ri win, ongoye ranyuth mibino miyo ji me.”
Gikenyo oweyo jo, ogik i yee, to chiewere loka man.
Jofuonjirok wiy jo owil gi kwanyo mugat mogo, aka oido jonitye gi mugat achiel kende i yee.
Yesu ofuonjo jo ni, “Gwokere win, aka kure win kwoŋ thow pa Jofarisayo kodi thow pa Herode.”
Jofuonjirok jochako luwo kendigin ni, “Go wacho ama rupiri wakitiŋo mugat mogo!”
Yesu oŋeyo gima onwaŋo jowacho, ri ameno openjo jo ni, “Raŋo ma wiluwo kendiwin kwoŋ mugat ma wikitiŋo? Fuodi wikiniaŋ kwoŋ gimotimere ndir cha; chuny win olokere manwaŋi?
Winitye gi waŋ win to raŋo wikinyal neno? Winitye gi ithi win to raŋo wikinyal winjo?
Kere i ndelo ma atur'iye mugat abich ri ji gana abich, aditin adi mopoŋ'iye ŋinjeŋinje ma wichoko?” Jodwoko ni, “Apar g'aryo.”
Yesu odoko openjo jo ni, “Aka munyo aturo mugat abiryo ri ji gana aŋwen, aditin adi mopoŋ'iye ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ ma wichoko?” Jodwoko ni, “Abiryo.”
To penjo jo ni, “Onyo fuodi wikiniaŋ kwoŋ gime?”
Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere jotundo Bethsaida kama jomogo jokel'iye ri go ŋata waŋe otho, to jokwayo Yesu ni wogey go.
Yesu omako chingi ŋato to tero go gi bor wok i adech no. Munyo otyeko ŋulo law i waŋ ŋato, oketho chinge kwoŋe to penjo go ni, “Inyalo neno gimoro?”
Ŋato otemo neno to wacho ni, “Ey, anyalo neno ji, to jochalo yen ma wotho.”
Aka Yesu odoko oketho chinge i waŋ ŋato. Ru me ŋato oyaro waŋe kendo waŋe obedo maber, to chako neno gimoro jye maber.
Yesu ooro go wodoki pecho gi wach me ni, “Ikiri i donji i adech ma Bethsaida.”
Rumachien Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere jomako royo ma kidho i adech ma Keserya mapa Filipo. Munyo jowotho, openjo jo ni, “Wachi ran win: Ji jowacho ni an aŋa?”
Jodwoko ni, “Jomegi jowacho ni in Yohana Jakibatisa, joman ni in Eliya, aka joman ni in achiel kwoŋ jotuchi wach Were.”
Aka go openjo jo ni, “To win, wiwacho ni an aŋa?” Petro odwoko ni, “In Kristo!”
Yesu ochiko jo ni, “Wikiri wiwachi ri nyatoro gima wiŋeyo kwoŋan.”

Gikenyo Yesu ochako fuonjo jofuonjirok pere ni Wuodi Dhano bino chandere tektek, kendo jotel pa ji kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik jobino kwero go. Ibino neko go to i ndelo maradek go bino chierino.
Otito ri jo gino maber swa. Gikenyo Petro otero go gichien to chako kipusa go.
To Yesu wire ŋiyo jofuonjirok pere, to bwoko Petro ni, “Eye bongan, Sitan. Paro perin obedo paro pa ji ma kiweno apa Were.”
Rumachien Yesu olwoŋo muma ji kodi jofuonjirok pere bonge, to wacho ri jo ni, “Ŋata mito bino bongan, won mito wokwerere kende kendo wotiŋi musalaba pere woluwan.
Rupiri ŋata mito botho kwo pere bino rwenyo woko, to ŋata rwenyo woko kwo pere kwoŋbedo an kodi ru Wach Maber, bino botho kwo pere.
Aŋo ma dhano olim ka oloki piny gipi apere, to rwenyo woko kwo pere won?
Aŋo ma dhano nyalo miyo ma wilo gine kwo pere?

Amomiyo ka dhano wiye okwoti kodan gi fuonji paran, i ndir ma ji kuy'iye Were, ndir ma ji odakan iye, Wuodi Dhano bende wiye bino kwot gi ŋato ka go dwoko i dwoŋ pa Bamere kanyachiel gi jomalaika maleŋ.”
Aka omedo wacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, nitye jomegi kwoŋ win ka ma jokotho ma fuodi jokoneno Ker pa Were ka bino gi men.”
Munyo ndelo auchiel okadho, Yesu okwanyo Petro gi Yakobo gi Yohana, to tero jo wi got mabor kakendigin. Gikenyo chal pere owire ruwaŋ jo,
aka nengin pere olokere matar, ma minyin ma ongoye ŋata nyalo lwoko nengin to lony matar amanago.
Gikenyo joneno Eliya gi Musa munyo joluwo gi Yesu.
Petro oluwo malo ka wacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, ber ri wan bedo ka, weyi wageti kayindin adek, achiel rin, achiel ri Musa, achiel ri Eliya.”
Ato oido go kuya girawacha, rupiri lworo oido omako jo tektek.
Pondeponde obino to umo jo gi tipo mere, aka derino owok i pondeponde ma wacho ni, “Me Wuodan ma amaro, winji win, go.”
Gikenyo jopoyo munyo joneno korin gi korin, to jokoneno nyatoro man kwanyo woko Yesu won kende gi jo.
Munyo joloro wi got, Yesu ochiko jo ni, “Wikiri wiwachi ri nyatoro gima wiwok neno, chuka Wuodi Dhano otyeki chierino kwoŋ jomotho.”
Jofuonjirok joliŋ gi wach no, to wegi jopenjere kendigin ni dwoŋ chierino kwoŋ jomotho no obedo aŋo.
Aka jopenjo Yesu ni, “Raŋo ma jofuonji ma Chik jowacho ni Eliya ama ripo telo bino?”
Yesu odwoko ni,

“Adyeri Eliya ama kutho ripo telo bino ŋey woyiki gimoro jye. To raŋo ma Ndiiko Maleŋ bende wacho ni Wuodi Dhano bino limo chandirok madwoŋ tikwero go? Awacho ri win, kole Eliya otyeko bino to ji jotimo ri go gima joyenyo jye, paka Ndiiko Maleŋ luwo kwoŋe.”
Munyo Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere adek no jogik bongi jofuonjirok pere man, jonwaŋo ji kweth jothoko jono kareno jofuonji ma Chik jopyemo kodi jo.
Tekin ji joneno Yesu, jobwok swa to joringo bothe to jomotho go.
Yesu openjo ni, “Oido wipyemo aŋo gi jo?”
Ŋatachiel i dyer ji odwoko ni, “Jafuonji, akelo wuodan bongin, rupiri chuny mochido ni kwoŋe aka kinyal kada luwo.
Hongo jye ka jwogi no omwonjo go, rwato go piny, aka bwoyo wok i dhoke, aka mwodo lake, to thwo matek. Akwayo jofuonjirok perin ni joworyemi woko jwogi no, to jokonyalo.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “A luse ji mongoye gi yeyo! Anobedi gi win kir keraŋo? Anodiy chunyan gi win kir keraŋo? Keli win go bongan ka.”
Jokelo jayach no bongi Yesu, to tekin jwogi mani kwoŋe neno Yesu, go opodho piny, to ŋindere i lowo kareno bwoyo wok i dhoke.
Yesu openjo bamere ni, “Ochowo hongo aŋo nyuka jwogi maki go?” Go odwoko ni,
“Wok i thino pere. Ndir madit otemo neko go munyo bolo go i mach kodi i pi. Maki gi wan wor, k'inyalo i kony wan!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “K'inyalo kendo ayin! Gimoro jye nyalere ri dhano mani gi yeyo.”
Piyo no baa jayach oluwo malo ni, “Anitye gi yeyo, to won kiromi, konyan!”
Munyo Yesu oneno muma ji rikere kwoŋe, owodho or ri chuny mochido ni, “Jwogi no ma ithe otho, mobadha, aryemin eye kwoŋ jayach me aka ikiri i giki kwoŋe kendo.”
Jwogi okoko malo, omiyo jayach no otho fum, to eye kwoŋe. Jayach no ochalo p'otho, momiyo dhano jye owacho ni, “Otyeko tho.”
To Yesu omako chinge to tiŋo go malo, to won tekere chungo.
Munyo Yesu otyeko donjo i ot, jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go nyaliŋliŋ ni, “Raŋo ma wakinyalo ryemo woko jwogi no?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kiti jwogi me ryemo mere tek ka ongoye kwayo gi riyo.”
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere munyo jowok kenyo, joluwo Galileya. Go komito ji jowoŋeyi kama go ni iye,
rupiri oido go fuodi fuonjo jofuonjirok pere, ka wacho ri jo ama: “Ibino mako Wuodi Dhano tiketho i chingi joma jobino neko go; to chieŋ maradek go bino chierino.”
To jokoniaŋ dwoŋ wach no, to jolworo penjo go.
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jobino Kapernaum, aka munyo jo ni ot, openjo jo ni, “Onwaŋo wipyemo aŋo i royo?”
Jokodwoko go, kwoŋbedo oido nyaka jowok pyem wegi kendigin ni ŋa kwoŋ jo malayo wadi gi dwoŋ.
Yesu obedo piny, olwoŋo japar ga'ryo no to wacho ri jo ni, “Ŋata mito bedo marapena, ripo bedo machowe kwoŋ ji jye, kendo jatich ri wadi jye.”
Gikenyo go okwanyo nyathi moro, to wacho ri go chungo i dyer jo, to ketho chinge umo gine go, to wacho ri jo ni,
“Dhano jye ma jolo nyaka nyathi me i nyingan, meno jolan; aka ŋata jolan meno kijolan kendan, to jolo kir ŋata ooran bende.”
Gikenyo Yohana owacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, wanwaŋo ŋat moro ryemo woko jwogi i nyingin; to paka go kobedo achiel kwoŋ wan, wachiero go timo ameno.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wichieri go; ongoye ŋata timo giraura i nyingan ma nyalo luwo kwoŋan marach.
Ŋata kimon gi wan, meno tiyere gi wan.
Adyeri awacho ri win, nyatoro jye momiyi win agwata pi amadha kwoŋbedo wi ji pa Kristo, go kibino keŋ kemba pere.
“Moro jye momiyi nyithindho me timo recho, d'ober ka otwey kidi madwoŋ i ŋute tibolo go i pendi wakawaka.
Aka ka chingin achiel rwakin i gimarach, ŋondi woko; kole ber rin donjo i kwo makirum gi chingin achiel loyo kidho gi chingin aryo jye i mach makitho,
[kuma kudin ma iye kitho, aka mach mere kitho.]
Aka ka tyendin achiel rwakin i gimarach, ŋondi woko; kole ber rin donjo i kwo makirum, miŋol loyo bolin i mach makitho gi tyendin aryo jye,
[kuma kudin ma iye kitho, aka mach mere kitho.]
Aka ka waŋin achiel rwakin i gimarach, goli woko; kole ber rin donjo i Ker pa Were gi waŋin achiel, loyo bedo gi waŋin aryo jye tibolin i mach makitho,
kuma kudin ma iye kitho, aka mach mere kitho.
“Kole dhano jye ibino loko maber pa gima othol i mach gi chumbi.
Kado chumbi ber, to ka olokere maboth, winyalo nedi dwoko ri go mito mere? Bedi win pa chumbi mamit i kite mewin, aka nyaka winobedi gi syem i dyer win.”
Yesu oeye kenyo to kidho i adech ma Yudeya kodi loka man ma Jwom Yordan. Kweth ji jobino bonge to go fuonjo jo, paka ndir jye oido omaro timo.
Jofarisayo mogo jobino bongi Yesu to jopenjo go ma temo go ni, “Chik yeyo dhano ryemo chiege?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Musa chango ooro win timo nedi?”
Jowacho ni, “Musa oyeyo jachwo ndiko balwa maryemo chiege ka pokere gine.”
To Yesu wacho ri jo ni, “Musa ondiko ri win chik no, rupiri chuny win tek.
To wok i chakirok pa chwech, ‘Were ochweyo jachwo gi dhako.’
‘Amomiyo jachwo bino weyo bamere gi min, to chwire kwoŋ chiege,
to jaryo jolokere del achiel.’ Ri ameno jo onyo kidel aryo to del achiel.
Amomiyo gima Were otyeko riwo kanyachiel, wongoye nyatoro ma wopoki.”
Munyo jogik i ot, jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go kendo dwoŋ wach no.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Ŋata pokere gi chiege to nywomo dhako man, meno timo chot,
aka ameno bende, dhako ma pokere gi chwore to nywomere gi jachwo man, meno timo chot.”
Ji mogo jokelo nyithindho bongi Yesu ni wogeyi jo, to jofuonjirok pere joay kwoŋ jo.
Munyo Yesu oneno ameno, nge omako go gi jofuonjirok pere, to wacho ri jo ni, “Weyi nyithindho jowobin bongan; wikiri wichieri jo, kole Ker pa Were obedo apa joma pameno.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ŋata kojolo Ker pa Were paka nyathi mathin, kibino donj'iye.”
Gikenyo Yesu otwodo nyithindho gi chinge, oketho chinge kwoŋ jo, to miyo jo silwany.
Munyo Yesu ochako woth pere kendo, jal moro obino gi ŋwech to ryewere piny ruwaŋe to penjo go ni, “Jafuonji maber, atim aŋo ŋey alim kwo makirum?”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Raŋo ilwoŋan ni maber? Ongoye ŋataber kwanyo woko Were kende.
Iŋeyo Or pa Were ma wacho ni, ‘Ikiri ineki, ikiri itim chot; ikiri ikwali; ikiri isegeya dhano nono; ikiri iwondi ji; ikiri icham gimahembi; lwori benin gi yokin.’ ”
Jalo odwoko ni, “Jafuonji, atyeko mako or no jye wok i thino paran.”
Gikenyo Yesu oŋiyo go gi mar to wacho ri go ni, “Gimoro achiel ama fuodi odoŋ rin timo: kidhi itana woko gima ini gine jye, pesa mere ipoki jochandi, aka ibino limo ŋaŋo i polo; aka ŋey ibin iluwan.”
Wach me okweyo kwoŋ jalo swa, to miyo go gut, rupiri go oido oŋaŋ tektek.
Yesu obolo waŋe oŋiyo korin gi korin, to wacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Bino bedo matek adyeri ri jaŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were!”
Jofuonjirok jodhyer swa kwoŋ wach me, to Yesu medo wacho ri jo ni, “Nyithindho paran, tek swa ri joma geno ŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were!
Yot ri ŋamira donjo i yore piso loyo ri jaŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were!”
Jofuonjirok jomedo dhyer, to wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Ka ameno onyo ŋa won ma nyalo both?”
Yesu oŋiyo jo to wacho ni, “Ri dhano gime kinyalere, to ki ri Were, rupiri Were nyalo gimoro jye.”
Petro to ero wacho ni, “Aka wan to? Kole watyeko weyo gimoro jye to waluwin.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, ongoye ŋata oweyi ot, wutimin, nyimin, yokimere, bamere, nyithindho, kosa lowo kwoŋbedo an kodi Wach Maber,
ma kibino limo gikipiny di miya achiel: udi, wutimin, nyimin, bachere mere, mege, nyithindho kodi lowo, kodi chandirok i ndir ma pama, to limo kwo makirum rumachien.
Aka ji madit ma pama jobedo marapena ama jobino bedo machowe; aka joma oido machowe ama jobino bedo marapena.”

Yesu kodi joma oido ni gi go onwaŋo jo ni royo jochomo yu Yerusalem kareno go otelo jo. Jofuonjirok pere jouro wach pere; aka ji moido joluwo jo bende lworo omako jo. Yesu odoko otero jofuonjirok apar g'aryo gichien to luwo kwoŋ gima onwaŋo kidho timirok kwoŋe.
