Owacho ri jo ni, “Winji win, onyo wakidho Yerusalem kuma ibino keth'iye Wuodi Dhano i chingi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik. Jobino thumo ri go banja ma tho, to joketho go i chingi Jopath.
Jono jobino nyiero go, ŋulo kwoŋe law, chwado go, gi neko go. To i ndelo maradek, go bino chierino.”
Yakobo gi Yohana, woti Zebedayo, jobino bongi Yesu to jowacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, nitye gima wayenyo itim ri wan.”
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Aŋo ma wiyenyo atim ri win?”
Jodwoko ni, “Yeyi wabedi ŋatachiel yu chingin marachuch, ŋat man yu racham, i dwoŋ perin.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wikuya gima wikwayo. Winyalo madho agwata ma anomadhi, gi limo batisimo ma anolim?”
Jodwoko ni, “Wanyalo.” Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Agwata ma anomadhi wibende wibino madho, odoko batisimo ma anolim wibende wibino limo,
to kabedo ma yu chingan marachuch kosa maracham kobedo tich paran poko. Me kabedo pa joma otyek yiko ri jo.”
Munyo jomoor wadi gin japar jowinjo wach no, nge omako jo gi Yakobo kodi Yohana,
omiyo Yesu olwoŋo jo bonge to wacho ri jo ni, “Wiŋeyo ni jodhum ma piny jodhumo ji gi maker; aka jotel pajo jodhumo gi mbaka.
To me k'apaka ripo bedo gi win. Ka nyatoro kwoŋ win mito bedo jadwoŋ, go ripo bedo jatich ri wadi;
aka ŋata mito bedo jatel i dyer win, ripo bedo ŋecha pa wadi jye.
Kole kada Wuodi Dhano bende kobino ni wotiy ri go; to obino ni wotiyi ri ji ayin kodi miyo kwo pere paka gichul ma gonyo ji mathoth.”
Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jotundo Yeriko. Aka munyo joay kenyo, gi kweth ji, jakwach ma waŋe otho, milwoŋo ni Batimayo, ma dwoŋ mere ni wuodi pa Timayo onwaŋo obedo piny i thengi royo.
Tekin Batimayo winjo ni manago Yesu Janazareth ama kadho, to chako koko ka wacho ni, “Yesu, Wuodi pa Daudi, timi reye wor!”
Ji mathoth jobwoko go aka jooro go liŋ, to go omedo ameda koko malo ayino ni, “Wuodi pa Daudi, timi reye wor!”
Yesu ochungo to wacho ni, “Lwoŋi win go ka.” To jolwoŋo jal ma waŋe otho no, ka jowacho ri go ni, “Ikiri irembi, ayi malo, kole go dicha lwoŋin.”
Gikenyo go obolo nanga pere gichien, opor malo, to kidho bongi Yesu.
Yesu openjo go ni, “Imito atim rin aŋo?” Jal ma waŋe otho no owacho ni, “Jafuonji, yawi ran waŋan.”
To Yesu wacho ri go ni, “Kadhi, yeyo perin obothin.” Piyo piyo no, waŋe oyawere, to bende luwo Yesu.
Munyo joriko Yerusalem, i tindi ma Bethfage kodi Bethaniya, chiegin gi got Olivet, Yesu ooro jofuonjirok pere aryo kadho yu wiye,
gi wach me ni, “Kidhi win loka ma yu wiy win, aka tekin widonj'iye wibino nwaŋo nyathi punda motwey, ma fuodi dhano kobedo i wiye; gonyi to wikelo ka.
Ka moro openji win ni, ‘Witimo aŋo?’ Wachi win ni, ‘Ruoth ama yenyo punda me aka bino dwoko go ka mayot.’ ”
Jokidho to jonwaŋo nyathi punda moro otwey dhoot i thengi royo, to jogonyo.
To jomogo monwaŋo jochungo kenyo jopenjo jo ni, “Witimo aŋo no? Raŋo ma wigonyo nyathi punda no?”
Jodwoko paka Yesu owacho ri jo, to jono joweyo jo, to jokadho gi nyathi punda no.
Jokelo nyathi punda no ri Yesu, to jopedho nengin i dyeŋeye, to Yesu bedo i wiye.
Ji mathoth jopedho nengin i royo, aka joman jopedho jangi yen ma joturo i dudi.
Aka joma jotelo yu wiye kodi joma joluwo go yu chien jowero ni, “Ozana! Jasilwany a ŋata bino i nyingi Ruoth!
Silwany wobedi ri Ker mabino mapa bawan Daudi! Ozana malo i polo!”
Yesu otundo Yerusalem, to donjo i Ot pa Were; aka munyo otyeko ŋiyo korin gi korin oneno gimoro jye, owok to kadho Bethaniya gi jofuonjirok apar g'aryo, paka piny oido kidho yutho.
Yawere mere munyo jo ni royo jodwoko wok Bethaniya, Yesu onwaŋo winjo kech.

Munyo go oneno giborbor kiti makuyu moro michamo, ma boke otweyere kwoŋe, okidho neno ni kono nyalo nwaŋo kwoŋe nyandere, to munyo otundo dho tyende, konwaŋo gimoro kwanyo woko bokee; rupiri meno oido ki ndir ma nyandere nyak'iye.
Yesu owacho ri makuyu no ni, “Ongoye moro modoko ocham nyandere kwoŋin.” To jofuonjirok pere jowinjo gima go owacho no.
Munyo jotundo Yerusalem, Yesu odonjo i Ot pa Were, to chako ryemo woko joma nyiewere kodi jomiten i Ot pa Were. Oryewo mezin pa jowili pesa, kodi kombere pa joma onwaŋo jotana akurin;
aka koyeyo kada moro wotho gi gimoro i Ot pa Were.
Ofuonjo jo ka wacho ni, “Kondik i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni Ot paran ibino lwoŋo ni Ot ma kwayo mapa nonin jye? Ama win wiloko kapondo pa jokwo ayino!”
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik jowinjo gime to jochako rango royo ma neko Yesu. To jolworo go, rupiri muma ji gi bee oido odhyer kwoŋ fuonji pere.
Munyo piny oyutho Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere joeye i tindi no.
Yawere mere odikini, munyo jowotho i royo, jonwaŋo makuyu no othwo wok malo kir i tyende.
Petro opoyo gima nyoro otimere to wacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, panen! Makuyu ma nyoro ikwoŋo cha otyeko thwo!”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Bedi win gi yeyo i Were. Adyeri awacho ri win,
ŋata owachi ri got me ni, ‘Mukere woko, ikidhi imunyere i wakawaka,’ aka ongoye gi kiganagana i chunye, to yeyo ni gima go owacho bino timere, ibino timo ri go gino.
Amomiyo awacho ri win, ka wikwayo gimoro, yeyi win ni wityeko limo aka ibino miyo win gimoro jye ma wikwayo.
Aka ka wichungo wikwayo, chwaki win recho jye ma nyatoro otimo ri win, aka nyaka Baa win mani polo bende bino chwako recho mewin.
[Ka wikichwaki jowoti win, kada Baa win mani polo bende kibino chwako recho mewin.”]
Odoko jogik Yerusalem, aka munyo Yesu oido wotho i Ot pa Were to jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik kanyachiel kodi jotel pa ji jobino bonge to jopenjo go ni,
“Inwaŋo men kune ma timo gikipiny me? Kosa ŋa momiyin men ma timo gikipiny me?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Alepenjo win gimoro achiel kende; dwokan win aka abino wacho ri win kama anwaŋ'iye men ma timo gikipiny me.
Men pa Yohana ma miyo ji batisimo owok kune: bongi Were kosa bongi ji? Dwokan win.”
Wegi jochako pyem kendigin ni, “Wadwoki nedi? Ka wadwoko ni, ‘Owok i polo,’ go bino wacho ni, ‘To raŋo ma wikwero yeyo go?’
Kosa di wadwoki ni, ‘Owok bongi dhano?’ ” (Ato onwaŋo jolworo ji, rupiri dhano jye onwaŋo otero Yohana paka jatuchi wach Were.)
Gikenyo jodwoko Yesu ni, “Wakuya.” To Yesu wacho ri jo ni, “Abende akowachi ri win kama men ma atimo gine gime wok'iye.”

Gikenyo Yesu ochako luwo ri jo g'agechin ni: “Dhano moro opidho yen vini i ndelo, othoko ndelo no gi chiel, okunyo bur ma biyo vini to gero ot achurchur ma kur. Go oketho ndelo vini i chingi jofur mogo to kadho wiloka.
Munyo ndir otundo ma fuono vini, go ooro jago pere bongi jofur pere no ni jowolimi rigo gimonyak moro wok i vini.
Jofur no jomako jago no jogoyo, to joryemo go ma bu gimoro.
Gikenyo won ndelo ooro jago man; ma bende jofur jogoyo lero to jofuta go swa.
Won ndelo ooro jago man, to joneko meno; jotimo jegin man mathoth ameno, munyo jogoyo jomegi aka joneko joman.
Ŋata onwaŋo odoŋ aora bongi jofur oido obedo wuode won ma migos. Amomiyo rumachien ooro wuode won gipi bongi jofur ka wacho ni, ‘Adyer jobino woro wuodan.’
To jofur no jowacho wegi kendigin ni, ‘Me won a musika pa won ndelo, weyi waneki go aka waŋati walunji lim pere!’
Gikenyo jomako go to joneko, to jobolo delkwoŋe woko ma ndelo.”
Yesu openjo ni, “Onyo won ndelo no otimi aŋo? Kole go bino neko woko jofur marecho no to ketho ndelo i chingi jofur man.
Fuodi wikisoma i ndiko ma wacho ni, ‘Kole tele ma jogeto jochayo ni bu kony ama olokere tele ma thyelo kindi ot;
me obedo tich pa Ruoth aka neno maber swa ri wan!’ ”
Jotel pa Joyudaya jotemo mako Yesu, rupiri joŋeyo ni go oido obolo agecha me kwoŋ jo. To jolworo muma ji, amomiyo joweyo go to jokadho.
Jooro Jofarisayo mogo kodi jopa Herode bongi Yesu chiiko go i luwo pere.

Jobino bonge to jowacho ni, “Jafuonji, waŋeyo ni ibedo ŋatotire, aka ikilwori nyatoro; ikidew kwoŋ dwoŋ pa nyatoro, to ifuonjo giradyeri kwoŋ gima Were yenyo ri dhano ayino. Ere wachi ri wan; yeyere i Chik mawan goyo misolo ri Kaisar, kosa be?”
Yesu oneno apondi pajo to dwoko ni, “Raŋo ma witemo chiiko an? Keli win pesa moro anen.”
Jokelo ri go pesa mothedhi achiel to penjo jo ni, “Me chal pa ŋa kodi nyingi ŋa mani kwoŋe me?” Jodwoko go ni, “Apa Kaisar.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ni, “amomiyo miyi win Kaisar gipa Kaisar, aka wimiy Were bende gipa Were.” Aka jojye jouro go.
Josadukayo mogo ma jowacho ni chierino pa jomotho ongoye jobino bongi Yesu.
Jowacho ni, “Jafuonji, Musa chango ondiko ri wan chik me ni, ‘Ka dhano otho oweyo chiege, to kolimo nyithindho, omin ŋato ripo lunjo chi tho no, to limo nyithindho ri jatho.’
Ndelo moro obedo wutimere abiryo. Kayo pajo onywomo, to tho ma kolimo nyithindho.
Mararyo olunjo dheno to bende tho to weyo go ma bu nyathi. Maradek bende ameno,
jomodong bende ameno. Wutimere abiryo jye jobedo gi dhako no aka jotho ma jokolimo nyithindho. Rumachien to dhako no bende tho.
Onyo chieŋ ka jomotho jye jochierino, dhako no obedi apaŋa? Ato chwo abiryo no jye jobedo gi dhako no!”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Me k'agima miyo wikomi, ma wikuya Ndiiko Maleŋ kosa men pa Were?
Kole ka jomotho jochierino jobino chale gi jomalaika mani polo, aka chwo gi mon jokibino nywomere.

Aka ma mako kwoŋ chierino pa jomotho, fuodi wikisoma i kitawo pa Musa, bol ma luwo kwoŋ kasugu mawaŋ? Ondik kenyo paka Were owacho ri Musa ni, ‘Abedo Were pa Ibrayimu, Were pa Isaka, kodi Were pa Yakobo.’
Dwoŋ mere ni go obedo Were pa jomakwo, ma kiweno apa jomotho. Wipodho swa!”
Jafuonji ma Chik moro onwaŋo ni kenyo winjo luwo no. Go oneno ni Yesu oido dwoko Josadukayo maber amomiyo obino bonge gi penji me ni, “Or mene ma loyo Or jye gi dwoŋ?”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Me a marapena: ‘Joisrael winji win! Ruoth Were mawan a Were;
aka iripo maro Ruoth Were perin g'adundo perin jye, gi chunyin jye, gi paro perin jye, gi men perin jye.’
Mararyo ma luwo meno gi dwoŋ a me: ‘Mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.’ Ongoye Or man ma loyo aryo me.”
Jandiki Chik owacho ri Yesu ni, “Itire, Jafuonji; Itire i wacho ni Ruoth a Were kende, aka ongoye Were man kwanyo woko go;
aka dhano ripo maro go gi adundo pere jye, gi paro pere jye, gi men pere jye, gi maro nyawote paka won omarere. Winjo Or aryo me loyo tero ri Were rachow awaŋa ma lee kodi giman jye.”
Yesu oneno ni dwok pere nyutho ryeko to wacho ri go ni, “Onyo ikibor gi Ker pa Were.” Rumachien moro kodoko otemo penjo Yesu wach moro jye.
Munyo Yesu fuonjo i Ot pa Were openjo ni, “Jofuonji ma Chik jonyalo nedi wacho ni Kristo obedo wuodi pa Daudi?
Kole munyo Chuny Maleŋ oloro ri Daudi won owacho ni, ‘Ruoth owacho ri Ruoth paran: Bedi yu chingan marachuch, chuka anoloki jokwor perin paka kor kasik ma nyono gi tyendin.’
Daudi won lwoŋo go ni Ruoth; to Kristo nyalo nedi bedo wuode?” Kweth ji jowinjo Yesu gi kisangala.
Aka munyo go fuonjo ji owacho ni, “Kure win kwoŋ jofuonji ma Chik, ma jomaro nyumo gi nengin mabeyo nike womothi jo gi dwoŋ i katale;
joyero kombere mabeyo loyo i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi kabedo pa wendo awora i kalima,
jomayo mon tho udi pajo aka joyumere gi kwayo maboyo. Girachula pajo bino racho tektek!”
Yesu obedo piny chiegin gi sanduku ma kano pesa, aka oneno paka ji mathoth jobol'iye pesa pajo. Jomoŋaŋ mathoth jobolo pesa kweth;
gikenyo chi tho moro ma jachandi bende obino to bol'iye jegejege pesa nyaka aryo won mathindho thindho ma rom gi dome achiel.
Gikenyo Yesu olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere bonge to wacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, chi tho ma jachandi me obolo i sanduku mich mathoth loyo apa joman jye.
Rupiri dhano jye omiyo pesa wok kwoŋ lim monwaŋo go ni gine, to theno gi chandi pere omiyo gimoro jye monwaŋo d'okwo gine.”
Munyo Yesu owok i Ot pa Were, achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok pere owacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, neni paka telin no kodi udi mere beyo!”
To Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ineno udi mojewere me? Ongoye ka tele kada achiel mibino weyo wi nyawote, ma kokedhi woko.”
Aka munyo Yesu obedo piny wi got Olivet, motitere gi Ot pa Were, Petro, Yohana kodi Andereya jopenjo go nyaliŋliŋ ni,
“Wachi ri wan ndir ma gime letimer'iye; odoko ranyuth aŋo ma bino bedo ka gime chiegin timirok?”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Gwokere win moro wokiri wowondi win.
Ji mathoth jolebino i nyingan ka jowacho ni, ‘An a go,’ to jowondo ji mathoth.
Ka wiwinjo ni lweny ogaga kamoro kodi luwirok kwoŋ lweny, lworo wokiri womaki win, gime ripo timirok, to giki piny won kareno fuodi kotundo.
Nono bino lwenyo gi nono, ker achiel bino lwenyo gi ker man. Yengirok pa piny bino bedo kamomore, kech bino bedo. Me obedo nyaka chakirok pa litho ma chale gi ma nywol.
“Kure win, rupiri jobino tero win i kapido; ibino goyo win i kalamo pa Joyudaya aka wibino chungo ruwaŋ ruodhe kodi kerin ru an, aka wititi ri jo Wach Maber,
rupiri kutho ripere wofuonji nonin jye Wach Maber.
To ka jotero win i kapido wikiri wirembi gima winowachi; be, wachi win gimobin i dhok win i hongo no rupiri wiŋati wikoluwi, to Chuny Maleŋ ama bino luwo.
Dhano bino kisegeya omin ni woneki, baa nyathi bino kisegeya nyathi pere; nyithindho jobino wire ri jonywol pajo to jomiyo ineko jo.
Aka ji jye jobino mon kodi win kwoŋbedo nyingan, to ŋata ochir chandirok me kir i gike ama bino both.
“Wibino neno munyo okethi Giramyen Madwoŋ ma kelo lworo kama di kiripi woketh'iye (ŋata soma wach me woniaŋi dwoŋ mere). Gikenyo joma nitye i Yudeya joworingi wi gote.
Ŋata nitye wi ot wokiri wolori piny kwanyo gimoro i ot.
Ŋata nitye i ndelo wokiri wogiki pecho kwanyo ruk pere man.
Kidamba madwoŋ bino bedo ri mon ma joyach kodi megi nyithindho ma fuodi nyothindho dhotho jo, i ndir no.
Kwayi win Were ni gino wokiri wotimere i ndir ma chwir munyo pe oŋicho piny.
Kole i ndelo no chandirok madwoŋ bino bedo ma fuodi yado kobedo ye wok i chakirok pa piny, aka odoko kobedi.
Mabedi Were kotyeko kimojaye woko ndelo no; ongoye ŋata d'oboth; to ri bero pa ji pere moyer, go omojaye ndelo no.
Gikenyo, ka moro owachi ri win ni, ‘Panen Kristo ee ni ka,’ kosa ‘Panen go ni kacha,’ wikiri wiyeyi.
Kole jotwodo ma jolwoŋere ni Kristo kosa jotuchi wach Were jobino konjere. Aka jobino timo ranyuth kodi giraura ma wondo jomoyer pa Were bedi nyalere.
Amomiyo wiripo kurok rupiri atyeko wacho ri win gimoro jye chon ma fuodi kotimere.
“Ka ndelo ma chandirok no otyeko rumo, waŋchieŋ bino lokere machol, aka dwe kibino lyel.
Michalin jobino wok malo to jooy piny, aka men ma polo malo bino yengere tektek.
Gikenyo Wuodi Dhano bino nenere munyo bino i pondeponde gi men moasere kanyachiel gi dwoŋ.
Go bino dhiro jomalaika choko jomoyer pa Were wok i thenge aŋwen ma koyo, wok i thengi piny jye tundo i thengi polo jye.
“Fuonjere win kwoŋ makuyu. Ka jange olokere mayom, aka boke mere loth, wiŋeyo ni ndir ma chieŋ chiegin tundo.
Ameno bende ka wineno gikipiny me timere, wiŋeyi ni go ochore chiegin, aka ni dho waŋkach.
Adyeri awacho ri win, luse ji ma pama jokorum ma fuodi gikipiny me kotimere.
Polo gi piny bino rumo to wach paran kibino rumo kada mathi.
“To ongoye ŋata oŋeyo ndelo kosa sawa ma gime bino timer'iye, kada jomalaika ma polo kosa Wuodi Were, to Baba kende amoŋeyo.
Kure win, bedi win milengela wikway, rupiri wikuya kare ma go obin'iye.
Kole chale pa dhano mokidho wiloka to weyo jotich pere
kuro ri go pecho, jatich jye gi muga pere, to wacho ri jawaŋkach kuro. Kure win rupiri wikuya hongo ma won pecho odwok'iye, nyalo bedo othyeno, kosa dyer wor, kosa keko, kosa munyo chieŋ gulo.
Ka odwoki abwap, wokiri wonwaŋi winindo.
Amomiyo awacho ri win gi joman jye ni, ‘Bedi win milengela.’ ”
Onwaŋo odoŋ ndelo aryo to kalima ma Kadho kodi ma mugat ma bu thow wotundi. Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik jorango royo ma mako Yesu nyaliŋliŋ jowoneki go.
Jowacho ni, “Gime wokiri wobedi i ndelo ma kalima, rupiri woy pa ji bino asirok.”
Munyo Yesu onwaŋo nitye Bethaniya i ot pa Simon jadhowo, munyo go chiemo, dhako moro odonjo gi chupa mo udo maŋwe kur, ma welo mere dwoŋ swa. Oyawo dhoki chupa no to olo mo i wiy Yesu.
Ji megi monwaŋo jo ni kenyo jomako nge to jowacho wegi kendigin ni, “Onyiek mo maŋwe kur me raŋo?
Bedi tana d'onyalo kelo pesa kada ma kalo jegejege ma feza miya adek, timiyo jochandi!” Aka jowacho nyingi dheno swa.
Yesu owacho ni, “Weyi win go! Wikwinyo go raŋo? Go otyeko timo tich maber swa kwoŋan?
Kole winitye gi jochandi noknok, aka winyalo konyo jo hongo jye. To an akobedi gi win ndelo jye.
Go otimo gimaber ma go nyalo; ato go onyo wiro delkwoŋ kichutho ri kalyel.
Aka adyeri awacho ri win, kamoro jye ma ofuonj'iye Wach Maber i piny gipi, gima dheno otimo ibino tucho ma poyo go.”
Gikenyo Yuda Iskaryot, achiel kwoŋ japar g'aryo, oay to kidho bongi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar chamo sereko ri Yesu.
Jotel no josangala swa munyo jowinjo gimokelo go, to jochiko miyo go pesa. Gikenyo Yuda ochako rango hongo maber ma miyo jo Yesu.
I ndelo marapena ma Kalima ma mugat ma bu thow, ndelo minek'iye nyithindhi roombo ma wote ma kalima ma Kadho, jofuonjirok pa Yesu jopenjo go ni, “Imito wayiki rin chiemo ma Kadho gi kune?”
Yesu ooro jaryo kwoŋ jo gi wach me: “Kidhi win i tindi, aka nyatoro motiŋo dakipi bino romo gi win. Luwi win go
kir i ot ma go odonj'iye; to wiwacho ri won ot no ni, ‘Jafuonji penjo ni nikune kisika pa wendo ma anocham'iye chiemo ma kalima ma Kadho gi jofuonjirok paran?’
Go bino nyutho win kisika ma malo, moyik maber, kama winoyik'iye gimoro jye mawan.”
Jofuonjirok no joay, jokidho i tindi, to jonwaŋo gimoro jye paka Yesu owacho ri jo; to joyiko chiemo ma kalima ma Kadho kenyo.
Munyo piny otundo othyeno, Yesu okidho kenyo gi japar g'aryo.
Munyo jonitye dhower, Yesu owacho ni, “Awacho ri win, ŋatachiel kwoŋ win kidho chamo ran sereko; aka manago ŋata chiemo kodan.”
Jofuonjirok jobwok swa to jochako penjo go, ŋata achielechiele ni, “Iwachani?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Manago achiel kwoŋ win, ma pilo kodan achiero achiel.
Wuodi Dhano bino tho paka Ndiiko Maleŋ wacho, to moro jye mochami sereko ri Wuodi Dhano bino neno chandirok! D'ober ri ŋato bedi chango wey ma konywol go!”
Aka munyo jochiemo, Yesu okwanyo mugat, omiyo silwany, to turo, to miyo jofuonjirok pere. Owacho ni,
“Chami win, me delkwoŋ.” To kwanyo kikopo, aka munyo otyeko fuoyo Were, omiyo jo, to jojye jomadho. Owacho ri jo ni,
“Me remo paran ma chikirok manyien, ma ibino oyo ri ji mathoth.
Awacho ri win, akodoko amadhi vini me nyuka ndelo ma anomadh'iye vini manyien i Ker pa Were.”
Munyo jotyeko wero wer ma pako Were, jokidho wi got Olivet.
Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Wijojye wibino kedhere gi ŋwech wiweyan, rupiri ondik ni, ‘Abino neko jakwath to roombo kedhere.’
To ka atyeko chierino, abino telo kidho ri win Galileya.”
Petro odwoko ni, “Akibino weyin, kada jowotan jye joweyin.”
Yesu owacho ri Petro ni, “Adyeri awacho rin, ka fuodi wuodi gweno kokoko diryo wor ma konon, ibino kwedere kwongan didek.”
Petro omedo wacho gi men ni, “Akibino kwedere kwongin, kada bedi ni atho kodin.” To jofuonjirok jye bende jowacho ameno.
Yesu gi jofuonjirok jotundo kuma ilwoŋo ni Gethsemane, to Yesu wacho ri jo ni, “Bedi win ka wikway.”
Gikenyo okwanyo Petro gi Yakobo, gi Yohana, to rembo madwoŋ gi geregere chako poŋ i chunye,
to wacho ri jo ni, “Rembo opoŋ i chunyan swa ma mito nekan. Bedi win ka wikway.”
Gikenyo omedere mathin yu malo, oryewere piny aka okwayo ni ka nyalere go wokiri wodonji i hongo ma chandirok.
Owacho ni, “Baba, inyalo gimoro jye, kwanyi woko agwata gima kech me kwoŋan. To ki paka amito, kwanyo woko paka iŋati imito.”
Gikenyo go ogik to nwaŋo jofuonjirok adek no jonindo,
to wacho ri Petro ni, “Simon, inindo? Ikinyal bedo waŋin kada nyaka sawa achiel won?” Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Bedi win waŋ win aka wikway ŋey wikodonji i ratem. Chuny win yenyo to del nyap.”
Go odoko ogik kwayo ka wacho wach achiel no won.
Gikenyo odoko odwoko bongi jofuonjirok to nwaŋo jonindo; jokonyalo bedo waŋ gin. To jokoŋeyo gima di jowacho ri go.
Munyo odwoko maradek owacho ri jo ni, “Fuodi winindo, wiywomere? Meno oromo; hongo otundo; Wuodi Dhano onyo pama ikidho ketho i chingi jomarecho.
Ayi win wakadhi; neni, kole ŋata ochamo ran sereko ee otyeko tundo.”

Munyo fuodi Yesu luwo, Yuda, achiel kwoŋ japar g'aryo otundo. Kweth ji ma jotiŋo abor gi ludhe onwaŋo jo ni gi go kareno jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik kodi jotel pa ji ama jooro jo.
Jachami ri Yesu sereko oido otyeko miyo jo ranyuth ni, “Ŋata anochwiy lembe meno a ŋata wirango. Maki wi go matek witer go ma wikaro dyere.”
Tekin Yuda tundo bongi Yesu to wacho ni, “Jafuonji,” to chwiyo lembe.
Gikenyo jomako Yesu to jokada go matek.
To ŋatachiel kwoŋ jomochungo kenyo yuyo abor pere to toŋo ŋecha pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar to chodo woko ithe.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wibino kodi abor gi ludhe makan pa jakwo nedi?
Ndelo jye yado abedo gi win i Ot pa Were afuonjo, wikimakan. To Ndiiko Maleŋ ripo wokethi i tim.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok pere jokedhere gi ŋwech to joweyo go.
Jayach moro moboyere gi suka oido luwo Yesu.
Jotemo mako go to weyo ri jo suka, to ringo yombo jo kinyoro.
Gikenyo jotero Yesu i ot pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, kuma jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji kodi jofuonji ma Chik oido jochoker'iye.
Petro oluwo Yesu giborbor aka odonjo i dyedipo pa jadwoŋ no to bedo kenyo gi joserikale kareno bende oyo mach.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi ji ma jo ni ot gi bee jotemo rango wach ma mako Yesu, ŋey jowoneki go to jokonwaŋo gimoro.
Jokony mathoth jokelo wach ma twodo kwoŋ Yesu, to wach ma jokelo bed'iye pyem kendekende.
Jomogo jochungo to jokelo twodo kwoŋ Yesu ni,
“Wawinjo go wacho ni, ‘Abino kedho woko Ot pa Were me ma chingi dhano amogero, to agero man ma koger gi chingi jo.’ ”
Kada ameno jye fuodi wegi jopyemo i wach me.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar oay malo i nyim ji jye to penjo Yesu ni, “Ingoye gi dwok kwoŋ kweth wach ma ji jokelo kwoŋin me?”
To Yesu oliŋaliŋa ma kodwoko gimoro. Jadwoŋ no odoko openjo go ni, “Iŋati Kristo, Wuodi Were ma Jasilwanyi?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “A an won, aka wibino neno Wuodi Dhano munyo nitye yu rachuch pa Jameni jye, kareno dwoko i pondeponde ma polo!”
Gikenyo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar no oyecho nangin pere ka wacho ni, “Wach aŋo man ma fuodi wadwaro kendo?
Kole watyeko winjo gima kotire m'owacho kwoŋ Were. Withumo nedi?” Aka jojye jothumo ri go banja ni go ripo aneka.
Jomegi jochako ŋulo law kwoŋ Yesu, to joboyo waŋe, aka jopatho go g'adhoŋ, to jokoko malo ni, “Patuchi ŋata ogoyin!” Joserikale jotero go gichien to jogoyo go adonde.
Petro onwaŋo fuodi nitye i dyedipo, to achiel kwoŋ nyir matiyo ri jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar bino.
Munyo nyako no oneno Petro oyo mach, okaŋasa go swa to wacho ni, “In bende onwaŋo initye gi Yesu Janazareth.”
To go kwero ni, “Akuya gima iluwo kwoŋe,” to kidho dho waŋkach. I hongo no to wuodi gweno koko marapena.
Jatich manyako no odoko oneno Petro kenyo to chako kowo ri joma oido jochungo kenyo ni, jame obedo achiel kwoŋ jonago.
To Petro odoko kwedere. I hongo machiek, joma oido jochungo jokaro Petro gi wach ni, “Adyeri, in achiel kwoŋ jo, rupiri ibende ibedo anywola ma Galileya.”
Gikenyo Petro ochako kwoŋirok ni, “Akuya ran ŋata wiluwo kwoŋe me.”

I hongo no won to wuodi gweno koko madiryo, aka munyo Petro opoyo gima ndir cha Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ka fuodi wuodi gweno kokoko diryo ibino kwedere kwoŋan didek.” Gikenyo kwoŋe okwe to ywak malith.
Odikini worwor, jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, kodi jotel pa ji, kodi jofuonji ma Chik, kodi jopido gi bee, joyiko paro kanyachiel. Jotweyo Yesu gi lijegere to jotero go i nyim Pilato.
Pilato openjo go ni, “Iŋati ibedo Kere pa Joyudaya?” Yesu odwoko go ni, “Eno iwacho.”
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar joosa Yesu gi wach mathoth swa.
To Pilato penjo go kendo ni, “Ingoye gi radwoki? Winji kweth wach ma ji jokelo kwoŋin.”
Yesu odoko okwero dwoko kada wach achiel, aka Pilato ouro tektek.
I ndelo madwoŋ ma kalima ma Kadho jye, Pilato yado omaro gonyo jatwech moro jye ma ji jokwayo.
I hongo no jal milwoŋo ni Baraba onwaŋo nitye i twech kanyachiel gi jomogwenyere kwoŋ adhum ma joneko kir ji i lweny pajo.
Munyo kweth ji jochokere aka jochako kwayo Pilato ni wogonyi ri jo jatwech achiel paka omaro timo,
Pilato openjo jo ni, “Wimito agony ri win Kere pa Joyudaya?”
Ato go oido oŋeyo maber ni jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ama jokelo go bonge ru nyieko pajo.
To jotel no jochuno ji, kuchiel jodhiro ji ni jowokwayi Pilato wogonyi ri jo Baraba ayino.
Pilato odoko openjo kweth ji ni, “To wiyenyo atim aŋo gi ŋata wilwoŋo ni Kere pa Joyudaya me?”
Jokoko ni, “Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!”
Pilato openjo jo ni, “To racho aŋo ma go otimo won?” Jomedo koko ni, “Guri go kwoŋ musalaba ayin!”
Pilato omito kisangala kweth ji, amomiyo ogonyo ri jo Baraba. To oro jo chwado Yesu, to yeyo jo guro go kwoŋ musalaba.
Joserikale jorwako Yesu i dyedipo pa Pilato to jolwoŋo wadi gin.
Joruko ri go nanga aywoya ma rangi ariŋo, to jodolo thach okudho to jorwako i wiye pa sangarya maradhum.
Aka jomotho go ni, “Yoga Kere pa Joyudaya!”
Jogoyo wiye gi luth, joŋulo kwoŋe law, joguro chongi gin, aka joryewere ri go piny pa jomiyo go dwoŋ.
Munyo jotyeko nyiero go ameno, jolunyo woko nanga ma rangi ariŋo no to joruko ri go nengin pere won. To jotero go wogur wi musalaba.
Joromo kodi Simon i royo munyo oido bino i tindi, to jochuko go gi tiŋo musalaba pa Yesu. (Ŋato oido Simon ma Sireno, baa Alekizanda kodi Rufus).
Jokelo Yesu kuma ilwoŋo ni Golgotha, dwoŋ mere ni Kabedo pa Kahanga wich.
Jotemo miyo go vini moruw gi pigi yath moro maŋwe kur makweyo litho, to Yesu komadho.
Joguro go kwoŋ musalaba, aka jopoko nengin pere gi kwir maŋeyo adech ma kis dhano d'otero.
Sawa oido obedo odikini kapa sawa adek mogur'iye go wi musalaba.
Me a wach mondik yu wiye: “Kere pa Joyudaya.”
Joguro jokwo aryo bende wi musalaba gi Yesu, ŋatachiel yu chinge marachuch ŋat man yu chinge maracham.
[Ameno randik otundo i kare, ma wacho ni, “Okwan go kwoŋ jomarecho.”]
Jomokadho i royo joyengo wiy gin aka joyeto Yesu ni, “Ha! In ama onwaŋo ikidho kedho Ot pa Were t'igero man i ndelo adek!
Ere palor'iye wi musalaba ibothere wanen!”
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji kodi jofuonji ma Chik bende jonyiero Yesu munyo joŋalo go ni, “Obotho joman, to won kinyal bothere.
Weyi wanen paka Kristo, Kere pa Joisrael won olori wi musalaba, aka wanoyey go.” Aka kir jomogur wi musalaba gine bende joyeto go.
Odyechieŋ kapa sawa auchiel, piny ochol chowo hongo ma sawa adek gipi.
I hongo ma sawa abuŋwen, Yesu okoko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Eloi, Eloi, lama sabach thani!” nyaka ni, “Were paran, Were paran raŋo iweyan!”
Ji megi moido jonitye kenyo munyo jowinjo wach me jowacho ni, “Winji win, go dicha lwoŋo Eliya.”
Ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo oringo gi changwe, obilo i vini mawach, to ketho i dhoke gi yath mabor. Oketho i dhoki Yesu gino munyo wacho ni, “Weyi wanen paka Eliya obin ogony go kwoŋ musalaba.”
Yesu okoko gi derino madwoŋ to tho.
Aka nanga moido olyer i Ot pa Were oyech wok malo kir piny.
Jaserikale madwoŋ moido ochungo chiegin gi musalaba, oneno paka Yesu okoko gi derino aka otho to wacho ni, “Adyeri, me oido Wuodi Were!”
Mon mogo oido jo ni kenyo jochungo giborbor. Idyer jo oido nitye Salome, Marya ma wok Magdala kodi Marya min Yakobo mathin kodi Yose.
Mon me yado joluwo Yesu gi miyo go kony munyo go nitye Galileya; aka onwaŋo nitye mon man bende mathoth ma jobino gine kir i Yerusalem.

Munyo piny kidho yutho, Yozefu ma wok Arimatheya otundo. Go oido obedo ŋata ni gi dwoŋ swa i kweth pa jopido, aka onwaŋo kuro bino pa Ker pa Were. Ndelo no onwaŋo obedo ndelo ma yikirok (dwoŋ mere ni, ndelo ma telo Sabato).
ri ameno Yozefu otimo miseni to kidho bongi Pilato to kwayo go delkwoŋ Yesu.
Pilato ouro swa ni Yesu otyeko tho. Olwoŋo jaserikale madwoŋ to penjo go ka Yesu otyeko tho adyeri.
Munyo otyeko winjo bongi jaserikale madwoŋ ni apaka obedo, Pilato oyeyo Yozefu kwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu.
Yozefu ogamo delkwoŋ Yesu wi musalaba, otweyo gi suka, to ketho i kalyel mogwor i tele. Oŋilo kidi madwoŋ to chulo gine dhok kalyel.
Marya ma wok Magdala kodi Marya min Yose onwaŋo jo ni kenyo joneno kuma oyik'iye Yesu.
Munyo ndelo ma Sabato orumo, Marya ma wok Magdala, kodi Marya min Yakobo, kodi Salome jonyiewo mo maŋwe kur mawiro gine delkwoŋ Yesu.
Odikini worwor i ndelo marapena ma tich, munyo chieŋ nyaka gulo, jokidho i kalyel.
Munyo fuodi jo ni royo, wegi jopenjere kendigin ni, “Ŋata oŋil ri wan woko kidi ma dhok kalyel?”
Gikenyo joŋiyo yu malo to joneno ni kidi otyek ŋilo woko; kidi no oido ombo swa.
Gikenyo jodonjo i kalyel, to joneno jayach moro obedo piny yu rachuch, oruko nanga matar, to lworo mako jo tektek.
Jayach no owacho ni, “Wikiri wibedi gi lworo. Aŋeyo ni wirango Yesu Janazareth ma chieŋino ogur kwoŋ musalaba. Go ongoye ka; otyeko chierino! Ere panen win kama chieŋino oketh'iye go.
Onyo kidhi witer wach me ri jofuonjirok pere, kir ri Petro bende ni kole go otyeko telo kidho ri win Galileya; yu koro ama wibino neni'iye go paka ndir cha owacho ri win.”
Gikenyo jowok i kalyel gi ŋwech, rupiri lworo gi bwok oido opoŋ kwoŋ jo. Aka jokowacho kada ri nyatoro, rupiri oido jothoth gi lworo.
[Munyo Yesu otyeko chierino kwoŋ jomotho, odikini worwor, i ndelo marapena ma tich, omenyere ri Marya ma wok Magdala, ma ndir no oryemo kwoŋe jwogi abiryo.
Dheno okidho to wacho ri joma yado jowotho gi Yesu, moido joywak gi geregere madit.
To munyo jowinjo wach pere ni Yesu kwo aka ni otyeko neno Yesu, jokoyeyo wach no.
Rumachien, Yesu omenyere ri jofuonjirok mogo aryo munyo oido jo ni royo jokidho loka moro.
Jome bende jogik to jowacho ri jofuonjirok wadi gin, to jye jokonyalo yeyo wach pajo.

Machowe, Yesu omenyere ri jofuonjirok apar g'achiel wegi munyo jochiemo. Go opusa jo paka jokobedo gi yeyo, aka odoko jobedo gi adundo manwaŋ, rupiri jokwero yeyo joma onwaŋo jotyeko neno go munyo ochierino.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi win i piny jye, wifuonji nono jye Wach Maber.
Ŋata oyeyi to limo batisimo bino both; ŋata okwer yeyo ibino thumo banja loyo go.
Joma joyey jobino bedo gi ranyuth ma men me: jobino ryemo woko jwogi i nyingan; jobino luwo dhudhok manyien.
Jobino mako thwol, aka ka jomadhi kwir moro marach jokibino ramere; jobino ketho chingi gin kwoŋ jotwo to joboth.”
Munyo Ruoth Yesu otyeko luwo gi jo, oter go i polo to bedo yu rachuch pa Were.
Jofuonjirok jokidho to jofuonjo Wach Maber iye jye, munyo Ruoth tiyo gi jo aka ridho adyeri ma fuonji pajo gi ranyuth ma men mothyelo wach no. Ameno.]
Jadwoŋ Thyofilo, Ji mathoth jotyeko temo ndiko wach motimere i dyer wan.
Jondiko gima joneno gi waŋ jo wok i chakirok aka bende jobedo jonyayi wach me.
Onyo an bende paka atyeko kikaŋasa wach me maber wok i chakirok mere, aparo ni ber andiki rin gime ma achano maber.
Atimo ama aka ŋey ibino niaŋ maber odocho kwoŋ adyeri ma gikipiny motyek fuonjin me.
I ndir ma Herode obed'iye kere ma Yudeya, onwaŋo nitye jachwayi ri Were wi alitar milwoŋo ni Zekariya, ma wok i nono pa Abiya; aka go oido ni gi chiege ma nyakwar Aron milwoŋo ni Elizabeth.
Jojye oido ji mabeyo i waŋ Were, ma jokuro Chik jye kodi Or jye mapa Ruoth mongoye apuse.
To oido jongoye gi nyathi, rupiri Elizabeth oido migumba, aka jojye onwaŋo jotyeko ti.
To munyo weso pa Zekariya gin otundo ma tich ma chwayo,
paka chik pa joma chwayo wi alitar nitye ma donjo i Ot pa Were waŋo buban, kwir omako Zekariya.
Aka kweth ji oido jokwayo gi woko i hongo ma waŋo buban.
Gikenyo malaika pa Ruoth omenyere ri go mochungo yu thenge marachuch ma alitar miwaŋ'iye buban.
Zekariya obwok swa munyo oneno go.
To malaika owacho ri go ni, “Ikiri ibedi gi lworo Zekariya, kole Were owinjo kwayo perin, aka dhako perin Elizabeth bino nywolo rin wuodin, aka ibino chwoko nyinge ni Yohana.
Ibino limo kisangala gi syem, odoko ji mathoth jobino kisangala gi nywolirok pere;
ato go bino bedo ŋatadwoŋ i nyim Ruoth; aka go kibino madho vini kosa medho moro jye ma mero jo, aka Chuny Maleŋ bino poŋ i go, kada ma fuodi go ni iyi min.
Aka go bino dwoko chuny Joisrael bongi Ruoth Were pajo;

kendo go bino telo yu wiy Ruoth paka jamikwenda pere i dwoŋ kodi i men paka apa Eliya jatuchi wach Were. Go bino dwoko chuny bachere ji bongi nyithindho pajo; aka bino miyo jochay jowogiki i yo paji motire; go bino miyo ji pa Ruoth yikirok ri Ruoth.”
Aka Zekariya owacho ri malaika ni, “Anoŋey nedi gino? Kole atyeko ti aka dhako paran bende oti.”
Aka malaika owacho ri go ni, “An Gabryel machungo ruwaŋ Were; aka ooran luwo kodin gi kelo rin wach maber me.
To paka ikiyeyo mikwenda paran, ma bino timere i ndir mere, ikibino luwo chuka ndelo ma gikipiny me otimer'iye.”
Ji oido jokuro Zekariya woko; to jouro swa paka go ogalo ameno i Ot pa Were.
Munyo go owok woko, konyalo luwo gi jo, to joparo nike go oneno gimoro i Ot pa Were; ri ameno go otimo ri jo ranyuth, rupiri go oido olokere obadha.
Munyo hongo pere ma tich orumo, go odok pecho pere.
Rumachien chiege, Elizabeth ogamo iye to pondo hongo ma dwe abich munyo wacho ni,
“Ruoth otimo ran ama i ndir me munyo oparo kwoŋan, to kwanyo kwoŋan wichkwot i waŋ ji.”
Munyo Elizabeth otyeko dwe auchiel gi iye, Were ooro malaika Gabryel i tindi ma Galileya milwoŋo ni Nazareth,
bongi nyako ma fuodi okuya jachwo, monwaŋo openjere gi jayach milwoŋo ni Yozefu, nyakwar Daudi; aka nyako no oido nyinge Marya.
Malaika obino bonge to wacho ri go ni, “Yoga, i jasilwany, Ruoth ni kodin!”
Go obwok swa munyo owinjo moth me, kende oparo g'ichunye dwoŋ moth me.
To malaika no owacho ri go ni, “Marya, ikiri ibedi gi lworo, rupiri i jasilwany i waŋ Were.
Kole ibino gamo iyin, t'inywolo wuodin; aka ibino chwoko nyinge ni Yesu.
Go bino bedo ŋatadwoŋ, aka ibino lwoŋo go ni Wuodi pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo; aka Ruoth Were bino miyo go kom ma ker pa Daudi, kwari mere.
Go bino dhumo nyikway Yakobo chil gi chil aka Ker pere bino ngoye gike.”
To Marya openjo malaika ni, “Gime obedi nedi mato an abedo nyako ma fuodi okuya jachwo?”
To malaika wacho ri go ni, “Chuny Maleŋ bino loro kwoŋin, aka men pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo bino umin; amomiyo nyathi m'ibino nywolo ibino lwoŋo ni ŋataleŋ, Wuodi Were.
Aka neni, wat perin Elizabeth gi tiyo pere bende ogamo iye nyathi ma jayach; aka me dwe pere marauchiel, ŋata yado ilwoŋo ni migumba.
Kole ri Were ongoye gima kinyalere.”
Marya owacho ni, “An abedo ŋecha pa Ruoth; weyi wotimere ran paka iwacho no.” Gikenyo malaika oweyo go.
I hongo no Marya omako royo mayot to kidho i piny ma tendere tendere, yu tindi ma Yudeya.
Go odonjo i ot pa Zekariya to motho Elizabeth.
Gikenyo tekin Elizabeth winjo moth pa Marya, nyathi mani iye ogwecho. Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Elizabeth
to luwo gi dwonde mamalo munyo wacho ni, “I jasilwany kwoŋ mon, Nyathi milenywolo bende jasilwany!
Me silwany aŋo ma min Ruoth gipi obino bongan ka?
Kole tekin awinjo moth perin to nyathi mani iyan gwecho gi kisangala.
In i jasilwany m'iyeyo ni mikwenda pa Ruoth rin bino timere adyeri.”
Marya owacho ni, “Adundo paran fuoyo Ruoth,
aka chunyan sangala i Were Jaboth paran.
Kole go oneno bwonirok pa ŋecha pere! Aka wok gunyoni nono jye bino lwoŋan ni jasilwany.
Kole Were ma jameni otimo ran gikipiny madongo. Nyingi go leŋ.
Go timo ŋono ri joma lworo go, wok i luse ji achiel tundo i luse man.
Go oryeyo chinge ma nyutho men pere, aka otyeko kedho woko joma pakere i paro ma chuny jo.
Go oŋilo woko kerere madongo wi kombere pajo, aka otiŋo malo joma bwonere.
Go oyeŋo joma kech neko gi gikipiny mabeyo, aka oryemo woko joŋaŋo gi chingi gin nono.
Go okonyo ŋecha pere Israel, munyo opoyo wor pere
m'ochiko kwarere mawan, Ibrayimu kodi nyikwaye jye chil gi chil!”
Marya obedo bongi Elizabeth chiegin dwe adek aka nyaka odok pecho.
Ndelo pa Elizabeth otundo ma nywol, to nywolo nyathi ma jachwo.
Joger pere kodi wade pere jowinjo ni Ruoth otimo ri go wor madwoŋ aka josangala swa gi go.
I ndelo maraboro jobino thumo nyathi, aka onwaŋo jomito chwoko nyinge ni Zekariya paka bamere.
To yokimere wacho ni, “Kameno, ibino lwoŋo go ni Yohana.”
Jowacho ri go ni, “Kole ongoye moro i nono mewin milwoŋo gi nyinge no!”
Aka jomiyo bamere ranyuth ma penjo go paka go mito wolwoŋ nyathi no.
Go okwanyo gindiiko, to ndiko ni, “Nyinge Yohana.” Ji jye jouro swa!
Gikenyo won to Zekariya yawo dhoke to lewe gonyore, to chako luwo munyo fuoyo Were.
To lworo omako joger pajo jye, kendo oluw kwoŋ gikipiny me i Yudeya parom.
Joma jowinjo jye jorwako wach no i chuny jo munyo jowacho ni, “Kosa nyathi me obedi ŋa? Kole chingi Ruoth ni kwoŋe.”
Aka Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Zekariya bamere, to luwo munyo wacho ni,
“Wopaki Ruoth Were pa Israel! Kole olyewo ji pere to botho jo.
Omiyo wan Jaboth ma jameni i nono pa Daudi jatich pere,
paka chango oluwo gi i dhok jotuchi wach pere maleŋ wok chon,
nike bino botho wan kwoŋ jokwor mawan kodi kwoŋ joma mon kodi wan bende;
kareno nyutho wor ri kwarere mawan, gi poyo chikirok pere maleŋ,
kwoŋirok ma chango go otimo ri bawan Ibrayimu, nike bino botho wan wok i chingi jokwor mawan,
ŋey watiyi ri go mongoye lworo,
i leŋo kodi tiro i waŋe, i kwo mawan gipi.
Aka in, nyathi me, ibino lwoŋin ni jatuchi wach pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo, kole ibino telo Ruoth kidho yiko ri go royo;
gi miyo ji pere ryeko ma both ka Were ochwako gimarecho pajo.
Ru wor mathoth ma Were mawan ni gine, go bino miyo waŋchieŋ gulo to ŋamba ma both wok ri wan,
ma bino kelo lero ri joma ni mudho kodi i tho ma mito umo jo, to tiro tyendi wan i royo ma syem.”
Nyathi no odongo to bedo gi men i chunye kendo obedo i thim chuka ndelo otundo to nyuthere kamaler ri Joisrael.
I ndir no, Kaisar Agusto owodho or ma ndiko ji ŋey wokwan ji ma piny pere gipi.
Me oido obedo ndiko ji marapena, aka obedo i ndir pa Kwirino jadhum i adech ma Sirya.
Dhano jye okidho i tindi ma thugin ndikirok.
Ri ameno Yozefu bende oay i tindi ma Nazareth, i Galileya to kidho Yudeya i tindi pa Daudi milwoŋo ni Bethlehem, paka go oido obedo ja ot pa Daudi.
Yozefu okidho ni wondik go gi Marya monwaŋo yiko nywomirok gine. Marya oido yach.
Munyo jo ni kenyo, hongo pa Marya otundo ma nywol.
Go onywolo wuode ma kayo to umo gi nengin pa nyithindho, to pyelo i wer ma dhok chiem'iye rupiri kabedo konwaŋere rigo i ot wendo.
Chiegin kenyo onwaŋo nitye jokwath mogo moido jo ni saa jokuro mwendi pajo wor gi weso.
Malaika pa Ruoth omenyere ri jo, aka dwoŋ pa Were omenyo jo, to jobwok swa.
Malaika owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wibedi gi lworo; kole akelo ri win wach kwoŋ kisangala madwoŋ ma bino bedo ri ji jye.
Konon i tindi pa Daudi onywol ri win Jaboth, mobedo Kristo Ruoth.
Aka me a ranyuth ri win, wibino nwaŋo nyathi maŋich moboy i nengin pa nyithindho tipyelo i wer ma chiemo dhok.”
Gikenyo ma piyo piyo, kweth jomalaika ma polo joriwere gi malaika no to jofuoyo Were munyo jowero ni,
“Dwoŋ wobedi ri Were malo i polo, aka i piny syem wobedi ri ji ma silwany pere nigi jo.”
Munyo jomalaika jotyeko weyo jo jogik i polo, jokwath jowacho wegi kendigin ni, “Weyi wakidhi Bethlehem wanen gimotimere ma Ruoth onyutho wan me.”
Gikenyo joredo to jonwaŋo Marya gi Yozefu kodi nyathi mopyel i wer ma chiemo dhok.
Munyo joneno nyathi no, jowacho ri ji gima malaika owacho ri jo kwoŋ nyathi no.
Jomowinjo wach me jouro swa gima jokwath no jowacho.
Marya opoyo gikipiny me jye to paro kwoŋe swa.
Jokwath jodok munyo jofuoyo Ruoth to jopako Were ru gikipiny jye ma jowinjo aka joneno ni obedo paka owachi ri jo won.
Munyo ndelo maraboro ma thumo Nyathi otundo, ochwok nyinge ni Yesu, nyinge ma malaika omiyo go ma fuodi kogam go i iyi min.
Munyo ndelo otundo ri Yozefu kodi Marya ma tero rachow ma lonyirok paka Chik pa Musa wacho, jotero Nyathi no i Yerusalem ketho go i chingi Ruoth.
(Me a gima ondik i chik pa Ruoth ni, “Nyathi ma jachwo jye mobedo okayo pa min, ibino miyo Ruoth.”)
Aka jotero kir mich bende paka ondik i chik pa Ruoth: Akurin aryo kosa nyithindhi njiwa aryo.
I Yerusalem kenyo onwaŋo nitye jal moro ma nyinge Simeyo. Go oido obedo dhano maber molworo Were, aka onwaŋo kiyo neno both pa Israel, kendo Chuny Maleŋ onwaŋo ni gi go.
Chuny Maleŋ onwaŋo otyeko nyutho go ni go kibino tho ma fuodi waŋe koneno Kristo pa Ruoth.
Munyo Chuny Maleŋ owacho ri go, Simeyo oay to kidho i Ot pa Were. Aka munyo jonywol jokelo Nyathi Yesu timo ri go gima Chik wacho,
Simeyo otiŋo Nyathi no i chinge to fuoyo Were ka wacho ni,
“Ruoth, onyo pama sewila ŋecha perin i syem paka chango ichiko;
Kole waŋan otyeko neno both
m'iyiko ni ji jye jowoneni.
Lero ma bino menyo ri Jopath royo pa Were, to kelo dwoŋ ri ji perin Israel.”
Baa nyathi gi yokimere jochungo kenyo munyo jodhyer kwoŋ gima Simeyo oido wacho kwoŋ Nyathi no.
Simeyo omiyo jo silwany to wacho ri Marya min Nyathi ni, “Nyathi me othuy gine ji wokeli podho ri joman kodi both ri ji mathoth i Israel; go bino bedo ranyuth ma ji mathoth jobino pyemo gine.
To paro pa ji mathoth mopanere bino wok kamaler, aka abor bino roko adundo nin won.”
Kenyo onwaŋo nitye dhako dwoŋ moro ma jatuchi wach Were ma nyinge Anna, nyar Fanwel, ma nono pa Aser. Go oido oti swa aka otyeko oro abiryo i nywomirok pere to chwore tho,
to doŋ chi tho chuka oro pere oromo pyero aboro g'aŋwen. Go koweyo Ot pa Were, to otiyo ri Were wor g'odyechieŋ munyo riyo kech gi kwayo.
I hongo no won ama go bende odonj'iye i Ot pa Were to chako fuoyo Were; aka oluwo kwoŋ Nyathi no ri ji jye monwaŋo jokuro both pa Yerusalem.
Tekin jotyeko timo gimoro jye ma Chik pa Ruoth wacho, jodok Galileya i tindi pajo ma Nazareth.
Nyathi no odongo gi men, gi ryeko, kendo silwany pa Were obedo gine.
Kis oro jonywol pa Yesu bin jokidho Yerusalem i ndelo ma kalima ma Kadho.
Munyo Yesu oromo oro apar g'aryo, jokidho korago i kalima paka oido jotimo ndir jye.
Munyo kalima no orumo, jomako royo madok pecho, to jayach Yesu odoŋ Yerusalem. Jonywol pere oido jokoŋeyo ameno.
Paka oido joparo nike go nitye i kitipa ji ma jowotho gi jo, jowotho awotha ndelo gipi, to nyaka jochako rango go bongi wade pajo gi merin pajo.
To munyo jokonwaŋo go, jogik Yerusalem munyo jorango go malomalo.
I ndelo maradek aka jonwaŋo go i Ot pa Were obedo i dyer jofuonji, munyo winjo fuonji pajo aka penjo jo penji mogo.
Ji jye ma jowinjo go jouro swa ryeko gi radwok pere.
Jonywol pere jodhyer munyo joneno go; aka yokimere owacho ri go ni, “Nyathi paran, itimo ri wan ama raŋo? Neni wakodi benin wabedo gi rem swa munyo warangin.”
Odwoko jo ni, “Raŋo ma wirangan? Wikuya nike oido aripo bedo i ot pa Baba?”
To jokoŋeyo dwoŋ gima go owacho ri jo.
Gikenyo Yesu odok gi jo Nazareth to winjo or pajo. Yokimere okano gikipiny me jye i adundo.
Yesu odongo i delkwoŋe aka ryeko pere omedere, munyo Were gi ji jofuoyo go.

I oro marapar g'abich ma dhum pa Kaisar Tiberyo, munyo Pontyo Pilato dhumo paka gavana ma Yudeya, kareno Herode ruoth ma Galileya, aka omin go Filipo ruoth ma Itureya gi Trakoniti, aka Lisania ruoth ma Abilene,
i ndir pa jodongo pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar Anas jokodi Kaifas, wach pa Were obino ri Yohana wuodi pa Zekariya i thim.
Go owotho i piny ma Yordan gi bee ka fuonjo batisimo ma ŋuto kodi limo chwak kwoŋ gimarecho,
paka ondik i kitawo pa Isaya jatuchi wach Were ni, “Dwondi jo moro koko i thim ni: ‘Yiki win kaluwo ri Ruoth Tiri win royo pere.
Kamaluŋ jye ibino poŋo kir malo. Gote gi tendere jye ibino ryewo woko, royo jye mokom ibino loko motire, odoko royo ma di geŋin gi buche jye bino pyele,
Aka dhano jye bino neno both pa Were!’ ”
Ri ameno go owacho ri kweth ji moido jobino limo batisimo ni, “Win nyithindhi thwole! Ŋata onyutho win ni ber wibudhere kwoŋ nge pa Were ma chiegin bino?

Timi win gikipiny ma nyutho nike wiŋuto gimarecho mewin. To wikiri wichaki wacho wiwegi kendiwin ni, ‘Ibrayimu meno kwari wan!’ Kendo awacho ri win, kole Were nyalo kwanyo telin me to loko nyikway Ibrayimu.
Aka otyek kir ketho le ma toŋo woko yen gi i tyende; yath jye ma kinyak maber ibino toŋo woko tibolo i mach.”
Ji jye jopenjo Yohana ni, “Onyo waripo timo aŋo?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ka nyatoro ni gi satere aryo, go ripo poko gi ŋat'ongoye gine. Kendo ŋata nigi gimoro achama bende wotimi ameno.”
Oido nitye jochoki misolo mogo ma bende oido jobino limo batisimo ma jowacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, waripo timo aŋo?” Owacho ri jo ni,
“Wikiri wichoki kwoŋ moro gima kalo rapor ma chik yeyo.”
Joserikale megi bende jopenjo go ni, “To wan waripo timo aŋo?” Owacho ri jo ni, “Ongoye mayo ji gikipiny g'akaka! Yeŋi win gi kemba mewin! Odoko, wikiri wichwoki dhok dhano!”
Geno pa ji ochako medirok; aka jochako paro ni ipoyo Yohana a Kristo.
Amomiyo Yohana odwoko jo ni, “An amiyo win batisimo kodi pi, to nitye nyatoro ma bino ma loyan bor gi dwoŋ, ma akiripi kada lunyo thol war pere: go bino miyo win batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ kodi mach.
Ragwar pere ni chinge ma gwaro woko gine kanja i kamoyo ŋano, tikonjo nyingi ŋano i dero, tiwaŋo woko kanja gi mach ma kitho.”
I yo momore, Yohana omedo yeŋo ji munyo fuonjo jo Wach Maber.
Yohana oido otyeko wacho ri Herode ni otimo marach nywomo Herodya chipa omin, kendo Herode no won oido otyeko timo gikipiny mathoth ma recho,
medo kwoŋ meno, go odoko otimo racho makalo kir moido otyeko timo timo chon, ma tweyo Yohana i jera.
Munyo ji jye jotyeko limo batisimo, kareno Yesu bende otyeko limo, aka go oido kwayo, to polo yawere.
Gikenyo Chuny Maleŋ oloro to pye kwoŋe i chal pa akuru, to dwondi jo moro wok i polo ma wacho ni, “In i Wuodan mamaro; kendo asangala swa kodin.”
Munyo Yesu ochako tich pere, go oido romo oro pyero adek: Go obedo wuodi pa (paka okwan go) Yozefu, Mobedo wuodi pa Heli,
wuodi pa Mathat, wuodi pa Levi, wuodi pa Melki, wuodi pa Janai, wuodi pa Yozefu,
wuodi pa Matathya, wuodi pa Amos wuodi pa Nahum, wuodi pa Esli, wuodi pa Nagai,
wuodi pa Maath, wuodi pa Matathya, wuodi pa Semei, wuodi pa Yosek, wuodi pa Yoda,
wuodi pa Yohanan, wuodi pa Resa, wuodi pa Zerubabel wuodi pa Seltyel, wuodi pa Neri,
wuodi pa Melki, wuodi pa Adi, wuodi pa Kosam wuodi pa Elmadam, wuodi pa Er,
wuodi pa Yoswa, wuodi pa Elyeza, wuodi pa Yorim, wuodi pa Mathat, wuodi pa Levi,
wuodi pa Simeyo, wuodi pa Yuda, wuodi pa Yozefu, wuodi pa Yonam, wuodi pa Elyakim,
wuodi pa Meleya, wuodi pa Mena, wuodi pa Matatha, wuodi pa Nasan, wuodi pa Daudi,
wuodi pa Yese, wuodi pa Obed, wuodi pa Bowaz, wuodi pa Salmon, wuodi pa Nason,
wuodi pa Aminadab, wuodi pa Admin, wuodi pa Arni, wuodi pa Heziron, wuodi pa Perez, wuodi pa Yuda,
wuodi pa Yakobo, wuodi pa Isaka, wuodi pa Ibrayimu, wuodi pa Tera, wuodi pa Nahor,
wuodi pa Serug, wuodi pa Rewu, wuodi pa Peleg, wuodi pa Eber, wuodi pa Sela,
wuodi pa Kainan, wuodi pa Alpakisadi, wuodi pa Semu, wuodi pa Nowa, wuodi pa Lameka,
wuodi pa Methusela, wuodi pa Enoka, wuodi pa Yared, wuodi pa Mahalalel, wuodi pa Kainan,
wuodi pa Enos, wuodi pa Seth, wuodi pa Adam, wuodi Were.
Munyo Yesu otyeko poŋ gi Chuny Maleŋ, oeye Yordan to Chuny Maleŋ telo go i thim chowo ndelo pyero aŋwen,
munyo Jwogi temo go. I hongo no, go k'ochamo gimoro; aka rumachien nyaka owinjo kech.
Gikenyo jwogi owacho ri go ni, “Ka in i Wuodi Were, ere oir tele me wolokere chiemo.”
To Yesu odwoko go ni, “Ondik ni, ‘Dhano ki kwo gi chiemo kende.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi otero go wi got mabor to nyutho go ker jye ma piny i hongo machiek; owacho ri Yesu ni,
“Abino miyin men jye gi dwoŋ jye ma ker me, rupiri oketh i chingan aka anyalo miyo nyatoro jye ma awon ayero.
Amomiyo k'inolaman, to gimoro jye bedo aperin.”
To Yesu odwoko go ni, “Ondik ni, ‘Lami Ruoth Were perin, aka itiyi ri go won kende.’ ”
Gikenyo jwogi otero Yesu Yerusalem to oro go chungo wi kisul Ot pa Were. Aka owacho ri go ni, “Ka in i Wuodi Were, woki ka, ipor piny;
kole ndiiko wacho ni, ‘Were bino ketho jomalaika pere jolin,’
kendo ni, ‘Jobino byelin i chingi gin ŋey ikir i chadhi tyendin kwoŋ tele.’ ”
To Yesu odwoko ni, “Otyek wacho i ndiiko ni, ‘Ikir item Ruoth Were perin.’ ”
Munyo jwogi ochowo temo Yesu iyo jye, oweyoye go kutho.
Yesu, gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ kwoŋe, ogik i Galileya; aka wach ma mako kwoŋe olak i adech jye ma piny no.
Go ofuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya momore aka dhano jye omiyo go dwoŋ.
Yesu okidho Nazareth kama chango odong'iye, to kidho i kalamo pa Joyudaya i ndelo ma Sabato paka yado omaro timo. Oay malo kisoma,
to jochwayo ri go kitawo ma chango Isaya jatuchi wach Were ondiko. Oyawo to soma kama ondik'iye ni,

“Chuny pa Ruoth opoŋ kwoŋan, rupiri owiran gi mo ma tito Wach Maber ri jochandi. Ooran wacho ri jomotwey ni otyek gonyo jo, kendo ri joma waŋ jo otho, ni otyek yawo waŋ jo, aka ri joma onwaŋo odiy jo ni onyo owey jo i syem.
Odoko ooran tito ni me a oro pa Ruoth manyutho ji ŋono pere.”
Gikenyo oumo kitawo no to dwoko ri ŋata kuro, to bedo piny, aka waŋ ji jye ma kalamo ochomere kwoŋ go.
Aka ochako luwo ri jo ni, “Konon randik me ee otundo i kare paka wiwinjo no.”
Ji jye jofuoyo go munyo jouro wach madongo mabeyo mowok i dhoke ka jowacho ni, “Me won ki wuodi pa Yozefu?”
Odwoko ni, “Aŋeyo ni wibino wacho ran agecha momar wacho ni, ‘Jamilerwa, iwon bothere,’ kendo ni, ‘Watyeko winjo gimoro jye motimere Kapernaum. Timi ameno bende loka perin ka.’ ”
Aka owacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, jatuchi wach Were kijol maber i piny pere won.
Adyeri awacho ri win, mon tho onwaŋo jomore i Israel i ndir pa Eliya, munyo polo ochiegere oro adek gi dwe auchiel, aka kech obedo i piny gipi.
To koor Eliya bongi kada achiel kwoŋ jono, to oor go bongi chi tho ma Zerefath, denge i tindi ma Sidon ayin.
Odoko i ndir pa Elisa jatuchi wach Were, onwaŋo jodhowo jomore i Israel, to ongoye kada achiel kwoŋ jo mobothi, kwanyo woko Naman Jasirya denge ayin kende.”
Munyo jowinjo gime, dhano jye keme omako i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Joay jowodho go i tindi, to jotero go dho thengi tendere moger'iye tindi pajo munyo joyenyo dhiro go wofuodere piny.
To go oluwo gi dyer jo to kadho rigo.
Gikenyo Yesu okidho Kapernaum, tindi ma i adech ma Galileya. Go ofuonjo ji kenyo i ndelo ma Sabato;
aka jouro fuonji pere, rupiri wach pere oido ni gi men.
To i kalamo pa Joyudaya no onwaŋo nitye nyatoro mani gi chuny mochido mapa jwogi kwoŋe. Ŋato okoko gi derino madwoŋ ni,
“Iyenyo timo aŋo gi wan, Yesu Janazareth? Ibino reyo wan woko? Aŋeyin, in Ŋataleŋ pa Were.”
To Yesu oay kwoŋe ka wacho ni, “Liŋi, aka woki kwoŋ go!” Aka munyo jwogi no otyeko redho ŋato piny i dyer ji, owok kwoŋe ma kotimo ri go racho moro.
Ji jye jouro swa aka wegi jochako luwo kendigin ni, “Me wach aŋo? Go ryemo woko chuny mochido gi maker gi men to jowok awoka!”
Aka wach ma mako kwoŋ Yesu onyay kamoro jye i adech no.
Yesu oeye i kalamo pa Joyudaya no, to donjo i ot pa Simon. I hongo no or Simon ma dhako oido two, kwoŋe oowere. To jokwayo Yesu ni wokonyi go.
Yesu ochungo kabuti dhako no to kwero two no bedo kwoŋe, to two weyo go. Piyo piyo no won to dhako no ay malo to chako rweyo jo.
I hongo no munyo waŋchieŋ kidho podho, ji jye moido jo ni gi jomatwo kiti two mopokere opokere, jokelo jo bothe to Yesu ketho chinge kwoŋ jo to joboth.
Jwogi jowok kwoŋ ji mathoth ka joywak ni, “In, i Wuodi Were!” To go oay kwoŋ jo to chiero jo luwo, rupiri oido joŋeyo ni go Kristo.
Munyo piny oyawere, Yesu oeye kenyo to kidho kama ji jongoy'iye. Ji jorango go to jobino bothe, kendo oido jokimiti ni go wowey jo;
to go owacho ri jo ni, “Aripo fuonjo Wach Maber ma Ker pa Were i tindi man bende; kole me a gima okelan.”
Aka ofuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya ma kweth i Yudeya.
Yesu ochungo dho wakawaka ma Genesaret to kweth ji ma joyenyo winjo wach pa Were jodire kwoŋe.
Yesu oneno yee mogo aryo dho thengi wakawaka; kareno jokitoga ma wegi mere onwaŋo jongoye kenyo oido jokidho lwoko bwoo pajo.
Gikenyo Yesu odonjo i yee achiel, mapa Simon Petro, to kwayo go ni wodhire i pi gi yee no nyaka mathin wok kwoŋ geŋin.
Aka munyo obedo i yee, ofuonjo kweth ji no gi i yee. To munyo ochowo luwo, owacho ri Simon ni, “Chori yee i wakawaka kamaluth wiboli bwoo mewin wimaki rech.”
To Simon odwoko go ni, “Jadwoŋ, kole watyeko kifamba wor gipi mongoye gima wamako! To rupiri iwacho, akidho bolo bwoo.”
Munyo jotyeko timo ameno, jomako rech mathoth swa ma bwoo onwaŋo chiegin kir gi yech woko.
Aka jolwoŋo jowoti jo moido jonitye i yee man gi chingi gin ni jobin jowokony jo. To jono jobino to jopoŋo yee aryo jye mapa jokidho munyirok i pi.
Munyo Simon Petro oneno ameno, opodho ka tyendi Yesu munyo wacho ni, “Eye bothan, Ruoth, rupiri a jarecho.”
Ato go kodi jowote jye, oido jobwok tektek ru kweth rech ma jomako.
Yakobo kodi Yohana, woti Zebedayo, ma jobedo jowoti Simon, jye bende jobwok. Aka Yesu owacho ri Simon ni, “Ikiri ibedi gi lworo! Wok gunyoni ibino kitoga ji.”
Aka munyo jotyeko chiewo yee kir dho geŋin, joywayo jowodho woko, to joweyo gimoro jye to joluwo Yesu.
Munyo Yesu oido nitye i tindi moro, jadhowo moro ma kwoŋe gipi odhole obino. Munyo go oneno Yesu, opodho piny gi nyime to ywakere ri go ni, “Ruoth, ka iyenyo inyalo lonyan.”
Yesu ochwayo chinge, ogeyo go munyo wacho ni: “Ayenyo, ri ameno lonyi.” Gikenyo won, dhowo oware kwoŋe.
Aka Yesu ochiko go teltel ni, “Ikir iwachi ri nyatoro; to kidhi inyuthere ri jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, aka iter mich paka Musa ooro, ma nyutho gine ji ni onyo ilony.”
To wach omedo nyay ayino, aka kweth ji jochokere winjo fuonji pere gi limo both kwoŋ two pajo.
To Yesu okidho i thim kwayo paka oido omaro timo.
Ndelo moro munyo Yesu fuonjo ji, Jofarisayo mogo kodi jofuonji ma Chik ma jowok i adech ma Galileya kodi Yudeya kodi Yerusalem bende jobino kenyo; aka go oido opoŋ gi men pa Ruoth ma chango two.
Gikenyo chwo mogo jokelo ri go nyatoro ma two nyaŋinya wi kitanda. Jono jodwaro yo ma kelo go bongi Yesu.
To paka royo odhyero jo ma rwako go ru kweth ji, joidho wi ot aka jochwayo go bongi Yesu gi kitanda pere gi i hola ma jomwomo wi kisul ot.
Munyo Yesu oneno yeyo pajo owach ni, “Nyawotan, gimarecho perin ochwak rin.”
To jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo jochako kigesa munyo wegi jopenjere ni, “Ŋatin ŋa ma luwo gimakotire kwoŋ Were ama? Ŋata bende nyalo chwako gimarecho kwanyo woko Were won?”
Munyo Yesu oniaŋ ni jogesa ameno, odwoko ni, “Raŋo ma widaŋin gi i chuny win?
Aŋo mayot wacho? Ni, ‘Gimarecho perin ochwak rin,’ kosa ni, ‘Ayi malo iwothi?’
Ere ma miyo win ŋeyo ni Wuodi Dhano nitye gi men i piny ka ma chwako gimarecho”, owacho ri ŋata two nyaŋinya ni, “Awacho rin, ayi malo ikwany kitanda perin idoki pecho.”
Piyo piyo no ŋato oay ruwaŋ jo, okwanyo kitanda moido go onind'iye, to dok pecho munyo miyo Were dwoŋ.
Aka ji jye jouro swa, to jopako Were gi lworo, munyo jowacho ni, “Konon waneno gikipiny ma yado fuodi wakineno.”
Gikenyo Yesu owok to neno jachoki misolo ma nyinge Levi, obedo piny dho chiegin gi ot misolo; to wacho ri go ni, “Luwan.”
Levi oweyo gimoro jye, oay, to luwo go.
Levi oyiko ri go kalima madwoŋ pecho pere; aka kweth pa jochoki misolo kodi joman jobedo gi Yesu dhower.
To Jofarisayo kodi jofuonji ma Chik, jogesa gi jofuonjirok pa Yesu munyo jowacho ni, “Raŋo ma wichiemo aka wimedho gi jochoki misolo kodi jomarecho?”
To Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Jomolama ama jokiyeny jamilerwa, to jomatwo ayino ama joyenyo;
kole akibino lwoŋo jomabeyo, to jomarecho ayino ni jowoŋuti recho pajo.”
Aka jowacho ri Yesu ni, “Jofuonjirok pa Yohana kodi apa Jofarisayo joriyo kech adhik, to kole joperin jochiemo aka jooro giramadha.”
To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Inyalo miyo jomolwoŋ i kalima ma nywomirok riyo kech nedi mato jamweha fuodi nitye gi jo?
Kole ndelo bino tundo munyo okwany woko jamweha bongi jo, aka nyaka jobino riyo kech.”

Yesu oluwo ri jo i agecha bende ni, “Ongoye ŋata yecho kiremo nanga manyien to kwoyo wi nanga moti; ka otimo ameno, go nyalo yecho woko nanga manyien no, odoko kiremo manyien bende kibino ripo gi machon.
Aka ongoye ŋata kako medho ma vini manyien i mugowa pyendere moti rupiri medho no bino yecho woko pyendere no to oy, gikenyo to pyendere nyiekere woko.
Be! Medho ma vini manyien ripere kako i mugowa pyendere mere manyien.
Aka ongoye ŋata otyeko madho vini ma ndoto modoko mito manyien: go wacho ni ndoto ama ber.”
I Sabato moro, munyo Yesu wotho i ndelin ma ŋano, jofuonjirok pere jofuono withi ŋano, joŋinyo i chingi gin, to jochamo.
To Jofarisayo mogo jowacho ni, “Raŋo ma witimo gimakoyey i Sabato?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Fuodi wikisoma gima Daudi otimo munyo kech oido neko jo kodi joma onwaŋo ni bonge:
paka go odonjo i Ot pa Were, okwanyo mugat ma chowirok to chamo, mato koyey joman chamo kwanyo woko jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kende, aka omiyo joma onwaŋo jo ni gigo bende to jochamo?”
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Kole Wuodi Dhano obedo Ruoth ma dhumo Sabato.”
I Sabato man, munyo Yesu odonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya to fuonjo, dhano ma chinge marachuch owiyere oido ni kenyo.
Jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo jokiyo Yesu munyo jomito neno ni kono obothi jatwo no i Sabato ŋey jowonwaŋi wach moro kwoŋe.
To go oŋeyo paro pajo; amomiyo owacho ri ŋata chinge otho no ni, “Biye chungi ka.” Ŋato oay, obino, to chungo kenyo.
Aka Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Apenjo win, oyey timo bero i ndelo ma Sabato, kosa racho ayin; botho kwo, kosa nyieko woko ayin?”
Gikenyo oŋiyo jojye korin gi korin, to wacho ri ŋato ni, “Ryeyi chingin.” Ŋato bende otimo ameno to chinge bedo maber.
To nge poŋ i chuny jono, omiyo jochako chano gima di jonyalo timo ri Yesu.
I hongo no Yesu okidho wi got kwayo; aka obedo wor gipi i kwayo Were.
Munyo piny oyawere, olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere, to yero japar g'aryo i dyer jo m'olwoŋo ni Jomoor;
Simon, m'ochwoko nyinge ni Petro, kodi Andereya omin, kodi Yakobo gi Yohana, kodi Filipo gi Batholomayo,
Mathayo gi Thoma, Yakobo wuodi pa Alfayo gi Simon, (monwaŋo ilwoŋo ni Jalwenyi ri piny pere), gi
Yuda wuodi pa Yakobo kodi Yuda Iskaryot, mochamo ri Yesu sereko.

Yesu oloro piny kodi japar g'aryo no, to chungo kama obipere, kama jofuonjirok pere kweth jochoker'iye gi kweth ji mowok thenge jye ma Yudeya, kodi Yerusalem kodi loka Tire gi Sidon mothenere gi wakawaka,
monwaŋo jobino winjo go kodi kwayo ni wochangi two pajo; aka joma onwaŋo chuny mochido chando jo joboth.
Ji jye jotemo geyo go rupiri men oido wok kwoŋe aka botho jojye.
Gikenyo Yesu otiŋo waŋe oŋiyo jofuonjirok pere, aka owacho ni, “Josilwany a win ma wichandere i chuny win: rupiri Ker pa Were mewin.
“Josilwany a win ma pama kech neko win: rupiri ibino yeŋo win. “Josilwany a win ma pama wiywak: rupiri wibino nyiero.
“Wi josilwany ka ji jodak win, joryemo win woko, joyeto win, aka jonyieko nyingi win ni wi jomarecho kwoŋbedo Wuodi Dhano.
“Sangala win ru ndelo ma bino tundo, aka uchi win gi myel. Kole kemba mewin bino bedo madwoŋ i polo. Me a kite ma bachere pajo jotimo ri jotuchi wach Were bende.
“To kidamba otundi ri win wijoŋaŋo: rupiri wityeko limo syem mewin.
“Kidamba otundi ri win ma pama widenya wiyeŋ: rupiri wibino pal gi kech. “Kidamba otundi ri win ma pama winyiero: rupiri wibino winjo malith to wiywak.
“Kidamba otundi ri win ma pama piny pako win: rupiri meno apaka chango kwarere mewin bende jopako jotuchi wach ma twodo.
“To awacho ri win ma wiwinjan, mari win jokwor mewin, kendo timi win maber ri joma mon kodi win.
Miyi win joma kwoŋo win silwany aka kwayi win ri joma yeto win.
Ka moro ogoyo lembin achiel adhoŋ, wiri ri go man bende; aka ka moro omayin kot perin, ikiri ichier go sat bende.
Nyatoro jye ma kwayin gimoro miyi go, aka ikiri ikway dhano ni wodwoki rin giperin motyeko mayin.
Timi ri jowotin paka imito bende jowotim rin.
Ka wimaro jomomaro win kende, fuoy aŋo ma wigeno limo? Kole kir jomarecho bende jomaro jomomaro jo.
Ka witimo maber ri joma timo ri win maber kende, fuoy aŋo ma wigeno limo? Kole kir jomarecho bende jotimo ameno.
Aka ka wimiyo joma wigeno ni jolechulo win gimoro kende, fuoy aŋo ma wigeno limo? Kole kir jomarecho bende jomiyo jomarecho wadi gin gikipiny ka jogeno ni ibino dwoko ri jo gima rom kodi ma jopoko.

Kuchiel, mari win jokwor mewin, aka witimi ri jo maber. Odoko miyi win ji gikipiny, ma wikigeno ni jobino chulo win. Wibino limo kemba madwoŋ, aka wibino bedo nyithindho pa Ŋatadwoŋ Maloyo; kole go won chunye ber gi joma jokifuoy go kodi jomarecho.
Bedi win gi wor paka Bawin jawor.
“Wikiri withum banja ri jowoti win, ŋey Were bende kibino thumo ri win banja. Wikiri wirodhi jowoti win aka bende korodhi win. Chwaki win recho pa jowoti win aka bende ibino chwako mewin;

Pok jowot win gikipiny, ŋey Were bino poko win bende: rapor mopoŋ, modile, moyengi to poŋ chuka oy; ama ibino ketho i chingi win. Kole rapor m'ioro ri jowotin ama Were bende bino oro ma kipima rin gine gima go dwoko rin.”
Yesu oluwo i agecha bende ni, “Ŋata waŋe otho bende nyalo kodo nyawote ma waŋe otho ma jojye jokopodho i bur?
Kole ŋata ifuonjo kiloy jafuonji pere gi dwoŋ, to ŋata ofuonji maber nyalo bedo marom kodi jafuonji pere.
Raŋo ineno nyaka yath mochile mondhilo mopodho i waŋ omerin aka ikinen kongolo kasik ma nitye i waŋin won?

Kosa inyalo nedi wacho ri omerin ni, ‘Omera, weyi akwany rin woko nyaka yath m'ochile mondhilo ma nitye i waŋin’, mato ikinyal neno kongolo kasik ma nitye i waŋin won? Jarendirok me, ber kutho ikwanyi woko kongolo kasik mani waŋin no, aka inonen odocho nyaka yath mochile mondhilo ma nitye i waŋ omerin, t'ikwanyo woko ri go.”
“Kole ongoye yath maber ma nyak gimarach, kosa yath marach ma nyak gimaber.
Aka kis yath iŋeyo ru gimanyak kwoŋe: Nyandere kifuon wi kudhin, odoko vini kifuon kwoŋ kudho oryaŋ.

Amomiyo dhano maber wodho tim mabeyo wok i kakano bero ma nitye i adundo pere; aka ŋatarach bende wodho tim marecho wok i kakano recho ma nitye i adundo pere. Kole wach ma dhano luwo jye wok i gimopoŋ iy adundo pere.
“Raŋo ma wilwoŋan ni, ‘Ruoth, Ruoth’, aka wikitim gima awacho ri win?
Dhano jye ma bino bongan aka winjo wach paran to tiyo gine, abino nyutho win paka go chalo:
Go chalo dhano ma munyo geto ot pere, okunyo tyendi ot maluth tundo i gee; aka munyo mikula opoŋ to mol kwoŋ ot no, konyalo yengo, rupiri ot onwaŋo oget matek.
To ŋata winjo wach me aka kitiy gine, chalo dhano ma munyo geto ot pere, kokunyo tyende maluth moromo; mikula omol kwoŋ ot no, to podho piyo piyo, to nyiekere kichutho.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo wacho gima go oido yenyo ji jowowinji, okidho Kapernaum.
Jaserikale Jaroma moro onwaŋo nitye gi jatich pere m'omaro swa, aka onwaŋo two tektek ma chiegin gi tho.
Munyo owinjo kwoŋ Yesu, ooro jotel pa Joyudaya mogo bonge kwayo go nike wobin wobothi jatich pere no.
Munyo jotundo bongi Yesu joywakere ri go swa ka jowacho ni, “Ripere itim ri jame kony,
rupiri go omaro nono mawan, aka otyeko kir geto ri wan kalamo pa Joyudaya.”
Gikenyo Yesu okadho gi jo aka munyo oriko pecho, jaserikale no ooro merin pere bonge wacho ri go ni, “Ruoth, ikiri ichandere, kole kiripi ran ka idonjo i ot paran.
Aka meno amomiyo awon akitiŋere bino bongin, to luwi nyaka wach won kende, to jatich paran bedo maber.
Kole nitye joma dhuman, aka abende adhumo joserikale man. Ka awacho ri achiel ni, ‘Kadhi’, to kadho; aka ri man ni, ‘Biye ka,’ to bino; kendo ka awacho ri jatich paran ni, ‘Timi gimanyo,’ to timo.”
Munyo Yesu owinjo wach me, ouro swa, to wire neno muma ji, to wacho ri joma luwo go ni, “Awacho ri win, kada i Israel gipi fuodi akinwaŋo kiti yeyo me.”
Aka munyo jomikwenda jogik i ot, jonwaŋo jatich no olama.
Rumachien mayot, Yesu okidho i tindi milwoŋo ni Nain, kuma jofuonjirok pere kodi lwak ji madwoŋ jokwaŋ'iye go.
Munyo oriko waŋkach ma tindi no, oneno otiŋ ŋatotho mobedo wuodi pa chi tho moro, aka manago onwaŋo obedo nyathi achiel no won kende. Kweth ji ma tindi oido jowotho gi dhako no kanyachiel.
Munyo Ruoth oneno dheno, wor omako go gine, to wacho ni, “Ikiri iywaki.”
Gikenyo go okidho to ketho chinge kwoŋ kitanda pa jatho, to jomotiŋo jochungo; to wacho ni, “Jayach, awacho rin, ayi malo.”
Ŋatotho oay obedo to chako luwo, to Yesu dwoko go i chingi yokimere.
Dhano jye obwok to pako Were munyo jowacho ni, “Jatuchi wach Were madwoŋ omenyere i dyer wan: Were olyewo ji pere.”
Wach motimere kwoŋe me onyay i Yudeya gipi kodi i adeche mothoko kenyo.
Jofuonjirok pa Yohana jowacho ri Yohana gikipiny me jye. Aka munyo Yohana olwoŋo jofuonjirok pere aryo,
odhiro jo bongi Ruoth penjo go ni, “In a ŋata Yohana owacho ni lebino kosa fuodi wakuri ŋat mani?”
Aka munyo jono jobino bonge jowacho ni, “Yohana odhiro wan bongin ka penjin nike, in a ŋata ripo bino, kosa wakuri ŋat mani?”
I hongo no Yesu obotho jotwo mathoth, to ryemo woko chuny mochido, aka ji mathoth monwaŋo waŋ gin otho joneno.

Ri ameno odwoko jo ni, “Kidhi wiwachi ri Yohana gima wityeko neno gi winjo: joma waŋ gin otho joneno, jomoŋol jowotho, jodhowo kwoŋ gin lony, joma ithi gin otho jowinjo, jomotho jochierino, jochandi ifuonjo jo Wach Maber.
Aka jasilwany a ŋata kiteran marach.”

Munyo jomikwenda pa Yohana jotyeko kadho, Yesu ochako luwo gi muma ji kwoŋ Yohana ka wacho ni, “Onwaŋo wikidho neno aŋo i thim? Midole ma koyo yengo? Aŋo won monwaŋo wikidho neno? Dhano moruko nengin mabeyo?
Neni win, kole joma rukere ma noro aka jochiemo maber jonwaŋere i dyedipo pa kere ayin.
To onwaŋo wikidho neno aŋo won? Jatuchi wach Were? Adyeri awacho ri win, go loyo kir jatuchi wach Were!
Me a ŋata ondik kwoŋe ni, ‘Neni, adhiro rin jamikwenda paran yu wiyin, ma bino kutho yiko rin royo.’
Awacho ri win, kwoŋ joma mon onywolo jye ongoye maloyo Yohana gi dwoŋ; to kuchiel kir ŋata thin loyo i Ker pa Were, jye loyo go gi dwoŋ.”
(Munyo ji jye kodi jochoki misolo jowinjo go, joyeyere gi wach pa Were rupiri jonwaŋo batisimo pa Yohana.
To Jofarisayo kodi jofuonji ma Chik jochayo atoŋa pa Were ri jo wegi, omiyo jokwero limo batisimo bongi Yohana.)
“Anopima ji ma pama kodi aŋo, kosa jochalo aŋo?
Jochalo nyithindho ma jobedo i katale. Aka kweth achiel koko ri man ni, ‘Kole wakudho ri win madundo, to wikimyelo; wawero wer ywak to wikiywak!’
Yohana Jakibatisa obino ma riyo kech aka kimedhi, to wiwacho ni, ‘Go nigi jwogi kwoŋe!’
Onyo Wuodi Dhano obino ma chiemo aka oro giramadha to wiwacho ni, ‘Neni ŋato jaworo, odoko jamadhi vini, aka mere pa jochoki misolo kodi jomarecho!’
To kada ameno ji jye ma joyeyo ryeko pa Were jotero paka otire.”
Jafarisayo achiel olwoŋo Yesu chiemo pecho pere. Munyo Yesu otundo pecho pa Jafarisayo no to bedo dhower,
dhako moro odonjo, monwaŋo odakana swa i tindi. Munyo go owinjo ni Yesu chiemo i ot pa Jafarisayo no, obino gi chupa mo maŋwe kur,
to chungo yu ŋeye dho katyende munyo ywak, to chako oyo pigi waŋe i tyendi Yesu, to yweyo gi yewiye; to chwiyo tyende, to wiro gi mo maŋwe kur.
Munyo Jafarisayo molwoŋo Yesu oneno ameno, won owacho kende ni, “Bedi ŋat me bedi jatuchi wach Were adyeri, kole d'oŋeyo kiti dhako ma geyo go me, paka go jarecho”
Gikenyo Yesu ogamo dhoke ka wacho ni, “Simon, nitye gima amito wacho rin.” Anago, “Jafuonji, wachi ran.”
“Jal moro oido ni gi jobanjin pere aryo; ŋatachiel obedo gi banja pere ma siringi miya abich, ŋat man pyero abich.
Munyo chulo pesa no odhyero jo, jalo ochwako jojye. Ka ameno, ŋa kwoŋ jono ma bino maro go loyo?”
Simon odwoko ni, “Aparo ni ŋata go ochwako banja madwoŋ loyo.” Yesu odwoko ni, “Itundo.”
Gikenyo Yesu owire oŋiyo dhako no, to wacho ni, “Simon, ineno dhako me? Adonjo i ot perin, to ikimiyan kada pi ma lwoko tyendan, to go owok lwoko tyendan gi pigi waŋe, aka oyweyo kir gi yewiye.
Ikichwiyo lemban, to go koweyo chwiyo tyendan chuka nende adonji ka.
Ikiwiro mo i wiyan, to neni go owok wiro tyendan gi mo maŋwe kur.
Amomiyo awacho rin, mar moasere ma go onyutho omiyo gimarecho pere madit otyek chwako ri go. Ato ŋata ochwak ri go manok ama nyutho mar manok.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri dhako no ni, “Gimarecho perin otyek chwako rin.”
Gikenyo joman monwaŋo jobedo i dhower jochako wacho kendigin ni, “Me ŋa ma bende chwako gimarecho?”
To Yesu owacho ri dhako no ni, “Yeyo perin obothin; kadhi i syem.”
Rumachien Yesu owotho i tindin kodi loka momore munyo tito aka fuonjo Wach Maber kwoŋ Ker pa Were. Japar g'aryo onwaŋo jo ni bonge,
kanyachiel gi mon mogo mobothi jo kwoŋ chuny mochido kodi i two pajo; Marya moido ilwoŋo ni Magdalena, moryem kwoŋe jwogi abiryo.
Yoana chipa Chuza, jatich madwoŋ i ot pa Herode, kodi Susana, kodi joman kweth monwaŋo jokonyo wendo gi gikipiny ma wegi jokelo.
Ji jowok i tindin mopokere opokere jobino bongi Yesu; aka munyo muma ji ochokere, Yesu oluwo ri jo i agecha ama:
“Dhano moro okidho chwoyo kodhi pere, aka munyo go bayo kodhi, megi opodho i dyer royo, to ji nyono gi tyendi gin, to winyin bino dimo woko.
Kodhi megi opodho wi tele kuma lowo rep iye; aka munyo kodhi no otwi, okwako ner, rupiri lowo oido rep, to munyo odongo, othwo woko, rupiri lowo oido othwo.
Kodhi megi opodho i kudhin; aka kudhin odongo gi jo to diyo jo woko.
Aka megi opodho i lowo ma diwa; odongo to nyak, nyingi gin miya achiel kis tyende achiel.” Munyo otyeko wacho ama, okoko malo ni, “Ŋata ni gi ithe ma winjo wowinji.”
Aka munyo jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go dwoŋ agecha me,
Yesu odwoko ni, “Win omiy win niaŋ kwon nyaliŋliŋ ma Ker pa Were; to joman ifuonjo jo g'agechin, ma kada joŋiyi, jokineen, kada jowinji jokiniaŋ dwoŋ gima jowinjo.”
“Me a dwoŋ agecha no: Kodhi meno wach pa Were.
Kodhi mopodho i dyer royo, meno a joma jowinjo: to jwogi bino to kwanyo woko wach i chuny jo, ŋeyi jokiri jowoyeyi to joboth.
Kodhi mopodho wi tele kuma lowo rep iye, meno a joma jowinjo wach gi kisangala, to wach kirwaki tyende i chuny jo; joyeyo nyaka ma hongo manok, to jopodho ka ratem obino.
Aka kodhi mopodho i kudhin, meno a joma jowinjo, to rumachien rembo kodi ŋaŋo ma piny kodi kisangala ma kwo diyo jo piny, aka gima jonyak kitegino.
To kodhi mopodho i lowo ma diwa, meno a joma, munyo jotyeko winjo wach, jomako maber i chuny jo, aka jonyak maber ru diyo chuny jo.
“Ongoye ŋata chwinyo tala to umo g'agono, kosa ketho i tyendi kitanda; kuchiel go ripo ŋawo tala no wi akare mere aka joma donjo i ot jowoneni lero.
Kole ongoye gimopanere ma kothangi kamaler, kosa gima nyaliŋliŋ ma koŋeyere kamaler.
“Chiki win ithi win maber, ato ŋata nitye gi gimoro ama ibino medo go man, to ŋata ongoye gi gimoro, kada ma go paro nike ni gine no, ibino mayo go woko.”
Gikenyo min Yesu gi wutimin jobino bonge, to jokonyalo tundo bothe ru thotho pa ji.
Aka owach ri go ni, “Yokin kodi wutimerin ichade jochungo woko, jodwaro nenin.”
To Yesu owacho ni, “Mama kodi wutimera meno a joma winjo wach pa Were aka jotiyo gine.”
Ndelo moro Yesu odonjo i yee gi jofuonjirok pere, to wacho ri jo ni, “Weyi wachiewere win yu loka ma wakawaka ma kocha.” To jochako chiewirok.
Munyo jochiewere, Yesu opodho gi nindo, aka koyo madwoŋ obino to kudho wakawaka, to pi chako poŋ i yee, ma yee onwaŋo chiegin munyirok i pi.
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jokidho to jochiewo Yesu munyo jowacho ni, “Jafuonji, Jafuonji, watho!” Yesu ochiew to ay malo, to oro koyo kodi pi ma tula kwe; gimoro jye oliŋ to piny kwe.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Nikune yeyo mewin?” Aka jodhyer to lworo mako jo, to jowacho wegi kendigin ni, “Me ŋa ma oro kir koyo gi pi jye to jowinjo go?”
Jochiewere jotundo i piny pa Jogerasa mochimere gi Galileya.

Aka munyo Yesu otyeko wok dho thengi pi, dhano moro mowok i tindi monwaŋo ni gi jwogi kweth kwoŋe oromo gine. Ŋato oido ochowo hongo malach ma kiruki gimoro, aka kibedi i ot, to bedo i kalyele ma ŋungu ayino.
Munyo go oneno Yesu, okoko to podho dho tyende to wacho gi derino ni, “Yesu, Wuodi pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo! Imito aŋo kwoŋan? Akwayin, ikiri itiman marach.”

Go owacho ameno, rupiri Yesu oido ooro chuny mochido no wok kwoŋ ŋato. (Ato ndir madit chuny mochido no oido mwonjo go, aka kada twey ŋato i chinge kodi tyende gi lijegere, chodo woko lijegere no to chuny mochido no tero go i thim.)
Yesu openjo go ni, “Nyingin ŋa?” Odwoko ni, “Nyingan ‘Lwak,’ ” rupiri jwogi kweth oido jodonjo kwoŋe.
Jwogi no jokwayo Yesu ni wokiri wodhiri jo i mwombe ma luth.
Kenyo onwaŋo nitye sidwol mbiji madwoŋ ma chiemo dho thengi tendere; jwogi jokwayo Yesu nike wowey jowodonji i mbiji no, to yeyo jo.
Gikenyo jwogi jowok kwoŋ ŋato to jodonjo i sidwol mbiji; aka sidwol no gi bee joloro wi tendere to jomunyere i wakawaka.
Munyo jokwath mbiji joneno gimotimere, joringo to jonyayo wach i tindi kodi loka no jye.
Ji bende jokidho neno gimotimere. Jobino bongi Yesu to jonwaŋo dhano ma jwogi jowok kwoŋe obedo piny dho tyendi Yesu, moruko nanga aka wiye ber, to lworo mako jojye.
Jomoneno gimotimere jotito ri joman paka Yesu obotho ŋato.
Gikenyo ji jye ma iyadech ma Gerasa jokwayo Yesu nike woeye kenyo, rupiri lworo oido opoŋ kwoŋ jo. Gikenyo Yesu odonjo i yee to dok.
Dhano ma jwogi owok kwoŋe okwayo Yesu ni, “Yeyan aluwin.” To Yesu okwero ri go ni,
“Doki pecho ititi ri ji gima Were otyeko timo rin.” Jalo owotho i tindi parom munyo tito ri ji gima Yesu otimo ri go.
Gikenyo munyo Yesu odwoko yu loka ma Galileya, kweth ji jojolo go rupiri oido ji jye jokuro go.
Aka nyatoro obino milwoŋo ni Yayiro, mobedo jadwoŋ ma dhumo kalamo pa Joyudaya; go opodho dho katyendi Yesu to kwayo go ni wokidhi pecho pere,
rupiri nyare achiel g'achiel won, monwaŋo romo oro apar g'aryo, oido chiegin tho. Aka munyo Yesu kidho korago, kweth ji jodire kwoŋe to jothoko go.
Gikenyo dhako moro moido remo oy kwoŋe tyeko oro apar g'aryo gipi, aka ongoye ŋata onyalo chango ri go two no, kada go oido otyeko wotho bongi jomilerwa mathoth gi nyieko lim pere,
obino yu ŋey Yesu, to geyo dhok nanga pere; gikenyo no won to remo chok.
Yesu openjo ni, “Ŋata ogeyan?” Dhano jye okwedere, to Petro wacho ni, “Jafuonji, kole muma ji othokin aka ji dire kwoŋin.”
To Yesu owacho ni, “Nyatoro ogeyan, kwoŋbedo awinjo men owok kwoŋan.”
Munyo dheno oneno ni onwaŋ go, obino gi kirin, opodho piny dho katyendi Yesu, to tito ruwaŋ ji jye gimomiyo ogeyo Yesu, kendo paka olimo both gi kenyo no won.
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Nyaran, yeyo perin obothin, kadhi i syem.”
Munyo Yesu fuodi luwo, jamikwenda moro owok pecho pa jadwoŋ cha. Ŋato owacho ri go ni, “Nyarin otyeko tho, ikiri imedi chando Jafuonji nono.”
Yesu kere oido owinjo, to wacho ri Yayiro ni, “Ikiri ilwori; yeyi ayino, go bino bedo maber.”
Munyo Yesu otundo pecho no, koyeyo moro donjo gi go i ot kwanyo woko Petro, Yohana kodi Yakobo, kodi baa nyathi gi yokimere kende.
Dhano jye oido ywako nyako no gi ndur. To Yesu owacho ni, “Wikiri wiywaki; nyathi me kotho, nindo ayino.”
Jono jonyiero go rupiri joŋeyo ni nyako no oido otyeko tho.
To Yesu omako chinge to lwoŋo ni, “Nyathi, ayi malo.”
Gikenyo chuny nyathi no odwoko kwoŋe to ay ni rwat, to Yesu oro jo miyo go girachama.
Jonywol pere jouro swa, to Yesu chiko jo ni jokiri jowowachi ri moro jye gimotimere.
Yesu olwoŋo japar g'aryo kanyachiel to miyo jo nyalo kodi men ma ryemo woko jwogi gi botho two.
Gikenyo go odhiro jo fuonjo kwoŋ Ker pa Were gi botho ji.
Owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wikwany gimoro ma woth mewin; kada luth, kosa mugowa, kosa chiemo, kosa pesa, kosa nengin aryo.
Kama ojol iye win, bedi win kenyo kende nyuka winoeye i tindi no;
kama kojol iye win, ka wi ay i tindi no, teŋi win woko fukefuke ma tyendi win paka ranyutho ma theko win gi jo.”
Jofuonjirok jomako royo to jowotho kabedo momore omore munyo jofuonjo Wach Maber gi botho jotwo kis kamoro.
Herode, ruoth ma Galileya, owinjo kwoŋ gikipiny moido timere; gino omiyo go dhyer swa, rupiri jomegi jowacho ni, “Yohana Jakibatisa osukina kendo.”
Joman ni Eliya ama omenyere, aka joman jowacho ni achiel kwoŋ jotuchi wach Were machon am'osukina kendo.
Herode owacho ni, “Chango aŋundo woko wich Yohana; to me ŋa ma awinjo kwoŋe gikipiny me?” To chako rango neno Yesu.
Jomoor jodwoko to jowacho ri Yesu gimoro jye ma jotimo. Go okwanyo jo to jokodere gi chien i tindi milwoŋo ni Bethsaida.
Munyo lwak ji jowinjo ameno, joluwo jo. Yesu ojolo jo to luwo gi jo kwoŋ Ker pa Were, aka obotho jomatwo.

Munyo piny kidho yutho, jofuonjirok japar g'aryo jobino bongi Yesu to jowacho ni, “Sewila ji jowokidhi i adech ma chiegin kodi loka man jye koro jowonwaŋi kanindo kodi girachama. Kole ka obedo dyer thim.”

To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wiwegi miyi win jo girachama.” Jodwoko ni, “Gima wani gine a nyaka mugat abich gi rech aryo won kende. Kono bedi wanyalo kidho nyiewo chiemo ri kweth ji me jye di watimo amanago.”
(Jono onwaŋo joromo chiegin chwo gana abich.) Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Wachi win jowobedi piny i kitipa ma pyero abich abich.”
Jotimo ameno to jooro ji jye bedo piny.
Gikenyo Yesu okwanyo mugat abich kodi rech aryo no, otiŋo waŋe malo oŋiyo polo, to miyo silwany: aka oturo to chwayo ri jofuonjirok pere jowopoki lwak ji.
Ji jye jochiemo paka joyenyo aka ochoki ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ to poŋo aditin apar g'aryo.
Ndelo moro munyo Yesu oido kwayo kakende aka jofuonjirok pere oido jo ni bonge, openjo jo ni, “Ji jowacho ni an a ŋa?”
Aka jodwoko ni, “Yohana Jakibatisa; to joman ni Eliya; aka joman ni achiel kwoŋ jotuchi wach Were machon am'osukina kendo.”
Yesu owacho ni, “To win wiwacho ni, an a ŋa?” Petro oluwo malo, to wacho ni, “Kristo pa Were.”
Ru wach no Yesu ochiko jo teltel ni kiri jowowachi ri nyatoro gime;
owacho ni, “Wuodi Dhano ripo chandirok i royo kweth, aka jotel pa ji kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik jobino kwero go to joneko go, to ichierino go i ndelo maradek.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Ka moro mito luwan, go won kutho ripo kwerere kende, wotiŋi musalaba pere kis ndelo, aka woluwan.
Ato ŋata won omiti botho kwo pere bino rwenyo woko; to ŋata orwenyi kwo pere ran bino botho kwo no.
Kony aŋo ma dhano onwaŋ ka oloki piny gipi apere to rwenyo kosa bolo woko kwo pere won?
Ŋata wiye kwot kodan gi wach paran, Wuodi Dhano bende wiye bino kwot kodi go ka odwoko i dwoŋ pere kodi i dwoŋ pa Bamere kodi apa jomalaika maleŋ.
To awacho ri win adyeri, kwoŋ win nitye joma jochungo ka ma jokiletho ma fuodi jokoneno Ker pa Were.”
Munyo ndelo aboro okadho nyuka Yesu wachi gikipiny me, go okwanyo Petro gi Yohana gi Yakobo to joidho wi got kwayo.
Aka munyo kwayo to chal pere wire, omiyo ruk pere olokere matar chilili.
Gikenyo chwo aryo, Musa kodi Eliya, joluwo gine.
Jomenyere i dwoŋ ma polo aka joluwo gi Yesu paka go chiegin chowo atoŋa pa Were mobedo tho pere i Yerusalem.
Petro gi wadi oido nindo okwalo jo, to munyo jochiew, joneno dwoŋ pa Yesu kodi chwo aryo ma jochungo bothe.

Munyo ji aryo no oido joeye bongi Yesu, Petro owacho ri go ni, “Jadwoŋ, apaka bedo ka ber ama! Weyi wageti kayindin adek: achiel rin, achiel ri Musa, achiel ri Eliya;” to go oido kuya kir gima go wacho.
Munyo fuodi go luwo ameno, pondeponde obino to umo jo, to lworo omako jofuonjirok munyo jodonjo i pondeponde no.
Gikenyo dwondi jo moro owacho gi i pondeponde ni, “Me Wuodan, mayero, winji win go!”
Munyo dwondi jo no otyeko luwo, onenere ni Yesu won ama oido odoŋ kende. Jofuonjirok joliŋ gi gikipiny no ma jokowacho ri nyatoro i hongo no kada gimoro kwoŋ gima joneno.
Yawere mere, munyo joloro wi got, kweth ji joromo gi Yesu.
Gikenyo, dhano moro okoko i dyer ji ni, “Jafuonji, akwayin ikonyiye wuodan, rupiri go a nyathi achiel won ma ani gine.
Aka jwogi moro mwonjo go noknok, miyo go koko malo, to fum redho go piny, to gwecho chuka bwoyo wok i dhoke, to futa go aka kimiti kada weyo go.
Akwayo jofuonjirok perin ni joworyemi woko jwogi no kwoŋe, to jokonyalo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “A luse ji ma bu yeyo kendo momyenere, anobedi gi win kir keraŋo ma fuodi anere gi win? Keli wuodin ka”
Munyo jayach no kidho, jwogi owito go aka ofuodo go piny to gwecho. To Yesu oay kwoŋ chuny mochido no, to botho jayach no, to dwoko go ri bamere.
Aka dhano jye ouro men pa Were. To munyo ji jye fuodi jouro gima Yesu otimo, owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni,
“Weyi wach me wodonji i ithi win; rupiri ibino ketho Wuodi Dhano i chingi ji.”
To jokoniaŋ dwoŋ wach no, aka opan ni kiri jowoniaŋi; kendo lworo omako kir jo penjo go wach me.
Pyem ochakere i dyer jo ni kwoŋ jo ŋa maloyo wadi gi dwoŋ.
To munyo Yesu oniaŋ paro ma chuny jo, okwanyo nyathi moro to ketho go chungo kabothe.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Ŋata jolo nyathi me i nyingan meno jolan; aka ŋata jolan, meno jolo ŋata ooran; kole ŋata oasa thin i dyer win meno a ŋata dwoŋ loyo.”
Yohana odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, wanwaŋo nyatoro ryemo jwogi i nyingin, to wachiero go, rupiri go kiwothi gi wan.”
To Yesu odwoko go ni, “Wikiri wichieri go; kole ŋata kimon gi win meno nitye yu thenge mewin.”
Munyo ndir pere orikere ma dok i polo, Yesu oridho paro ma kidho Yerusalem.
Aka odhiro jomikwenda pere yu wiye, to jokidho loka ma Samarya yiko ri go kabedo.
To jono jokoyeyo jolo go paka go oido omako yo ma kidho Yerusalem.
Munyo jofuonjirok pere joneno ama, Yakobo gi Yohana jowach ni, “Ruoth, imito walwoŋ mach wok i polo wowaŋi woko jo?”
To Yesu owire oŋiyo jo to bwoko jo.
Aka jomedere kadho yu loka man.
Munyo jowotho, joromo gi dhano i royo mowacho ri Yesu ni, “Abino luwin kama inokidh'iye jye.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kibwe jo ni gi kero pajo, aka winyin ma malo bende jo ni gi odi gin, to Wuodi Dhano ongoye kodi katheno wiye.”
To ri ŋat man Yesu owacho ni, “Luwan.” To ŋato dwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, weyi kutho akidhi ayiki baba, otho.”
To Yesu dwoko go ni, “Weyi jomotho jowoyiki jomotho pajo, tich perin kidho nyayo wach kwoŋ Ker pa Were ayin.”
Ŋat man owacho ni, “Aleluwin Jadwoŋ, to weyi kutho akidhi asewila jopecho.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Dhano jye ma furo gi kwer dhok aka kethere ŋiyo chien meno kiripi gi Ker pa Were.”
