Rumachien Ruoth oyero ji pyero abiryo g'aryo man aka ooro jo yu wiye jaryo jaryo, i kis tindi kodi kamoro jye ma go onwaŋo yiko tund'iye.
Owacho ri jo ni, “Kecho opikere, to jotich ama nok, amomiyo kwayi win Ruoth ma won kecho wodhiri jotich jowokechi ri go.
Onyo kadhi win pama won. Eno, adhiro win pa roombo i dyer arara.
Wikiri witiŋ mugowa pesa, kosa mugowa chiemo, kendo kada war.
I ot moro jye ma widonj'iye, kutho mothi win jo ni, ‘Syem wobedi i ot me.’
Aka k'inen onwaŋere ŋata jolo syem kenyo, syem mewin bino doŋ ri go; to ka kameno, bino giki ri win.
Bedi win i ot achiel munyo wijolo chiemo kodi giramadha ma jomiy win, rupiri jatich chamo gikwok pere. Wikiri wikowere i udi man.
Ka widonjo i tindi moro tijolo win, chami win gima okethi ruwaŋ win.
Bothi win jotwo mani kenyo aka wiwachi ri jo ni, ‘Ker pa Were ochore chiegin gi win.’
To ka widonjo i tindi moro aka kojol win, kidhi win i royo ma tindi no to wiwacho ni,
‘Onyo wateŋo woko kir fukefuke ma tindi mewin moido odoŋ i par tyendi wan wodoŋi i wiy win; to kada ameno ŋeyi win ni Ker pa Were orikere chiegin.’
Awacho ri win, i ndelo ma thumo banja, Sodom bino limo girachula madhey ye loyo tindi no.

“Kidamba otundi rin, Korazin! Kidamba otundi rin, Bethsaida! Kole bedi giraura motim i win tim i Ture kodi Sidon, di chango joŋuto chon, aka di jobedo piny to joruko gunia, to jobukere gi buru ma nyutho ni joŋuto recho.
Were bino nyutho wor madwoŋ i ndelo ma thumo banja ri Tire kodi Sidon loyo ri win.
Aka in Kapernaum, onwaŋo iyenyo tiŋirok malo tundo i polo? Ibino bolin i piny pa jomotho ayino!”
Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Ŋata winjo win, meno winjan; ŋata kwero win meno kweran; aka ŋata kweran, meno kwero Ŋatooran.”
Jofuonjirok pyero abiryo g'aryo cha jodwoko munyo josangala, ka jowacho ni, “Ruoth, kiri jwogi jye jowinjo wan ka waoro nyingin.”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Aneno Sitan munyo podho pa lithkoth mowok i polo.
Onyo atyeko miyo win men ma nyono gi tyendi win thwole kodi thwolgwok, gi nyalo woko men pa jakwor jye; kendo ongoye gima bio timo win marach.
To wikiri wisangala ni chuny mochido jowinjo win; kuchiel sangala win ni nyingi win ondik i polo ayino.”

I hongo no won Yesu osangala i Chuny Maleŋ aka owacho ni, “Afuoyin Baba, Ruoth ma polo kodi piny, paka ipano gikipiny me ri jomaryek kodi jomofuonjere tinyutho nyithidho ayin. Ey Baba, gime otimere paka i yero.
“Baba otyeko miyan gimoro jye; aka ongoye ŋata oŋeyo Wuode kwanyo woko Bamere, kendo ongoye ŋata oŋeyo Baba kwanyo woko Wuode kodi joma Wuode oyero nyutho jo Bamere.”
Gikenyo Yesu owire ri jofuonjirok pere to wacho ri jo nyaliŋliŋ ni, “Josilwany a joma waŋ gin neno gima wineno!
Aka awacho ri win, jotuchi wach Were kodi kerin mathoth, chango joyenyo neno gima wineno to jokoneno, gi winjo gima wiwinjo to jokowinjo.”
Gikenyo jafuonji ma Chik moro omito temo Yesu; oay to penjo ni, “Jafuonji, mitere atim aŋo ŋey adonji i kwo makirum?”
Yesu bende openjo go ni, “Chik wacho nedi? Somere nedi?”
Odwoko ni, “Mari Ruoth Were perin g'adundo perin jye, gi chunyin jye, gi men perin jye, gi paro perin jye, kendo mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Idwoko motire; ere timi ameno aka ibino kwo.”
To paka ŋato onwaŋo yenyo nyutho tiro pere, openjo Yesu ni, “Nyawotan a ŋa?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Jal moro oido wotho i royo kareno owok Yerusalem kidho Yeriko, to podho i chingi jokwo, ma jolunyo kwoŋe nengin jye, jogoyo go, to joweyo go kenyo ma chunye kende ama gudere.
Gikenyo jachwayi ri Were wi alitar moro oido luwo royo no, to munyo oneno ŋato, oluwo i thengi royo to kadho akadha.
Ameno bende Jalevi mobino kenyo oneno go, to kadho kwoŋe gi i thengi royo.
To munyo Jasamarya moro otundo bonge, ama omako gi go wor munyo oneno go;
okidho bonge to chako tweyo adholin pere, to konj'iye mo gi vini. Rumachien otiŋo go to ketho go wi kayina pere won, aka otero go i ot wendo, to miyo go kony kenyo.
Yawere mere okwanyo siringi aryo to chulo jakuri ot wendo ka wacho ni, ‘Kuri ran go maber, aka ka adwoko abino chulin gimoro jye m'inomedi oro ma konyo go.’
Onyo kwoŋ ji adek me, iparo ni ŋa mobedo nyawoti jal mopodho i chingi jokwo no?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ŋata onyutho go wor.” Yesu odwoko ni, “Ibende kidhi itim ameno.”
Munyo Yesu gi jofuonjirok pere jomedo woth, jotundo loka moro, to dhako moro ma nyinge Maritha jolo go i ot pere.
Dheno oido ni gi nyamin milwoŋo ni Marya, mobino to bedo piny dho katyendi Yesu to winjo fuonji pere.
To Maritha won oido ni gi mindin madit mogeŋo go winjo fuonji momiyo owacho ni, “Ruoth, ikipar paka nyamera oweyan gi tich kendan? Mondo wachi ri go wokonyan.”
To Ruoth odwoko ni, “Maritha, Maritha, chunyin ramin kendo rembo kwoŋ gimathoth,
mato nyaka gimoro achiel won ama mitere. Marya ayino am'oyero gimaber mere, ma kokwany kwoŋe.”
Ndelo moro Yesu onwaŋo nitye kamoro kwayo, aka munyo ochowo, achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok pere owacho ni, “Ruoth, fuonji wan kwayo, paka Yohana ofuonjo jofuonjirok pere.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wachi win ama ka wikwayo: ‘Bawan mani polo, Nyingin wolwor paka leŋ. Ker perin wobin.
Miyi wan ndelo jye chiemo mawan ma noknok.
Chwaki ri wan gimarecho mawan, paka wabende wachwako dhano jye ma timo ri wan marach. Aka ikiri iter wan karatem. To bothi wan ayino kwoŋ gimarach.’ ”
Aka Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ win mani gi mere pere, ma ka okidho bothe dyer wor to kwayo go ni, ‘Mere paran, kopa ye an mugat adek, anochulin;
nyawotan moro mowok bor ee nyaka tundo ran pama won me, aka angoye gi gimoro ma anomiy go!’
Jalo to dwoko gi i ot ni, ‘Ikir iolan, atyeko kir diyo thigo, aka nyithindho paran gi an won wanitye i kanindo; akinyal ay malo bino miyin.’
Awacho ri win, kada di ŋato koay miyo go gimoro paka mere, to ru amen pere, jalo bino ay malo to miyo go gimoro jye ma go yenyo.
“Amomiyo awacho ri win, kwayi win, aka omiy win; rangi win, aka winonwaŋ; gudi win thigo, aka oyaw ri win.
Kole ŋata kwayo ndir jye limo, ŋata rango, ndir jye nwaŋo; aka ŋata gudo thigo, bende ndir jye iyawo ri go.
Ŋa kwoŋ win ma baa nyithindho, ma ka wuode okwayo go rech to miyo thwol ayino?
Kosa ka okwayo go tongi gweno to miyo go thwolgwok?
K'inen win ma wirecho, wiŋeyo miyo nyithindho mewin gimaber, onyo Bawin mani polo oloy win ma rom nedi i miyo joma kwayo go Chuny Maleŋ!”
Gikenyo Yesu oido ryemo woko jwogi mobadha; munyo jwogi no owok, obadha oluwo, aka ji jouro swa.
To joman jowacho ni, “Go ryemo jwogi gi men pa Belzebul, jadwoŋ pa jwogi jye.”
Aka joman, ma temo go, jokwayo go ranen mawok i polo.
To Yesu paka oido oŋeyo paro pajo, owacho ri jo ni, “Ker jye ma won tyakere dyere bino tur, odoko pecho ma won tyakere dyere podho.
Onyo ka Sitan won owire to tyakere dyere, ker pere ochungi nedi? Ato wiwacho ni aryemo jwogi gi men pa Belzebul.
Medo kwoŋ meno, ka kere aryemo jwogi gi men pa Belzebul, nyithindho mewin joryemo jo gi men pa ŋa? Meno amomiyo jobino thumo banja loyo win.
To k'inen aryemo jwogi gi lwet Were, kole meno Ker pa Were otyeko tundo ri win.
Ka dhano ma jameni, manitye gi gilweny, kuro pecho pere, meno gikipiny pere otyek gwoko;
to ka ŋata loyo go gi men omwonji go to kengila go, bino mayo go gilweny monwaŋo go geno to poko jowote gikipiny m'onyaga no.
Ŋata ongoye i thenge paran meno jakwor paran, aka ŋata kikonyan gi choko roombo kanyachiel meno kedho woko ayino.
“Ka chuny mochido owok kwoŋ dhano, kidho i kabedo mothwo mongoy'iye pi munyo rango kaywomirok; to ka konwaŋo kamoro wacho ni, ‘Abino gik i ot paran kama awok'iye.’
Aka ka odwoko to nwaŋo ni ot oywey aka oyik maber,
kidho to omo jwogi wadi man abiryo marecho loyo go, to jodonjo to jobedo kenyo; aka kiti ŋato lokere marach loyo ma yado chon.”
Munyo Yesu owacho ameno, dhako moro okoko i dyer ji ka wacho ri Yesu ni, “Jasilwany a dhako motiŋin i iye, to miyin dhoth.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kuchiel josilwany meno a joma jowinjo wach pa Were to joketho i tim!”
Munyo lwak ji oido medere, Yesu owacho ni, “Luse ji ma pama obedo luse marach; kwayo ranyuth, to ongoye m'ibino miyo jo kwanyo woko ranyuth pa Yona.
Kole paka Yona obedo ranyuth ri ji ma Nineve, apaka Wuodi Dhano bende bino bedo ranyuth ri luse ji ma pama.

Kere ma dhako ma wok i thenge ma yu Tyendi piny bino ay gi luse ji me to kelo kwoŋ jo wach i ndelo ma thumo banja, rupiri go owotho wok i piny mabor bino winjo ryeko pa Solomon; aka awacho ri win, kole ŋatadwoŋ ma loyo Solomon ee ni ka.
I ndelo ma thumo banja, ji ma Nineve jobino chungo to jokelo kwoŋ win wach, rupiri joŋuto gimarecho pajo munyo jowinjo wach ma Yona otito; aka awacho ri win, kole ŋatadwoŋ ma loyo kir Yona ee ni ka!
“Ongoye ŋata chwinyo tala pere to pano kosa umo g'agono; kuchiel go ketho tala no wi meza, aka joma donjo i ot jowonyali neno lero.
Waŋin meno a tala ma delkwoŋin; ka waŋin olama, delkwoŋin gipi bedo maler; to ka kolama, delkwoŋin gipi bende bedo i mudho.
Amomiyo kure aka ŋey lero ma kwoŋin kolokere mudho.
K'inen delkwoŋin ni gi lero mathoth aka ongoye kama di mudho, meno bino bedo maler kichutho, paka tala malyel miyo lero.”
Munyo Yesu fuodi luwo, Jafarisayo moro okwayo go ni wokidhi wochiemiye gine; ri ameno Yesu odonjo i ot pere to bedo dhower.
Jafarisayo no ouro swa munyo oneno nike Yesu kokutho ologo paka chik pajo yenyo aka ochiemo.
To Ruoth owacho ri go ni, “Win Jofarisayo wilwoko ŋey kikopo kodi atewe to woro kodi recho madit ama opoŋ i chuny win.
Ji ma paro pajo chiek! Wiparo ni Were ma chango ochweyo ŋey gimoro ama kochweyo iye bende?
To miyi jochandi gima ni iyi kikopo kodi atewe aka gikipiny no jye bino bedo molony ri win.

“Kidamba otundi ri win, Jofarisayo! Rupiri wimiyo Were achiel kwoŋ apar ma gikipiny machielirok maŋwe kur paka: katungulu, binzari, kodi yen maŋwe kur man, to wijala tiro kodi maro Were; gikipiny me oido wiripo timo ma wikijala man.
“Kidamba otundi ri win, Jofarisayo! Ato wimaro kabedo mamalo i kalamo pa Joyudaya, kodi jolo moth i katale.
Kidamba otundi ri win! Wichalo kalyele ma koketh kwoŋ jo ranyuth aka ji wotho i wiy jo ma jokiŋey.”
Achiel kwoŋ jofuonji ma Chik owacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, k'iwacho ameno kole onyo iyeto wan bende!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kidamba otundi ri win bende, wi jofuonji ma Chik! Wiketho migugu idyeŋey ji ma kiyot tiŋo, to wiwegi wikigey migugu no kada gi lwet chingi win achiel.
Kidamba otundi ri win, kole wigero kalyele pa jotuchi wach Were ma chango bachere mewin joneko.
Ameno wiwegi wibedo joridhi wach no aka wifuoyo gima bachere mewin jotimo; ato jo joneko jo, aka win wigero kalyele pajo.
Amomiyo Ryeko pa Were wacho ni, ‘Abino dhiro ri jo jotuchi wach Were kodi jomikwenda; aka jobino neko megi, joman to jochando.’
Amomiyo ji ma pama ibino ketho kwoŋ jo banja ma oyo remo pa jotuchi wach Were jye wok i chwech ma piny,
chako kwoŋ remo pa Abel tundo i remo pa Zekariya ma joneko i dyer alitar kodi kabedo maleŋ. Ey, awacho ri win, ji ma pama ibino ketho ri jo banja kwoŋ recho no jye!
“Kidamba otundi ri win, jofuonji ma Chik! Wikwanyo rayaw ma thigo ma ot ryeko; to wiwegi wikwero donjo i ot no, odoko wigeŋo joman ma joyenyo donj'iye!”
Munyo Yesu eye kenyo, jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo jochako diyo go tektek, gi temo omo iye gi penji kwoŋ gikipiny mathoth,
kareno jobuto ri go ŋey jowomaki go i wach pere moro.
I hongo no, munyo kweth ji gana gi gana oido jonyonere dho bothe, Yesu okutho ochako wacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Kure win kwoŋ gipa Jofarisayo matiyo pa thow, mobedo rendirok.
Ongoye gima oum ma koyaw i lero, kosa gimopan ma koŋeyere.
Amomiyo gimoro jye ma wimwoŋo i cholo bino winjere i lero, aka gimoro jye ma wimwoŋo i udi nyaliŋliŋ ibino kedho kamaler wi udi malo.
“Awacho ri win, jowotan, wikiri wilwori joma neko del, mato kwoŋ meno ongoye giman ma jonyalo medo timo.
Weyi anyuthi win Ŋata wiripo lworo: lwori win ŋata k'otyeko neko dhano, ni gi men ma bolo i mach makitho; adyeri awacho ri win, lwori wi Go.
“Obicho abich kitana siringi aryo be? To ongoye kada achiel ma Were wiye wil gine.
Medo kwoŋ meno, kir yewiy win jye Were otyeko kwano. Amomiyo wikiri wilwori; kole wiloyo obicho gi welo!
“Aka awacho ri win: dhano jye matucho i dyer ji nike go oyeyan, Wuodi Dhano bende bino tucho go ruwaŋ jomalaika pa Were.
To ŋata okwedere kwaŋan i dyer ji, Wuodi Dhano bende bino kwedirok kwoŋe ruwaŋ jomalaika pa Were.
Nyatoro jye ma luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Wuodi Dhano ibino chwako go; to ŋata oluw gima kotire kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ kibino nwaŋo chwak.
“Ka joteri win i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi i waŋ jodhum kodi ruodhe, wikiri wirembi kwoŋ gima winowachi kosa gima winodwoki.
Kole Chuny Maleŋ bino fuonjo win i hongo no won gima wiripo wacho.”
Ŋatachiel i dyer muma ji owacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, wachi ri omera wopoki kodan gikipiny ma walunjo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Jawodhan, ŋa mokethan jathumi banja mewin, kosa jathek kwoŋ gikipiny mewin?”
To medere wacho ri jono ni, “Kure win, odoko gwokere win kwoŋ woro ma nger jye, rupiri kwo pa dhano kichungi i thotho pa lim ma go ni gine, kada bedi ni go nigi makalo ma go yenyo.”
Gikenyo Yesu oluwo i agecha ama: “Jaŋaŋo moro chango obedo gi ndelo chiemo monyak ri go mathoth swa.
Ameno go oparo g'ichunye ni, ‘Anotimi aŋo, kole angoye gi kaketho kweth chiemo paran me?’
To wacho ni, me a gima onyo aletimo: abino kedho woko dere paran jye t'achweyo madongo loyo, t'akonjo kal paran kodi gikipiny man jye i iye.
Gikenyo abino wacho ri chunyan ni, chunyan, ini gi kweth gikipiny mabeyo modhure rin ma nyalo chowo oro kweth; ikiri ipar gimoro, onyo chiemi, medhi, iyodere!
To Were owacho ri go ni, ‘Mamiŋ me! Kole wor ma konon won me ibino omo chunyin: onyo kweth gikipiny modhure me jye obedi apaŋa?’ ”
Yesu ochowo wachi nike, “Me apaka bedo ri joma jodhuro lim kweth ri syem pa jowegi to jongoye gi ŋaŋo i waŋ Were.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Amomiyo awacho ri win ni wikiri wirembi kwoŋ kwo mewin, gima winochami, kosa kwoŋ delkwoŋ win, gima winoruki.
Kole kwo loyo chiemo, aka delkwoŋ dhano loyo ruk.
Pari win kwoŋ winyin milwoŋo ni agak, jokichwoyi kosa jokechi; jongoye gi dero kosa kachoko chiemo; Were won ama pidho jo! Onyo wiloyo winyin no gi bero didi?
Aka ŋa kwoŋ win ma i rembo pere nyalo medoye hongo ma kwo pere kada masisiri?
To k'inen wikinyal timo gima thin paka meno, raŋo ma wirembo kwoŋ gikipiny man?
Pari win kwoŋ dudi ma thiwe ŋon paka jodongo; jokitiy kosa jotimi ruk pajo. To kada Solomon, gi ŋaŋo pere no jye, oido ongoye gi ruk mabeyo paka achiel kwoŋ dudi me.
To k'inen Were ruko dudi ma konon nitye to dikin iwaŋo i kidhur yuk, onyo Were koruki win loyo dudi no? Apaka yeyo mewin nok ameno!
Amomiyo wikiri wirembi kwoŋ gima winochami kodi gima winomadhi, odoko wikiri wiasa paro.
Kole jokafiri ma piny gipi ama jorango gikipiny no; aka Bawin oŋeyo ni wiyenyo gikipiny me.
Kuchiel, kutho rangi win Ker ma polo, aka go bino miyo win gikipiny no.
“Wikiri wibedi malwor, nyaka roombo paran! Kole Bawin sangala gi miyo win Ker.
Tana win lim mewin jye aka pesa mere wipoki jochandi. Bedi win gi migowe ma kiyechi, aka wikan ŋaŋo mewin i polo kama komojere iye, kendo ongoye jakwo ma nyalo gey'iye, kosa masirigi moro nyiek'iye.
Kole kama ŋaŋo perin ni iye ama chunyin bende bed'iye.
“Rukere win ma tich aka wimoki talin mewin.
Bedi win paka jotich ma jokuro ruoth pajo wodwoki wok i kalima ma nywomirok, ma joyikere yawo thigo tekin go gudo.

Jotich no josilwany ma ruoth pajo onwaŋi jo ni waŋ gin ka go bino. Awacho ri win adyeri, go bino tweyo nanga moro i kore, to bedo piny dhower to poko jo chiemo. Miti go odwoki munyo piny keko kosa munyo ochot;
aka jotich no josilwany ka onwaŋ joyikere.
Ŋeyi win gime, ni bedi won pecho ŋey hongo ma jokwo jobin'iye turo ot pere, di koyeyo kada ŋatachiel turo thigo pere.
Wibende wiripo chungo ma wiyikere, kole Wuodi Dhano ledwoko i hongo ma wikipar ni dwok'iye.”
Petro openjo ni, “Ruoth, iluwo i agecha me kwoŋ wani kosa kwoŋ joman jye?”
Ruoth odwoko ni, “Jatich ma kuro pecho mene maryek? Meno a ŋata ruoth pere oketho go kuro pecho gi poko ji chiemo ka hongo otundo.
Jatich no jasilwany ma ka ruoth pere odwoko bino nwaŋo go i tich.
Adyeri awacho ri win ni go bino ketho ŋato kuro lim pere jye.
To jatich ma won wacho ni, ‘Kole ruoth paran fuodi ogalo gi dwoko,’ to chako goyo wadi machwo gi mamon, to chiemo to medho, to mer,
ruoth pere bino dwoko i ndelo ma go kipar kodi i hongo ma go kuya, aka ruoth pere bino miyo go girachula to loko go achiel kwoŋ joma kigenere.
“Jatich moŋeyo gima ruoth pere yenyo, to fuodi kochako kada timo gino, ibino chwado go matek,

to jatich moido koŋeyo rigo, to bende ripo achwada kiboko ru gim'otimo, ibino chwado go manok. Dhano jye moyim rigo gimoro, ibino mito kwoŋe gimathoth; ato ka oyim ri dhano gimombo gi genirok, bende ibino mito kwoŋe gima loyo meno.
“Abino kelo mach i piny, aka mach ago wany swa ma agomba ni bedi oido otyeko kir chako lyel!
Nitye batisimo ma aripo limo, aka rembo paran dwoŋ swa ka fuodi kotimere!
Wiparo nike akelo syem i piny? Be, awacho ri win, akelo tyakirok ayino.
Kole wok pama, i ot ma di ji abich bino bedo tyakirok: jadek jobino pokirok kwoŋ jaryo.

Baa nyathi bino dak wuode, aka wuodi nyatoro bende bino dak bamere; min nyathi bino dak nyare, nyar nyatoro bende bino dak yokimere; adha nyako manywolo chwore bino dak chi wuode no, chi wuodi nyatoro bende bino dak adhamere.”
Yesu owacho ri ji ni, “Ka wineno pondeponde chokere yu Podhochieŋ, piyo piyo wiwacho ni, ‘Koth kidho chwe,’ to bende timere ameno.
Aka ka wineno koyo ma wok yu Tyendi piny, wiwacho ni, ‘Lyetho leasirok,’ aka bende timere ameno.
Wi jorendirok! Wiŋeyo tito chal pa piny kodi apa pondeponde; to raŋo ma wikinyal tito hongo ma pama?
“To raŋo ma wiwegi wikinyal neno gima otire ma ripere atima?

Ka wimako yo kodi ŋata osa in pa jathumi banja, temi paka inyalo yiko gine wach gi i royo, ka k'ameno go bino terin bongi jathum banja, to jathumi banja dhirin i chingi jaserikale, to jaserikale bolin i twech.
Awacho rin, ikowoki kenyo chuka inochuli pesa kir machowe.”
I hongo no jomogo oido jo ni kenyo ma jowacho ri Yesu kwoŋ Jogalileya ma Pilato oruwo remo pajo kodi mich ma chowirok pajo.
Aka Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Wiparo ni Jogalileya no amoido ji marecho loyo Jogalileya man, rupiri jochandere ameno?
Awacho ri win, ni k'ameno; to ka wikiŋuto gimarecho mewin wibende wibino reyere woko paka jo.
Kosa wiparo ni japar g'aboro ma ot achurchur ma Silowam oryewere kwoŋ jo to neko jo, wiparo nike oido jobedo jomarecho loyo ji jye monwaŋo jonitye Yerusalem?
Awacho ri win, k'ameno, to ka wikiŋuto wibende wibino reyere woko paka jo.”
Yesu oluwo i agecha ni, “Dhano moro oido nitye gi kiti makuyu michamo m'opidho i ndelo vini pere, aka obino rango nyandere mere to konwaŋo.
Ameno owacho ri jadoyi ndelo vini ni, ‘Neni pama onyo oro adek gipi ma ariwin ka rango nyandere wi makuyu me, to akinwaŋi. Onyo toŋi go woko; raŋo ma go nyieko lowo ka?’
Jatich odwoko ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, okutho weyi go kenyo oro me, nyuka anofuri tyende to aketh'iye lowo motop.
Aka ka onyak nyandere oro mabino, meno ber, to ka konyak, aka inotoŋi go woko.’ ”
I ndelo ma Sabato moro, Yesu onwaŋo fuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Aka dhako moro onwaŋo nitye kenyo moido chuny mochido ma two oido nitye kwoŋe aka oido otyeko two oro apar g'aboro; go oido ogwomere ma kinyal ryerok ayi malo.
Munyo Yesu oneno go, olwoŋo go to wacho ri go ni, “Dhako me, pama onyo iboth i two perin.”
Gikenyo munyo Yesu oketho chinge kwoŋe, piyo piyo no to dheno chungo moryere, to pako Were.

To ruoth ma kalamo pa Joyudaya chunye owaŋ rupiri Yesu obotho dheno i Sabato, omiyo owacho ri ji ni, “Ndelo nitye auchiel ma waripo tiy'iye; amomiyo biye win i ndelo no kwayo both, ma kiweno ndelo ma Sabato.”
Ruoth odwoko go ni, “Win, jorendirok! Nitye nyatoro kwoŋ win ma kigony thwon pere kosa punda pere wi loch i ndelo ma Sabato to tero i pi?
To yagi, dhako me ma nyar Ibrayimu, aka Sitan onwaŋo otweyo go kweth oro apar g'aboro gipi, ama d'ikonyal gonyo go i twech me kada nende i ndelo ma Sabato?”
Munyo owacho ameno, jokwor pere jye wichkwot omako jo, kareno ji jye oido josangala ru giraura ma Yesu otimo.
Yesu odoko owacho ni, “Ker pa Were chale kodi aŋo? Anopima g'aŋo won?
Go chalo nyingi kodhi mondhilo ma nyatoro okwanyo to pidho i ndelo pere; aka odongo to lokere yath mombo, to winyin ma malo bino to jogero odi gin i jange.”
Aka odoko owacho ni, “Anopima Ker pa Were g'aŋo kendo?
Go chalo thow ma dhako moro okwanyo to rwako i masiyo adek ma moko m'obak nyuka moko gipi oyenyo.”
Yesu owotho ka fuonjo ji malomalo i tindin kodi i thenge jye munyo chomo yu Yerusalem.
Ŋat moro openjo go ni, “Ruoth, kosa ji manok ama jolebothi?” Yesu odwoko jo ni,
“Temi win paka winyalo donjo gi i dhoot madiny, rupiri awacho ri win ni, ji madit jobino temo donjo to jokonyal.
“Ka won pecho otyeko ay malo to diyo thigo, kada winotemi chungo woko kenyo to wigudo thigo munyo wiwacho ni, ‘Ruoth, yawi ri wan,’ go bino dwoko ni, ‘Akuya ran win kama wiwok'iye.’
Odoko wibino temo wacho ni, ‘Kole chango wachiemo to wamedho kodin kanyachiel; aka ifuonjo kir i tindi mawan.’ To go bino dwoko ni,
‘Akuya ran win kama wiwok'iye. Eye win bongan, wijotimi gimarecho!’
“Gikenyo ywak gi kayo lak bino bedo, kareno wineno Ibrayimu kodi Isaka kodi Yakobo gi jotuchi wach Were i Ker pa Were aka win am'obol win woko.
Aka ji mawok yu Wokchieŋ kodi yu Podhochieŋ yu Wich piny kodi yu Tyendi piny, jobino mako kabedo pajo i kalima i Ker pa Were.
Gikenyo joma pama jobedo machowe ama jobino bedo marapena, aka joma oido marapena ama jobino bedo machowe.”
I hongo no won, Jofarisayo mogo jobino, to jowacho ri Yesu ni, “Eye ka, rupiri Herode mito nekin.”
To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi wiwachi ri kibwe no ni, ‘Kole aryemo woko jwogi aka alechango two konon gi dikin aka ndelo maradek abino chowo tich paran.’
Kada ameno aripo medirok gi woth paran konon gi dikin gi yawere, rupiri kinyalere neko jatuchi wach Were kaman ma kiweno i Yerusalem.
“A ji ma Yerusalem, ma joneko jotuchi wach Were modhir ri jo, aka megi jogoyo jo gi telin! Didi ma atyeko temo choko win bongan aumi win pa min gweno ma umo nyithindhe i bwombe, to wikwero!
Kole Ot pa Were mani kenyo ibino jwango, aka awacho ri win, wikonenan kendo nyuka winowachi ni, ‘Jasilwany a ŋata bino i nyingi Ruoth!’ ”
I ndelo ma Sabato moro, Yesu okidho chiemo i ot pa achiel kwoŋ Jofarisayo madongo; aka ji joryeko waŋ gin kwoŋe tektek.
Gikenyo dhano moro ma tyende gi chinge oido obumbere obino bongi Yesu,
to Yesu luwo malo munyo penjo jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo ni, “Chik mawan yeyo botho dhano i ndelo ma Sabato, kosa be?”
To joliŋ aliŋa. Yesu okwanyo ŋato, obotho go to sewila go.
Aka Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Ŋa kwoŋ win ma ka punda pere kosa thwon pere opodho i dago maluth i ndelo ma Sabato, di kinyal ywayo to wodho woko mayot?”
To jokonyalo dwoko go wach no.
Munyo Yesu oneno paka wendo joyero kabedo mamalo, oluwo ri jo i agecha ni,
“Ka olwoŋin i kalima ma nywomirok, ikiri iyer kabedo mamalo, ipoyo ŋat man ma loyin gi dwoŋ bende olwoŋ;
ameno ŋata olwoŋo win nyalo bino to wacho rin ni, ‘Weyi kabedo no ri ŋat me.’ Gikenyo, ibino ay gi wichkwot madwoŋ, t'ikowere i kabedo ma piny loyo.

Kuchiel, k'ibedo wendo, chomi yu kabedo ma piny t'ibedo kenyo, aka ka ŋata olwoŋo win obino, ama wowachi rin ni, ‘Jawodhan, choreye yu malo kacha.’ Ameno dhano jye mani kodin dhower kenyo bino miyin dwoŋ.
Ato ŋata won miyere dwoŋ ibino dwoko piny, aka ŋata won bwonere ama ibino miyo dwoŋ.”

Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jadwoŋ molwoŋo go ni, “Ka iyiko kalima ri ji, ikiri ilwoŋ merin perin kosa wutimerin kosa wade perin kosa joger perin ma joŋaŋ kende, rupiri jono jonyalo chulin kemba munyo bende jolwoŋin.
To ka iyiko kalima madwoŋ, lwoŋi jochandi, joma giyagiya, jomoŋol kodi joma waŋ gin otho bende,
aka inolimi silwany, rupiri jono mere jokonyal chulin kemba moro, to Were won ama bino chulin i ndelo ma jomaleŋ jobino chierin'iye.”
Munyo achiel kwoŋ jomobedo dhower gi Yesu owinjo gime, owacho ri Yesu ni, “Jasilwany a ŋata ocham mugat i Ker pa Were.”
To Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Dhano moro chango otimo kalima madwoŋ, to lwoŋo ji mathoth.
Aka i hongo ma chiemo, go odhiro jotich pere wacho ri joma go olwoŋo ni, ‘Biye win, kole gimoro jye otyeko yikere.’
To jojye jochako kwayo chwak ayino. Ŋat marapena owacho ni, ‘Atyeko nyiewo lowo, aka aripo kidho neno; akwayin ichwaki ran.’
Ŋat man owacho ni, ‘Atyeko nyiewo megikwe abich, aka onyo akidho temo jo; akwayin ichwaki ran.’
Ŋat man owacho ni, ‘Kole nyaka anywomo manyien, ri ameno akinyali bino.’

Gikenyo jatich no ogik to dwoko wach ri ruoth pere. Won pecho owacho ri jatich pere no gi nge ni, ‘Kidhi i royo madwoŋ kodi i royo jye mokakere i tindi, idwoki kodi jochandi gi jomomyenere gi joma waŋ gin otho kodi jomoŋol.’
To jatich no owacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ gima iwacho no jye otyeko timere, to fuodi kabedo nitye modoŋ.’
Aka won pecho odoko owacho ri jatich no ni, ‘Kidhi i royo man woko ma tindi kodi i thengi royo mogo jye, ilwoŋi ji jowobin i ot paran, ot wopoŋi.
Awacho ri win ni ongoye moro kwoŋ joma onwaŋo otel lwoŋo jo mobil chiemo paran.’ ”
Gikenyo kweth ji moasere oido jokwaŋo Yesu; aka Yesu owire oŋiyo yu chien to wacho ri jo ni,
“Moro jye ma bino bongan kinyal bedo jafuonjirok paran ma k'okutho okwero bamere gi yokimere, kodi chiege, kodi nyithindho pere gi wutimin gi nyimin, kir gi kwo pere won.
Ŋata won kitiŋi musalaba pere aka luwan, kinyal bedo jafuonjirok paran.
Ere ŋa kwoŋ win ma ka mito gero ot achurchur, kikuthi bedi piny to kwano welo pesa ma mitere, to neno ka nyalo chowo tich no kosa be?
Ka kameno, ka go otyeko gero tyendi ot, to chowo mere dhyero go, ji jye ma joneno geto no jobino chako nyiero go,
ka jowacho ni, ‘Neni win, ŋatin orikin chako geto gima go konyalo chowo.’
Kosa, kere mene ma ka kidho romo gi kere man i lweny, kikuthi bedi piny to rango ryeko paka go nyalo kwanyo jolweny gana apar kidho romo gi ŋat cha mani gi jolweny gana pyero aryo?
Aka k'oneno ni kinyali, ka kere man cha fuodi ni boriye, to dhiro ri go jamikwenda wokwayi winjirok ma syem i dyer jo ayin.
Amomiyo, i dyer win ŋata kimaran loyo gimoro jye ma go ni gine, meno kinyal bedo jafuonjirok paran.
“Chumbi ber, to ka chwe mere orumo woko, bero no odoko ogiki nedi?
Chumbi no ngoye kony ri lowo kosa ri kidhur yuk matopo lowo; ikonjo woko ayin. Ŋata ni gi ithe ma winjo wowinji.”
Ndelo moro jochoki misolo kodi jomarecho mogo jobino bongi Yesu winjo go.
Gikenyo Jofarisayo kodi jofuonji ma Chik jochako kigesa ni, “Ŋat me jolo jomarecho aka chiemo kir gi jo!”
Amomiyo, Yesu oluwo ri jo i agecha ama:
“Ŋa kwoŋ win ma ka nitye gi roombo miya achiel, aka achiel rwenyi, kiwey pyero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen i saa to kidho rango morwenyo cha chuka onwaŋi?
Aka ka otyeko nwaŋo rombo no, tiŋo i goke gi kisangala.
Gikenyo ka otundo pecho lwoŋo merin gi joger pere munyo wacho ni, ‘Biye sangala win kodan, rupiri atyeko nwaŋo rombo paran moido orwenyo.’
Ameno bende awacho ri win, kisangala bino asirok i polo maloyo ru ŋatachiel ma ŋuto recho pere loyo ji motire pyero abuŋwen g'abuŋwen ma kiyenyere ri jo ŋuto kendo.
“Kosa dhako mene ma ka nitye gi jegejege pesa ma siringi apar to rwenyo achiel, kichwiny tala, to yweyo ot, to rango maber swa iye jye chuka nwaŋo?
Aka ka onwaŋo pesa no, lwoŋo merin gi joger pere kanyachiel munyo wacho ri jo ni, ‘Biye sangala win kodan, rupiri anwaŋo pesa paran moido orwenyo.’
Ameno bende awacho ri win, kisangala nitye ri jomalaika pa Were ka jagimarach achiel oŋuto recho pere.”
Yesu omedo wacho ni, “Jal moro oido nitye gi wote aryo;
wuode mathin owacho ri bamere ni, ‘Baba, miyan pama lim jye ma aripo lunjo.’ Gikenyo baa jo opoko go lim pere.
Ndelo okadho manok, to wuode mathin no choko lim pere jye monwaŋo go ni gine, to kadho wiloka mabor, to nyieko woko lim pere no i kwo marach.
Aka munyo ochowo nyieko woko gimoro jye, kech madwoŋ odonjo i piny no to go bedo ma bu gimoro.
Gikenyo go okidho bedo paka misemel pa nyatoro i piny no to miyo go tich kwayo mbiji.
Aka go d'osangala chamo amola majanjal ma mbiji chamo, to moro ongoye momiyo go gimoro.
To munyo oparo i chunye, owacho ni, ‘Kole jotich pa baba jye jo ni gi chiemo ma jochamo denge to doŋ; to raŋo ma akidho tho kech ama!
Aleay mayot t'adok bongi baba t'awacho ri go ni, baba, atyeko nyieko i waŋ Were kodi i waŋin.
Pama akiripi kada alwoŋa ni wuodin kendo; teran paka achiel kwoŋ jotich perin.’
Gikenyo go oay mayot to chako woth ma dok bongi bamere. “To munyo fuodi go nitye bor ye gi pecho, bamere oneno go; wor opoŋ i chunye to ringo, to podho i kor wuode to chwiyo lembe.
Gikenyo wuode owacho ni, ‘Baba, atyeko timo gimarach i nyim Were kodi i nyimin. Pama akiripi kada alwoŋa ni wuodin.’
To bamere olwoŋo jotich pere munyo wacho ni, ‘Redi win! Keli win ruk mabeyo jye wirwaki ri go. Rwaki win ri go peta i lwet chinge gi war i tyende;
aka kidhi wikel rwath dhyaŋ machwe no wineki, aka weyi konon wachami kalima.
Kole wuodan me oido otyeko tho to pama onyo kwo; onwaŋo otyeko rwenyo to pama onyo onwaŋere.’ Gikenyo to kalima chakere.
“I hongo no wuode madwoŋ oido nitye i ndelo. To munyo dwoko aka oido chiegin riko pecho, owinjo wer gi myel.
Gikenyo olwoŋo jatich achiel to penjo go ni, ‘Aŋo matimere?’
Jatich odwoko ni, ‘Omerin ama odwoko pecho, aka benin oneko rwath machwe cha, rupiri wuode odwoko maber, kendo molama.’
Omin madwoŋ nge omako to kwero kir donjo i ot; gikenyo bamere owok woko to temo naŋo go ni wodonji.
To go odwoko bamere ni, ‘Wowe! Atyeko tich rin kweth oro me jye, ma akichayin kada dichiel, to kole ongoye kada nyathi dyel m'imiyan nike bende atimiye gine kalima ri merin paran.
Aka wuodin monyieko lim perin gi mon ma jotana delkwoŋ jo i timo gi wichkwot me, ama onyo odwoko pecho to ineko ri go rwath dhyaŋ machwe!’
Bamere odwoko go ni, ‘Wuodan, kole ndelo jye ini kodan pecho ka, aka gimoro jye mani gine meno aperin.
Aka oido ripere ni watim kalima wasangala ye; kole omin in me onwaŋo otyeko tho, to pama onyo kwo; onwaŋo otyeko rwenyo, to pama onyo onwaŋere.’ ”
Yesu odoko owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Obedo jaŋaŋo moro monwaŋo nitye gi jakur mowachi ri go ni nyieko anyieka lim pere.
Go olwoŋo ŋato to penjo go ni, ‘Awinjo aŋo me kwoŋin? Titi ran kwan kwoŋ tich perin ma kur, rupiri ikile bedo jakur kendo.’
Gikenyo jakur no won owacho kende ni, ‘Paka ruoth paran onyo kwanyo woko kwoŋan tich ma kur, anotim aŋo? Angoye gi men ma fur, aka wiyan kwot kir kidho kwayirok. Bedo ran wichkwot madwoŋ.
Ka ameno, awon aŋeyo gima aletimo ma kada oryeman i tich jomogo jobino jolan i pechin pajo.’
Gikenyo go othumo ryeko to lwoŋo joma jo ni gi banjin pa ruoth pere achielechiele. Ri marapena, owacho ni, ‘Ruoth paran banja in aŋo?’
Ana ŋato ni, ‘Jerikan miya achiel ma mo wuto.’ Jakur no owacho ni, ‘Ere kwanyi papila perin ma chikirok, ibedi piny mayot aka indiki pyero abich ayino.’
Ri ŋat man, owacho ni, ‘To in ini gi banja aŋo?’ Ana ŋato ni, ‘Gunia miya achiel ma kal.’ Jakur no owacho ni, ‘Ere kwanyi papila perin machikirok indiki pyero aboro ayino.’
Ruoth opako jakur ma kigenere no mato go othumo ryeko; ato nyithindho ma piny me joryek i tim pajo wegi loyo nyithindho ma lero.”
Yesu omedo wacho ni, “Awacho ri win, maki win mere ka wioro ŋaŋo ma kotire ma piny, aka k'orumo aka ibino jolo win i kabedo ma chil gi chil.
Dhano ma genere i gikipiny mathindho ibino geno go i gimadwoŋ; ŋata kigenere i gikipiny mathindho kogen go i gimadongo.
Amomiyo ka wikinyalo genirok i ŋaŋo ma kotire ma piny ka, ŋa ma di gen win gi ŋaŋo maradyeri?
Aka ka ikinyalo genirok i gikipiny pa ŋat man, ŋa m'omiyin gim'obedi aperin won?
“Ongoye jatich ma nyalo bedo ŋecha pa ruodhe aryo; go bino dak achiel to maro man: bino woro achiel to chayo man. Ikinyal tiyo ri Were kodi ri pesa bende.”
Jofarisayo jowinjo gikipiny me jye, aka jonyiero Yesu rupiri oido jomaro pesa.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Winyuthere ri ji ni wibeyo, to Were oŋeyo chuny win. Kole gima ji paro ni ber moasere, ama bedo gima ongoye kir gi kony i waŋ Were.
“Chik pa Musa kodi ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were obedo gi men tundo i ndir pa Yohana Jakibatisa; wok i ndir no Wach Maber ma Ker pa Were ochak tito, aka dhano jye rire donj'iye gi maker.
To yot ri polo gi piny reyirok, ma kiweno nyieko woko kada nyaka adech mondhilo kwoŋ Chik.
“Dhano jye ma ryemo chiege to nywomo dhako man meno timo chot; aka ŋata nywomo dhako ma chwore oryemo bende timo chot.
“Chango obedo jaŋaŋo moro ma ruko nangin mawelo mamalo swa aka chamo chiemo mawelo tektek ndir jye.
Aka jachandi moro ma nyinge Lazaro bin ryewere piny dho waŋkach pere, kareno adhola odheth kwoŋe gipi.
Go oido kuro chamo nyaka ŋinjeŋinje chiemo mapodho piny wok i dhower pa jaŋaŋo no; aka ameno gwokere bende jobino to jonaŋo adholin pere.
Ndelo otundo ma jachandi no otho to jomalaika jotiŋo go, to jotero go bothi Ibrayimu, i polo; jaŋaŋo bende otho tiyiko.
Munyo go oido nitye i litho madwoŋ swa i piny pa jomotho, otiŋo waŋe malo to neno Ibrayimu gi bor koro, kodi Lazaro kabute.
Gikenyo olwoŋo go ni, ‘Baba Ibrayimu! Makiye kodan wor idhir ran Lazaro wobili lwet chinge i pi wokweyi ran gine lewan, rupiri ani litho madwoŋ i mach me!’

To Ibrayimu odwoko ni, ‘Wuodan, poyi ni i kwo perin ma piny ilimo gikipiny perin mabeyo, to Lazaro olimo gikipiny marecho kendekende; amomiyo pama onyo ikweyo chunye ka, aka in onyo iŋati initye i litho.
To ki meno kende, okethi bur mwombe maluth swa i dyer wan kodi win mageŋo ŋat moro jye ma d'omiti ŋondo wok i thenge mawan bino yu bongi win, kosa wok i thenge mewin bino yu bongi wan korin’
Aka jaŋaŋo owacho ni, ‘Baba, ere onyo aywak rin ni ori Lazaro pecho thuwan pa baba,
kama anityeye gi wutimin an abich; wokidhi wonyuthi jo ŋey bende kiri jowobin kama di litho ma kiwachere me.’
Ibrayimu owacho ni, ‘Kole jonitye gi fuonji pa Musa kodi apa jotuchi wach Were; weyi wutimin in jowowinji fuonji pa jono.’
Jaŋaŋo owacho ni, ‘Bee, baba Ibrayimu, to ka nyatoro mowok bothi jomotho okidho bongi jo aka jobino ŋuto recho pajo.’
To Ibrayimu wacho ri go ni, ‘Ka jokonyal winjo wach pa Musa kodi apa jotuchi wach Were, meno bende jokowinji ma kada nende nyatoro ayi wok bongi jomotho to kidho.’ ”
Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Gikipiny ma miyo ji podho i gimarach ripo bino; to kidamba bino bedo ri ŋata omiy gikipiny no timirok!
D'ober ri go bedi twey kidi mombo i ŋute tibolo go i wakawaka, loyo go kidho miyo achiel kwoŋ nyaka jomathindho me timo gimarach.
Kure wini! Ka omerin timo gimarach, kweri rigo, aka ka oŋuti, chwaki go.
Ka otimo rin marach dibiryo ndelo achiel, aka hongo jye go bino bongin ka wacho ni aŋuto, chwaki go.”
Jomoor jowacho ri Ruoth ni, “Medi ri wan yeyo mawan.”
Ruoth odwoko ni, “Bedi winitye gi yeyo kada mathin paka nyingi kalantus di wiwacho ri yath madwoŋ me ni, ‘Fudhere woko gi tyendin ikidhi ipiidhere i dyer wakawaka, d'owinjo win.’ ”
“Bedi moro kwoŋ win nitye gi jatich ma furo, kosa ma kwayo roombo, iparo ni ka jatich no odwoko wok i ndelo, d'owacho ri go ni, ‘Redi mayot i bedi piny ikutho ichiemi?’
Kameno be! Kuchiel d'owacho ri go ni, ‘Kutho iyiki ran chiemo mothyeno, itweyi nanga i korin, ikuran ka achiemo aka amadho giramadha, ŋey nyaka inochiem rumachien.
Odoko, i paro ni di go ofuoyo jatich no ka otimo gimoor go?’
Ameno win bende ka wityeko timo gimoro jye mowach ri win, wiripo wacho ni, ‘Wabedo ri wan nyaka jotich aticha, aka wachowo timo nyaka tich monwaŋo ripere watim kende.’ ”
Munyo Yesu oido kidho Yerusalem, oluwo gi i kew ma poko Samarya kodi Galileya.
Aka munyo go oido nyaka donjo loka moro, jodhowo mogo japar joromo gine. Jochungo giborbor
to jokoko ri go ni, “Yesu, Jafuonji! Timi ri wan wor.”
Munyo Yesu oneno jo, owacho ri jo ni, “Kidhi winyuthere i waŋ jochwayi ri Were wi alitar.” Gikenyo munyo fuodi jowotho jokadho to del kwoŋgin lokere molony.
Ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo, munyo oneno ni kwoŋe ochango, ogik chien munyo pako Were gi derino madwoŋ swa,
to podho piny dho katyendi Yesu to fuoyo go. Jalo oido obedo Jasamarya.
Gino omiyo Yesu openjo ni, “Alwoŋo ni ji apar jye jolony; to jabuŋwen man jo ni kune?
Ongoye ŋata onyalo gik bino fuoyo Were kwanyo woko japath me kende?”
Aka owacho ri jalo ni, “Ayi malo imaki royo perin; yeyo perin otyeko bothin.”
Jofarisayo megi jopenjo Yesu ndir ma Ker pa Were obin'iye. Go odwoko ni, “Ker pa Were kilebino i royo ma nenere.
Ongoye ŋata bino wacho ni, ‘Neni, ee ni ka, kosa ni kacha,’ rupiri Ker pa Were nitye i dyer win won ka.”
Aka owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Hongo bino tundo ma wibino kiwany'iye neno kada nyaka ndelo achiel kwoŋ ndir pa Wuodi Dhano, to wikibino neno.
Nitye joma jobino wacho ri win ni, ‘Neni, go dicha!’ kosa ni ‘Neni, go ee ka!’ To wikiri wiay ni wikidho rango go.
Kole paka lithkoth pilin i pondeponde aka menyo thenge gi thenge, apaka Wuodi Dhano bende obedi i ndelo pere.
To go ripo kutho chandirok tektek, ji ma ndir me jowokweri go.
Paka chango obedo i ndir pa Nowa apaka bende bino bedo i ndir pa Wuodi Dhano.
Dhano jye onwaŋo chiemo, medho, aka chwo gi mon jonywomere chuka ndelo otundo ma Nowa odonj'iye i yee, aka mikula obino to neko woko ji jye ma piny.
Odoko bino bedo paka i ndir pa Lot bende. Dhano jye oido chiemo, medho, nyiewere kendo tana, furo chiemo aka geto.
To ndelo ma Lot owok'iye Sodom, mach ma lyel ochwe piny wok i polo to neko woko ji jye ma kenyo.
Meno apaka bende lebedo i ndelo ma Wuodi Dhano bino nyuther'iye.
“I ndelo no, ŋata nitye malo wi ot wokiri wolori ni donjo i ot kwanyo gikipiny pere mani kenyo; ameno bende, ŋata nitye i ndelo wokiri wodwoki pecho.
Poyi win chipa Lot!
Ŋata temo botho kwo pere bino rwenyo woko; ŋata rwenyo woko kwo pere ama bino botho.
Wor no, awacho ri win, ji aryo jobino nindo i kanindo achiel; ŋatachiel ibino kwanyo tiweyo ŋat man kenyo.
Mon aryo jobino rego kanyachiel; achiel ibino kwanyo tiweyo nyawote kenyo.
[Chwo aryo jobino bedo i ndelo: ŋatachiel ibino kwanyo, tiweyo nyawote kenyo.”]
Gikenyo jofuonjirok jopenjo go ni, “Kune, Ruoth?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Kama lee motho ni iye, ama achut jochoker'iye.”
Yesu oluwo ri jofuonjirok pere i agecha kwoŋ riwin i kwayo ma chuny jo koŋedhere ni:
“Chango obedo jathumi banja achiel i tindi moro, ma kolworo Were kendo koworo dhano.
I tindi no won, oido nitye chi tho moro momena bino bothe ka wacho ni, ‘Amito ithekan gi jakwor paran!’
Hongo malach okadho ma jalo fuodi onwaŋo kwero akwera, to rumachien won owacho gi i chunye ni, ‘Kada nende akilwor Were kendo akiwor dhano,
to ru mijokere pa chi tho me, aripo miyo go gima ripere ri go, ka kameno go bino kimena jokan tundo tho.’ ”
Aka Ruoth owacho ni, “Wineno gima jathumi banja mongoye g'adyeri no ojok owacho?
Onyo Were ama konen giratima ri ji pere moyer, ma jogoyo ri go koko wor g'odyechieŋ? Wiparo ni go bino galo tektek gi konyo jo?
Aridho ri win ni go bino neno gima ber wotimi ri jo, kendo bino timo ameno i yoto. To chieŋ ma Wuodi Dhano odwok'iye, onwaŋi yeyo moro i pinyi?”
Yesu oluwo i agecha ri ji ma joŋoyo ni jobeyo i chuny gin aka jochayo wadi gin ama:
“Ji mogo jokidho jaryo i Ot pa Were kwayo; ŋatachiel Jafarisayo, aka ŋat man jachoki misolo.
Jafarisayo ochungo to kwayo ni, ‘Were afuoyin nike akichal jomegi ma jomayi ji gikipiny, jodiyi wadi gin, jochot paka ji man, aka maloyo meno akichal jachoki misolo me.
Ariyo kech diryo i sabiti achiel; achulo achiel ma wiy apar kwoŋ gima alimo jye.’
To jachoki misolo ochungo gibor ma kotemo kada tiŋo wiye malo yu polo; to ogoyo kore ayino ka wacho ni, ‘Were, maki kodan wor, a jagimarach.’
Awacho ri win, jal me odok pecho munyo otire i waŋ Were loyo Jafarisayo no. Ato ŋata won miyere dwoŋ ibino bwono, to ŋata bwonere ama ibino miyo dwoŋ.”
Ji mogo oido jokelo nyithindho pajo bende ni Yesu wokethi chinge kwoŋ jo; to munyo jofuonjirok joneno ameno, joay kwoŋ jono ni jonyieko timo ameno.
To Yesu olwoŋo nyithindho no bothe, to wacho ni, “Weyi win nyithindho jowobin bongan! Wikiri wigeŋi jo, rupiri Ker pa Were obedo apa joma pameno.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ŋata kijol Ker pa Were paka nyathi kibino donj'iye.”
Achiel kwoŋ jodhum pa Joyudaya openjo ni, “Jafuonji maber, mitere atim aŋo ŋey alim kwo makirum?”
Yesu openjo go ni, “Raŋo m'ilwoŋan ni maber? Ongoye ŋataber kwanyo woko Were won.
Iŋeyo Or pa Were me: ‘Ikiri itim chot; ikiri ikwali; ikiri ineki, lwori benin gi yokin.’ ”
Ŋato owacho ni, “Wok i thino paran amako Or no jye.”
Munyo Yesu owinjo gim'owacho me, owacho ri go ni, “To fuodi mitere rin timo gimoro achiel. Tana woko lim perin jye, ipoki jochandi pesa mere, aka ibino limo ŋaŋo i polo, ŋey nyaka ibin iluwan.”
To munyo ŋato owinjo wach no ogut swa, rupiri go oido oasa ŋaŋo.
Munyo Yesu oneno nike go ogut, owacho ni, “Tek swa ri jaŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were!
Tek swa ri jaŋaŋo donjo i Ker pa Were loyo kayina donjo i yore piso.”
Ji ma jowinjo wach me jopenjo ni, “To ŋa won ma nyalo both?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Gima kinyalere ri ji, nyalere ri Were.”
Gikenyo Petro owacho ni, “Panen, kole watyeko weyo pechin mawan waluwin.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Ey, to awacho ri win ama: ongoye ŋata owey pecho pere kosa chiege kosa wutimin kosa jonywol kosa nyithindho pere ru Ker pa Were
ma kibino limo gimadit loyo, i ndir mapama kodi kwo makirum i ndir mabino.”
Yesu otero jofuonjirok pere gichien to wacho ri jo ni, “Neni win, onyo wakidho Yerusalem kama gimoro jye ma jotuchi wach Were jondiko kwoŋ Wuodi Dhano bino timer'iye.
Ibino bolo go i chingi Jopath, ma jobino nyiero go, yeto go, gi ŋulo kwoŋe law.
Jobino chwado go to joneko go, to i ndelo maradek ibino chierino go.”
Jofuonjirok jokoniaŋ dwoŋ wach me; dwoŋ wach me opan ri jo, aka jokoŋeyo gima Yesu oido luwo kwoŋe.
Munyo Yesu oriko Yeriko, ŋat moro ma waŋe otho onwaŋo obedo piny i thengi royo kwayere.
Munyo ŋato owinjo muma ji kadho, openjo ni, “Aŋo ma timere?”
Jowacho ri go ni, “Yesu Janazareth ama kadho i royo ka.”
Gikenyo ŋato okoko malo ni, “Yesu, Wuodi pa Daudi, maki kodan wor!”
Ji moido jotelo jobwoko go to jowacho ri go ni woliŋi. To go omedo koko malo ayin ni, “Wuodi pa Daudi, maki kodan wor!”
Gikenyo Yesu ochungo to oro jo kelo ŋata waŋe otho no bonge. Munyo otundo chiegin, Yesu openjo go ni,
“Iyenyo atimi rin aŋo?” Go odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, amito neno kendo.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Chaki neno, yeyo perin obothin.”
Gikenyo won to ŋato chako neno, to luwo Yesu, munyo fuoyo Were. Munyo ji jye joneno gime, jopako Were.
Yesu odonjo Yeriko aka oido wotho i dyer tindi.
Nyatoro ma nyinge Zakayo oido ni kenyo; go oido obedo achiel kwoŋ jochoki misolo madongo kendo ŋataoŋaŋ.
Onwaŋo go yenyo swa ŋeyo Yesu ni obedo dhano manedi, to onwaŋo oasa chieko ma konyalo neno go ru kweth ji.
Ri ameno go oyombere yu malo to idho musikamol ni wonyali neno Yesu moido kidho luwo kenyo.
Munyo Yesu otundo kanyago oŋiyo malo to luwo gine; owacho ni, “Zakayo, lori, kwakere rupiri aripo bedo i ot perin konon.”
Go oloro mayot to jolo Yesu gi kisangala.
To ji jochako kiŋunyaŋunya munyo joneno gima timere. Jowacho ni, “Jame okidho wendo ri jagimarach.”
To Zakayo oay ochungo to wacho ri Ruoth ni, “Jadwoŋ, akidho miyo jochandi adech ma lim paran, odoko ka nitye nyatoro ma atyeko diyo kwoŋe gipere akidho dwoko ri go ma kalo meno diŋwen.”
Aka Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Konon both otyeko bino i ot me, paka jame bende obedo nyakwar Ibrayimu;
kole Wuodi Dhano obino dwaro gi botho jomorwenyo.”
Munyo fuodi jowinjo wach no, Yesu omedo luwo ri jo i agecha rupiri go oido oriko Yerusalem, aka ji oido joparo ni Ker pa Were kidho tundo piyo no won.
Ri ameno Yesu owacho ni, “Chango obedo jadwoŋ moro mokidho i piny mabor ni woloki go kere aka nyaka wodwoki pecho.
Ma fuodi go koay, olwoŋo jotich pere apar bothe to miyo dhano jye kwoŋ jo siringi gana achielechiele, to wacho ni, ‘Tiyi win gine wonywoli magowa nyuka anodwoki.’
To paka anywola ma piny no oido jodak ŋato, jodhiro jomikwenda pajo kidho wacho ni, ‘Wakimiti jalo wobedi kere mawan.’
“Jadwoŋ no oloki go kere to ay dwoko. Piyo piyo olwoŋo jotich pere m'omiyo pesa bino bonge ka mito ŋeyo magowa ma jolimo.
Jatich marapena obino to wacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, alimo gana apar kwoŋ gana achiel m'imiyan.’
Go owacho ni, ‘Itimo maber, ijatich maber! Paka inyutho genirok i gimathin, onyo abino kethin kuro tindi apar.’
Jatich mararyo obino to wacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, alimo magowa ma siringi gana abich kwoŋ pesa m'imiyan.’
Go owacho ri ŋat me ni, ‘Ibino kuro tindi abich.’
Gikenyo jatich machowe obino to wacho ni, ‘Jadwoŋ, siringi gana achiel perin ee; akano mopanere i kitambala.
Ato onwaŋo alworin, rupiri in idhano ma jamahembi. Ikwanyo gima iŋati ikiketho, aka ikecho gima iŋati ikichwoyo.’
Jalo owacho ri ŋato ni, ‘Ijatich marach, abino thumo rin banja chungo kwoŋ wach perin won! Kere iŋeyo nike abedo jamahembi; ni akwanyo gima akiketho, aka akecho gima akichwoyo;
to raŋo ma ikiketho pesa paran i kakan, di ka adwoko d'anwaŋo omedere?’
Gikenyo go owacho ri joma onwaŋo jochungo kenyo ni, ‘Kwanyi win woko pesa no kwoŋe aka wimiyi jatich manitye gi gana apar cha!’
To jowacho ri go ni, ‘Jadwoŋ kole go ni gi siringi gana apar.’
To go odwoko ni, ‘Awacho ri win, moro jye ma nitye gi gimoro ibino medo go; to ŋata ongoye gine, kada nyaka mathin ma go ni gine ibino kwanyo kwoŋe.
Aka jokwor paran ma jokweran bedo kere pajo no keli win ka wineki jo ruwaŋan!’ ”
Munyo Yesu otyeko wacho gime, otelo kadho ri jo Yerusalem.
Munyo go oriko Bethfage gi Bethaniya, dho got Olivet, odhiro jofuonjirok aryo yu wiye
munyo wacho ni, “Kidhi win loka ma yu wiy win; ka widonjo loka no wibino nwaŋo nyathi punda motwey ma fuodi dhano kobedo wiye, wigonyi to wikelo ka.
Ka dhano openjo win ni, ‘Wigonyo punda no raŋo?’ Wiwachi ri go ni, ‘Ruoth ama yenyo.’ ”
Jokadho to jonwaŋo gimoro jye paka Yesu owacho ri jo.
Munyo jogonyo nyathi punda no, wegi mere jopenjo jo ni, “Wigonyo punda no raŋo?”
Jodwoko ni, “Ruoth ama yenyo”;
to jotero nyathi punda no ri Yesu. Gikenyo jobolo nangin pajo wi kayina no to joketho Yesu i wiye.
Munyo Yesu kadho, jopedho nengin pajo i royo malomalo.
Aka munyo Yesu oriko Yerusalem dho kama royo lor'iye yu Got ma Olivet, jofuonjirok pere mathoth jochako fuoyo Were gi pako go gi dwondi gin mamalo ru gikipiny madongo ma jotyeko neno.
Jowacho ni, “Silwany wobedi ri Kere ma bino i nyingi Ruoth! Syem wobedi i polo, aka dwoŋ wobedi ri Were mani malo swa!”
Gikenyo Jofarisayo mogo i dyer lwak ji jowacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, wachi ri jofuonjirok perin jowoliŋi!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ka joliŋ, awacho ri win, telin ama jobino koko.”
Yesu otundo chiegin gi tindi aka munyo oneno tindi no, oywako
munyo wacho ni, “Bedi kada konon won iŋey gima d'okelo rin syem! To gino opanere ri waŋin.
Kole ndelo bino tundo ma jokwor perin jobino kuny'iye bur wugo thokin to jochiegin iye jye.
Jobino reyin woko kichutho gi ji ma nitye i chiel perin; ongoye tele kada achiel ma jowey i wiy nyawote, rupiri ikinyalo ŋeyo ndir ma Were owend'iye rin.”
Yesu odonjo i Ot pa Were to chako ryemo woko jomiten
munyo wacho ri jo ni, “Ondik ni, ‘Ot paran ibino lwoŋo ni Ot makwayo.’ Ama onyo wiloko ŋungu mapondo pa jokwo ayin.”
Yesu ofuonjo i Ot pa Were kis ndelo. Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, jofuonji ma Chik, kodi jotel pa ji oido joyenyo neko go,
to jokonwaŋo yo ma timo ameno, rupiri ji jye oido jochiko ithi gin winjo go gi maro madit.
Ndelo moro munyo Yesu oido nitye i Ot pa Were fuonjo ji aka luwo kwoŋ Wach Maber, jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik kanyachiel gi jotel pa ji jobino,
to jopenjo go ni, “Wachi ri wan, men aŋo m'ini gine ma timo gikipiny me, kosa ŋa m'omiyin men ma timo gikipiny me?”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Weyi abende apenji win penji moro. Wachi ran win,
men pa Yohana ma miyo ji batisimo owok bongi Were kosa bongi dhano?”
Gikenyo wegi jochako pyem kendigin ni, “Wawachi nedi? Ka wanowachi ni owok bongi Were, go bino wacho ni, ‘To raŋo ma wikiyeyo Yohana?’
Odoko ka wanowachi ni, ‘Owok bongi dhano,’ ji gi bee jobino goyo wan gi telin, rupiri joŋeyo ni Yohana oido jatuchi wach Were.”
Ri ameno jowacho ni, “Wakuya kama men no owok'iye.”
Aka Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Amomiyo abende akowachi ri win kama anwaŋ'iye men ma atimo gine gikipiny me.”
Gikenyo Yesu oluwo ri ji i agecha ama: “Dhano moro opidho ndelo vini to ketho i chingi jokur, to kadho wiloka ma hongo mabor.
Munyo ndir otundo ma fuono vini, ooro ŋecha pere bongi jokur nike jowolimi ri go gimonyak megi. To jokur jogoyo ŋecha no ayino to joryemo go to dok gi chinge nono.
To go odoko ooro ŋecha man, ma bende jokur jogoyo, jotimo go kichar, to joryemo go to dok gi chinge nono.
To go odoko ooro ŋecha maradek; ma jokur joketho kwoŋe poyo bende, to jobolo go woko koro.
Gikenyo won ndelo vini owacho ni, ‘Anotim aŋo? Abino oro wuodan won mamaro; adyeri jobino miyo go dwoŋ!’
To munyo jokur joneno go, jowacho wegi kendigin ni, ‘Me won a musika pa won ndelo. Weyi waneki aka ndelo vini wodoŋi mawan!’
Gikenyo jobolo go woko ma ndelo vini to joneko go. “Onyo wiparo ni aŋo ma won ndelo vini otimi ri jokur me?
Go bino dwoko to neko woko jono, to ketho ndelo vini i chingi jokur man.” Munyo ji jowinjo gime jowacho ni, “Gino wokiri wobedi ameno kada mathin!”
Yesu oneno jo to penjo ni, “Aŋo ma ndiiko nyutho ka wacho ni, ‘Kole tele won ma jogeto jochayo ni bu kony ama olokere tele ma thyelo kindi ot?’
Moro jye m'opodhi wi tele no bino ŋinyere woko; aka ka tele no opodhi kwoŋ moro, bino dhiŋo go woko.”
Jofuonji ma Chik kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jotemo mako Yesu i hongo no won, rupiri joŋeyo nike oido luwo iyagecha kwoŋ jo; to jolworo ji.
Ri ameno jodwaro hongo ma ripere, to jodhiro jopendo mogo ri Yesu, ma jorendere pa ji mabeyo, ŋey jowomaki wach mokom m'owachi, nyaka jowoosa go bongi joradhum kodi Gavana.
Jopendo me jopenjo Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, waŋeyo nike gima iwacho kodi gima ifuonjo otire, kendo ikidew kwoŋ dwoŋ pa dhano moro jye, to ifuonjo adyeri kwoŋ gima Were mito ri dhano timo.
Onyo wachi ri wan, Chik mawan yeyo wan goyo misolo ri Kaisar kosa be?”
To Yesu oneno apondi pajo, to wacho ri jo ni,
“Nyuthan win jege pesa moro. Chal pa ŋa kodi nyingi ŋa ma nitye kwoŋe?”
Jodwoko ni, “Apa Kaisar.” Aka Yesu odwoko ni, “Ere ka ameno, miyi win Kaisar gipa Kaisar, aka wimiyi Were bende gipa Were.”
Jokonyalo mako go i gimoro m'owacho i dyer ji kenyo, to joliŋ munyo jodhyer ayin ru dwok pere no.
Josadukayo mogo, joma wacho ni chierino pa jomotho ongoye, jochore bongi Yesu to jobolo ri go penji ni,
“Jafuonji, Musa chango ondiko ri wan ni ka omin nyatoro otho ma bu nyathi aka chiege fuodi nitye, jalo ripo lunjo chi lyendi omin no wolimi ri go gine nyithindho.
Onyo chango obedo wutimere abiryo: okayo pajo onywomo dhako, to tho ma bu nyithindho.
Gikenyo omin mararyo bende olunjo dhako no,
gi maradek; aka wutimere abiryo no jye jobedo gi dheno, to jotho ma jokoweyo nyithindho.
Rumachien to dhako no bende tho.
Onyo i ndelo ma jomotho jochierin'iye, dheno obedi apaŋa? Ato wutimere abiryo no jye jobedo gine!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Chwo gi mon ma ndir me jonywomere,
to ji mibino yeyo jo donjo i kwo ma ndir mabino ka ji jochierino, jokonywomere.
Ato kareno jokinyal tho kendo, rupiri jochalo jomalaika. Aka jobedo nyithindho pa Were, rupiri otyek chierino jo kwoŋ jomotho.
Kole kir Musa bende onyutho ni jomotho ibino chierino jo i wach m'owacho kwoŋ dudi mawaŋ munyo luwo kwoŋ Ruoth ni go obedo Were pa Ibrayimu, Were pa Isaka, gi Were pa Yakobo.
Dwoŋ mere nike go obedo Were pa jomakwo, ma kiweno apa jomotho, ato jojye jokwo i go.”
Gikenyo jofuonji ma Chik mogo joluwo malo ni, “Jafuonji, meno dwok maber!”
Ato odoko jokotemo penjo Yesu penji moro kendo.
To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Nyalere nedi wacho ni Kristo obedo nyakwar Daudi?
Kole Daudi won owacho i kitawo ma Zabul ni, ‘Ruoth owacho ri Ruoth paran ni, Bedi yu chingan marachuch,
chuka anoloki jokwor perin kor kasik ma nyono gi tyendin.’
Kole Daudi olwoŋo go ni, ‘Ruoth.’ To go nyalo nedi kendo bedo nyakwar Daudi?”
Munyo kweth ji jye jochiko ithi gin winjo go, Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni,

“Kure win kwoŋ jofuonji ma Chik, ma jomito nyumo kamoro jye gi ruk maboyo, aka joyenyo ni womothi jo i katale ma miten gi lworo; joyero kabedo ma malo i kalamo pa Joyudaya gi kabedo maloyo bero i kalima;
jodiyo mon tho to jomayo jo gikipiny ma pechin pajo aka jorendere gi kwayo maboyo. Jobino limo girachula madwoŋ loyo!”
Yesu otiŋo waŋe malo to neno munyo ji jobolo mich pajo i kakan ma Ot pa Were.
Aka oneno chi tho moro ma jachandi tektek bende bol'iye dome aryo.
Gikenyo owacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, chi tho ma jachandi me obolo mich maloyo apa joman jye.
Ato joman jokelo mich mawok kwoŋ ŋaŋo pajo ma jokano; to go, kada jachandi ri go, omiyo gimoro jye ma d'okwo gine.”
Joman kwoŋ jo oido joluwo kwoŋ Ot pa Were, paka neno maŋon gi telin mere kodi mich michwayo ri Were mani iye. Yesu owacho ni,
“Kwoŋ gima wineno me jye, hongo bino tundo mongoye tele kada achiel ka mibino weyo wi nyawote ma kokedhi woko.”
Gikenyo jopenjo Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, gime bino timere keraŋo? Kendo aŋo m'onyuthi ni ndir otundo ri gino ma timirok?”
Yesu owacho ni, “Kure win moro wokiri wowondi win; kwoŋbedo ji mathoth jolebino i nyingan ka jowacho ni, ‘An a go!’ kendo ni, ‘Ndir ago otundo!’ Wikiri wiluwi jo.
Lworo wokiri womaki win ka wiwinjo ji luwo kwoŋ lweny kodi gwenyirok pa ji kwoŋ adhum; gikipiny ma pameno ripo kutho timirok, to meno kinyuthi ni giki piny bino mayot.”
Go omedo wacho ni, “Piny achiel bino lwenyo gi man, ker achiel gi man; yengirok pa piny madongo bino bedo, kech kodi tho bino bedo kis kamoro jye;
gikipiny ma bwoko ji tektek kodi ranyuth madongo mawok i polo bino timere.
“Ma fuodi gikipiny me jye kotimere, ibino mako win to ichando win; ibino tero win i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi i jera; ibino tero win i waŋ kerin kodi jodhum ru nyingan.
Me bino bedo hongo mewin ma tito Wach Maber ri jono.
Kethi win paro me i chuny win, ni wikiri wikwakere rango radwok mewin wegi.
Kole abino miyo win wach kodi ryeko ma ongoye jakwor mewin ma bino chiro kosa kwero gima wiwacho.
Kir jonywol mewin, wutimin win, wade mewin, gi merin mewin jye jobino kwedo win; jobino neko jomegi kwoŋ win.
Dhano jye bino mon kodi win ru wach paran.
To ongoye kada yewiy win achiel ma bino rwenyo.
Chir win matek, kole me apaka wibino botho kwo mewin.
“Ka wineno lwak jolweny jothoko Yerusalem, gikenyo wibino ŋeyo nike ilereyo woko go mayot.
Gikenyo joma nitye i Yudeya joworingi wi gote; joma nitye i tindi no jowoeye woko, aka joma nitye woko ma tindi kiri jowodonji i tindi.
Kole me obedo, ndelo ma girachula mamiyo gimoro jye ma Ndiiko Maleŋ oluwo kwoŋe wotimere.
Kidamba madwoŋ bino bedo ri mon majoyach kodi megi nyithindho maŋich i hongo no! Litho madwoŋ swa bino bedo i piny me, aka Were bino kigaga tektek gi ji me.
Ibino neko jo g'abor, titero jo paka ŋechin i piny moro jye, aka Jopath jobino wotho wi Yerusalem chuka ndir madhum pajo orum kichutho.”
“Ranyuth bino bedo i waŋchieŋ, i dwe, i michalin i piny, aka piny jye jobino rem mongoye geno, munyo jolworo kitula gi derino ma mor pa wakawaka.
Ji jobino bwok to chuny gin tho gi lworo munyo jokuro gima bino i piny gipi: rupiri men mani polo bino yengere.
Gikenyo nyaka ji jobino neno Wuodi Dhano munyo loro wi pondeponde gi men kodi dwoŋ moasere.
Ka gikipiny me chako timirok, chungi win, witiŋi waŋ win malo rupiri both mewin ochore chiegin.”
Gikenyo Yesu oluwo i agecha ni, “Poyi win makuyu kodi yen man jye.
Ka wineno boke mere ochako loth, wiŋeyo ni chieŋ chiegin lyel.
Amomiyo bende ka wineno gikipiny me timere, ŋeyi wini ni Ker pa Were chiegin bino.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, luse ji ma ndir me jok'otho jorum ma fuodi gikipiny me jye kotimere.
Polo gi piny bino rumo woko to wach paran kibino rumo.
“To gwokere win, chuny win wokiri wopoŋi awanya ma piny gi mero gi rembo ma kwo me, rupiri ndelo no nyalo choro win pa bwoo mochiiki gine win.
Kole Ndelo no bino tundo ri ji jye mani piny gipi pa apormalo.
Kendo kure win aka wikway noknok nike wibedi gi men ma chiro gikipiny ma bino timere me jye to wichungo i nyimi Wuodi Dhano.”
Yesu ochowo ndelo mogo munyo fuonjo i Ot pa Were, to i dyer wor go oido omaro wok woko to bedo wi Got Olivet.
Aka odikini maŋich, ji jye oido jokidho bonge i Ot pa Were winjo fuonji pere.
Gikenyo kalima ma mugat ma bu thow, milwoŋo ni ma Kadho, oido ochore chiegin.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik onwaŋo jotemo rango royo ma neko Yesu, to oido jolworo ji.
Gikenyo Sitan odonjo i Yuda, milwoŋo ni Iskaryot, monwaŋo obedo achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok apar g'aryo.
Ameno Yuda okadho to luwo kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa joserikale ma Ot pa Were kwoŋ yo ma go d'onyalo ketho gine Yesu i chingi jo.
Josangala to joyeyo miyo go pesa.
Yuda oyeyo to chako rango hongo maber ma ketho Yesu i chingi jo ma ji madit jongoye chiegin.
Ndelo ma chamo mugat ma bu thow, minek'iye roombo mawote ma nyaka ay michowere gine i kalima ma Kadho otundo.
Ri ameno Yesu ooro Petro gi Yohana gi wach me: “Kidhi wiyiki chiemo mawan mothyeno ma kalima ma Kadho wacham.”
Jopenjo ni, “Iyenyo wayiki yu kune?”
Go odwoko ni, “Panen win, ka wityeko donjo i tindi, ŋat moro motiŋo daki pi bino romo gi win. Wiluwi go kir i ot ma go odonj'iye.
Aka wiwachi ri won ot no ni, ‘Jafuonji penjin ni nikune ot wendo ma an kodi jofuonjirok paran wanocham'iye kalima ma Kadho?’
Go bino nyutho win ot malach mani malo, kuma winoyik'iye gimoro jye.”
Jokidho aka jonwaŋo gimoro jye paka Yesu owacho ri jo, to joyiko chiemo mothyeno ma kalima ma Kadho kenyo.
Munyo hongo otundo, Yesu obedo dhower gi jomoor pere.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Onwaŋo awanya chamo gi win chiemo ma kalima ma Kadho me ma fuodi akichandere.
Ato awacho ri win, akodoko acham chiemo kendo chuka gikipiny otimere paka ripere i Ker pa Were.”
Gikenyo okwanyo kikopo, oketho Were walwa, to wacho ni, “Joli win gime wimadhi gima n'iye wijojye,
rupiri awacho ri win, wok gunyoni akibino madho vini kendo chuka Ker pa Were obin.”
Gikenyo okwanyo mugat, oketho Were walwa, oturo, to miyo jo jowochami, munyo wacho ni, [“Me delkwoŋan momiy win. Timi win ameno noknok ma poyan.”]
I yo achiel no bende, omiyo jo kikopo, munyo chiemo mothyeno orumo, ka wacho ni, “Kikopo me obedo chikirok manyien moridhi gi remo paran ma bino oy ri win.
To neni win, ŋata chamo ran sereko nitye dhower ka kodan!
Kole Wuodi Dhano bino tho paka Were oyiko; to kidamba madwoŋ bino bedo ri ŋata osita go!”
To jochako penjirok wegi kendigin ni ŋa kwoŋ jo ma d'otimo gino.
Pyem owok i dyer jofuonjirok ni ŋa kwoŋ jo ama woter paka ni gi dwoŋ loyo wadi.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kerin ma piny ka jodhumo ji pajo gi mbaka, aka joma jodhum joyenyo ni wokeri jo ni jokony pa ji.
To me k'apaka nitye gi win; kuchiel, ŋata loyo dwoŋ i dyer win ripo lokere pa ŋatathin loyo, aka jatel ripo bedo paka jatich ri wadi.
Kere ŋa maloyo dwoŋ; ŋata bedo piny chiemo, kosa ŋata poko chiemo? Ki ŋata bedo piny be? To kole an abedo i dyer win paka jatich mewin.
Wityeko bedo kodan i hongo ma teko paran jye,
to paka Baba omiyan Ker, abende abino timo ri win ameno.
Wibino chiemo gi oro giramadha dhower paran i Ker paran, to wibedo wi kombere ma Ker munyo withumo banjin ri nonin apar g'aryo ma Israel.”
“Simon, Simon, panen! Sitan oridho ri Were ni yenyo win, ŋey woyeki win pa nyingi kal.
To atyeko kwayo ri win, nike yeyo mewin wokiri worumi woko. Aka ka ityeko gik bongan, imiyi wutimerin men.”
Petro odwoko ni, “Ruoth, ayeyere kidho i twech kendo kada tho kodin!”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Awacho rin, Petro, wuodi gweno kukoki konon, chuka munyo ichowo kwedirok kwoŋan didek ni ikuya an.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Munyo adhiro win woko i ndir cha ma wikitiŋo mugowa pesa, mugowa moro jye kosa war, wichandoye gimoro?” Jodwoko ni: “Ongoye gima wachando.”
Yesu omedo wacho ni, “To pama ŋata nitye gi mugowa pesa kosa mugowa moro wokwanyi; aka ŋata ongoye g'abor wotana kot pere wonyiewi gine.
Kole awacho ri win gime: ndiiko ma wacho ni, ‘Okwan go kwoŋ jomarecho,’ bino timere kwoŋan; ato gimondik kwoŋan onyo kidho timirok.”
Jofuonjirok jowacho ni, “Panen, Ruoth, abor aryo ee!” Go odwoko ni, “Meno romo.”
Yesu oay okadho wi Got olivet, paka yado oido omaro timo, aka jofuonjirok joluwo go korago.
Munyo go otundo kenyo, owacho ri jo ni, “Kwayi win aka ŋey wikodonji i karatem.”
Aka oeye bongi jo to chore kama romo boro ma lowo abola, to guro chonge piny to kwayo.
Owacho ni, “Baba, ka imito, kwanyi woko agwata me kwoŋan. Kada ameno, wokiri wobedi paka aŋata amito, to gima imito ama wotimere.”
[Gikenyo malaika owok i polo, omenyere ri go, to miyo go men.
Gi arama chuny madwoŋ, go omedo kwayo gi geregere; i hongo no kwok pere onwaŋo chalo remo ma thon piny.]
Munyo oay i kwayo pere, ogik bongi jofuonjirok pere to nwaŋo jonindo, rupiri oido jonyochere gi rem.
Aka owacho ri jo ni, “Raŋo winindo? Ayi win wikwayi aka nyaka wikodonji i karatem.”
Munyo Yesu fuodi luwo, muma ji otundo; Yuda, achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok apar g'aryo, otelo jo, aka obino bongi Yesu to podho i kore to chwiyo lembe.
To Yesu owacho ni, “Yuda, ichamo sereko ri Wuodi Dhano gi rendirok ni ichwiyo lembe?”
Munyo jofuonjirok monwaŋo jonitye gi Yesu joneno gima onwaŋo kidho timirok, jowacho ni, “Ruoth, watoŋi jo g'abor mawan?”
Aka ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo otoŋo ŋecha pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar to chodo woko ithe marachuch.
To Yesu odwoko ni, “Gime wokiri womedere!” Aka ogeyo ithi jalo to chango.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jokur ma Ot pa Were kodi jotel pa ji monwaŋo jobino kenyo mako go ni, “Wibino ran g'abor g'abirin p'igeni abedo jakwo?
Munyo abedo gi win ndelo jye i Ot pa Were, wikitemo makan, to me onyo a hongo mewin kodi apa jameni ma mudho ma timo ameno.”
Gikenyo jomako Yesu to jotero go i ot pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar; aka Petro oluwo jo giborbor.
Onwaŋo omok mach moro i dyedipo kenyo, to Petro bende mako oyo mach no gi joma onwaŋo jooyo.
Munyo achiel kwoŋ jotich manyir oneno go obedo piny dho mach, oŋiyo go swa to wacho ni, “Ŋatin oido bende ni bonge!”
To Petro kwedere ni, “Dhako me, akuya ran go!”
Hongo machiek okadho to ŋat man neno Petro to wacho ni, “In achiel kwoŋ jonago!” To Petro odwoko ni, “Ojame, ki an!”
Aka munyo sawa achiel okadho, jal moro omedo wacho g'amen ni, “Ongoye kiganagana ni ŋat me bende oido nitye bothe, rupiri go bende Jagalileya!”
To Petro odwoko ni, “Ojame, akuya gima iluwo kwoŋe!” Gikenyo won, munyo fuodi go luwo, wuodi gweno okoko.
Ruoth owire oŋiyo Petro, aka Petro opoyo wach pa Ruoth, paka owacho ni, “Ma fuodi wuodi gweno kukoko konon, ibino kwedere kwoŋan didek.”
Gikenyo Petro owok to ywak malith.
Ji monwaŋo jokuro Yesu joyeto go to jochwado go.
Joboyo waŋe gi nanga aka jopenjo go ni, “Ŋat'ogoyin ŋa? Tuchi ri wan!”
Aka jowacho gikipiny man madit mayeto go.
Munyo piny oyawere, kitipa pa jotel pa Joyudaya kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik joromo kanyachiel, titero Yesu i kapido pajo.
Ana jo ni, “Wachi ri wan, in a Kristo?” Go odwoko jo ni, “Ka awacho ri win, wikoyeyi;
aka ka apenjo win penji, wikodwokan.
To wok pama kadho yu waŋe, Wuodi Dhano bino bedo yu rachuch pa Were Majameni jye.”
Jojye jopenjo ni, “Kere in i Wuodi Were?” Go odwoko jo ni, “Kole eno wiwacho.”
Jowacho ni, “Odoko wayenyo wach mene kendo maridho gime! Kole ee wawegi watyeko winjo wach mowok i dhoke won!”
Kweth ji gi bee joay to jotero Yesu ruwaŋ Pilato
kama jochako kel'iye kwoŋe wach ni, “Wanwaŋo jalin komo ji, munyo wacho ri ji ni kiri jowogoyi misolo ri Kaisar aka ŋoyo ni go Kristo mobedo kere.”
Pilato openjo go ni, “In Kere pa Joyudaya?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Eno iwacho.”
Gikenyo Pilato owacho ri jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi muma ji no ni, “Akinwaŋi gima miyan athumi banja loyo ŋatin.”
To nyaka jomedo wacho gi men ni, “Go gi fuonji pere kelo ri ji gwenyirok kwoŋ adhum! Go ochako i Galileya, okidho Yudeya gi bee, aka pama onyo obino ka.”
Munyo Pilato owinjo gino, openjo ni, “Yesu obedo Jagalileya?”
Aka munyo go owinjo ni Yesu wok iyadech ma Herode dhum'iye, odhiro go bongi Herode won, ma i hongo no oido bende nitye Yerusalem.
Herode osangala swa munyo oneno Yesu, rupiri oido otyeko winjo kwoŋe, aka oido otyeko kiwanya neno go hongo malach; oido geno neno Yesu ka timo giraura mogo.
Amomiyo Herode openjo Yesu kweth penji, to Yesu kodwoko kada wach achiel.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jofuonji ma Chik jochungo kenyo munyo jokelo wach madongo swa kwoŋ Yesu.
Herode kodi joserikale pere jokelo ginyiero kwoŋ Yesu to jotimo ri go gichay. Rumachien joruko ri go nanga maŋon to jodwoko go bongi Pilato.
I ndelo no won ama Herode kodi Pilato jomak'iye mere; rupiri yado onwaŋo jodakere.
Pilato olwoŋo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jodhum pa ji kodi ji jye kanyachiel,
to wacho ri jo ni, “Wikelo ŋatin bongan ka wiwacho ni go komo ji. Onyo atyeko kikaŋasa wach mokel kwoŋe jye ruwaŋ win, to akinwaŋi ni banja loyo go i gikipiny marecho ma wikelo kwoŋe no jye.
Kada Herode bende konwaŋo kwoŋe banja moro, amomiyo odwoko go bongi wan. Ongoye gima ŋatin otimo ma miyi neki go.
Amomiyo amito nike wochwadi go, to aweyo go kadho.”
[I kis hongo ma kalima ma Kadho Pilato yado omaro gonyo ri jo jatwech achiel.]
Gikenyo ji jye jokoko ni, “Neki go! Gonyi ri wan Baraba ayin!”
(Baraba me onwaŋo otwey ru gwenyirok kwoŋ adhum mobedo i tindi, kodi ru neko ji).
Pilato oido mito gonyo Yesu, amomiyo odoko oluwo gi jo;
to jodwoko gi koko ni, “Guri go, guri go kwoŋ musalaba!”
Pilato owacho ri jo madidek ni, “To racho aŋo won ma go otimo? Kole akinen racho mogo ma go otimo ma di miyi neki go. Amomiyo alechwado go t'agonyo go.”
To ji oido jo ni g'arom kodi koko moasere ni woguri go kwoŋ musalaba. Kenyo to dwondi jo umo woko paro man jye.
Ri ameno Pilato otimo ri jo paka oido joyenyo.
Ogonyo ri jo ŋata jomito, ŋata onwaŋo otwey ru gwenyirok kodi neko ji, to miyo jo Yesu ni jowotimi gine gima jomito.
Jokadho gi Yesu, aka munyo fuodi jowotho, joromo gi dhano ma nyinge Simon ma wok Sireno monwaŋo bino i tindi. Jomako go, to jochuko go gi tiŋo musalaba yu ŋey Yesu.
Kweth ji moasere joluwo Yesu; kwoŋ jo oido nitye mon mogo monwaŋo joywako go, aka jowinjo malith swa.
Yesu owire oniyo jo to wacho ni, “Mon ma Yerusalem! Wikiri wiywakan, to wiwegi ywakere win kodi nyithindho mewin.
Kole ndelo odyedere bino ma ji jobino wach'iye ni, ‘Josilwany a mon ma jokonywol, ma jokolimo nyithindho, ma jokomiyo nyithindho dhoth!’
Meno a hongo ma ji bino wach'iye ri gote ni, ‘Podhi win kwoŋ wan,’ gi ri tendere ni, ‘Ryewere win kwoŋ wan’.
Rupiri ka gikipiny ma kite no itimo munyo yen fuodi numu, aŋo mobedi ka yen othwo?”
Jotero jomogo jaryo moido jobedo jokwo ni woneki jo kanyachiel gi Yesu.
Munyo jotundo kuma ilwoŋo ni, “Kahanga wich”, joguro Yesu kwoŋ musalaba, kodi jokwo aryo no, achiel yu rachuch man yu racham pere.
Yesu owacho ni, “Baba, chwaki jo rupiri jokuya gima jotimo.” To jogoyo kwir ma poko ruk pere.
Ji oido jochungo kenyo joŋiyo jo, kareno jodhum pa Joyudaya jonyiero aka joŋalo go ni, “Obotho joman; ere weyi won wobothere, ka go a Kristo ma Were oyero adyeri!”
Joserikale bende jonyiero go; jobino bonge to jochwayo ri go pigi gimoro ma kech ni womadhi,
to joŋalo go ni, “Ere iwon bothere, k'inen ibedo Kere pa Joyudaya adyeri.”
Wach me bende ondik yu wiye: “Me Kere pa Joyudaya.”
Achiel kwoŋ jokwo molyero kenyo oŋalo go ni, “Kosa in iki Kristo? Ere iwon bothere aka ibothi wan bende!”
To nyawote obwoko go munyo wacho ni, “Ikilwori Were? Kole ibende ilimo girachula paka apere.
Aka girachula mawan obedo ru ndir, rupiri walimo gima ripo gi recho ma watimo; to go kotimo recho moro kada achiel.”
To wacho ri Yesu ni, “Yesu, poyan chieŋ midwok'iye gi men ma Ker perin!”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Adyeri awacho rin, konon ibino bedo kodan i kabedo ma yu polo.”
Dho kapa sawa auchiel, waŋchieŋ oumere to mudho chulo piny gipi kir i sawa abuŋwen;
aka nanga molyer i Ot pa Were oyech to pokere aryo.
Yesu okoko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Baba! Aketho chunyan i chingin!” Munyo otyeko wacho ameno to nyaka tho.
Jadwoŋ pa joserikale monwaŋo ni kenyo oneno gimotimere, opako Were, munyo wacho ni, “Adyeri jal me oido dhano maber!”
Munyo ji moido jochokere kenyo neno gima obedi joneno gimotimere, jojye jodok pecho munyo jogoyo pal chuny jo gi rem.
Ji jye moido joŋeyo Yesu, kanyachiel gi mon ma joluwo go wok Galileya, jochungo gi bor neno gikipiny me.
Onwaŋo nitye dhano ma nyinge Yozefu, ma wok i tindi pa Joyudaya ma Arimatheya. Go oido achiel kwoŋ jopido kendo dhano maber
moido koyeyere gi tim kodi atoŋa pa jonicha marach, aka oido go kuro bino ma Ker pa Were. Kada go oido jakweth pa jonek no, go koyeyere gi paro kodi tim pajo.
Go okidho bongi Pilato to kwayo delkwoŋ Yesu.
Gikenyo ogamo del no to boyo gi suka matar, to ketho i kalyel mogwor i tele, ma fuodi oido koyik'iye dhano moro jye.
Ndelo no onwaŋo obedo ma yikirok aka Sabato oido chiegin chakirok.
Mon ma joluwo Yesu wok Galileya jokidho gi Yozefu to joneno kalyel gi paka oketh'iye delkwoŋ Yesu.
Gikenyo jodok pecho to joyiko gikipiny kodi mo maŋwe kur ri delkwoŋe. I Sabato joywomere paka Chik wacho.
Odikini maŋich i ndelo ma chako tich, mon no jokidho i kalyel munyo jotiŋo gikipiny maŋwe kur ma joyiko no.
Jonwaŋo tele moido oum gine dhok kalyel oŋil woko,
to jodonj'iye; to jokonwaŋo delkwoŋ Yesu.
Munyo fuodi jochungo kenyo gi dhyer kwoŋ gimotimere, gikenyo no won chwo aryo ma jorukere i nengin ma minyin jochungo kabuti jo.
Mon no joryewere piny, munyo lworo omako jo, aka chwo no jowacho ri jo ni, “Raŋo ma wirango ŋata kwo kwoŋ jomotho?
Go ongoye ka; otyeko chierino. Poyi win gima go owacho ri win munyo fuodi nitye gi win i Galileya ni
ibino ketho Wuodi Dhano i chingi ji marecho, jowoguri go kwoŋ musalaba to ichierino go i ndelo maradek.”
Mon no jopoyo wach pere no,
jodwoko wok i kalyel, to jowacho gikipiny me jye ri jofuonjirok apar g'achiel kodi joman jye.
Mon no oido obedo Marya ma wok Magdala, Yoana kodi Marya min Yakobo; jono, kodi mon man ma jobedo bothi jo, jotero wach me ri jomoor.
To jomoor joparo ni gima mon no jowacho oido sisiri, to jokwero yeyo wach no.
Petro oay oringo yu kalyel; oluŋere to neno nengin ma kalyel kende mongoye gimoro man. Gikenyo go odok pecho munyo dhyer kwoŋ gimotimere.
I ndelo no won, jaryo kwoŋ jo oido jokidho yu loka milwoŋo ni Emaus, chiegin mairo abiryo wok Yerusalem,
aka onwaŋo joluwo kwoŋ gikipiny jye motimere.
Munyo fuodi joluwo aka jopyemo, Yesu won gipi ochore chiegin to wotho gi jo.
Joneno go, to jokonyalo ŋeyo go.
Yesu openjo jo ni, “Wilyesa malomalo kwoŋ aŋo me?” To jochungo ma joliŋ aliŋa munyo jo ni gi rem madit.
Gikenyo ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo, ma nyinge Klewopa, openjo go ni, “Iŋati ibedo wendo i Yerusalem ka m'ikuya gimotyeko timirok i ndelo manok me?”
Go to penjo jo ni, “Gikipiny aŋo?” Jodwoko ni, “Gima otimere kwoŋ Yesu Janazareth. Ŋat me oido jatuchi wach Were, aka Were kodi ji jye jotero go paka ŋata ni gi men i wach kodi i tim.
To jotel mawan mapa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi ruodhe, jotero go ni wothumi ri go banja ma tho, to joguro go kwoŋ musalaba.
Aka onwaŋo wageno nike go ama bino botho Israel! Medo kwoŋ meno jye, konon ndelo maradek chuka gino timere.
Aka mon mogo ma kweth mawan jomiyo wan dhyer madwoŋ. Nende jokidho i kalyel odikini worwor,
to jokonwaŋo delkwoŋe. Jodwoko munyo jowacho ni jomalaika moro jomenyere ri jo ma jowacho nike go kwo.
Jowoti wan megi bende jokidho i kalyel aka jonwaŋo ni obedo adyeri paka mon no jowacho ri jo won, to jokoneno ri gin go won.”
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “A ji mamiŋ, aka wibol i yeyo g'ichuny win gimoro jye ma jotuchi wach Were jowacho!
Wiparo ni onwaŋo kiripere ni Kristo wokutho wochandere i yo no aka nyaka wodonji i dwoŋ pere?”
Yesu otito ri jo gima Ndiiko Maleŋ oluwo kwoŋe chako kwoŋ kitawin pa Musa tundo i ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were jye.
Gikenyo munyo jotundo chiegin gi loka monwaŋo jokidh'iye, Yesu otimo pa ŋata fuodi medere gi woth pere;
to jojuko go munyo jowacho ni, “Rwayi gi wan; kole piny oyutho aka onyo lokere machol.” Ri ameno Yesu odonjo to bedo gi jo.
Munyo obedo dhower gi jo, okwanyo mugat to miyo silwany; gikenyo to turo mugat no to miyo jo.
Gikenyo waŋ jo oyawere to nyaka joŋeyo go; to go leny woko i waŋ jo ni many.
To wegi jochako penjirok ni, “Onwaŋo kichal pa chuny wan waŋ munyo go luwo gi wan i royo aka tito ri wan Ndiiko Maleŋ?”
Joay mayot to jogik Yerusalem, kama jonwaŋ'iye jofuonjirok apar g'achiel jochokere kanyachiel kodi joman
aka onwaŋo jowacho ni, “Ruoth bende ochierino won, aka Simon otyeko neno go!”
Gikenyo jaryo no bende jotito ri jo gimotimere i royo, kodi paka joniaŋ kwoŋ Ruoth munyo oturo mugat.
Munyo fuodi jowacho ri jo gime, jopoyo ka Ruoth won gipi ochungo i dyer jo to wacho ri jo ni, “Syem wobedi gi win.”
Lworo opoŋ kwoŋ jo gi bwok, rupiri oido joparo nike onwaŋo joneno tipo dhano moro.
To go owacho ri jo ni, “Raŋo ma wibwok aka kiganagana bino i paro mewin?
Neni win chingan kodi tyendan kole me an won. Mulan win, aka wibino neno, kole yamo ongoye gi riŋo gi chokin, paka wineno ani gine.”
Owacho gime to nyutho jo chinge gi tyende.
Munyo fuodi jokonyalo yeyo ru kisangala kodi dhyer moido oasere ri jo; go openjo jo ni, “Winitye gi girachama moro ka?”
Jomiyo go rech motedi,
ma go ojolo to chamo ruwaŋ jo.

Gikenyo owacho ri jo ni, “Me gikipiny ma yado amaro wacho ri win munyo fuodi anitye gi win, ni gimoro jye mondik kwoŋan i Chik pa Musa, i ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were, kodi i Zabul onwaŋo ripo timirok.”
Aka oyawo paro pajo ma niaŋ kwoŋ Ndiiko Maleŋ,
to wacho ri jo ni, “Me a gimondik ni Kristo ripo kutho chandirok tichierino go kwoŋ jomotho i chieŋ maradek,
aka mikwenda ma ŋuto kodi ma chwako gimarecho wotiti ri nonin jye, chako Yerusalem.
Wibedo jokony i gikipiny me.
Aka abino dhiro ri win gima Baba ochiko; to wiripo kuro i tindi chuka men mawok i polo olori ri win.”
Gikenyo okwanyo jo to tero jo yu Bethaniya kama go oryey'iye chinge to miyo jo silwany.
Munyo go miyo jo silwany, oeye bongi jo titero go i polo.
Jolamo Yesu to jogik Yerusalem ma kisangala opoŋ i chuny jo.
To jochowo hongo pajo jye i Ot pa Were munyo jopako Were.
I chakirok, wach oido nitye; go oido nitye gi Were, aka wach no oido obedo Were won.
Wok i chakirok go oido nitye gi Were.
Gi go Were ochweyo gimoro jye ma nitye, ongoye gima nitye ma go ama kochweyo.
Gimoro jye ma nitye olimo kwo i go aka kwo no oido a lero pa ji.
Lero no lyel i mudho aka mudho kinyal niaŋ kwoŋe.
Dhano moro obino, ma Were ooro, nyinge Yohana.
Go obino paka jamikwenda ma luwo ri lero no, ŋey dhano jye woyeyi ru wach pere.
Go ama oido ki lero no, to jamikwenda ma luwo ri lero ayin.
Lero maradyeri ma miyo ji jye lero, won ama onwaŋo lebino i piny.
Go obedo i piny, ma chakirok mere owok bonge, to piny koŋeyo go.
Go obino i piny pere won, to ji pere jokojolo go.
To ji jye ma jojolo go ma joyeyo i nyinge, omiyo jo men ma lokirok nyithindho pa Were.
Nywolirok pa jono kobedo ma remo pa dhano, kosa ru mito pa ji, to ru mito pa Were won.
Wach olokere Dhano, aka obedo gi wan, to waneno dwoŋ pere paka Wuodi Were achiel kende, mowok bongi Were Bawan, mopoŋ gi ŋono kodi adyeri.
Yohana obedo paka jamikwenda pere mokoko ka wacho ni, “Me a ŋata atyeko luwo kwoŋe ni, ‘Ŋata luwan chien loyan swa gi dwoŋ, rupiri go otelo bedo ran.’ ”
Adyeri, wajojye watyeko nwaŋo ŋono wi ŋono kwoŋ ŋaŋo pere.
Kole Chik obino gi i chingi Musa, to ŋono kodi adyeri obino ri wan ka luwo bongi Yesu Kristo.
Ongoye moro motyeko neno Were, kwanyo woko Wuode won morikere ruŋeti Bamere ama onyutho wan go.
Me a gima Yohana owacho munyo Joyudaya ma Yerusalem jooro jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kanyachiel gi Jolevi penjo go ni, “To in iŋa?”
Yohana kokwero dwoko, to owacho kamaler ni, “Aŋata akibedo Kristo.”
To jopenjo go ni, “To in iŋa won? In Eliya?” Go odwoko ni, “A ki go.” Jopenjo go kendo ni, “Ibedo jatuchi wach Were?” Ana go ni, “Be!”
Gikenyo jowacho ni, “Ere wachi ri wan ŋat'ibedo to. Waripo dwoko wach ri joma jooro wan. Iwacho aŋo ma mako kwoŋin iwon.”
Ana Yohana ni, “Abedo, ‘Dwondi ŋata koko i thim ni, Tiri win royo pa Ruoth wowoth'iye!’ ” (Me a gima jatuchi wach Were, Isaya owacho.)
Jofarisayo ama jodhiro jomikwenda no.
Jopenjo Yohana ni, “Ka in iki Kristo kosa Eliya kosa jatuchi wach Were, to raŋo m'imiyo batisimo?”
Yohana odwoko ni, “An amiyo batisimo kodi pi; to idyer win ka ochungo ŋata wikuya.
Go luwan chien, aka akiripi kada gonyo thol war pere.”
Gikipiny me jye otimere i Bethaniya loka ma jwom Yordan kama go oido miy'iye ji batisimo.
Yawere mere Yohana oneno Yesu munyo bino bonge to wacho ni, “Neni Nyathi rombo pa Were ma kwanyo woko gimarach ma piny!
Me a ŋata oido aluwo kwoŋe munyo awacho ni, ‘Moro luwan chien, aka loyan gi dwoŋ rupiri go ama otelo bedo ran.’
An won oido akiŋeyo go, to abino timo tich ma miyo ji batisimo gi pi ŋey go wonenere kamaler ri Joisrael.”
Me a mikwenda ma Yohana omiyo, “Aneno Chuny Maleŋ oloro wok i polo to pye kwoŋe.
An oido akiŋeyo go, to Were mooran miyo ji batisimo gi pi ama owacho ran ni, ‘Ŋat'inonen Chuny Maleŋ loro piny to pye kwoŋe, meno a ŋata ripo miyo ji batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ.’
Aka atyeko neno gi tito ri ji nike ŋat me won a Wuodi Were.”
Yawere mere Yohana onwaŋo ochungo kenyo kodi jofuonjirok pere aryo;
aka munyo oneno Yesu wotho, owacho ni, “Neni Nyathi rombo pa Were!”
Jofuonjirok aryo no jowinjo munyo go wacho ameno to joluwo Yesu.
Yesu owire to neno jono munyo joluwo go, to penjo jo ni, “Wiyenyo aŋo?” Jodwoko ni, “Rabi, ibedo kune?” (Rabi, nyaka ni jafuonji).
Go odwoko ni, “Biye neni win.” Gikenyo jokidho gine to joneno kama go bed'iye, to jochowo ndelo no bonge (ato onwaŋo obedo kapa sawa apar mothyeno).
Achiel kwoŋ ji aryo ma jowinjo gima Yohana owacho, to joluwo Yesu, obedo Andereya, omin Simon Petro.
Gikenyo Andereya onwaŋo Simon, omin go, to wacho ri go ni, “Wanwaŋo Mesiya.” (Wach me dwoŋ mere ni Kristo).
Gikenyo go okelo Simon bongi Yesu. Yesu oneno go to wacho ni, “Kere ilwoŋin ni Simon, wuodi pa Yona? Pama nyingin bino bedo Kefas.” (Kefas me rom gi Petro, aka dwoŋ mere ni, “Tele.”)
Yawere mere Yesu oyiko paro ma kidho Galileya, to nwaŋo Filipo to wacho ri go ni, “Luwan!”
(Filipo onwaŋo wok Bethsaida, tindi ma Andereya kodi Petro bende onwaŋo jowok'iye.)
Gikenyo Filipo onwaŋo Nathanayel to wacho ri go ni, “Watyeko nwaŋo ŋata Musa ondiko kwoŋe i kitawo ma Chik, kodi ŋata jotuchi wach Were jondiko kwoŋe. Go obedo Yesu, wuodi Yozefu ma Nazareth.”
To Nathanayel openjo ni, “Bende nitye gimaber ma nyalo wok Nazareth?” Filipo odwoko ni, “Ere biye neni.”
Munyo Yesu oneno Nathanayel, oluwo kwoŋe ni, “Me Jaisrael maradyeri; ongoye komo moro kwoŋe!”
Nathanayel openjo go ni, “Iŋeyan nedi?” Ana Yesu, “Anenin munyo ibedo i tyendi makuyu, ma fuodi Filipo kobino lwoŋin.”
Nathanayel odwoko ni, “Jafuonji, ibedo Wuodi Were! In a Kere pa Joisrael!”
Yesu owacho ni, “Iyeyo nyaka rupiri awacho rin nike anenin munyo ibedo i tyendi makuyu? Ibino neno gikipiny madongo maloyo me!”
Aka Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Adyeri awacho rin, ibino neno munyo polo oyawere kareno jomalaika pa Were joidho malo aka joloro piny wi Wuodi Dhano.”
I ndelo maradek kalima ma nywomirok obedo i tindi ma Kana i Galileya. Min Yesu oido ni kenyo
aka Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere bende oido olwoŋ jo i kalima no.
Munyo vini jye orumo, min Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Kole vini orumo ri jo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, iraŋo ithuyan gi wach me? Kole ndir paran fuodi kotundo.”
Gikenyo min Yesu owacho ri joma poko chiemo gi giramadha ni, “Timi win gimoro jye ma go owachi ri win.”
Joyudaya jonitye gi kite ma logo, ri ameno kenyo oido nitye degi auchiel ma telin, aka kis achiel onwaŋo dwoŋ ma romo ayigin aŋwen kosa auchiel.
Yesu owacho ri jotich ni, “Ere poŋi win pi i degi no.” Jopoŋo degi no gi pi kir malo ni sit,
to wacho ri jo ni, “Onyo twomi win pi moro witer ri jadwoŋ ma telo kalima.” Jono jotero ri go pi no,
to go bilo, aka onwaŋo oido otyeko lokere vini. Go koŋeyo kama vini no owok'iye to jotich ma jotwomo pi ama joŋeyo. Gikenyo go olwoŋo won kalima,
to wacho ri go ni, “Kole dhano jye kutho pen poko vini maber tektek mere, aka ka wendo jotyeko medho moromo aka nyaka poko vini ma ndir jye. To in ikano vini maber tektek mere tundo pama!”
Yesu otimo giraura marapena me i Kana i Galileya; kenyo go onyuth'iye dwoŋ pere, aka jofuonjirok pere joyeyo go.
Munyo gino orumo, Yesu kodi yokimere, gi wutimin kodi jofuonjirok pere jokidho Kapernaum, to jobedo kenyo ndelo manok.
Munyo ndir oido orikere ma poyo ndelo ma Kadho, Yesu okidho Yerusalem.
Go onwaŋo ji jotana gikipiny i Ot pa Were paka: dhok, roombo, kodi akurin; aka joma wilo pesa oido jobedo dho meza pajo.
Gikenyo go omino adasa to ryemo woko lee jye i Ot pa Were, gi roombo kanyachiel gi dhok; aka oywoyo woko pesa to ŋilo woko mezin pa jowili pesa;
Ooro joma tana akurin ni, “Kwanyi wi woko akurin no ka! Wikiri wiloki Ot pa Baba katale!”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok pere jopoyo gima ondik ni, “Maro Ot perin, a Were, waŋo chunyan pa mach.”
