Rumachien Joyudaya jodwoko bonge gi penji ni, “Giraura aŋo m'inyalo timo ma nyutho wan nike initye gi men matimo gime?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kedhi win woko Ot pa Were me aka i hongo ma ndelo adek abino gero kendo?”
Jopenjo go ni, “Ot pa Were me motero wan oro pyero aŋwen g'achiel gipi gero, ama iwacho ni ibino gero i ndelo adek won kende?”
To Ot pa Were ma Yesu oluwo kwoŋe oido obedo delkwoŋe ayino.
Amomiyo munyo go ochierino kwoŋ jomotho, jofuonjirok pere jopoyo nike go oido wacho gino ayin; gikenyo to joyeyo gima ondik kodi wach ma Yesu owacho.
Munyo go fuodi ni Yerusalem i kalima ma Kadho, ji madit joyeyo nyingi go munyo joneno ranyuth m'otimo.
To Yesu konyuthere kamaler ri jo kwoŋbedo go oido oŋeyo dhano jye.
Oido ongoye kony nyatoro wacho ri go gimoro kwoŋ jo rupiri go won oido oŋeyo gima ni chuny jo.
Nitye nyatoro ma nyinge Nikodemo, jatel pa Joyudaya, mobedo Jafarisayo.
Ŋato obino bongi Yesu Wor achiel to wacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, waŋeyo paka ibedo jafuonji ma Were ama ooro. Ongoye ŋata nyalo timo giraura m'itimo kwanyo woko ka Were ni gine.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho rin, ongoye ŋata nyalo neno Ker pa Were kwanyo woko ka onywole madiryo.”
Nikodemo openjo ni, “Nyalere nedi ŋata otyeko dwoŋ nywolirok kendo? Kole go kinyal donjo i iyi min kendo ŋey wonywol go madiryo!”
Ana Yesu, “Adyeri awacho rin, ongoye ŋata nyalo donjo i Ker pa Were kwanyo woko ka olimo nywolirok ma pi kodi ma Chuny.
Gima del onywolo bedo madel, aka gima Chuny onywolo bende bedo machuny.
Ikiri ibedi gi dhyer ni awacho rin ni, ‘Iripo nywolirok madiryo!’
Kole koyo kudho yu thenge m'omito jye; wiwinjo derino mere, to wikiŋey kama owok'iye kosa kama chom'iye.” Meno bende apaka ŋata onywolere machuny chalo.
To Nikodemo omedo openjo ni, “Gime nyalere nedi?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “In i jafuonji madwoŋ ma Israel gipi, ama ikuya gime?
Adyeri awacho rin, waluwo gima waŋeyo, aka wawacho gima watyeko neno to ongoye moro kwoŋ win ma yeyo jolo mikwenda mawan.
K'inen wikiyey ka awacho ri win gikipiny ma piny ka; onyo winonyal nedi yeyo ka awacho ri win gikipiny ma polo?
Aka ongoye moro motyeko kidho i polo kwanyo woko Wuodi Dhano mobino i piny wok i polo.
“Aka paka Musa oŋawo thwol ma nyweny wi yath moro i thim, apaka bende ibino ŋawo Wuodi Dhano malo.
Ameno nyaka dhano jye ma yeyo go bino bedo gi kwo makirum.
Kole Were omaro piny tektek to miyo Wuode achiel g'achiel, ni nyatoro jye ma yeyo go wokiri wotho to wobedi gi kwo makirum.
Ato Were kooro Wuode i piny ka nike wothumi ri piny banja, to ni piny wonyali limo both kwoŋ go ayino.
Ongoye moro jye ma yeyo Wuodi Were m'ibino thumo ri go banja, to moro jye ma kiyey ama otyek thumo ri go banja ni oloyo go chon kwoŋ bedo koketho yeyo i nyingi Wuodi Were achiel kende.
Me apaka thumo banja bedo: lero obino i piny to ji jomaro mudho ayino kapa lero, rupiri jotimo gikipiny marecho.
Aka moro jye ma timo gikipiny marecho meno odak lero aka kibin kama di lero, rupiri kimiti ni tim pere marecho wonyuthere kamaler.
To ŋata timo gimotire bino kama di lero, ŋey lero wonyuthi nike go otimo tich pere munyo winjo Were.”
Rumachien Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere jokidho i adech ma Yudeya to chowo kenyo hongo moro gi jo munyo miyo ji batisimo.
Yohana oido bende miyo ji batisimo i Ayenon, chiegin gi Salim, rupiri pi oido nitye kenyo kweth. Ji oido jokidho bonge hongo jye womiyi jo batisimo.
(Gime otimere ma Yohana oido fuodi kotwey.)
Jofuonjirok pa Yohana megi jochako pyem kodi Jayudaya moro kwoŋ lonyirok ma nyadin.
Gikenyo jobino bongi Yohana to jowacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, dhano moido nitye kodin loka mecha ma Yordan miluwo kwoŋe, pama miyo ji batisimo aka dhano jye onyo kidho bonge!”
Yohana odwoko ni, “Ongoye dhano ma nyalo bedo gi gimoro kwanyo woko ka Were amomiyo go.
Wiwegi wibedo jokony paran ni awacho ni aŋata akibedo Kristo, to ooran telo ri go ayin.
“Jamweha ama migole manyako bedo apere; jakony pa jamweha chungo ruŋete to chiko ithe wowinji gima timere, aka go sangala swa ka owinjo dwondi jamweha. Meno bende apaka kisangala paran onyo oromo.
Go ripo medo ŋeyirok kareno ŋeyirok paran mojere woko.”
Ŋata wok malo i polo ama loyo ji jye; ŋata wok i piny ka meno dhano ma piny ka, aka luwo kwoŋ gikipiny ma piny ka. To Ŋata wok i polo loyo ji jye.
Go luwo kwoŋ gima go otyeko neno gi winjo, to ongoye ŋata jolo mikwenda pere.
To ŋata otyeko jolo mikwenda pere otyeko niaŋo ji gi ranen nike Were obedo jaradyeri.
Ŋata Were ooro, luwo wach pa Were, rupiri Were miyo go Chuny Maleŋ mopoŋ ma kobuyo.
Were Baba omaro Wuode aka oketho gimoro jye i chingi go.
Ŋata yeyo Wuode nitye gi kwo makirum; ŋata kiwinji Wuode kolimi kwo, to keme pa Were ama bino tundo ri go.
Munyo Yesu oniaŋ nike Jofarisayo jotyeko winjo ni go onyo ywayo ji bonge aka miyo ji madit batisimo loyo Yohana,
(Iyadyeri, Yesu komiyo nyatoro batisimo, to jofuonjirok pere ama oido jotimo ameno.)
Go oeye Yudeya to gik yu Galileya;
Aka go onwaŋo ripo luwo gi Samarya.
Go obino i tindi ma Samarya milwoŋo ni Sika, moido chiegin gi ndelo ma Yakobo chango omiyo Yozefu, wuode.
Waŋ pi pa Yakobo oido ni kenyo, aka Yesu munyo ool gi woth, obedo piny dho waŋ pi no oido obedo odyechieŋ kapa sawa auchiel.
Dhasamarya moro obino kulo, to Yesu wacho ri go ni, “Miyan ye pi amadhi.”
(Jofuonjirok pere onwaŋo fuodi jokidho i tindi nyiewo chiemo.)

Dhasamarya no odwoko ni, “Kole in i Jayudaya aka an a Jasamarya; inyalo nedi kwayan pi amadha?” (Ato Joyudaya oido jokitiyere gi Josamarya kosa jokiori atewe pa Josamarya kendo jokimadhi pi gi agwetin ma Josamarya jomadhiye pi.)
Yesu odwoko ni, “Bedi iŋey mich pa Were kodi ŋata kwayin pi amadha, d'ikwayo go aka d'omiyin pi makwo.”
Dhako no owacho ni, “Jadwoŋ kole ingoye kodi gitwomo pi aka waŋ pi luth. Inonwaŋ kune pi makwo m'iwacho no?
Iparo ni idwoŋ loyo kwari wan Yakobo momiyo wan waŋ pi me; aka go kodi wote, kodi mwendi pere jomadho pi me?”
Ana Yesu ni, “Moro jye ma madho pi me bino winjo riyo kendo;
to ŋata omadhi pi ma abino miyo go odoko kibino winjo riyo kendo. Aka pi ma anomiy go bino lokere i go waŋ pi mamol to miyo go kwo makirum.”
Ana dheno ni, “Jadwoŋ, miyan pi no aka ŋeyi akir adoko awinji riyo kosa adwoki ka kendo kulo.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Kidhi ilwoŋ chworin idwoki gine ka”
Dheno odwoko ni, “Angoye gi chworan.” Ana Yesu ni, “Itire wacho ni ingoye gi chworin,
rupiri ityeko nywomirok gi chwo abich, aka ŋata pama ibedo gine no bende kobedo chworin. Iwacho giradyeri.”
Dhako no owacho ni, “Jadwoŋ, onyo aniaŋ ni kere i jatuchi wach Were.
Kole kwarere mawan yado jolamo Were wi got me, to win wi Joyudaya wiwacho ni Yerusalem a kuma waripo lam'iye Were.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Dhako me, yeyi gima awacho rin; hongo bino tundo ma ji jokolam Baba wi got me kosa kada i Yerusalem.
Win Josamarya wilamo gima wikuya; to wan Joyudaya waŋeyo gima walamo, kwoŋbedo both wok bongi Joyudaya.
To hongo bino, aka ee otyeko kir tundo, ma joma lamo Baba i yo motire, jobino lamo go i Chuny kodi iyadyeri, rupiri Baba yenyo joma lamo go ameno.
Were obedo Chuny aka joma lama go joripo lamo go i chuny kodi iyadyeri.”
Dhako no owacho ri go ni, “Aŋeyo ni Mesiya (milwoŋo ni Kristo), lebino, aka ka obino lewacho ri wan kis gimoro.”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “An won a go, an maluwo kodin me.”
I hongo no won to jofuonjirok pa Yesu jodwoko, to jodhyer swa munyo jonwaŋo go luwo kodi dhako. To ongoye kwoŋ jo ŋata openjo go kada ni, “Imito aŋo?” kosa ni, “Raŋo m'iluwo gi dheno?”
Gikenyo dhako no oweyo dakipi pere, ogik i tindi, to wacho ri ji ma kenyo ni,
“Biye neni win dhano mowacho ran gimoro jye matyeko timo, kosa go a Kristo?”
Gikenyo ji joay i tindi to jokidho bongi Yesu.
I hongo no jofuonjirok oido jokwayo Yesu nike, “Jafuonji, chiemiye!”
To odwoko jo ni, “Anitye gi chiemo achama ma wikuya.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok pere wegi jochako penjirok kendigin ni, “Yagi, kosa moro nende okelo ri go chiemo?”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Chiemo paran obedo timo gima ŋata ooran yenyo gi chowo tich pere.
“Wingoye gi agecha ma wimaro luwo ni, ‘Odoŋ dwe aŋwen to kecho tundo?’ Awacho ri win, kaŋasa win ndelin maber: gim'ochwoy pama otyeko chiek aka otundo akecha.
Ŋata kecho limo kemba, aka ameno go choko gimonyak ri kwo makirum, ŋey jachwoyo kodi jakecho jye jowosangala kanyachiel.
Kole agecha me ripo ni, ‘Ŋatachiel chwoyo aka ŋat man kecho.’
Adhiro win kecho gima wikichwoyo; joman ama jonekere gi tich mere, aka onyo widonjo limo bero ma wok i kwok pajo.”
Josamarya mathoth ma tindi no joyeyo Yesu rupiri dhako no owacho ri jo ni, “Go owacho ran gimoro jye matyeko timo.”
Gikenyo Josamarya jobino bonge to jokwayo go nike wobedi gi jo, to Yesu bedo kenyo ndelo aryo.
Ji mathoth man joyeyo go ru fuonji pere,
aka jowacho ri dhako no ni, “Pama onyo wayeyo go, ki ru kwoŋbedo gima iwacho, to rupiri wawegi watyeko winjo go, aka onyo waŋeyo adyeri ni go a Jaboth pa piny.”
Munyo ndelo aryo no orumo, Yesu oeye kenyo to kidho Galileya,
kada nende go won onwaŋo otyeko wacho ni, “Jatuchi wach Were kimiy go dwoŋ i piny pere won.”
To munyo go otundo Galileya, ji jojolo go, rupiri jo wegi ndir cha jokidho Yerusalem i ndelo madwoŋ ma kalima ma Kadho to joneno gimoro jye ma go otimo i kalima no.
Gikenyo Yesu ogik i Kana ma Galileya, kama go ndir cha olok'iye pi vini. Kenyo onwaŋo nitye jadwoŋ moro ma wuode oido two yu Kapernaum.
Munyo jalo owinjo ni Yesu obino Galileya wok Yudeya, okidho bonge to kwayo go nike wokidhi Kapernaum wobothi ri go wuode monwaŋo chiegin tho.
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ato ka wikineno ranyuth madongo wikoyey!”
Jadwoŋ ma Jaroma no odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, bowe wakadhi ka fuodi nyathi paran kotho.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Kadhi, wuodin bino kwo!” Jalo oyeyo gima Yesu owacho ri go to kadho.
Munyo fuodi ni royo kadho, jotich pere joromo gine to jowacho ri go ni wuode kwo.
Go openjo jo ni two oweyo go keraŋo, to jowacho ni, “Nyoro odyechieŋ kapa sawa abiryo ama two no owey'iye go.”
Gikenyo bamere opoyo ni i hongo no won ama Yesu owach'iye ri go ni, “Wuodin bino kwo.” Ri ameno go kodi pecho pere gipi joyeyo.
Me obedo giraura mararyo ma Yesu otimo munyo otyeko wok Yudeya okidho Galileya.
Rumachien, kalima pa Joyudaya ma nyadin obedo to Yesu kidho Yerusalem.
I Yerusalem, dho waŋkach milwoŋo ni Ma Rombo, ma i Dhoyudaya ilwoŋo ni Bethzatha, nitye dago moro mani gi kadonjo abich.
Aka kidhur ji matwo oido jonitye dho kadonjo no jye. Joma waŋ gin otho, jomoŋol, kodi jomatwo nyaŋinya. [Jono onwaŋo jokuro pi woichere;
rupiri dichiel dichiel malaika pa Ruoth oido bin loro piny i dago no to icho pi. Aka jatwo m'open donjo i dago no ka otyek icho pi, ama two pere ma nger jye both woko.]
Kenyo onwaŋo nitye nyatoro monwaŋo otyeko two oro pyeradek g'aboro.
Munyo Yesu oneno go opyele piny kenyo, to ŋeyo nike ŋato oido otyeko two hongo malach; ameno openjo go ni, “Imito bedo maber?”
Jatwo no odwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, angoye gi moro ma nyalo kethan i dago ka pi oichere; ka nyaka ni atem donjo i pi, ŋat man ama telo donjo ran.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ayi malo, kwanyi par perin, iwothi.”
Piyo piyo no, ŋato obedo maber, okwanyo par pere, to wotho kadho. Ndelo no oido obedo Sabato pa Joyudaya,
amomiyo jowacho ri ŋata owok both no ni, “Kole konon Sabato, aka Chik kiyeyin tiŋo par perin.”
Go odwoko ni, “Ŋata obothan owacho ni, Tiŋi par perin iwothi.”
Aka jopenjo go ni, “Manago ŋa no m'owacho rin ni itiŋ par perin iwothi?”
To jalo koŋeyo ŋatago, rupiri Yesu oido otyeko rwenyo i dyer ji mathoth moido jonitye kenyo.
Rumachien, Yesu onwaŋo go i Ot pa Were to wacho ri go ni, “Neni, pama onyo ityeko bedo maber! Onyo ikiri idoko igiki i timo recho, ka kameno giman nyalo timin marach maloyo meno.”
Gikenyo ŋato okadho to wacho ri Joyudaya ni Yesu ama obotho go.
Ru wach me, Joyudaya jochako lweny gi Yesu, rupiri omaro timo gima pameno i Sabato.
To Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Kole Baba tiyo noknok, aka abende onyo atiyo.”
Wach me omiyo Joyudaya jomedo ridho paro ma neko go; rupiri go oido koturo nyaka chik ma Sabato kende, to oido wacho bende ni Were meno Bamere won, aka ameno go won kethere i kabedo marom g'apa Were.
Gikenyo Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, Wuodi Were kitim gimoro gi men pere won; to go timo gima oneno Bamere timo. Gima Bamere timo ama Wuode bende timo.
Kole Were Baba omaro Wuode aka nyutho go gimoro jye ma go won timo. Go bino nyutho Wuode kir gikipiny maloyo me, aka wibino uro
rupiri paka Bamere chierino jomotho aka miyo jo kwo, apaka Wuode bende miyo joma go oyenyo kwo.
Baba won kithumi banja ri nyatoro, to omiyo Wuode men jye ma thumo banja
aka ŋey dhano jye wowori Wuodi Were paka joworo Bamere. Ŋata kiwor Wuodi Were meno bende kiwor Bamere mooro go.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, nyatoro jye ma winjo wach paran, to yeyo ŋata ooran, nitye gi kwo makirum. Aka kothumi ri go banja rupiri go otyeko wok i tho odonjo i kwo.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ndir bino tundo aka otyeko kir tundo ma jomotho jobino winj'iye dwondi Wuodi Were, aka dhano jye ma winjo dwonde bino kwo.
Ato paka Baba ni gi kwo kwoŋe, apaka otyeko miyo Wuode bende bedo gi kwo kwoŋe.
Aka go otyeko miyo Wuode men ma thumo banja, rupiri go obedo Wuodi Dhano.
Wikiri widhyeri kwoŋ gime; kole ndir bino ma jomotho jye ma jonitye i kalyel jobino winj'iye dwonde,
aka jobino wok kenyo: joma timo gimabeyo jobino chierino to jokwo, aka joma timo recho ibino chierino jo to ithumo banja loyo jo.
“Akinyal timo gimoro awon kendan; athumo banja paka Were wacho ran, amomiyo thumo banja paran otire, rupiri akitem timo gima awon amito, to gima ŋata ooran ama mito.
Bedi awon aluwo gima mako kwoŋan, d'onyo wach paran kibedi motire;
to nitye ŋat man ma chungo aka luwo kaparan, aka aŋeyo nike gima go wacho kwoŋan otire.
“Wioro jomikwenda bongi Yohana aka kole go otyeko luwo ma ridho adyeri no.
Kobedo nike athenere kwoŋ wach pa dhano, to awacho ama aka ŋey wilimi both ayin.
Yohana oido obedo paka tala malyel ka miyo lero, aka wiyeyo kir kisangala i lero pere nyaka hongo machiek.
To wach ma an awodh'iye kony dwoŋ maloyo kir ma Yohana omiyo: ato tich ma an atimo obedo ma Baba ama omiyan timo, aka tich no nyutho kamaler ni Baba ama ooran.
Aka Baba mooran, bende otyeko luwo kwoŋan. Fuodi wikiwinjo dwonde, odoko fuodi wikineno chal pere,
aka wingoye gi wach pere i win; rupiri wikiyeyo ŋata go ooro.
Wifuonjere Ndiiko Maleŋ rupiri wiparo ni wibino nwaŋ'iye kwo makirum; aka kole Ndiiko no ama luwo kwoŋan!
To jye fuodi wikiyey bino bongan limo kwo.
“Akiyeny pak pa ji,
to aŋeyo win maber, nike wingoye kodi mar pa Were i chuny win.
Ee abino i men pa Baba to wikijolan; to ka moro obin gi men pere won, ama wibino jolo.
Onyo winyalo yeyo nedi ka wimito pak mawok bongi wiwegi, aka wikitem limo pak mawok bongi Were won.
Wikiri wipar nike abino kiosa win bongi Baba. Musa ma wigeno kwoŋe no won ama bino kelo kwoŋ win wach.
Bedi wiyeyo Musa, d'onyo wiyeyan bende, rupiri go ondiko gima mako kwoŋan.
To ka wikiyey gima go ondiko, winonyal nedi yeyo gima awacho?”
Rumachien, Yesu ogik to chiewere i wakawaka ma Galileya (kosa ma Tiberya).
Lwak ji madwoŋ oluwo go, rupiri oido joneno ranyuth m'otimo kwoŋ botho jotwo.
Yesu oidho tendere, to bedo piny gi jofuonjirok pere.
Ndelo pa Joyudaya madwoŋ ma kalima ma Kadho, onwaŋo orikere.
Munyo Yesu oŋiyo kor gi korin to neno ni muma ji madwoŋ onwaŋo bino bonge, openjo Filipo ni, “Wanyalo nyiewo kune chiemo ma nyalo pidho ji me jye?”
(Openjo ama nyaka ma temo Filipo, rupiri go won oido otyeko ŋeyo gima go kidho timo.)
Filipo odwoko ni, “Kada pesa ma romo misara ma dwe auchiel jye kinyal nyiewo mugat ma romo dhano jye biloye kada abila won.”
Jafuonjirok pere man, Andereya, omin Simon Petro owacho ni,
“Jayach moro ee ka mani gi mugat abich ma bel kodi rech aryo. To me bende di kony aŋo ri kweth ji me jye?”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wachi ri ji jowobedi piny.” (Lum oido omore kenyo.) Ameno ji jye jobedo piny. Oido chwo romo chiegin gana abich.
Gikenyo Yesu okwanyo mugat, oketho Were walwa, to poko ji monwaŋo jobedo piny. Apaka bende otimo gi rech, aka ji jye jolimo paka joyenyo.
Munyo ji jye joyeŋ, go owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Choki win ŋinjeŋinje modoŋ; wakiri wawey gimoro wonyiekere kada mathin.”
Gikenyo jochoko gimoro jye, to jopoŋo aditin apar g'aryo ma mugat ma bel ma jomochiemo joweyo odoŋ.
Munyo ji joneno giraura ma Yesu otimo, jowacho ni, “Adyeri me obedo jatuchi wach Were moido ripere bino i piny!”
Munyo Yesu oŋeyo nike oido jomito bino loko go kere gi mbaka, go oeye kenyo to kidho pondo wi got kakende.
Munyo piny oyutho, jofuonjirok pere joloro yu wakawaka to
jodonjo i yee, to jochiewere jogik yu Kapernaum. Piny oyutho kir ma fuodi Yesu kodwoko bongi jo.
I hongo no asur madwoŋ oido kudho aka miyo pi ule marach.
Jofuonjirok oido jotyeko chiewirok ma romo mairo adek kosa aŋwen to joneno Yesu munyo wotho wi pi kareno bino chiegin gi yee; to lworo mako jo.
To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wilwori, kole me an.”
Gikenyo to jorwako go i yee gi kisangala, to piyo piyo no jotundo kamothwo kama onwaŋo jokidh'iye.
Yawere mere muma ji monwaŋo odoŋ loka wakawaka ma kocha joniaŋ nike yee achiel kende amonwaŋo odoŋ kenyo. Aka oido bende joŋeyo nike Yesu kodonjo i ye kodi jofuonjirok pere, to jokadho kendigin.
Onyo yee mogo mowok Tiberya, jotundo thengi pi chiegin kodi kuma muma ji chieŋino jocham'iye mugat, munyo Ruoth otyeko miyo silwany.
Munyo muma ji no joneno ni Yesu ongoye kenyo kodi jofuonjirok pere, jodonjo i yee no to jokidho yu Kapernaum rango go.
Munyo ji jonwaŋo Yesu yu loka, jowacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji, ibino ka i hongo mene?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, wirangan rupiri chieŋino wichamo mugat wiyeŋ wijojye, to ma kiweno ni wineno ranyuth ma giraura.

Wikiri witiy ri chiemo ma nyiekere piyo; to tiyi win ri chiemo ma yindira to kelo kwo makirum. Me a chiemo ma Wuodi Dhano bino miyo win, rupiri Were Baba won otyeko ketho kwoŋ go ranyuth ma ridho wach no.”
Gikenyo jopenjo go ni, “Watimi aŋo ŋey watim tich pa Were?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Me a tich ma Were mito ni witim: Yeyi win ŋata go ooro.”
Jodwoko ni, “Ranyuth aŋo ma giraura ma inotimi aka nyaka wanyal neno to wayeyin? Aŋo m'ilatimo ye won?
Kwarere mawan chango jochamo mana i thim paka ndiiko wacho ni, ‘Omiyo jo mugat mawok i polo achama.’ ”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, Musa ama komiyo win mugat mawok i polo. To Baba won ama miyo win mugat maradyeri mawok i polo.
Rupiri mugat ma Were miyo obedo ŋata loro piny wok i polo aka miyo piny kwo.”
Gikenyo jokwayo go ni, “Jadwoŋ, onyo miyi wan mugat no wok konon.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Abedo mugat ma kelo kwo. Ŋata bino bongan kibino winjo kech, aka ŋata yeyan kibino winjo riyo.
“Aka atyeko kir wacho ri win ni wityeko nenan, to jye fuodi wikiyeyan.
Moro jye ma Baba miyan bino bino bongan. Akoryem woko nyatoro jye m'obin bongan.
Kole abino i piny wok i polo timo gima ŋata ooran yenyo, ma kiweno gima awon ayenyo.
Me a gima ŋata ooran yenyo ni atim: nike ji jye ma go omiyan kiri joworwenyi kada achiel, to nike achierino jo i kwo i ndelo ma rumachien.
Ato me obedo mito pa Baba, nike nyatoro jye moneni Wuode to yeyo go wobedi gi kwo makirum; aka abino chierino go i ndelo ma rumachien.”
Joyudaya jochako kiŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ go rupiri owacho ni, “Abedo mugat ma wok i polo.”
Gikenyo jowacho ni, “Me won ki Yesu wuodi pa Yozefu, aka waŋeyo kir bamere gi min? To raŋo ma go pama kethere wacho ni oloro piny wok i polo?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Weyi win kiŋunyaŋunya wiwegi kendiwin.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo bino bongan kwanyo woko ka Baba mooran oywayo go bongan; aka abino chierino go i ndelo ma rumachien.
Kole ondik i kitawo pa jotuchi wach Were ni, ‘Were bino fuonjo ji jye.’ Moro jye ma winjo Baba aka fuonjere bonge bino bongan.
Me kinyuthi ni nitye moro motyeko neno Baba, kwanyo woko ŋata owok bongi Were kende ama otyeko neno go.
“Adyeri awacho ri win, ŋata yeyo jye nitye gi kwo makirum.
Abedo mugat ma kelo kwo.
Kole kwarere mewin jochamo mana i thim, to jotho.
To ee mugat ma wok i polo ma ka nyatoro ochamo kibino tho.
Abedo mugat ma kelo kwo mobino i piny wok i polo. Ŋata ochamo mugat me bino kwo chil gi chil. Aka mugat ma abino miyo win meno a delkwoŋan, ma abino miyo aka nyaka piny wolimi kwo.”
Gime oero pyem ri Joyudaya wegi kendigin. Jopenjo ni, “Ŋatin nyalo nedi miyo wan delkwoŋe ni wacham?”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win ni ka wikichamo delkwoŋ Wuodi Dhano to wimadho remo pere wikobedi gi kwo i win.
Ŋata chamo delkwoŋan aka madho remo paran nitye gi kwo makirum, aka abino chierino go i ndelo ma rumachien.
Kole delkwoŋan meno chiemo adyeri aka remo paran bende giramadha adyer.
Ŋata chamo delkwoŋan aka madho remo paran bedo i an aka abedo i go.
Baba makwo ooran, aka akwo kwoŋbedo go. Meno bende apaka ŋata chaman bino limo kwo wok kwoŋan.
Amomiyo me obedo mugat mobino wok i polo; kichale kodi mugat ma kwarere win jochamo to jotho. Ŋata chamo mugat me bino kwo chil gi chil.”
Yesu owacho gime munyo fuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya ma Kapernaum.
Jofuonjirok pere mathoth jowinjo gime to jowacho ni, “Kole Fuonji me tek swa. Onyo ŋata nyalo yeyo?”
Munyo, Yesu oŋeyo ni jofuonjirok pere oido joŋunyaŋunya kwoŋ gime, openjo jo ni, “Gime ŋedho chuny wini?
To kosa bedi winen Wuodi Dhano munyo gik malo kama yado go nity'iye chon!
Chuny pa Were ama miyo go kwo; delkwoŋe won bu kony. Wach ma atyeko wacho obedo chuny kodi kwo.
Ama jye nyaka joman kwoŋ win jokiyey.” (Ato Yesu oido oŋeyo wok i chakirok joma jokoyeyo kwoŋ go kodi ŋata d'ochamo ri go sereko.)
Aka omedo wacho ni, “Me amomiyo awacho ri win nike ongoye ŋata nyalo bino bongan kwanyo woko ka Baba ama omiyo go onyalo timo ameno.”
Wok i hongo me, jomathoth moido joluwo go jowire to joweyo ameno luwo go.
Ameno Yesu openjo japar g'aryo ni, “To win, wibende wimito weyani?”
Simon Petro odwoko go ni, “Ruoth, onyo wanokidhi ri wan bongi ŋa man? Kole iŋati inityeye gi wach ma kwo makirum.
Aka onyo wayeyo odoko waŋeyo nike in iŋati Maleŋ mowok bongi Were.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Akiyero win apar g'aryo? To ŋatachiel kwoŋ win obedo jwogi!”
Go oido luwo kwoŋ Yuda, wuodi pa Simon Iskaryot. Rupiri Yuda, kada onwaŋo obedo achiel kwoŋ japar g'aryo, go ama oido kidho chamo ri Yesu sereko.
Rumachien, Yesu owotho yu Galileya; ato komito kidho Yudeya, rupiri Joyudaya oido jomito neko go.
Ndelo ma kalima pa Joyudaya milwoŋo ni ma Wema pa Were onwaŋo orikere chiegin.
Ri ameno wutimin Yesu jowacho ri go ni, “Eye ka ikidhi Yudeya, aka nyaka jofuonjirok perin jobino neno tich m'itimo.
Ongoye ŋata pano tich ma go timo ka mito nike woŋeyere maber. Paka itimo gikipiny me, onyo weyi piny gipi woŋeyi.”
(Kada wutimin go bende oido jokoyeyo go).
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Ndir paran motire fuodi kotundo. To ri win hongo jye ripo.
Ji ma piny kinyal dak win, to jodakan, rupiri amena wacho ri jo nike tim pajo recho.
Wiwegi kidhi win i kalima no, akibino kidh'iye, rupiri hongo paran motire fuodi kotundo.”
Owacho ri jo ameno to bedo i Galileya.
Munyo wutimin jotyeko kadho i kalima, Yesu bende okidho nyaliŋliŋ.
Joyudaya onwaŋo jorango go i kalima no. Jopenjo ni, “Nikune jalago?”
Mwoŋo madit obedo kwoŋ go i dyer kweth ji. Jomegi jowacho ni, “Kole go dhano maber.” Joman ni, “Be, go komo wiy ji.”
To ongoye ŋata oluwo kwoŋe kamaler rupiri oido jolworo Joyudaya.
Kalima oido ni dyere kamapek to Yesu kidho i Ot pa Were to chako fuonjo.
Joyudaya jobedo gi dhyer madwoŋ, ka jowacho ni, “Ŋatin oŋeyo gikipiny kweth ama nedi mato go kofuonjere kada?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Gima afuonjo kobedo aparan won, to wok bongi Ŋatooran.
Ŋata yeyo timo gima Were yenyo bino ŋeyo ka gima afuonjo wok bongi Were kosa ka aluwo gi men paran won.
Kole ŋata luwo gi men pere won temo miyirok dwoŋ. To ŋata mito dwoŋ ri ŋatooro go meno otire, aka ongoye gi twodo i go.
Musa omiyo win Chik, Kameno? To kole ongoye kada ŋatachiel kwoŋ win ma mako Chik no. Raŋo ma wiyenyo nekan?”
To ji jodwoko ni, “Ini gi jwogi kwoŋin! Ŋata yenyo nekin ŋa?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Atimo gimoro nyaka achiel won to wijojye widhyer.
Musa ooro win thumirok (kobedo Musa to kwarere pajo ama jochako), to kole withumo dhano kir i Sabato.
Onyo ka nyathi ma jayach ithumo i Sabato ma kitur Chik pa Musa, raŋo ma wimako nge kodan ni rupiri abotho dhano to bedo maber i Sabato?
Wikiri witer wach moro chungo kwoŋ nyaka gima nenere gi woko, to kutho wiripo niaŋ tyendi wach motire.”
Wok i hongo no ji mogo ma Yerusalem jowacho ni, “Me k'aŋata joradhum joyenyo neko?
Neni! Kole go ee luwo i dyer ji, aka ongoye kir ŋata luwo kwoŋe. Kosa jotel joŋeyo nike go a Kristo?
Kole waŋeyo kama jame wok'iye, mato ka Kristo obin, ongoye ŋata leŋeyo kama go wok'iye.”

Munyo Yesu fuodi medere fuonjo i Ot pa Were, owacho gi dwonde ma malo ni, “Wiparo ni wiŋeyan, aka wiŋeyo kir kama awok'iye? To kole akibino ka gi men paran won. Aka ŋata ooran obedo jaradyeri. Wikuya go,
to an aŋeyo go, rupiri awok bonge aka go ama ooran.”
Gikenyo jotemo mako go, to ongoye ŋata oketho chinge kwoŋe, rupiri ndir pere oido fuodi kotundo.
To kada ameno ji mathoth i dyer kitipa no joyeyo go, aka jopenjere ni, “Ka Kristo obin, otim tich madongo loyo ma jalin otyeko timo?”
Munyo Jofarisayo jowinjo ji madit jomwoŋo gikipiny me kwoŋe, jo kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jooro joserikale ma Ot pa Were mako Yesu.
Yesu owacho ni, “Abino bedo gi win hongo machiek, to agik bongi ŋata ooran.
Wibino rangan to wikonwaŋan; aka kama akidh'iye wikinyal tundo.”
Joyudaya jopenjere wegi kendigin ni, “Jame chiegin kidho kune kama wakinyal nwaŋ'iye go? Kosa go lekidho yu tindin ma Yunani kama ji mawan man jonityeye?
Go wacho ni wibino rangan to wikibino nwaŋan, kendo ni, ‘Wikinyal tundo kama akidh'iye.’ Gime dwoŋ mere aŋo?”
Ndelo machowe ma kalima ama obedo ndelo moloyo dwoŋ. I ndelo no, Yesu ochungo to luwo gi dwonde ma malo ni, “Ka nitye moro jye ma riyo neko wobin bongan womadhi pi,
paka ondik ni, ‘Moro jye ma yeyan, pi mamol ma kelo kwo makirum bino mol wok i chunye.’ ” (
Yesu owacho ama kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ ma joma joyeyo go oido jolelimo rumachien. I hongo no Chuny Maleŋ oido fuodi komiy ji, rupiri Yesu oido fuodi kotiŋ malo i dwoŋ.)
Ji megi kwoŋ jono jowinjo go munyo wacho gime aka jowacho ni, “Ŋat me obedo jatuchi wach Were adyeri!”
Joman jowacho ni, “Jame won a Kristo.” To joman jowacho ni, “Kristo nyalo wok nedi i Galileya.
Kondik ni Kristo bino bedo nyakwar Daudi, aka ibino nywolo go i Bethlehem, tindi pa Daudi?”
Gikenyo tyakirok obedo i dyer jo kwoŋ wach maŋeyo go.
Joman oido jomito mako go, to ongoye ŋata oketho chinge kwoŋe.
Joserikale jogik bongi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi Jofarisayo, ma jopenjo jo ni, “Raŋo ma wikikelo go? ”
Joserikale jowacho ni, “Ongoye ŋata fuodi oluwo paka jame luwo!”
Jofarisayo j openjo ni, “Nyutho ni go onyo otyeko miŋo win bende, kameno be?
Nitye megi kwoŋ jotel mawan kosa Jafarisayo moro ma bende jotyeko yeyo go?
To lwak ji me, paka jokuya Chik pa Musa onyo kole Were okwoŋo jo!”
Achiel kwoŋ Jofarisayo no mobedo Nikodemo ma oido otyeko kidho neno Yesu chon, openjo jowote ni,
“Kere ti Chik mawan yeyo wan thumo banja loyo dhano ma fuodi wakiwinjo wach pere to waniaŋ gima go otimo?”
Jodwoko ni, “Kere ibende iwok yu Galileya? Fuonjereye Ndiiko Maleŋ, aka inoniaŋi ni jatuchi wach Were ongoye ma wok Galileya!”
[Gikenyo dhano jye odok pecho pere.
To Yesu okidho wi got ma Olivet ayin.
Yawere mere odikini, aka go ogik i Ot pa Were. Muma ji gi bee ochokere othoko go, to go bedo piny to chako fuonjo jo.
Gikenyo jofuonji ma Chik kodi Jofarisayo jokelo dhako momak munyo timo chot, to joketho go wochungi ruwaŋ ji jye.
Aka jowacho ri Yesu ni, “Jafuonji, dhako me owok nwaŋo munyo timo chot won.
Kole i Chik mawan Musa owodho or ni dhako ma pameno ripere wogoyi gi telin wotho. Onyo pama, iwacho aŋo?”
Jowacho ama ma chiiko go, ŋey jowokethi kwoŋe banja. To Yesu oluŋere piny to ndiiko i lowo gi lwete.
Munyo jochungo kenyo aka oido fuodi jomedere gi penji pajo, Yesu oay malo to wacho ri jo ni, “Ere nyatoro jye kwoŋ win ma fuodi kotimo gimarach wopen bolo tele kwoŋe.”
Gikenyo go oluŋere piny kendo to ndiiko i lowo.
Munyo jowinjo gino jojye jochako kwalok, achielechiele, chako kwoŋ jomadongo. Joweyo Yesu kenyo kende, gi dhako no munyo ochungo kenyo.
Go otiŋo waŋe malo to wacho ri dheno ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, nikune jo? Ongoye ŋata thumo rin banja be?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ongoye, jadwoŋ.” Yesu odwoko ni, “Onyo abende akothum rin banja. Onyo kadhi rin, to ikiri idoki itim gimarach.”]
Yesu odoko oluwo gi jo ni, “Abedo lero ma piny; ŋata luwan bino bedo gi lero ma kelo kwo aka kowothi i mudho.”
Jofarisayo jowacho ri go ni, “Kole onyo eno iluwo yu thenge perin iwon; kere gima iwacho onyo kobedo adyeri.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Be, kada awon aluwi yu thenge paran jye fuodi gim'awacho otire, rupiri aŋeyo kama awok'iye kodi kama akidh'iye.
Withumo ri ji banja gi ryeko ma nyadhano; to an akithumi ri nyatoro banja.
To kada bedi athum banja ri nyatoro, jye di thumo paran obedo maradyeri, rupiri akinitye kendan i gime; Baba mooran ni kodan.
Ondik i Chik mewin ni ka jokony aryo joyeyere i wach moro, gima jowacho bedo adyeri.
Aridho adyeri ma mako kwoŋan won, aka Baba mooran bende ridho adyeri ma mako kwoŋan.”
Jopenjo go ni, “Benin ni kune?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Wikuya an kosa Baba. Bedi wiŋeyan di wiŋeyo kir Baba bende.”
Yesu owacho gime jye munyo fuonjo i Ot pa Were, dho tyelo kama ikan'iye lim. Aka ongoye ŋata omako go rupiri ndir pere oido fuodi kotundo.
Yesu owacho ri jo kendo ni, “Abino kadho ran; aka wibino rangan, to wiletho i gimarecho mewin. Kama akidh'iye wikinyal tundo.”
To Joyudaya jowacho ni, “Ka go wacho ni wakinyal kidho kama go kidh'iye, dwoŋ mere nike go ledere wotho?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Win wichakere i piny, to an awok malo. Win ji ma piny ka, to an a ki dhano ma piny ka.
Amomiyo awacho ri win nike wibino tho i gimarecho mewin. Aka wibino tho i gimarecho mewin rupiri wikiyey nike, ‘An a Go ma atucho ri win.’ ”
Gikenyo jopenjo ni, “In a ŋa”? Ana Yesu ni, “Gima atyeko wacho ri win wok chon.
Gikipiny dit ma aripo wacho ri win odoko wach thoth ma aripo kelo kwoŋ win. To ŋata ooran, obedo jaradyeri, aka awacho ri piny gima awinjo wok bonge.”
Jokonyalo niaŋ nike go oido luwo ri jo kwoŋ Bamere.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Ka wityeko ŋawo malo Wuodi Dhano nyaka wibino ŋeyo ni, ‘Ana Go,’ aka wibino ŋeyo nike akitimi gimoro gi wi tungan, to awacho gima Baba ama ofuonjan.
Aka ŋata ooran ni kodan, koweyan kendan, rupiri ndir jye atimo gima sangala go.”
Jomathoth ma jowinjo Yesu munyo wacho gikipiny me joyeyo go.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri Joyudaya ma joyeyo go ni, “Ka wiwinjo fuonji paran to wichwir'iye meno wijofuonjirok paran adyeri;
wibino ŋeyo adyeri, aka adyeri no bino miyo wibedo i syem.”
Jodwoko ni, “Kole wabedo nyikway Ibrayimu, kendo fuodi wakibedo ŋechin pa nyatoro, odoko iwacho nedi ni ibino loko wan joma ni syem?”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, moro jye ma timo gimarach meno ŋecha pa gimarach.
Ndir jye ŋecha kibedi japecho; to nyathi anywola ama ndir jye bedo japecho.
Ka Wuodi Were omiyo win syem, wibino bedo joma ni syem adyeri.
Aŋeyo nike wibedo nyikway Ibrayimu. To kada ameno jye fuodi wirango nekan, rupiri wikiyey jolo fuonji paran.
Aluwo kwoŋ gima Baba onyuthan, to win witimo gima bawin owacho ri win.”
Gikenyo jodwoko go ni, “Bawan obedo Ibrayimu.” Yesu odwoko ni, “Bedi adyeri winyithindho pa Ibrayimu, di witimo gima chango go otimo.
To an ma awacho ri win adyeri ma awinjo bongi Were, ama jye fuodi wimito nekan. Kole Ibrayimu kotimo gima chal ameno!
Adyeri witimo gima bawin otimo.” Jodwoko ni, “Wakibedo nyithindho ma dudi. Wanitye gi Bawan achiel kende, Were won gipi.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Bedi Were a Bawin adyeri, di wimaran, rupiri awok bongi Were aka onyo ani ka. Akibino gi wi tungan, to go ama ooran.
To raŋo ma wikiniaŋ gima awacho? Obedo rupiri wikimiti winjo fuonji paran.

Wibedo nyithindho pa bawin, jwogi, aka wimito timo gima bawin no yenyo. Wok chon go oido janek. Fuodi go kobedo yu thenge maradyer, rupiri adyeri ongoye i go. Ka go twodo meno go timo gikula pere won, rupiri go jatwodo aka go a baa jotwodo jye.
To rupiri awacho ri win giradyeri amomiyo wikiyeyan.
Ŋa kwoŋ win ma nyalo nyutho ni atimo gimarach? To k'inen awacho giradyeri raŋo ma wikiyeyan?
Ŋata wok bongi Were winjo wach pa Were. Gima omiyo wikiyey winjo wach paran, obedo rupiri wikibedo apa Were.”
Joyudaya jopenjo Yesu ni, “Kere wakinuŋo munyo wawacho nike in i Jasamarya aka jwogi ni kwoŋin?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Angoye gi jwogi moro jye, aworo Baba, to win wikiworan.
Akirangi dwoŋ paran awon, to nitye Ŋata rango aka ama bino bedo jathumi banja.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ni ŋata winjo fuonji paran kibino tho.”
Joyudaya jowacho ri go ni, “Pama onyo nyaka waŋeyo odocho nike initye gi jwogi. Ibrayimu kodi jotuchi wach Were jotho, aka odoko iwacho ni, ŋata winjo fuonji perin kibino tho.
Onyo iwacho nike idwoŋ loyo Ibrayimu Bawan motyeko tho. Aka jotuchi wach Were bende jotho. Iparo nike in i ŋa?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Bedi awon amiyere dwoŋ, dwoŋ paran donyo ongoye gimoro. Ŋata miyan dwoŋ manago Baba -- aka a ŋata wilwoŋo ni Were mewin.
Fuodi wikiŋeyo kir go, to an aŋeyo go aka awinjo wach pere. Bedi awachi ni akuya go, d'abedo jatwodo paka win. To aŋeyo go aka awinjo wach pere.
Bawin Ibrayimu osangala nike oido leneno ndelo paran; oneno aka osangala.”
Joyudaya jowacho ri go ni. “K'inen fuodi ikirom kada oro pyero abich, ama iwacho ni ityeko neno Ibrayimu?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, ma fuodi konywol Ibrayimu oido anitye.”
Ru meno jodimo telin ma goyo gine go to go opondo to eye i Ot pa Were.
Munyo Yesu wotho, oneno ŋat moro ma chango onywol ma waŋe otho.
Jofuonjirok pere jopenjo go ni, “Jafuonji, ŋata otimo gimarach momiyo ŋat me onywol ma waŋe otho? Gimarach pere woni, kosa apa jonywol pere?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Tho waŋ pere kimaki kwoŋ gimarach pere kosa apa jonywol pere. Go waŋe otho nike nyaka tich pa Were wonenere ka tiyo i go.
Ka fuodi piny ler waripo timo tich pa ŋata ooran, mudho bino, ma ongoye dhano monyal tich.
Ka fuodi anitye i piny aŋata abedo lero ma piny.”
Munyo otyeko wacho ameno, Yesu oŋulo law piny to dwanyo lowo mathin gi law no to mwono waŋ ŋato gi chwodho no,
aka owacho ri go ni, “Kidhi ilwoki waŋin i Jwom Silowam.” Gikenyo ŋato okidho lwoko waŋe, to dwoko ma waŋe neno.
Joger pere kodi ji moido jotyeko neno go munyo kwayere, jopenjo ni, “Me won k'aŋata yado bedo piny aka kwayere?”
Jomegi jowacho ni, “Me go won,” to joman jowacho ni, “Be, ki go, chale gine ayino.” Gikenyo ŋato won owacho ni, “An won a ŋatago.”
Jopenjo go ni, “To waŋin oyawere nedi won?”
Go odwoko ni, “Jal milwoŋo ni Yesu odwanyo chwodho moro, omwono gine waŋan, to wacho ran ni, ‘Kidhi i jwom Silowam ilwoki waŋin.’ Gikenyo akidho, to tekin atyeko lwoko waŋan to anyalo neno.”
Jopenjo go ni, “Go ni kune?” Go odwoko ni, “Akuya ran.”
Gikenyo jotero ŋata yado waŋe oido otho me bongi Jofarisayo.
Ndelo ma Yesu odwany'iye chwodho aka oyawo waŋ ŋato oido obedo Sabato.
Amomiyo Jofarisayo odoko jopenjo ŋata waŋe yado otho no paka ochako neno. Go owacho ri jo ni, “Go oketho chwodho moro i waŋan, to alwoko waŋan aka onyo aneno.”

Jofarisayo mogo jowacho ni, “Ŋata otimo gino kinyal wok bongi Were, rupiri go kikur chik ma Sabato.” To joman jowacho ni, “Ŋata jarecho d'onyalo nedi timo tich madwoŋ ameno?” To tyakirok bedo i dyer jo.
Gikenyo Jofarisayo odoko jopenjo ŋato ni, “Iwacho nike go oyawo waŋin, to iwon iwacho aŋo kwoŋ go?”
Ana go ni, “Go jatuchi wach Were.” Gikenyo Joyudaya jokomito yeyo nike go oido waŋe otho aka onyo pama neno, chuka jolwoŋo jonywol pere
to jopenjo jo ni, “Me wuodi win? Wiwacho nike go onywol ma waŋe otho? Ka ameno, raŋo ma go pama neno?”
Jonywol pere jodwoko ni, “Waŋeyo nike go wuodi wan, aka go onywolere ma waŋe otho.
To wakuya paka go ochako neno, kosa ŋata oyawo waŋe. Penji win go won; kole go otegino, aka won nyalo luwo kwoŋe.”
Jonywol pere jowacho ama kwoŋe rupiri oido jolworo Joyudaya; ato Joyudaya oido jotyeko ridho ni moro jye m'otucho ni Yesu obedo Kristo ibino ryemo go woko i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Amomiyo jonywol pere jowacho ni, “Kole go otegino; penji win go won!”
Gikenyo jodoko jolwoŋo ŋat monywol ma waŋe otho no mararyo to jowacho ri go ni, “Miyi Were dwoŋ. Waŋeyo nike jalo jagimarach.”
Ŋato odwoko ni, “Akuya kosa go jagimarach kosa be, to gima aŋeyo kende a ni oido waŋan otho to pama onyo aneno.”
Jomedo penjo go ni, “Go otimo rin aŋo won? Oyawo waŋin nedi?”
Go odwoko ni, “Atyeko wacho ri win, to wikwero winjo. Aŋo man ma wimito winjo kendo? Kono miti wibende wimito bedo jofuonjirok pere!”
Gikenyo jokwoŋo go to jowacho ni, “Ibedo jafuonjirok pa jalo; wan wabedo ri wan jofuonjirok pa Musa.
Waŋeyo ni Were oluwo gi Musa; to jalo, wakuya kiri kama go wok'iye!”
Ŋato odwoko ni, “Iraŋo? Meno obedo gidhyer swa! Wikuya kama go wok'iye, mato go oyawo kir waŋan!
Waŋeyo nike Were kiwinji jomarecho; go winjo joma jomiyo go dwoŋ aka jotimo gima go mito.
Wok i chakirok pa piny fuodi kowinji ni nyatoro oyawo waŋ dhano monywol ma waŋe otho.
Kole bedi ŋat me kowok bongi Were, di konyalo timo gimoro.”
Jodwoko go ni, “In m'idongo gi recho wok i nywolirok perin bende onyo ifuonjo wan aŋo?” To joryemo go woko i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Yesu owinjo ni joryemo go woko, to munyo onwaŋo go, openjo go ni, “Iyeyo Wuodi Dhano?”
Ŋato odwoko ni, “A ŋa no jadwoŋ, ŋey ayey go?”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ityeko neno go, aka go won ama luwo kodin pama me.”
Ŋato owacho ni, “Ruoth, ayeyo,” to lamo Yesu.
Yesu owacho ni, “Abino i piny ka thumo banja, ŋey joma waŋ gin otho jowoneen, aka jomaneno jowolokere joma waŋ gin otho.”
Jofarisayo megi, monwaŋo jonitye bonge kenyo, jowinjo go wacho ameno to jopenjo go ni, “Onyo nyutho ni wabende waŋ wan otho?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Bedi waŋ win otho d'onyo wingoye gi recho; to paka wiwacho ni winyalo neno, dwoŋ mere kere fuodi winitye i recho.”
“Adyeri awacho ri win, ŋata kidonji i dyer sidwol roombo gi dhoot, to idho gi yu thenge man, meno go jakwo kendo jamahembi.
Ŋata donjo gi dhoot meno a jakwath roombo.
Jakuri dhoot yawo ri go, roombo jowinjo dwonde aka go lwoŋo roombo pere gi nyingi gin aka wodho jo woko.
Ka otyeko wodho jo woko, telo jo, to joluwo go, rupiri joŋeyo dwonde.
Jokibino luwo ŋat man, jobino ŋwech jowoeye bongi ŋato ayino, rupiri jokuya dwonde.”
Yesu owacho ri jo agecha me, to jokoniaŋ gima go owacho no.
Yesu odoko owacho ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, Aŋata abedo dhoot pa roombo.
Joman jye ma jotelo yu wiyan jobedo jokwo kendo jomahembi; to roombo kowinjo jo.
Aŋata abedo dhoot. Moro jye madonjo gi bongan bino both; go bino donjo to wok, to nwaŋo lum moloth.
Jakwo bino nyaka kwalo, neko kodi nyieko woko. An abino nike jowolimi kwo, aka kwo ma gi bee.
“Aŋata abedo jakwath maber. Jakwath maber yeyo tho ri roombo pere.
Jatich achula kibedi won roombo, ka oneno arara bino, weyo jo to ringo, to arara kwanyo roombo to kedho jo woko.
Go ringo rupiri go jatich achula, aka kidew kwoŋ roombo.
An a jakwath maber. Aŋeyo roombo paran,
aka bende joŋeyan paka Baba oŋeyan, aka abende aŋeyo go, aka ayeyo tho ri roombo.
Ani gi roombo man ma jongoye i sidwol me. Aripo kelo jo bende; jobino winjo dwondan, aka jobino lokere sidwol achiel kodi jakwath achiel.
“Baba omaran rupiri ayeyo bolo woko kwo paran, rumachien to adoko anwaŋo kendo.
Ongoye ŋata kwanyo kwoŋan kwo me. Awon arwenyo woko gi mito paran. Anitye gi men ma rwenyo go woko, kendo anitye gi men ma dwoko go. Me gima Baba ooran timo.”
Tyakirok odoko obedo i dyer Joyudaya ru wach me.
Jomathoth kwoŋ jo jowacho ni, “Go nitye gi jwogi! Neko omako! Wiwinjo luwo pere raŋo?”
To joman jowacho ni, “Ŋata ni gi jwogi kinyal luwo ama! Jwogi bende di nyal botho joma waŋ gin otho?”
I hongo no ndir otundo ma kalima ma lonyirok i waŋ Were, mobedo i Ot pa Were i Yerusalem; i ndir no pe oido oŋicho piny.
Yesu oido wotho i kalikondi pa Solomon i Ot pa Were, to
Joyudaya jochokere jothoko go kenyo to jowacho ri go ni, “Ileweyo wan i kiganagana kir keraŋo? Wachi ri wan kamaler ka in a Kristo.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Atyeko wacho ri win, to wikimiti yeyo. Tich ma atimo i nyingi Baba ama luwo ran;
to wikibino yeyo rupiri wingoye i roombo paran.
Roombo paran winjo dwondan; aŋeyo jo, aka joluwan.
Amiyo jo kwo makirum, aka jokibino tho; ongoye moro ma bino mayan jo.
Baba momiyan jo dwoŋ loyo ji jye, aka ongoye nyatoro ma nyalo kwanyo jo woko i chingi Baba.
Aka wan kodi Baba wabedo achiel.”
Gikenyo Joyudaya odoko jokwanyo telin ma goyo gine go.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Atyeko timo tich mabeyo madit mowok bongi Baba; onyo mene kwoŋ jo ma wimito goyan'iye gi telin?”
Joyudaya jodwoko ni, “Wakimiti goyin ru tich mabeyo mitimo, to ru luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were, rupiri in idhano aka ikethere lwoŋirok ni ibedo Were!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Kere kondik i Chik mewin wegi nike Were owacho ni, ‘Wibedo werin?’
Ka Were olwoŋo jomokel rijo wach pere ni werin (aka gima ondik kiturere),
onyo winowachi ri ŋata Were ooro i piny ni go luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were ni rupiri awacho ni abedo Wuodi Were?
Ere onyo wikiri wiyey k'inen akitim tich pa Baba.
To k'inen atimo gikipiny ago, kada nende wikiyeyan, yeyi win kada nyaka tich no aka winoŋey kichutho ni Baba nitye i an aka anitye i go.”
Gikenyo odoko jotemo mako Yesu to budho jo.
Yesu odoko ogik ochiewere i Yordan to por loka yu kama yado Yohana batis'iye ji to bedo kenyo.
Ji madit jobino bonge aka jowacho ni, “Yohana kotimo giraura moro, to gima go owacho kwoŋ jame jye obedo adyeri.”
Aka ji kweth joyeyo go kenyo.
Dhano milwoŋo ni Lazaro, ma Bethaniya oido two. Me obedo tindi ma Marya kodi Maritha, nyamin go, oido jobed'iye.
(Marya me ama ndir moro oolo mo maŋwe kur i tyendi Ruoth to yweyo gi yewiye; aka ama Lazaro, omin go, oido two.)
Nyimere no jodhiro wach ri Yesu ni, “Ruoth, mere perin m'imaro two.”
Munyo Yesu owinjo, owacho ni, “Two pa Lazaro kilechowere gi tho; gime otimere ma nyutho dwoŋ pa Were, aka nyaka Wuodi Were wolim'iye dwoŋ.”
Yesu oido omaro Maritha gi nyamin, kodi Lazaro.
To kada munyo go owinjo wach ni Lazaro two, omedo bedo kama oido ni iye ndelo aryo man.
Gikenyo nyaka go owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Weyi wagiki win Yudeya kendo.”
Jofuonjirok jodwoko ni, “Jafuonji kole nyaka okadho hongo machiek won chuka Joyudaya jomiti goyin gi telin, ama odoko onyo iyiko gik yu korago?”
Yesu owacho ni, “Ndelo nitye gi sawa apar g'aryo, kameno? Ka dhano wotho odyechieŋ, kichier, rupiri go neno lero.
To ka go owotho wor, chier, rupiri lero ongoye.”
Yesu omedo wacho ni, “Mere mawan Lazaro nindo, to abino kidho chiewo go.”
Jofuonjirok jowacho ni, “Ruoth, ka go nindo bino bedo maber.”
To wach pa Yesu dwoŋ mere oido ni Lazaro otyeko tho, to joparo nike go wacho nindo ma ndir jye.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jo kamaler ni, “Lazaro otyeko tho;
to ri bero mewin asangala nike onwaŋo angoye yu koro aka ŋey wiyey. Ere weyi wakidhi win bothe.”
Thoma (milwoŋo ni Rut) owacho ri jofuonjirok wadi ni, “Weyi wajojye wakidhi watho kanyachiel gine!”
Munyo Yesu otundo, onwaŋo ni Lazaro oido otyeko bedo ndelo aŋwen i bur.
Bethaniya onwaŋo kitundi mairo aryo wok Yerusalem
aka Joyudaya mathoth onwaŋo jobino limo Maritha kodi Marya gi kweyo chuny jo i teko pajo ma tho pa omin jo.
Munyo Maritha owinjo ni Yesu bino, owok woko romo gine; to Marya odoŋ pecho.
Maritha owacho ri Yesu ni, “Ruoth bedi chieŋino ibedi ka, di omin an kotho.”
To aŋeyo ni kada pama Were bino miyin gimoro jye mikwayo go.
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Omin in lechierino.”
Go odwoko ni, “Aŋeyo ni go bino chierino i ndelo ma rumachien.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Anaŋata chierino kodi kwo; ŋata yeyan bino kwo, kada go otho;
aka ŋata kwo aka yeyan kibino tho. Iyeyo gime?”
Go odwoko ni, “Ey, Ruoth! Ayeyo nike in i Kristo, Wuodi Were, moido genere ni lebino i piny ka.”
Munyo Maritha otyeko wacho gime, ogik pecho lwoŋo Marya nyamin go nyaliŋliŋ. Owacho ri go ni, “Jafuonji obino aka lwoŋin.”
Munyo Marya owinjo gime, oay malo to redo kidho romo gine. (
Yesu oido fuodi kotundo loka no, to oido nitye kama Maritha orom'iye gine.)
Joyudaya monwaŋo jonitye i ot gi Marya moido jokweyo chuny go i teko pere munyo joneno go oay malo to rure woko, joluwo go. Joparo nike oido go kidho dho kalyel ywak.
Munyo Marya otundo kama Yesu ni iye to neno go, opodho piny dho tyende, to wacho ni, “Ruoth, bedi chieŋino ini ka di omin an kotho!”
Munyo Yesu oneno go ywak, aka Joyudaya ma jobino gine bende joywak, geregere omako go, aka owinjo malith swa i chunye.
Openjo jo ni, “Wiyiko go kune?” Jodwoko ni, “Ruoth biye neni.”
Yesu oywak.
Gikenyo Joyudaya jowacho ni, “Neni paka onwaŋo omaro go!”
To jomegi kwoŋ jo jowacho ni, “Ŋata obotho kir waŋ dhano moido otho iraŋo ma di go kogeŋo tho pa jame?”
Geregere odoko omako Yesu to kidho dho kalyel, monwaŋo obedo ŋungu mochul dhoke gi tele.
Yesu omiyo jo or ni, “Kwanyi win woko tele!” Maritha nyamin jatho, odwoko ni, “Ruoth, kole pama onyo go ŋwe marach; chuka yiki go onyo me ndelo maraŋwen!”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Akiwacho rin nike ibino neno dwoŋ pa Were ka iyeyo?”
Gikenyo oŋilo woko tele. Yesu oŋiyo malo to wacho ni, “Baba, afuoyin ni i winjan.
Aŋeyo ni ndir jye iwinjan, to awacho ama ma bero pa ji mani ka, ŋey jowoyeyi ni iŋat'ioran.”
Munyo otyeko wacho gime, okoko gi dwonde ma malo ni, “Lazaro, woki!”
Ŋatotho no owok motwey chinge gi tyende gi nengin, kareno nanga man oboy gine waŋe. Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Gonyi win go, aka wiwey wowothi.”
Joyudaya mathoth ma oido jobino limo Marya joneno gima Yesu otimo, to joyeyo go.
To joman kwoŋ jo jogik bongi Jofarisayo to jowacho ri jo gima Yesu otimo.
Ameno Jofarisayo kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar joromo kodi jopido to jowacho ni, “Watim win aŋo? Neni paka jame onyo timo giraura madit!
Ka wayeyo go omedere gi tich me, ji jye jobino yeyo go, aka Ruodhe ma Roma jobino ay to joŋinyo woko Ot pa Were gi ryemo wako nono mawan gipi!”
Ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo ma nyinge Kaifas, moido a jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar i oro no owacho ni, “Wikuya gimoro kada achiel!
Wikiniaŋ ni ber ri win ka ŋatachiel otho ri ji jye, loyo nono gipi reyirok woko?”
Iyadyeri, go kowacho gime i paro pere won; kwanyo woko paka go oido jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar i oro no, go otucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were nike Yesu chiegin tho ri Joyudaya jye.
Aka ki ri Joyudaya kende, to ma choko kanyachiel nyithindho pa Were ma jokele iye jye.
Amomiyo wok i ndelo no kadho malo jotimo chan ma neko Yesu.
Ri ameno Yesu kowotho kamaler kendo i Yudeya, to oeye to kidho kamoro machiegin gi thim, i tindi milwoŋo ni Efuraim. Kenyo ama go obed'iye gi jofuonjirok pere.
Kalima pa Joyudaya ma Kadho, oido ni chiegin, aka ji mathoth jowok thenge gi thenge jokidho Yerusalem, timo kula ma lonyo delkwoŋ gin ma fuodi kalima no kotundo.
Jo oido jorango Yesu, aka munyo jochokere i Ot pa Were, wegi jopenjere ni, “Wiparo nedi? Kosa go kobin i kalima?”
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi Jofarisayo oido jotyeko wodho or ni ka moro nitye moneno kama Yesu ni iye ripo dhiro wach, ŋey jowomaki go.
Munyo fuodi odoŋ ndelo auchiel aka ndelo ma kalima ma Kadho wotundi, Yesu okidho Bethaniya, kama Lazaro, ma Yesu ochierino kwoŋ jomotho bed'iye.
Joyiko rigo kenyo chiemo mothyeno aka Maritha oido a japoki chiemo kareno Lazaro obedo gi Yesu dhower.
Gikenyo Marya okwanyo chupa mo maŋwe kur swa ma romo adech kilo gipi, ma nyingi yath moro aka mawelo, to olo i tyendi Yesu, to yweyo gi yewiye. Kur pa mo no mamit otweyo ot gipi.
Achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok pa Yesu, Yuda Iskaryot, ŋata oido lechamo ri go sereko, okwero ni,
“Iraŋo kotana mo maŋwe kur me siringi miya adek to ipoko jochandi pesa no?”
Go owacho ama ki ru kwoŋbedo go paro kwoŋ jochandi, to rupiri go oido jakwo. Go oido a jamigowa pesa aka onwaŋo dichieŋ konyere gi pesa me.
To Yesu wacho ni, “Weyi dheno! Oyik ni go wokani mo me chuka ndelo ma yikirok paran.
Ndir jye wibino bedo gi jochandi, to an akibino bedo gi win ndir jye.”
Muma ji madwoŋ jowinjo ni Yesu oido nitye Bethaniya to jokidho kenyo; ki ru wach pa Yesu kende, to ru mito neno Lazaro bende, ma Yesu ochierino kwoŋ jomotho.
Ameno jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jochano neko Lazaro bende;
rupiri ru gimotimere kwoŋe, Joyudaya mathoth joweyo jotel pajo to joyeyo Yesu.
Yawere mere muma ji madwoŋ monwaŋo obino i kalima ma Kadho, jowinjo ni Yesu oido bino Yerusalem.
Ri ameno jokwanyo jangi thith to jokidho romo gine munyo jokoko ni, “Ozana! Silwany pa Were wobedi ri ŋato ma bino i nyingi Ruoth! Silwany pa Were wobedi ri Kere ma Israel!”
Yesu onwaŋo nyathi punda to bedo wiye, paka Ndiiko Maleŋ wacho ni,
“Tindi ma Zayun, ikiri ibedi gi lworo, kole Kere perin bino bongin, mobedo wi nyathi punda.”
Jofuonjirok pere jokoniaŋ kwoŋ gime i hongo no, to munyo Yesu otyek tiŋo malo i dwoŋ nyaka jopoyo nike ndiko owacho gime, aka ni d'otim kwoŋe gime.
Muma ji ma ndelago jobedo bongi Yesu i hongo ma go olwoŋ'iye Lazaro wok i kalyel aka ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho, jomedo nyayo wach no.
Ji kweth jokidho romo gine rupiri jowinjo nike go otimo giraura no.
Gikenyo Jofarisayo wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Wineno, wakinyal gimoro be! Neni win paka piny gipi onyo luwo go”
Joyunani mogo bende oido jobedo megi kwoŋ joma jokidho Yerusalem lamo Were i ndir ma kalima no.
Jobino bongi Filipo, moido wok Bethsaida i Galileya, to jokwayo ni, “Jadwoŋ, wamito neno Yesu.”
Filipo okidho to wacho ri Andereya, aka jaryo no jokidho to jowacho ri Yesu.
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Pama onyo hongo otundo ma miyo Wuodi Dhano dwoŋ.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ka nyingi kal moro k'opidhi i lowo to tho, go doŋ adoŋa achiel mangil. To k'otho, nyaka nywolo nyingi kal momore.
Ŋata won omaro kwo pere, bino rwenyo woko kwo; to ŋata kwero kwo pere i piny ka ama bino kuro ri kwo makirum.
Nyatoro jye ma tiyo ran ripo luwan, aka jatich paran bino bedo kama an'iye. Aka Baba bino miyo nyatoro jye ma tiyo ran dwoŋ.
“Pama chunyan raman; to anowachi nedi? Ni, ‘Baba, bothan kwoŋ hongo me?’ To be, me a gima omiyan atundo i hongo ma chandirok me.
Baba, miyi nyingin dwoŋ.” Gikenyo dwondi jo moro oluwo wok i polo ni, “Atyeko miyo nyingan dwoŋ, kendo abino medo timo ameno.”
Muma ji moido ochungo kenyo owinjo dwondi jo no to jowacho ni manago lithkoth, aka joman jowacho ni, “Chalo malaika oluwo gine!”
To Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Kobedo ri an amomiyo dwondi jo me oluwo, to ri win.
Ndir otundo ma thumo banja ri piny me; kendo jadhum ma piny me onyo ibino ryemo woko.
K'otyek tiŋan malo wok piny abino ywayo ji jye bongan.” (
Ameno, go onyutho kiti tho ma go oido kidho chandirok.)
Muma ji odwoko ni, “Kole Chik mawan wacho ni Kristo bino kwo chil gi chil. To idoko iwacho ni Wuodi Dhano iripo tiŋo malo nedi? Wuodi Dhano no a ŋa?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Lero no fuodi nitye gi win hongo moro ye. Wothi win ka fuodi lero no nitye gi win, ka mudho fuodi koumo win; kole ŋata wotho i mudho kiŋey kuma go chom'iye.
Yeyi win lero no ka fuodi wini gine, ŋey wibedi nyithidho ma lero.” Rumachien munyo Yesu otyeko wacho gime okidho pondo ri jo.
Kada Yesu oido otyeko timo ranyuth madongo me i waŋ jo, jye fuodi jokoyeyo go.
Gime otimere ama ŋey gima jatuchi wach Were, Isaya, owacho wotundi i kare ni, “Ruoth, ŋa moyeyo mikwenda ma wakelo? Were onyutho ŋa men pere?”
Ri ameno jokonyalo yeyo paka Isaya odoko owacho kaman ni,
“Were ochulo waŋ jo to umo paro pajo, nike waŋ jo wokiri woneen, paro pajo wokiri woniaŋi gimoro, ŋey jowokiri jowonyali gik bongan, ni aboth jo.”
Isaya owacho ama rupiri oneno dwoŋ pa Ŋato, aka oluwo kwoŋe.
Kada ameno, jotel pa Joyudaya mathoth bende joyeyo Yesu; to paka onwaŋo jolworo Jofarisayo, jokowacho gino nyatirtir ni aka ŋey wokiri woryem jo woko i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Ato oido jomaro fuoy pa ji loyo fuoy pa Were.
Gikenyo Yesu oluwo gi dwonde mamalo ni, “Nyatoro jye ma yeyan kiyeyan kende to yeyo ŋata ooran bende.
Ŋata nenan meno neno ŋata ooran bende.
Abino i piny ka paka lero ŋey nyatoro jye ma yeyan, wokiri wodoŋi i mudho.
To ka moro winjo mikwenda paran aka kimaki, akithum ri go banja, Ato akibino thumo banja ri piny, to botho piny ayino.
Nitye ŋata bino thumo banja ri nyatoro jye ma kweran aka kijol fuonji paran; wach m'atyeko luwo ama bino bedo jathumi ri go banja i ndelo ma rumachien,
rupiri akiluwo gi men paran won, to Baba am'ooran gima aripo wacho kodi luwo.
Aka aŋeyo nike or pere kelo kwo makirum. Amomiyo gima awacho jye, awacho paka Baba ooran wacho.”
Ma fuodi ndelo ma kalima ma Kadho, kotundo, Yesu oniaŋ nike hongo pere otundo ma eye i piny wokidhi bongi Bamere. Paka ndir jye go oido omaro jopere i piny ka, omaro jo kir i gike.
Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere oido jonitye dhower othyeno. Aka jwogi oido otyeko ketho paro machamo ri Yesu sereko i chuny Yuda wuodi pa Simon Iskaryot.
Yesu oŋeyo ni Bamere otyeko ketho gimoro jye i chinge; go oŋeyo nike owok bongi Were aka onyo go kidho gik bongi Were.
Ri ameno Yesu oay dhower, olunyo nanga pere ma woko, to tweyo taulo i pyere.
Gikenyo okonjo pi mogo i besen, to chako lwoko tyendi jofuonjirok pere, to yweyo gi taulo mapyere.
Munyo otundo bongi Simon Petro, Simon openjo go ni, “Ruoth, onyo ikidho lwoko tyendan?”
To Yesu odwoko ni, “Pama fuodi ikuya gima atimo, to ibino ŋeyo rumachien.”
Ana Petro, “Ikibino lwoko tyendan kada mathin.” Yesu odwoko ni, “Ka akilwoko tyendin meno kere ikinitye kanyachiel kodan.”
Simon Petro odwoko ni, “Ruoth onyo ikiri ilwoki nyaka tyendan kende, to lwoki ran kir chingan gi wiyan bende!”
Yesu owacho ni, “Moro jye motyeko lwok meno otyeko lony kwoŋe gipi aka kiyeny lwok kendo, mitere wolwoki tyende won kende. Wijojye wilony, kwanyo woko ŋatachiel.”
(Yesu onwaŋo otyeko ŋeyo ŋata kidho chamo ri go sereko, amomiyo owacho ni, “Wijojye wilony, kwanyo woko ŋatachiel.”)
Munyo go otyeko lwoko tyendi jo, oruko nanga pere mawoko to gik i kabedo pere dhower. Go openjo ni, “Wiŋeyo dwoŋ gima awok timo ri win?
Wilwoŋan ni Jafuonji kodi Ruoth, aka witire, rupiri meno an adyeri.
Onyo paka an mabedo Ruoth mewin odoko Jafuonji mewin, awok lwoko tyendi win, wibende wiripo lwoko tyendi jowoti win.
Amiyo win ranen, ŋey wibende witim gima awok timo ri win.
Adyeri awacho ri win, ongoye ŋecha maloyo ruoth pere gi dwoŋ, kendo ongoye jamikwenda madwoŋ loyo ŋata ooro go.
Paka pama onyo wiŋeyo gikipiny me, ka witimo ameno wibino limo silwany!
“Akiluw kwoŋ wijojye; aŋeyo joma ayero. To Ndiiko Maleŋ ripo timere mawacho ni, ‘Ŋata ochiemo kodan owire ran marach.’
Awacho ri win gime pama ma fuodi kotimere, aka ka otimere wibino yeyo ni, ‘An a go’.
Adyeri awacho ri win, moro jye ma jolo nyatoro ma aoro, meno bende jolan aka ŋata jolan, meno bende jolo ŋata ooran.”
Munyo Yesu otyeko wacho gime, ochako winjo rem i chunye to luwo kamaler ni, “Adyeri awacho ri win, ŋatachiel kwoŋ win kidho chamo ran sereko.”
Jofuonjirok joŋiyere waŋ, munyo jodhyer swa kwoŋ ŋata go oido wacho.
Achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok ma Yesu omaro, onwaŋo bende obedo kabuti Yesu.
Simon Petro ogwelo ŋato aka owacho ni, “Penji go ŋata go luwo kwoŋe.”
Gikenyo jafuonjirok no ochore chiegin to thenere kwoŋ Yesu to penjo ni, “Manago ŋa, Ruoth?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ŋata abino pilo mugat i achiero t'amiyo go meno a ŋatago.” Gikenyo go okwanyo mugat, opilo, to miyo Yuda, wuodi pa Simon Iskaryot.
Tekin Yuda jolo mugat no, Sitan odonjo kwoŋe. Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Kwaki timo gima iyiko timo!”
Ongoye dhano kwoŋ joma oido jonitye dhower no moniaŋ gimomiyo Yesu owacho ri go ameno.
Paka Yuda ama oido jamigowa, jofuonjirok megi joparo ni Yesu owacho ri go ni wokidhi wonyiewi gima jomito ma kalima, kosa ni womiyi jochandi gimoro.
Tekin Yuda jolo mugat no, owok woko mayot; aka piny oido otyeko yutho.
Munyo Yuda otyeko kadho, Yesu owacho ni, “Pama Wuodi Dhano onyo otyeko limo dwoŋ, aka Were bende onyo otyeko limo dwoŋ i go.
K'inen Were onyo otyeko limo dwoŋ i go, meno Were won gipi ama bino miyo Wuode dwoŋ, aka bino timo ameno mayot.
Nyithindho paran, fuodi abino bedoye gi win hongo machiek. Wibino rangan, aka bende awacho ri win gima atyeko wacho ri Joyudaya ni, ‘Wikinyal tundo kama akidh'iye.’
Amiyo win or manyien ni, marere win. Paka atyeko maro win apaka bende wiripo marere.
Ka kis dhano omaro nyawote, meno aka ji jye jobino ŋeyo nike wijofuonjirok paran.”
Simon Petro openjo ni, “Ruoth, ikidho kune?” Ana Yesu, “Wikinyal luwan kama akidh'iye gi pama; to rumachien aka wibino luwan.”
Petro openjo ni, “Ruoth, raŋo ma akinyal luwin pama? An ayikere kir tho rin!”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Iyikere adyeri tho ran? Adyeri awacho rin, ka fuodi wuodi gweno kokoko, ibino kwedirok kwoŋan didek.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Wikiri wirembi kosa wiguti. Yeyi win Were, aka yeyan win bende.
Kisikin omore i ot pa Baba, aka akidho yiko ri win kabedo. D'akiwacho ri win ama bedi kobedo adyeri.
Aka ka atyeko kidho yiko ri win kabedo, abino dwoko t'aomo win, ŋey wibedi kodan kama ani iye.
Wiŋeyo kama akidh'iye kodi royo mere.”
Thoma owacho ri go ni, “Ruoth, wakuya kama ikidh'iye: wanyalo ŋeyo nedi royo ma tundo korago?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “An aŋata royo, aŋata adyeri, kodi kwo; ongoye ŋata bino bongi Baba, ka koluwo bongan.”
Owacho ri jo ni, “Ka wiŋeyan, meno bende wiŋeyo Baba; aka wok konon onyo wiŋeyo go, aka wityeko neno go.”
Filipo owacho ri go ni, “Ruoth, nyuthi wan Were Bawan, meno won kende leromo wan.”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Atyeko bedo gi win hongo malach ama jye, to fuodi ikuya an, Filipo? Moro jye motyeko nenan meno otyeko neno Baba. To raŋo ma wiwacho ni, ‘Nyuthi wan Were Bawan?’
Wikiyey, ni anitye i Baba aka Baba ni i An? Wach ma atyeko wacho ri win, kiwoki bongan an won. Baba ma bedo i an, ama timo tich pere.
Yeyi win nike anitye i Baba, aka Baba nitye i an. Ka kameno yeyi win kada ru tich pere won.
Adyeri awacho ri win, moro jye ma yeyan bino timo tich ma an atimo, ey, bino timo kir ma loyo me, rupiri akidho bongi Baba.
Aka abino timo gimoro jye ma winokway i nyingan; ameno aka ŋey dwoŋ pa Baba wonyuthere i Wuode.
Ka wikwayo gimoro jye i nyingan abino timo.
“Ka wimaran, wibino mako or paran.
Aka abino kwayo Baba to miyo win Jakony man ma wobedi gi win ndir jye,
meno Chuny maradyeri ma piny kinyal jolo, rupiri kinyal neno go kosa ŋeyo go. To wiŋeyo go, rupiri go nitye gi win aka bino bedo i win.
“Akibino weyo win paka nyithindho kiich; abino dwoko bongi win.
I hongo machiek piny kibino nenan kendo, to wibino nenan; aka paka akwo, wibende wibino kwo.
Ka ndelo no otundo, wibino ŋeyo nike anitye i Baba, aka winitye i an, paka anitye i win.
“Moro jye ma jolo or paran aka mako, meno a ŋata omaran. Baba bino maro ŋata omaran; aka abende abino maro go to anyuthere ri go.”
Yuda (ki Yuda Iskaryot) owacho ni, “Ruoth, onyal bedo nedi nike ibino nyuthere ri wan to ki ri piny?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Nyatoro jye momaran bino winjo mikwenda paran. Baba bino maro go aka wabino bino bino bonge to wabedo bonge.
Nyatoro jye ma komaran kiwinji wach paran. Aka mikwenda ma wityeko winjo k'aparan, to wok bongi Baba m'ooran.
“Atyeko wacho ri win gime jye ma fuodi anitye gi win.
To Jamiy ryeko, Chuny Maleŋ ma Baba bino dhiro i nyingan, bino fuonjo win gimoro jye aka bino poyo win gimoro jye matyeko wacho ri win.
“Syem ama onyo aweyo ri win; amiyo win syem paran; aka akimiy win paka piny miyo. Wikiri wirembi i chuny win; odoko wikiri wibedi gi lworo.
Kole wiwinjo munyo awacho ri win ni, ‘Abino weyo win, to abino dwoko bongi win.’ Bedi wimaran, di wisangala ni akidho bongi Baba, rupiri go loyan gi dwoŋ.
Ato eno atyeko wacho ri win pama, ma fuodi kotimere, aka ka otimere wibino yeyo.
Onyo akibino medo luwo kodi win mathoth, rupiri jadhum ma piny me bino. Go ongoye gi men kwoŋan,
to piny jye ripo ŋeyo nike amaro Baba; amomiyo atimo gimoro jye ma go ooran. Ere ayi win waeye ka.”
“Aŋata abedo yath vini maradyeri, aka Baba a won ndelo mere.
Go turo woko jangi yath moro jye i an ma kinyak, aka sewila to yiko jangi yath jye ma nyak ŋey womedi nyak madit.
Pama onyo wityeko lony gi wach ma atyeko luwo ri win.
Doŋi win i an, aka abende abino doŋ i win; rupiri jangi yath kinyal nyak ka komakere gi yath mere. Wibende wikinyal nyak ka wikidoŋ i an.
“Aŋata abedo yath vini maradyeri, aka win wibedo jangi yath no. Ŋata doŋ i an, aka abende adoŋ i go, bino nyak madit; ato wikinyal timo gimoro jye ma bu an.
Nyatoro jye ma kidoŋi i an chalo jangi yath mibolo woko to thwo woko; jangi yen ma chalo ameno, ichoko kanyachiel to ibolo jo i mach, to jowaŋ woko.
Ka widoŋ i an, to wach paran doŋ i win, winyalo kwayo gimoro jye ma wiyenyo to ibino miyo win.
Me apaka Baba bino limo dwoŋ: Ka wiwodho gimanyak madit ma nyutho ni wibedo jofuonjirok paran.
Amaro win paka Baba omaran; bedi win i mar paran.
Ka wimako or paran, wibino doŋ i mar paran, paka abende amako or pa Baba aka anitye i mar pere.”
“Atyeko wacho ri win gime ŋey kisangala paran wobedi i win, aka kisangala mewin wobedi mopoŋ.
Me a gima aooro win timo: marere win, paka amaro win.
Ongoye mar ma dhano nyalo bedo gine loyo meno ma go nyalo miyo kwo pere ri merin pere.
Wibedo merin paran, ka witimo gima aoro win.
Akilwoŋ win ni jotich kendo rupiri jatich kiŋey gima ruoth pere timo. Kuchiel alwoŋo win ni merin, rupiri atyeko wacho ri win gimoro jye ma awinjo bongi Baba.
Wiŋati wikiyeran, to aŋata ayero win aka adimo win ni wikidhi winyak gima yindira. Meno aka nyaka Baba bino miyo win gimoro jye ma winokway go i nyingan.
Amomiyo, me a gima aoro win timo: marere win”.
“Ka piny dak win, poyi win nike otelo dakan.
Bedi wibedi ji pa piny, di piny omaro win paka ji pere. To ayero win wok i piny me, aka wikibedo apere; amomiyo piny dak win.
Poyi win gima atyeko wacho ri win, ‘Ŋecha ongoye ma loyo ruoth pere gi dwoŋ.’ Ka jolwenyo kodan, jobino lwenyo gi win bende.
To jobino timo ri win gime jye rupiri wibedo ji paran; aka jokuya ŋata ooran.
Bedi akibino to aluwo gi jo di jongoye gi racho; to pama onyo jongoye gi kagoŋirok kwoŋ gimarecho pajo.
Moro jye ma dakan meno dak Baba bende.
Bedi fuodi akitimo idyer jo tich moido fuodi ongoye ŋata otimo, di jongoye gi racho; to pama onyo jotyeko neno gima atimo aka jodak wan gi Baba.
Gime obedo ameno, aka ŋey gima ondik i Chik pajo wotundi i kare ni, ‘Jodakan nono.’
“Ka Jamiyi ryeko, mobedo Chuny maradyeri ma anodhir ri win, ma loro wok bongi Baba obin, go bino luwo kwoŋan.
Aka win bende, wibino pido ran, rupiri wityeko bedo kodan wok i chakirok.
“Awacho ri win gime aka wikiri wiyengere i yeyo mewin.
Jobino ryemo win woko i kalamo pa Joyudaya, aka ndir bino tundo ma moro jye maneko win bino paro nike ka timo ameno meno tiyo ri Were.
Jobino timo gikipiny me ri win rupiri jokuya Baba kosa an.
To awacho ri win gime, ni ka ndir mere otundi, wibino poyo nike atyeko luwo ri win kwoŋe.” “Akutho akiwacho ri win gime rupiri oido fuodi anitye gi win.
Pama onyo akidho bongi ŋata ooran, to ongoye kwoŋ win kada ŋata penjan ni, ‘Ikidho yu kune?’
Ato paka onyo atucho ri win gime, rembo onyo opoŋ i chuny win.
To adyeri awacho ri win: Bedo gimaber ri win ka akadho, rupiri ka akikadho, Jamiyi ryeko kilebino bongi win. To ka atyeko kadho, nyaka abino dhiro ri win go.
Aka ka go obino, go bino miyo piny ramirok kwoŋ gimarecho, kodi tiro, kodi thumo banja;
kwoŋ gimarecho, rupiri jokoyeyan;
kwoŋ tiro, rupiri akidho bongi Baba aka odoko wikonenan;
kwoŋ thumo banja, rupiri jadhum ma piny ka otyek thumo ri go banja.
“Anitye kodi gikipiny man awacha ri win, to gunyoni fuodi wikinyal chiro.
To ka Chuny maradyeri obin, go bino nyutho win adyeri jye. Ato go kibino luwo gi i wiye won, to bino wacho ri win gima go owinjo, odoko go bino nyutho win kwoŋ gima lebino rumachien.
Go bino miyan dwoŋ, rupiri go bino wacho ri win gimoro jye m'okwanyo bongan.
Gimoro jye ma Baba ni gine meno aparan; amomiyo atyeko wacho ri win nike go bino wacho ri win gimoro jye ma go okwanyo bongan.
“I hongo machiek wikibino nenan; to i hongo machiek wibino nenan kendo.”

Megi kwoŋ jofuonjirok pere jopenjere wegi kendigin ni, “Gime dwoŋ mere aŋo? Go wacho ri wan ni, ‘I hongo machiek wikibino nenan, to i hongo machiek wibino nenan kendo.’ Odoko ni, ‘Rupiri akidho bongi Baba.’ ”
Jomedere gi penjo ni, “Hongo machiek me, dwoŋ mere aŋo? Fuodi wakiniaŋ gima go luwo kwoŋe?”
Yesu oŋeyo nike jomito penjo go, ri ameno owacho ri jo ni, “Onyo wiwegi wipenjere kwoŋ gima awok wacho ni, ‘I hongo machiek wikibino nenan, to i hongo machiek wibino nenan kendo?’
Adyeri awacho ri win, wibino ywak to wirem, kareno piny sangala. Wibino winjo malith, to winjo malith mewin no bino lokere kisangala.
I hongo ma nywol, dhako winjo litho, rupiri hongo pere ma chandirok otundo, to ka otyeko nywolo nyathi pere go wiye wil gi litho cha, rupiri go onyo sangala nike nyathi otyeko nywolere i piny.
Meno apaka bende nitye gi win: pama onyo wiwinjo litho, to abino neno win kendo, aka chuny win bino poŋ gi kisangala, kiti kisangala ma moro kinyal mayo win.
“Ka ndelo no otundo wikibino kwayan gimoro. Adyeri awacho ri win, Baba bino miyo win gimoro jye ma winokway i nyingan.
Gunyoni fuodi wikikwayo gimoro i nyingan, kwayi win aka wibino limo, ŋey kisangala mewin wobedi mopoŋ.”
“Awacho ri win gikipiny me g'agechin, to ndir bino tundo ma akibino oro agechin kendo, to abino luwo ri win nyatirtir kwoŋ Baba.
Ka ndir no otundo, wibino kwayo go i nyingan; aka akiwachi ni abino kwayo go gimoro ri win,
rupiri Baba won omaro win rupiri wimaran aka wiyeyo nike awok bongi Were.
Awok bongi Baba to abino i piny, aka onyo aeye i piny agik kendo bongi Baba.”
Gikenyo jofuonjirok pere jowacho ri go ni, “Nyaka onyo iluwo nyatirtir, ma kiweno i agechin.
Nyaka onyo waŋeyo ni iŋeyo gimoro jye; ikiyeny moro wopenjin kendo. Me miyo wayeyo nike adyeri iwok bongi Were.”
Yesu odwoko jo ni, “Onyo nyaka wiyeyo?
Ndir bino tundo, aka otyeko kiri tundo ma wijojye wibino kedher'iye to dhano jye dok pecho pere, aka wibino weyan kendan. To akinitye kendan, rupiri Baba nitye kodan.
Atyeko wacho ri win gime ŋey wibedi i syem i riwirok kodan. Piny bino miyo wichandere. To bedi win miseni! Atyeko loyo chandirok ma piny!”
Munyo Yesu otyeko wacho gime, oŋiyo polo to wacho ni, “Baba, hongo otundo. Miyi Wuodin dwoŋ, aka ŋey Wuodin womiyin dwoŋ.
Kole imiyo go men kwoŋ ji jye, ŋey go womiyi joma imiyo go jye kwo makirum.
Aka me a kwo makirum: nike ji jowoŋeyin, Were achiel maradyeri, kendo jowoŋeyi Yesu Kristo m'ioro.
Atyeko nyutho dwoŋ perin i piny; achowo timo tich m'imiyan timo.
Onyo pama, Baba, miyan dwoŋ i waŋin, dwoŋ moido ani gine kodin ma fuodi kochwey piny.
“Atyeko miyo nyingin ŋeyirok i waŋ ji m'imiyan wok i piny. Jo oido jobedo ji perin, to imiyan jo aka jotyeko mako wach perin.
Pama onyo joŋeyo ni gimoro jye m'imiyan wok bongin,
rupiri amiyo jo mikwenda m'imiyan, aka jojolo; joŋeyo adyeri ni awok bongin, aka joyeyo nike iŋat'ioran.
“Akwayo ri jo. Akikwayi ri piny, to ri ji m'imiyan, rupiri jobedo aperin.
Gimoro jye ma ani gine meno aperin, odoko gimoro jye m'ini gine meno aparan, aka atyeko limo dwoŋ kwoŋ jo.
Akibino doŋ i piny ka, to jo fuodi jonitye i piny ka, to an onyo abino bongin. Baba Maleŋ, kuri jo maber gi men ma nyingin m'imiyan, ŋey nyaka jowobedi achiel paka wan kodin wabedo achiel.
I hongo monwaŋo ani gi jo, akuro jo maber gi men ma nyingin m'imiyan. Agwoko jo, aka kwoŋ jo ongoye ŋata orwenyo, kwanyo woko ŋat ma amien oido oripo podho rigo ŋey gima ndiiko wacho wotimere.
Onyo pama abino bongin, aka awacho gikipiny me i piny, ŋey jowolimi kisangala paran to poŋ i chuny jo.
Amiyo jo mikwenda perin aka piny odak jo, rupiri jokobedo ji pa piny paka an bende akibedo dhano pa piny.
Akikway ni ikwany jo woko i piny, to nike ikur jo maber kwoŋ men ŋatarach piny, jo bende jokobedo ji pa piny.
Paka akabedo dhano pa piny, jo bende jokobedo ji pa piny.
Lonyi chuny jo i adyeri, rupiri wach perin obedo adyeri.
Onyo aoro jo i piny paka chango ibende ioran i piny.
Aka ri bero pajo onyo amiyere rin ŋey jo bende jowonyali miyirok ri iyadyeri.
“Akikwayi ri jome kendijo, to ri joma bende joyeyan ru mikwenda pa jome.
Akwayo nike jojye jowonyali bedo achiel, Baba, paka initye i an aka anitye i in. Jo bende jowobedi i wan, ŋey piny woyeyi nike iŋati ioran.
Amiyo jo dwoŋ m'imiyan, ŋey jowobedi achiel paka wan kodin wabedo achiel;
abedi i jo aka ibedi i an, ŋey jowobedi achiel kichutho, aka nyaka piny woŋeyi nike ioran aka imaro jo paka imaran.
“Baba, ityeko miyan jo, aka ayenyo jowobedi kodan kama ani iye, jowonyali neno dwoŋ paran m'imiyan; kole imaran kir ma fuodi kochwey piny.
Baba Motire, piny kuya in, to aŋeyin aka jome joŋeyo nike iŋati ioran.
Atyeko miyo jo ŋeyin aka abino medo timo ameno, ŋey mar perin ma initye gine ran wobedi i jo, aka awon bende abedi i jo.”
Munyo Yesu ochowo kwayo me, oay kodi jofuonjirok pere to jokalo jwom Kiduron. Kenyo oido nitye ndelo moro, to Yesu kodi jofuonjirok pere jodonj'iye.
Yuda, jachami sereko, oido bende oŋeyo kenyo, rupiri ndir madit Yesu onwaŋo otyeko bedo kenyo kodi jofuonjirok pere.
Ameno Yuda okidho kenyo kodi kitipa pa joserikale kodi jokur mogo ma Ot pa Were ma jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi Jofarisayo jooro. Jotiŋo mach odingili, talin, gi gilweny.
Yesu oido oŋeyo gimoro jye monwaŋo kidho timirok kwoŋe. Ri ameno ochore bongi jo to penjo jo ni, “Wirango ŋa?”
Jodwoko ni, “Yesu Janazareth.” Go odwoko ni, “A an me.” Yuda jachami sereko, onwaŋo ochungo gi jo.
Munyo Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “A an me”, jogik gi yuŋey gin to jooy piny ngulungulu.
Yesu odoko openjo jo ni, “Wirango ŋa won.” Jowacho ni, “Yesu Janazareth.”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Atyeko wacho ri win ni a an me. Ere ka wirangan, weyi win jome jowokadhi.”
Gime otimere ama ŋey gima ndir no go owacho wotundi i kare ni, “Ongoye kada achiel morwenyo kwoŋ jojye m'imiyan.”
Simon Petro oido nitye g'abor; oyuyo to toŋo ŋecha pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, to chodo woko ithe marachuch. Nyingi ŋecha no oido Malko.
Yesu owacho ri Petro ni, “Dwoki abor i ode! Onyo akiramadhi agwata ma chandirok ma Baba omiyani?”
Lwak joserikale kodi jotel pajo kodi Joyudaya ma jokur jomako Yesu, jotweyo go,
to jotero go pa Anas moido obedo baa chipa Kaifas, moido jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar i oro no.
Kaifas me ama ndir cha omiyo Joyudaya ryeko nike oido ber loyo ka ŋatachiel otho ri ji jye.
Petro kodi jafuonjirok man joluwo Yesu. Paka jafuonjirok man no oido oŋeyere maber gi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar no, go bende odonjo gi Yesu i dyedipo pa jadwoŋ no.
Petro odoŋ woko to chungo chiegin gi dhoot. Jafuonjirok man, moido oŋeyere maber gi jadwoŋ no, ogik oluwo gi nyako moido kuro dhoot, to rwako Petro.
Nyako moido kuro dhoot owacho ri Petro ni, “In won me k'achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok pa ŋato?” Petro odwoko ni, “Be, akibedo.”
Piny onwaŋo ŋich, ri ameno jotich kodi jokur jomoko mach aka onwaŋo jochungo jothoko mach no jooyo. Petro bende okidho to chungo gi jo ka oyo mach.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar no openjo Yesu kwoŋ jofuonjirok pere kodi fuonji pere.
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ndir jye aluwo kamaler ri piny, aka afuonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi i Ot pa Were, kama Joyudaya jye jochokere iye, aka ongoye gima fuodi awacho nyaliŋliŋ.
To raŋo ma wipenjan ameno? Penji win ji ma jotyeko winjan. Kole joŋeyo gima atyeko wacho ri jo.”
Munyo Yesu owacho ama, achiel kwoŋ jokur ogoyo lembe g'adhoŋ aka owacho ni, “Inyalo nedi luwo ameno gi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Ka awacho gimoro marach, nyuthi ginago kamaler. To ka gima awacho otire, raŋo igoyan?”
Gikenyo Anas odhiro go, ma fuodi otwey chinge, pa Kaifas, jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar.
Petro oido fuodi ochungo kenyo oyo mach. Gikenyo jowote jopenjo go ni, “Ibende ikibedo achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok pa ŋato?” To Petro kwedere ni, “Be, akibedo achiel kwoŋ jo.”
Achiel kwoŋ ŋecha pa jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, wat pa ŋata Petro oido ochodo woko ithe cha, oluwo malo ni, “Akinenin bonge i ndelo kacha?”
Petro odoko okwedere to wacho ni, “Be”, piyo piyo no to wuodi gweno koko.

Jokwanyo Yesu i ot pa Kaifas to jotero go i chiel pa gavana. Piny onwaŋo obedo odikini worwor. Joyudaya jokodonjo i chiel rupiri oido joyenyo jowokure ma jokobedo makoch i kite ma chik, ŋey jowochami kalima ma Kadho.
Amomiyo Pilato owok woko romo gi jo to wacho ni, “Banja aŋo ma wi osa jame?”
Jodwoko ni, “Di wakikelo go bongin bedi go kotimo racho moro.”
Pilato owacho ni, “Wiwegi kwanyi win go aka winen banja pere i kite ma chik mewin.” Joyudaya jodwoko ni, “Koyey wan neko dhano.”
(Me onyutho adyeri gima Yesu onwaŋo otyeko wacho munyo go nyutho kiti tho ma go le tho.)
Pilato ogik i chiel to lwoŋo Yesu to penjo go ni, “In i Kere pa Joyudaya?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Penji me wok bongin i won, kosa joman ama jowacho rin kwoŋan?”
Pilato odwoko ni, “Iparo nike a Jayudaya? Kole ji perin wegi kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ama jokelin bongan. Itimo aŋo?”
Yesu owacho ni, “Ker paran kobedo ma piny ka; bedi ker paran bedi ma piny ka, di jomaluwan jolwenyo ma geŋan ma d'akipodho i chingi Joyudaya. To, ker paran ki ma piny ka!”
Gikenyo Pilato openjo go ni, “Kere in i kere?” Yesu odwoko ni, “Eno iwacho ni an kere. Onywolan ri gino aka abino i piny ka luwo ri adyeri. Nyatoro jye ma tiyere g'adyeri winjo dwodan.”
Pilato openjo ni, “Aka adyeri meno aŋo?” Gikenyo Pilato ogik woko bongi Joyudaya to wacho ri jo ni, “Akinen banja moro kwoŋ go.
To paka winitye gi chik mewin, ndir jye agonyo ri win jatwech moro i hongo ma kalima ma Kadho, wimito agony ri win Kere pa Joyudaya?”
Jodwoko go gi koko ni, “Be, ki go! Wamito Baraba!” (Baraba oido jakwo mojokojo.)
Gikenyo Pilato otero Yesu to oro jo chwado go.
Joserikale jodolo thach okudho to joketho i wiye pa junga; joruko ri go kanzo ma rangi ariŋo.
Aka jobino bonge to jowacho ni, “Yindira Kere pa Joyudaya!” To jogoyo lembe adhoŋ.
Pilato odoko ogik to wacho ri muma ji no ni, “Neni win ee awodho go bongi win, ma miyo win ŋeyo nike akinyalo nwaŋo gima miyan thumo ri go banja.”
Gikenyo owodho Yesu woko munyo oruko junga ma thach okudho kodi kanzo ma rangi ariŋo. Pilato owacho ri jo ni, “Neni win! Me a jal ago!”

Munyo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi ji pajo joneno go, jokoko ni, “Guri go kwoŋ musalaba! Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!” Pilato owacho ri jo ni, “Ere kwanyi wi go wiwegi wiguri go kwoŋ musalaba. Akinen gima d'imiyan athum ri go banja.”
Joyudaya jodwoko ni, “Wanitye gi chik ma wacho ni, go ripo tho, rupiri go owacho ni go Wuodi Were.”
Munyo Pilato owinjo ameno, lworo omedo mako go.
Go ogik i chiel to wacho ri Yesu ni, “Iwok kune?” To Yesu kodwoko go.
Pilato owacho ri go ni, “Ikoluwi kodani? Ikuya ni anitye gi men ma gonyin, kosa ma gurin kwoŋ musalaba?”
Yesu odwoko ni, “Initye gi men kwoŋan nyaka rupiri Were am'omiyin. Amomiyo ŋata okelan i chingin ama ni gi racho madwoŋ mere.”
Munyo Pilato owinjo ameno omedo bedo g'awanya ma gonyo go. To Joyudaya jokoko ni, “K'igonyo jal me meno ikimere kodi Kaisar! Nyatoro jye ma wacho nike go kere meno jakwor pa Kaisar!”
Munyo Pilato owinjo wach me, otero Yesu woko to bedo piny i kom ma thumo banja kama ilwoŋo ni, “Kalikondi ma Tele.” (I Dhoyudaya bedo “Gabatha.”)
Oido chiegin sawa auchiel modyechieŋ i ndelo ma yikirok ri kalima ma Kadho. Pilato owacho ri Joyudaya ni, “Kere mewin ee!”
Jokoko ni, “Neki go! Guri go kwoŋ musalaba!” Pilato openjo jo ni, “Wimitan aguri Kere mewin kwoŋ musalaba?” Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jodwoko ni, “Kere ma wanitye gine meno a Kaisar kende!”
Gikenyo Pilato oketho Yesu i chingi jo ni woguri kwoŋ musalaba. Gikenyo Yesu obedo i chingi jokur.
Go owok woko munyo otiŋo musalaba pere, to tundo i kabedo milwoŋo ni “Kahanga wich”. (I Dhoyudaya ni “Golgotha.”)
Joguro go kenyo kwoŋ musalaba; joguro ji aryo man bende kwoŋ musalaba, ŋatachiel yu rachuch ŋat man yu racham pere kareno Yesu obedo dyere.
Pilato ondiko wach to oro jo ketho wi musalaba ni, “YESU MA NAZARETH, KERE PA JOYUDAYA.”
Joyudaya mathoth josoma gino, rupiri kama ogur'iye Yesu kwoŋ musalaba oido chiegin gi tindi. Wach no oido ondik i Dhoyudaya, Dholatin, kodi Dhoyunani.
Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar pa Joyudaya jodaŋin ri Pilato ni, “Ikiri indiki ni, ‘Kere pa Joyudaya,’ to ndiki ni, ‘Jal me owacho nike, An a Kere pa Joyudaya.’ ”
Pilato odwoko ni, “Gima atyeko ndiko meno atyeko ndiko.”
Munyo joserikale jotyeko guro Yesu kwoŋ musalaba, jokwanyo nengin pere, to jopoko adech aŋwen, kis jaserikale otero adech achiel. Jokwanyo kanzo bende mokwoy ma nanga achiel, mongoye kama oriw gine.

To Joserikale jowacho ni, “Wakiri wayechi me; ere weyi wagoy kwir wanen ŋata oteri.” Gime otimere ma miyo gimondik wotundi i kare ni, “Wegi jopokere nengin paran Jogoyo kwir ri kanzo paran.” Aka joserikale jotimo ameno won.
Joma oido jochungo chiegin gi musalaba pa Yesu obedo yokimere, nyamin yokimere, Marya chipa Kulopa, kodi Marya ma wok Magdala.
Munyo Yesu oneno yokimere kodi jafuonjirok ma go omaro jochungo kenyo, owacho ri yokimere ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, wuodin eno.”
To wacho ri jafuonjirok no ni, “Yokin eno.” Aka wok i hongo no jafuonjirok no otero dheno pecho pere.
Yesu oŋeyo ni gimoro jye orumo, to ma miyo gimondik wotundi owacho ni, “Riyo nekan.”
Agwata oido ni kenyo mopoŋ vini mawach; jorwako changwe i vini no, joketho i jangi yath, to jochwayo ri go i dhoke.
Yesu obilo vini to wacho ni “Orumo!” Gikenyo okulo wiye to weyo chunye chot.

Gikenyo Joyudaya jokwayo Pilato nike wotur tyendi jom'oneki tikwanyo jo kwoŋ musalaba, rupiri meno oido ndelo ma yikirok ri Sabato, aka jokomito ni delkwoŋ jono wobedi kwoŋ musalaba i ndelo ma Sabato, rupiri Sabato obedo ndelo madwoŋ.
Amomiyo joserikale jokidho to joturo tyendi ŋat marapena kodi apa ŋat man monwaŋo onek jo kanyachiel gi Yesu.
To munyo jotundo bongi Yesu to joneno nike go otyeko tho, jokoturo tyende.
Achiel kwoŋ joserikale oroko ŋeti Yesu gi toŋ, to piyo piyo remo gi pi wok.
Ŋata oneno gime munyo timere oluwo kwoŋe. Wach pere otire, kendo go oŋeyo ni luwo giradyeri aka ŋey wibende wiyey.
Gime otim nike randik wotundi i kare ni, “Ongoye choko pere kada achiel ma bino tur.”
Aka randik man wacho ni, “Ji jobino ŋiyo ŋata jochwowo.”

Rumachien, Yozefu, ma Arimatheya, okwayo Pilato ni go wokwanyi delkwoŋ Yesu. (Yozefu oido jafuonjirok pa Yesu ma nyaliŋliŋ, rupiri go oido lworo Joyudaya.) Pilato owacho ri go ni go nyalo kwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu; gikenyo Yozefu okidho to kwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu.
Nikodemo bende, ma ndir moro okidho neno Yesu wor, obino, kareno otiŋo gima ŋwe kur chiegin kilo pyeradek, moruw kodi pigi yen man.
Jaryo me jokwanyo delkwoŋ Yesu to jotweyo i sukin matar gi mo maŋwe kur me i kite ma yikirok pa Joyudaya.
Kama ogur'iye Yesu kwoŋ musalaba oido nitye ndelo ma di kalyel moido fuodi koyik'iye nyatoro.
Paka ndelo oido obedo ma telo Sabato pa Joyudaya, aka kalyel onwaŋo ni chiegin, joyiko Yesu kenyo.
I Sabiti odikini worwor, ma fuodi piny riprip, Marya ma wok Magdala okidho kalyel to neno ni oŋil woko tele ma dhok kalyel.
Go oringo to kidho bongi Simon Petro kodi jafuonjirok man ma Yesu omaro, to wacho ri jo ni, “Jokwanyo woko Ruoth i kalyel aka wakuya kama oketh'iye go!”
Gikenyo Petro gi jafuonjirok man no joay to jokidho i kalyel.
Jaryo no oido joringo, to jafuonjirok man no odwire oyombo Petro to telo tundo i kalyel.
Go oluŋere to neno sukin ama odoŋ, to kodonjo iye.
Simon Petro oluwo go chien to donjo i kalyel, to neno sukin no kenyo,
kodi nanga monwaŋo otwey gine wiy Yesu m'odole gichien kakende.
Gikenyo, jafuonjirok, motelo tundo i kalyel bende odonjo to neno to yeyo.
(Jono fuodi oido jokoniaŋ odocho kwoŋ randik ma wacho ni go ripo chierino).
Gikenyo jofuonjirok no jodok pecho pajo.
Marya ochungo munyo ywak dho thengi kalyel;
gikenyo go oneno jomalaika aryo kenyo, i nengin matar, ma jobedo piny kama onwaŋo oketh'iye delkwoŋ Yesu, achiel yu wiye man yu tyende.
Jopenjo go ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, iywak aŋo?” Go odwoko ni, “Jokwanyo Ruoth paran, aka akuya kama joketh'iye go!”
Munyo go otyeko wacho ameno, go owire to neno Yesu ochungo kenyo; to koŋeyo ni manago Yesu.
Yesu openjo go ni, “Dhakodwoŋ, raŋo iywak. Irango ŋa?” Paka dheno oparo ni meno won ndelo, owacho ri go ni, “K'iŋati ikwanyo go, jadwoŋ, wachi ran kama iketh'iye go akidhi aom go.”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Marya!” Go owire yu bonge to wacho gi Dhoyudaya ni, “Raboni!” (Dwoŋ mere ni Jafuonji.)
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Ikiri imakan rupiri fuodi akigik both Baba. To kidhi bongi wutimera iwachi ri jo ni akidho malo bongi Baba ma Bawin, Were paran ma Were mewin.”
Gikenyo Marya ma wok Magdala owacho ri jofuonjirok pere nike, “Atyeko neno Ruoth,” to lyesa ri jo gima Yesu owacho ri go jye.

Munyo piny oumere i ndelo ma Sabiti no, jofuonjirok oido jochokere kanyachiel kareno jochiego thigin, rupiri oido jolworo Joyudaya. Gikenyo Yesu obino to chungo i dyer jo to wacho ni, “Syem wobedi kodi win.”
Munyo go otyeko wacho ameno, onyutho jo chinge gi ŋete. Jofuonjirok kisangala opoŋ i chuny jo munyo joneno Ruoth.
Gikenyo Yesu odoko owacho ri jo ni, “Syem wobedi kodi win. Paka Baba ooran abende aoro win.”
Go owacho gime to kudho jo gi luya to wacho ni, “Limi win Chuny Maleŋ.
Gimarecho pa ji ma winochwaki ri jo, ibino chwako ri jo; to gimarecho pa ji ma wikochwaki ri jo bende kochwaki ri jo.”
