Achiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok, Thoma (milwoŋo ni Rut) onwaŋo ongoye bongi jo munyo Yesu obino.
To jofuonjirok wadi jowach ri go ni, “Watyeko neno Ruoth!” Thoma owacho ri jo ni, “Ka akineno waŋpoyo ma musumal oweyo i chinge, t'arwako lwetan kama musumal odonj'iye i ŋete, akoyey.”
Munyo ndelo abiryo okadho, jofuonjirok oido jonitye kanyachiel kendo, aka Thoma oido ni gi jo. Thigin jye oido ochiegi, to Yesu obino to chungo i dyer jo to wacho ri jo ni, “Syem wobedi gi win.”
Gikenyo go owacho ri Thoma ni, “Rwaki lwetin ka, aka neni chingan; odoko keli chingin irwaki i ŋetan bende. Ikiri ibedi gi kiganagana, to bedi gi yeyo ayin!”
Thoma odwoko ni, “Ruoth paran kendo Were paran!”
Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Onyo iyeyo rupiri ityeko nenan? Josilwany a joma yeyo kada ma fuodi jokonenan!”
Yesu otimo ranyuth man kweth i waŋ jofuonjirok pere ma korwaki i kitawo me.
To me ondik ni aka ŋey wiyey ni Yesu a Kristo, Wuodi Were, aka i yeyo gime winyal limo kwo makirum!
Rumachien, Yesu onyuthere kendo ri jofuonjirok pere dho wakawaka ma Tiberya. Me apaka go otimo.
Simon Petro, Thoma (milwoŋo ni Rut), Nathanayel (ma wok Kana i Galileya) woti Zebedayo kodi jofuonjirok pa Yesu man jaryo jye oido jo ni kanyachiel.
Simon Petro owacho ri jo ni, “Akidho kitoga.” Jowacho ni, “Wabino kidho kodin.” Ameno jodonjo i yee, to wor no gipi jokomako gimoro.
Munyo chieŋ gulo, Yesu ochungo dho thengi pi, to jofuonjirok jokoŋeyo ni manago Yesu.
Gikenyo go owacho ri jo ni, “Yach me, wityeko makoye gimoro?” Jodwoko ni, “Ongoye gimoro.”
Go owacho ri jo ni, “Boli win bwoo mewin yu thengi yee marachuch aka wibino mako gimoro.” Gikenyo jobolo bwoo pajo, to jokonyalo wodho ru thotho pa rech.
Jafuonjirok ma Yesu omaro owacho ni, “manago Ruoth!” Munyo Simon Petro owinjo ni manago Ruoth, otweyere gi nanga pere mawoko (rupiri oido olunyo woko nengin pere), to por i pi.
Jofuonjirok modoŋ jobino dho geŋin gi yee to joywayo bwoo ma rech opoŋ'iye, rupiri onwaŋo jokini bor gi geŋin kamothwo, to oido romo chiegin mita miya achiel kende.
Munyo jotundo wi geŋin joneno chuk mach mokur kenyo gi rech i wiye kodi mugat.
Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri jofuonjirok pere ni, “Keli win rech mogo ma wityeko mako.”
Simon Petro odonjo i yee to kelo bwoo wi geŋin, mopoŋ'iye rech madongo miya adek gi pyero abich g'adek; to kada oido rech dit ameno, jye bwoo koyech.
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, “Biye chiemi win.” Ongoye kada ŋatachiel kwoŋ jofuonjirok mobedo gi miseni ma penjo go ni, “In i ŋa?” rupiri oido joŋeyo ni manago Ruoth.
Gikenyo Yesu okidho, okwanyo mugat no, to miyo jo, to timo ameno bende gi rech.
Me oido hongo maradek ma Yesu onyuther'iye ri jofuonjirok pere munyo otyeko chierino kwoŋ jomotho.
Munyo jotyeko chiemo, Yesu openjo Simon Petro ni, “Simon, wuodi Yohana, imaran loyo jome?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey Ruoth, iŋeyo nike amarin.” Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Pidhi nyithindhi roombo paran.”
Madiryo Yesu odoko openjo go ni, “Simon wuodi Yohana, imarani?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey Ruoth, iŋeyo paka amarin.” Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Kwayi roombo paran.”

Madidek Yesu odoko omedo penjo go ni, “Simon wuodi Yohana, imarani?” Gikenyo Petro chunye oramo, rupiri Yesu openjo go madidek ni, “Imarani?” Ameno odwoko go ni, “Ruoth, kole iŋeyo gimoro jye, iŋeyo paka amarin.” Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Pidhi roombo paran.
Adyeri awacho rin, munyo fuodi ithin onwaŋo iwon irukere t'ikidho kama iyenyo jye; to ka iti ibino ryeyo chingin ŋat man ama worukin to terin kama d'ikimito kidh'iye.”
(Ameno Yesu owacho ama ma nyutho paka Petro d'otho ma miyo Were dwoŋ.) Gikenyo Yesu owacho ri go ni, “Luwan.”
Petro owire to neno jafuonjirok man luwo jo ma Yesu omaro, ma ndir cha othenere bongi Yesu dhower to penjo ni, “Ruoth, ŋata kidho chamo rin sereko?”
Munyo Petro oneno go, owacho ri Yesu ni, “Ruoth, to ŋatin?”
Yesu odwoko go ni, “Ka amito ni ŋato wokwo chuka anodwoki, meno mako kwoŋini? Luwan ayino!”
Gikenyo wach onyay i dyer jofuonjirok pa Yesu nike jafuonjirok no k'otho. To Yesu kowacho nike go k'otho; go owacho nike, “Ka amito ni go wokwo chuka anodwoki, meno mako kwoŋini?”
Go a jafuonjirok ma luwo kwoŋ gikipiny me, aka ama ondiko gikipiny me; aka waŋeyo nike gima go ondiko obedo adyeri.
Onyo, nitye gikipiny man kweth ma Yesu otimo. Bedi ndik jye achielechiele, aparo nike piny gipi di konyalo tiŋo kitawin mere.
Thyofilo, i kitawo marapena ma andiko, aluwo kwoŋ gimoro jye ma Yesu otimo kendo ofuonjo,
chuka ndelo ma oter'iye go i polo. Aka gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ, omiyo jomoor pere ma go oyero or.
Go onyutho jo i yo madit paka go onyo kwo, munyo otyeko chandirok to tho; aka i hongo ma ndelo pyero aŋwen gi pi obedo munyo menyere ri jo aka luwo ri jo kwoŋ Ker pa Were;
aka go omiyo jo or munyo nitye dhower gi jo ni, “Wikiri wieye Yerusalem; to kuri win gikenyo mich ma Were Baba ochiko ma wityeko winjo.
Ato batisimo pa Yohana obedo gi pi, to wibino limo batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ ma fuodi ndelo kokadho mathoth.”
Aka joma oido jobino kenyo jopenjo go ni; “Ruoth, imito dwoko dhum i chingi Israel pama?”
Yesu owacho ri jo ni, kobedo tich mewin ŋeyo ndir kodi hongo ma Baba won oyiko gi men pere;
to wibino nwaŋo men ka Chuny Maleŋ otyeko loro kwoŋ win; aka wibino bedo jokony maridho wach paran i Yerusalem kodi i Yudeya gipi, i Samarya, kodi i witum jye ma piny.
Munyo otyeko wacho ameno, joneno paka otiŋ go titero malo, chuka pondeponde oumo go ma jokinen.
Aka munyo fuodi joyaro waŋ gin malo munyo joneno paka go kadho, piyo piyo ji aryo ma joruko nengin matar jochungo kabuti jo.
Jowacho ni, “Win ji ma Galileya, raŋo ma wichungo wiŋiyo polo? Kole Yesu me, ma okwany bongi win titero i polo, bino dwoko i piny ka i kite no won, paka wiwok neno go munyo kadho i polo.”
Gikenyo jomoor jogik Yerusalem munyo jowok wi got Olivet, ma romo chiegin adech mairo wok i tindi.

Jodonjo Yerusalem aka joidho malo i ot monwaŋo jobed'iye; Petro, Yohana, Yakobo kodi Andereya, Filipo gi Thoma, Batholomayo kodi Mathayo, Yakobo wuodi pa Alfayo, Simon ma jalwenyi ri piny pere, kodi Yuda wuodi pa Yakobo.
Jojye jochokere kanyachiel i bwora to jokwayo adhik, kanyachiel gi mon, kodi Marya min Yesu, kodi wutimin Yesu.
Munyo ndelo okadho manok, romo pa jomoyeyo obedo (ma romo ji chiegin miya achiel), to Petro chungo to luwo.
Owacho ni, “Wutimera, ndiiko oido ripo wotundi i kare kwoŋ gima Chuny Maleŋ, munyo luwo gi dhoki Daudi, owacho chon kwoŋ Yuda motelo ji munyo jobino mako Yesu.
Yuda oido jakweth mawan, rupiri oido oyer go bende i tich mawan.”
(Pesa ma Yuda olimo i tim pere marach no onyiewo gine ndelo, kama go ogore'iye piny to tho; aka okedhere to gir iye dhure piny.
Ji jye ma jobedo Yerusalem jowinjo gino, aka i dhudhok pajo wegi jolwoŋo ndelo no ni Akeldama, dwoŋ mere ni, “ Ndelo ma Remo.”)
“Kole ondik i Zabul ni, ‘Weyi ot pere wodoŋi nono, aka moro wokiri wobed'iye.’ Kendo ni, ‘Weyi ŋat man woter kabedo pere.’
“Amomiyo achiel kwoŋ chwo ma jowotho gi wan i hongo no jye munyo Ruoth Yesu oido fuodi ni gi wan noknok,
wok i ndir ma batisimo pa Yohana tundo chieŋ mokwany'iye go bongi wan titero go malo, ama ripo bedo jakony moneno gi wan chierino pere.”
Gikenyo to joketho ji aryo ruwaŋ jo: Yozefu milwoŋo ni Barsaba, mochwok nyinge ni Yusto, kodi Mathiyas.
Aka jokwayo Were munyo jowacho ni, “Ruoth, iŋeyo chuny dhano jye, nyuthi wan achiel kwoŋ jaryo me, ŋata iyero
ni woteri tich paka achiel kwoŋ jomoor, i kabedo ma Yuda oweyo to kidho kapere.”
To jobolo ri jo kwir, to Mathiyas loyo; to iketho go i kitipa pa jomoor apar g'achiel.
Munyo ndelo ma Pentekost otundo, jomoyeyo jochokere kanyachiel i ot.
Gikenyo derino owok i polo mochalo koyo makudho, to poŋo ot gipi monwaŋo jo ni iye.
Aka joneno gima chalo lew mach motyakere; dhano jye lew mach no ogeyo.
Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo to jochako luwo dhudhok mopokere, paka Chuny Maleŋ omiyo jo luwo.
I Yerusalem onwaŋo nitye Joyudaya ma jomara Were ma jowok i thenge jye ma piny.
Munyo jowinjo derino no, kweth ji jochokere kanyachiel; jojye jouro, rupiri kis dhano owinjo joluwo dhudhok pere won.
I dhyer kodi i uro jopenjo ni, “Ji ma joluwo ni jye ki Jogalileya?
To nedi ma kis dhano jye kwoŋ wan winjo joluwo dhudhok mawan won?
Jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Pathya, Medya kodi Elam; Mesopotamya, Yudeya kodi Kapadosya; Ponto kodi Asya,
Furigiya gi Panfilya, Misir kodi adech ma Libya chiegin gi Sireno; jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Roma;
Joyudaya kodi jokafiri ma jowire i din pa Joyudaya, jomegi kwoŋ wan jowok Kurete kodi Arabya -- ama wajojye wawinjo joluwo dhudhok mawan kwoŋ gikipiny madongo ma Were otimo.”
I dhyer madwoŋ gi uro, jomena penjirok wegi kendigin ni, “Gime dwoŋ mere aŋo?”
To joman jonyiero jomoyeyo, munyo jowacho ni, “Ji me jomer ayin!”
Petro ochungo gi jomoor apar g'achiel to luwo ri kweth ji gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Ji ma Yudeya jowotan gi wijojye ma wibedo Yerusalem, chiki win ithi win awachi ri win thenethene ma gime.
Jome jokomer gi vini paka wiparo; pama nyaka sawa adek won modikini.
Kuchiel, me a gima jatuchi wach Were Yower chango oluwo kwoŋe ni,

‘Were wacho ni, me a gima bino timere i ndelo ma chowe: Abino konjo Chuny paran kwoŋ ji jye; woti win gi nyigi win jobino tucho wach Were, nyithindho mewin ma yach ma soye jobino limo menyirok, aka jomoti i dyer win jobino leko lek.
Ey, kwoŋ jegin paran, chwo gi mon, kodi ŋechin abino konjo Chuny paran i ndelo no, aka jobino tucho wach paran.
Abino timo giraura i hongo malo kodi ranyuth momore i piny, remo kodi mach kodi yiro motweyere bino bedo;
Waŋchieŋ bino lokere machol aka dwe bino bokere pa remo, ma fuodi ndelo pa Ruoth madwoŋ moasere kotundo.’
Aka bino bedo ni nyatoro jye molwoŋ nyingi Ruoth bino both.

“Win Joisrael, chiki win ithi win wiwinji gime: Yesu Janazareth onwaŋo obedo dhano ma Were oyero ni wotimi giraura, kodi gidhyer kodi ranyuth momore i dyer win; aka wiwegi wiŋeyo gime, rupiri otimere bongi win won ka.
Were, i mito pere gi ryeko pere, onwaŋo otyeko yiko chon nike bino ketho Yesu me i chingi win; amomiyo wineko go munyo wiketho ji marecho to joguro go kwoŋ musalaba.
To Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho; okwanyo go woko i litho ma tho, rupiri onwaŋo kinyalere nike tho wotweyi go.
Kole Daudi chango oluwo kwoŋe ni, ‘Aneno Ruoth i waŋan hongo jye, rupiri go nitye yu rachuch paran ŋeyi akir ayengere.
Amomiyo chunyan osangala, aka kisangala opoŋ i wach paran. Aka delkwoŋan bende bino bedo gi geno madwoŋ.
Rupiri ikibino weyo chunyan i piny pa jomotho. Odoko ikibino weyo Maleŋ perin wotopi woko.
Ityeko nyuthan royo ma kwo, aka bedo perin kabutan bino poŋo kisangala i chunyan.’
“Wutimera, weyi awach ri win kamaler kwoŋ kwari wan Daudi, m'otho tiyiko, aka kalyel pere fuodi ni gi wan kir konon me.
Go oido obedo jatuchi wach Were, aka oŋeyo chikirok ma Were otimo gine: Were okwoŋere nike bino ketho nyakwar Daudi achiel wolunji kom madhum pere.
Daudi oneno gima Were oido kidho timo, amomiyo oluwo kwoŋ chierino pa Kristo munyo wacho ni, ‘Koweyi go i piny pa jomotho, aka delkwoŋe kotopi.’
“Were ochierino Yesu me kwoŋ jomotho; aka wajojye wabedo jokony i wach me.
Otyek tiŋo go malo yu rachuch pa Were aka onyo walimo bonge Chuny Maleŋ paka Bamere ochiko; aka gim'onyo pama wineno aka odoko wiwinjo me, obedo mich pere ma go okonjo kwoŋ wan.
Kole Daudi won kokidho malo i polo, to owacho ni, ‘Ruoth owacho ri Ruoth paran ni, Bedi yu rachuch paran
chuka anoloki jokwor perin paka kasik m'ijeng'iye tyendin.’
“Amomiyo ji ma Israel, joripo ŋeyo adyeri ni manago Yesu, ma wiguro kwoŋ musalaba, ama Were oloko Ruoth kodi Kristo!”
Munyo jowinjo gime, chuny jo oramo jo swa, to jopenjo Petro kodi jomoor man ni, “Wutimin wan wanotimi aŋo?”
Petro odwoko jo ni, “Ŋuti win gimarecho mewin, wilim batisimo i nyingi Yesu Kristo, wochwaki gimarecho mewin, aka wibino limo mich ma Chuny Maleŋ.
Kole chikirok me obedo ri win kodi nyithindho mewin kodi ji jye ma jonitye bor, ji jye ma Were lwoŋo bonge.”
Petro oluwo ri jo aka oruma jo gi wach man madit munyo medo jo miseni ni, “Bothi win kwoŋ ndir ma pama mopoŋ gi recho me!”
Ameno ji mathoth majoyeyo mikwenda pere jolimo batisimo; ji ma romo gana adek jomedere i kweth pajo i ndelo no.
Aka jochwire kwoŋ fuonji pa jomoor munyo jobedo i kweth achiel, i chiemo kodi i kwayo.
Lworo opoŋ i chuny kis dhano, aka jamoor jotimo giraura kodi ranyuth madit.
Jomoyeyo jye jobedo kanyachiel aka jotimo gimoro jye kanyachiel.
Aka jotana gikipiny kodi lim pajo, to jopoko gima owok'iye i dyer gin paka kis dhano oyenyo.
Bin kis ndelo jokidho romo kanyachiel i Ot pa Were, odoko jochiemo kanyachiel i udi pajo gi kisangala kodi chuny jo maber,
munyo jopako Were aka ji jye oido jofuoyo jo. Ameno Ruoth omedo welo pajo gi jomaboth kis ndelo.
Ndelo moro Petro kodi Yohana oido jokidho i Ot pa Were sawa abuŋwen mothyeno, i hongo ma kwayo.
Kenyo, dho “Waŋkach Maŋon,” paka oido ilwoŋo, oido nitye dhano moŋol wok i nywolirok pere. Ndir jye bin itiŋo atiŋa ŋato aka ikelo go dho waŋkach me kwayo pesa bongi joma donjo i Ot pa Were.
Munyo go oneno Petro kodi Yohana jodonjo, okwayo jo ni jowomiyiye go gimoro.
Joŋiyo go nyatirtir to Petro wacho ni, “Ŋiyi wan!”
Gikenyo go oŋiyo jo, munyo geno limo gimoro bongi jo.
Aka Petro owacho ri go ni, “Angoye gi zawabu kosa feza, to abino miyin gima ani gine. I nyingi Yesu Kristo ma Nazareth, aorin ni wothi!”
Gikenyo Petro omako chinge marachuch to konyo go to ay malo. Piyo piyo no olenge tyendi jalo kodi odondo jye jobedo mochwiny;
go opor malo, ochungo gi tyende to chako kisedela gi woth. Gikenyo go odonjo i Ot pa Were gi jo, munyo wotho aka por malo gi pako Were.
Kweth ji jye joneno go munyo wotho aka pako Were.
Aka munyo joŋeyo ni meno jakwach ma yado bedo dho “Waŋkach Maŋon” ma Ot pa Were, jouro swa aka jobedo gi dhyer kwoŋ gimotimere ri go.
Munyo fuodi jalo ochwire kwoŋ Petro gi Yohana, ji jye jodhyer aka joringo bongi jo “I Kalikondi pa Solomon,” paka oido ilwoŋo.

Munyo Petro oneno gime, owacho ri jo ni, “Ji ma Israel: raŋo ma wiuro gime, kosa raŋo ma wichomo waŋ win kwoŋ wan? Wiparo nike gi men mawan won, kosa ni rupiri waŋeyo lamo Were maber amomiyo ŋatin wotho?

Kole Were pa Ibrayimu, Isaka, kodi Yakobo, Were pa kwarere mawan, ama omiyo Yesu Jatich pere dwoŋ. Wibolo go i chingi jodhum aka wikwedo go ruwaŋ Pilato, kada munyo Pilato onwaŋo otyeko ridho gonyo go.
Kole go oido leŋ aka ber, to wikwero go, kuchiel wikwayo Pilato ni wogonyi ri win janek ayino.
Wineko Won kwo, to Were chierino go kwoŋ jomotho; aka wabedo jokony ma joneno gime.
Kole nyingi Yesu kodi yeyo kwoŋ nyinge ama omiyo jal ma wiŋeyo me kilama ama i waŋ wijojye.
“Onyo pama, wutimera, aŋeyo nike gima win kodi jotel mewin witimo ri Yesu obedo gima witimo ma wikuya.
Me a gima Were chango owacho gi i dhoki jotuchi wach pere ni Kristo ripo chandere; aka amomiyo gino otimere adyeri i royo me.
Amomiyo, ŋuti win recho mewin wigiki bongi Were, ŋey gimarecho mewin woreyi woko, aka ŋey hongo ma kelo loth manyien wok bongi Ruoth wobin ri win,
aka go wodhiri ri win Kristo, ma go otyeko yero ri win, mobedo Yesu.
Go ripo doŋ i polo nyuka ndir otundi ma Were odwok'iye gikipiny jye i kare, paka Were owacho gi i dhoki jotuchi wach pere ma chango chon.

Kole Musa chango owacho ni, ‘Ruoth Were mewin bino dhiro ri win jatuchi wach Were ma bino wok kwoŋ ji mewin won paka odhiran bongi win ama. Wiripo chiko ithi win wiwinji gimoro jye ma go owachi ri win.
Nyatoro jye ma kowinji wach pere, ibino kwanyo go woko kwoŋ ji pa Were to ireyo go woko.’
To jotuchi wach Were jye wok kwoŋ Samwir kodi jomoluwo ŋeye jojye ma jobedo gi mikwenda, bende joluwo kwoŋ ndelo agono.
Aka wibedo jolunji gima jotuchi wach Were chango joluwo kwoŋe i chikirok ma Were otimo gi kwarere mewin, munyo owacho ri Ibrayimu ni, ‘Abino miyo ji jye ma piny silwany wok kwoŋ kodhi perin.’
Amomiyo Were oyero aka okutho open dhiro jatich pere bongi win won, womiyi win silwany munyo wiro wijojye ni wieye woko i yo mewin marecho.”
Munyo Petro gi Yohana oido fuodi joluwo ri ji, jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, jotel pa jokur ma Ot pa Were, kodi Josadukayo jobino to joay kwoŋ jo.
Nge oido omako jo ni rupiri jomoor aryo no oido jofuonjo ji nike otyek chierino Yesu kwoŋ jomotho, ma nyutho nike jomotho jobino chierino.
Ameno jomako jo to jobolo jo i od twech chuka yawere mere, paka piny oido otyeko yutho.
To ji mathoth ma jowinjo mikwenda no joyeyo ri gin, aka welo pa chwo omedere otundo chiegin gana abich.
Yawere mere jodhum kodi jotel pa Joyudaya, kodi jofuonji ma Chik jochokere Yerusalem,
kodi Anas, jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, kodi Kaifas, kodi Yohana, kodi Alekizanda, kodi ji jye moido jokweth ma nono pa jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar.
Jomiyo jomoor no chungo i dyer jo aka jopenjo jo ni, “Witimo gime nedi?”
Gikenyo munyo Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Petro, odwoko ni, “Jodhum kodi jotel pa ji,
k'inen konon wipenjo wan kwoŋ bero motim ri ŋatoŋol kodi paka obedo maber,
ber wijojye wiŋeyi, aka ji jye ma Israel jowoŋeyi, nike ŋat me chungo ruwaŋ win m'olama adyeri ru men pa Yesu Kristo Janazareth ma wiguro kwoŋ musalaba aka Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
Yesu won a ŋata ndiiko luwo kwoŋe ni, ‘Kole tele won ma jogeto jochayo ni bu kony ama olokere tele ma thyelo kindi ot.’
“Aka both kinwaŋere bongi ŋat man, rupiri ongoye nyingi nyatoro man jye i piny gipi, ma Were omiyo ji, ma waripo nwaŋ'iye both.”
Jokweth ma pido jodhyer munyo joneno miseni pa Petro gi Yohana, gi ŋeyo nike me ji mogo ma jokofuonjere kada. Gikenyo joniaŋ nike jome yado jobedo bongi Yesu.
To onwaŋo ongoye gimoro ma di jonyal wacho, rupiri joneno jal moboth no ochungo kenyo gi Petro gi Yohana.
Amomiyo jowacho ri Petro gin ni jowoeye i kapido, to jochako kikaŋasa wach wegi kendigin.
Jopenjere ni, “Wanotimi aŋo gi jome? Dhano jye ma Yerusalem oŋeyo nike jome jotyeko timo giraura madwoŋ me, aka wakinyal kwero.
To ma geŋo wach me medo nyay i dyer ji, weyi wawachi ri jo nike kiri jowomedi luwo kendo ri nyatoro jye i nyingi ŋato.”
Gikenyo jolwoŋo jo dwoko aka jochiko jo teltel ni kiri jowofuonji i nyingi Yesu.
To Petro gi Yohana jodwoko ni, “Wiwegi thum win gimotire atima i waŋ Were, winjo win, kosa winjo Were;
rupiri wakinyal weyo luwo kwoŋ gima wawegi watyeko neno gi winjo.”
Jopido jomedo bwoko jo gi men swa, to joweyo jo jokadho. Jokoneno yo ma di jomiyo gine jaryo no girachula, rupiri ji jye oido jopako Were kwoŋ gimotimere.
Aka ŋata giraura ma both otimere kwoŋe no oido kalo oro pyero aŋwen.
Tekin ityeko weyo jo, Petro gi Yohana jogik i kweth pajo to jowacho ri jowot gin gima jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji jowacho.
Munyo jowinjo gime, jo jye joriwere kanyachiel i kwayo Were ni, “Ruoth ma Jachwech ma polo gi piny, kodi wakawaka kodi gima ni iye jye!
Chango iluwo i Chuny Maleŋ gi dhoki kwari wan Daudi, jatich perin, ni, ‘Raŋo ma Jopath jo ni gi keme?
Kerere ma piny joyikere aka jodhumbe joromo kanyachiel, kwinyo Ruoth kodi Kristo (mowir gi mo) pere!’
Kole adyeri Herode kodi Pontyo Pilato joromo kanyachiel i tindi me gi Jopath kodi ji ma Israel ma chano timo gimarecho ri Yesu, Jatich perin Maleŋ, m'iwiro gi mo.
Jochokere ma timo gimoro jye ma in, gi men perin kodi mito perin, oido ityeko yiko ni d'otimere.
Aka pama, Ruoth, neni paka jobwoko wan, amomiyo miyi jotich perin men ma tito mikwenda perin gi miseni.
Ryeyi chingin ma botho ji, itimi ranyuth ma giraura kodi gidhyer i nyingi jatich perin maleŋ, Yesu.”
Munyo jotyeko kwayo, kama onwaŋo jo ni iye oyengere. Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo to jochako luwo wach pa Were gi miseni.
Kitipa pa jomoyeyo obedo achiel i paro kodi i chuny gin. Ongoye ŋata owacho ni lim pere obedo maraora pere kende, to obedo apa ji jye.
Jomoor jothyelo wach ma chierino pa Ruoth Yesu gi men moasere, aka jojye jonwaŋo silwany madwoŋ.
Ongoye moro i kitipa pajo moido chando gimoro, rupiri jomonwaŋo jonitye gi lowo kosa udi jotana to jokelo pesa mere
to joketho i chingi jomoor. Meno ama bin ipoko dhano jye mani kitipa monwaŋo chando gimoro.
Gikenyo Yozefu, Jalevi m'onywol Sipuro, ma jomoor jolwoŋo ni Barunaba (dwoŋ mere ni, “Ŋata kweyo chuny ji”),
otana lowo pere, to kelo pesa mere to miyo jomoor.
To onwaŋo nitye nyatoro milwoŋo ni Ananiya, gi chiege ma nyinge Safira, ma jotana lowo pajo mogo.
To go okano pesa moro ma konyirok, aka chiege oŋeyo gime, to modoŋ ama go otero ri jomoor.
Petro owacho ri go ni, “Ananiya, raŋo miyeyo Sitan odonjo i chunyin to miyin itwodo ri Chuny Maleŋ to ikano adech ma pesa m'ilimo i lowo perin?
Ma fuodi ikitana lowo no, onwaŋo kobedo aperin? Aka munyo ityeko kitana, pesa mere oido kobedo aperin? To raŋo ma iridho i chunyin nike itim gima pameno? Ikiwondo ji to iwondo Were won!”
Tekin Ananiya winjo gime, ogore piny to tho, aka dhano jye mowinjo gime, lworo opoŋ kwoŋe.
Yach mogo jodonjo, jotweyo go gi suka to jotero go to joyiko go.
Munyo hongo okadho ma romo sawa adek, chiege bende odonjo ma koŋeyo gima oido nende otimere.
Petro openjo go ni, “Wachi ran, me oido a gima in gi chworin wilimo gipi i gimewin?” Go odwoko ni, “Ey, meno won a welo mere.”
Gikenyo Petro owacho ri go ni, “Raŋo ma in kodi chworin wiyiko paro ma temo Chuny Maleŋ? Neni! Joma jowok yiko chworin eno jokonjere dhoot, aka jobino tiŋin jowoterin woko bende!”
Gikenyo won to dheno podho piny dho katyendi Petro to tho. Yach cha jodwoko, aka munyo jonwaŋo go otho, jotiŋo go bende to jokidho yiko go kabuti chwore.
Kitipa pa jomoyeyo gi bee gi joman ma jowinjo gino lworo madwoŋ opoŋ kwoŋ jo.
Jomoor jotimo ranyuth ma giraura madit i dyer ji. Jomoyeyo bin joromo i kalikondi pa Solomon.
Ongoye ŋat moro man ma kobedo jakweth pajo motemo riwirok gi jo, kada ji oido jomiyo jo dwoŋ.
Kada ameno welo pa chwo kodi mon ma jomedo yeyo Ruoth oidho malo mayot.

Ranyuth momore kodi giraura otim i waŋ ji gi chingi Jomoor ma kiri jotwo bin itero jo i royo mokakere ma tindi to jobedo kenyo i kanindo kodi i par pajo munyo jogeno ni kada nyaka tipo pa Petro wogeyi jomegi kwoŋ jo ka go kadho kenyo.
Ji bende jowok i tindi mothoko Yerusalem to jochokere kenyo munyo jokelo jotwo kodi joma chuny mochido chando jo, aka joboth jojye.
Gikenyo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi wadi jye, ma kweth pa Josadukayo, jobedo gi nyieko madwoŋ ri jomoor.
Jomako jomoor to joketho jo i od twech mani kenyo.
To i wor no, malaika pa Ruoth oyawo waŋkach ma od twech, to wodho woko jomoor, to wacho ri jo ni,
“Kidhi win wichungi i Ot pa Were, aka wiwachi ri ji jye kwoŋ kwo manyien me.”

Munyo ŋamba oyweyo, jomoor jodonjo i Ot pa Were to jochako fuonji paka owachi ri jo. Munyo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi wadi jotundo, jolwoŋo jotel pa Joyudaya kanyachiel bedo i romo mopoŋ i kapido. Gikenyo odhiro wach i od twech nike wokel jomoor bongi jo.
To munyo joserikale jotundo, jokonwaŋo jomoor; gikenyo jogik to jodwoko wach ri jopido ni,
“Munyo watundo i od twech wanwaŋo ochiegi aka jokur jye oido jochungo kenyo; to munyo wayawo wakinwaŋo moro kada achiel iye.”
Munyo jaserikale ma telo jokur ma Ot pa Were kodi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jowinjo gime, jodhyer swa, kareno joparo kwoŋ gima obedi ru wach no.
Gikenyo dhano moro odonjo to wacho ri jo ni, “Neni win ji ma wirwako i od twech ichade jochungo i Ot pa Were jofuonjo ji.”
Gikenyo jaserikale okadho gi ji pere to dwoko gi jomoor. Jokooro meni, rupiri jolworo ni ji jonyalo goyo jo gi telin.
Jorwako jomoor i ot to jomiyo jo chungo ruwaŋ kitipa pa jopido, to jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar osa jo ka wacho ni,
“Nyoro wachiko win ni wiŋuti ru meno, wikiri widoki wifuonji i nyingi ŋato, to kole onyo wipoŋo Yerusalem gi bee gi fuonji mewin, aka wimito ridho ni tho pa jame obedo gimarach mawan.”
Petro gi jomoor man jodwoko ni, “Waripo winjo or pa Were ma kiweno apa ji.
Were pa bachere wan ama ochierino Yesu ma wiguro kwoŋ yath to wineko.
Were ochierino go aka oketho go yu rachuch pere paka Jadhum kodi Jaboth, womiyi Israel hongo ma ŋuto gi limo chwak ma gimarecho pajo.
Kendo wan wabedo jokony i gikipiny me--wan wajukony kanyachiel kodi Chuny Maleŋ mich pa Were ri jomawinjo or pere.”
Munyo jokweth ma pido jowinjo gime jolimo nge mathoth to joridho nike woneki jomoor.
To ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo milwoŋo ni Gamaliel ma Jafarisayo, odoko jafuonji ma Chik ma jomiyo dwoŋ swa, ochungo i pido, to oro jo wodho woko jomoor, ma hongo ma thin,
to wacho ri jopido ni, “Joisrael, gwokere win kwoŋ gima wiyenyo timo ri jome.
I hongo mokadho Thyodas okethere munyo ŋoyo ni go ŋat moro madwoŋ; ji ma romo miya aŋwen joluwo go. To kole oneki go, to jomoido joluwo go jokedhere woko, to kitula pere reyere woko.
Rumachien, Yuda ma Jagalileya bende owok kamaler i hongo ma kwano ji; go oywayo ji megi bonge to kole oneki go bende, to jomoido joluwo go jokedhere woko.
Amomiyo i wach pa jome, wikiri witimi gimoro kwoŋ jo. Weyi win jo, rupiri ka atoŋa kodi tim pajo obedo yiko pa dhano, meno won bino rumo woko,
to ka wok bongi Were wikibino nyalo geŋo jome. Winyalo poyo ni wilwenyo gi Were won.” Jopido jowinjo ryeko ma Gamaliel omiyo jo.
Jolwoŋo jomoor no i ot, to jomiyo or ni wochwadi jo, aka jopiro jo ni kiri jowomedi luwo i nyingi Yesu, nyaka to jogonyo jo.
Jomoor joeye i kapido gi kisangala madwoŋ ni Were oparo kwoŋ jo ni joripo limo achanda ma kite no i nyingi Yesu.
Aka piny moyawere jye jomedere gi fuonjo ji Wach Maber ma Kwoŋ Yesu Kristo, i Ot pa Were kodi i pechin pa ji.

I hongo me munyo welo pa jofuonjirok medere dito, Joyudaya ma joluwo Dhoyunani joero kiŋunyaŋunya kodi Joyudaya ma jooro Dhoyudaya. Joyudaya ma joluwo Dhoyunani jowacho ni mon tho pajo kipar kwoŋ jo odocho i pok ma kis ndelo.
Amomiyo Jomoor apar g'aryo jolwoŋo kweth pa jofuonjirok gipi kanyachiel to jowacho ni, “Kiripi ka waweyo tich ma fuonjo Wach pa Were to wayindin gi tich ma poko chiemo ayin.
Amomiyo, wutimin wan, yeri win chwo abiryo i dyer win ma wiŋeyo ni jopoŋ gi Chuny Maleŋ kodi ryeko, aka wabino ketho jo i tich me.
Aka wawegi wabino liŋ i tich ma kwayo kodi fuonji.”

Kweth ji gi bee josangala gi wach pa jomoor, to joyero Stefano, jal mopoŋ gi yeyo kodi Chuny Maleŋ; kodi Filipo, kodi Purokoro, kodi Nikanor, kodi Timon, kodi Parmena kodi Nikolayo, Japath modonjo i dini pa Joyudaya wok Antyok.
Jokelo jono ruwaŋ jomoor, to jokwayo ri jo, to joketho chingi gin kwoŋ jo.
Gikenyo Wach pa Were omedere nyay. Welo pa jofuonjirok ma Yerusalem omedo idho malo mapiyo, aka jochwayi ri Were wi alitar mathoth jojolo to yeyo.
Stefano, dhano ma Were oŋaŋo gi silwany aka oasere gi men, otimo gikipiny madongo ma kelo dhyer kanyachiel gi giraura i dyer ji.

To ji megi, moido jobedo jokweth ma kalamo pa jomogony (paka onwaŋo ilwoŋo jo), kodi jokalamo ma Sireno kodi ma Alekizandurya, jopyemo gine. Jono gi Joyudaya man ma jowok Silisya kodi Asya jochako pyem gi Stefano.
To Chuny Maleŋ omiyo Stefano ryeko ma munyo luwo jokonyalo chiro go.
Amomiyo jonyiewo ji mogo ma jowacho ni, “Wawinjo go luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Musa kodi Were!”
Ameno jonyalo kisigila ji kodi jotel pa ji kodi jofuonji ma Chik. Jobino bongi Stefano, jomako go, to jotero go i kapido.
Gikenyo jokelo ji mogo ma jotwodo kwoŋ Stefano, ka jowacho ni, “Jame ndir jye luwo aluwa marach kwoŋ Ot maleŋ mapa Were mawan kodi kwoŋ Chik pa Musa.
Aka wawinjo munyo go wacho nike Yesu ma Nazareth me bino ŋinyo woko Ot pa Were to wiro woko kula jye ma wanwaŋo bongi Musa!”
Ji jye ma jobedo i kapido jochomo waŋ gin kwoŋ Stefano aka joneno ni waŋe ochale kodi waŋ malaika.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar openjo Stefano ni, “Wach no obedo adyeri?”
Aka Stefano odwoko ni, “Wutimera gi bachere nan! Winjan win! Were mani gi dwoŋ omenyere ri kwari wan Ibrayimu munyo go fuodi nitye yu Mesopotamya, ma fuodi go kokidho bedo Haran,
aka Were owacho ri go ni, ‘Weyi jothuwin kodi piny mewin ikidhi i piny ma anonyuthin.’
Gikenyo go oeye i piny ma Kalideya to kidho bedo Haran. Aka rumachien munyo baa Ibrayimu otho, Were okwanyo go woko kenyo to kelo go i piny me, ma pama wibed'iye.

I hongo no Were k'omiyo Ibrayimu kada adech moro paka apere won, kada nyaka lowo ma romo par tyendi dhano; to Were ochiko ni bino miyo go piny no, aka rumachien d'obedo apere kodi apa nyikwaye, kada go onwaŋo fuodi ongoye gi nyathi.
Me a gima Were owacho ri go: ‘Nyikwayin jobin bedo i piny ma wiloka, kama jobino bed'iye ŋechin aka ibino kuro jo marach hongo ma romo oro miya aŋwen.’
Were owacho ni, ‘Abino thumo banja loyo nono ma jobino tich ri jo no, aka rumachien nyikwayin jobino wok i piny no to jodwoko laman ka.’
Gikenyo Were omiyo Ibrayimu chikirok ma thumirok paka ranyuth mere. Amomiyo Ibrayimu othumo Isaka munyo ndelo aboro otundo, aka Isaka obedo baa Yakobo, aka Yakobo obedo baa nono apar g'aryo.
“Kwarere ma nonin no jotimo nyieko gi omin gin Yozefu, to jotana go gi Jomisir paka ŋecha. To Were obedo gi Yozefu,

to wodho go maber i teko pere jye. Munyo Yozefu otundo ruwaŋ Farawo, kere pa Jomisir, Were omiyo go kite maber swa kodi ryeko momiyo go oywayo chuny Farawo. Farawo oloko Yozefu jadhum (gavana) ma piny kodi ma ot pere.
Gikenyo kech opodho i Misir gipi kodi i Kanan, mokelo chandirok madwoŋ. Kwarere mawan jokonyalo limo chiemo moro jye.
Amomiyo munyo Yakobo owinjo ni girachama nitye Misir, odhiro kwarere mawan koro kutho kidho lyewo marapena.
I wendo pajo mararyo, Yozefu onyuthere ri wutimin aka Farawo oniaŋ ni jono jobedo wutimin Yozefu.
Amomiyo Yozefu odhiro mikwenda ri Yakobo bamere, munyo wacho ri go kodi pecho gipi ni jowokidhi Misir. Welo pajo oido romo ji pyero abiryo g'abich.
Gikenyo Yakobo okidho Misir, kama go kodi kwarere mawan jotho iye.
Delkwoŋ jo oter Sekem, kama oyik'iye jo i kalyel ma Ibrayimu chango onyiewo kwoŋ nono pa Hamor gi pesa moro.
“Munyo ndir ochore chiegin ri Were ma ketho chikirok pere kodi Ibrayimu i tim, welo pa ji mawan i Misir oido oidho malo swa.
Rumachien kere man, ma koŋeyo wach pa Yozefu ochako dhum i Misir.
Go obuto ri ji mawan to lokere mager ri kwarere mawan, munyo romo jo jwango nyithindho pajo maŋich nike jowotho.
I ndir no ama onywol'iye Musa, nyathi maŋon swa ruwaŋ Were. Okur go pecho pa bamere hongo ma dwe adek.
Aka munyo owodhi go pecho pajo, nyar Farawo odimo go to pidho paka nyathi pere won.
Ofuonji go ryeko jye mapa Jomisir to lokere ŋata tek swa i wach kodi i tim.
“Munyo Musa oromo oro pyero aŋwen, oridho paro ma limo Joisrael wadi.
Oneno achiel kwoŋ jo munyo Jamisir moro timo ri go marach; gikenyo oredo konyo Joisrael no to chulo kwor kwoŋ Jamisir gi neko woko go.
(Go oparo nike ji pere wegi jobino ŋeyo ni Were oido oro go ma konyo jo, to kere jokoniaŋ).
Yawere mere Musa onwaŋo Joisrael aryo jogore, to temo theko jo ka wacho ni, ‘Jume, kole wibedo wutimere. Raŋo ma widhaw matek ama?’
To ŋata oido timo nyawote marach odhiro Musa gichien, to penjo ni, ‘Ŋata okethin ruoth ma thumo ri wan banja?
Imito nekan bende, paka nyoro ineko Jamisir?’
Munyo Musa owinjo gime oringo to eye Misir to chako bedo i piny Midyan kama olim'iye wote aryo.
“Munyo oro pyero aŋwen okadho, malaika omenyere ri Musa i mach mogaŋere monwaŋo lyel i kasugu dudi moro chiegin gi got Sinai.
Musa ouro swa gima go oneno, to dhire chiegin gi kasugu dudi no woneni maber. Gikenyo go owinjo dwondi Ruoth munyo wacho ni,
‘An Were pa kwarere nin, Were pa Ibrayimu kodi Isaka kodi Yakobo.’ Musa okirin gi lworo aka kotimo miseni ma ŋiyo.
To Ruoth wacho ri go ni, ‘Lunyi woko war ma tyendin, rupiri kama ichung'iye me kabedo maleŋ.
Adyeri atyeko neno chandirok pa ji paran i piny Misir, kendo atyeko winjo paka joywak malith, aka onyo aloro bino botho jo. Onyo biye, aleorin i Misir.’

“Me a Musa ma jono jokwero ka jopenjo go ni, ‘Ŋata okethin ruoth ma thumo ri wan banja?’ Kole go won a ŋata Were ooro paka ruoth kodi jaboth pajo gi men pa malaika momenyere ri go i kasugu dudi ma onwaŋo lyel mach.
Go ama otelo ji i royo wok Misir, munyo timo gikipiny ma miyo ji dhyer kanyachiel kodi giraura i Misir kodi i Wakawaka Mobokere, kodi i thim i hongo ma oro pyero aŋwen.
Me a Musa mowacho ri Joisrael ni, ‘Were bino kelo ri win jatuchi wach Were bende paka an, ma bino wok kwoŋ ji mewin won.’
Me a ŋata chango obedo i dyer Joisrael ma jochokere i thim kanyachiel kodi kwarere wan kodi malaika moluwo gine wi got Sinai; aka go olimo mikwenda ma kwo mapa Were m'okelo ri wan.
“To kwarere wan jokwero winjo go; jodhiro go gichien aka joparo kir kwoŋ gik yu Misir.
Amomiyo jowacho ri Aron ni, ‘Timi ri wan werin ma jobino telo wan. Wakuya gima otimo Musa no momiyo owodho wan i piny Misir.’
Gikenyo jochweyo gimoro ma chalo nyathi dhiaŋ to jochako lamo gino, to jotimo kalima ma miyo gino dwoŋ.

Gikenyo Were owiro ŋeye ri jo to miyo jochako lamo michalin ma polo, paka ondik i kitawo pa jotuchi wach Were ni, ‘Ji ma Israel! Manago i ndir cha wineko ran lee paka rachow i hongo ma oro pyero aŋwen i thim?
Kole wema pa were Molek ama witiŋo kodi chal ma michala pa were Refam, chal ma wichweyo ni wilam. Amomiyo abino ryemo win woko kalo kir Babilon.’
“Kwarere mawan oido jonitye gi wema pa Were i dyer thim. Oger paka Were ooro Musa timo, i chal ma Were onyutho Musa.
Rumachien, kwarere mawan ma jojolo wema wok bongi bachere pajo jotiŋo munyo jowotho kodi Yoswa to jotero i piny pa nonin ma Were oryemo woko ri jo. Aka wema no obedo kenyo kir i ndir pa Daudi
monwaŋo silwany pa Were, aka okwayo Were ni woyeyi go wogeri ot ri Were pa Yakobo.
To Solomon ama ogero ot no ri go.
“To Were Madwoŋ Maloyo kibedi ri gin i ot ma ji ama jogero; paka jatuchi wach oketho i Ndiiko ni,
‘Polo meno kom paran madhum, apaka Ruoth wacho, aka piny meno kom paran ma ajeng'iye tyendan. Kiti ot aŋo ma d'igero ran? Kosa ka ywomirok paran obedi aŋo?
Kosa chingan ama kochweyo gikipiny ni jye?’
“Wiyi win tek swa! Dwoŋ thumirok ongoye i chuny win kodi i ithi win. Wichale kodi kwarere mewin; wibende noknok wipyemo gi Chuny Maleŋ!
Nitye jatuchi wach Were kada achiel ma kwarere mewin jokolwenyo gine? Joneko kir jomikwenda pa Were, ma chango chon jotucho bino pa Ŋatotire, ma wityeko kir chamo ri go sereko to wineko go.
Win ma wijolo Chik pa Were ma malaikin jokelo ri win, ama wikwero winjo Chik no!”
Munyo jokweth ma pido jowinjo wach no, keme omako jo to chako mwodo laki gin.
To Sitefano, paka opoŋ gi Chuny Maleŋ, oŋiyo polo to neno dwoŋ pa Were kodi Yesu munyo ochungo yu rachuch pa Were.
Aka owacho ni: “Neni! Eno aneno polo oyawere aka Wuodi Dhano ochungo yu rachuch pa Were!”
Chungo kwoŋ wach me jomochokere kenyo jowoy aka jochulo ithi gin; gikenyo jojye jomwomere kwoŋe,
jowodho go woko ma tindi aka jogoyo go gi telin. Jomobedo i wach no joketho ruk pajo dho tyendi jayach milwoŋo ni Saulo.
Munyo jogoyo go, Sitefano owacho i kwayo ni, “Ruoth Yesu, joli chunyan.”
Gikenyo oguro chonge piny to koko malo ni, “Ruoth, ikiri ikethi kwoŋ jo gimarach me;” aka gi wach me opodho to kwe.
Aka Saulo oyeyere gi nek me. Gi i ndelo no won, kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Yerusalem ochako nwaŋo achanda malith. Jomoyeyo jye, kwanyo woko jomoor, jotyakere i adeche ma Yudeya kodi Samarya parom.
Chwo mogo ma jomiyere ri Were joyiko Sitefano munyo joywako go gi geregere madwoŋ.
To Saulo otemo reyo woko kitipa pa jomoyeyo munyo wotho i kis dhoot pa jomoyeyo ka choko jo, chwo gi mon, aka bolo jo i twech.
Jomoyeyo ma okedhi jo jokidho iye jye munyo jofuonjo Wach pa Were.
Filipo okidho i tindi ma Samarya to fuonjo ji kwoŋ Kristo.
Kweth ji jochiko ithi jo gi chuny jo achiel munyo jowinjo fuonji pa Filipo gi giraura ma go otimo.
Chuny mochido jowok kwoŋ ji madit gi derino madwoŋ; ji mathoth ma jotwo nyaŋinya, kodi jomoŋol bende jobedo maber.
Aka kisangala madwoŋ obedo Samarya gipi.
I tindi no oido nitye nyatoro milwoŋo ni Simon, ma yado miyo Josamarya dhyer gi thyeth pere. Go oido wacho nike go ŋatadwoŋ swa,
aka dhano jye i tindi, i kitipa ji ma nger jye ochiko ithe maber winjo go. Jowacho ni, “Jame a men pa Were milwoŋo ni, ‘Ma Siragama’ ”
Go oido otyeko miyo ji dhyer gi thyeth pere hongo malach swa momiyo bin jochiko ithi gin winjo go.
To munyo joyeyo fuonji pa Filipo kwoŋ Wach Maber ma Ker pa Were kodi nyingi Yesu Kristo, jolimo batisimo, chwo gi mon.
Simon jye bende oyeyo, aka munyo otyeko limo batisimo, obedo chiegin gi Filipo to dhyer swa munyo oneno ranyuth madongo kodi giraura monwaŋo itimo.
Munyo jomoor ma Yerusalem jowinjo nike ji ma Samarya jotyeko jolo wach pa Were, jodhiro Petro gi Yohana ri jo.
Munyo jotundo, jokwayo ri jomoyeyo nike jowolimi Chuny Maleŋ.
Ato Chuny Maleŋ onwaŋo fuodi koloro ri kada ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo; onwaŋo jotyeko limo batisimo kende i nyingi Ruoth Yesu.
Gikenyo Petro gi Yohana joketho chingi gin kwoŋ jo, to jolimo Chuny Maleŋ.
Munyo Simon oneno nike Chuny Maleŋ loro ri ji ka jomoor joketho chingi gin kwoŋ jo, ochwayo pesa ri Petro kodi Yohana
ka wacho ni, “Miyan win bende men me, aka wangi ka aketho chingan kwoŋ moro go bino limo Chuny Maleŋ.”
To Petro odwoko ni, “Kadhi itho koro gi pesa perin, rupiri oido iparo ni inyalo nyiewo mich pa Were gi pesa!
Ingoye gi kabedo i tich mawan me, rupiri chunyin kotire i waŋ Were.
Amomiyo ŋuti kwoŋ tim perin marach me, aka ikway Ruoth nike wochwakin kwoŋ paro marach me,
rupiri aneno ni duro opoŋ i chunyin, aka gimarach otweyin.”
Simon owacho ri Petro kodi Yohana ni, “Mondo kwayi win ran Ruoth, ŋey wongoye kada gimoro achiel ma wiluwo kwoŋe me ma wotiman.”
Munyo jotyeko niaŋo ji mikwenda pa Ruoth, Petro gi Yohana jogik Yerusalem. Jofuonjo Wach Maber malomalo i adeche momore i Samarya.
Malaika pa Ruoth oluwo gi Filipo ni, “Yikere ilekidho i royo ma yu Tyendi piny ma wok i Yerusalem aka laro yu Gaza.”

Me obedo royo ma thim. Gikenyo Filipo oyikere to kadho. I hongo no jatich ma Ethopya onwaŋo dok yu pecho. Ŋat me oido obedo jaserikale madwoŋ ma kuro dero ŋaŋo pa kere madhako ma Ethopya milwoŋo ni Kandase. Go oido owok Yerusalem lamo Were,
aka onwaŋo dok gi chawula pere munyo soma kitawo pa jatuchi wach Isaya malomalo.
Chuny Maleŋ owacho ri Filipo ni, “Kidhi iromi kodi chawula no.”
Filipo oringo bonge to winjo munyo go soma kitawo pa Isaya; gikenyo openjo go ni, “Iŋeyo dwoŋ gima isoma no?”
Ana Jaserikale, “Anyalo nedi ŋeyo dwoŋ mere ma nyatoro kotito ran?” Go olwoŋo Filipo ni woidhi chawula wobed'iye gine.
Adech ma randik moido go soma a me: “Paka rombo mitero thumo, kosa nyathi rombo milyelo yer mere, go koŋamo dhoke ni luwo.
I achanda pere odiy go piny i banja. Ŋa ma nyalo tito kwoŋ luse pere? Kole orey woko kwo pere i piny ka mapiyo.”
Jaserikale owacho ri Filipo ni, “Wachi ran, jatuchi wach me luwo kwoŋ ŋa me? Kwoŋ go won, kosa ŋat man?”
Gikenyo Filipo ochako tito ri go kwoŋ adech ma randik me; otito ri go Wach Maber mapa Yesu.
Munyo fuodi jowotho i royo, jotundo kama di pi, to jaserikale wacho ni, “Kole pi moro ee. Aŋo ma geŋan limo batisimo?”
[Filipo owacho ri go ni, “I nyalo limo batisimo ka iyeyo gi chunyin jye.” Ana go, “Ayeyo ni Yesu Kristo obedo Wuodi Were.”]
Jaserikale ooro jatich pere juko chawula; gikenyo jaryo no, Filipo kodi jaserikale jokidho i pi, to Filipo miyo go batisimo.
Munyo jowok i pi, Chuny Maleŋ pa Ruoth okwanyo Filipo. Joserikale odoko koneno go, to medere gi woth pere, munyo kisangala opoŋ i chunye.
Filipo opoyo munyo go nitye i Azoto; to wotho i tindi parom munyo fuonjo Wach Maber, chuka otundo Kaisareya.
Saulo oido fuodi medere i hongo no gi ywoyo wach ma bwoko gi neko jofuonjirok pa Ruoth. Okidho bongi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar,
to kwayo balwa ma dhiro go i kalamo pa Joyudaya i Damasiko, ni ka onwaŋo joma luwo royo pa Ruoth kenyo, wonyali mako jo, chwo gi mon, to dwoko jo Yerusalem.
Munyo go fuodi oido ni royo kidho Damasiko, ma fuodi kotundo i tindi, lero owok i polo to umo go ni fungu.
Go ogore piny to winjo dwondi jo ma wacho ri go ni, “Saulo Saulo! Raŋo milwenyo kodan”?
Go openjo ni, “In i ŋa, Ruoth?” Dwondi jo no odwoko ni, “An Yesu m'ilwenyo gine.
To ayi malo ikidhi i tindi, kama ibino wacho rin iye gima inotimi”
I hongo no ji monwaŋo jowotho gi Saulo oido jochungo, mongoye wach ma jowacho; jowinjo dwondi jo no to jokoneno nyatoro.
Saulo oay malo kama onwaŋo opodh'iye to yawo waŋe, to konyalo neno gimoro. Gikenyo jomako chinge to jotero go Damasiko.
I hongo ma ndelo adek go konyalo neno gimoro, aka i hongo no go konyalo chiemo kosa madho gimoro.
Onwaŋo nitye i Damasiko jafuonjirok moro milwoŋo ni Ananiya. Ŋato olimo lek ma Ruoth owach'iye ri go ni, “Ananiya!” Odwoko ni, “Anika, Ruoth.”
Ruoth owacho ri go ni “Yikere ikidhi i Royo milwoŋo ni Nyatirtir, aka ipenji dhano ma wok Tarso milwoŋo ni Saulo i ot pa Yuda. Go nitye i kwayo pama won me.
Aka, i lek, go oneno dhano milwoŋo ni Ananiya munyo donjo to ketho chinge kwoŋe ŋey go wochaki neno kendo.”
Ananiya odwoko ni, “Ruoth, kole ji mathoth jotyeko luwo ran kwoŋ gikipiny marecho ma ŋato otyeko timo ri ji perin maleŋ ma Yerusalem.
Aka go obino Damasiko gi men ma jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jomiyo go ma mako nyatoro jye ma yeyo i nyingin.”
Ruoth owacho ri go ni, “Kidhi, rupiri atyeko yero go wotiyi ran, ma miyo nyingan ŋeyirok bongi Jopath kodi kerin, kodi nyithindho pa Israel.
Aka abino nyutho go paka go ripo chandirok ran.”
Gikenyo Ananiya okidho, odonjo i ot to ketho chinge kwoŋ Saulo ka wacho ni, “Omera Saulo, Ruoth Yesu momenyere rin i royo munyo ibino ka, ooran nike inyali neno kendo ipoŋ gi Chuny Maleŋ.”
Piyo piyo gimoro ma chalo magambala ohale wok i waŋe to podho, to go chako neno kendo. Gikenyo go oay malo to imiyo go batisimo,
aka munyo otyeko chiemo, men pere odwoko. Saulo obedo ndelo manok gi jofuonjirok i Damasiko.
Go okidho nyatirtir i kalamo pa Joyudaya momore aka ochako fuonjo kwoŋ Yesu ka wacho ni, “Yesu obedo Wuodi Were.”

Ji jye ma jowinjo go jodhyer swa, aka wegi jopenjere ni, “Me k'aŋata oneko ji Yerusalem ma jotucho nyingi Yesu? Aka miti go onyo ameno kobino ka kodi atoŋa ma mako ji ma jotucho nyingi Yesu gi tweyo jo tero jo bongi jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar?”
To fuonji pa Saulo omedere bedo gi men loyo, aka tito pere ni Yesu obedo Kristo obedo mochwiny swa ma Joyudaya moido jonitye Damasiko jokonyalo dwoko go.
Munyo ndelo mathoth okadho, Joyudaya jochokere to joyiko paro ma neko Saulo;
to owachi ri go gima oido joyiko timo. Jonago jokuro go i waŋkach ma tindi Wor g'odyechieŋ ni jowoneki go.
To gi wor no, jomaluwo Saulo jokwanyo go to jowodho go gi i hoŋ ma kor ot i adita molyer gi thol.
Saulo okidho Yerusalem to temo makirok kodi jofuonjirok to jokonyalo yeyo nike go pama onyo bende olokere jafuonjirok, to jojye jolworo go ayino.

Gikenyo Barunaba obino okwanyo go to tero go bongi jomoor to tito ri jo paka Saulo ndir cha oneno Ruoth i royo to Ruoth luwo gine. Go bende owacho ri jo paka Saulo ofuonjo gi miseni i nyingi Yesu i tindi ma Damasiko.
Gikenyo Saulo obedo gi jo to wotho Yerusalem parom, munyo fuonjo gi miseni i nyingi Ruoth.
Go bende oluwo aka opyemo kodi Joyudaya ma joluwo Dhoyunani, to jotemo neko go.
Muny jomoyeyo joŋeyo gino, jotero Saulo yu Kaisareya to jodhiro go Tarso.
Gikenyo kitipa pa jomoyeyo i Yudeya gipi kodi Galileya kodi Samarya obedo gi hola ma syem. Jokonyere aka jodongo i welo ru kony pa Chuny Maleŋ, munyo jowotho i kwo ma lworo Were.
Paka Petro oido wotho i kabedo momore, ndelo moro go okidho lyewo ji ma jobedo Lida.
Kenyo go oromo gi dhano milwoŋo ni Ayineya, monwaŋo two nyaŋinya aka konyalo ay i kanindo oro aboro.
Petro owacho ri go ni, “Ayineya, Yesu Kristo bothin. Ayi malo iyiki kanindo perin.” Ayineya oay mayot.
Ji ma jobedo Lida kodi Saron joneno go, to jowire bongi Ruoth.
I Yopa onwaŋo nitye dhako moyeyo milwoŋo ni Tabisa, (Nyinge i Dhoyunani obedo Dokas, dwoŋ mere ni amudhe), moido oro hongo pere jye ma timo bero gi konyo jochandi.
I hongo no two omako go to tho. Olwok delkwoŋe to ipyelo i ot ma malo.
Paka Yopa oido kibor gi Lida, munyo jofuonjirok ma Yopa jowinjo ni Petro nitye Lida, jooro ji aryo bonge gi mikwenda me, “Mondo redi ibin.”
Gikenyo Petro oyikere to kidho bongi jo. Munyo go otundo, oter go i ot ma malo. Mon tho jye jothoko go munyo joywak aka jonyutho go satere gi kotere ma Dokas otimo munyo fodi kwo.
Petro oryemo jojye woko, aka oguro chonge to kwayo; aka owire kama di jatho to lwoŋo ni, “Tabisa, ayi malo!”
Petro otundo bonge to konyo go gi ay malo. Gikenyo Petro olwoŋo jomoyeyo kodi mon tho, to chwayo go makwo ri jo.
Wach me onyay i Yopa gipi, aka ji mathoth joyeyo Ruoth.
Petro obedo Yopa ndelo moromo kodi jajwayi pyendere milwoŋo ni Simon.
Onwaŋo nitye dhano i Kaisareya milwoŋo ni Kornelyo, jaserikale madwoŋ i lwak jolweny ma Roma milwoŋo ni kitipa pa Joitalya.
Go oido obedo jadin matek gi ot pere gi bee aka jolworo Were. Go oido miyo kony madit ri jochandi, aka onwaŋo kwayo Were noknok.
Dho kapa sawa abuŋwen odyechieŋ moro, go oneno chal momenyere ri go, monen'iye malaika pa Were munyo donjo to lwoŋo go ni, “Kornelyo!”
Go omoro waŋe kwoŋ malaika gi lworo aka owacho ni, “Aŋo jadwoŋ?” Ana malaika: “Were ojolo kwayo perin gi tich perin ma konyo ji, aka onyo opoyin.
Onyo ori jomogo i Yopa jowolwoŋi Simon ma nyinge man Petro.
Go obedo wendo pa Simon ma jajwayi pyendere ma bedo dho thengi wakawaka.”
Gikenyo malaika monwaŋo luwo gine okadho, aka Kornelyo olwoŋo jotich ma ot pere jaryo kodi jaserikale, ma bende jadin matek monwaŋo obedo achiel kwoŋ jokur pere.
Owacho ri jo gima otimere jye to oro jo Yopa.
Yawere mere kapa sawa auchiel modyechieŋ, munyo jonitye i woth pajo aka onwaŋo joriko Yopa, Petro oidho wi ot kwayo.
Gikenyo go ochako winjo kech to mito girachama; aka munyo fuodi itedo chiemo, ochako nur to neno chal momenyere ri go.
Oneno polo oyawere aka gimoro oloro mochalo suka malach m'ochar piny gi sonda mere aŋwen pa kidho umo piny.
I suka no onwaŋo nitye lee ma piny ma kite jye, gikipiny mamol gi kor gin piny kodi winyin ma malo.
Dwondi jo moro owacho ri go ni; “Ayi malo, Petro, ineki ichami!”
To Petro owacho ni, “Kameno, Ruoth! Fuodi yado akichamo gimoro jye mitero paka gima kichar, kosa ma kolony.”
Dwondi jo no odoko oluwo gine ni, “Gima Were otyeko lonyo, ikiri ilwoŋo ni gima kichar.”
Gime otimere didek to idwoko gino i polo.
Munyo Petro fuodi uro dwoŋ chal ma go oneno no, ji ma Kornelyo ooro rango kama ot pa Simon nitye iye jotundo kenyo to jochungo dho waŋkach.
Jolwoŋo gi dwondi jo ma malo to jopenjo ni, “Nitye wendo moro ka ma nyinge Simon Petro?”
Petro oido fuodi temo niaŋ i dwoŋ chal ma go oneno no to Chuny Maleŋ wacho ri go ni, “Kole nitye ji adek ka ma jorangin.
Amomiyo yikere ilor, aka ikiri imindaminda ma ikikadho gi jo, rupiri aŋata aoro jo.”
Gikenyo Petro oloro to wacho ri jo ni, “Ani a ŋata wirango. Wibino raŋo?”

Jowacho ni, “Jaserikale madwoŋ milwoŋo ni Kornelyo ama ooro wan. Go obedo ŋataber ma lamo Were aka Joyudaya joworo go swa. Achiel kwoŋ jomalaika pa Were owacho ri go nike wolwoŋin i ot pere, wonyali winjo gima inowachi.”
Petro orwako jono i ot to jonindo kenyo. Yawere mere go oyikere to kadho gi jo; aka jowote mogo ma jowok Yopa bende jokadho gine.
Yawere mere jotundo Kaisareya kama Kornelyo oido kur'iye go, kanyachiel gi wade pere gi merin pere ma go olwoŋo.
Munyo Petro nyaka donjo i ot, Kornelyo oromo gine, to podho dho tyende gi bwonirok.
Petro owacho ri go woay malo. Owacho ni, “Chungi, kole abende adhano adhana.”
Petro omedere gi luwo kodi Kornelyo munyo donjo i ot, kama onwaŋ'iye ji mathoth ma jochokere.
Owacho ri jo ni, “Wiwegi wiŋeyo maber nike din pa Jayudaya kiyey go riwirok kodi Jopath. To Were otyeko nyuthan ni akir ater dhano moro jye paka jakichar kosa ni kolony.
Amomiyo munyo ioro ji lwoŋan abino mongoye pyem. Onyo wach ran gima omiyo ilwoŋan.”
Kornelyo owacho ni, “Ndelo aŋwen mokadho onwaŋo akwayo i ot paran sawa abuŋwen modyechieŋ. Piyo piyo dhano morukere i ruk ma minyin ochungo ruwaŋan.
Owacho ni, ‘Kornelyo! Were owinjo kwayo perin, aka opoyo tich perin ma konyo ji.
Ori dhano moro Yopa wolwoŋi jal milwon ni Simon Petro ma obedo wendo pecho pa Simon jajwayi pyendere, ma bedo dho thengi wakawaka!’
Amomiyo aoro ji lwoŋin mayot, aka itimo maber bino. Pama onyo wajojye wani ka i nyim Were, wakuro winjo gimoro jye ma Ruoth oorin wacho.”
Petro ochako luwo ni, “Onyo pama aneno adyeri ni Were tero dhano jye marom.
Nyatoro jye ma lworo go aka timo gimotire, go jolo mongoye tito nono pere.
Wiŋeyo fuonji ma go odhiro ri ji ma Israel, ma tito Wach Maber ma kelo syem i Yesu Kristo, mobedo Ruoth pa ji jye.
Wiŋeyo gimadwoŋ motimere i Yudeya parom, chako Galileya, chako kwoŋ batisimo ma Yohana ofuonjo:
paka Were okonjo kwoŋ Yesu ma Nazareth Chuny Maleŋ kodi men; paka go okidho kamoro jye munyo timo bero gi botho jomatwo jye monwaŋo jonitye i achanda pa jwogi, rupiri Were oido ni gi go.
Wabedo jokony ma joŋeyo gimoro jye ma go otimo i piny Yudeya kodi i Yerusalem. Joneko go munyo joguro go kwoŋ musalaba.
To Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho i ndelo maradek, to miyo go menyere ri ji.
Ji jye jokoneno go, to wan ayino ma wabedo jokony ma Were otyeko yero. Wachiemo odoko waoro giramadha kanyachiel gine munyo Were otyeko chierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
Aka go ooro wan fuonjo ji Wach Maber, gi nyutho jo kamaler nike go a ŋata Were oketho thumo banja pa jomakwo gi jomotho.
Jotuchi wach Were jye joluwo kwoŋe, munyo jowacho ni nyatoro jye moyeyi go ibino chwako gimarecho pere gi men ma nyingi go.”
Munyo Petro fuodi luwo, Chuny Maleŋ oloro kwoŋ jojye monwaŋo jochiko ithi jo jowinjo fuonji.
Joyudaya ma joyeyo ma jobino wok Jopa gi Petro jodhyer ni Were okonjo mich pere ma Chuny Maleŋ kwoŋ Jopath bende.
Ato jowinjo munyo joluwo i dhudhok manyien ma nyakare ka jopako dwoŋ pa Were. Aka Petro owacho ni,
“Nitye ŋata nyalo geŋo jome limo batisimo ma pi mato bende jotyeko limo Chuny Maleŋ paka wan?”
Gikenyo go ooro jo ni jowolimi batisimo i nyingi Yesu Kristo. Rumachien jokwayo Petro gin ni jowobediye gi jo ndelo ma romo.
Jomoor kodi wadi jo ma Yudeya pa rom jowinjo ni Jopath bende jojolo wach pa Were.
Munyo Petro okidho Yerusalem, ji monwaŋo joyenyo ni Jopath bende jowothumere jogesa ni,
“Iraŋo wikidho bongi Jopath ma jokuthumere to wichiemo kir gi jo!”
Gikenyo Petro otito ri jo thenethene ma gima otimere woki i chakirok mere ama:
“An onwaŋo anitye ikwayo i tindi ma Yopa, to aneno gimoro munyo loro piny wok i polo mochalo suka mapando micharo piny kareno omaki thenge aŋwen jye to tundo bongan.
Akaŋasa iye maber to aneno lee ma nyatyende aŋwen, kodi ogwange, kodi gikipiny ma mol gi kor gin kodi winyin ma malo.
Aka awinjo dwondi jo moro mowacho ran ni, ‘Petro, ayi malo, neki jo ichami!’
To awacho ni, ‘Kameno Ruoth! Ongoye chiemo makichar kosa ma kolony motyeko donjo i dhokan.’
Dwondi jo mowok i polo no oluwo kendo ni, ‘Gima Were otyeko lonyo, ikiri ilwoŋo ni gimakichar.’
Gime otimere didek, aka rumachien oywayi to idwoko i polo.
I hongo no won ama ji mogo adek m'oor bongan wok Kaisareya jotundo i ot monwaŋo abed'iye.
Chuny Maleŋ owacho ran ni akidhi gi jono mongoye yero. Joma joyeyo auchiel me bende jowotho kodan kir i Kaisareya, to wajojye wadonjo i ot pa Kornelyo.
Go owacho ri wan paka oneno malaika moro ochungo i ot pere to wacho ri go ni, ‘Ori dhano Yopa wolwoŋi Simon ma nyinge Petro.
Go bino kelo ri win wach ma bino miyin kodi joodin jye limo both.’
Aka munyo achako luwo, Chuny Maleŋ oloro ri jo paka chango oloro ri wan i kachako.
Gikenyo apoyo gima Ruoth ndir cha owacho ni, ‘Yohana omiyo win batisimo gi pi to wibino limo batisimo gi Chuny Maleŋ.’
Onyo k'inen Were omiyo Jopath no bende mich achiel ma go omiyo wan munyo wayeyo Ruoth Yesu Kristo, onyo an aŋa, ma d'atem juko Were!”
Munyo jowinjo gime, joliŋ pyem, to jopako Were munyo jowacho ni, “Kere Were otyeko miyo Jopath bende hongo ma ŋuto gi bedo gi kwo.”
Jomoyeyo jokedhere ru lweny mobedo munyo oneki Sitefano. Jomegi jokidho kir yu Fonisya kodi Sipuro kodi Antyok munyo jotito mikwenda ri Joyudaya kende.
Aka jomoyeyo megi, ji ma jowok Sipuro kodi Sireno jokidho Antyok to jotito ri Joyunani mikwenda no bende, munyo jofuonjo jo Wach Maber kwoŋ Ruoth Yesu.
Chingi Ruoth onwaŋo ni gi jo, aka ji mathoth joyeyo to jowire bongi Ruoth.
Wach me otundo i kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Yerusalem to jooro Barunaba yu Antyok.
Munyo go otundo to neno ŋono pa Were moido ni kenyo, osangala to kwayo jojye ni jowobedi gi genirok kodi adyeri i waŋ Ruoth gi ridho madwoŋ;
ata Barunaba onwaŋo obedo dhano maber, mopoŋ gi Chuny Maleŋ kodi yeyo. Aka ji mathoth swa jomedere i kitipa ji pa Ruoth.
Gikenyo Barunaba okidho Tarso rango Saulo.
Munyo onwaŋo go, okelo go Antyok. I hongo ma romo oro gipi jaryo me joromo gi kitipa pa jomoyeyo, to jofuonjo ji madit swa. I Antyok me ama open lwoŋ'iye jofuonjirok ni Jokristo.
I kare no ama jotuchi wach Were megi jobin'iye Antyok wok Yerusalem.
Achiel kwoŋ jo, ma nyinge Agabo, ochungo malo gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ, to luwo kwoŋ kech madwoŋ ma bino bedo to swana piny gipi. (Kech no obino i adhum pa Klaudyo.)
Jofuonjirok joridho ni kis dhano kwoŋ jo ripo dhiro kony ri wadi jo ma Yudeya paka go nyalo.
Jotimo ameno, to jodhiro pesa ri jotel ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo munyo luwo gi i chingi Barunaba gi Saulo.
I hongo no Herode mobedo kere ochako lweny gi jomegi ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo.
Go owodho or to ineko Yakobo, omin Yohana, g'abor.
Munyo oneno ni gino osangala Joyudaya, go omedere oro ji mako Petro bende. (Gime otimere i ndir ma kalima ma Mugat ma Bu Thow.)
Munyo otyek mako ri go Petro, oketho go i od twech, to ketho go i chingi bwora aŋwen ma joserikale aŋwen aŋwen, kuro go. Herode oido oyiko wodho go kenyo wowinji banja pere ka kalima ma Kadho orumo.
Ameno Petro obedo i od twech; to ji ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo onwaŋo jokwayo Were ri go gi geregere madit.
Wor no won ma Herode onwaŋo kidho wodh'iye go ri ji, Petro onwaŋo nindo i dyer jokur aryo kareno otwey go g'atege aryo, aka jokur megi oido jonitye kir dho waŋkach ma od twech.
Piyo piyo malaika pa Ruoth omenyere, to lero meny i od twech. Malaika no ogwelo buti Petro, oyengo go to chiewo go aka owacho ni, “Kwakere! Ayi malo!” Gikenyo won to atege ma chinge budhere woko.
To malaika wacho ri go ni, “Rukere irwaki war perin.” Petro otimo ameno, to malaika wacho ni, “Ere ruki kabut perin iluwan.”
Petro oluwo go to jowok i od twech to go koŋeyo kada ni gima malaika no onwaŋo timo obedo adyeri; oparo nike kono manago menyirok moro ama go onyo neno.
Jokalo jokur marapena gi mararyo, to jotundo i waŋkach ma nyweny ma royo ma kidho yu tindi. Waŋkach no won oyawere kende ri jo, to jowok woko i royo. Piyo piyo to malaika no weyo Petro kenyo kende.

Gikenyo Petro nyaka oniaŋ kwoŋ gima owok timirok ri go, to wacho ni, “Nyaka onyo aŋeyo ni gime obedo adyeri! Ruoth ooro malaika pere wobothan kwoŋ men pa Herode kodi kwoŋ gikipiny jye ma Joyudaya oido jochano timo ran.”
Munyo otyeko niaŋ ameno, okidho pecho pa Marya min Yohana ma nyinge man Marko. Ji mathoth onwaŋo jochokere kenyo jokwayo.
Petro ogudo thigo ma woko to jatich ma nyako milwoŋo ni Roda bino.
To munyo go oniaŋ ni obedo dwondi Petro, ogik i ot gi ŋwech ma koyawo thigo ru kisangala madit, to wacho ri jo paka Petro ochungo woko i waŋkach.
Jowacho ri go ni, “Neko omakin!” Aka munyo go omedo wacho nike obedo adyeri, jodwoko ni, “Kono meno malaika pere ayin.”
I hongo no Petro omedo gudo thigo. Rumachien joyawo thigo aka munyo joneno go jodhyer swa.
Go onyutho jo gi chinge ni jowoliŋi, aka otito ri jo paka Ruoth owodho go i od twech. Owacho ni, “Wachi win ri Yakobo kodi jomoyeyo jye.” Gikenyo oweyo jo to kadho kaman.
Yawere mere odikini, ruwirok madwoŋ obedo i dyer jokur ma od twech ri gima otimo Petro.
Munyo Herode owodho or ma rango go, to jokonyalo nwaŋo go, oyenyo ni wopenji jokur to wodho or ni woneki jo. Rumachien Herode oay wok i Yudeya to kidho wochowi hongo moro yu Kaisareya.

Herode onwaŋo yado ni gi dhaw moro kodi ji ma Tire kodi Sidon; ameno jokidho bonge i muma neno go. Jono kutho jotelo mako mere gi Blasto, jal moido kuro chiel pa kere. Gikenyo nyaka jokidho bongi Herode to jokwayo go syem, rupiri piny pajo onwaŋo limo chiemo ma wok i piny pa kere no.
I ndelo moyik, Herode orwako ruk pere madhum, to bedo wi kom pere madhum, to chako luwo gi jo.
Gikenyo ji jokoko ni, “Me ki dwondi dhano ama luwo, to were moro ayin!”
Piyo piyo malaika pa Ruoth ogoyo Herode matek, rupiri go komiyo Were dwoŋ. Aka kudin ochamo go to tho.
To wach pa Were omedo nyay gi dongo.
Munyo Barunaba gi Saulo jochowo timo tich pajo, jogik yu Yerusalem kodi Yohana gi Marko.
I kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Antyok, oido nitye jotuchi wach Were mogo kodi jofuonji: Barunaba, Simeyo (milwoŋo ni Ma chol), Lusyo (ma wok Sireno), Manaen (modongo pa gavana Herode), kodi Saulo.
Ndelo moro munyo jolamo Ruoth aka joriyo kech, Chuny Maleŋ owacho ri jo ni, “Kethi ran win gichien Barunaba kodi Saulo, jowotimi tich ma alwoŋ'iye jo.”
Munyo jotyeko riyo kech kodi kwayo, joketho chingi gin kwoŋ jo to jodhiro jo kadho tich.
Munyo Chuny Maleŋ otyeko oro Barunaba gi Saulo, jokidho yu Selusya aka jochiewere wok kenyo to jokidho i kigoda ma Sipuro.
Munyo jotundo Salamis, jofuonjo wach pa Were I kalamo pa Joyudaya. Yohana Marko oido konyo jo i tich.
Jojye jochiewere yu loka i kigoda ma Pafo, kama jorom'iye gi jathyeth moro ma nyinge Bar Yesu, Jayudaya mobedo jatuchi wach matwodo.
Go oido tiyo ri gavana ma kigoda no, Serigio Paulo, monwaŋo obedo ŋataryek swa. Gavana no olwoŋo Barunaba kodi Saulo bonge rupiri oido mito winjo Wach pa Were.
To Elima jathyeth (meno a dwoŋ nyinge) opyemo gi jo ka temo ywayo woko gavana i yeyo.
Gikenyo Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋ Saulo, ma bende oŋeyere ni Paulo, to ŋiyo waŋ jathyeth no tirtir
to wacho ni, “In wuodi pa jwogi, m'ibedo jakwor gi gimoro jye motire, aka imore kodi thenethene marecho ma twodo, kere ikileweyo wiro adyeri pa Ruoth i twodo?

Chingi Ruoth eno bino podho kwoŋin pama; waŋin bino tho, aka ikonen lero pa waŋchieŋ chowo hongo moro.” Piyo piyo no Elima owinjo munyo tor machol umo waŋe, to chako woth ariwa ariwa munyo temo nwaŋo dhano m'omaki chinge to telo go royo.
Gavana oyeyo munyo oneno gimotimere no; aka odhyer swa kwoŋ fuonji pa Ruoth.
Gikenyo Paulo kodi wadi jochiewere wok Pafo to jokidho yu Paga i adech ma Panfilya kama Yohana Marko owey'iye jo to gik yu Yerusalem.
Jomedere gi woth wok Paga to jokidho Antyok ma Pisidya; aka i ndelo ma Sabato jodonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya to jobedo piny.

Munyo kisoma mowok i Chik pa Musa kodi i ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were orumo, jotel ma kalamo pa Joyudaya jodhiro ri jo mikwenda ni, “Wutimin wan, luwi win ye gi ji ka winitye gi wach ma medo gine jo men.”
Paulo ochungo, to miyo jo ranyuth gi chinge to chako luwo ni, “Joisrael jowotan, kodi Jopath jye ma jolamo Were, winji win!
Were pa ji ma Israel oyero kwarere mawan, to miyo nono pajo bedo madwoŋ i ndir ma jobed'iye i piny Misir. Were owodho jo wok Misir gi men pere moasere,
aka i hongo ma oro pyero aŋwen ofamba gi jo i dyer thim.
Go oreyo woko nonin abiryo i piny ma Kanan to loko ji pere wegi piny no chowo
hongo ma oro chiegin miya aŋwen gi pyero abich. Rumachien omiyo jo jothumi banjin, chuka tundo ndir pa Samwir jatuchi wach Were.
Aka munyo jokwayo kere, Were omiyo jo Saulo, wuodi pa Kis, janono pa Benjamin, bedo kere pajo ma oro pyero aŋwen.
Munyo Were otyeko kwanyo go woko, oloko Daudi kere pajo. Me a gima Were oluwo kwoŋe: ‘Anwaŋo ni Daudi wuodi pa Yese, obedo kiti dhano ma amito, ŋata bino timo gimoro jye ma ayenyo ni wotimi.’
Yesu, achiel kwoŋ nyikway Daudi, a ŋata Were oloko Jaboth pa ji ma Israel paka chango ochiko.
Ma fuodi Yesu kobino, Yohana ofuonjo ji jye ma Israel nike jowoŋuti gimarecho pajo womiy jo batisimo.
Aka munyo Yohana oido chiegin chowo tich pere, openjo ji ni, ‘Wiparo nike an a ŋa? Akibedo ŋata wikuro. To neni win, go luwan chien, aka akiripi kada lunyo war ma tyende.’
“Wutimera, nyikway Ibrayimu, kodi Jopath jye ma ka ma jolamo Were: fuonji ma mako kwoŋ both me otyek dhiro ri wan!

Kole ji ma Yerusalem kodi jotel pajo jokoŋeyo nike go a Jaboth, aka jokoniaŋ kada wach pa jotuchi wach Were misoma i kis Sabato. Kada ameno wach pa jotuchi wach Were otundo i kare munyo jothumo ri Yesu banja ma tho.
Aka kada jokonwaŋo atoŋa ma thumo ri go banja ma tho, jye fuodi jokwayo Pilato nike woneki go.
Aka munyo jotyeko timo gimoro jye ma Ndiiko Maleŋ luwo kwoŋe, jogamo go kwoŋ musalaba to joketho go i kalyel.
To Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho,
aka i ndelo madit onyuthere ri joma yado jowotho gine woki i Galileya tundo Yerusalem. Jono ama onyo pama jobedo jokony i wach pere i waŋ ji ma Israel.
Aka onyo bende wakelo ri win Wach Maber no.
Gima Were ochiko kwarere mawan nike d'otimo, pama go otyeko timo ri wan ma wabedo nyikway jo, munyo ochierino Yesu paka ondik i Zabul mararyo ni, ‘In Wuodan, konon alokere Benin.’
Aka me a gima Were owacho kwoŋ chierino pere kwoŋ jomotho ma odoko kogiki i topo: ‘Abino miyin silwany maleŋ ma bu kiganagana ma chango achiko Daudi.’
Aka adyeri go owacho kaman ni, ‘Ikoyey jatich perin wotopi.’
Kole Daudi oketho atoŋa pa Were i tim i ndir pere; rumachien go otho to iyiko chiegin gi kwarere pere, aka otho to top woko.
To ŋata Were ochierino kwoŋ jomotho konyalo top woko.
Ri ameno wutimere, wijojye wiripo ŋeyo adyeri nike fuonji kwoŋ chwako gimarecho ma ifuonjo win wok bongi Yesu;
Aka nyatoro jye ma yeyo i go igonyo go woko kwoŋ gimarach ma Chik pa Musa onwaŋo kinyal gonyo win kwoŋe.
Amomiyo gwokere win, ŋey gima jotuchi wach Were jowacho wokiri wotimere ri win ni:
‘Neni win, wijochay! Dhyeri win witho; rupiri aletimo tich mogo i ndir mewin won, to wikoyey tich no kada moro otem tito ri win!’ ”
Munyo Paulo kodi Barunaba oido jokidho wok i kalamo pa Joyudaya, okway jo ni jowogiki kendo i Sabato ma luwo aka jowomedi wacho ri jo kwoŋ gikipiny me.
Munyo ji jotyeko eye i romo, Joyudaya mathoth kodi Jopath ma jowire i din pa Joyudaya joluwo Paulo gi Barunaba. Jomoor joluwo gi jo aka jomedo jo miseni nike jowomedere i ŋono pa Were.
I Sabato ma luwo, chiegin kis dhano obino wok i tindi winjo wach pa Were.
Munyo Joyudaya joneno kweth ji, nyieko omako jo; jopyemo gi gima Paulo oido wacho aka joyeto kir go.

To Paulo kodi Barunaba jomedo luwo pajo gi miseni ni, “Oido yenyere ni wach pa Were wopen tito ri win ayino. To paka wikijol, aka wikiter i kwo mewin paka joma ripere limo kwo makirum, waleweyo win to wakidho bongi Jopath.
Kole meno a or ma Ruoth omiyo wan munyo owacho ni, ‘Aketho win paka lero pa Jopath, ni winyali kelo both ri piny gipi.’ ”
Munyo Jopath jowinjo gime josangala aka jopako fuonji pa Ruoth. Aka joma oido oyer ri kwo makirum jolokere jomoyeyo.
Wach pa Were onyay iye jye i adech no.
To Joyudaya josigila jotel pa ji i tindi kodi mon pa Jopath ma kitipa ma malo ma onwaŋo jolamo Were. Gikenyo jochako lweny gi Paulo kodi Barunaba to joryemo jo woko i adech no.
Jomoor joteŋo lowo ma par tyendi gin munyo jokwoŋo jo to jokadho yu Ikoniam.
Jofuonjirok ma Antyok jopoŋ gi kisangala i chuny jo kanyachiel gi Chuny Maleŋ.
Gima pameno bende otimere Ikoniam: Paulo kodi Barunaba jodonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya to joluwo wach momiyo Joyudaya kodi Joyunani mathoth joyeyo.
To Joyudaya ma jokonyalo yeyo josigila Jopath to joruwo paro pajo jowoeye kwoŋ jomoyeyo no.
Jomoor jobedo kenyo hongo malach. Joluwo gi miseni kwoŋ Ruoth, moridho ni fuonji pajo kwoŋ ŋono pere oido obedo adyeri munyo miyo jo men ma timo ranyuth kodi gidhyer.
To kitipa pa ji i tindi otyakere: jomegi jodok yu thenge pa Joyudaya, joman yu thenge pa jomoor.
Gikenyo Jopath kodi Joyudaya, kanyachiel gi jodhum pajo, joyiko lweny kodi jomoor gi goyo jo gi telin.
Munyo jomoor jolimo ŋeyo i wach no, joringo yu Listura kodi Derube, tindin ma Likonia, kodi i adech mothoko jo.
Kenyo ama jofuonjiye Wach Maber no.
Onwaŋo nitye nyatoro i Listura ma tyende jye oŋol; go oido oŋol wok i nywolirok pere aka konyalo woth.
Go onwaŋo obedo piny ochiko ithe winjo wach pa Paulo. Gikenyo Paulo oneno go tirtir aka munyo oneno nike ŋato ni gi yeyo aka nyalo limo both,
owacho ri go gi dwonde madwoŋ ni, “Ayi malo i chungi m'itire!” Ŋato oay malo arwat to chako thokirok gi woth.
Munyo muma ji oneno gima Paulo otimo, jochako koko i dhudhok Likonia pajo ni, “Werin jolokere ji aka joloro bongi wan!”
Jomiyo Barunaba nyinge ni Zeus, aka Paulo ni Hemes, rupiri go ama oluwo.

Gikenyo jachowirok i migam pa were Zeus, ma migam pere oido nitye dho tindi, okelo thwondhe mogo kodi thiwi ajwoka i waŋkach munyo go kanyachiel kodi ji ma tindi no onwaŋo jomito timo chowirok ri jomoor.
Munyo Paulo gi Barunaba jowinjo gima onwaŋo jokidho timo, joyecho nengin pajo to joringo i dyer muma ji munyo jokoko ni,

“Jume, raŋo ma witimo gime? Wabende wabedo ji paka win! Wanitye ka i atoŋa ma tito ri win Wach Maber, kwanyo win woko kwoŋ gikipiny me mongoye kony bongi Were Makwo, mochweyo polo gi piny, nam kodi gikipiny jye mani iye.
I ndir mokadho go oweyo nonin jye luwo yo pajo wegi;

to kada ameno go kodoŋ nono mongoye gima nyutho ni go nitye, rupiri go onyuthere ndir jye i gikipiny mabeyo ma go timo: go miyo win koth wok i polo kodi chiemo mipidho i hongo motire; go miyo win chiemo aka poŋo kisangala i chuny win.”
To kada joluwo kweth wach me, jye jomoor jokonyalo i yoto juko jono chowirok ri jo.
Joyudaya mogo jowok yu Antyok ma Pisidya kodi Yu Ikoniam; aka munyo jochowo ywayo ji yu thenge pajo, jogoyo Paulo gi telin, joywayo go, to jowodho go woko ma tindi munyo joparo nike go otyeko tho.
To munyo jomoyeyo jochokere jothoko go, oay malo to gik i tindi. Yawere mere go kodi Barunaba jokadho yu Derube.
Paulo kodi Barunaba jofuonjo Wach Maber i Derube to jolimo jofuonjirok mathoth. Gikenyo jogik Listura, kodi Ikoniam, kodi Antyok ma Pisidya.
Jomedo jomoyeyo meni to jomedo jo miseni nike jowochwire i yeyo. Jofuonjo ni, “Waripo donjo i Ker pa Were munyo waluwo i teko madit.”
Munyo jotyeko ketho jotel i kis kitipa pa jomayeyo gi kwayo kodi riyo kech, joketho jo i chingi Ruoth ma oido joketho geno pajo kwoŋe.
Munyo jochowo woth i adech ma Pisidya, jokidho yu Panfilya.
Jofuonjo i Paga to joloro Atalya.
Aka wok kenyo jochiewere to jogik Antyok, kama ndir cha oketh'iye jo gichien ri Were i kur ma ŋono pere kwoŋ tich ma oido jochowo me.
Munyo jotundo Antyok, jochoko ji ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo kanyachiel to jowacho ri jo gimoro jye ma Were otimo gi jo; kendo paka onyo oyawo royo ri Jopath ma yeyo.
Jotyeko kenyo hongo malach gi jomoyeyo.
Nitye jomogo ma jowok Yudeya to jobino Antyok to jochako fuonjo jomoyeyo ni, “Wikinyal limo both kwanyo woko ka withumere paka Chik pa Musa wacho.”
Paulo kodi Barunaba jobedo gi pyem mager tektek gi jo kwoŋ gime; gikenyo oridhi ni Paulo kodi Barunaba kodi joman ma Antyok jowokidhi Yerusalem jowoneni jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin kwoŋ wach me.
Paka kitipa pa jomoyeyo ooro jo, joluwo yu Fonisya kodi Samarya to jowacho ri jo paka Jopath bende jowire bongi Were; wach me okelo kisangala madwoŋ ri jomoyeyo jye.
Munyo jotundo Yerusalem, kitipa pa jomoyeyo kodi jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin jye jojolo jo maber, to jowacho ri jo gimoro jye ma Were otimo ri jo.
To jomoyeyo megi moido jonitye i kweth pa Jofarisayo jochungo to jowacho ni, “Mitere wothum Jopath aka wowachi ri jo mako Chik pa Musa.”
Gikenyo jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin, joromo kanyachiel paro kwoŋ wach me.
Rumachien munyo pyem okadho kamabor, Petro ochungo to wacho ni, “Wutimera, wiŋeyo nike yu chien koro Were oyeran i dyer win fuonjo Jopath Wach Maber, nike jowonyali winjo jowoyeyi.
Aka Were, moŋeyo chuny ji, onyutho paka ojolo Jopath munyo bende omiyo jo Chuny Maleŋ, paka otimo gi wan.
Go kopoko wan gi jo; aka ochwako gimarecho pajo chungo kwoŋ yeyo pajo.
Amomiyo, raŋo ma wimito temo Were mawan munyo wiyimo ri jomoyeyo okol i goki jo ma kada kwarere wan kosa wawegi wakinyal tiŋo?
Be! Kole wayeyo ni wabino limo both kwoŋ ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu, paka jo bende.”
Gikenyo jomochokere jye joliŋ to jowinjo Barunaba kodi Paulo munyo jonuŋanuŋa ri ji giraura jye kodi gikipiny ma kelo dhyer ma Were otimo i dyer Jopath.
Munyo jochowo luwo, Yakobo oluwo malo ni, “Winjan win, wutimera!
Simon owok tito ri wan paka Were okutho onyutho paka dewo kwoŋ Jopath munyo kwanyo i dyer jo ji ma jowobedi apere won.
Kole wach pa jotuchi wach Were makere swa gi me. Paka ndiiko wacho ni,
‘Rumachien abino dwoko, apaka Ruoth wacho, aka abino gero kendo ot pa Daudi mopodho. Abino gero kamonyiekere jye kendo.
Aka ŋey ji man jye jobino rango Ruoth, jo kodi ji ma nonin jye milwoŋo gi nyingan.
Ruoth, momiyo gime oŋeyere wok chon ama owacho ameno.’
“Amomiyo aparo ni wakiripi chando Jopath ma jowire bongi Were;
kuchiel waripo ndiko balwa ma chiero jo lamo chal ma kichar kosa timo kidakana kosa chamo gimodey kosa remo moro jye kosa chiemo moro jye ma kolony ayin.
Kole Chik pa Musa otyek kisoma hongo malach i kalamo pa Joyudaya momore i Sabato jye, aka wach pere ifuonjo i tindi jye.”

Gikenyo jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin pa jomoyeyo, kanyachiel gi kitipa pa jomoyeyo gipi joridho yero ji mogo i kitipa gi dhiro jo Antyok kodi Paulo gi Barunaba. Joyero Yuda milwoŋo ni Barsaba kodi Sila, ji aryo ma jomoyeyo jomiyo dwoŋ swa.
Jodhiro jono gi balwa me: “Wan jomoyeyo jowot win, ma joman jomoor aka joman jotel ma kitipin pa jomoyeyo, wadhiro moth ri jomoyeyo ma Jopath ma Antyok kodi Sirya kodi Silisya.
Watyeko winjo paka ji megi i kitipa mawan jobino koro to jokwinyo win gi luwo pajo mato wakifuonjo jo ni jowotimi ameno.
Amomiyo watyeko romo kanyachiel aka wajojye wayeyere yero jomikwenda mogo to wadhiro jo ri win. Jobino kanyachiel gi merin mawan Barunaba gi Paulo,
chwo ma jojala kwo pajo i tich ri Ruoth Yesu Kristo.
Amomiyo wadhiro ri win Yuda kodi Sila, ma wegi jobino wacho ri win gikipiny ma wandiko ri win.
Ato oneno ri Chuny Maleŋ kodi wan ni ber wakiri waturi win gi byeto kwanyo woko or me kende:
Wikiri wichami gima ochow gine jwogi; wikiri wichami remo; wikiri wichami lee modey; aka kure win kwoŋ kite ma kidakana. Wibino timo maber ka wikure kwoŋ gikipiny me. Kutho win.”
Jooro jomikwenda no to jokidho Antyok, kama jochok'iye kitipa pa jomoyeyo jye to jomiyo jo balwa no.
Munyo ji josoma balwa no, kisangala opoŋ i chuny jo ru mikwenda madwoko men.
Yuda kodi Sila, monwaŋo bende jotuchi wach Were, joluwo ma hongo malach kodi jomoyeyo no munyo jomedo jo men kendo jodwoko chuny jo.
Munyo jochowo hongo moro kenyo, jomoyeyo josewila jo gi syem, to jogik bongi jomoor.
[To Sila oridho paro ma doŋ kenyo.]
Paulo kodi Barunaba jochowo hongo moro i Antyok kanyachiel gi joman mathoth munyo jofuonjo wach pa Ruoth.
Rumachien Paulo owacho ri Barunaba ni, “Weyi wagiki walyewi wutimegi wan i tindi jye ma watyeko fuonj'iye Wach pa Were, aka wanen paka jonitye.”
Barunaba onwaŋo yenyo ni jowokadhi gi Yohana Marko bende,
to Paulo oparo ni jokiripi kadho gine, rupiri ndir cha go kobedo gi jo kir i giki tich pajo, to owire to weyo jo i Panfilya.
Jobedo gi pyem matek wegi kendigin, to jopokere. Gikenyo Barunaba okwanyo Marko to jochiewere jochomo yu Sipuro,
to Paulo oyero Sila to jokadho kareno jomoyeyo joketho go i kur ma ŋono pa Were.
Go oluwo yu Sirya kodi Sisilya, munyo jomedo kitipa pa jomoyeyo men.
Paulo ochomo yu Derube gi Listura. Jafuonjirok moro ma nyinge Timotheyo oido ni kenyo; go oido obedo wuodi pa dhakodwoŋ moro ma Jayudaya moyeyo, to bamere oido obedo Jayunani.
Jomoyeyo jye ma Listura kodi Ikoniam onwaŋo joluwo maber kwoŋ Timotheyo.
Paulo oyenyo kidho gi Timotheyo, ameno to kutho thumo go. Go otimo ameno rupiri Joyudaya makenyo jye oido joŋeyo ni baa Timotheyo obedo Jayunani.
Munyo jowotho i tindi momore, jomiyo jomoyeyo ma kamoro jye chik ma jomoor kodi jotel ma kitipin pa jomoyeyo ma Yerusalem joridho, aka jowacho ri jo mako chik me.
Ameno kitipa pa jomoyeyo omedi meni i yeyo aka odongo i welo ji kis piny moyawere jye.
Jono jowotho i adech ma Furigiya kodi Galasya: Chuny Maleŋ koyeyo jo fuonjo mikwenda i adech ma Asya.
Munyo jotundo yu loka mothenere gi Misya, jotemo kidho i adech ma Bithiniya, to Chuny Maleŋ pa Yesu koyeyo jo.
Ri ameno jowotho i Misya to joloro yu Trowa.
Paulo olimo menyirok wor no ma go onen'iye dhano ma Masedonia munyo ochungo aka kwayo go ni, “Biye yu Masedonia korin ikonyi wan!”
Tekin Paulo limo menyirok no, wayikere kidho Masedonia, rupiri oido waridho ni Were otyeko lwoŋo wan fuonjo Wach Maber ri ji kenyo.
Waweyo Trowa gi yee to wachiewere wakidho yu Samotura, aka yawere mere watundo Neyapoli.
Wok kenyo wadonjo Filipya, tindi ma i adech ma Masedonia; kenyo bende obedo kama Joroma jodhumo. Wachowo ndelo mogo i tindi no.
I ndelo ma Sabato wawok i tindi to wakidho i thengi jwom, kama waparo nike kakwayo pa joyudaya ni iye. Wabedo piny to waluwo gi mon moido jochokere kenyo.

Ŋatachiel kwoŋ jo mowinjo wan oido ilwoŋo ni Lidya, ma Thyatira, monwaŋo jamiten ma nengin ma rangi ariŋo. Go oido obedo dhako ma lamo Were, aka Ruoth oyawo paro pere ma winjo wach ma Paulo oido wacho.
Go kodi ji ma ot pere jolimo batisimo. Gikenyo go olwoŋo wan ni, “Biye win wibedi i ot paran, ka winiaŋ adyeri ni ayeyo Ruoth.” Aka go onyalo dwoŋo wan to wakidho.

Ndelo moro munyo oido wakidho i kakwayo, waromo kodi ŋecha moro manyako monwaŋo nitye gi chuny mochido moro ma miyo go thyedho ri ji gima bino i kwo pajo ma yuwaŋe. Go oido kelo pesa kweth ri jopere munyo tucho ri ji silwany pajo.
Go oluwo Paulo gi wan munyo koko ni, “Jome jotich pa Were Madwoŋ Maloyo! Jotito ri win royo ma both!”
Go otimo ameno ndelo mathoth, nyuka Paulo nge omako swa to wire to wacho ri jwok no ni, “I nyingi Yesu Kristo aorin, woki kwoŋ nyako me!” Jwok no owok kwoŋe i hongo no won.
Munyo wegi nyako no joneno ni yo pajo ma limo pesa onyo onyiekere woko, jomako Paulo gi Sila to joywayo jo to jotero jo bongi jodhum i katale.
Jokelo jo bongi joserikale ma Joroma to jowacho ni, “Jome joyudaya, aka jokelo ruwirok i tindi mawan ka.
Jofuonjo kite ma turo chik mawan; wan Wajoroma aka wakinyal mako kite no!”
Muma ji bende odonjo i kwinyo no, aka jothumi banjin joyecho nengin pa Paulo kodi Sila, to jowodho or ni wochwadi jo.
Munyo otyek chwado jo maloŋo, obol jo i twech, aka oor jakur chiego od twech matek.
Munyo jotyeko limo or me, jakuri od twech obolo jo i kisika ma iye to tweyo tyendi jo i kindi kasike madongo.
Dho kapa sawa auchiel ma wor, Paulo kodi Sila oido jokwayo aka jowero wer ma pako Were, aka jotwech oido jochiko ithi gin jowinjo jo.
Piyo piyo yengirok pa piny otimere, moyengo od twech kir i tyende. Gikenyo thigin jye joyawere arwat, to atege pa jotwech jye gonyere woko.
Jakuri jotwech ochiew, aka munyo oneno thigin ma od twech ni thwolo, oparo nike jomotwey jye onyo jokwale; gikenyo oyuyo abor pere aka oido won kidho nekirok.
To Paulo okoko gi derino ni, “Ikiri itim racho kwoŋin, wajojye fuodi wanitye ka.”
Jakur okwayo mach, omwomere i ot, to gore piny gi kirin dho katyendi Paulo gi Sila.
Gikenyo otero jo woko to penjo jo ni, “Jodongo, aripo timo aŋo ŋey alim both?”
Jowacho ni, “Yeyi Yesu Kristo, aka ibino limo both, in kodi ot perin gipi.”
Aka jofuonjo go wach pa Ruoth kodi joman jye ma ot pere.
I hongo ma wor no won, jakuri od twech otero jo lwoko adholin pajo; aka go kodi joot pere jye jolimo batisimo mayot.
Go otero Paulo kodi Sila i ot pere to miyo jo chiemo moro achama. Go kodi joot pere jye kisangala opoŋ i chuny jo ru yeyo Were.
Yawere mere odikini, jodhum ma Joroma jodhiro or ri joserikale ni, “Gonyi win jono jowokadhi.”
Gikenyo jakuri od twech owacho ri Paulo ni, “Jothumi banjin jodhiro or ni wogony win. Onyo winyalo kadho, kadhi win gi syem.”

To Paulo owacho ri joserikale ni, “Kole konwaŋ racho moro kwoŋ wan, aka otyek chwado wan i dyer ji mato wabedo Joroma! Odoko jobolo wan i twech; aka onyo pama jomito gonyo wan nyaliŋliŋ? Bee! Weyi wegi jowobin jowogony wan.”
Joserikale madongo jodhiro wach no ri jodhum ma Joroma; aka munyo jowinjo ni Paulo kodi Sila jobedo Joroma, lworo omako jo.
Ri ameno jokidho to jokwayo chwak bongi jo; gikenyo jowodho jo woko to jokwayo jo ni jowoeye i tindi.
Paulo gi Sila joweyo od twech to jokidho pecho pa Lidya. Kenyo jorom'iye kodi jomoyeyo, joluwo wach mamedo jo men, to jokadho.
Joluwo yu Anfipoli kodi Apolonia, to jobino Thesalonika, kama onwaŋo kalamo pa Joyudaya nitye iye.
Paka Paulo yado oido omaro timo, okidho i kalamo pa Joyudaya. Aka opyemo gi ji gi wach ma Ndiiko Maleŋ chowo hongo ma Sabato adek gipi,
munyo tito aka nyutho i wach ni Kristo oido ripo chandere aka ŋey wochierino go kwoŋ jomotho. Paulo owacho ni, “Yesu me obedo Kristo.”
Jomegi kwoŋ jo joniaŋ to joriwere gi Paulo kodi Sila; kitipa pa Joyunani mathoth ma jolamo Were, kodi mon mathoth ma joŋeyere bende jotimo ameno.

To Joyudaya nyieko omako jo to jochoko jomarecho mogo i ngudin mokakere ma tindi to jotimo bwora moro. Gikenyo jokelo woy madwoŋ i tindi gipi, to jomwonjo pecho pa Yason, munyo jorango Paulo kodi Sila wowodhi jo ri ji.
To munyo jokonwaŋo jo, joyware gi Yason kodi jomoyeyo mogo kir bongi judhum ma tindi kareno jokoko ni, “Jome jokelo ruwirok kis kamoro! Aka onyo bende jobino i tindi mawan ka, aka
Yason ama kano jo i ot pere. Jojye joturo chik pa Kaisar, ka jowacho ni odoko nitye kere man, ma nyinge Yesu.”
Gi wach me jokelo ri lwak ji kodi jodhum ma tindi woy madwoŋ.
Jodhum jomiyo Yason kodi joman tweyo pesa momit to iweyo jokadho.
Tekin piny lokere machol, jomoyeyo jodhiro Paulo gi Sila yu Bereya. Munyo jotundo koro, jokidho i kalamo pa Joyudaya.
Joyudaya ma kenyo oido joneno bor loyo ma Thesalonika. Jochiko ithi gin winjo fuonji gi maro madwoŋ, aka ndelo jye bin jofuonjere Ndiiko Maleŋ jowoneni ka gima Paulo ofuonjo jo oido obedo adyeri.
Mathoth kwoŋ jo joyeyo, aka mon kweth ma malo kodi chwo ma Joyunani bende joyeyo.
To munyo Joyudaya ma Thesalonika jowinjo ni Paulo fuonjo wach pa Were i Bereya bende, jobino kenyo to jochako nywowo j.
Piyo piyo jomoyeyo jodhiro Paulo i thengi jwom to Sila kodi Timotheyo jodoŋ Bereya.
Joma jokwaŋo Paulo jotero go kir yu Athen aka ŋey jogik Bereya gi wach pa Paulo ni Sila kodi Timotheyo jowokidhi bonge mayot.
Munyo Paulo oido kuro Sila kodi Timotheyo i Athen, chunye oramo swa munyo oneno ni tindi opoŋ gi gikipiny ma ji jochweyo ma jolamo.
Ri ameno go opyemo i kalamo pa Joyudaya kodi Joyudaya gi Jopath ma jolamo Were, kodi ji ma jobino ndelo jye i katale madwoŋ.

Joepikuryan kodi Jostoik mogo ma jopyem i wach bende jopyemo gine. Megi jowacho ni, “Jal mamiŋ me onyo bende kwot ni wacho aŋo?” Joman jowacho ni, “Chale pa go luwo kwoŋ werin mogo mawok loka man.” Jowacho ama rupiri Paulo onwaŋo luwo kwoŋ Yesu kodi chierino pere.
Ameno jokwanyo Paulo to jotero go i ot romo milwoŋo ni Arewopago, to jowacho ni, “Wamito ŋeyo fuonji manyien me ma iluwo kwoŋe.
Gikipiny me ma wawinjo iluwo kwoŋe wendo ri wan swa, aka wamito ŋeyo dwoŋ mere.”
(Ato ji ma Athen kodi jowiloka ma kenyo oido jomaro oro hongo pajo jye i luwo gi winjo gikipiny manyien motimere.)
Paulo ochungo i waŋ jomochokere i Arewopago no to wacho ni, “Ji ma Athen! Aneno ni i yo jye wimaro din tektek,
rupiri munyo awotho i tindi mewin t'aneno kama wilamer'iye taneno alitar mondik kwoŋe ni, ‘Ri Were ma koŋeyere.’ Onyo gima wilamo, kada wikuya no, ama ee atito ri win kwoŋe.
Were mochweyo piny kodi gima ni iye gi bee, obedo Ruoth ma polo kodi piny, aka kibedi i udi ma ji ama jogero.
Odoko go kiyeny kony moro bongi dhano igani go keŋ gimoro ma dhano ama nyalo miyo go, rupiri go won ama miyo ji jye kwo, luya kodi gimoro jye.
Wok kwoŋ dhano achiel go ochweyo nonin jye, to miyo jo bedo i piny gipi. Go won ama chango ochano ndir kodi kew ma kabedo ma ji di jobed'iye.
Otimo ameno ni jowonyali rango go, ni ipoyo di jonwaŋo go munyo jomudamuda jorango go. To iyadyeri won, Were kinitye bor gi nyatoro jye kwoŋ wan;
kole ‘I go wanwaŋo kwo aka wawotho kendo walama;’ paka jondiiko mewin mogo joluwo ni, ‘Adyeri wabedo nyithindho pere.’
Onyo paka wabedo nyithindho pa Were, wakiri wapar ni Were chale kodi zawabu, kosa feza, kosa tele ma dhano ama won othedho gi ryeko kodi ndijo pere.
I ndir ma fuodi ji oido jokuy'iye Were, go kokwano recho pajo, to pama go onyo oro ji jye i piny jye ŋuto gimarecho pajo,
rupiri go otyeko yiko ndelo ma go bino thum'iye banja ri piny gipi i tiro, aka ŋata go oyero ama bino thumo. Go otyeko ridho wach no ri dhano jye munyo chierino ŋato kwoŋ jomotho.”
Munyo jowinjo Paulo luwo kwoŋ chierino pa jomotho, megi kwoŋ jo jonyiero ayin, to joman jowacho ni, “Wamito iluwi kwoŋ gime kendo.”
Gikenyo Paulo oeye i kachokirok no.
Jomogo joluwo go to jolokere jomoyeyo; kwoŋ jo oido obedo Dyonisyo, achiel kwoŋ jokweth ma Arewopago, dhako milwoŋo ni Damari, kodi joman.
Rumachien, Paulo oeye Athen to kidho yu Korintho.

Kenyo go orom'iye kodi Jayudaya milwoŋo ni Akwila ma nywolere Ponto monwaŋo nyaka jowok Italya kodi chiege Prisila, rupiri Kaisar milwoŋo ni Klaudyo oido owodho chik ni Joyudaya jye jowoeye Roma. Paulo okidho neno jo
aka obedo gi jo to tiyo gi jo, rupiri bin go oido limo chiemo pere i timo wema, paka jono oido bende jotimo.
Go opyemo i kalamo pa Joyudaya i ndelo ma Sabato jye, munyo temo miyo Joyudaya kodi Joyunani jye niaŋ i gima go wacho.
Munyo Sila kodi Timotheyo jotundo kenyo wok Masedonia, Paulo ooro hongo pere jye ma fuonjo mikwenda, munyo tito ri Joyudaya ni Yesu obedo Kristo.
