Munyo jopyemo gine to joluwo wach marecho kwoŋ go, Paulo oteŋo woko fukefuke ma nengin pere ka wacho ri jo ni, “Ka wirwenyo, remo mewin wodoŋi i wiy wiwegi! Kobedo wach paran. Wok pama kadho yuwaŋe abino kidho bongi Jopath ayino.”
Gikenyo oweyo jo to kidho bedo i ot pa Japath milwoŋo ni Tito Yusto, monwaŋo lamo Were; ot pere oido chiegin gi kalamo pa Joyudaya no.
Krispo, jatel ma kalamo pa Joyudaya, oyeyo Ruoth, go kodi ot pere gipi; aka joman mathoth i Korintho jowinjo fuonji pere, joyeyo, to jolimo batisimo.
Wor achiel Paulo olimo lek, ma Ruoth owach'iye ri go ni, “Ikiri ibedi gi lworo, to medere gi luwo aka ikiri iliŋi,
rupiri ani kodin, aka ongoye ŋata bino nyalo timo rin racho, rupiri ani gi ji mathoth i tindi me.”
Ameno Paulo obedo kenyo oro achiel g'adech, munyo fuonjo ji wach pa Were.
Munyo Galyo olok gavana pa Joyunani ma i adech ma Akaya, Joyudaya jochokere kanyachiel, jomako Paulo, to jotero go i waŋ jothumi banjin i kapido.
Jowacho ni, “Jal me temo dwoŋo ji jowolami Were i yo ma turo chik!”
Paulo onwaŋo kidho luwo to Galyo wacho ri Joyudaya ni, “Bedi me obedo wach ma kotire kosa tim ma turo chik motim, d'adiyo chunyan to awinjo win Joyudaya,
to paka me obedo pyem kwoŋ wach kodi nyingi ji kodi chik mewin, wiwegi wiripo chowo teko no. Akibino ran bedo jathumi banja i gikipiny ma pameno!”
Ameno go oryemo jo woko i kapido.
Gikenyo jono jye jorodho Sostheno, jatel ma kalamo pa Joyudaya, to jogoyo go i nyim jopido. To meno jye Galyo kodewo kwoŋe kada ma thin.
Paulo obedo Korintho kodi jomoyeyo ndelo mathoth, to weyo jo to jochiewere gi Prisila kodi Akwila yu Sirya. I Kenkereya go olyelo wiye, rupiri obedo gi kwoŋirok ma nyadin pa Joyudaya.
Jotundo Efeso to Paulo weyo Prisila kodi Akwila kenyo. Go odonjo i kalamo pa Joyudaya to pyemo gi Joyudaya kenyo.
Kenyo jokwayo go ni wobedi gi jo hongo malach, to go koyeyo.
Kuchiel, owacho ri jo munyo kadho ni, “Ka obedi chan pa Were, abino dwoko bongi win.” Gikenyo ochiewere to eye Efeso.
Munyo go otundo Kaisareya, okidho to motho kitipa pa jomoyeyo, aka ŋey okadho yu Antyok.
Munyo go ochowo hongo mogo kenyo to kadho i adeche ma Galasya kodi Furigiya munyo medo jomoyeyo men.
Jayudaya moro ma nyinge Apolo, monywol Alekizandurya, obino Efeso. Go oido jaluwo maber swa aka oido oŋeyo Ndiiko Maleŋ bende maber.
Go oido otyek fuonjo go Yo pa Ruoth, aka gi chunye jye oluwo aka ofuonjo fuonji motire kwoŋ Yesu. To go oido oŋeyo batisimo pa Yohana won kende.
Go ochako luwo gi miseni i kalamo pa Joyudaya; to munyo Prisila kodi Akwila jowinjo go, jotero go pecho to jomedo tito ri go maber kwoŋ royo pa Were.

Munyo Apolo oridho paro ma kidho Akaya, jomoyeyo ma Efeso jomedo go men, to jondiko ri jomoyeyo ma yu korago ni jowojoli go kenyo. Munyo go otundo koro, obedo gi kony madwoŋ swa ri jono ma gi ŋono pa Were oido jolokere jomoyeyo.
Ato gi pyem pere matek oturo woko pyem pa Joyudaya i dyer ji kamaler munyo nyutho jo i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni Yesu obedo Kristo.
Munyo Apolo nitye Korintho, Paulo owotho i adech ma Yumalo to tundo Efeso. Kenyo go onwaŋ'iye jofuonjirok mogo
to penjo jo ni, “Wilimo Chuny Maleŋ munyo wiyeyo?” Jodwoko go ni, “Oido fuodi wakiwinjo kada ni Chuny Maleŋ bende nitye.”
Openjo jo bende ni, “K'inen ameno, wilimo batisimo mene?” Jodwoko ni, “Batisimo pa Yohana.”
Paulo owacho ni, “Batisimo ma Yohana omiyo ji obedo ma ŋuto gimarecho; to owacho ri ji ni joripo yeyo ŋata oido luwo go chien, aka meno a Yesu.”
Munyo jowinjo ameno, jolimo batisimo i nyingi Ruoth Yesu.
Paulo oketho chinge kwoŋ jo, to Chuny Maleŋ loro ri jo to joluwo dhudhok mopokere to jotucho mikwenda ma wok bongi Were.
Oido jojye jobedo ji apar g'aryo.
Paulo okidho i kalamo pa Joyudaya, to chowo hongo ma dwe adek munyo luwo kodi ji gi miseni, aka pyemo gi jo munyo temo niaŋo jo kwoŋ Ker pa Were.

To munyo jomegi kwoŋ jo jobedo gi wichtek to jokwero yeyo, aka joluwo gikipiny marecho kwoŋ Royo pa Ruoth ruwaŋ kitipa pa ji, Paulo oweyo jo to kadho gi jofuonjirok; aka ndelo jye jobedo gi pyem i ot romo ma Tirano.
Gime obedo ameno chowo hongo ma oro aryo, momiyo ji jye ma jobedo i adech ma Asya, Joyudaya kodi Joyunani, jowinjo Wach pa Ruoth.
Were onwaŋo timo gikipiny ma kelo dhyer gi i chingi Paulo,
ma kir kitambilin pere kodi nengin pere mawoko oido itero ri jotwo, aka two pajo ware woko aka chuny mochido wok kwoŋ ji.
Joyudaya mogo ma jothoko piny aka joryemo chuny mochido bende jotemo oro nyingi Yesu kwoŋ joma jo ni gi chuny mochido. Jowacho ri chuny marach moro ni, “Aorin i nyingi Yesu ma Paulo fuonjo.”
Wuoti jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma Jayudaya milwoŋo ni Sikeva jabiryo onwaŋo jotimo ameno.
To chuny mochido owacho ri jo ni, “Aŋeyo Yesu aka aŋeyo gimatho kwoŋ Paulo; to win, wijokune?”
Ŋata oido nitye gi chuny mochido no orodho jo to loyo jo gi men. Jojye jowok i ot pere gi ŋwech kinyoro g'adholin kwoŋ jo.
Joyudaya jye kodi Jopath ma jobedo Efeso jowinjo gime; lworo opoŋ kwoŋ jojye, aka omiy nyingi Yesu dwoŋ moasere.
Ji mathoth monwaŋo nyaka joyeyo bende jobino munyo jopusere recho aka jothango kamaler ajwoka moido jotimo.
Mathoth kwoŋ jomoido jothyedho jokelo kitawin pajo kanyachiel to jowaŋo ruwaŋ ji jye. Jokwano welo kitawin to jye bedo pesa ma romo jegejege feza gana piero abich.
Aka Wach pa Ruoth omedo nyay gi dongo i men tektek.
Munyo gikipiny me otyeko timire, Paulo oyiko paro ma luwo yu Masedonia gi Akaya aka wokidhi Yerusalem. Go owacho ni, “Ka atyeko kidho koro, aripo neno Roma bende.”
Gikenyo go ooro Timotheyo kodi Erasto, jokony pere aryo, yu Masedonia, to won chowo hongo moro i adech ma Asya.
Hongo no ama ruwirok madwoŋ obed'iye i Efeso ma mako kwoŋ Royo pa Ruoth.
Jatheth ma thedho feza moro milwoŋo ni Demeturyo, ma thedho chal ma udi mathindho gi feza ri were Artemi, oido konyo jomiten swa i nywolo ri jo ŋaŋo madit gi tich pere no.
Gikenyo go olwoŋo jojye kanyachiel, kodi joman ma tich pajo chale g'apere, to wacho ri jo ni, “Jume, kole wiŋeyo ni ŋaŋo mawan wok i tich me.
To wiwegi wityeko winjo gi neno gima jal milwoŋo ni Paulo me timo. Go otyeko wiro ji mathoth ka kodi i Efeso kodi chiegin i adech ma Asya gipi ka wacho ni werin mothedhi gi chingi jo kobedo were.

Aka ameno wach onyo rach rupiri tich mawan bino limo nyinge marach. Ki meno kende, racho bende nitye mogam pa were madhako Artemi bino ngoye kony, aka dwoŋ pere bino reyere woko mato were madhako me ilamo i Asya parom kodi i piny jye!”
Munyo jono jowinjo wach me, jolokere mager to jochako koko ni, “Artemi ma Efeso dwoŋ moasere!”
Woy no olak i tindi gipi. Jono jomwomere i ot minen'iye tuko to jomako Gayo kodi Aristaruko, Jomasedonia aryo monwaŋo jowotho gi Paulo.
Paulo won oido mito kidho luwo gi muma ji, to jomoyeyo jokoyeyo ri go.
Jodhum mogo moido merin pere, bende jodhiro ri go wach munyo jokwayo go ni wokiri wotemi kidho i ot minen'iye tuko no.
I hongo no i romo obedo woy kende kende; ji megi oido jokoko gimoro achiel, joman bende jokoko giman, aka jomegi jokoŋeyo kir gima okelo jo kanyachiel.
Joman joparo ni Alekizanda ama oero wach no, rupiri Joyudaya joketho go paka jatel. Gikenyo Alekizanda otimo ranyuth gi chinge to temo luwo ma yiko nyinge i dyer ji.
To munyo joniaŋ nike go Jayudaya, jojye jochako koko kiromo gimoro achiel chowo hongo ma sawa aryo gipi ni, “Artemi ma Efeso dwoŋ moasere!”

Rumachien jadwoŋ ma tindi onyalo miyo lwak ji kudirok munyo owacho ni, “Ji ma Efeso! Kole dhano jye oŋeyo ni tindi ma Efeso ama kuro migam pa were Artemi moasere no, kodi tele maleŋ mopodho wok i polo.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo kwero gime. Amomiyo, wiripo kudere ma kiweno timo gikipiny pa joneko.
Wikelo ji me ka kada onwaŋo jokikedhi ot pa were kosa jowachi gikipiny marecho kwoŋ were madhako.
Ka Demeturyo kodi jotich pere jonitye gi wach ma jokelo kwoŋ nyatoro, nitye ndelo mochan ma pido aka ruodhe bende jonitye; jonyalo kelo wach pajo to joosere wegi kenyo.
To ka nitye gimoro man ma wimito, ibino chowo wach no i romo paji paka chik wacho.
Aka giramen nyalo miyo iketho kwoŋ wan wach ma gwenyirok gi woy konon me. Kole ongoye gima di miyi win woy madwoŋ ama, aka di wakinyalo nyutho atoŋa mere.”
Munyo go otyeko wacho ameno, ochiego woko romo.
Munyo woy no orumo, Paulo olwoŋo jomoyeyo kanyachiel, aka munyo otyeko medo jo men to sewila jo. Gikenyo go oweyo jo to kidho yu Masedonia.
Munyo go otyeko woth i adech no gi medo jo men gi wach kweth, okidho Yunani
kama go obed'iye hongo ma dwe adek. Go oido yikere kidho Sirya to limo ŋeyo nike Joyudaya oido jochamo ri go sereko; gikenyo go oridho paro ma gik gi yu Masedonia.
Sopate, wuodi pa Piro ma Bereya, okidho gine; Aristaruko jokodi Sekundo ma Thesalonika, kodi Gayo ma Derube, kodi Timotheyo, kodi Tichiko gi Trofimo ma jowok Asya bende jowotho gine.
Jono jotelo aka jokuro wan i Trowa.
Wachiewere wok Filipya rumachien munyo kalima ma Mugat ma Bu Thow orumo, aka i ndelo marabich aka wariwere gi jo i Trowa, kama wabed'iye sabiti achiel.
I ndelo marapena (i sabiti) odikini, munyo wabedo kanyachiel chiemo gi merin, Paulo oluwo gi ji luwo mabor kir i dyer wor, rupiri go oido yenyo kadho yawere mere.
Talin oido omore i ot mamalo kama oido warom'iye.

Jayach moro ma nyinge Yutiko onwaŋo obedo wi dirisa; to paka Paulo omedere luwo, Yutiko nindo onuro chuka nindo okadho gine to podho piny wok wi gorofa ma malo maradek. Jotiŋo go malo to jonwaŋo ni otyeko tho.
To Paulo oloro piny to luŋere kwoŋe to ketho kore kwoŋe to wacho ni, “Wikiri wilwor, go fuodi kwo!”
Gikenyo go ogik i ot mamalo, oturo mugat, to chamo. Munyo Paulo otyeko luwo gi jo hongo malach nyuka chieŋ ogulo, to okadho.
Jono jokadho gi jayach no ma kwo, to chuny jo dwoko maber.
Wamedere gi woth tundo i yee to wachiewere wachomo yu Aso, kama onwaŋo wakidho rwak'iye Paulo i yee. Go owacho ri wan timo ameno, rupiri oido kidho kenyo atyendi.
Munyo go oromo gi wan i Aso, warwako go i yee to wakidho yu Mitilene.
Wachiewere wok kenyo to watundo yu Kiyo yawere mere. Rumachien ma ndelo achiel, watundo Samo, aka yawere mere aka watundo Mileto.
Paulo oido oyenyo chiewirok kalo Efeso, ŋey nyaka wokiri wonyieki hongo i adech ma Asya. Go onwaŋo kwakere ka mito tundo Yerusalem i ndelo ma Pentekost ka nyalere.
Paulo odhiro wach Efeso wok Mileto munyo kwayo jotel ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo bino romo gine.
Munyo jobino, go owacho ri jo ni, “Wiwegi Wiŋeyo kite ma abed'iye gi win i hongo jye, wok i ndelo marapena ma tund'iye i adech ma Asya.
Gi bwonirok kodi pigi waŋan, atimo tich paran paka jatich pa Ruoth, i ndir ma teko obed'iye ran ru sereko pa Joyudaya.
Wiŋeyo nike akimuŋo win gimoro ma d'okonyo win munyo afuonjo win i dyer ji kamaler kodi i pechin mewin.
Afuonjo Joyudaya kodi Jopath parom nike jowoŋuti gimarecho pajo jowogiki bongi Were, to joyeyo Ruoth Yesu Kristo.
Aka gunyoni, gi wach pa Chuny Maleŋ akidho Yerusalem, ma akuya gima bino timan koro.
Kwanyo woko gima aŋeyo ame: i tindi jye Chuny Maleŋ otyeko nyuthan kichutho nike twech kodi teko ama kuran.
To akiter kwo paran pa gimadwoŋ, kosa pa gima di welo tekin achowo tich ma Ruoth Yesu ooran ma tito ri ji Wach Maber kwoŋ ŋono pa Were.
“Atyeko woth i dyer win jojye, munyo afuonjo Ker pa Were, to pama aŋeyo ni kwoŋ win ongoye ŋata odoko bino nenan kendo.
Amomiyo konon atucho ri win kamaler ni ka moro kwoŋ win orweny meno kiwach paran,
rupiri akimuŋo win atoŋa pa Were gipi.
Kure win wiwegi kodi sidwol roombo jye, ma Chuny Maleŋ oketho i chingi win, ni wibedi jotel mere, ma konyo kitipa pa jomoyeyo pa Were, ma go oloko apere gi remo pa Wuode won.
Kole aŋeyo ni ka atyeko eye, arara mager bino donjo bongi win, aka jokowori sidwol roombo.
Aka ndir bino tundo ma jomogo i dyer win won jobino ay gi twodo ma ywayo jomoyeyo bongi jo.
Amomiyo kure win, aka poyi win ni, odyechieŋ gi wor akikeŋ fuonjo dhano jye kwoŋ win gi geregere chowo hongo ma romo oro adek.
“To pama onyo aketho win i chingi Were kodi i wach ma ŋono pere ma nyalo dongo win to miyo win silwany ma go okano ri ji pere jye.
Fuodi akiwanya feza kosa zawabu pa nyatoro kosa ruk.
Wiwegi wiŋeyo ni atiyo gi chingan me aka alimo gimoro jye ma an kodi jowotan onwaŋo wayenyo aora.
Atyeko nyutho win i gikipiny jye nike timo tich gi men miyo wanyalo konyo jomanyap munyo wapoyo wach pa Ruoth Yesu m'owacho ni, ‘Silwany nitye madwoŋ ri ŋata poko gimoro loyo ŋata limo.’ ”
Munyo Paulo ochowo luwo, ogoyo chonge piny to kwayo gi jojye
Gikenyo jojye joywak gi geregere munyo jopodho i kore aka jochwiyo lembe.
Jorem swa ru wach pere ni odoko jokoneni go kendo. Rumachien to jokwaŋo go dho yee.
Munyo watyeko kisewila jo to wachiewere waeye, wabino nyatirtir i loka Kos, to yawere mere watundo Rod, aka wok kenyo wadonjo Patara.
Munyo wanwaŋo kenyo yee moido kidho Fonisya, waidho to wachiewere.
Munyo watundo kama wanyalo neni'iye Sipuro, wachiewere yu racham to wachomo yu Sirya. Waloro Tire kama ye oido kidho wodh'iye gikipiny m'otiŋo.
Wanwaŋo jomoyeyo mogo kenyo to wabedo gi jo sabiti achiel. Gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ jowacho ri Paulo nike wokiri wokidhi Yerusalem.
To munyo hongo mawan orumo, waweyo jo to wakadho i woth mawan. Jojye gi mon pajo gi nyithindho, jokwaŋo wan kalo tindi. Wajojye wagoyo chongi wan piny dho thengi pi to wakwayo.
Gikenyo kis dhano osewila nyawote, to waidho yee kareno jo jodok.
Munyo watyeko chiewirok mawan wok Tire, watundo Potolemayi, kama wamoth'iye jomoyeyo to wabed'iye gi jo ma ndelo achiel.
Yawere mere waeye to wakidho Kaisareya. Kenyo wakidho i ot pa Filipo jatiti Wach Maber, to wabedo bonge.
Go oido nitye gi nyithindho ma nyir aŋwen ma fuodi jokonywomere moido jotucho mikwenda ma wok bongi Were.
Munyo watyeko bedo kenyo ndelo mogo, jatuchi wach ma nyinge Agabo otundo kenyo wok Yudeya.

Go obino bongi wan to kwanyo del pa Paulo to won tweyo gine tyende gi chinge, to wacho ni, “Me a gima Chuny Maleŋ wacho, ‘Joyudaya jobino tweyo won del me ama i Yerusalem to jobolo go i chingi Jopath.’ ”
Munyo wawinjo ameno wan kodi ji ma kenyo wakwayo Paulo ni wokiri wokidhi Yerusalem.
To go odwoko ni, “Witimo aŋo, wiywak aka wikelo ran rembo i chunyan? Kole ayikere ki nyaka ri twech kende to kir ri tho jye i Yerusalem i nyingi Ruoth Yesu.”
Wakinyalo turo go i gime amomiyo chuny wan bende oeye to wawacho ni, “Weyi mito pa Ruoth wotimere.”
Munyo watyeko bedoye kenyo hongo moro, wayikere to waay to wakadho Yerusalem.
Jofuonjirok megi ma Kaisareya bende jowotho gi wan, to jotero wan i ot pa jal monwaŋo wakidho bedo pere milwoŋo ni Minason mawok Sipuro, moido obedo achiel kwon jofuonjirok ma jopen yeyo.
Munyo watundo Yerusalem jomoyeyo jojolo wan gi kisangala madit swa.
Yawere mere Paulo okidho gi wan neno Yakobo; aka jotel jye ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo oido jonitye kenyo.
Paulo omotho jo to miyo jo wach jye kwoŋ gimoro jye ma Were oido otyeko timo i dyer Jopath i tich pere.
Munyo jotyeko winjo go, jojye jopako Were. Gikenyo jowacho ri Paulo ni, “Omin wan neni, nitye Joyudaya kweth ma jotyeko lokere jomoyeyo, to jojye fuodi jochwire tektek kwoŋ Chik pa Musa.
Otyek wacho ri jo nike ifuonjo Joyudaya jye ma jo ni i dyer Jopath weyo Chik pa Musa, aka ni iwacho ri jo nike kiri jowothumi nyithindho pajo kosa luwo kula pa Joyudaya.
Onyo aŋo ma ripere atima? Adyer jobino winjo nike ityeko tundo ka.
Amomiyo timi gima wawacho rin. Wani gi ji mogo aŋwen ma jonitye i kwoŋirok ma nyadin.

Kidhi gi jome ibedi gi jo i tim ma lonyirok aka iwodhi ri jo chul kwoŋ gima joor jye, odoko jowolyel yewiy gin. I yo me dhano jye bino ŋeyo nike adyeri ingoye i gimoro jye ma joluwo kwoŋin, kuchiel in bende imako Chik pa Musa.

To ma mako kwoŋ Jopath ma jotyeko yeyo, watyeko dhiro ri jo balwa, munyo wawacho ri jo nike waridho paro ni kiri jowochami chiemo mochow gine werin motim gi chingi jo; kosa chamo remo, kosa lee moro jye modey, aka jowokure kwoŋ kite ma kidakana.”

Gikenyo Paulo otero jono aka yawere mere otimo gi jo tim ma lonyirok. Gikenyo go odonjo i Ot pa Were nyutho jo ndelo ma lonyirok no kidho rum'iye aka ŋey kis dhano kwoŋ jo wokeli mich pere ma chowirok.
Munyo ndelo abiryo oido chiegin rumo, Joyudaya mogo ma jowok i adech ma Asya joneno Paulo i Ot pa Were. Jono josigila lwak ji gi bee to jomako Paulo.

Jokoko ni, “Ji ma Israel! Konyi wan win! Me won a ŋata wotho kamoro jye aka fuonjo ji dakirok gi Joisrael, kwero Chik pa Musa kodi Ot pa Were me. Aka onyo okelo kir Jopath mogo i Ot pa Were to kocho kamaleŋ me!”
(Jowacho ama rupiri joneno Trofimo ma Efeso gi Paulo i tindi, aka joparo nike Paulo oido otero go i Ot pa Were).
Ruwirok olak i tindi gipi, aka ji jye joringo kanyachiel jomako Paulo, to jowodho go woko wok i Ot pa Were. Piyo piyo to ichiego woko dhoudi jye.
Muma ji onwaŋo temo neko Paulo to itero wach ri jatel ma lwak jolweny pa Joroma nike ruwirok nitye i Yerusalem gipi.
Piyo piyo jatel otero joserikale mogo madongo kodi joserikale man to jomwomere kwoŋ muma ji. Tekin ji neno go gi joserikale to joweyo goyo Paulo.
Jatel okidho bongi Paulo, omako go, to wodho or nike wotweyi Paulo gi lijegere aryo. Gikenyo go openjo ni, “Me ŋa; kendo otimo aŋo?”
Jomogo i muma ji jokoko gimoro achiel, joman giman. Ruwirok obedo mathoth momiyo jatel konyalo nwaŋo adyeri ma gima otimere; gikenyo ooro ji tero Paulo i chiel pa jolweny.
Jotundo gine i geŋin ma dhoot, to joserikale jotiŋo atiŋa go rupiri muma ji oido olokere mager swa.
Jojye oido joluwo go ka jokoko ni, “Neki wi go!”
Munyo jochiegin tero Paulo i chiel, go oluwo gi jatel ni, “Weyi awachi ye rin gimoro?” Jaserikale madwoŋ openjo ni, “Iŋeyo Dhoyunani?
In won me iki Jamisir ma ndir cha oruwo wiy ji to telo jogwenyirok gana aŋwen i thim?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “A Jayudaya to onywolan i Tarso ma Silisya, anywola ma tindi moŋeyere maber. Mondo yeyan aluwi gi ji.”
Jaserikale madwoŋ oyeyo go, to Paulo chungo i geŋin ma dhoot to miyo ji ranyuth gi chinge. Munyo jopye, Paulo oluwo gi jo gi Dhoyudaya ni,
“Wutimera gi bachere nan, winji win gima awacho ri win ma nyutho win paka angoye gi racho moro!”
Munyo jowinjo go luwo Dhoyudaya, jomedo kudirok; Paulo omedere gi luwo ni,

“A Jayudaya, monywol i Tarso ma Silisya, to adongo Yerusalem won ka paka jafuonjirok pa Gamaliel. Alimo fuonji matek kwoŋ Chik pa kwarere mawan, aka oido amiyere ri Were paka win bende ma wini ka konon me.
Alwenyo gi ji ma joluwo Royo pa Yesu no tundo kir i nek. Amako chwo gi mon aka abolo jo i od twech.

Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi kitipa pa jotel pa ji gi bee jonyalo ridho ri win ni aluwo giradyeri. Alimo balwa wok bongi jo mondik ri Joyudaya jowoti wan ma Damasiko aka akidho koro mako ji kelo jo Yerusalem gi lijegere i chingi gin wochandi jo.
“Aka munyo oido atyeko woth ariko Damasiko, dho kapa sawa auchiel, lero madwoŋ owok malo abwap to thokan.
Gikenyo agore piny t'awinjo dwondi ŋata wacho ran ni, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Raŋo ilwenyo kodan?’
Apenjo ni, ‘In iŋa, Ruoth?’ Owacho ran ni, ‘An Yesu ma Nazareth m'ilwenyo gine.’
Ji monwaŋo ni kodan kenyo joneno lero no to jokowinjo dwondi ŋata onwaŋo luwo kodan no.
Apenjo go ni, ‘Atimi aŋo, Ruoth?’ Aka Ruoth owacho ran ni, ‘Ayi malo idonji Damasiko, aka kenyo ama ibino wacho rin gimoro jye ma Were ochano rin timo.’
Munyo waŋan onwaŋo otho ru lero moasere no, jowotan jomako chingan to joteran Damasiko.
“Kenyo onwaŋo nitye nyatoro milwoŋo ni Ananiya, jadin mowinjo Chik mawan aka Joyudaya jye ma Damasiko jomiyo go dwoŋ swa.
Go obino bongan to chungo kabutan to wacho ni, ‘Omera Saulo, chaki neno kendo!’ I hongo no won aneno kendo to aŋiyo go.
Gikenyo go owacho ran ni, ‘Were pa kwarere mawan oyerin ni iŋey gima go mito, ni inyal neno Ŋata otire pere gi winjo go munyo iwinjo dwonde won;
ameno ibino bedo jakony pere ma wacho ri ji gima ityeko neno gi winjo.
To onyo aŋo m'idoko ikuro? Ayi malo ilimi batisimo, aka recho perin wolwoki woko munyo ilwoŋo nyingi go.’
“Agik Yerusalem, aka munyo akwayo i Ot pa Were, aneno chal momenyere ran
m'aneno iye Ruoth munyo wacho ran ni, ‘Redi mayot ieye Yerusalem, rupiri ji maka jokojol gima iwacho kwoŋan.’
Adwoko ni, ‘Ruoth, kole joŋeyo maber paka yado akidho i kalamo pa Joyudaya momore, amako jomoyeyin, agoyo jo aka atero jo i twech.
Aka munyo ineko jatiti Wach perin Sitefano, oido ani kenyo, aka abende afuoyo odoko aŋata akuro kir ruk pa joma joneko go.’
Ruoth owacho ran ni, ‘Kadhi, rupiri abino dhirin bor swa i dyer Jopath.’ ”
Ji onwaŋo jowinjo luwo pa Paulo nyuka tundo i wach me, to jochako koko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Kwanyi wi woko jalo i piny ka! Go kiripi wokwo kendo!”
Oido jokoko aka jokwadho nengin pajo i hongo aka jowito fukefuke malo.
Gikenyo jaserikale madwoŋ owodho or nike woter Paulo i chiel, to oro jo chwado go ma mito ŋeyo gima omiyo Joyudaya jokoko ri go ameno.
To munyo jochowo kikada go aka wochwadi, Paulo owacho ri jaserikale moro monwaŋo ochungo kenyo ni, “Kere chik yeyo win chwado ŋata obedo anywola ma Roma kada fuodi koosa go banja moro jye?”
Munyo jaserikale no owinjo ameno, okidho bongi jadwoŋ pa joserikale to penjo ni, “Wikidho timo aŋo? Kole jame obedo anywola ma Roma!”
Gikenyo jatel pa joserikale okidho bongi Paulo to penjo go ni, “Wachi ran, ibedo Jaroma?” Paulo odwoko ni, “Ey.”
Jatel pa joserikale no owacho ni, “An alokere Jaroma munyo atyeko chulo pesa malach swa.” Paulo odwoko ni, “To an onywolan paka Jaroma.”
Gikenyo piyo piyo, ji moido jokidho kelo penji ri Paulo joeye gichien kwoŋe; aka jatel pa joserikale lworo omako munyo oneno ni Paulo obedo anywola ma Roma, aka ama go oido otweyo gi lijegere.

Yawere mere jatel pa joserikale oyenyo ŋeyo adyeri ma wach ma Joyudaya jomito kelo kwoŋ Paulo; ri ameno ooro jo gonyo woko lijegere pa Paulo to oro jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jopido gi bee romo. Gikenyo go owodho Paulo, to kelo go ruwaŋ jo.
Paulo oŋiyo jopido nyatirtir to wacho ni, “Wutimera chunyan oŋeyo maber swa kwoŋ kwo paran gipi ni angoye gi racho ruwaŋ Were i hongo jye kir pama.”
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma nyinge Ananiya ooro joma onwaŋo jochungo kabuti Paulo goyo lembe.
Paulo owacho ri go ni, “Were bino goyin adyeri, in m'ichal kor ot mofuy matar gi woko! Wibedo kenyo ma thumo ran banja chungo kwoŋ Chik, aka win won ama odoko wituro Chik ago munyo wioro jo goyan!”
Ji monwaŋo jo ni chiegin gi Paulo jowacho ri go ni, “Inyalo nedi luwo marach kwoŋ jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Wutimera oido akiŋeyo nike go jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, ‘Wikiri wiluwi marach kwoŋ jadhum pa ji mewin!’ ”

Munyo Paulo oneno nike jomegi kwoŋ jono oido jobedo Josadukayo aka joman Jofarisayo, okoko ri jopido ni, “Wutimera, a Jafarisayo aka Jofarisayo ama jonywolan. Anitye i kapido ka rupiri ageno ni jomotho jobino chierino!”
Tekin go otyeko wacho ameno, Jofarisayo kodi Josadukayo jochako dhawirok, to ji tyakere i bwora.
(Ato Josadukayo jowacho ni ji jokibino chierino kendo kwoŋ jomotho; aka nike ongoye jomalaika kosa gima obedo chuny, to Jofarisayo joyeyo gikipiny adek no jye).

Gikenyo woy omedo kidho malo; aka jofuonji ma Chik megi moido jo ni kweth pa Jofarisayo jochungo to jokwero matek ni, “Wakinyal nwaŋo racho moro kwoŋ jame! Miti kono malaika kosa chuny moro oluwo gine!”

Pyem olokere mager swa momiyo jaserikale madwoŋ lworo omako nike jobino yecho woko Paulo achielechiele. Ri ameno go ooro joserikale pere kidho i dyer muma ji piny jowokwanyi woko Paulo bongi jo gi mbaka jowoteri go i chiel.
Wor moluwo to Ruoth chungo kabuti Paulo to wacho ni, “Bedi miseni! Ityeko bedo jakony paran Yerusalem ka, aka iripo timo ameno Roma bende.”
Odikini yawere mere, Joyudaya joromo kanyachiel to joyiko paro. Jokwoŋere nike jokochiem kosa madho gimoro chuka joneki Paulo.
Onwaŋo jokalo ji pyero aŋwen ma joyiko paro me kanyachiel.
Gikenyo jokidho pa jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa ji to jowacho ni, “Watyeko timo kwoŋirok madwoŋ kanyachiel ni wakobil girachama moro jye ka fuodi wakaneko Paulo.
Onyo win kodi jopido dhiri win wach ri jaserikale madwoŋ ma Roma wokeli ri win Paulo munyo wirendere nike wimito medo niaŋ kwoŋ tyendi wach pere. Gikenyo waleneko go ma fuodi kotundo kir ka.”
To okewo pa Paulo owinjo sereko me to donjo i chiel to wacho ri Paulo gino.
Gikenyo Paulo olwoŋo jaserikale madwoŋ achiel to wacho ri go ni, “Teri jayach me bongi jatel pa joserikale; nitye gima go mito wacho ri jatel no.”
Jaserikale madwoŋ no okwanyo go otero go bongi jatel pa joserikale to wacho ni, “Jatwech milwoŋo ni Paulo olwoŋan aka okwayan ni akel jayach me bongin, nike nitye gima go lewacho rin.”
Jaserikale ma jatel omako chinge to won tero go gichien to penjo go ni, “Aŋo ma imito wacho ran?”
Ana go, “Joyudaya joriwo paro nike dikin jowokwayin iter Paulo ruwaŋ jopido, to jorendere ni jopido jomito medo niaŋ kwoŋ wach pere.

To ikiri iyey winjo wach pajo, rupiri nitye ji ma kalo pyero aŋwen ma jolepondo jowokuri go i royo. Jono jotyeko kwoŋere nike jokochiem kosa madho gimoro chuka joneki go. Pama won me jotyeko yikere ma timo ameno, aka jokuro ŋeyo paro perin won kende.”
Jaserikale ma jatel no owacho ni, “Ikiri iwachi ri nyatoro nike ityeko kelo wach me bongan.” To oro jayach no kadho.

Gikenyo jaserikale ma jatel no olwoŋo joserikale pere aryo madongo to wacho ri jo ni, “Kwanyi win joserikale miya aryo jowoyikere ma kidho Kaisareya, kanyachiel gi jokayina pyero abiryo kodi jotonge miya aryo, aka wiyikere ay keti sawa adek ma wor.
Neni kayina moro ri Paulo ma go owothi gine, aka witer go maber bongi gavana Felik.”
Gikenyo jaserikale ma jatel no ondiko balwa ama:
“An Klaudyo Lisya andiko ri jadwoŋ, gavana Felik, aka adhiro rin moth.
Joyudaya jomako ŋat me aka oido jokidho neko go. Alimo ŋeyo nike go obedo Jaroma, amomiyo akidho kodi joserikale paran botho go.
Paka onwaŋo amito ŋeyo wach ma jokelo kwoŋe, atero go i kapido pajo.
Anwaŋo nike go kotimo racho moro ma di miy neki go kosa twey go; wach mokel kwoŋe onwaŋo mako kwoŋ chik pajo wegi.
Aka munyo onyuthan nike Joyudaya jochamo ri go sereko, aridho paro ma dhiro go bongin. Awacho ri joma osa go jowokeli wach no gi bongin kenyo.”
Joserikale jotimo paka oor jo. Jokwanyo Paulo to jotero go wor no kir yu Antipaturi.
Yawere mere joserikale ma jotyendi gin jodwoko i chiel to joweyo jokayina jokadho gine.
Jotero go Kaisareya to jochwayo balwa ri gavana to jomiyo go Paulo.
Gavana osoma balwa no to penjo Paulo adech ma go wok'iye. Munyo onwaŋo ni go wok Silisya, owacho ni,
“Abino winjo wach perin ka joma osa in jotundo.” Gikenyo ooro jo kuro Paulo i chiel pa Herode.
Munyo ndelo abich okadho, jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, Ananiya, okidho Kaisareya gi jodongo mogo kodi ŋata oido luwo ri jo milwoŋo ni Tertulo. Jokidho ruwaŋ gavana Felik to joosa Paulo.
Olwoŋ Tertulo to jochako kelo wach pajo ama: “Jadwoŋ! Tel perin ma ryeko otyeko kelo ri wan syem chowo hongo malach, aka wirok mathoth motyeko bedo onyo pama okelo bero ri piny mawan.
Wajolo gime iye jye hongo jye, aka wakethin walwa swa.
Akimiti galin tektek, to akwayin itim ran ŋono iwinji wach mawan manok.
Ŋat me waneno paka jamijokere marach swa; go kelo ruwirok i dyer Joyudaya i piny gipi, aka go obedo jatel pa Jonazarin.
Go bende otemo kocho Ot pa Were to wamako go. [Onwaŋo waparo thumo ri go banja i nger ma Chik mawan,
to jaserikale madwoŋ Lisya donj'iye to kwanyo go bongi wan gi men.
Gikenyo Lisya ooro joma joosa go jowobin bongin.] Ka ikaŋasa wach pa jame maber, iwon ibino ŋeyo bonge gikipiny jye ma waos'iye go.”
Joyudaya bende jodonjo i wach no to jowacho nike gino jye otire.
Gavana ooro Paulo luwo, to Paulo wacho ni, “Aŋeyo nike ityeko bedo jathumi banja chowo hongo malach, amomiyo asangala gi limo silwany ma kwedirok kwoŋ wach pa jome ruwaŋin.
Paka iwon inyalo neno, fuodi kokalo ndelo apar g'aryo chuka akidhi Yerusalem kwayo.
Joyudaya jokonwaŋan apyemo gi nyatoro i Ot pa Were, kosa ni aruwo ji i kalamo pajo kamoro jye i tindi.
Aka jokinyal kada nyutho ni wach ma joos'iye an me obedo adyeri.
Me a gima ayeyo ruwaŋin: an alamo Were pa kwarere mawan munyo aluwo Royo ma jowacho ni kotire. Aka ayeyo gikipiny jye mondik i Chik pa Musa kodi i kitawin pa jotuchi wach Were.
Abende anitye gi geno kwoŋ Were paka jome, nike ji jye, mabeyo kodi marecho, jobino chierino kwoŋ jomotho.
Amomiyo atemo paka anyalo ndelo jye bedo gi paro motire ruwaŋ Were kodi ji.
“An oido angoye Yerusalem tyeko oro mogo, amomiyo oido akidho koro tero mich paran ri ji paran gi timo chowirok.
Aka i kare moido atim'iye ameno ama jome jonwaŋan'iye i Ot pa Were munyo atimo tim ma lonyirok. Muma ji oido ongoye bothan, aka ruwirok moro jye oido ongoye.
To Joyudaya mogo ma jowok i adech ma Asya onwaŋo jo ni kenyo; jo ama joripo bino bongin ka kelo wach pajo k'inen jo ni gi wach moro kwoŋan.
Ka kameno weyi jome wegi jowowachi recho ma jonwaŋan gine i ndir cha munyo achungo i waŋ pido,
ma kiweno gimoro achiel kende ama akoko gine munyo achungo i dyer jo ni, ‘Wimon kodan nyaka ni rupiri ayeyo ni jomotho jobino chierino aka amomiyo wiosa an konon.’ ”
Gikenyo Felik, monwaŋo otyek tito ri go maber kwoŋ Royo no, ochiego winjo banja. Owacho ri jo ni, “Abino thumo banja mewin ka jaserikale madwoŋ Lisya otundo.”
Ooro jaserikale monwaŋo ni gi Paulo kuro go, munyo miyoye go syem moro aka yeyo merin pere kelo ri go gima go yenyo.
Munyo ndelo mogo okadho Felik obino gi chiege Durosila, mobedo Nyajayudaya. Felik ooro jomogo lwoŋo Paulo bothe to winjo gima go wacho kwoŋ yeyo Kristo Yesu.
To munyo Paulo ochako gi luwo kwoŋ tiro, kurok, kodi bino pa ndelo ma thumo banja, lworo omako Felik to wacho ni, “Ere onyo eye, abino lwoŋin kendo ka alimo hongo.”
I hongo no go onwaŋo geno ni kono di Paulo omiyoye go pesa moro; ri ameno go oido lwoŋo Paulo adhik luwo gine.
Munyo oro aryo okadho, Porusyo Festo olunjo kapa Felik paka gavana. Felik onwaŋo mito mako mere kodi Joyudaya, amomiyo oweyo Paulo i jera.
Munyo ndelo adek okadho wok chuka Festo tundi i adech no, go owok Kaisareya to kidho Yerusalem.
Kenyo jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa Joyudaya jokelo ri go wach pajo kwoŋ Paulo. Jokwayo Festo
ni wotimi ri jo bero woyeyi wokel Paulo Yerusalem, rupiri oido joyiko neko go i royo.
Festo odwoko ni, “Paulo nitye i twech Kaisareya, aka awon abino gik koro mayot.
Weyi jotel mewin jowokidhi kodan Kaisareya to joosa go gi koro, k'inen go otimo racho moro.”
Festo odoko ochowo ndelo aboro kosa apar gi jo, aka nyaka okidho Kaisareya. Yawere mere go obedo piny i kapido, to oro jo kelo Paulo.
Munyo Paulo otundo, Joyudaya moido jowok Yerusalem jochungo jothoko go to jochako kiosa go wach madongo momore ma jokonyalo wodho adyeri mere.
To Paulo pyemo gi jo ni, “Fuodi akitimo racho moro kwoŋ Chik pa Joyudaya, kosa Ot pa Were, kosa kwoŋ Kaisar Kere pa Joroma.”
Festo oido mito limo fuoy bongi Joyudaya, ri ameno openjo Paulo ni, “Iyenyo kidho Yerusalem wawinji banja perin me gi koro?”
Paulo owacho ni, “Kole ama onyo ee achungo i kapido pa Kaisar won, kama ripere ni wowinj'iye banja paran. Akitimo racho moro ri Joyudaya paka iwon iŋeyo.

K'inen aturo Chik aka atimo gimoro ma miyan aripo gi tho, d'akikway ni abudhere. To ka adyeri angoye gi racho i wach ma joosa an iye, ongoye ŋata nyalo kethan i chingi jo. Onyo akodo wach paran bongi Kaisar.”
Gikenyo munyo Festo otyeko luwo kodi joma jomiyo go ryeko, odwoko ni, “Ikodo banja perin bongi kere, amomiyo ibino kidho bongi kere.”
Rumachien Kere Aguripa kodi Barunike jobino Kaisareya jolo Festo.
Munyo jochowo kenyo ndelo mogo, Festo otito ri kere wach pa Paulo ni, “Nitye dhano ka ma Felik oweyo i twech;
aka munyo akidho Yerusalem jotel pa jachwayi ri Were wi alitar kodi jotel pa Joyudaya joosa go bongan aka jokwayan ni athumi banja woloyi go.
To awacho ri jo ni, ‘Joroma jokibol dhano woko ka fuodi go konenere awaŋ g'awaŋ gi joma osa go to won kutho osere gi jo.’
Munyo jojye jobino ka, akigalo, to yawere mere abedo i kapido to aoro jo kelo go.
Joma osa go jochungo, to jokokelo kwoŋe recho mogo monwaŋo aparo ni di jokelo.
Gimobedo oido a nyaka pyem kwoŋ Chik pajo ma nyadin kodi kwoŋ nyatoro motho milwoŋo ni Yesu ma Paulo ŋoyo nike fuodi kwo.
Akinyalo ridho royo ma nwaŋo adyeri kwoŋ gikipiny me, amomiyo apenjo Paulo ka d'oyeyo kidho Yerusalem wowinji wach pere me gi koro.
To Paulo wodho ywak pere nike woweyi go i jera aka Kaisar ama wowinji banja pere. Amomiyo awodho or ni wokur go tundo ndir ma d'adhir'iye go bongi Kaisar.”
Aguripa owacho ri Festo ni, “Awon amito winjo wach pa jal me.” Festo odwoko ni, “Inowinji go dikin.”
Yawere mere Aguripa gi Barunike jobino gi noro gi dwoŋ moasere, aka jodonjo i kapido kodi ruodhe ma lweny kodi jomadongo ma tindi. Festo owodho or to ikelo Paulo i kapido.
Festo owacho ni, “Kere Aguripa, kodi ji jye ma wini ka gi wan, wineno ŋata Joyudaya jye, ma ka kodi ma Yerusalem joosa go bongan? Jokoko malo nike wokiri womedere gi kwo!
To akinyalo nwaŋo recho moro ma go otimo ma ripere gi wach ma tho. To paka go won okodo wach pere bongi Kere madwoŋ, aridho nike abino dhiro go bonge.

To angoye kodi gima nyatirtir manondiki kwoŋe ri kere madwoŋ, Kaisar. Amomiyo, akelo go ka ruwaŋ win, to tektek mere ruwaŋin, Kere Aguripa! Aka ka ityeko kikaŋasa wach pere, nyaka anobedi kodi gima anondiki.
Ato kineen motire dhiro jatwech ma konyuthi maber wach mios'iye go.”
Aguripa owacho ri Paulo ni, “Oyeyin luwo wach perin.” Paulo oryeyo chinge aka owodho wach pere ama:
“Kere Aguripa! Atero paka a jasilwany ni konon abino luwo wach ma kwanyan woko kwoŋ gikipiny jye ma Joyudaya joluwo kwoŋan.
Ato me obedo rundir, kwoŋbedo iŋeyo maber kula pa Joyudaya kodi dhawirok pajo. Amomiyo akwayin idiy chunyin iwinji wach paran.
“Joyudaya jye joŋeyo kwo paran wok i thino. Joŋeyo wok chon ni i kwo paran gipi abedo i piny paran won kodi i Yerusalem.
Ndir jye joŋeyo, ka joyeyo ridho ri win, ni yado onwaŋo abedo jakweth pa joma jomako swa din mawan, Jofarisayo.
Aka onyo achungo ka munyo iosa an ni rupiri ageno i chikirok ma Were otimo gi kwarere mawan;
chikirok ma nonin mawan apar g'aryo jye jogeno limo, paka jolamo Were wor g'odyechieŋ. Aka ru geno me, Jadwoŋ, amomiyo Joyudaya joosa an!
Raŋo tek ri win yeyo ni Were chierino jomotho?
“An won onwaŋo yado aparo ni aripo timo gimoro jye ma nyalere ma lwenyo gi nyingi Yesu ma Nazareth.

Aka meno a gima yado atimo i Yerusalem. Jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar oido jomiyan men aka atweyo kir ji pa Were mathoth i jera; aka kimeno kende, ka ithumo ri jo banja ma tho, abende agoyo kwir mere.
I ndir momore amiyo jo limo girachula i kalamo pa Joyudaya jye, aka atemo miyo jo kwedirok kwoŋ yeyo pajo. Keme omakan swa gi jo momiyo akidho kir i tindi ma wiloka lwenyo gi jo.”
“Gime amoido teran i Damasiko chungo kwoŋ men kodi or pa jotel pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar.
Munyo fuodi oido ani royo odyechieŋ, jadwoŋ, aneno lero ma loyo apa waŋchieŋ mowok malo to thoko wan kodi ji monwaŋo awotho gi jo.
Wajojye wagore piny, aka awinjo dwondi jo mowacho ran i Dhoyudaya ni, ‘Saulo, Saulo! Ilwenyo kodan raŋo? Iwon itimo gima kelo rin ayino litho, pa mirikwa ma temo gweyo kwer manyweny gi tyende.’
Apenjo ni, ‘In iŋa, Ruoth?’ Aka Ruoth odwoko ni, ‘An Yesu ma ilwenyo gine.
Onyo ayi ichungi gi tyendin. Amenyere rin ma lokin jatich paran iwachi ri joman gimomiyo konon inenan kodi giman jye ma anonyuthin yuwaŋe.
Abino bothin i chingi ji ma Israel kodi Jopath, ma adhirin bongi jo
ni iyaw waŋ jo jowonyali wirok wok i mudho donjo i lero kodi wok i men pa Sitan bino bongi Were, ŋey jowonyali limo chwak kwoŋ gimarecho pajo to jolimo kabedo i dyer joma Were oyero munyo joyeyan.’ ”
“Amomiyo, Kere Aguripa, akichayo menyirok mowok i polo ma aneno.

Atero wach me marapena i Damasiko, nyaka t'atero Yerusalem, kodi rumachien i Yudeya gipi, kodi i piny pa Jopath, ni joripo ŋuto gimarecho pajo jowowire bongi Were, gi timo gikipiny ma nyutho nike jotyeko ŋuto.
Wach no amomiyo Joyudaya jomakan munyo anitye i Ot pa Were to jotemo nekan.

To kir konon Were okonyan, amomiyo achungo ka munyo aridho wach me ri ji jye, ri jomathindho kodi jomadongo parom. Gima awacho obedo gimoro achiel ma jotuchi wach Were kodi Musa jowacho ni bino timere,
nike Kristo ripo chandere, aka ka otyeko bedo marapena i chierino kwoŋ jomotho, wokeli lero ma both ri Joyudaya kodi Jopath.”
Munyo Paulo fuodi osa ri kwo pere ameno, Festo okoko ri go ni, “Paulo, ijaneko! Fuonjirok perin madit no olokin janeko!”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Akijaneko Jadwoŋ! Wach m'aluwo obedo adyeri odoko aluwo wach me m'anitye milengela.
Kole Kere Aguripa oŋeyo gikipiny me, aka anyalo luwo kodi go gi misen jye. Aridho ni go otyeko kikaŋasa gikipiny me jye, rupiri gime kotimere nyaliŋliŋ yu tyelo.
Kere Aguripa, iyeyo wach pa jotuchi wach Were? Aŋeyo ni iyeyo.”
Gikenyo Aguripa owacho ri Paulo ni, “I hongo machiek won me iparo ni inyalo lokan Jakristo?”
Paulo odwoko ni, “Kada me hongo ma chiek kosa ma bor, kwayo paran bongi Were obedo ni in kodi wijojye ma wiwinjan konon ka winyali bedo paka an, to kareno ma kotwey win gi lijegere ayino.”
Gikenyo kere, gavana, Barunike kodi joman jye moido jobedo kenyo gi jo joay malo;
aka munyo jotyeko eye kenyo, wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Ŋatin kotimo gimoro ma di miy woneki kosa tweyo go.”
Aka Aguripa owacho ri Festo ni, “Ŋat me d'onyo ogony bedi kokodo wach pere bongi Kaisar.”
Munyo oridhi nike wachiewere i nam wakidhi yu Italya, joketho Paulo kodi jomotwey mogo i chingi Julyo, jaserikale i lwak jolweny ma Roma milwoŋo ni, “Lwak jolweny pa Kaisar Agusto.”
Wadonjo i mel ma wok Aduramityo, monwaŋo chiegin ay wokidhi loka ma yu adech ma Asya, gikenyo to waay. Aristaruko, Jamasedonia ma Thesalonika, onwaŋo ni gi wan.
Yawere mere watundo Sidon. Julyo otimo wor gi Paulo to yeyo go kidho neno merin pere, jowomiyi go gim'oyenyo.
Wok kenyo wamedere gi chiewirok, to paka koyo onwaŋo kudho wok yu wiy wan, wachiewere yu thenge ma kigoda ma Sipuro kama koyo oido ongoy'iye.
Munyo watyeko chiewirok i nam kalo Silisya gi Panfilya, wabino Mira, i adech ma Lisya.
Kenyo jaserikale onwaŋo yee mowok Alekizandurya moido chiegin ay wokidhi yu Italya, to rwako wan iye.

Wachiewere mothmoth ndelo moromoye, aka rumachien i teko madwoŋ watundo dho tindi ma Kunido. To paka koyo koyeyo wan medirok yu thenge no, wachiewere yu thenge ma koyo ongoy'iye yu Salmon dho geŋin ma kigoda ma Kurete.
Warikere i thengi nam, aka i teko madwoŋ watundo kama ilwoŋo ni, “Thengi nam Maber”, ma kibor kodi tindi ma Laseya.
Paka hongo onwaŋo okadho malach, aka ndelo ma madwoŋ ma chwako recho oido otyeko kadho, odoko medirok gi chiewirok oido nyalo kelo teko, Paulo omiyo jo ryeko ni,
“Jowotan, aneno ni chiewirok mawan kidho kelo teko yu malo aka gikipiny madit bino nyiekere i mel, aka ki meno kende, to kir wan won bende wanyalo podho i teko.”
To jaserikale omedo tich gi wach pa jadwoŋ ma mel kodi won yee loyo gi ryeko ma Paulo oido okelo.

Paka kachungo pa mel i thengi nam no onwaŋo kiber bed'iye i ndir ma pe ŋich'iye piny, ji maloyo thotho jofuoyo dhirok i nam gi temo tundo yu Fenisya ka nyalere. Kanyago obedo kachungo pa mel i Kurete ma ŋiyo yu Wich piny i thenge ma yu rachuch kodi i Tyendi piny yu thenge ma yu rachuch bende, aka ka oido nyalere, di wabedo kenyo i hongo ma ŋicho no.
Koyo mawok yu Tyendi piny ochako kudho, aka ji joparo ni di jonyalo tiyo gi chan pajo; ameno joywayo gima juko ye to jochiewere gi dho geŋin ma thengi Kurete.
To piyo piyo koyo madwoŋ, milwoŋo ni Koyo ma wok yu rachuch ma Wich piny, okudho munyo loro wok i kigoda.
Koyo no ogoyo mel, aka paka oido kinyalere choro mel yu kama koyo wok'iye, chuny wan oeye to waweyo koyo kadho gi wan.
Walimo kagoŋirok moro munyo wachomo yu geŋin ma kigoda mathin milwoŋo ni Kauda. Kenyo watemo gi mbaka to wanyalo gwoko ye monwaŋo waywayo yu chien.

Munyo jotyeko ywayo yee gi tiŋo malo, jotemo kikoda mel matek gi thondhe kwoŋ geŋin. To paka oido jolworo nike jonyalo gurok i kwoyo dho thengi pi ma Libya, jolwogo nanga ma chiewirok to joweyo koyo won kadho gi mel.
Munyo koyo madwoŋ onwaŋo wito wan gi men, yawere mere jochako bolo woko gikipiny ma yee onwaŋo otiŋo,
aka yawere mere jobolo woko gikipiny michiewo gine mel gi chingi jo.
Ndelo okadho madit ma wakineno waŋchieŋ kosa michalin, aka koyo omedere gi kudho gi men. Rumachien chuny wan oeye kir kwoŋ kwo mawan.

Munyo ji onwaŋo jotyeko riyo kech ndelo madit, Paulo ochungo i dyer jo to wacho ni, “Jowotan, di chieŋino wiwinjo wach paran to wiweyo chiewirok wok Kurete; aka di wanyalo geŋo nyiekirok kodi rwenyo pa gikipiny me jye.
To onyo akwayo win, bedi win miseni! Ongoye ŋat moro kwoŋ win ma bino rwenyo kwo pere; to mel kende ama bino rwenyo,
rupiri nende wor malaika pa Were ma an alamo aka abedo apere obino bongan,
to wacho ni, ‘Paulo, ikiri ibedi gi lworo! Iripo chungo ruwaŋ Kaisar; aka Were, i bero pere, otyeko miyin kwo pa ji jye m'ichiewere gi jo me!’
Amomiyo, jowotan, bedi win miseni, rupiri ani gi geno i Were ni gime bino bedo paka awacho ri win won.
To waripo chombo kwoŋ kigoda moro.”
I wor marapar g'aŋwen, munyo koyo oido fuodi wito wan i nam ma Mediterania, dho dyer wor, jochiewi yee joŋicho nike oido wariko kamothwo.

Ri ameno jobolo piny tal motwey kwoŋe tele mapek to jonwaŋo ni lutho ma pendi pi oido obedo fut miya achiel gi pyero aryo. I kare moro kenyo jodoko jobolo tal to jonwaŋo ni pendi pi obedo fut pyero abuŋwen.
Munyo lworo omako jo ni mel mawan nyalo guro telin, jocharo piny gikipiny aŋwen ma juko yee gi yuchien wochungi to jokwayo ni piny woyawere.
Gikenyo jochiewi mel jotemo kwalok wok i mel; jobolo yee mathin i pi to jorendere nike oido jokidho wodho woko gikipiny ma juko yee ma yunyime.
To Paulo owacho ri jaserikale madwoŋ gi joserikale man ni, “Ka jochiewi mel jokodoŋ i mel ka wakinyal both.”
Gikenyo joserikale jothumo woko thondhe monwaŋo mako yee mathin no to joweyo kadho.
Munyo piny kidho yawirok, Paulo okwayo jojye ni jowochiemiye. “Wityeko riyo kech ndelo apar g'aŋwen pama, aka hongo no jye wikichamo gimoro.
Amomiyo akwayo win, chami wiye gimoro aka winwaŋi men rupiri ongoye kada yer achiel ma wiy win ma bino rwenyo.”
Munyo otyeko wacho ameno, Paulo okwanyo mugat, oketho Were walwa ruwaŋ jojye, to turo, to chako chamo.
Miseni omako jo, to dhano jye chamoye chiemo moro.
Wajojye oido waromo ji miya aryo gi pyero abiryo g'auchiel i mel no.
Munyo dhano jye otyeko chiemo, joloko mel masew munyo jobolo woko ŋano i wakawaka.
Munyo piny oyawere, jochiewi mel oido jokoniaŋ ni kamothwo ni chiegin, to joneno choŋino kodi kamonaŋere ma di kwoyo i thengi nam to joridho paro ni kanyalere di jotero mel kenyo.

Gikenyo jobolo gichien gikipiny ma juko mel to joweyo i pi, to bende jogonyo woko thondhe monwaŋo omako yath mitiro gine royo i mel. Gikenyo jotiŋo malo nanga machiewo yee to joyaro to koyo chako tero mel i choŋino.
To nyim mel oguro kwoyo ma piny to donj'iye, to moko ma kidhire kareno pi ma tula gi derino ŋinyo woko mbawin mogeti gine mel gi yuchien.
Joserikale joparo neko woko jotwech jye ŋey wongoye kwoŋ jo ŋata wokwale.
To jaserikale madwoŋ onwaŋo mito botho Paulo, amomiyo ochiero jo timo ameno. Kuchiel, ooro ji jye ma jonyalo buko pi jowopeni por iye jowobuki to jokadho.
Gikenyo nyaka jomodoŋ jowoluwi jo chien munyo jobedo wi mbawin mogo kosa adeche ma mel moturotur. Aka meno apaka wajojye wapor loka maber.
Munyo watundo loka maber, aka walimo ŋeyo nike kigoda piny no ilwoŋo ni Malta.
Ji ma kenyo josangala swa gi wan. Koth oido ochako chwe aka piny oido ŋich swa, amomiyo jomoko ri wan mach to jolwoŋo wan oyo.
Paulo onwaŋo otyeko dimo agwere mogo to ketho i mach, to thwol uu moro wok ru lyetho pa mach, to minere i chinge to moko gine.
Munyo ji ma kenyo joneno thwol no olyero i chingi Paulo, wegi jowacho kendigin ni, “Ŋat me ripo bedo ni go janek, rupiri kada oido oboth nam, jye fuodi tipo kiyey ni go wobothi.”
To Paulo owito woko thwol no i mach ma kotimo kwoŋe racho moro.

Onwaŋo jokuro neno go ka kwoŋe yenyo gi kwir kosa gore piny arwat gi tho. To munyo jotyeko kuro chowo hongo malach ma jokoneno gimoro jye ka timere kwoŋe, jowiro paro pajo to jowacho ni, “Go were moro!”
Chiegin kenyo oido nitye ndelo mogo mobedo apa Pubulyo, ruoth ma kigoda no. Go ojolo wan maber to wabedo wendo pere chowo hongo ma ndelo adek.
Baa Pabulyo oido ni kanindo kwoŋe oowere odoko iye ryemo. Paulo odonjo i ot pere, okwayo Were, to ketho chinge kwoŋe to botho go.
Munyo gime otimere, jotwo man jye i kigoda no jobino to jolimo both.
Jomiyo wan mich madit, aka munyo wachiewere joketho ri wan i yee no gimoro jye monwaŋo wayenyo i chiewirok mawan.
Munyo dwe adek okadho, wachiewere i mel wok Alekizandurya i mel milwoŋo ni, “Wutimere Marut” moywomere i kigoda no i ndir ma pe oido oŋich'iye piny.
Watundo i tindi ma Sirakuse to wabedo kenyo ndelo adek.
Wok kenyo wathokere gi chiewirok to watundo i tindi ma Rejum. Yawere mere koyo ochako kudho wok yu Tyendi piny, to kada ameno watundo i tindi ma Puteyoli i hongo ma ndelo aryo.
Wanwaŋo jomoyeyo jowoti wan mogo kenyo ma jokwayo nike wabedi gi jo ma sabiti achiel. Wok kenyo aka watundo Roma.
Jomoyeyo jowot wan ma Roma jowinjo kwoŋ wan to jobino romo gi wan i karomo milwoŋo ni Apiya kodi man ni Udi Machiemo Adek. Munyo Paulo oneno jo, ofuoyo Were to limo miseni.
Munyo watundo Roma, oyey Paulo bedo kakende gi jaserikale ma kuro go.

Munyo ndelo adek okadho, Paulo olwoŋo jotel pa Joyudaya ma kenyo i romo. Munyo jochokere owacho ri jo ni, “Wutimera! Kada oido akitimo racho moro ri ji mawan kosa kwoŋ kula ma wanwaŋo kwoŋ kwarere mawan, olokan jatwech i Yerusalem to ikethan i chingi Joroma.
Munyo jokaŋasa wach paran oido jomito gonyan, rupiri jonwaŋo ni akitimo racho moro ma di miyan atho.
To munyo joyudaya jopyemo gi paro me, aneno ni aripo kodo wach paran bongi Kaisar kada onwaŋo awon angoye ran gi wach m'aosa ji paran.
Ri ameno akwayo neno win gi luwo gi win, rupiri anitye gi lijegere me kwoŋan ru wach ma Joisrael jogeno kwoŋe.”
Jowacho ri go ni, “Fuodi wakilimo balwa mogo jye wok bongi Joyudaya ma mako kwoŋin, aka ongoye kada omin wan moro jye mowok koro gi wach moro, kosa moluwo gimoro marach kwoŋin.
To wamito winjo gima iwacho rupiri kamoro jye ji joluwo marach kwoŋ kweth me ma initye iye.”

Gikenyo joyiko ndelo gi Paulo, to ji kweth kwoŋ jo jobino i ndelo no kama Paulo oido bed'iye. Wok odikini tundo othyeno, Paulo otito ri jo mikwenda kwoŋ Ker pa Were. Otemo paka onyalo miyo jo ŋeyo maber kwoŋ Yesu munyo kwanyo wach i Chik pa Musa kodi i ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were.
Jomegi kwoŋ jo joyeyo i chuny gin kwoŋ wach pere, to joman jokoyeyo.
Gikenyo joeye gi pyem i dyer jo wegi kendigin munyo Paulo otyeko wacho gimoro achiel me: “Chuny Maleŋ chango otire munyo luwo gi i dhok Isaya jatuchi wach Were ri kwarere mewin ni,
‘Kole Were owacho ni, Kidhi iwachi ri jome ni, Wibino winjo adyeri, to wikoniaŋ dwoŋ gima wiwinjo; Wibino ŋiyo adyeri, to waŋ win konen gimoro.

Kwoŋbedo paro pa jome olokere ma fuol. Jotyeko chulo ithi gin, to jomiyo waŋ gin. Bedi k'ameno, waŋ gin d'oneno gimoro, odoko ithi gin d'owinjo wach, aka chuny jo d'oniaŋ gimoro. Ameno di jonyalo wirok bongan to jolimo both.’ ”
Aka Paulo omedo ni, “Wiripo ŋeyo nike mikwenda pa Were kwoŋ both odhir ri Jopath; aka jobino winjo!”
[Munyo Paulo owacho ameno, Joyudaya joeye, munyo wegi jopyemo kendigin matek.]
Paulo obedo kenyo oro aryo munyo won chowo teko pere, aka ojolo ji jye ma jobino lyewo go,
to tito kwoŋ Ker pa Were to fuonjo kwoŋ Ruoth Yesu Kristo munyo luwo gi miseni jye kodi syem.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jatich pa Yesu Kristo kendo jamoor ma Were oyero to lwoŋo fuonjo Wach Maber pere,
ma Were chango ochiko munyo oro jotuchi wach pere, tiketho i Ndiiko Maleŋ.
Me obedo Wach Maber ma mako kwoŋ Wuode, Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, monywole paka nyakwar Daudi;
to inyutho ji ni go obedo Wuodi Were gi men madwoŋ mapa Chuny ma kelo leŋo, munyo ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
I go Were omiyan silwany ma bedo jamoor ri Kristo, ŋey atel ji ma nonin jye jowoyeyi odoko jowowinji or.
Me bende mako win ma winitye Roma, ma Were olwoŋo bedo ji pa Yesu Kristo.
Amomiyo andiko ri wijojye mani Roma ma Were omaro to lwoŋo bedo ji pere won; Weyi Were Bawan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo womiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Marapena afuoyo Were paran, i Yesu Kristo, ri wijojye; rupiri piny gipi winjo kwoŋ yeyo mewin.
Were nyalo ridho ni gima awacho obedo adyeri; Were no ama atiyo ri go gi chunyan jye munyo afuonjo Wach Maber kwoŋ Wuode. Were oŋeyo nike ndir jye apoyo win, i hongo jye ka akwayo.
Akwayo nike Were i mito pere, i hongo moro womiyaye thwolo ma limo win.
Kole ayenyo swa neno win ŋey anyal poko gi win silwany machuny, ma medo win men.
Dwoŋ mere ni win, kodan, wabino nwaŋo kony kiromo, win i yeyo paran aka an i yeyo mewin.
Poyi win gime wutimera: ndir mathoth ayiko bino limo win, to hongo jye gimoro geŋan bino. Atyeko yenyo swa ywayo jomegi i yeyo i dyer win bende, paka atyeko timo i dyer Jopath.
Kole or omakan matek kwoŋ ji jye, kwoŋ jokite mabeyo kodi jomarecho, kwoŋ jomofuonjere kodi joma kuya gimoro.
Amomiyo ayenyo swa fuonjo win bende ma winitye Roma Wach Maber.
Kole ageno swa Wach Maber, rupiri obedo men pa Were ma botho ji jye majoyeyo, marapena Joyudaya, aka nyaka Jopath bende.
Kole Wach Maber nyutho paka Were ketho ji i tiro gine ma bedo i yeyo, wok i chakirok tundo i gike. Ato randik wacho ni, “Ŋata oketh i tiro gi Were bino kwo gi yeyo.”
Were otyeko nyutho ni keme pere bino wok i polo to lwenyo gi recho jye kodi tim pa ji marecho ma royo pajo marecho geŋo adyeri ŋeyirok.
Were miyo jo girachula rupiri gima ji jonyalo ŋeyo kwoŋ Were nitye kamaler ri jo.
Chuka Were chwey piny, kada go won kinenere i men pere ma chil gi chil kodi i kite ma nyawerewere, gima nyutho ni go nitye nenere i gikipiny ma go ochweyo. Amomiyo dhano ongoye kodi gi goŋirok!
Ji joŋeyo Were, to jokimiy go dwoŋ pere, kendo kada temo fuoyo go ni walwa. Kuchiel, paro pajo olokere masisiri aka paro pajo ma kitiy modoŋ mudho otyeko poŋ'iye.
Jowacho ni joryek, to kere jomiŋ ayin;
kama di jolam Were makitho, jolamo ri gin gima othedhi i chal pa dhano matho, kosa apa winyin, kosa apa ogwange kosa apa thwole ayino.
Paka ji jomiŋ ameno, Were ojala jo jowotim gikipiny marecho ma chuny gin yenyo, aka jotimo gikipiny ma kelo wichkwot i del pajo, ŋat man gi nyawote.
Jowilo adyeri kwoŋ Were gi twodo; jolamo aka jotiyo ri gima Were ochweyo kapa lamo Jachwech won, miripo pako chil gi chil. Ameno.
Paka ji jotimo gime, Were ojala jo to weyo jo ri awanya makelo wichkwot. Kir mon bende jowiro or ma delkwoŋ gin munyo joweyo riwirok i del i yo motire to joriwere wegi kendigin, mobedo yo ma kotire.
Ameno, chwo bende joweyo riwirok gi mon paka ndir jye, to joowere g'awanya kwoŋ chwo wadi gin. Chwo jotimo wichkwot gi chwo wadi gin, amomiyo Were miyo jo girachula rundir ru tim pajo marecho no.
Paka ji jokwero ketho i paro pajo ryeko maradyeri ma mako kwoŋ Were, go onyo ojala jo ri paro motop, ma miyo jo timo gima oido jokiripi timo.
Joasere gi recho ma nger jye, racho, woro, kodi chamo tyendi ji gi piny; joasere gi nyieko, nek, gorok, twodo, paro marecho kwoŋ dhano. Jonyieko nyingi wadi gin,
aka joluwo kichar kwoŋ ji; jodak Were, joyetere, jobedo jopakirok, jokwoto; joparo yo momore ma timo recho; aka jokiwinji jonywol pajo;
jodakana, jokikur chikirok pajo, jokinyuthi wor odoko jokidew kwoŋ nyatoro.
Joŋeyo kir ni chik pa Were wacho ni ji ma kwo pajo chalo ameno joripere gi tho, to jye fuodi nyaka jomedere ameda gi timo gikipiny no won; aka maloyo racho: jofuoyo joman ma bende jotimo ameno.

Jowotan, withumo banja ri jowoti wini? Kere onyo wingoye gi kagoŋirok, kada wibedi jokune! Ato ka withumo banja ri jowoti win mato wibende witimo gikipiny marom gi ma jotimo, meno wiwegi withumere banja loyo win.
Waŋeyo ni Were otire ka thumo banja ri joma timo gikipiny ma pameno.
Nyawotan, iparo nike ka itimo gikipiny no won ma ithum'iye banja ri jowotin, inobothi kwoŋ thumo banja pa Were?
Kosa miti ichayo bero pere moasere, ka diyo chunye gi ji aka kudere. Adyeri wiŋeyo ni Were ber rupiri go temo tero win i ŋuto!
To initye gi wichtek aka chunyin di chay. Amomiyo iwon imiyo girachula perin lebedo madwoŋ swa i ndelo ma keme pa Were bino nyuther'iye ma thumo banja maradyeri.
Kole Were bino miyo dhano jye kemba chungo kwoŋ gima go otimo.
Ji megi hongo jye jotimo gimabeyo, aka jorango dwoŋ pa Were gi wor kodi kwo makirum; aka Were bino miyo jo kwo makirum.
Ji man joparo kwoŋ bero pajo wegi to jokwero gimotire, aka jotimo gima kotire. Jono Were bino konjo kwoŋ jo keme pere gi jok swa.
Chandirok gi litho bino bedo ri ji jye ma jotimo recho, kutho marapena ri Joyudaya, aka nyaka ri Jopath bende.
To Were bino miyo dwoŋ kodi wor gi syem ri nyatoro jye ma timo gimabeyo, marapena ri Joyudaya ŋey wotimi ri Jopath bende.
Kole Were tero ji jye marom.
Jopath, ma jongoye kodi Chik pa Musa, jotimo gimarecho aka jobino rwenyo bende mongoye Chik. Joyudaya ma jo ni gi Chik, jotimo gimarach aka ilethumo ri jo banja chungo kwoŋ Chik no.
Ato kobedo nyaka i winjo Chik gi ithi jo ama miyo iketho ji i tiro gi Were, to i timo gima Chik mito ayino.
Jopath jongoye gi Chik; to ka hongo jye gi yero pajo jotimo gima Chik mito, meno nyutho ni Chik tiyo i chuny jo, kada oido jongoye gi Chik.
Kite pajo nyutho ni gima Chik mito ondik i chuny jo. Paro pajo mani chuny jo bende nyutho ni gime otire, rupiri paro pajo dichieŋ miyo jo ŋeyo ni jonyieko wach kosa be.
Onyo, chungo kwoŋ Wach Maber m'afuonjo, me apaka bino bedo i ndelo no munyo Were, i Yesu Kristo, bino thumo banja ri paro ma nyaliŋliŋ jye ma chuny ji.
Aka in to? Ilwoŋere ni Jayudaya; ithenere kwoŋ Chik aka iyumere gi Were;
K'iŋeyo gima Were mito ni itim, aka ityeko fuonjere kwoŋ Chik yero gimotire;
aka k'iridho adyeri ni iripo nyutho joma waŋ gin otho royo paka lero pa joma nitye i mudho,
ibedo jatiri jomamiŋ g'adyeri, odoko ibedo jafuonji pa joma fuodi jokotegino. Iridho ni ini gi ryeko moromo, kodi adyeri ma wok i Chik.
Onyo in m'ifuonjo joman no, raŋo iwon ikifuonjere? K'ifuonjo nike, “Ikiri ikwal,” iwon odoko ikwalo nedi?
In miwacho ni, “Ikiri itim chot,” iwon idoko itimo chot nedi? In midak lamo chal ma kichar, idoko inyaga gikipiny wok i migam milam'iye werin mogo nedi?
In miyumere ni ini gi chik pa Were, raŋo midoko ikelo wichkwot ri Were kareno ituro chik pere?
Kole ondik ni, “Ru kiti win Joyudaya, amomiyo Jopath joluwo marach kwoŋ nyingi Were.”
Kole ka wiwinjo Chik, meno aka nyaka thumirok mewin di kony; to ka wituro Chik, meno kole thumirok mewin onyo chale pa kobedo thumirok.
Amomiyo ka Japath ma kothumere timo gima Chik mito, meno onyo Were kiter go paka ŋatothumere?
Aka Jopath jobino thumo banja woloyi win Joyudaya, rupiri kada wini gi Chik aka withumere jye fuodi wituro, kuchiel jo ama jowinjo Chik kada jokothumere.
Kere ŋa m'onyo obedo Jayudaya maradyer, m'othumere? Ŋata obedo Jayudaya nyaka gi thumirok mawoko meno ki Jayudaya maradyer, odoko thumirok maradyeri kobedo mitimo nyaka gi woko kende.
Kuchiel Jayudaya maradyeri meno mobedo Jayudaya i chunye, mothumere i chunye, aka meno tich pa Chuny Maleŋ pa Were, ma kiweno apa Chik mondik. Ŋato limo pak bongi Were, ma kiweno bongi dhano.
Onyo Joyudaya joloyo joman i yo mene? Kosa kony aŋo ma nitye i thumirok?
Nitye bero moromo ma bedo Jayudaya. Kutho marapena, Were ogeno Joyudaya to miyo jo mikwenda pere.
Aŋo to, ka jomegi kwoŋ jo jobedo joma kigenere? Onyo ru gino, nyutho ni Were kigenere?
Kameno be! Weyi Were wobedi jaradyeri kada dhano jye obedi jatwodo. Paka ondik ni, “Aka ŋey wonyuthere paka gima iluwo otire, aka iloy banja ka i pido kodin.”
Onyo wanowachi nedi ka tim mawan makotire konyo ma nyutho kamaler ni apa Were amotire? Wawachi ni Were timo marach ka miyo wan girachula? (Meno onyo aluwo paka dhano.)
Kameno be! Ka Were kotire nyalo nedi thumo banja ri piny?
To ka komo paran konyo ma nyutho tiro pa Were to kelo ri go dwoŋ, raŋo ma fuodi ithumo ran banja igani ajarecho?
To raŋo ma kiwachi ni, “Weyi watim recho ŋey bero wowok'iye?” Adyeri jomegi jotyeko kir yetan munyo jochwoko dhokan ni awacho ameno won! Ibino thumo banja loyo jo paka ripere.
Onyo wa Joyudaya wanitye maber i yo mene loyo Joman? Ongoye be! Atyeko nyutho ni Joyudaya kodi Jopath parom jojye jonitye i men pa gimarach,
paka ondik ni, “Ongoye dhano kada achiel motire, ongoye ma kada achiel,
ongoye moro ma niaŋ, kosa ma rango Were.
Ji jye joeye woko bongi Were, jojye jotyeko podho; Ongoye ŋata timo gimaber, ongoye kada achiel.
Dhoki jo chalo kalyel mothangere; Jooro lew jo ma twodo, aka wach ma chal kwir ama wok i dhok jo;
Dhok jo opoŋ'iye kwoŋ ma kech kodi duro.
Joyot gi kidho neko ji.
Joweyo gunda kodi rem kama jokidh'iye jye.
Fuodi jokoŋeyo yo ma syem,
odoko fuodi jokofuonjere lworo Were.”
Onyo pama watyeko ŋeyo ni gimoro jye ma Chik wacho, mako kwoŋ joma fuodi joluwo Chik, ŋey wogeŋ woko rendirok pa dhano, aka Were wonyal thumo banja ri piny gipi.
Kole ongoye dhano mibino kwano ri go tiro i waŋ Were ru nyaka timo gima Chik yenyo, rupiri Chik miyo dhano nyaka ŋeyo nike gimanyo obedo recho won kende.
To pama royo ma Were ketho gine ji i tiro gi go otyeko nyuthere, aka kimaki kwoŋ chik. Chik kodi ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were jye joridho gima mako kwoŋ royo no.
Were ketho ji i tiro kwoŋ yeyo pajo i Yesu Kristo ayino. Were timo gime ri ji jye ma joyeyo Kristo, rupiri pokirok ongoye.
Paka ji jye jotyeko timo recho aka jo ni bor gi dwoŋ pa Were,
pama onyo ikwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji jye ru mich ma ŋono pa Were kareno igonyo jo woko kwoŋ recho i Kristo Yesu

ma Were oketho paka rachow, ŋey gi tho pere go wolokere royo ma chwako recho pa ji chungo kwoŋ yeyo pa dhano. Were otimo ameno ma nyutho tiro pere, rupiri i ndir mokadho, go odiyo chunye to weyo ma kokwano recho pa ji;
to i ndir ma pama go kaŋasa recho pa ji, ma nyutho paka go won otire, aka go ama kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ŋata ni gi yeyo i Yesu.
Onyo aŋo ma wanyalo yumirok gine? Kole ongoye! I royo mene? I royo ma kuro Chik? Be, i royo ma bedo gi yeyo ayino.
Ato onyo wachowo wach ni Were kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ dhano chungo kwoŋ yeyo, ma kiweno kwoŋ timo gima Chik mito.
Kosa Were obedo Were pa Joyudaya kende? Go kobedo Were pa Jopath bende? Kole go obedo Were pa Jopath bende.
Were nitye achiel, aka go bino kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ Joyudaya chungo kwoŋ yeyo pajo, aka bende bino kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ Jopath ru yeyo bende achiel no won.
Onyo nyutho ni waboli woko Chik ru yeyo me? Kameno be; kuchiel, waridhi Chik bende.
Onyo wanowachi aŋo kwoŋ Ibrayimu, kwari wan i del?
Bedi kwany woko banja kwoŋe chungo kwoŋ gikipiny ma go otimo, di go onyalo bedo kodi yumirok, to go kinyal yumere i waŋ Were.
To kere randik wacho aŋo? Ni, “Ibrayimu oyeyo Were, aka ru yeyo pere Were okwano go paka ŋatotire.”
Dhano ka tiyo ichulo go kemba ma kiter paka mich, to paka gima go otiyo ri go ayin.
To ka dhano kikethi geno kwoŋ tich pere, to ketho i yeyo Were ma kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji ayino, kiti yeyo no miyo ikwano ri go tiro.
Me a dwoŋ gima Daudi owacho munyo luwo kwoŋ kisangala pa ŋata Were jolo paka ŋatotire ma kokwano tich ma go otyeko timo:
“Josilwany a joma recho pajo Were otyeko chwako; joma go oumo recho pajo!
Jasilwany a ŋata Ruoth kibino kwano kwoŋe recho pere!”

Silwany ma Daudi oluwo kwoŋe me bedo apa jomothumere kende? Be. Bedo apa jomakothumere bende, rupiri watyeko nyutho wach wok i randik ni, “Ibrayimu oyeyo Were, aka ru yeyo pere Were okwano go paka ŋatotire.”
Gime otimere keraŋo? Otimere ma fuodi, kosa munyo Ibrayimu otyeko thumere? Ma fuodi, ma kiweno rumachien ma thumirok pere.

Othum go rumachien paka ranyuth ma ridho ni ru yeyo pere munyo fuodi go kothumere amomiyo Were okwano go paka ŋatotire. Meno amomiyo Ibrayimu obedo baa joma yeyo Were machuny, ma Were jolo jo paka jomotire, kada jokothumere.
Go obedo baa jomothumere bende, ki ni rupiri othum jo, to rupiri jonitye i kiti kwo ma yeyo ma Ibrayimu chango obedi'iye munyo fuodi kothum go.
Were ochiko Ibrayimu kodi nyikwaye ni piny me bino bedo apa jo. Chikirok me otim, ki ru kwoŋbedo Ibrayimu okuro Chik, to rupiri go oyeyo aka Were okwano go paka ŋatotire.
To k'inen joma kuro Chik ayino ama jobino lunjo gimochik, meno kere yeyo pa dhano ongoye kony, aka chikirok pa Were bende ongoye kony.
Chik kelo nge pa Were, to kama chik ongoy'iye, meno turo chik bende ongoye.

Ri ameno chikirok no chungo kwoŋ yeyo, ŋey wothenere kwoŋ ŋono pa Were aka womiyi nyikway Ibrayimu jye, aka ki nyaka joma jokuro Chik kende, to joma joyeyo paka chango Ibrayimu bende oyeyo. Ato Ibrayimu obedo baa wajojye ma chuny,
paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Alokin baa nonin mathoth.” Aka chikirok no otimere bongi Were won ma Ibrayimu oyeyo; Were ma chierino jomotho, ma or pere miyo gimoro ma oido ongoye chako bedo.
Ibrayimu oyeyo aka ogeno, munyo geno oido ongoye kir kony, amomiyo go olokere “Baa nonin mathoth,” paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Nyikwayin joletiŋo piny pa kweth michala.”
Oro pere oido chiegin romo miya achiel, to yeyo pere komojere munyo go oparo kwoŋ delkwoŋe monwaŋo chal p'otyeko tho, kosa munyo oneno ni Sara oido kinyal limo nyithindho.
Yeyo pere korumo, aka go koganagana kwoŋ chikirok pa Were; yeyo pere opoŋo kwoŋ go men, to fuoyo Were,
rupiri go oido oridho kichutho ni Were bino timo gima go otyeko chiko.
Meno amomiyo, ru yeyo pa Ibrayimu, Were okwano go paka ŋatotire.
Wach me ni, “Okwan go,” kondik ri Ibrayimu kende.
Ondik ri wan bende ma ibino kwano wan paka jomotire, wan ma wayeyo Ŋata ochierino Yesu Ruodhiwan kwoŋ jomotho.
Ojala Yesu ri tho ru gimarecho mawan, aka ochierino go i kwo ŋey wokwan ri wan tiro gi Were.
Paka onyo okethi wan i tiro gi Were chungo kwoŋ yeyo, onyo wanitye i syem gi Were kwoŋ Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
Go am'okelo wan i ŋono pa Were ma pama wachung'iye. Amomiyo wasangala i geno ma wani gine ma limo dwoŋ pa Were!
Maloyo meno, wasangala i chandirok mawan, rupiri waŋeyo ni chandirok kelo chiro,
chiro miyo Were fuoyo wan, aka fuoyo pere kelo ri wan geno.
Geno me kikwoti wiy wan, rupiri Were otyeko konjo mar pere i chuny wan, munyo omiyo wan Chuny Maleŋ, mobedo mich pa Were ri wan.
Munyo fuodi oido wanyap, Kristo otho ri jomarecho i hongo ma Were oyero. Raŋo ameno?
Kole tek swa moro tho ri ŋatotire. Kono moro nyalo miyere to tho ri ŋataber.
To Were otyeko nyutho wan paka omaro wan, rupiri munyo fuodi wabedo jomarecho, Kristo otho ri wan.
Paka tho pere onyo okelo wan i tiro gi Were, ma loyo kenyo, go bino botho wan kwoŋ keme pa Were.
Wan oido wabedo jokwor pa Were, to Were odwoko wan i tiyirok gine kwoŋ remo pa Wuode. Aka paka onyo watyeko dwoko i tiyirok gi Were, kwo pa Wuode onyo bino botho wan kichutho.
To kimeno kende; wasangala i Were kwoŋ Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, ma pama odwoko wan i tiyirok gi Were.
Gimarach obino i piny ka luwo kwoŋ ŋatachiel, aka gimarach pere okelo tho. Gim'owok'iye, tho olak kwoŋ dhano jye, rupiri ji jye jo ni gi gimarach.
Gimarach oido nitye i piny ma fuodi kowodhi Chik; to kama Chik ongoy'iye kikwan'iye recho ri nyatoro.
To wok i ndir pa Adam tundo i ndir pa Musa, tho odhumo ji jye, kada joma oido jokotimo recho paka Adam munyo okwero mako chik pa Were. Adam obedo chal pa ŋata oido kidho bino rumachien.

To mich pa Were ma nono no, kichale gi gimarach ma Adam otimo. K'inen ji mathoth jotho ru gimarach pa Adam ŋatachiel no, ameno ŋono pa Were kodi mich ma nono mani ŋono pa ŋatachiel, Yesu Kristo, loyo meno bor swa.

Aka pokirok nitye i dyer mich pa Were kodi gimarach pa ŋatachiel. Munyo otyek timo gimarach achiel, gimoluwo a thumo banja ni, “Banja oloyo ŋato; ” to munyo gimarecho olokere madit, mich moido wakiripi gine obino ni, “Okwany woko banja pa ŋato!”

K'inen ru gimarach pa ŋatachiel ama omiyo tho ochako dhum kwoŋbedo ŋatachiel no, meno kere adyeri joma jonwaŋo ŋono mathoth kodi mich ma nono ma tiro bende jobino dhumo maloyo i kwo ru ŋatachiel, Yesu Kristo.
Amomiyo paka kibenga pa ŋatachiel omiyo banja oloyo ji jye, ameno bende ibino kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji mathoth ru winjo pa ŋatachiel.
Ato paka kibenga ma nyaturo chik pa ŋatachiel oloko ji kweth jogimarach, apaka bende winjo chik pa ŋatachiel miyo iloko ji kweth jomotire.
Munyo Chik obino, kibenga ma nyaturo Chik omedere; to kama recho meder'iye, ŋono pa Were bende medere loyo.
Amomiyo, paka gimarach odhumo i royo ma tho, ameno bende ŋono pa Were dhumo i royo ma kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ ji, munyo tero jo i kwo makirum kwoŋ Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan.
Onyo wawachi nedi? Nike wamedere gi timo gimarach aka ŋey ŋono pa Were bende womedere?
Kameno be! K'inen watyeko tho ma nyutho kwero gimarach, wanyalo nedi doko medirok gi timo gimarach?
Kole adyeri wiŋeyo gime ni: munyo walimo batisimo i riwirok gi Kristo Yesu, walimo batisimo i riwirok gi tho pere bende.
Ri ameno, batisimo mawan nyutho ni oyik wan bende gi Yesu kendo wariwere gine i tho pere, ŋey paka Kristo ochierino kwoŋ jomotho ru men pa Bamere Moasere, ameno bende wanyalo bedo i kwo manyien.
Ato ka wariwere gi Yesu i tho paka go otho, meno bende apaka wabino riwere gine i chierino ma chalo apere.
Aka waŋeyo ni kwo mawan machon otyek neko gi Kristo wi musalaba, ŋey men ma miyo del timo gimarach wonyali reyere woko, aka ŋey wakiri wadoko wabedi ŋechin pa gimarach.
Kole ka dhano otho meno otyek gonyo go kwoŋ men pa gimarach.
Aka ka watyeko tho gi Kristo, wani gi yeyo nike bende wabino kwo gine.
Kole waŋeyo ni Kristo ochierino kwoŋ jomotho aka kibino tho kendo; tho ongoye gi men kwoŋe kende.
Tho ma go otho oido obedo tho ma kwero gimarach dichiel ma kichutho; aka kwo ma go onyo ni gine obedo ri Were.
I royo achiel wibende wiripo terere paka jomotyeko tho ma nyutho kwero gimarach aka onyo jokwo ri Were i Kristo Yesu.
Gimarach odoko wokiri wodhumi i delkwoŋ win ma tho me, kareno witimo gima awanya mere yenyo.

Odoko wikiri wimiy gimarach adech ma delkwoŋ win moro woori i timo kidakana, kuchiel miyi win Were kwo mewin, paka ji mokwany jo i tho to ikelo jo i kwo, aka miyi win go kwo mewin gipi woori i atoŋa motire.
Gimarach wokiri wodhumi win paka onyo wikibedi i men pa chik, to i ŋono pa Were ayino.
Kere onyo aŋo modoŋ? Watim gimarecho ni rupiri wakinitye i men pa chik to i ŋono pa Were ayino? Be!
Wikuya nike ka wimiyere paka ŋechin ma winjo nyatoro, meno adyeri wibedo ŋechin pa ruoth ma wiwinjo no, kosa apa gimarach ma kelo tho, kosa apa winjo Were ma kelo ri win tiro i waŋe?
To Were wofuoyi ni yado oido wibedo ŋechin pa gimarach, to pama wiwinjo adyeri mifuonjo win gi chuny win jye.
Aka paka otyek gonyo win woko kwoŋ gimarach, pama onyo wilokere ŋechin pa tiro.

Aoro wach ma nyadhanodhano ru nyapo ma wini gine ma niaŋ. Paka yado oido wimiyere i bedo ŋechin pa kidakana, kodi turo chik pa Were, onyo pama bende wiripo miyirok paka ŋechin pa tiro ri atoŋa ma lonyo.
Munyo oido wibedo ŋechin pa gimarach, oido wingoye i tiro.
Onyo bero aŋo ma wilimo i timo gikipiny ma kelo ri win wichkwot? Kole gima wok i gikipiny no obedo tho!
To paka onyo otyek theko win gi gimarach to wibedo ŋechin pa Were, bero ma wini gine onyo obedo lonyo, ma i gike bino miyo wilimo kwo makirum.
Kole kemba pa gimarach obedo tho; to mich ma Were miyo wan obedo kwo makirum i Kristo Yesu Ruoth mawan.
Wikuya, wutimere, ka aluwo gi joma joŋeyo chik, ni chik dhumo dhano ka go fuodi kwo?
Paka ranen, Chik tweyo dhako monywomere kwoŋ chwore ka chwore fuodi kwo; to tekin chwore tho, go gonyere woko kwoŋ chik ma mako kwoŋ chwore.

Amomiyo, ka go obedo gi jachwo man munyo fuodi chwore nitye, ibino tero go paka jatimi chot; to ka chwore otyeko otho, go nitye i syem i kite ma chik, aka go kitim chot ka go odoko obedo gi jachwo man.

Meno apaka nitye kodi win wutimera. Wibende wityeko tho kwoŋ gima mako kwoŋ Chik, rupiri wilokere adech ma delkwoŋ Kristo; aka onyo win apa go mochierino kwoŋ jomotho, ŋey wanyal kwo kareno wakonyo tich pa Were.
Munyo oido fuodi watimo gima del yenyo, awanya marecho ma Chik osigila oido tiyo i delkwoŋ wan, aka oido kelo ri wan tho.

To pama otyek gonyo wan woko kwoŋ Chik, rupiri watyeko tho ma nyutho ni wakwero gima chango oido otweyo wan. Pama onyo wakibedo jotich i chik machon mondik, to wabedo jotich i kwo manyien ma Chuny ayino.
Onyo wawachi nedi? Ni Chik meno won a racho. Kameno be! To ru Chik amomiyan aŋeyo gimarach. Kole d'akiŋeyo gimilwoŋo ni kikobo bedi Chik kowacho ni “Ikiri itim kikobo.”
Gimarach onwaŋo hola pere i or pa Were, ma kelo ran kikobo ma nger jye. Ka Chik ongoye, gimarach bende bedo gimotho.
An chon oido akwo munyo Chik fuodi ongoye; to munyo or pa Were obino, to gimarecho chako nenirok kamaler,
gikenyo t'atho; ameno or monwaŋo omiti ni wokeli kwo odoko olokere ran tho ayino.
Ato gimarach onwaŋo hola to wondan munyo luwo kwoŋ or; ameno to nekan.
Ri ameno Chik leŋ, aka or pa Were leŋ, otire, kendo ber.

Meno onyo nyutho ni gimaber okelo tho? Kameno be! Gimarach am'okelo ran tho munyo oro gimaber, ney kite pere maradyeri paka gimarach wonyuthere kamaler. Amomiyo, chungo kwoŋ or pa Were, gimarach olokere marach ma kichutho.
Waŋeyo ni Chik mako kwoŋ chuny, to an abedo dhano ma ni gi del, motana paka ŋecha ri gimarach.
Akiniaŋ odocho kwoŋ gikipiny m'atimo, rupiri akitim gima amito timo, kuchiel, atimo gima akimiti mere ayino.
Ka atimo gima akimiti timo, meno nyutho nike ayeyo ni Chik otire.
To iyadyeri awon, aŋata akitim gime; kuchiel gimarach ma nitye i an ama timo gino.
Aŋeyo ni bero ongoye i an, kosa awachi ni i delkwoŋan paka dhano. Anyalo yenyo timo gimaber, to akinyal.
Ato akitim gimaber ma amito timo; kuchiel atimo recho moido akimito timo ayino.
Ka atimo gima oido akimito timo, nyutho ni aŋata akitim ameno, to gimarach ma nitye i an ama timo ameno.
Ameno anwaŋo ni gime chale gi chik; ka amito timo gimaber, ayero gimarach ayino.
Kwo ma chunyan sangala i chik pa Were,
to anwaŋo ni chik man ama tiyo i delkwoŋan, chik ma lwenyo kodi gima paro paran yenyo. Gino lokan jatwech pa chik ma gimarach ma tiyo i delkwoŋan.
Adyer an adhano ma bu kisangala. Ŋata othekan gi del me ma teran i tho! Were wofuoy ma bino timo ameno kwoŋ Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan!
Amomiyo, me apaka anitye: abedo ŋecha ri chik pa Were i paro paran, to i del abedo ŋecha ri chik pa gimarach.
Pama onyo kidoki kethi banja kwoŋ joma kwo pajo nitye i Kristo Yesu,
rupiri chik ma Chuny ma kelo ri wan kwo i Kristo Yesu, otyeko thekan gi chik mokelo gimarach kodi tho.

Gima Chik konyalo timo ru nyapo ma del pa dhano, Were onyalo timo. Othumo banja loyo gimarach ma del, munyo ooro Wuode won, mobino i chal ma del pa dhano ma jagimarach, aka wonyali reyo woko gimarach.
Meno aka ŋey gima Chik mito ama wotimere i wan, ma wakiter kwo mawan i timo gima del yenyo, to i timo gima Chuny ama yenyo.
Kole joma tero kwo pajo i timo gima del yenyo joketho paro pajo i gikipiny ma nyadel. Aka joma miyo kwo pajo i timo gima Chuny yenyo joketho paro pajo i Chuny.
Ketho paro i gikipiny ma nyadel meno tho, to ketho paro i gikipiny ma nyachuny meno limo kwo kodi syem.
Meno amomiyo paro mokethi kwoŋ gikipiny ma nyadel lokere jakwor pa Were, rupiri kiwinji chik pa Were, aka iyadyeri go kitim ameno.
Aka joma jotero kwo pajo i timo gima del yenyo jokinyal kisangala Were.
To kwo mewin kobedo ma nyadel, to obedo ma nyachuny, k'inen Chuny Maleŋ pa Were nitye i win. Ŋata ongoye gi Chuny pa Kristo i kwo pere, meno kobedo apa Kristo.
To ka Kristo nitye i in, meno delkwoŋin otyeko tho ma nyutho ni ikwero gimarach, aka chunyin onyo ni gi kwo ru tiro perin gi Were.
Ka Chuny Maleŋ pa Were mochierino Yesu kwoŋ jomotho nitye i win, meno ŋata ochierino Kristo kwoŋ jomotho bende bino miyo delkwoŋ win ma tho no kwo ru Chuny Maleŋ ma bedo i win.
Amomiyo, wutimera, wanitye gi banja, to ki ri del ni watim gima del yenyo.
Kole ka kwo mewin nitye paka del yenyo meno wikidho tho; to ka wineko woko tim marecho gi men pa Chuny, aka wibino kwo.
Ato joma Chuny Maleŋ pa Were ama telo jo ama jobedo nyithindho pa Were.
Kole wikilimo chuny ma lokirok ŋecha ma kelo ri win lworo; to wityeko limo Chuny ma loko win nyithindho pa Were, aka ka waywak ri Were ni “Baba! Baba!”
meno men pa Chuny no ama nyutho wan i chuny wan ni wabedo nyithindho pa Were.

Aka ka wabedo nyithindho pa Were, meno bende wabedo jolunji gikipiny pere paka jomisika kanyachiel gi Kristo, aka wabende wabino limo dwoŋ kanyachiel gi Kristo, ka bende wariwere gi go i chandirok pere.
Atero ni chandirok ma pama kirom gi dwoŋ ma ibino nyutho wan be.
Chwech gi pi kiyo neno gima Were bino nyutho nyithindho pere.
Kole omiy piny lokirok gima ongoye kony, ki ru mito pere, to Were won amomito ni wobedi ameno. Kada ameno, geno oido nitye ama:
nike ndelo moro ibino gonyo chwech wok kwoŋ topo ma fuodi dhumo go, to limo syem i dwoŋ ma nyithindho pa Were jobino limo.
Kole waŋeyo kir gunyo ni chwech gi bee chur gi litho ma chale gi litho ma nywol.
Aka kameno kende, to wan ma wanitye gi Chuny paka mich pa Were marapena, wabende wachur gi litho i iyi wan koro munyo wakuro Were woloki wan nyithindho pere aka wokethi wan i syem.
Kole geno amomiyo obothi wan; to geno motyeko nenere meno kidoki bedi geno. Ŋa ma geno gima go neno?
To ka wageno gima wakinen, meno aka wakuro ginago ma wadiyo chuny wan.
I royo achiel no bende, Chuny Maleŋ konyo wan i nyapo mawan; rupiri wakuya paka waripo kwayo; aka Chuny won ama pido ri wan bongi Were gi chur ma wach kinyal tucho.
Aka Were ma neno chuny ji, oŋeyo paro pa Chuny, rupiri Chuny pido bongi Were ri ji pere paka Were mito.
Kole waŋeyo ni gimoro jye timere kanyachiel ma bero ri joma jomaro Were, jono ma go olwoŋo ru atoŋa pere won.
Kole joma Were oŋeyo chon, bende oyiko ri jo kichutho bedo i chal pa Wuode, ŋey Wuode wobedi okayo i dyer wutimin go.
Amomiyo joma Were oyiko ri jo kabedo chon kichutho, bende olwoŋo jo; aka joma go olwoŋo, bende okwanyo woko banja kwoŋ jo; aka joma go okwanyo woko banja kwoŋ jo, bende opoko jo dwoŋ pere.
Onyo wanyalo wacho aŋo kwoŋ gikipiny me? Ka Were nitye yu thenge mawan, ŋata nyalo lwenyo gi wan?
K'inen Were kogwoko kir Wuode won, to omiyo go ri wajojye! Onyo go komiy wan gimoro jye nono kanyachiel gi Wuode?
Ŋa ma bino kelo banja kwoŋ ji pa Were moyer? Kole Were won ama kwanyo woko banja kwoŋ jo!
To ŋa modoko othumi ri jo banja? Ki Kristo Yesu motho, kendo ma Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho, aka onyo obedo yu chingi Were marachuch aka pido ri wan bongi Were!
Ŋa mopoki wan gi mar pa Kristo? Teko di tim ameno, kosa aŋedha chuny, kosa achanda, kosa kech, kosa bedo kinyoro, kosa tho, kosa abor?
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Ru wach perin imito neko wan ndelo jye, itero wan pa rombo mikidho thumo.”
I gikipiny me jye, watyeko loyo lweny i go momaro wan!
Kole aŋeyo maber ni kada tho, kosa kwo, kosa jomalaika, kosa jodhum ma polo, kosa gima pama, kosa gima bino rumachien, kosa men mogo,
kosa ŋawirok pa gimogo, kosa thutho pa gimogo, kosa gimogo jye i chwech, kinyal poko wan gi mar pa Were i Kristo Yesu Ruodhiwan.
Aluwo giradyeri i Kristo aka akitwodi; paro ma chunyan ridho gino gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ.
Ani gi rem kodi litho mathoth i chunyan.
Aparo ni di Were wokwoŋan ayin aka wopokan kodi Kristo ma bero pa ji paran, wade paran won ma del!
Jobedo Joisrael, ma Were oloko nyithindho pere to poko jo dwoŋ pere. Otimo chikirok pere kodi jo, to miyo jo Chik. Jonitye gi royo ma lamo Were maradyeri. Jotyeko jolo chikirok pa Were;
jowok kwoŋ kwarere wan machon, aka Kristo, paka dhano, onywolere wok i dyer jo. Weyi Were ma dhumo gimoro jye, wopak chil gi chil. Ameno.
Akiwachi ni chikirok pa Were othogaya ongoye kony; rupiri kobedo ni Joisrael jye ji pa Were;
odoko kobedo ni nyikway Ibrayimu jye nyithidho pa Were. Kole Were owacho ri Ibrayimu ni, “Nyikway Isaka kende ama ibino kwano paka aperin.”
Ma nyutho ni nyithindho monywol i yo ma kis ndelo ma nyadel jokobedo nyithindho pa Were; kuchiel, nyithindho monywol chungo kwoŋ chikirok pa Were ama ikwano paka nyikway go maradyeri.
Kole chikirok pa Were otim i wach me: “I hongo ma rom gi ma pama yu wa��e, abino dwoko aka Sara bino limo nyathi ma nyiyach.”
Aka ki meno kende; nger gino bende otimere ri Rebeka munyo ogamo iye to limo nyithindho ma rut, go kodi kwari wan Isaka.
Kada munyo fuodi konywol jo aka onwaŋo fuodi jokotimo kir gimoro maber kosa marach, (ma miyo yero pa Were wotimere,
kareno kichungi kwoŋ tim pa nyithindho no, to kwoŋ lwoŋo pa Were), Were owacho ri Rebeka ni, “Wuodin makayo bino tiyo ri mathin.”
Meno obedo paka ondik ni, “Amaro Yakobo, to adak Esau.”
Onyo wawachi nedi? Nike Were kotire? Kameno be.
Kole go owacho ri Musa ni, “Abino mako wor gi ŋata ayero timo ri go wor, abino ramere ri ŋata ayero ramirok ri go.”
Amomiyo, kichungi kwoŋ yero kosa men pa dhano, to chungo kwoŋ Were ma nyutho wor.
Kole ondik kwoŋ Farawo ni, “Alokin kere ri atoŋa ma aleorin iye ma nyutho men paran, gi miyo nyingan woŋeyere i piny gipi.”
Amomiyo Were mako wor gi ŋata go oyero, aka miyo dhano bedo jachay paka won oyero.
Moro kwoŋ win bino wacho ran ni. “K'inen obedo ameno, Were nyalo nedi ketho banja kwoŋ dhano? To ŋa, ma nyalo geŋo paro pa Were?”
To jawodhan in iŋa, dhano adhana, m'inyalo dwoko Were? Ayiga dak bende nyalo penjo ŋata ochweyo go ni, “Raŋo m'ichweyan ama?”
Kole jachwech ni gi syem ma oro lowo nyamasiga paka won oyero, gi chweyo degi aryo wok i lowo achiel modwany: dak achiel maraora i kabedo mawelo kodi man maraora i kabedo ma kis ndelo.
Iŋeyo nedi, kole ka Were otimo ameno ma mito nyutho keme pere gi miyo men pere woŋeyere! Amomiyo go odiyo chunye swa munyo chiro joma keme pere d'otiyo kwoŋ jo, moido ikidho reyo woko jo.
Aka iŋeyo nedi, kole ka Were otimo ameno ma mito nyutho dwoŋ pere moŋaŋ ri joma go kidho nyutho jo wor pere, ma go oyiko jolo i dwoŋ pere.
Kole meno mako kwoŋ wan ma go olwoŋo, ki nyaka wok kwoŋ Joyudaya kende, to kwoŋ Jopath bende.
Kole me a gima go wacho i kitawo pa Hoseya: “Ji me moido jokobedo aparan, abino lwoŋo jo ni, ‘Ji paran.’ Nono monwaŋo akimaro, abino lwoŋo ni, ‘Migos paran.’
Aka i kabedo monwaŋo owach'iye ri jo ni, ‘Wikibedo ji paran,’ kenyo ama ibino lwoŋ'iye jo ni nyithindho pa Were makwo.”
Aka Isaya luwo kwoŋ Israel ni, “Kada nyithindho pa Israel jothoth pa kwoyo ma nam, nyaka manok kwoŋ jo ama ibino botho.
Kole Ruoth bino chowo thumo banja pere i yoto ri piny.”
Aka gime nitye paka Isaya chango owacho ni, “Bedi Ruoth Majameni jye koweyo ri waye nyikway wan mogo, di wabedo paka Sodom, di walokere paka Gomora.”
To wanowachi nedi? Jopath monwaŋo jokitem bedo i tiro gi Were, onyo oketh jo i tiro gine ru yeyo pajo;
kareno Joisrael monwaŋo jorango tiro chungo kwoŋ Chik, jokonyalo kuro Chik nago.
To raŋo? Rupiri gima jotimo onwaŋo kochungo kwoŋ yeyo to kwoŋ tich mabeyo ayino. Jochier wi “tele ma redho jo,”
ma ndiiko luwo kwoŋe ni, “Neni, aketho i Zayun tele ma bino miyo ji chier, Tele ma bino miyo jo podho. To ŋata oyey go, kowey wiye wokwoti.”
Wutimera, ayenyo gi chunyan jye ni ji paran jye jowobothi! Neni paka akwayo Were ri jo!
Kole anyalo ridho ni chuny jo omaro Were, to maro pajo kichungi kwoŋ niaŋ motire.
Fuodi jokoniaŋ royo ma Were keth'iye gi go ji i tiro gine, aka wegi jotyeko temo chwogo royo pajo; amomiyo jokojolo royo ma Were keth'iye gine ji i tiro.
Kole Kristo amobedo kama Chik gik'iye, ŋey nyaka dhano jye mayeyo woketh i tiro gi Were.
Musa ondiko kwoŋ wach ma bedo i tiro gi Were i winjo Chik ni, “Ŋata timo gima Chik wacho, bino kwo gi Chik.”
To me a gima ndiiko wacho kwoŋ ketho dhano i tiro gi Were ru yeyo: “Ikiri iwachi i chunyin ni, ‘Ŋata oidhi i polo?’ ” (dwoŋ mere ni dwoko Kristo i piny ka).
“Kosa ni, ‘Ŋata olori piny i bur maluth?’ ” (dwoŋ mere ni kidho chierino Kristo kwoŋ jomotho.)
Me a gima Ndiiko wacho: “Kole wach nitye chiegin kodin, i dhokin kodi i chunyin” (dwoŋ mere ni wach ma yeyo ma wafuonjo);
rupiri ka itucho gi dhokin ni, “Yesu meno Ruoth,” aka iyeyo i chunyin nike Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho, ibino both.
Ato dhano yeyo gi i chunye to ikwanyo woko banja kwoŋe; aka tucho gi dhoke to limo both.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Moro jye ma yeyo go konwaŋ wichkwot.”
Me mako kwoŋ dhano jye, rupiri pokirok ongoye i dyer Joyudaya kodi Jopath; Were achiel ama obedo Ruoth pa ji jye, aka go miyo dhano jye ma lwoŋo go silwany.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Nyatoro jye m'olwoŋ nyingi Ruoth bino both”.
To jolwoŋ nedi ŋata fuodi jokoyeyo kwoŋe? Odoko joyey nedi ŋata fuodi jokowinjo wach ma mako kwoŋe? Odoko jowinji nedi mongoye ŋata otito ri jo mikwenda?
Aka jotiti nedi mikwenda, ka koor jo? Kole ondik ni, “Bino pa joma kelo Wach Maber obedo gimaber manedi!”
To ki Joisrael jye ma jojolo Wach Maber. Isaya won owacho ni, “Ruoth, ŋata oyeyo mikwenda mawan?”
Amomiyo yeyo wok i winjo mikwenda, aka mikwenda wok i fuonji kwoŋ Kristo.
To apenjo, obedo adyeri ni jokowinjo mikwenda? Kole jowinjo paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Derino ma dwondi jo olak i piny gipi, Wach pajo otundo i tum jye ma piny.”
Odoko apenjo, kosa Joisrael chango jokoniaŋ? Kole Musa won gipi a marapena dwoko ni, “Abino miyo witimi nyieko gi ji ma jokobedo nono motire. Abino miyo win nge gi ji mamiŋ.”
Aka Isaya ni gi miseni madwoŋ ka wacho ni, “Jomonwaŋo jokirangan ama jonwaŋan; Amenyere ri jomonwaŋo jokipenjan kada.”
