To ma mako kwoŋ Israel go wacho ni, “Atiŋo chingan malo ndelo gipi ri ji ma jochay kendo ma jopyem.”
Onyo apenjo ni, Were otyeko bolo woko ji pere? Kameno be! An won bende abedo Jaisrael, nyakwar Ibrayimu, achiel kwoŋ jonono pa Benjamin.
Were kobolo woko ji pere ma go won oyero chako chon. Wikuya gima ndiiko wacho i adech ma Eliya pid'iye gi Were ka lwenyo gi Israel?
Owacho ni, “Ruoth, joneko jotuchi wach perin aka jonyieko woko alitar perin; aŋata adoŋ kendan, aka jorango kir nekan bende.”
Were omiyo go radwok aŋo? Odwoko go ni, “Atyeko ketho gichien ji gana abiryo ma fuodi jokolamo were Baal.”
Amomiyo bende kir gunyo fuodi nitye jomodoŋ, ma Were oyero ru ŋono pere.
Ka obedo ru ŋono pere, meno yero pa Were kichungi kwoŋ tim mabeyo ma dhano timo, rupiri d'onyo ŋono no kidoki bedi ŋono motire.
Onyo aŋo to? Gima Joisrael jorango tektek jokonwaŋo; jomoyer ama jonwaŋo, to jomodoŋ jobedo gi chuny jo matek.
Otimere paka ondik ni, “Were omiyo jo chuny ma miŋo, gi waŋ gin ma konyalo neno, kodi ithi gin ma konyalo winjo, kir konon.”
Aka Daudi wacho ni, “Mada kalima pajo wolokere ri jo bwo ma chiko jo, kodi gima redho jo; jowolimi girachula!
Mada waŋ gin chule woko ma jokinyal neno, miyi jowogwomere i chandirok pajo ndir jye.”
Amomiyo apenjo ni: Munyo Joyudaya jochier, jopodho to joreyere woko? Kameno be! Rupiri jotimo gimarach, both obino ri Jopath, ŋey womiyi Joyudaya jowotimi nyieko gi jo.
K'inen gimarach pa Joyudaya okelo silwany mathoth ri piny, aka podho pajo okelo ŋaŋo ri Jopath, onyo ka orwaki jo, silwany no bino thoth marom nedi?
Pama onyo aluwo gi win Jopath: ka fuodi abedo jamoor pa Jopath abino pakere gi tich paran.
Miti anyalo miyo ji ma nono paran won nyieko, ŋey anyal botho jomegi kwoŋ jo.
K'inen munyo obol jo woko, odwok piny gipi i tiyirok gi Were, onyo aŋo man m'obedi ka ojol jo, loyo nwaŋo kwo wok i tho!
Kole ka adech ma chiemo momiy Were paka gimanyak marapena leŋ, meno chiemo no gipi bende leŋ; aka k'inen tyendi yath leŋ, meno kir jange bende leŋ.

To k'inen otyek toŋo woko megi kwoŋ jangi yath vini mopidhi, aka win ma wibedo jangi vini mogo madudi onyo oriw win maber i kabedo pa motoŋ woko cha munyo ipoko win ye kwo moŋaŋ mani tyendi yath mopidhi no,
onyo wikiri wipakere ri jangi yen moŋwer woko cha, rupiri wibedo nyaka jangi yen, aka wiŋat wikithyel tyendi yath to tyendi yath ama thyelo win.
To wibino wacho ni, “Ey, kole oŋwer woko jangi yen cha ma leŋo ran hongo.”
Meno otire, oŋwer woko jo rupiri jokoyeyo, to wikiri wibedi gi paro ma pakirok kwoŋ gime; kuchiel, bedi win gi lworo ayino.
Ato k'inen Were koworo Joyudaya ma jobedo paka jangi yen motire mere, wiparo nike go bino woro win ayino?
Onyo neni win paka Were chunye ber aka odoko nyutho gero bende. Go ger kodi joma jopodho, to nyutho win bero tekin wichwire i bero pere; to ka wikitimo ameno, wibende ibino ŋwero win woko.
Aka ka Joyudaya joweyo bedo ma bu yeyo, ibino dwoko jo i kabedo pajo monwaŋo jo ni iye, rupiri Were nyalo dwoko jo kendo.

K'inen win Jopath oŋadi win paka jangi yath vini madudi to iriwo win kwoŋ vini mopidhi pecho, gima oido kinyalere, onyo Joyudaya ma jobedo jangi yath kwoŋ yath vini mopidhi, jobino bedo mayot nedi riwo jo kendo i kor yath mere won!
Amito ni winiaŋ nyaliŋliŋ me, wutimera, ŋey wikiri wipar ni wiryek swa: wichtek pa ji ma Israel kobedo ma kiwire, to bino bedo chuka welo kwan pa Jopath mamitere jowobin bongi Were woromi.
Aka me apaka Israel gipi bino limo both, paka ondik ni, “Jaboth bino wok Zayun, Go bino kwanyo woko recho pa nyikway Yakobo jye.
Abino timo chikirok me gi jo, munyo akwanyo woko gimarecho pajo.”
Rupiri jokwero Wach Maber, Joyudaya jolokere jokwor pa Were ma bero mewin, win Jopath. To i yero pa Were, jobedo mere pere ma bero pa kwarere pajo.
Kole Were kiwir paro pere kwoŋ mich kodi lwoŋo pere ri nyatoro.
Gime rom kodi gima otimere ri win Jopath; chon oido wichayo Were, to kole pama onyo wilimo wor pa Were rupiri Joyudaya jotimo chay.
Ameno bende, Joyudaya pama jokiwinji Were, ŋey gi wor ma wilimo, jo bende jowolimi wor pa Were.
Kole Were otyeko loko ji jye jotwech pa chay, ŋey wonyuthi wor ri ji jye.
Thutho ma ŋaŋo pa Were kodi ryeko kodi niaŋ pere rom nedi! Ŋa ma nyalo tito paro ma go ochano? Ŋa ma nyalo niaŋ kwoŋ royo pere?
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Ŋa moŋeyo paro pa Ruoth? Odoko ŋa ma nyalo miyo go ryeko?
Ŋa motyeko miyoye go gimoro ma ripo wonwaŋi chul?”
Kole go amochweyo gimoro jye, aka gimoro jye nitye kwoŋbedo go kodi ri go. Dwoŋ wobedi ri Were chil gi chil! Ameno.
Amomiyo, wutimera, ru wor pa Were moasere ri wan, agoyo ri win koko me: Miyi win delkwoŋ win ri Were paka rachow makwo, maleŋ ma sangala go. Meno a lamo machuny ma wiripo chwayo ri go.
Wikiri wiluw kula ma piny me, to bedi win ma wiwire i paro mewin, aka nyaka wibino ŋeyo mito pa Were: gimaber ma sangala go, odoko molony kichutho.
Aka gi mich ma Were omiyan awacho gime ri wijojye: Wikiri wipar ni wini malo loyo kama di wipar'iye. Kuchiel, bedi win milengela i paro mewin, kis dhano kwoŋ win, ma ripo gi yeyo ma Were omiyo go.
Wanitye g'adeche madit i del achiel, aka adeche me jye nitye gi tich mere.
Ameno kada wathoth, jye fuodi wabedo del achiel i Kristo, aka wamakere kanyachiel paka adeche mopokere opokere ma del achiel.
Amomiyo paka wanitye gi mich mopokere opokere chungo kwoŋ ŋono ma Were omiyo wan, weyi waor ama: K'obedo mich ma tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were, timi ameno i chungo kwoŋ yeyo mini gine.
K'obedo mich ma chwayo, tiyi ri jowotin; k'obedo mich ma fuonji, fuonji wadin.
K'obedo mich ma medo wadin miseni, timi ameno; ŋata poko ri joman gima go nigine, wopoki gi chunye maber; jatel, wotiyi gi men; jawor, wonyuthi wadi wor gi kisangala.
Mar ripo bedo maradyeri. Kweri gimarach, chwire kwoŋ gimaber.
Marere win gi owirok ma chuny paka wutimere i Kristo, odoko bedi win mayil i miyo jowoti win dwoŋ.
Tiyi win matek, aka wikiri wibedi manyap. Chwayi win ri Ruoth gi chuny win jye.
Weyi geno mewin womiyi win kisangala, diyi win chuny win i teko mewin, aka kwayi win Were hongo jye.
Poki win ye lim mewin gi wutimin win ma jochando, odoko weyi win pechin mewin thwolo ri wendo.
Kwayi win Were womiyi jomalwenyo kodi win silwany; ey, kwayi wi go womiyi jo silwany ma kiweno kwoŋ.
Sangala win gi jomasangala, ywaki win gi jomaywak.
Nyuthi win dhano jye chuny maber marom. Wikiri wibedi jokwoto, to joli win tich kada mapiny. Wikiri wibedi gi paro ni wiryek.
Ka nyatoro otimo ri win marach, wikiri wichul kwor. Temi win timo gima ji jye tero ni ber.
Temi win paka nyalere neno ni wibedo i syem gi ji jye.
Wikiri wichul kwor wiwegi, jowotan; kuchiel weyi win keme pa Were ama wochuli. Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Ruoth wacho ni, ‘Chulo kwor obedo aparan; abino chulo.’ ”
Kuchiel ndiiko wacho ni, “Ka jakwor perin kech neko, pidhi go; ka riyo neko, miyi go giramadha; kole k'itimo ameno, meno chal pa onyo itoko chuk mach ma lyeth i wiye.”
Ikiri iyey recho wodhumin; kuchiel loyi recho gi bero.
Dhano jye ripo winjo or pa ruodhe ma piny; ato ongoye men maradhum ma Were ama koyeyo, aka jodhum ma jonitye Were ama oketho jo.
Nyatoro jye ma pyemo kodi men pa jodhum manitye, meno pyemo kodi gima Were ochano; aka moro jye ma timo ameno bino kelo wach kwoŋe won.
Kole joma timo gimaber jokilwor jodhum, to jomatimo recho ayino ama jolworo. Imito bedo ma bu lworo kwoŋ jadhum? Ere timi gimaber, aka go bino pakin.
Kole go jatich pa Were ma tiyo ri bero perin. To k'itimo recho, lwori go, rupiri jadhum kibedi gi gilweny nono. Go obedo jatich pa Were aka go nyutho joma timo recho keme pa Were.
Ru wach me dhano jye ripo winjo or pa ruodhe, ki nyaka ru keme pajo kende, to ru gima paro ma chunyin nyuthin bende.
Meno bende amomiyo wiripo goyo misolo, rupiri ruodhe jotiyo ri Were ka jotimo tich pajo no.
Amomiyo, chuli win gima wiripo chulo dhano; chuli misolo perin bongi ŋata iripo chulo, kodi lim perin bende ameno; aka wori win ŋata ripere awora, odoko miy dhano jye dwoŋ, ma ripere amiya dwoŋ.
Wikiri wibedi gi banja pa dhano moro jye. Nyaka banja ma wiripo bedo gine meno a marok i dyer win. Nyatoro jye momaro nyawote meno otyeko winjo Chik.
Or ma wacho ni, “Ikiri itim chot, ikiri ineki, ikiri ikwal, ikiri ibedi g'awanya,” jye kodi man oriw kanyachiel i or achiel ni, “Mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.”
Nyatoro jye momaro nyawote kibino timo ri nyawote recho. Amomiyo, marok meno winjo Chik gi bee.
Medo kwoŋ meno, wiŋeyo ndir ma pama ni ndir otundo ri win ma chiew. Kole ndir ma both mawan onyo ochore chiegin loyo munyo nyaka wachako yeyo.
Wor chiegin rumo, aka piny chiegin yawirok. Ri ameno wawey win timo gikipiny mamudho to wakwanyo win gilweny ma lero.
Wabedi win i kwo motire paka ji ma jonitye i lero modyechieŋ, mongoye woro kosa mero, chot kosa kidakana, gorok kosa nyieko.
Kuchiel ruki win Ruoth Yesu Kristo, aka wikiri wiwey hola ri del, ma timo awanya mere.
Joli win i dyer win ŋatanyap i yeyo; to wikiri wipyem gine kwoŋ paro pere.
Yeyo pa ŋatachiel yeyo go chamo gimoro jye, to ŋatanyap i yeyo chamo fufa aŋweta kende.
Ŋata chamo gimoro jye wokiri wochay dhano ma kitim ameno; aka ŋata chamo fufa kende wokiri wothum banja ri ŋata chamo gimoro jye, kole Were otyeko jolo go.
In iŋa m'ithumo banja ri jatich pa ŋat man? Ruoth pere won ama nyalo ridho paka go tiyo maber kosa makiber odocho. Aka bino konyo go wochungi, rupiri Ruoth nyalo miyo go chungo matek.
Ŋatachiel paro ni ndelo achiel loyo ndelo man jye, kareno ŋat man paro ni ndelo jye rom. Dhano jye ripo bedo gi paro pere m'oridho matek.

Ŋata paro kwoŋ ndelo moro ni loyo nyawote timo ameno ka miyo Ruoth dwoŋ, ŋata chamo gimoro bende timo ameno ka miyo Ruoth dwoŋ, rupiri go fuoyo Were ru chiemo no. Onyo ŋata kwero chamo gikipiny mogo bende timo ameno ma miyo Ruoth dwoŋ, aka fuoyo Were.
Ongoye moro kwoŋ wan ma won kwo ri wach pere kende; odoko ongoye ma tho ri go won kende.
Ka wakwo, meno wakwo ri Ruoth odoko ka watho, meno bende watho ri Ruoth. Amomiyo, kada wakwo kosa watho, jye wabedo apa Ruoth.
Kole Kristo otho to chierino ŋey wobedi Ruoth pa jomakwo kodi jomotho jye.
Onyo raŋo m'ithumo banja ri omerin? Aka in! Raŋo m'ichayo omerin? Kole wajojye wabino chungo i nyim Were, go wothumi ri wan banja.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “ ‘Paka akwo,’ Ruoth wacho, ‘dhano jye bino guro chonge i nyiman, Aka dhano jye bino tucho ni abedo Were.’ ”
Amomiyo, dhano jye kwoŋ wan bino tito gima mako kwoŋ kwo pere ri Were.
Amomiyo wawey win thumo banja ri jowoti wan. Kuchiel, me a gima wiripo ridho: wikiri witim gimoro jye ma miyo nyawoti win chier, kosa podho i gimarach.
Riwirok paran kanyachiel gi Ruoth Yesu miyan aŋeyo adyeri ni ongoye gimakoch; kwanyo woko ka dhano oyeyo nike gimoro koch aka gino lokere makoch ri go.
K'imiyo nyawotin ramirok ru gima ichamo, meno kere ikitim gino gi mar. Ikiri imiy chiemo m'ichamo wokel ri nyawotin ma Kristo otho ri go podho.
Ikiri imiy gimitero paka ber wolim nyinge marach.
Kole Ker pa Were kobedo nyaka chiemo gi oro giramadha, to obedo tiro kodi syem kodi kisangala i Chuny Maleŋ.
Aka ŋata tiyo ri Kristo i royo me Were jolo, odoko ji bende fuoyo go.
Amomiyo, ndir jye wakidhi win ri gikipiny ma kelo syem aka konyo wawegi i miyirok men ayin.
Ikiri inyieki tich pa Were ru wach chiemo. Chiemo jye nyalo bedo ni olony achama, to kibedi gimotire chamo gimoro ma bino miyo dhano man podho i gimarach.
Gimotire a weyo chamo riŋo, madho vini, kosa timo gimoro man jye ma miyo omerin podho, kosa chunye ŋedhere, kosa lokere manyap i yeyo.
Ini gi yeyo? Ere maki yeyo perin no paka gima iwon iridho ruwaŋ Were. Jasilwany a ŋata kiwinji banja i chunye ka timo gima go ofuoyo!
To ka nyatoro ganagana kwoŋ gima go chamo, Were thumo banja loyo go ka ochamo gino, rupiri tim pere kochungo kwoŋ yeyo. Aka gimoro jye ma kochungo kwoŋ yeyo meno recho.
Wan ma wategino i yeyo waripo konyo jomanyap gi tiŋo byeto pajo. Kiripi ka wawegi wamiyere kisangala.
Kuchiel, ŋatachielechiele kwoŋ wan ripo miyo jager pere kisangala ma konyo go, ŋey wodongi ŋato i yeyo.
Kole Kristo won komiyere kisangala. Kuchiel, obedo paka ondik ni, “Yet ma jono joyetin gine omakan ayino.”
Kole gimoro jye mondik i kitawo maleŋ ondik ma fuonjo wan, ŋey walim geno i diyo chuny kodi i men ma Ndiiko Maleŋ miyo wan.
Weyi Were ma jadiy chuny ji kendo jadwoki men, womiyi winyal bedo kanyachiel i syem, munyo wiluwo ranen pa Yesu Kristo,
aka nyaka wijojye kanyachiel, gi dwondi win achiel, winyal pako Were kodi Baa Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan.
Amomiyo jolere win paka Kristo ojolo wan, ma miyo Were dwoŋ.
Kole awacho ri win ni Kristo olokere jatich pa jomothumere (Joyudaya) ma nyutho nike Were genere, ma miyo chikirok pa Were m'otimo gi kwarere wan wotundi i kare,
bende gi miyo Jopath pako Were ru wor pere, paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Amomiyo abino kethin walwa i dyer Jopath, Abino wero munyo apako nyingin.”
Odoko wacho ni, “Sangala win, wi Jopath, kanyachiel gi ji pa Were moyer.”
Odoko wacho ni, “Paki win Ruoth, win Jopath jye!” aka weyi nonin jye jowopaki go.
Odoko Isaya wacho ni, “Nyakwar Yese lebino; Ibino tiŋo go malo wodhumi Jopath, Aka Jopath jobino ketho geno pajo i go.”
Were ma geno wok bonge wonyali poŋo win gi kisangala jye kodi syem chungo kwoŋ yeyo mewin, ŋey geno mewin womedere dongo gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ.
Wutimera, awon ani gi geno kwoŋ win, nike withoth gi bero, nike wipoŋ gi ryeko, aka wiwegi winyalo fuonjo jowoti win.
To kada ameno, i balwa ma atyeko ndiko ri win, abedo gi miseni kwoŋ gikipiny mogo ma apoyo win, ru ŋono ma Were opokan
ma bedo jatich pa Kristo Yesu ma tiyo ri Jopath. Atiyo paka jachwayi ri Were wi alitar kareno atito Wach Maber ma wok bongi Were, ŋeyi Jopath jowobedi mich ma Were jolo, ma Chuny Maleŋ olonyo ri go.
Amomiyo, i Kristo Yesu, anyalo bedo g'atoŋa ma yumirok gi tich paran ri Were.
Aka akibino yumirok gi giman ma kiweno gima Kristo otyeko timo munyo oran i miyo Jopath winjo Were, i yo ma wach kodi tim,
gi men ma wok'iye ranyuth kodi giraura, gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ pa Were. Gino omiyo kama awoth'iye jye, chako Yerusalem tundo Ilirikam, atyeko tito Wach Maber kwoŋ Kristo kichutho.
Amomiyo gima aasa yenyo timo obedo tito Wach Maber kama fuodi kowinj'iye kwoŋ Kristo, ŋey akir alwowere kwoŋ tich ma ŋat man otyeko chako.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Joma fuodi kowachi ri jo kwoŋ go jobino neno, aka joma fuodi jokowinjo jobino niaŋ.”
Meno a gima onwaŋo omonan ndir madit bino bongi win.
To paka achowo tich paran i adech me, odoko paka atyeko yenyo bino neno win oro mathoth,
onyo ageno timo ameno pama. Amito neno win ka amako royo makidho yu Spain, winyal konyan i nger ma kidho koro, ka atyekoye kisangala i lyewo win hongo moromo.
Gunyoni, akidho Yerusalem tiyo ri ji pa Were koro.
Kole kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Masedonia kodi Yunani joridho paro ma miyo mich ma konyo jochandi i dyer ji pa Were ma Yerusalem.
Jo wegi joridho timo ameno; aka i adyeri joripo konyo jo; kole Joyudaya jopoko silwany pajo kodi Jopath, amomiyo Jopath bende joripo konyo Joyudaya gi silwany pajo ma gikipiny ma piny.
Ka achowo tich me, kareno atyeko tero ri jo pesa mochoki ri jo, nyaka abino mako yo ma kidho Spain, to alyewo win ka akidho yu korago.
Ka abino bongi win, aŋeyo ni alebino gi silwany pa Kristo mopoŋ.
Wutimera, agoyo ri win koko, i Ruoth Yesu Kristo kodi kwoŋ mar pa Chuny Maleŋ; riwere win kodan i kwayo mochwiny bongi Were,
nike go wokuran i bero kwoŋ jomakoyeyo i Yudeya, ŋey ji pa Were jowojoli tich paran i Yerusalem.
Amomiyo alebino bongi win gi kisangala mopoŋ, ka obedo mito pa Were, kareno awinjo syem i wendo paran bongi win.
Were ma kelo ri wan syem wobedi kodi wijojye. Ameno.
Afuoyo ri win nyamin wan Febe, ma tiyo paka jakony i kitipa pa jomoyeyo i Kenkereya.
Joli win go i nyingi Ruoth, paka ripere ri ji pa Were, aka miyi win go kony jye ma go omiti bongi win; kole go otyeko bedo jakony ri ji mathoth ma kir ran bende.
Mothi ran Prisila kodi Akwila, jotich jowotan i Kristo Yesu,
ma jojala kwo pajo ran. Aketho jo walwa, aka ki an kendan, to kitipa pa jomoyeyo pa Jopath jye bende.
Mothi ran kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma romo i ot pajo. Mothi ran mere paran ma kachunyan Epeneto, mobedo ŋat marapena i adech ma Asya i yeyo Kristo.
Mothi ran Marya, motyeko tich tektek ri win.
Mothi ran Androniko kodi Yuniya, Joyudaya jowotan ma jobedo i twech kodan; jojye joŋeyere maber i dyer jomoor, aka jolokere jokristo ma fuodi an.
Mothi ran Ampulyato, mere paran i Ruoth.
Mothi ran Urubano, jatich nyawotan i Kristo, kodi Sitako, mere paran swa.
Mothi ran Apele, ma chwirok pere kwoŋ Kristo oŋeyere maber. Mothi ran jopecho pa Aristobulo.
Mothi ran Herodyon, Jayudaya nyawotan kodi jokristo wutimin wan i pecho pa Narukiso.
Teri moth paran ri Turifena kodi Turifosa, mon ma jotiyo tektek i Ruoth. Mothi ran jawodhan swa, Pasis, motyeko timo kweth tich ri Ruoth.
Adhiro moth ri Rufo, jatich moŋeyere i tich pa Ruoth, kodi ri min, ma hongo jye oteran paka wuode.
Teri moth paran ri Asinkurito, Fulegon, Herume, Paturoba, Heruma, kodi wutimere i Kristo jye ma jo ni kanyachiel gi jo.
Mothi ran Filologo kodi Julya, Nereyo kodi nyamin, Olimpa kodi ji pa Were jye ma jonitye bongi jo.
Mothere win akor i leŋo. Kitipa pa jomoyeyo Kristo jye jodhiro ri win moth pajo.
Wutimera, agoyo ri win koko ni kure win kwoŋ joma kelo pokirok aka jogeŋo ri win royo gi gima opokere kodi fuonji ma wityeko jolo; eye win kwoŋ jo.
Kole joma timo gikipiny ma kite no jokitiy ri Kristo Ruodhiwan, to jotiyo ri iyi gin wegi gi wach pajo mamit kodi luwo ma dwoŋo paro pa joma onwaŋo jongoye gi racho.
Dhano jye otyeko winjo chwirok mewin kwoŋ Wach Maber, aka ru wach me josangala swa gi win. Amito wibedi maryek kwoŋ gimaber, aka ma wikitim recho.
Aka Were ma miyo wan syem, bino ŋinyo woko Sitan i par tyendi win i yoto. Ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo wobedi gi win.
Timotheyo, jatich nyawotan, bende dhiro ri win moth; kanyachiel gi Lusyo, Jason kodi Sosipate, Joyudaya jowotan.
An Terutiyo, jandiiko gi kalamu i balwa me, abende adhiro ri win moth paran ma nyakristo.
Gayo, won pecho ma an kodi jomoyeyo waromo i ot pere ka, dhiro ri win moth pere; Erasto, jatel ma tich ma tindi, kodi omin wan Kwaruto jye jodhiro ri win moth.
[Ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo wobedi kodi win. Ameno]
Weyi wamiy Were dwoŋ ma nyalo miyo wichungo matek i yeyo, i Wach Maber m'afuonjo win, mikwenda kwoŋ Yesu Kristo, kodi kwoŋ nyutho adyeri ma nyaliŋliŋ monwaŋo opan oro kweth mokadho.
To pama adyeri no otyek wodho kamaler i ndiiko pa jotuchi wach Were; kodi i or pa Were ma chil gi chil, ma onyo imiyo nonin jye ŋeyo, aka ji jye jowoŋeyi odoko jowowinji.
Ri Were ma nitye achiel kende maryek, dwoŋ wobedi kwoŋ Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan chil gi chil. Ameno.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, ma i mito pa Were olwoŋ bedo jamoor pa Kristo Yesu, jokodi omin wan Sostheno,

Ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were ma nitye Korinthya, ri ji jye molwoŋ bedo ji pa Were, ma jobedo apere i riwirok gi Kristo Yesu, kanyachiel gi ji jye ma kamoro jye ma jolwoŋo nyingi Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, Ruoth mawan gi jo.
Were Baa wan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo jowomiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Ndir jye aketho Were paran walwa ri win, ru ŋono momiyo win kwoŋ Yesu Kristo.
Kole i riwirok gi Kristo wilokere joŋaŋo i gimoro jye, tektek mere i luwo kodi i ryeko mewin
paka mikwenda ma mako kwoŋ Kristo otyeko ridhere i kwo mewin
to miyo wikichandi mich moro jye ka wikuro nike Ruoth Yesu Kristo womenyere kamaler.
Go bino miyo wichungo matek chuka gike, aka nyaka ibino nwaŋo win ma bu racho i Ndelo pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
Were molwoŋo win riwirok gi Wuode Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan genere.

Agoyo koko ri win wutimera i nyingi Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo: Yeyere win wijojye, i gima wiwacho, aka nyaka tyakirok wokiri wobedi i dyer win; riwere win swa munyo winitye gi paro achiel kodi atoŋa achiel.
Ato ji megi ma jowok pecho pa Kilowe jodhiro ran wach nike dhawirok nitye i dyer win, wutimera.
Weyi awachi ama: kis dhano kwoŋ win wacho gipere, ni “An aluwo Apolo, ” ŋat man ni “An aluwo Petro” ŋat man ni “An aluwo Kristo.”
Nyutho nike Kristo opokere i dyere? Kere Paulo am'otho wi musalaba ri win? Kosa batisimo ma wilimo obedo i nyingi Paulo?
Afuoyo Were nike akimiyo win batisimo, kwanyo woko Kurispo kodi Gayo.
Amomiyo, ongoye ŋata nyalo wacho ni wilimo batisimo i nyingan paka jofuonjirok paran.
(Ey, abatisa Stefano kodi pecho pere bende; to akipoy ni abatisa ŋat man kendo.)
Kole Kristo kooran kibatisa ji, to tito Wach Maber ayin, ma ki gi ryeko ma nyadhanodhano, rupiri d'omiyo tho pa Kristo bedo ma bu men.
Kole mikwenda ma mako kwoŋ tho pa Kristo wi musalaba obedo gimiŋo ri jono ma jobino rwenyo; to ri wan ma wabino both, obedo men pa Were.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Abino reyo woko ryeko pa jomaryek, to adhiro gi chien niaŋ pa jomofuonjere.”
Onyo nyaka ni kune ŋataryek? Nikune jondiiko? Nikune jopyem majoryek ma pama? Kole Were otyeko nyutho ni ryeko ma piny ka meno miŋo ayin!
Kole Were i ryeko pere omito ni ji kiri jowoŋeyi go gi ryeko pajo wegi. Kuchiel Were oridho botho jomayeyo, gi mikwenda ma wafuonjo ma wiŋoyo ni miŋo.
Joyudaya joyenyo giraura paka giranena, aka Joyunani jodwaro ryeko.
To wan, watito Kristo mogur kwoŋ musalaba, mikwenda mobedo yet ri Joyudaya kodi miŋo ri Jopath,
to ri jomolwoŋ i dyer Joyudaya gi Joyunani, obedo Kristo mobedo men pa Were gi ryeko pa Were.
Kole gima chale p'obedo miŋo pa Were fuodi ryek loyo ryeko pa ji. Aka gima chale p'obedo nyapo pa Were ni gi men loyo men pa ji.
Onyo poyi win paka oido winitye munyo Were olwoŋo win. Jomanok kwoŋ win ama di piny oneno paka jomaryek, kosa joma ni gi men, kosa joma ni gi dwoŋ i neno pa dhano.
To Were otimo atoŋa yero gima piny ŋisa ni gimiŋo ŋey wokwoti gine wiyi jomaryek, kodi gima piny tero paka nyap wokwoti gine wiyi jomen.
Were Oyero gima piny ŋisa aka chayo, aka paro ni meno ki gimoro, ŋey wonyieki woko gima piny paro nike gimadwoŋ.
Meno aka wongoye dhano ma nyalo pakirok i waŋ Were.
Were ama okelo win i riwirok gi Kristo Yesu, to loko Kristo bedo ryeko mawan, tiro mawan gi leŋo mawan, kodi chul ma gimarecho mawan to walimo syem.
Amomiyo, ndiiko wacho ni, “Ŋata mito pakirok wopakere i Ruoth.”
Wutimera, munyo abino bongi win fuonjo adyeri pa Were mopanere, akioro wach maboyo kodi ryeko mamalo.
Kendo akimito ŋeyo giman jye kwoŋ win munyo fuodi anitye gi win kwanyo woko Yesu Kristo, aka mogur wi musalaba.
Amomiyo munyo abino bongi win oido men oloyan kareno akirin ru lworo.
Aka luwo paran gi mikwenda paran kobedo i luwo ma ryeko pa ji, to i nyutho kamaler men pa Chuny Maleŋ,
ŋey yeyo mewin, wokiri wothenere kwoŋ ryeko pa dhano, to kwoŋ men pa Were ayin.
Kada ameno, waluwo gi ryeko ri joma jotegino i yeyo. To kobedo ryeko ma ndir me, kosa apa jodhum ma pama, ma jokidho reyirok woko.
Ryeko ma wafuonjo obedo ryeko pa Were mopanere, mopan ri ji, ma Were oido otyeko yiko miyo wan wok chon ma piny fuodi kochwey.
Ongoye kada achiel kwoŋ jodhum ma pama moido oŋeyo ryeko me. Bedi joŋeyi di jokoguro Ruoth mopoŋ gi dwoŋ kwoŋ musalaba.
To paka ndiiko wacho: “Gima dhano fuodi koneno kosa kowinjo wok chiene, gima dhano fuodi koparo kwoŋe ni d'otimere a gima Were oyiko ri jomomaro go.”
To Were onyutho wan nyaliŋliŋ me luwo i Chuny Maleŋ pere. Ato Chuny Maleŋ udo gimoro jye, kada gimoro mopanere kamadiny i Were.
To ŋa ma di ŋey paro pa dhano kwanyo woko chuny dhano won ma nitye i go? Meno bende apaka Chuny Maleŋ pa Were won amoŋeyo paro pa Were.
Wakilimo chuny ma nyapiny, to walimo Chuny mowok bongi Were, ma miyo waniaŋ kwoŋ gimoro jye ma Were omiyo wan ma nono.
Meno a wach ma waluwo; wakiluw wach ma ryeko ma dhano amofuojo wan, to waluwo gima Chuny Maleŋ ama fuonjo wan, aka watito adyeri ma Chuny ri joma bende jonitye gi Chuny Maleŋ.
To ŋata ongoye gi Chuny kinyal limo mich ma wok bongi Chuny Maleŋ pa Were, rupiri obedo ri go gimiŋo: aka go kinyal niaŋ kwoŋe, kwoŋbedo dwoŋ mere niaŋere ri ŋata bende ni gi Chuny Maleŋ pa Were.
Ŋata nitye gi Chuny nyalo niaŋ kwoŋ gimoro jye, aka ongoye ŋata niaŋ kwoŋ gima ni kwoŋ go.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Ŋata di ŋey paro pa Ruoth aka womedi miyo go ryeko?” To wan, wanitye gi paro pa Kristo.
To wutimera, akinyalo luwo gi win paka joma nitye gi Chuny; to paka ji ma nyapiny, paka nyidhindho maŋich i yeyo manyakristo.
Apidho win gi chak ma kiweno chiemo matek, rupiri oido fuodi wikiyikere, aka kada pama jye fuodi wikiyikere,
kwoŋbedo fuodi kwo mewin obedo manyadel. Ka witimo nyieko wiwegi aka widhawere, meno kinyuthi paka fuodi wibedo ji ma kis ndelo munyo wioro kula mere?
Ka ŋatachiel kwoŋ win wacho ni, “An aluwo Paulo,” man ni, “An aluwo Apolo,” meno wikibedo ji ma kis ndelo?
Onyo, Apolo a ŋa? Aka Paulo a ŋa? Kole wabedo nyaka jotich pa Were ma jokelo ri win yeyo. Kis dhano kwoŋ wan otimo nyaka tich ma Ruoth omiyo go timo.
Apidho kodhi, Apolo oywoy'iye pi, to Were won amomiyo gimopidhi dongo.
Amomiyo gima mako kwoŋ ŋata opidho kosa ŋata oywoy'iye pi ama kobedo gima dwoŋ, kwanyo woko Were ma miyo gimoro dongo ama dwoŋ.
Japidho kodi jaywoyi pi jye jorom aroma; Were bino miyo jo kemba chungo kwoŋ tich ma jotimo.
Kole wariwere kanyachiel i tich ri Were, aka wibedo ndelo pa Were kodi geto pere.
Munyo aoro mich ma Were omiyan, atimo tich paka jandijo ma geto moketho tyendi ot, aka ŋat man ama onyo geto i kore. Aka dhano jye ripo gwoko paka go medo tich kwoŋ ot no.
Ato ongoye tyendi ot man ma nyatoro di chaki kendo, kwanyo woko motyeki chako no won, mobedo Yesu Kristo.
Joman jobino oro zawabu, feza, kosa telin mawelo wi tyendi ot no; aka joman mbawo, lum mothwo, kosa kanja.
Aka bero ma tich pa kis dhano bino nenere munyo Ndelo pa Kristo thango gino kamaler, rupiri mach ma Ndelo no bino kikaŋasa tich pa dhano jye; mach no bino kipima to nyutho bero kosa racho mere.
Ka nyatoro ogeti wi tyendi ot no to tich pere chiro mach, go bino limo kemba.
To ka tich pa moro owaŋi woko, go bino keŋ kemba mere kada nende go won bino both ri go, to kareno leboth igani obudhere owok i mach.
Wikuya nike wibedo Ot pa Were, aka Chuny Maleŋ pa Were bedo i win?
Ŋata nyieko Ot pa Were, Were bino reyo go Woko, rupiri Ot pa Were leŋ aka wiŋati wibedo Ot ago.
Moro wokiri wowondere. Ka moro kwoŋ win paro nike go ryek i hongo ma pama me, go ripo bedo pa ŋatamiŋ, ŋey wolokere ŋataryek.
Kole gima piny tero paka ryeko meno gimiŋo ri Were, rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Were chiiko jomaryek i ryeko pajo.”
Aka ndiiko man wacho ni, “Ruoth oŋeyo nike paro pa jomaryek ongoye kony.”
Amomiyo, ongoye pakirok moro jye kwoŋ gima dhano nyalo timo. Kole gimoro jye obedo mewin:
Paulo, kosa Apolo, kosa Petro, kosa piny me, kwo gi tho, kosa hongo ma pama kodi ma bino; me jye mewin.
Aka wibedo apa Kristo. Aka Kristo obedo apa Were.
Wiripo neno wan paka jotich pa Kristo, momiy jo adyeri pa Were mopanere.
Onyo gima yenyere kwoŋ dhano moketh i tich meno a genirok ri ruoth pere.
Aka, akidew kada onyo withum ran banja, kosa kapido ma piny me ama thum; kada awon akithum banja paran.
An awon akinen racho moro ma ani gine to meno kinyuthi nike angoye gi racho. Ruoth ama thumo ran banja.

Amomiyo wikiri withum ri nyatoro banja ma fuodi ndir kotundo. Kutho kur win bino pa Ruoth, ma bino wodho i lero gimoro jye mopondo i mudho kendo bino thango kamaler atoŋa ma chuny ji. I hongo no ama nyaka dhano jye bino lim'iye pak ma ripo gine wok bongi Were.
Wutimera, ma konyo win, aluwo kwoŋ Apolo kodan paka ranen, ŋey winiaŋ dwoŋ wach mondik ni, “Maki chik motire.” Meno aka bino ngoye kwoŋ win ŋata pakere gi dhano achiel to chayo ŋat man.
Aka ŋa ma neno gimopokere i in? Aŋo m'ini gine ma komiyin amiya? To inyalo kwot nedi, igani gima ini gine kobedo mich?

Kole kere wityeko ri win limo gimoro jye ma wiyenyo! Wityeko ŋaŋo! Wityeko lokirok kerin, kada wawegi wakibedo ameno! Bedi nyalere di wibedo kerin adyeri, aka di wabende wabedo kerin kanyachiel gi win.
Kole chali ran pa Were omiyo wan jomoor kabedo machowe swa, pa ji mothum ri jo banja matho, rupiri walokere giranena ri jomalaika kodi ji ma piny.
Wabedo jomamiŋ kwoŋbedo Kristo; to wiryeki ri win i Kristo! Wanyap, to witek ri win! Ochay wan, to win omiy win dwoŋ!
Kir gi pama fuodi wanitye gi kech kodi riiyo; waruko oselin; igoyo wan; wangoye gi pechin;
watiyo matek gi chingi wan aka walimo gikonyirok. Ka dhano okwoŋo wan, wamiyo go silwany ayin; ka ilwenyo gi wan, wachiro;
ka oyet wan, wadwoko wach i bero. Watyeko lokere yuk ma piny; aka kir pama won me wachal ri wan chwodho.
Andiko ri win ama ki ru mito kwoto wiy win; to atimo ama ma fuonjo win paka nyithindho paran ma kachunyan.
Kole kada wibedi gi jofuonji gana apar i kwo mewin, i Kristo winitye gi baa win achiel kende. Kole i kwo mewin i Kristo Yesu alokere baa win munyo akelo ri win Wach Maber.
Amomiyo, akwayo win ni luwi win kite paran paka ranen ma amiyo win.
Atoŋa me amomiyo adhiro ri win Timotheyo wuodan mamaro kendo mogenere i Ruoth. Go bino poyo win royo m'aluwo i Kristo Yesu, odoko m'afuonjo i kweth pa jokristo iye jye.
Jomegi kwoŋ win jopakere ka joparo ni kono akobin bongi win.
To ka Ruoth oyeyo, alebino bongi win mayot, aka abino neno men pa jopakirok no, ma kiweno nyaka luwo pajo kende!
Kole ker pa Were kobedo nyaka luwo kende, to obedo meni.
Mene ma wifuoyo? Abin bongi win g'adasa, kosa gi mar kodi mwolo?
Kole wawinjo ni chot nitye i dyer win moasare gima kitimere kada i dyer jokafiri; owachi ran nike nitye nyatoro mobedo gi chi bamere!
Meno a gima miyo win kwoto? Kole d'onyo wiwinjo gi rem ayin to wiryemo woko ŋata timo gino wok i kweth mewin.
Kada nende anitye bor gi win i del, to anitye gi win i chuny; aka atyeko kir thumo banja loyo ŋat'otimo gimarach no igani anitye gi win kenyo.
Ka wiromo kanyachiel, aka abende ani gi win i chunyan, gi men pa Ruodhiwan Yesu ma nitye gi wan,
wiripo chwayo ŋat me ri Sitan wonyieki delkwoŋe, g'awanya mere ŋey chunye wolimi both i ndelo pa Ruoth Yesu.
Kwoto mewin no kiripi! Wikuya ni, “Thow kada mathin nyalo miyo moko modwany gipi yenyo?”

Wiripo kwanyo woko thow machon ma gimarecho aka nyaka wibino bedo ma wilony. Aka ŋey wibino chale kodi moko modwany ma bu thow, paka aŋeyo nike wibedo ameno adyeri. Kole Kristo, nyathi rombo mawan ma kalima ma Kadho, otyek miyo ri wan.
Amomiyo onyo weyi watim kalima mawan, to ki gi mugat moketh'iye thow machon, marathuye kodi gimarecho, to kodi mugat ma bu thow, ma di tiro kodi adyeri.
I balwa m'andiko ri win awacho ni wikiri wimakere kodi jomodakana.
Akiluw kwoŋ jokafiri ma jodakana kosa joworo, kosa jokwo, kosa jolami chal makichar ma piny me. Kole bedi ameno d'onyo wiweyo piny ka kichutho!

Gima akidho ri go obedo nike wikiri wimakere gi dhano ma lwoŋere ni oyeyo to odakana, wor, kosa lamo chal makichar, kosa janyieki nyingi wadi, kosa jamero kosa jakwo. Wikiri wibedi kada piny chiemo gi dhano ma pameno.
Aŋo ma di miyan athum banja ri joma woko? Kole joma ni dyer jomoyeyo ama winyalo thumo ri jo banja!
Were won bino thumo banja ri joma ni woko paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Kwanyi win woko ŋatarach i dyer win.”
Ka ŋatachiel kwoŋ win nitye gi pyem g'omin, go nyalo nedi kidho bongi jothumi banjin ma jokafiri, kama di wey ji pa Were wegi jowochowi wach no?
Wikuya ni ji pa Were jobino thumo ri piny banja? To ka wiŋati wilethumo ri piny banja, thumo banjin mathindho nyalo dhyero win nedi?
Wikuya ni wabino thumo banjin ri jomalaika? K'inen ameno, banjin ma kwo me d'odhyer wan thumo nedi?
Amomiyo ka wach ma chalo ameno obino, iraŋo witero woko both ji ma jokristo jochayo ni ama jowochowi?
Meno awacho ma kwoto wiy win! Ongoye kada ŋatachiel i dyer win maryek ma nyalo chowo dhawirok ma nitye i dyer jomoyeyo!
Kuchiel dhano kidho i kapido g'omin to miyo jokafiri ama jothumo banja ri jo.

Iyadyeri, k'inen witero kiŋunyaŋya mewin i kawinjo banjin ma piny ka, nyutho nike wipodho swa. Thimba di wikidiyo chuny win ka moro otimo ri win marach? Iraŋo di wikidiyo chuny win ka nyatoro omayo win gimoro?
Kuchiel wiwegi witimo recho ri jowoti win: mayirok gikipiny, kir apa jomoyeyo jowot win won!

Wikuya ni jomarecho jokibino donjo i Ker pa Were? Moro wokiri wowondi win: Ongoye jokidakana, kosa jolami chal makichar, kosa mon ma jotana delkwoŋ jo i timo gi wichkwot, kosa jotimi chot, kosa joma timo kidakana chwo gi chwo wadi gin aka mon bende gi mon wadi gin,
kosa jokwo, kosa jomero, kosa jonyieki nyingi wadi gin, kosa jomiten ma jokwalo, ma bino donjo i Ker pa Were. Aka megi kwoŋ win oido wibedo ameno.
To onyo otyek lonyo win kwoŋ gimarach: oketh win i tiro gi Were i nyingi Ruoth Yesu Kristo gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ pa Were mawan.
Nyatoro nyalo wacho ni, “Kole oyeyan timo gimoro jye.” Ey, to bero kinyal bedo i kis gimoro. Abende anyalo wacho ni oyeyan timo gimoro jye, to akibino yeyo gimoro wolokan ŋecha pere.
Ŋat man bino wacho ni, “Kole chiemo obedo ri ich, aka ich bende ri chiemo.” Ey, to Were bino reyo woko gino jye. Delkwoŋ dhano kotim ri kidakana to ri Ruoth ayin; aka Ruoth bende bedo ri del.
Were ochierino Ruoth kwoŋ jomotho, aka go bende bino chierino wan i men pere.
Wikuya ni delkwoŋ win obedo adeche ma delkwoŋ Kristo? Onyo akwany adech ma delkwoŋ Kristo aloki delkwoŋ dhano ma tana delkwoŋe i timo gi wichkwot? Kinyalere!
Kosa miti wikuya ni ŋata riwo delkwoŋe kodi apa ŋatochale ameno lokere achiel gine? ndiiko wacho ni, “Jaryo jobino lokere del achiel.”
Aka ŋata bedo i achiel gi Ruoth lokere achiel i chunye kodi go.
Weyere win gi kidakana! Gimarach man ma dhano timo kimaki delkwoŋe to ŋata timo chot timo gimarach kwoŋ delkwoŋe won.
Ikuya ni delkwoŋin obedo Ot pa Chuny Maleŋ ma bedo i in, ma Were omiyini? Ikibedo aperin won, to apa Were.
Go onyiewo win gi welo mamalo. Amomiyo ori win delkwoŋ win ri dwoŋ pa Were.
Onyo wey wanen wach ma windiko ran kwoŋe: Dhano timo maber ka konywomo,
to paka timo gi wichkwot oasere, jachwo jye ripo bedo gi chiege; aka dhako jye ripo bedo gi chwore.
Jachwo ripo timo ri chiege gima dheno yenyo kwoŋ go, odoko dhako bende ripo timo ameno ri chwore.
Dhako monywomere won kidhum delkwoŋe, to chwore ama dhumo; i royo achiel jadhako won bende kidhum delkwoŋe, to chiege ama dhumo.

Wikiri wikwerere, kwanyo woko ka wiyeyere wijaryo timo ameno chowo hongo machiek, ŋey wilim hongo ma kwayo; to giki win mayot i kwo ma nywomirok, kakameno chiro mewin manok nyalo miyo widonjo i karatem pa Sitan.
Awacho ri win gime ki paka or, to paka ryeko m'amiyo win ayin.
D'ayeny ni ji jye jowobedi paka an; to kis dhano nitye gi mich ma Were omiyo go mopokere; ŋatachiel mich me, ŋat man mecha.
Onyo awacho gime ri joma konywomere kodi mon ma chwogi jo otho: d'obedo maber ri win bedo kendiwin paka an.
To ka wikinyal chiro awanya mewin, kidhi win winywomere; kole ber nywomirok loyo waŋ g'awanya.
Anitye gi or ri jomonywomere, aka kobedo aparan to apa Ruoth: dhako monywomere kiripi weyo chwore;
aka ka go otimo ameno, go ripo bedo kende kosa gik bongi chwore; odoko jachwo kiripi ryemo chiege.
Ri joman awacho (an won, ki Ruoth) ni: ka jachwo ma jakristo nitye gi chiege mongoye gi yeyo to dheno yeyo bedo gine, jalo kiripi woryemi go.
Odoko ka dhako ma jakristo nitye kodi chwore mongoye gi yeyo, to jalo yeyo bedo gine, go kiripi pokirok gi jalo.

Kole Were jolo jachwo mongoye gi yeyo ru riwirok gi chiege, aka dhako mongoye gi yeyo bende Were jolo ru riwirok gi chwore ma jakristo. Bedi kobedo ameno, di nyithindho pajo jobedo paka nyithindho ma nyakafiri; to paka nitye, Were jolo jo.
To ka ŋata bu yeyo mito pokirok kodi nyawote ma jakristo, weyi go wotimi ameno. I wach ma chalo ameno, jakristo mobedo jachwo kosa dhako, nitye gi syem ma yero; kole Were olwoŋin bedo i syem.
Iŋeyo nedi, in dhako ma jakristo, nike ikobothi chworin? Kosa iŋeyo nedi in jachwo ma jakristo, nike ikobothi chiegin?
Dhano jye ripo doŋ i kwo ma Ruoth olwoŋ'iye go. Me a chik ma afuonjo i kitipa pa jokristo jye.

Nitye ŋata onwaŋo otyeko thumirok i hongo ma Kristo olwoŋ'iye go? Kiripi ŋato wotemi kwanyo woko waŋ poyo ma thumirok. Kosa nitye ŋata onwaŋo fuodi kothumere i hongo ma Were olwoŋ'iye go? Kiripi ŋato woyenyi thumirok.
Kole thumirok kosa bedo ma dhano kothumere meno ama kobedo gima dwoŋ. Gimadwoŋ meno a winjo or pa Were.
Dhano jye ripo doŋ paka oido nitye munyo ojolo lwoŋo pa Were.
Oido ibedo ŋecha munyo Were olwoŋini? Ikiri idew; to k'inyalo nwaŋo syem perin, timi ameno.
Kole dhano ma Ruoth olwoŋo munyo ŋecha lokere dhano pa Were mani syem; aka rom aroma gi ŋata onwaŋo nitye i syem munyo olwoŋ go, ma lokere ŋecha pa Kristo.
Were onyiewo win i welo mamalo, amomiyo wikiri wilokere ŋechin pa ji.
Wutimera, dhano jye ripo doŋ i Were paka go oido nitye i hongo m'olwoŋ'iye go.
Onyo ma mako kwoŋ joma konywomere, akinwaŋo or bongi Ruoth, to akelo paro paran paka ŋata ru wor pa Ruoth ripere agena.
Chungo kwoŋ teko ma pama nitye, aparo ni ber ri dhano jye doŋ adoŋa paka go nitye.
Inywomo kosa inywomere? Ere ikiri item pokirok gi nyawotin. Ikinywomo kosa ikinywomere? Ere ikiri irangi dhako kosa jachwo.
To ka inywomo, ikitimo gimarach, odoko ka nyako onywomere, bende kotimo gimarach. To joma nywomo kosa nywomere jobino bedo gi teko madit i kwo me, aka oido ayenyo konyo jo kwoŋ gino.
Jowotan, me a dwoŋ gima awacho: hongo modoŋ nok, aka wok konon kadho malo jomonywomo jowobedi igani joma konywomo;
jomaywak, igani joma kiywaki; jomasangala, igani jomongoye gi kisangala; joma nyiewere, igani gikipiny ma jonyiewo k'apajo;
joma oro gikipiny ma piny, igani gikipiny no komayo jo hongo moro jye. Kole piny me, paka pama nitye, kibino odoko kiyindira.
Amito wingoye kodi rembo. Jachwo ma konywomo ketho chunye i tich pa Ruoth, rupiri go rango yo ma kisangala Ruoth;
to jachwo monywomo ketho chunye i gikipiny ma piny, rupiri go mito kisangala chiege,

aka chunye tero go korin gi korin. Dhako ma konywomere kosa nyako ketho chunye i tich pa Ruoth, rupiri go yenyo miyirok ri Ruoth i chunye kodi i del bende; to dhako monywomere ketho chunye i gikipiny ma piny, rupiri go rango yo ma kisangala chwore.
Awacho gime rupiri amito konyo win. Akitem ketho win i dinyo. Kuchiel amito witim gimotire m'oripo, kareno wimiyere i tich pa Ruoth mongoye ruwo paro.

K'inen jayach motyeko penjirok gi nyako onyo neno ni go timo gima kiripi ri nyawote no, aka nyako no oro pere kadho, aka go paro ni joripo nywomirok, ere jowotimi ameno paka go mito; ongoye kenyo gimarach.
To ka jachwo won otyeko ridho i chunye ni lenywom, mongoye ŋata romo go, to won thumo paro pere, timo maber.
Amomiyo, jachwo ma nywomo nyako pere no timo maber, to ŋata weyo ma konywomo, timo maber loyo.
Chik tweyo dhako monywomere kwoŋ chwore tekin chwore fuodi kwo; to ka chwore otho, go nitye gi syem ma nywomirok gi jachwo man ma go omiti; to wobedi i Ruoth.
To go d'obedo gi kisangala loyo, ka go odoŋ paka go nitye. Meno paro paran, aka aparo ni abende anitye gi Chuny Maleŋ pa Were.

Onyo, i wach ma mako kwoŋ chiemo mochow gine chal makichar: Ato adyeri, “Wajojye wani gi ŋeyo kwoŋ wach,” paka jowacho. Ŋeyo no adyeri, kelo ri dhano winjirok nono; to mar ama miyo dhano dongo i yeyo.
Dhano nyalo paro nike go oŋeyo gimoro, to kere fuodi ongoye gi ŋeyo motire ma go oido ripo bedo gine.
To ŋata omaro Were, Were ŋeyo go.
Amomiyo, i wach ma mako kwoŋ chamo chiemo mochow gine chal makichar: waŋeyo ni chal ma kichar kobedo gima ni gi kwo i piny ka; aka adyeri waŋeyo ni Were nitye achiel kende mongoye man.
Kada bedi ni gikipiny man milwoŋo ni, “werin”, oido nitye kuya i polo kosa i piny ka, (aka gikipiny milwoŋ ni, “werin” kodi “ruodhe” no, jothoth),

to ri wan Were nitye achiel kende, Were Bawan, mochweyo gikipiny jye, ma gimoro jye wok bonge; ma wakwo ri go; odoko Ruoth nitye achiel kende, Yesu Kristo, ma i go gikipiny jye ochwey, aka go ama miyo wakwo.

To ki ji jye ma jonitye gi ŋeyo i gime. Jomegi oido joasa ŋiiyo gi chal makichar ma kir konon ka jochamo nger chiemo no fuodi joparo nike meno chiemo mochow gine chal makichar; aka paka paro pajo fuodi nyap, joneno ni chiemo no onyo obedo gimakoch.
To chiemo k'ama kel wan chiegin gi Were; odoko wakikeŋ gimoro kada wakichiemo, kendo wakilim gimoro kada wachiemi.
To kure win, rupiri syem mewin nyalo lokere gima redho jomanyap i yeyo.
Ka dhano ma paro pere nyap i wach me nenin, in m'iŋoyo ni initye gi ŋeyo nago, munyo ichiemo i migam mapa chal makichar, gino komedi go men ma chamo chiemo mochow gine chal makichari?
Ameno ŋatanyap me, mobedo omerin ma Kristo otho ri go, bino rwenyo woko ru wach “ŋeyo” perin!
Aka k'itimo gimarach ameno ri jomoyeyo jowotin, t'imiyo paro ma chuny jo manyap no litho, meno itimo gimarach ri Kristo.
Amomiyo ka chiemo miyo omera timo gimarach, akodoko acham riŋo kendo, ŋey akir aredhi omera i yeyo pere.
Kere angoye gi syemi? Akibedo jamoori? Akityeko neno Yesu Ruodhiwani? Wikibedo jomowok i tich paran i Ruothi?
Kada nende akibedo jamoor ri joman, to aripo bedo ri win! Kole win a ranyuth nike abedo jamoor.
Me a wach ma athyelere gine kwoŋ joma dwaro wach kwoŋan.
Nyutho ni wangoye gi men ma limo chiemo gi giramadha i tich mawani?
Waŋati wakiripi woth gi mon mawan paka jomoor man jotimo, kodi wutimin Ruoth, kodi Petro?
Kosa wan kodi Barunaba kende ama waripo tiyo ri kwo mawan aka walim girachama?
Ŋa ma bedo jaserikale to won chulo gima go oro i lweny? Kosa ŋa ma jafur ma kicham gimanyak ma ndelo vini pere? Kosa jakwath mene ma kior chak ma wok kwoŋ mwendi pere won?
Wiparo ni gima awacho me wok i paro pa dhano? Chik bende kiwachi ameno woni?
Ondik i Chik pa Musa ni, “Ikiri ichul dhoki mirikwa ka ŋinyo rin withi ŋano nyinge wooyi.” Onyo, wiparo ni Were dewo kwoŋ megi kwe ayino kende?
Kosa go kowacho ameno ka luwo kwoŋ wan tektek mere? Kole gino ondik ri wan rupiri jafur furo, jaŋinyo ŋinyo kareno jojye jogeno migewo wok kwoŋ gim'okechi.
Kole watyeko chwoyo kodhi ma chuny i dyer win. Onyo meno waŋati wanyieko ka wanwaŋoye gimoro bongi win?

K'inen joman jo ni gi thwolo ma nwaŋo gimoro bongi win, onyo maraŋo ma wan ama wakigen kada ma loyo meno kwoŋ win? To wakioro thwolo no; kuchiel wachiro gimoro jye ni wakiri wakethi rageŋ i yo pa Wach Maber kwoŋ Kristo.
Kere wikuya nike joma tiyo i Ot pa Were jolimo chiemo pajo i Ot pa Were. Aka jomachwayo wi alitar jolimo pok i tich ma chwayo no.
Meno bende apaka joma tito Wach Maber mapa Ruoth joripo kwo gi wach no won.
To fuodi akioro thwolo no jye kada dichiel, kendo onyo akindiki gime ma kwayo win ni witimi ran ameno. Them onyo atho ma akiweyo nyatoro womayan gima apakere gine me to loko nyaka pa wach awacha.
To akinyal pakirok i tito Wach Maber, rupiri atimo gim'ooran aora. Aka d'obedo ran marach ka akitito Wach Maber me ri ji.
Bedi atimo tich paran paka awon ayero d'ageno limo kemba, to atimo tich ma aripo timo ma Were ama ogenan gine.
Onyo kemba paran aŋo? A me: tito Wach Maber ri ji mongoye chul, kendo ma akioro thwolo moido ani gine ma limo gimoro.
Oido akibedo ran ŋecha pa moro, to onyo awon alokere ŋecha pa dhano jye ŋey ayway ji mathoth paka nyalere.
I dyer Joyudaya abedo paka Jayudaya ŋey ayway jo; i dyer joma luwo Chik pa Musa, abedo paka ŋata luwo Chik (kada onwaŋo awon akibedo jaluwi Chik), ŋey ayway jo.
Ka anitye i dyer Jopath, abende abedo paka Japath woko ma Chik pa Joyudaya, ŋey ayway jo. Me kinyuthi ni akiwinji chik pa Were, rupiri anitye i chik pa Kristo.
Gi jomanyap i yeyo, abedo manyap paka jo, ŋey ayway jo. Amomiyo abedo gimoro jye ri ji jye aka anyal both jomegi kwoŋ jo.
Atimo gime ri bero pa Wach Maber, ŋey wopokan silwany mere.
Wikipoy ni i ŋwech ma pyem, joŋwech jye joringo, to ŋatachiel kende ama limo kemba. Amomiyo ringi chuka ibende ilim kemba.
Jatuko ma pyem moro jye ripo yikirok ka fuonjere chik ma tuko: go timo ameno ŋey wolim sangarya ma kiyindira, to wan walwenyo ri sangarya ma bino kiyindira chil gi chil.
Amomiyo akiringi aringa ameno nono, odoko akiwiti adol paran i hongo nono.
Amiyo del paran fuonji moromo aka wolokere mochwiny munyo adhumo go, ŋey ka atyeko tito ri joman Wach Maber, an awon akir akeŋ kemba mere.
Wutimera, amito wipoy gima otimere gi kwarere mawan ma joluwo Musa. Jojye jowotho i pendi pondeponde, aka jojye joluwo i dyer Wakawaka mobokere.
Jojye jolimo batisimo i pondeponde kodi i wakawaka paka jomaluwo Musa.
Jojye jochamo mugat nger achiel mowok bongi Were,
to jomadho giramadha nger achiel mowok bongi Were; ato jomadho pi mowok i tele mowotho gi jo aka meno oido obedo Kristo won.
To kada ameno Were kosangala kodi jomoloyo i thotho kwoŋ jo, amomiyo obol jo woko i thim to jotho.
Onyo gikipiny me jye obedo giranena ri wan, ma fuonjo wan nike wakiri wawanya gikipiny marecho paka jotimo.
Wikiri wilam chal makichar paka jomegi kwoŋ jo jotimo paka ndiiko wacho ni, “Jonicha jobedo piny chiemo gi medho, to joay myel.”
Wakiri watim chot paka jomegi kwoŋ jo jotimo, to gana pyero aryo g'adek kwoŋ jo tho i ndelo achiel.
Wakiri watem Ruoth, paka jomegi kwoŋ jo jotimo, to thwole neko jo.
Wakiri waŋunyaŋunya, paka jomegi kwoŋ jo jotimo to Malaika majanek reyo jo woko.
Gikipiny me jye otimere paka giranena ri joman, aka ondik ma fuonjo wan ma wanitye i hongo ma giki ndir chiegin tund'iye.
Ŋata paro ni ochungo motire wogwokere ŋey wokiri wopodhi.

Ongoye ratem mogo jye ma bino ri win ma kichale gi ma bino ri dhano jye. Kole Were genere, aka koyey ratem ma bino ri win wokadhi kor win, to ka ratem moro obino, go bino miyo win royo ma both aka ŋey winyal chiro.
Amomiyo, jowotan, gwokere win kwoŋ lamo chal makichar.
Aluwo gi win paka joma niaŋ; wiwegi kaŋasa win gima awacho.
Ka wafuoyo Were ri agwata ma di silwany ma wamadho, meno wakibedo i riwirok achiel gi remo pa Kristo? Aka mugat ma waturo aka wachamo; kobedo riwirok i achiel gi Kristo?
Kole paka mugat nitye achiel onyo wajojye bende, kada wathoth, wabedo del achiel, rupiri wajojye wachamo mugat achiel no.
Pari win kwoŋ Joisrael; joma chamo gima ochowere gine wiy alitar meno jokinitye kanyachiel i tich maralitar?
Gima awacho dwoŋ mere aŋo? Nike chal makichar kosa chiemo mochow gine chal no nitye iye gimoro?
Be, gima awacho obedo ni gima ochowere gine wi migam ma nyakafiri meno ochow gine jwogi, to ki Were. Aka akimiti ni wiriwere gi jwogi.
Wikinyal madho gim'owok i agwata pa Ruoth kodi apa jwogi bende. Wikinyal chiemo dhower pa Were to odoko wichiemo dhower pa jwogi bende.
Onyo wanomiy Ruoth wotimi nyieko? Wiparo nike watek loyo go?
Kada winopar ni, “Chik yeyo wan timo gimoro jye,” to kibedi ni kis gimoro jye di kony.
Wongoye moro ma rango bero pere won kende, to bero pa jowote bende.
Chami gimoro jye mitana i katale, mongoye kiganagana moro jye i paro ma chunyin.
Kole paka ndiiko wacho, “Lowo kodi gimoro jye man'iye obedo apa Ruoth.”
Ka ŋata ongoye gi yeyo olwoŋin chiemo aka iridho kidho, chami gima okethi ruwaŋin mongoye kiganagana moro jye i paro ma chunyin.
To ka moro owacho rin ni, “Me chiemo mochow gine chal makichar,” onyo ikiri icham chiemo no, ma kweyo chuny ŋata owacho rin ameno ma konyo paro ma chunye;
akiwachi ni ma konyo paro ma chunyin, to ma chuny ŋaticha ayin. Nyatoro nyalo penjo ni, “Onyo raŋo ma syem paran wochungi kwoŋ paro ma chuny ŋat man?
Ka atyeko ran fuoyo Were ri chiemo paran, raŋo ma ŋat man pusa an ru chiemo ma atyeko kir keth'iye silwany?”
Amomiyo, gima witimo jye, kosa wichiemo kosa wimadho gimoro, timi win ameno ma miyo Were dwoŋ.
Wikiri wiŋedhi chuny Joyudaya kosa Jopath, kosa kitipa pa jomoyeyo.
Wibende timi win paka atimo. Ato atemo kisangala dhano jye i gimoro jye m'atimo, mongoye paro kwoŋ bero paran won, to bero pa ji mathoth ayino, ŋeyi jowonyali limo both.
Timi win gima wineno kwoŋan paka abende atimo gima aneno kwoŋ Kristo.
Afuoyo win rupiri ndiri jye wipoyan aka wiluwo fuonji m'amiyo win.
To amito wiŋey ni Kristo obedo jatel pa jachwo jye, jachwo obedo jatel pa chiege, aka Were obedo jatel pa Kristo.
Amomiyo, jachwo ma lamo Were kosa tucho mikwenda pa Were moboyo wiye meno chayo jatel pere.
Aka dhako moro jye ma lamo Were kosa tucho mikwenda pa Were ma koboyo wiye meno bende chayo jatel pere: pokirok ongoye kwoŋ go kodi dhako molyel wiye.
Ka dhako kiboy wiye, ere wolyel woko. To paka obedo gi wichkwot dhako lyelo wiye kosa ŋado yey wiye, go ripo boyo wiye.
Jachwo kiripi boyo wiye, rupiri go nyutho chal kodi dwoŋ pa Were. Aka dhako nyutho dwoŋ pa jachwo.
Ato kochwey jachwo wok kwoŋ dhako, to dhako ama owok kwoŋ jachwo.
Aka jachwo kochwey ri dhako, to dhako ama ochwey ri jachwo.
Amomiyo ru jomalaika ma joneno, dhako ripo bedo gi giboyo wiye ma nyutho nike go nitye i men pa chwore.
To kada ameno, i kwo mawan i Ruoth, dhako kibedi ma kothenere kwoŋ jachwo, odoko jachwo bende kibedi ma kothenere kwoŋ dhako.
Ato paka dhako ochwey wok kwoŋ jachwo, apaka bende jachwo nywole wok kwoŋ dhako; aka gikipiny jye wok bongi Were.
Wiwegi neni win: otire ka dhako kwayo Were gi wiye ma koboyi?
Kwo ma kis ndelo won kifuonji win ye ni jachwo m'oweyo yey wiye ogaŋere meno won dwokere chien,
mato ri dhako meno a bero pere? Ato omiy go yewiye maboyo no paka giumirok.
To ka moro mito pyem kwoŋ gime, awacho nyaka ni wangoye gi kite man aluwa, kada i kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were jye.
I fuonji me, adyeri akifuoy win: rupiri chokirok mewin medo win racho ayin loyo bero.
Marapena, awinjo nike nitye pokirok mogo i chokirok mewin, to fuodi akiyey odocho ni timere ameno.
(Aka pokirok no ripo aripa bedo i dyer win ŋey joradyeri jowonenere kamaler.)
Ato ka wiromo kanyachiel kere wikibin ri win chamo chiemo pa Ruoth mothyeno ma gike,
rupiri ka wichiemo, dhano jye won chomere gi chiemo pere ma kikur wadi; ma miyo joman kech neko jo kareno joman jotyeko ri gin madho gimoro.
Wingoye gi pechin mewin ma chiemo gi or'iye giramadha? Kosa wimito chayo kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were ayino gi miyo jochandi kumo? Wiyenyo awachi ri win aŋo kwoŋ gime? Onyo afuoy wini? Be! Akotim ameno!
Kole alimo fuonji me wok bongi Ruoth aka abende akelo ri win: Nike Ruoth Yesu, wor mocham'iye ri go sereko, okwanyo mugat,
oketho Were walwa, oturo to wacho ni, “Me delkwoŋan, momiy win. Timi win ama ma poyan.”

I yo achiel, okwanyo agwata munyo chiemo mothyeno orumo to wacho ni, “Me agwata ma remo paran ma chikirok manyien. Onyo wangi kis ka wichamo mugat me aka wimadho gima ni i agwata me, meno witucho tho pa Ruoth chuka go odwoki.”
Kole chuka Ruoth obin, wibino tucho tho pere wangi ka wichamo mugat me aka wimadho gima ni i agwata me.
Amomiyo, ŋata ocham mugat pa Ruoth kosa omadhi gima ni i agwata pere i kite ma kiripi, meno timo gima kiripi kwoŋ del pa Ruoth kodi remo pere.
Dhano jye ripo kutho kikaŋasa kwo pere ma fuodi kochamo mugat me kosa madho gima ni i agwata me.
Ato ŋata chamo aka madho gikipiny me ma kinen dwoŋ mani i del pa Ruoth, meno won ketho banja kwoŋe.
Amomiyo jomathoth kwoŋ win jotwo aka jongoye gi men, aka joman jotyeko kir tho.
Bedi wakutho wakaŋasa kwo mawan di wakidonji i banja gi Were.
Ka Ruoth thumo ri wan banja meno miyo wan girachula ma tiro wan, ŋey wokiri wothumi ri wan banja kanyachiel gi ji ma piny.
Amomiyo, wutimera, ka wichokere kanyachiel i dhower pa Ruoth, kuri win jowoti win.
Ka nyatoro thoth gi kech, go ripo chiemo pecho aka ŋey ka wiromo kanyachiel kite mewin wokiri womiyi win donjo i banja gi Were. Kwoŋ wach man, abino chowo ka abino.
Onyo, wach ma mako kwoŋ mich mawok bongi Chuny Maleŋ, amito winiaŋ odocho kwoŋe, wutimera.
Wiŋeyo nike munyo oido fuodi wibedo jokafiri oido owondi win to itero win bongi chal makichar mobedo obadha.
Amomiyo amito wiŋey ni ongoye ŋata luwo gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ pa Were ma nyalo wacho ni, “Wokwoŋ Yesu!” Odoko ongoye ŋata nyalo wacho ni, “Yesu a Ruoth,” ka Chuny Maleŋ ama komiyo go men.
Mich ma chuny nitye mopokere opokere, to Chuny Maleŋ achiel ama poko jye.
Odoko tich nitye mopokere opokere, to Ruoth achiel ama itiyo ri go.
Mich ma timo tich bedo mopokere opokere, to Were achiel won ama poko dhano jye mich no.
Kis dhano jye imiyo ranyuth pa Chuny Maleŋ ri bero pa ji jye.
Chuny no miyo ŋatachiel mikwenda ma ryeko, ŋat man Chuny miyo mikwenda ma ŋeyo gimoro.
Chuny achiel no miyo ŋatachiel yeyo, aka ŋat man go miyo mich mopokere opokere ma botho two.

Chuny no miyo natachiel men ma timo giraura, ŋat man mich ma luwo mikwenda mawok bongi Were; aka ŋat man, men ma poko i dyer ranyuth mawok bongi Chuny Maleŋ kodi man ma kiwoki bonge. Ŋatachiel go miyo men ma luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere, ŋat man men ma tito dwoŋ dhudhok no.
To Chuny achiel ama timo gime jye; go miyo kis dhano mich mopokere paka go won yenyo.
Kole paka del obedo gimoro achiel ma nitye g'adeche mopokere, apaka bende Kristo chalo. Go obedo paka del achiel ma adeche omor'iye.
Kole wajojye, kada bedi Joyudaya kodi Jopath, kosa joma ni syem kodi ŋechin, jye Chuny achiel ama omiyo wan batisimo i del achiel, aka omiy wajojye limo Chuny Maleŋ achiel.
Kole del kotim g'adech achiel kende, to g'adeche momore.
Bedi tyendi jo wachi ni, “Paka akibedo chingi, onyo akibedo adech pa del,” meno di komono go bedo adech pa del.
Aka bedi ithi jo wachi ni, “Paka akibedo waŋ, onyo akibedo adech pa del,” meno bende di komono go bedo adech pa del.
Bedi del gipi bedi waŋ won kende, d'owinjo wach nedi? Aka bedi del gipi bedi ith won kende, d'oŋweyo gimoro nedi?
To paka nitye, Were oketho adeche mopokere ma del i kabedo pajo paka won oyenyo.
Bedi adeche jye lokere achiel kende, aŋo ma d'olwoŋ ni del?
To paka nitye, adeche omore ri gin, to jye fuodi jobedo del achiel.
Amomiyo, waŋ jo kinyal wacho ri chingi jo ni, “Akiyenyin!” Kosa wich bende wacho ri tyendi jo ni, “akiyenyin!”
Kuchiel, adeche ma del ma waparo ni nok gi kony, ama odoko yenyere loyo.
Aka adeche ma del ma waparo ni bu kony odocho ama wagwoko maber swa; odoko adeche ma del ma kineen maŋon odocho ama walith gine tektek,
Aka adeche moasa bero ama kiyeny. Were won am'oriwo wan to miyo adeche michayo no dwoŋ.
Ameno aka wongoye gi pokirok i del, kareno kis adech tiyere gi nyawote.
Ka adech achiel ma del olimo litho, adeche modoŋ jye jowinjo litho gine; ka adech achiel omiy dwoŋ, wadi jye josangala gine.
Onyo wijojye wibedo delkwoŋ Kristo, aka kis dhano obedo adech mere.

Aka i kitipa pa jomoyeyo, Were oketh'iye: marepena jomoor, mararyo jotuchi wach Were, maradek jofuonji, to luwo joma timo giraura, to luwo joma ni gi men ma botho two, kodi joma konyo jowoti gin, aka joman jodhum, kodi joma luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere.
Wiparo ni ji jye jobedo jomoor? Kosa jotuchi wach Were? Kosa jofuonji? Dhano jye ni gi men ma timo giraura?
Kosa botho two? Kosa luwo dhudhok mopokere? Kosa tito dwoŋ dhudhok no?
To kethi win chuny win kwoŋ mich ma loyo dwoŋ ayin. Aka alenyutho win royo maber ma loyo:
Kada aluw dhudhok pa ji kir g'apa malaika, to angoye gi mar, d'achal achala olaŋ ma koko wiy jo kosa dewe ma woy nono.
Kada abedi gi mich ma tucho mikwenda pa Were kodi ma niaŋ kwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ jye; odoko kada abedi gi yeyo ma nyalo ŋilo woko gote, to angoye gi mar, meno jye fuodi angoye kony.
Kada anyal poko gimoro jye mani gine; kada ayey delkwoŋan wowaŋ, ka angoye gi mar, meno kikonyan kada mathin.
Mar kudere odoko ni gi wor; mar ongoye gi nyieko, kwoto, kosa pakirok;
mar ongoye gi gero, kosa mima; kimaki nge piyo, aka kipar kwoŋ timo racho; mar kibedi gi duro;
mar kisangala gi recho, to sangala g'adyeri ayino.
Mar kijoki kichar; geno, aka kilachere.
Mar kirum chil gi chil. To mikwenda mitucho bino chok; dhudhok mopokere opokere bende bino rumo; aka mich ma ŋeyo gimoro bende jye bino ware woko.
Kole mich ma wani gine ma ŋeyo gimoro kodi ma tucho mikwenda pa Were jye jokobedo gim'ochowere.
To ka gim'ochowere obin, gikenyo gima kochowere bino leny woko.
Munyo fuodi anyathi, aluwo paka nyathi, odoko aparo paka nyathi; munyo alokere ŋata otegino, aweyo woko tim ma thino.

Kole pama fuodi waneno gikipiny maripirip pa ndewiro ma nimnim, to rumachien wabino neno gikipiny awaŋ g'awaŋ. Pama aŋeyo gikipiny adech kende; rumachien abino ŋeyo mochowere, aka mochowere paka Were oŋeyan.
Onyo gikipiny adek me: yeyo, geno kodi mar jye joyindira, to mar ama loyo jye.
Amomiyo wiripo bedo gi mar. Kethi win chuny win kwoŋ mich machuny, kodhi won mich ma tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were!
Ŋata luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere kiluwi gi ji to gi Were ayin, rupiri ongoye ŋata niaŋ gima go wacho. Go luwo wach mopondo ma nyaliŋliŋ gi kony pa Chuny.
To ŋata tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were meno luwo gi ji, miyo ji dongo aka medo jo men, odoko diyo chuny jo.
Ŋata luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere won konyere kende, to ŋata tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were konyo kitipa pa jomoyeyo gipi.

Onyo ayenyo ri wijojye luwo dhudhok mopokere; to maloyo oido d'ayenyo ni winyal bedo gi mich ma tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were. Kole ŋata tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were ni gi kony loyo ŋata luwo dhudhok mopokere, kwanyo woko ka nitye ŋata tito dwoŋ gima go wacho i dhudhok ma ŋiaŋere; ney kitipa pa jomoyeyo gipi wolim kony.

Onyo, wutimera, ka abino bongi win, kony aŋo m'obedi ri win ka aluwo dhudhok mopokere ma wikiniaŋ? Ongoye kada masisiri, kwanyo woko ka akelo wach momenyere mogo mawok bongi Were, kosa amiyo win niaŋ kwong gimoro, kosa atucho mikwenda moro mawok bongi Were; kosa afuonjo win.
Kada ka waneno kwoŋ gikipiny mongoye gi kwo paka madundu kosa tongol, ŋa moŋey dwondi wer mituko ka dwonde kowok ma tito wer no?
Aka ka kokudhi dwondi gwara moŋeyere, ŋa moyikere ri lweny?
K'inen ameno, onyo ŋa moŋey gima iluwo kwoŋe ka mikwenda perin i dhudhok mopokere koŋey dwoŋ mere? Kole wach perin bino leny woko i koyo!
Adyer dhudhok omore i piny, to ongoye kada achiel kwoŋ jo ma dwoŋ mere ongoye.
To ka akiniaŋ dwoŋ gima nyatoro luwo, meno onyo alokere jakichar ri ŋata luwo, aka go bende lokere ran jakichar moro.
Paka wiwanya bedo gi mich pa Chuny, onyo maloyo jye, temi win swa oro mich ma konyo gero kitipa pa jomoyeyo gipi.
Amomiyo, ŋata luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere, mitere ri go kwayo mich ma tito dwoŋ mere.
Kole ka akwayo Were gi dhudhok mopokere opokere meno chunyan ama kwayo to paro paran kitim gimoro.
Onyo atim nedi? Abino kwayo gi chunyan, to abino kwayo gi paro paran bende; abino wero gi chunyan, to abino wero gi paro paran bende.
Ka wifuoyo Were gi chuny win, onyo dhano ma ndir jye m'obin i dyer joma kwayo owachi nedi ni, “Ameno” i kwayo mewin ma fuoyo Were mato go kuya gima wiwacho?
Nyalo bedo ni adyeri oido wifuoyo ri win Were maber i kwayo mewin, to ŋat cha kilim kony be.
Afuoyo Were ni aluwo gi dhudhok mopokere opokere loyo moro jye kwoŋ win.
To i kalamo pa jomoyeyo Kristo d'ayenyo ni aluwi kada nyaka wach abich gi paro paran ma ŋiaŋere, ma fuonjo joman, loyo luwo wach gana apar gi dhudhok mopokere.
Wikiri wibedi pa nyithindho i paro mewin, wutimera; bedi win nyithindho i gima mako kwoŋ recho, to wibedo jomotegino i paro mewin.
Ondik ama i chik: Ruoth wacho ni, “Abino luwo gi ji me, abino oro ji ma joluwo dhudhok mopokere, gi i dhok jowiloka. To kada ameno ji paran jokowinjan.”
Amomiyo, dhudhok mopokere opokere meno ranyuth ri joma koyeyo Were to ki ri jomoyeyo; aka mich ma tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were obedo ranyuth ri jomoyeyo, ma kiweno ri joma koyeyo.
Onyo ka kitipa pa jomoyeyo gi bee jochokere kanyachiel aka dhano jye luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere, ka ji ma ndir jye kosa joma koyeyo jobin, jokowachi ni neko omako wini?
To ka wijojye witucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were, aka dhano ma koyeyo kosa ma kuya gimoro obin, bino ŋeyo recho pere chungo kwoŋ gima go winjo. Ibino thumo ri go banja chungo kwoŋ gima go winjo;
aka paro mopondo i chunye bino wodhere kamaler. Gikenyo go bino ryewere piny to lamo Were munyo tucho ni, “Adyeri, Were nitye gi win!”

Wutimere, gim'awacho dwoŋ mere aŋo? Ka wiromo kanyachiel i kwayo, ŋatachiel nitye gi wer, ŋat man gi fuonji, ŋat man gi menyirok ma wok i wach pa Were, ŋat man dhudhok mopokere, aka ŋat man jatiti dwoŋ dhudhok no. Gimoro jye wobedi ma konyo kitipa pa jomoyeyo.
Ka nyatoro oluw gi dhudhok mopokere, ji aryo kosa adek ma kikal kenyo ama joripo luwo, i weso, kareno ŋat man tito dwoŋ gimiluwo.
Ka ongoye moro ma nyalo tito dwoŋ mere, ere jaluwo wokiri womedere luwo i dhodhok no i romo, kwanyo woko won woluw i nyaliŋliŋ gi Were.
Ripere ji aryo kosa adek momiy jo mikwenda pa Were ama jowoluwi, kareno joman jokaŋasa wach m'oluw ka otire.
To ka ŋat man olimo menyirok ma wok i wach pa Were, ŋata onwaŋo luwo ripo liŋ.
Kole wijojye winyalo tucho mikwenda ma wok bongi Were ŋat achielechiele, ŋey dhano jye wonyali fuonjirok to ji jye limo men.
Aka chuny jotuchi mikwenda ma wok bongi Were kidhyer jo wegi dhumo;
ato Were kobedo jakeli nywowirok to obedo jakeli syem ayin.
Paka yenyere i kitipa pa jomaleŋ iye jye, mon mewin joripo liŋ i romo ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo. Koyey jo luwo, to joripo winjo or paka Chik bende wacho.
Ka jomito ŋeyo gimoro, joripo penjo chwogi jo yu pecho. Bedo gi wichkwot dhako luwo i romo ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo Kristo.
Kosa wach pa Were ochako bongi wini? Kosa wach no obino ri win kendiwini?
Ka moro ŋoyo nike go jatuchi mikwenda mawok bongi Were kosa nike go nitye kodi mich machuny, go ripo jolo gima andiko ri win paka obedo or pa Ruoth.
To ka kodewo kwoŋ wach me, meno ongoye ŋata odew kwoŋ go bende.
Amomiyo, wutimera, kethi win chuny win kwoŋ tucho mikwenda mawok bongi Were, aka wikiri wichieri ji luwo dhudhok mopokere opokere.
To gimoro jye ripere wotim i royo motire mochan maber.
Onyo wutimera, amito poyo win, Wach Maber ma atyeko fuonjo win, ma wijolo, ma yeyo mewin onyo ochung'iye matek.
Wach Maber ma afuonjo win no ama bino botho win ka wichwir'iye matek, ka kameno, meno wiyeyo gima ongoye.
Achwayo ri win gima abende ajolo, aka meno a gima dwoŋ swa: nike Kristo otho ri gimarecho mawan paka Ndiiko Maleŋ wacho;
nike oyik go tichierino go i kwo chieŋ maradek, paka Ndiiko Maleŋ wacho;
nike go omenyere ri Petro, aka rumachien bende ri jomoor apar g'aryo jye.
Rumachien go omenyere ri jofuonjirok pere ma kalo miya abich kiromo, aka mathoth kwoŋ jo fuodi jokwo, kada joman jotyeko nindo.
Gikenyo go omenyere ri Yakobo, gi rumachien ri jomoor pere jye.
Machowe, go omenyere ran bende, an ma achal pa ŋatonywol apoya.
Ato abedo jamoor moasa thin kwoŋ jomoor jye, ma kiripi kada alwoŋa ni jamoor, rupiri alwenyo gi kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were.
To ru ŋono pa Were, abedo ŋata abedo, aka ŋono ma go otimo ran kobedo ma bu kony. Kuchiel, atyeko tiyo matek loyo jomoor man jye, kada kobedo tich paran won, to ŋono pa Were mani kodan ama tiyo.
Amomiyo, kada obedo an kosa jo ama jotito ri win, to me a gima wijojye wiyeyo.
Onyo ka itito ni Kristo ochierino kwoŋ jomotho, jomegi kwoŋ win odoko jowacho nedi ni chierino pa jomotho ongoye?
K'inen chierino ongoye, nyutho ni kere Kristo kochierino be;
aka ka Kristo kochierino kwoŋ jomotho, meno kere fuonji mawan ongoye kony aka yeyo mewin bende ongoye kony.
Medo kwoŋ meno, nyutho ni wachwoko dhok Were, rupiri wawacho nike go ochierino Kristo kwoŋ jomotho mato kere kochierino go, k'inen obedo adyeri ni jomotho jokichierino.
Ato ka jomotho kichierino jo, meno nyutho ni kir Kristo bende kochierino.
Aka ka Kristo kochierino, meno nyutho ni kere yeyo mewin bu kony aka fuodi wirwenyo i gimarecho mewin.
Aka joma onwaŋo joyeyo ma jotyeko ywomere i Kristo kere bende jotyeko rwenyo woko ayin.
Ka wageno Kristo nyaka i kwo ma pama i piny ka kende meno kere waŋati wajolifol maloyo joman jye i piny gipi.
To iyadyeri otyek chierino Kristo kwoŋ jomotho, paka gimanyak monyak marapena kwoŋ jomotho ma bende jobino chierino.
Ato paka tho owok kwoŋ dhano achiel, i royo achiel chierino kwoŋ jomotho bende onyo wok kwoŋ ŋatachiel.
Paka ji jye jotho ru nywolirok kwoŋ Adam, ameno bende apaka ibino chierino ji jye i Kristo.
To kis dhano chierino gi hongo pere; Kristo marapena ri ji jye; nyaka joma jobedo apa Kristo bende jobino luwo i ndir ma bino pere.
Gikenyo, gike bino tundo; Kristo bino reyo woko adhum jye, gi dwoŋ, kodi men jye, to kodo ker ri Were Bawan.
Ato Kristo ripo dhumo chuka Were okethi jokwor jye i par tyende.
Jakwor ma ibino reyo ma chowe a tho.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Were oketho gimoro jye i par tyende.” Ato, ka owachi ni, “Gimoro jye okethi i par tyende”, meno kirwak Were bende iye, rupiri go amoketho gimoro jye i adhum pa Kristo.
Aka k'otyeki ketho gimoro jye i adhum pa Kristo, gikenyo go won, paka Wuodi Were, bende bino donjo i adhum pa Were, moketho gimoro jye i par tyende; ŋey Were wodhumi kis gimoro jye.
Ka kobedo ameno, to iraŋo jomegi jolimo batisimo kawaŋ jomotho? Ka obedo adyeri paka jowacho ni jomotho jokichierino, raŋo ma ji limo batisimo kawaŋ jomotho?
To wan, raŋo ma wayeyo chandirok hongo jye?
Wutimera, athenere gi tho ndelo jye, to pakirok mani gine ru win i kwo mawan i Kristo Yesu Ruodhiwan ama miyan atucho gime.
K'inen alwenyo g'ogwange mager ma Efeso, nyaka ru mbusa paka dhano, bero aŋo ma alim'iye? Ka jomotho kichierino paka jowacho, kere onyo, “Wey wachiemi wamedhi rupiri dikin waletho.”
Moro wokiri womiŋi win: kole, “Kitipa marach nyieko kite maber.”
Dwoki win i paro mewin motire wiwey timo recho. Awacho gime ma kwoto wiy win; ato jomegi kwoŋ win jokuya Were.
Nyatoro nyalo penjo ni, “Jomotho jobino chierino nedi? Jobino dwoko gi del ma chalo aŋo?”
In dhano mamiŋ! Kole kodhi m'ipidho i lowo kinyal twi gi kwo ka kokutho otho.
K'ipidho gimoro, ikipidhi gima twi gi kululu, to nyaka kodhi mere ayin paka nyigi ŋano, kosa kiti kodhi man,
Were miyo kodhi no kiti chal pere ma won oyenyo; go miyo kis kodhi achielechiele kiti chal pere ma ripo gine.
Aka gikipiny makwo kibedi nger achiel; ji jonitye gi del ma kite achiel, ogwange del ma kite man, winyin del ma kite man, rech bende del ma kite man.
Aka nitye chal ma nyapolo kodi ma nyapiny bende; onyo kiti ŋono pa gikipiny ma nyapolo obedo man, aka kiti ŋono pa gikipiny ma nyapiny bende obedo nger man.
Waŋchieŋ nitye gi lero mere, dwe gi lero man, aka michalin bende gi lero man: odoko kir i dyer michalin jye nitye lero mopekere.
Meno bende apaka bino bedo ka jomotho jochierino. Dhano miyiko obedo gima top; del ma go lechierino gine bino bedo gima kitopi.
Iyiko del manyap, to bino chierino mani gi men.
Iyiko paka del ma nyapiny, to bino chierino paka del ma nyachuny. K'inen del ma nyapiny nitye, meno del ma nyachuny bende ripo bedo.
Amomiyo ndiiko wacho ni, “Adam, dhano marapena olimo kwo;” to Adam machowe obedo Chuny ma miyo kwo.
Del ma nyachuny ama kitel, to ma nyapiny ama kutho telo, aka nyaka gima nyachuny luwo.
Adam marapena owok i piny, dhano ma fukefuke; Adam mararyo wok i polo.
Paka ŋat mochwey wok i fukefuke chalo, apaka ji jye ma piny ka bende jochalo; aka paka ŋata wok i polo chalo, bende apaka joma ni polo jochalo.
Aka paka waruko chal pa ŋatochwey gi fukefuke, ameno bende apaka wabino ruko chal pa ŋat mowok i polo.
Me a gima awacho, wutimera: del kodi remo kinyal donjo i Ker pa Were; aka gima tho bende kinyal donjo i kwo makitho ka kokutho owiro chal.
Weyi awachi ri win nyaliŋliŋ me: wajojye wakotho, to wabino wire ni wich,
mapiyo paka dyemo waŋ, k'ogoy gwara machowe. Ato gwara bino ywak, to jomotho jochierino gi del ma kibino tho kendo, aka wajojye wabino wire.
Ato del ma tho me ripo ruko del ma kitho aka ŋey kwo ma rumo piyo me wolokere ma kirum.
Amomiyo ka otyek rwako ri gima tho ruk ma kitho, aka gima kiyindira otyeki rwako ri go ruk ma yindira, nyaka ndiiko bino tundo i kare ma wacho ni, “Men pa tho otyeki loyo woko kichutho.”
“Tho, nikune paka idoko inoloy lweny? Tho, nikune kwir perin ma lunga?”
Ato kwir pa tho ma lunga wok i gimarach, aka gimarach nwaŋo men pere i Chik.
To Were wofuoy ma miyo wan loyo lweny i Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan!
Amomiyo, wutimera, chungi win matek ma wichwiny, ma wikiyengere. Yindini win ndir jye i tich mewin ri Ruoth, rupiri wiŋeyo ni ongoye gima witimo i tich mewin ri Ruoth ma bu kemba.
Onyo wach ma mako kwoŋ pesa miripo choko ma konyo ji pa Were i Yudeya: Timi win gima awacho ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Galasya timo.
I ndelo marapena jye ma tich, i Sabiti, ŋatachielechele kwoŋ win ripo ketho gichen pesa moro, ma go nyalo ketho paka lim pere nitye, aka wokan kichutho, ŋey wongoye kendo choko pesa moro ka abino.
Ka abino, aledhiro ji mogo ma wifuoyo kiti jo, gi balwa manyutho jo, jowoteri mich mewin Yerusalem.
Ka yenyere ran kidho, bende jonyalo woth kodan.
Alebino bongi win ka atyeko wok yu Masedonia, rupiri ayiko luwo yu Masedonia.
Miti abino chowo hongo moro gi win, ma kono kada hongo ma chwir ma pe ŋich'iye piny no gipi, ŋey winyal konyan i medirok gi woth paran kamoro jye ma anokidh'iye kendo,
rupiri akimiti neno win nyaka i hongo machiek won akadha. Ageno chowo hongo moromoye gi win ka Ruoth oyeyo.
To abino bedo Efeso ka nyuka ndelo ma Pentekost.
Aka royo onyo oyawere ran malach ma tich, kada joma pyemo kodan jomore.
To ka Timotheyo obino bongi win, yikere win ma miyo go ŋeyo ni wijolo go maber, rupiri go bende tiyo ri Ruoth paka an.
Wongoye ŋata wochayi go, to wikonyi go womedere gi woth pere i syem, aka nyaka go bino dwoko bongan: kole wan kodi jomoyeyo jye wakuro neno go.
Onyo, i wach ma mako kwoŋ Apolo, atyeko temo dhiro go limo win kodi jomoyeyo man, to go won fuodi koneno ni ber wobin pama. To ka go olimo hongo, aka obin.
Bedi win waŋ win, chungi win matek i yeyo, bedi win miseni, bedi win gi men.
Gimoro jye ma witimo, timi win gi mar.
Aka wutimera, wiŋeyo kwoŋ Sitefano gi pecho pere paka jobedo jomotelo wirok i yeyo i Yunani, aka jomiyere tich ri ji maleŋ pa Were. Akwayo win wutimera,
yeyo tel pa ji machalo ameno, kodi apa joman jye ma jotiyo matek gi jo.
Asangala gi bino pa Sitefano, Fotinato, kodi Akaiko rupiri jobino kamewin,
aka joyomo chunyan kir gi chuny win bende. Joli win ji ma pameno.
Kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma i adech ma Asya jodhiro ri win moth; Akwila kodi Prisila, kodi kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma romo i ot pajo jodhiro ri win moth moasere i Ruoth.
Jomoyeyo ma ka jye jodhiro ri win moth. Mothere win akor i leŋo.
An Paulo, awon andiko moth me gi chingan.
Ŋata komaro Ruoth Yesu Kristo, wonwaŋi kwoŋ! Maranantha (Ruodhiwan biye!)
Ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu wobedi kodi win.
Mar paran wobedi kodi wijojye i Kristo Yesu.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jamoor pa Kristo Yesu i mito pa Were, jokodi omin wan Timotheyo, Ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo Kristo ma Korinthya, kodi ji pa Were jye ma Yunani.
Weyi ŋono gi syem mowok bongi Were Baa wan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo wobedi gi win.
Wopaki Were ma Baa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, Bawan ma jawor, Were ma jakweyi chuny ji!
Go kweyo chuny wan i teko ma waluw'iye jye, ŋey wanyal bende kweyo chuny ji ma jonitye i teko ma nger jye, munyo waoro kony ma wawegi bende watyeko limo bongi Were.
Paka wariwere gi Kristo i chandirok pere momore, ameno bende luwo kwoŋ Kristo wariwere gi go i kony pere moasere.
Ka wachandere, meno ma konyo win kodi ma both mewin; ka okony wan, meno okony win bende aka omiy win men ma chiro kiti chandirok ma wabende wachiro.
Amomiyo, geno mawan ma wani gine kwoŋ win kiyengere, rupiri waŋeyo ni paka wiriwere kodi wan i chandirok mawan, onyo wibende wiriwere gi wan i kony ma walimo.
Wakimiti wibedi ma wikuya, wutimin wan, teko ma walimo i adech ma Asya. Byeto moyim ri wan obedo madwoŋ aka mapek swa, momiyo oido wakigen kir kwo kendo.
Oido waparo nike otyek thumo ri wan banja ma tho. To gino obedo ameno ŋey wathenere, ki kwoŋ wawegi, to kwoŋ Were ayin, ma chierino jomotho.
Go obotho wan kwoŋ tho ma d'orach moasere, aka fuodi go bino botho wan. Waketho geno mawan kwoŋ go nike go bino medere gi botho wan kendo;
aka wiripo konyo wan gi kwayo. Meno aka ji mathoth jobino fuoyo Were ri wan, ru mich ma go omiy wan chungo kwoŋ kwayo pa ji mathoth.

Me a gima wapakere gine: Paro ma chuny wan miyo waridho ni i kwo mawan i piny ka, tektek mere i riwirok mawan gi win kanyachiel, wawotho i leŋo kodi i adyeri pa Were. Aka watimo ameno gi men ma ŋono pa Were, ma kiweno gi ryeko pa dhano.
Kole wakindiki ri win gima wikinyal kisoma gi niaŋ kwoŋe. Aka ageno nike paka fuodi wikiniaŋ kwoŋ wan odocho, wibino niaŋ kichutho,
(i gima pama winiaŋ wiyewiye), ŋey i Ndelo pa Ruoth Yesu winyal pakere gi wan paka bende wabino pakere gi win.
Paka onwaŋo atyeko ridho timo gime, oido ayiko bino lyewo win kutho, ŋey wilim silwany diryo.
Kole onwaŋo achano lyewo win ka akidho yu Masedonia, aka ka adwoko anwaŋiye kony bongi win i woth paran ma kidho Yudeya.
I chan paran me, oido achale pa jawiroki? Manago atimo chan ma nyapiny kareno awacho ni “Ey, ey,” kodi “Be, be” i hongo no won?
Paka Were obedo ŋata genere, chikirok mawan gi win kobedo “Ey” kodi “Be”.
Kole Yesu Kristo, Wuodi Were, ma wan kodi Sila gi Timotheyo wafuonjo win kwoŋe kobedo “Ey” kodi “Be”. Kuchiel i Kristo, fuonji no ndir jye bedo “Ey”.
Amomiyo chikirok pa Were jye, kada mathoth nedi, i Kristo bedo abeda “Ey”. Meno amomiyo i Yesu Kristo, wawacho “Ameno” mawan, ma miyo Were dwoŋ.
Kole Were won ama miyo wan, kanyachiel gi win, chungo matek i Kristo; aka go won ama owiro wan gi mo i tich pere,
to ketho ranyuth pere kwoŋ wan paka wabedo apere, to ketho Chuny Maleŋ i chuny wan ma ridho ni lemiyo wan gimoro jye ma go okano ri wan.
Alwoŋo Were wobedi jakony paran rupiri go oŋeyo chunyan! Kole aworo win amomiyo akidwoko yu Korinthya.
Onyo wakitem chuko win gi gima wiripo yeyo, rupiri wichungo matek i yeyo. Kuchiel, watiyo gi win ri kisangala mewin won.
Amomiyo, aridho paro nike akir adoko abin bongi win ramo chuny win kendo.
Aka ka aramo chuny win, ŋa man ma di miyan kisangala ma kiweno win won ma atyeko ramo chuny win?
Andiko ri win balwa aka ŋey ka abino bongi win, ji ma di miyan kisangala kiri jowomiyan gut ayino. Kole ageno kwoŋ wijojye nike kisangala paran bedo mewin bende.
Andiko ri win ma chunyan odwoyere kendo raman, gi pigi waŋan madit, ki ma ramo chuny win, to ma miyo win ŋeyo paka amaro win.
Onyo, ka moro obenga, kiram chunyan, to ramo chuny win ayino, ka akitero wach no bor tektek.
Girachula ma ji mathoth kwoŋ win jotyeko miyo go won romo.
Kuchiel, onyo pama wiripo chwako go gi miyo go miseni, woweyi bedo gi guto madwoŋ, to chunye ŋedhere woko.
Amomiyo, akwayo win ni winyuthi go mar mewin.
Kole me amomiyo andiko ri win balwa no: onwaŋo amito ŋeyo paka wichiro maber tem no, gi ŋeyo paka ndir jye wiyikere winjo fuonji paran.
Ka wichwako nyatoro i recho pere, abende achwako go. Kole ka achwako, k'inen adyeri ripere achwaki nyatoro, meno achwako go ma bero mewin i waŋ Kristo,
ŋey wageŋ Sitan kadho wan gi ryeko; ato waŋeyo chan pere.
Medo kwoŋ meno, munyo atundo Trowa kama akidho tit'iye Wach Maber mapa Kristo, anwaŋo ni Ruoth oido oyawo ran royo ma tich kenyo.
To fuodi oido ani gi rembo kwoŋbedo akinyalo nwaŋo omin wan Tito kenyo. Amomiyo asewila ji ma kenyo t'akidho yu Masedonia.
To Were wofuoy rupiri go noknok telo wan i loyo lweny i Kristo. Were oro wan paka jomikwenda pere ma miyo Kristo woŋeyere ri ji jye pa ŋweche kur ma tweyo piny.
Kole wachal ŋweche buban mamit ma Kristo waŋo ri Were ma kidho ri joma ibotho jo kodi joma rwenyo woko.
Ri joma jorwenyo woko, wachal ŋweche ma kelo tho; to ri joma ibotho, wachal ŋweche kur ma kelo kwo. Onyo ŋa ma di nyal tich me?
Wakichal jomathoth man, ma jooro mikwenda pa Were ma nwaŋ'iye lim; to rupiri Were ooro wan, waluwo g'adyeri ruwaŋ go, paka jotich pa Kristo.
Onyo chale pa wawegi odoko wayumere? Kosa nyalo bedo ni paka joman, onyo wabende wayenyo balwa ma fuoyo wan ri win kosa ma wok bongi win?
Kole wiwegi wibedo balwa mawan, mondik i chuny wan, ma dhano jye ŋeyo odoko soma.
Nenere kamaler ni wibedo balwa ma Kristo won ondiko ma mako kwoŋ tich mawan. Aka kondik gi bwino kwoŋ telin morudi, to ondik gi Chuny Maleŋ pa Were makwo kwoŋ telin ma chuny ji.
Wawacho gime gi miseni rupiri wanitye gi geno i Were kwoŋ Kristo.
To ki ni rupiri wawegi wani gi nyalo ma timo kis gimoro, to nyalo mawan wok bongi Were.
Go omiyo wanyalo tiyo ri chikirok manyien, ma kobedo apa Chik mondik, to apa Chuny Maleŋ, rupiri Chik mondik kelo tho, to Chuny miyo kwo.
To k'inen Chik ma kelo tho, mondik kwoŋ tele morudi obino gi dwoŋ moasere, ma Joisrael jokonyalo chomo waŋ gin kwoŋ Musa ru pilin ma waŋe, kada onwaŋo kidho rumo woko,
onyo dwoŋ ma wok i tich pa Chuny Maleŋ okadhi meno didi?
K'inen tich moido kelo kwoŋ ji banja obedo gi dwoŋ ameno, onyo tich ma kelo tiro ri ji obedi gi dwoŋ loyo meno didi?
Wanyalo wacho ni, rupiri dwoŋ ma pama onyo kalo machon, dwoŋ machon kere onyo orumo woko.
Ato ka gima rumo woko obino gi dwoŋ, meno gima yindira chil gi chil nitye gi dwoŋ ma loyo.
Amomiyo paka wanitye gi geno me, wabedo miseni swa.
Wakichal Musa, m'oboyo waŋe gi nanga, ni Joisrael kiri jowoneni pilin ma waŋe ka mojere to leny woko.
Paro pajo adyeri oido othore, rupiri kir konon ka josoma chikirok machon, nanga ma umo waŋ jo no fuodi doŋ adoŋa. Nanga no ware woko denge ka dhano ojolo Kristo.
Aka kir gi pama wo ena, ka josoma Chik pa Musa, nanga no fuodi umo auma paro pajo.
To ka dhano owire bongi Ruoth aka nyaka nanga no ware woko.
Onyo, “Ruoth”i luwo me, obedo Chuny; aka kama Chuny pa Ruoth ni iye, syem bedo kenyo.
Wajojye, onyo, wanyutho dwoŋ pa Ruoth gi waŋ wan ma koum; aka dwoŋ no, mawok bongi Ruoth mobedo Chuny, loko wan i chal pere, gi dwoŋ ma medere ameda.
Amomiyo, paka Were otyeko miyo wan tich me i wor pere, wakibino nyochere.
Waketho gichien tim ma nyaliŋliŋ ma kelo wichkwot; wakitiy gi twodo, odoko wakiwir wach pa Were. Kuchiel waluwo adyeri i lero, ma nyutho ji jye ni wanitye i tiro i waŋ Were.
Aka kada bedi ni Wach Maber ma wafuonjo opanere, kole opanere nyaka ri joma jokidho rwenyo won kende.
Were ma piny me oumo paro pa joma koyeyo gi mudho, ŋey womoni jo neno lero ma Wach Maber ma nyutho dwoŋ pa Kristo mobedo chal pa Were.
Ato wakifuonji kwoŋ wawegi: wafuonjo kwoŋ Kristo Yesu paka Ruoth, aka wabedo jotich ri win ri atoŋa pa Yesu.
Kole Were mowacho ni, “Lero wolyel wok i mudho,” ama omiyo lero pere lyel i chuny wan, ma kelo ri wan niaŋ kwoŋ dwoŋ pa Were, ma nenere i waŋ Kristo.
To wan ma wanitye gi ŋaŋo machuny me wachalo degi malowo, manyutho nike men moasere me wok bongi Were ayin ma kiweno bongi wan.
Teko diyo wan i thenge jye to kiŋiny wan woko; dichieŋ wadhyer, to chuny wan kiŋedhere woko;
I chando wan, to kojwangi wan; bende ogoy wan piny, to wakireyere woko.
Hongo jye watiŋo tho pa Yesu i delkwoŋ wan, aka ŋey kwo pere bende wonen i delkwoŋ wan.
I kwo mawan, ndir jye wathenere gi tho ri atoŋa pa Yesu, ŋey kwo pere wonenere i delkwoŋ wan ma kiruw tho me.
Me nyutho ni kere tho tiyo i wan; aka kwo ama tiyo rigo i win.
Ndiiko wacho ni, “Ayeyo, amomiyo aluwo.” Gi chuny ma yeyo achiel no, wabende onyo wayeyo amomiyo waluwo,
rupiri waŋeyo ni Were, mochierino Ruoth Yesu i kwo, bende bino chierino wan gi Yesu to kelo wan kanyachiel gi win ruwaŋe.
Gino jye bedo ma bero mewin, ŋey ŋono pa Were ma tundo ri ji momore jowomedi fuoyo Were gi miyo go dwoŋ.
Meno ama omiyo wakilachere; kada men ma delkwoŋ wan mojere mathin mathin, to kwo ma chuny wan lokere manyien kis ndelo.
Aka teko mathin ma hongo machiek me bino kelo ri wan dwoŋ moasere ma chil gi chil, ma loyo teko no bor.
Amomiyo waketho paro mawan, ki kwoŋ gikipiny ma nenere, to kwoŋ gikipiny ma kinenere rupiri gima nenere chowo nyaka hongo machiek; to gima kinenere yindira chil gi chil.
Kole waŋeyo ni ka kayindi ma wabed'iye i piny, delkwoŋ wan me, okedhi woko, Were bino miyo wan ot ma chil gi chil i polo, ma dhano ama kogero.
Pama onyo wachukere gi awanya ma ruko ot mawan mani polo.
Ato k'oruki ri wan ot no, wakobedi kinyoro.

Ka fuodi wakwo i kayindi ma piny me, wachur aka wachukere gi paro ma diyo wan; ki rupiri wamito lunyo woko delkwoŋ wan, to rupiri wamito woruki ri wan del ma nyapolo ayino, aka ŋey kwo ma kirum womwonyi woko tho.
Were ama oyiko wan ri wirok me, aka omiyo wan Chuny Maleŋ ma ridho ni lemiyo wan gimoro jye ma go ochiko miyo wan.
Amomiyo hongo jye wanitye gi miseni. Waŋeyo nike ka tekin waripo i del me meno wanitye bor gi Ruoth.
Kole wakwo gi yeyo, ma kiweno gi gima waneno.
Awacho ni wapoŋ gi miseni, aka di wayenyi kir weyo delkwoŋ wan to wakadho bedo gi Ruoth.
To maloyo gimoro jye, wamito kisangala go, kada fuodi wanitye i del mawan me kosa be.
Kole wajojye waripo chungo ruwaŋ Kristo, go wothumi ri wan banja, ŋey kis dhano kwoŋ wan wolimi gima ripo gine chungo kwoŋ gima go otimo gi delkwoŋe, maber kosa marach.
Waŋeyo dwoŋ lworo Ruoth, amomiyo watemo naŋo ji. Were oŋeyo kwo mawan maber, aka ageno ni i chuny win wibende wiŋeyo wan.
Wakitem pakirok ri win kendo; kuchiel watemo miyo win thwolo ma yumirok gi wan ayin, aka nyaka wibino nyalo dwoko wach ma dhoki joma fuodi joyumere gi chal pa dhano ma woko, ma kiweno ma i adundo.
K'inen neko omako wan adyeri meno omako wan ri atoŋa pa Were; to ka wiy wan otire, meno otire ma bero mewin.
Ato mar pa Kristo ama dhumo wan, kareno waŋeyo ni dhano achiel otho ri ji jye, ma nyutho ni kere ji jye jotyeko tho.
Aka go otho ri ji jye, nike jomakwo kiri jowoteri kwo paka apa jo wegi to paka apa Kristo motho ri jo to ichierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
Amomiyo, wok pama wakithumi ri nyatoro banja chungo kwoŋ paro ma nyadhanodhano. Kada yado onwaŋo watero Kristo gi paro ma nyadhanodhano, pama wakitim ameno kendo.
Amomiyo ka moro nitye i Kristo, go obedo chwech manyien: gimachon okadho woko, manyien ama obino.
