Gime jye wok bongi Were, ma i Kristo odwoko wan i tiyirok gine; aka omiyo wan tich ma dwoko joman bende i tiyirok gine.
Mikwenda mawan obedo ni: Were onyo dwoko ji ma piny i tiyirok gine i Kristo, aka kikwan gimarecho kwoŋ jo kendo. Were omiyo wan mikwenda paka go dwoko ji tiyirok gine kendo.
Amomiyo, wabedo jomikwenda ma joluwo ri Kristo, igani Were won gipi onyo goyo koko ri ji i wan. Kapa Kristo, wakwayo win ni dwoki win witiyere kodi Were!
Kristo oido ongoye gi gimarach, to Were omiyo go riwirok gi wan i gimarach mawan, ŋey i Kristo, wanyal bedo paka tiro pa Were.
Ri ameno, paka joma tiyo kanyachiel gi Were, wakwayo win ni paka wityeko jolo ŋono pa Were, onyo wikiri wiwey wonyiekere woko.
Kole Were wacho ni, “Awinjo dwondin i hongo paran ma nyutho wor, aka atyeko konyin i ndelo ma both.” Onyo me a hongo ma nwaŋo wor pa Were; me a ndelo ma limo both.
Wakimiti riwirok ri dhano moro jye i royo pere, rupiri meno nyalo miyo wochay tich mawan.
Kuchiel, i gimoro jye wanyutho ni wabedo jotich pa Were, munyo wachiro aŋedha chuny, teko, kodi peko gi diyo chuny madwoŋ.
Otyek goyo wan, tweyo wan, kodi woy gi wan; tich opikere ri wan, ruman nindo ngoye, to chiemo jye ngoye.
Watyeko nyutho ni wajotich pa Were gi lonyo, niaŋ, diyo chuny, kodi chuny maber, i Chuny Maleŋ, i mar mawan maradyeri,
i luwo adyeri, kodi i men pa Were. Wanitye gi tiro paka gilweny mawan, i chingi wan marachuch kodi maracham.
Imiyo wan dwoŋ, odoko ikwoto wiy wan; iyeto wan, aka odoko ipako wan. Itero wan paka jotwodo, mato waluwo adyeri;
paka joma koŋeyere, mato ji jye joŋeyo wan; itero wan pa jomotho, to kere wakwo. Kada chandi wan, kineki wan;
kada miyi wan gut, to ndir jye wasangala; wachale pa jochandi, to wamiyo jomathoth ŋaŋo; wachale pa joma jongoye gi gimoro, mato wanitye gi gimoro jye.
A Jokorinthya! Kole watyeko luwo kamaler ri win, wathango ri win chuny wan.
Wakipondo ri win; to wiŋat wipondo ri wan i chuny win.
Aluwo gi win igani winyithindho paran. Nyuthi wan win kiti paro ma wanitye gine ri win. Wibende yawi win chuny win malach paka watimo ri win.
Wikiri witiyere kanyachiel ma wirom kodi jomakoyeyo. Nyalere nedi tiro kodi komo bedo mere? Kosa nyalere nedi lero kodi mudho bedo kanyachiel?
Nyalere nedi Kristo kodi Jwogi tuyirok? Aŋo ma ŋata oyeyo Kristo riwo kodi ŋata koyeyo?
Tiyirok aŋo ma nitye i dyer Ot pa Were kodi chal makichar? Kole wabedo Ot pa Were makwo! Paka Were won owacho ni, “Abino bedo i jo to awotho gi jo. Abino bedo Were pajo, aka jobino bedo ji paran.”
Aka Ruoth wacho ni, “Amomiyo eye win bongi jo, aka wipokere gi jo. Wikiri wigeyi gima kolony, aka nyaka abino jolo win.
Abino bedo Baa win, aka wibino bedo wotan gi nyigan. Ruoth Majameni jye ama wacho.”
Paka wani gi chikirok me, jowotan mamaro, walonyi win kwoŋ gimoro jye ma kocho delkwoŋ wan, kosa chuny wan, aka warangi lokirok maleŋ ma kichutho, ka walworo Were i kwo mawan.
Nwaŋi win kabedo ri wan i chuny win. Wakitimo racho ri nyatoro, odoko wakinyieko kite pa moro, kosa temo timo gimahembi ri moro.
Akiwachi gime ma thumo ri win banja; rupiri paka atyeko wacho, winitye kachuny wan tektek momiyo wanitye kanyachiel, kada wakwo kosa watho.
Anitye gi geno madwoŋ i win; aka apakere gi win swa! Awinjo gi syem i win. Kada i teko mawan jye fuodi anitye atya gi kisangala.
Kir munyo watyeko tundo Masedonia jye wakiywomere kada, to wanwaŋo chandirok kis kamoro: kocha dhawirok okaro wan, korin lworo opoŋ i chuny wan.
To Were ma dwoko chuny jomobwok, odwoko chuny wan gi bino pa Tito.
Ki gi bino pere kende, to gi kony ma widwoko gine chunye bende. Go owacho ri wan paka wiyenyo swa nenan, paka wirem gi paka wiyikere konyan; gino omedan kisangala tektek.
Aka kada bedi ni balwa paran omiyo win rem, jye chunyan kiraman ni andiko. To kada ameno chunyan oramaye kwoŋ balwa no munyo aneno ni omiyo win rem nyaka hongo machiek won.
To pama asangala, ki rupiri amiyo win rem, to rupiri rem mewin omiyo wiŋuto recho mewin. Kole wibedo gi rem paka Were onwaŋo yenyo, amomiyo kere wakitimo ri win racho moro.
Kole rem ma wok bongi Were kelo ŋuto recho aka tero dhano i both; aka ongoye ramirok kenyo. To rem ma piny ka kelo tho ayin.

Ere neni win gima rem ma wok bongi Were no otyeko timo kwoŋ win; neni paka oloko win jomagenere, ma chuny win olony. Neni paka chuny win ramere, bwok, paro, maro Were, aka mito tiro ama wobedi. Kole wityeko nyutho ni wingoye gi racho i wach no jye.
Amomiyo, kada andiko balwa no, atimo ameno ki paka ŋata otimo marach, kosa ŋata otimi ri go marach. Kuchiel, andiko ma nyutho win kamaler, i waŋ Were, paka wimaro wan tektek.
Me amomiyo walimo miseni. Wakilimo miseni kende; to iyadyeri wamedo kisangala ru syem ma Tito onyutho kwoŋ kony ma wimiyo go ma dwoko chunye.
Kada bedi aŋata atel kiyuma win ri go, di wiyan kokwot be. Paka noknok waluwo ri win giradyeri, yumirok mawan ri Tito bende onyutho adyeri mawan.
Aka mar ma go ni gine ri win medere ameda ka go poyo paka wijojye wiwinjo or, gi paka wijolo go gi lworo gi kirin.
Asangala ni anyalo geno win kichutho!
Onyo wutimera, wamito wiŋey ŋono pa Were motyeko nyuthirok i dyer kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Masedonia.
I tem pajo maloŋo gi teko ma jolimo, kisangala pajo omedere chuka omiyo jobedo gi yomo ma chuny i wodho mich pajo, kada wegi oido jochandi.
Anyutho win ni adyeri jopoko gikipiny kweth paka jonyalo; aka ma kalo kir kenyo. Aka i yenyo pajo wegi,
jokwayo wan g'amen ni jowolimi silwany ma konyo ji pa Were i Yudeya.
Jokalo kir kama onwaŋo wanyalo geno! Marapena wegi jomiyere ri Ruoth; aka rumachien, gi mito pa Were, jomiyere ri wan bende.
Ri ameno wakwayo Tito, mochako tich me, ni womedere gine, aka wokonyi win wichow tich ma ŋono me.
Paka wimiyere i gimoro jye ma wini gine: i yeyo, i luwo, kodi niaŋ, i ketho kinen kodi i maro wan ameno bende neni win ni wimedere loyo i silwany ma poko bende.
Akikethi chik moro, to amito ŋeyo ka mar mewin obedo maradyeri; amomiyo anyutho win paka joman joketho kinen i miyo kony.
Kole wiŋeyo ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo ni kada go oido oŋaŋ, olokere jachandi ri bero mewin, ŋey go woloki win jomoŋaŋ kwoŋ chandi pere.
Me a paro m'amiyo win kwoŋ wach no: I oro morumo wiŋati witelo poko; aka ki meno kende to bende wiŋat witelo bedo gi maro ma timo ameno.
Amomiyo, medere win gine wichow tich no! Kethi win kinen i chowo tich no paka oido wiketho i timo chan mere, aka timi win ameno kodi gima wini gine.
Kole ka wini gi maro ma miyo mich, Were bino jolo mich mewin chungo kwoŋ gima winitye gine amiya, ma kiweno kwoŋ gima wingoye gine.
Wakimiti gonyo joman kareno wayimo kwoŋ win ayino byeto, to wamito thenge jye wobedi ma rom;
to paka pama onyo wimore gi lim, ber ka wikonyo joma jochando gimoro. Aka rumachien, ka wibende wichando gimoro aka jo jomore gi lim, bende jobino konyo win. Ameno aka thenge jye bino bedo ma rom.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Ŋata ochoko lim madit kodoŋ gi moasa dito, aka ŋata ochoko lim manok kodoŋ gi moasa noko.”
Wafuoyo Were moketho i chuny Tito maro ma konyo win paka wakonyo win.
Go oyeyo munyo wakwayo go bino, to ki meno kende; go oido won bende oyikere amomiyo go oridho bino bongi win.
Aka wadhiro go kodi omin wan momiy dwoŋ swa i kitipa pa jomoyeyo Kristo jye ru tich pere ma fuonjo Wach Maber.
Medo kwoŋ meno, kitipa pa jomoyeyo oyero go woth gi wan ka wamedere gi tich ma ŋono me ri dwoŋ pa Kristo, gi nyutho paka wani gi maro ma miyo kony.
Wagwokere rupiri wakimiti kisigila kiŋunyaŋunya mogo bongi ji i tich mawan ma tero mich madwoŋ me.
Wamiyere timo gimotire, ki i waŋ Ruoth kende, to i waŋ ji bende.
Amomiyo, waoro omin wan no gi jo; obedo ŋata watyeko temo ndir mathoth, aka wanwaŋo ni go ni gi maro moromo ma konyo; aka go ogeno win tektek.
Ma mako kwoŋ Tito, meno jawodhan ma tiyo kodan i konyo win; aka wutimin wan man no jobedo jomikwenda ma jowok i kitipa pa jomoyeyo aka jokelo ri Kristo dwoŋ.
Amomiyo, nyuthi win jo mar mewin, kodi gima omiyo wayuma win ri jo, ŋey kitipa pa jomoyeyo jye jowoŋeyi gino.
Onwaŋo kiyenyere ni adoko andiki ri win kwoŋ dhiro kony ri ji pa Were i Yudeya.
Aŋeyo nike wiyeyo konyo, aka ayuma win ri ji ma Masedonia ka awacho ni, “Wutimere ma Yunani joyikere miyo kony wok denge i oro mecha.” Aka ketho kinen mewin oicho jomathoth kwoŋ jo bende konyo.
Onyo eno adhiro jomoyeyo me, ŋey yumirok mawan gi win i wach me wokiri wotho nono: to paka awacho, wibino yikere ma miyo kony.
Ka kameno, ka ji ma Masedonia jobin kodan to jonwaŋo ni wikiyekere, wiy wan bino kwot ma rom nedi; meno kareno wakiluw kwoŋ wichkwot mewin; rupiri waasa geno win!

Amomiyo, aparo nike ripere aori jomoyeyo me jowoteli bino ran bongi win, ŋey wiyikere kichutho nwaŋo mich ma wichiko miyo. Gikenyo bino nwaŋo ni mich no oyik chon ka atundo, aka meno bino nyutho ni wimiyo rupiri wiwegi wiyenyo, ma kiweno ni oromi aroma win timo.
Me a gima awacho: ŋata chwoyo kodhi manok bino kecho gimanyak manok; ŋata chwoyo kodhi mathoth bende bino kecho gimanyak mathoth.
Amomiyo, dhano jye ripo miyo gimoro paka won oridho timo, mongoye kiŋunyaŋunya kosa paro ni oromi aroma go timo; kole Were omaro ŋata miyo mich pere gi kisangala.
Aka Were nyalo miyo win i ŋono pere, gima kalo ma wiyenyo, ŋey ndir jye wibedi gi gimoro jye ma wiyenyo, kodi ma winyalo konyo gine tich jye mabeyo.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Go ka miyo jochandi, miyo amiya jo gima bup; ato tiro pere yindira chil gi chil.”
Were ma miyo ji kodhi ma chwoyo, kodi chiemo achama, bino miyo win kodhi ma wiyenyo to miyo kodhi no dongo, ŋey gimawok i tim mewin mabeyo wonyak kweth.
Go bino miyo wiŋaŋ i kis gimoro ŋey winyal bedo jomiyo ndir jye, aka jomathoth jobino fuoyo Were ru mich mewin ma bino luwo gi bongi wan.
Kole tich ma witiyo me kikony chandi pa ji maleŋ pa Were kende, to bende miyo ji kweth jofuoyo Were.

Aka ru tich mewin motyeko nyuthere kamaler me, jomathoth jobino miyo Were dwoŋ ru chwirok mewin kwoŋ Wach Maber mapa Kristo ma witucho ni wiyeyo, kodi ru miyo kony mewin munyo wipoko lim mewin gi jo kodi joman bende.
Ameno, jobino kwayo ri win gi maro madwoŋ rupiri Were otyeko nyutho win ŋono madwoŋ.
Were wofuoy ru mich pere ma welo mere kiwachere!
An Paulo, agoyo koko ri win; an miwacho ni amwol ka anitye gi win, to abedo jamaker ri win ka ani bor gi win. Akwayo win gi mwolo kodi ŋono pa Kristo, ni
wikiri wimiyan abedi jamaker ri win ka abino; kole aŋeyo adyeri paka anyalo bedo jamaker mager gi joma joparo ni watiyo g'atoŋa ma piny.
Adyer wanitye i piny; to wakilweny paka piny lwenyo.
Ato gilweny ma waoro kobedo gilweny ma nyapiny, to obedo gilweny pa Were ma di men, ma ŋinyo woko chiel kada moger matek nedi,
gi kedho woko rageŋ jye ma pyem, kodi gimogo jye ma tiŋere malo aka temo juko ryeko pa Were, to tudo woko paro ma nyadhanodhano jye wogiki winjo Kristo.
Aka ka wityeko mwole kichutho, aka wabino yikere miyo tim jye ma chay girachula.
Onyo neni win paka gikipiny nitye. Ka moro kwanere paka dhano pa Kristo, meno ber, to go ripo ŋeyo ni wabende wabedo ji pa Kristo paka go.
Kole angoye gi wichkwot, kada atyeko yumirok ye gi men ma Ruoth omiyo wan ma geto yeyo mewin, aka ki ma reyo win woko.
Akimiti wochale pa amito bwoko win gi balwin paran.
Jomogo jowacho ni, “balwin pa Paulo ger aka di wach mapek, to ka go won nitye gi wan go nyap, aka luwo pere ongoye gimoro!”
Joma pameno ripo ŋeyo ni ongoye pokirok i gima wandiko i balwin mawan ka wangoye, kodi gima wabino timo ka wanitye kenyo gi win.
Ato wakitem kwanirok kosa pimirok kodi jomogo ma jokethere tiŋirok malo. Joma wegi jopimere aka joyumere kendigin meno joma jokiryek.
To wan, yumirok mawan kokali kew; bino bedo i kew ma tich ma Were oketho ri wan, ma rwako kir tich mawan ri win iye.
Aka wakikadhi bor gi kew mawan ka wayumere, rupiri win won ama wabino bongi win, munyo wakelo Wach Maber kwoŋ Kristo.
Amomiyo wakiyumere gi tich pa joman ayin. Kuchiel, wageno ni yeyo mewin bino dongo, aka wabino nyalo timo tich madwoŋ maloyo i dyer win.
Meno aka wanyalo tito Wach Maber i piny man ma kalo kamewin, ma wakiyumere gi tich ma joman ama jotyeko timo i ndelo pa dhano man.
Paka ndiiko wacho, “Ŋata mito yumirok, woyumere i Ruoth.”
Kole ŋata won pakere k'ama ji yeyere gine, to joma Ruoth won ama oyero ayino ama ji yeyere gi jo.
Ayenyo ni widiy chuny win kodan, kada chale pa abedo mamiŋ ye. Aka aŋeyo ni witimo ameno!
Atimo nyieko ri win paka Were timo; ato wichalo nyako maliw ma atyeko yiko ni wonywomere gi jachwo achiel kende, aka manago Kristo.
To alworo ni paro mewin bino nyiekere to wiweyo miyirok mewin maradyeri odoko ma kichutho ma winitye gine ri Kristo paka Eva otimo munyo jwogi owondo go gi twodo pere ma nyaryekoryeko.
Kole wirikin jolo dhano jye ma bino bongi win, kada ŋato fuonjo kwoŋ Yesu man, ma kiweno ma wafuonjo win kwoŋe; aka wijolo chuny kodi Wach Maber mopokere gi ma winwaŋo bongi wan.
Akipar nike ani chien kada masisiri kwoŋ jomoor mewin ma nyakare no!
Kono akifuonjere i luwo, to ki i ryeko be; aka watyeko nyutho win gime kamaler hongo jye kodi i gimoro jye.
Munyo atito ri win Wach Maber mapa Were akiyenyo kwoŋ win wodho chul moro; amwole ŋey atiŋ win malo. Meno onyo atimo marachi?
Kole onwaŋo akwalo lim pa jokristo man munyo ajolo kony pajo ma tich ri win ayino!

Aka munyo abedo gi win akijoko win ni wikonyan kada munyo onwaŋo ayenyo pesa; kole jomoyeyo ma Masedonia ama jokelo ran gimoro jye moido ayenyo. Fuodi akikelo ri win peko moro, kendo akibino timo ameno kir yu waŋe!
G'adyeri pa Kristo i an, achiko ni yumirok paran me ongoye ŋata bino juko kamoro jye i Yunani.
Raŋo ma awacho ama? Obedo rupiri akimaro wini? Kole Were oŋeyo ni amaro win.
Abino medere gi timo gima atimo, ŋey ageŋ “jomoor” man no bedo kodi atoŋa ma yumirok gi wacho ni bende jotiyo paka wan.
Jono jokobedo jomoor maradyeri; jobedo jomoor matwodo, ma jokethere ni jo bende jomoor pa Kristo.
Aka meno ki gidhyer, rupiri kir Sitan bende twodo to lokere paka malaika ma lero!
Amomiyo kobedo gidhyer ka jotich pere bende jotwodo ni jobedo jotich ma lero. Rumachien jobino limo gima ripo gi jo tirtir ru gikipiny ma jotimo.
Adoko amedo wacho: moro wokiri wopari nike amiŋ. To ka wiparo ameno, ere jolan win to kada paka ŋatamiŋ, aka ŋey ayumereye nyaka mathin.
Ato wach ma aluwo me kobedo wach ma wok bongi Ruoth; to me onyo aluwo paka ŋatamiŋ.
Paka nitye jomathoth ma joyumere gi nyaka gikipiny ma nyapiny, abende onyo aletimo ameno.
Ato wiryek ri win, amomiyo wiyeyere kir gi jomamiŋ!
Aka wiyeyere gi moro jye ma bino miyo win or ma nger jye, kosa loko win ŋechin, kosa chiemo kwoŋ win, kosa limo ŋaŋo i nyapo mewin, kosa chayo win, kosa goyo lembi win adhoŋ.
Kole wiyan kwot ka apoyo ni oido wanyap swa ma wakinyalo timo ameno. To ka moro timo miseni to yumere gi gimoro, ka aluwo paka ŋatamiŋ, abende onyo aletimo miseni ma yumirok amanago.
Jobedo Joyudaya? Kole an bende! Jobedo Joisrael? Kole an bende! Jobedo nyikway Ibrayimu? Kole an bende!

Jobedo jotich pa Kristo? Ka aluwo pa janeko, abedo jatich maber loyo jo! Atyeko tiyo matek loyo jo, atyeko bedo i twech ndir mathoth loyo jo, otyek chwadan ndir madit loyo jo, aka atyeko bedo chiegin gi tho ndir mathoth loyo.
Dibich Joyudaya jochwadan adasa pyero adek g'abuŋwen;
Joroma jogoyan gi ludhe didek, aka ogoyan gi telin dichiel; yee otyeko bare ran i pi didek, aka dichiel achowo sawa pyero aryo g'aŋwen i dyer wakawaka munyo lekaleka kodan.
I woth paran momore aboth ri mikula ma jwombe, kodi jomach; aboth kwoŋ ji ma piny paran won, kodi ri Jopath; aboth i tindi, kodi i thim; aboth kwoŋ nam madongo, kodi kwoŋ jomoyeyo matwodo.
Atyeko tich gi olo; ndir mathoth akibil nindo; abedo gi kech kodi riyo; ndir mathoth akichiem, odoko koyo goyan kinyoro.
Aka, m'akitucho gikipiny man, ndir jye abedo i rembo ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo jye.
Ka dhano nyap, abende abedo manyap gine; ka moro opodho i gimarach, kole awinjo gi rem.
Ka ripere ayumere, abino yumirok kodi gikipiny ma nyutho paka anyap.
Were kodi Baa Ruodhiwan Yesu, moripo g'apaka chil gi chil, oŋeyo nike akitwodi!
Munyo fuodi oido anitye Damasiko, gavana ma ndir pa Kere Areto oketho jokur i waŋkach ma tindi makan.
To owodhan munyo ichwayan piny i adita, gi i hoŋ moro i kor ot, ameno t'abudho go.
Aripo medo yumirok kada kikel bero moro. Onyo pama abino luwo kwoŋ chal ma menyere kodi menyirok ma Wach ma Ruoth omiyan.
Aŋeyo jakristo moro ma oro apar gaŋwen mokadho oyudhi go titero i polo maradek malo (akiŋeyo kuya gino otimere i del, kosa go oneno chal momenyere rigo; Were won amoŋeyo).
Weyi adok'amedi wacho: aŋeyo ni ŋato oyudhi titero i polo (to akuya ni gino otimere i del, kosa obedo chal momenyere ri go; Were won amoŋeyo).
Oter go i kabedo ma di syem i polo, aka kenyo go owinj'iye gikipiny makiwachere; gikipiny ma dhok dhano kinyal luwo.
Amomiyo, abino yumere kapa ŋato; to akibino yumirok kwoŋan an won, kwanyo woko gikipiny ma nyutho paka anyap.
Kada bedi amito yumirok, jye d'akibedo ŋatamiŋ rupiri d'aluwo giradyeri. To akoyumere, rupiri akimiti moro wobedi gi paro mamalo kwoŋan ma kalo gima go otyeko nenan atimo kosa owinjo munyo awacho.
To ma jukan ŋey akir akwoti gi pakirok ru menyirok ma urere m'aneno, okethi kwoŋan gima chalo okudho, ma tiyo paka jamikwenda pa Sitan ma wochandan aka wojukan akir abedi gi kwoto.
Didek akwayo Ruoth i wach me, ni wokwanyi woko gino.
To go odwokan ni, “Ŋono paran romin; kole men paran asere kama nyapo ni iye.” Amomiyo, asangala swa pakirok gi nyapo paran, ŋey men pa Kristo wobedi kwoŋan.
Aŋiyo ran gi nyapo, yet, chandirok, lweny pa ji kodi teko ru tich ri Kristo. Kole ka angoye gi men meno aka nyaka atek.
Onyo alokere paka ŋatamiŋ, aka wiŋati wimiyan abedo ameno. Kole wiŋati onwaŋo wiripo fuoyan, rupiri kada akibedo gimoro, to aki ni chien loyo “jomoor” mewin ma nyakare no.
Kole gikipiny ma nyutho ni dhano obedo jamoor maradyeri otim gi diyo chuny moasere i dyer win: ranyuth, giraura kodi tich madongo ma men.
Aŋo ma wikeŋ loyo kitipa pa jomoyeyo man, kwanyo woko nike akikwayo win kony. Mondo chwakan win kwoŋ kibenga no!

Me onyo maradek m'ayikere bino lyewo win, aka akibino mito gimoro kwoŋ win. Ayenyo win ayino, to ki gikipiny mewin. Kuchiel nyithindho mathindho k'ama jolimo gikipiny ri jonywol, to jonywol ama jolimo gikipiny ri nyithindho pajo mathindho.
Abino kisangala oro gimoro jye ma ani gine, ma kada an won gipi orirok ma konyo win. Ka amaro win tektek ameno, onyo wiŋati winomaran mathin ma kiromi?
Amomiyo, wibino yeyo ni, oido akibedo byeto ri win. To wiwacho ni abedo jaryeko aka achiiko win gi bwo ma twodo.
Nitye gima akwanyo kwoŋ win i jomikwenda m'adhiro ri wini?
Adhiro Tito ni wobin, aka adhiro go kir gi omin wan man ni wowothi gine. Kosa nitye gima Tito okwanyo kwoŋ wini? Nyutho ni wakitiyo g'atoŋa achieli? Kosa wakitimo chan achieli?
Oido wiparo ni hongo jye watemo gwoko thenge mawan i waŋ wini? Waluwo paka Kristo mito ni waluw i waŋ Were, aka gimoro jye ma watimo jowotan, kole watimo ma konyo win!

Alworo ni kono kani atundo kenyo anyalo nwaŋo ni wipokere kodi paka oido d'ayenyo wibedi, kosa kareno aŋata apokere kodi paka di wiyenyo abedi. Alworo ni abino nwaŋo widhaw, kosa witimo nyieko, wioro nge kosa witimo mima, winyieko nyingi jowoti win kodi luwirok kichar, pakirok kodi nywowirok.
Alworo nike ruman ka abino, Were paran bino miyan anwaŋo wichkwot t'aywak ru jomathoth ma jotimo recho i ndir mokadho aka fuodi jokoŋuto timo gikipiny makoch, chot kodi timo gi wichkwot.
Me onyo maradek ma abino lyewo win. “Jokony ripo bedo aryo kosa adek ma joridho kis banja mokel kwoŋ nyatoro.”

Ndir cha aniaŋo win kwoŋ jomotimo gimarecho munyo alyewo win mararyo; to adoko awacho kendo pama ma angoye bongi win ni: ka abino kendo, akibino weyo ŋatotimo recho chon kosa manyien ma kolimo girachula.
Ato wimito ŋeyo adyeri ka Kristo luwo i an. Go kinyap ka tiyere gi win; kuchiel go nyutho men pere i dyer win.
Kole ogur go wi musalaba i nyapo, to gi men pa Were go odoko kwo. Wabende wanyap i go; to gi men pa Were wabino kwo ka watiyere gi win.
Kaŋasa win kwo mewin winen ka fuodi wini gi yeyo. Wikuya ni Kristo Yesu nitye i wini? Kono kosa timo ameno odhyero win kichutho.
Ageno ni wibino ŋeyo ni kikaŋasa kwo mawan kodhyero wan.
Wakwayo Were ni di wikitim recho, ki ma nyutho ni kono wanyalo gimoro jye, to ni witim gimotire, kada wanochal jomopodho.
Ato wakinyal timo gima pyemo kodi adyeri pa Were, rupiri watiyo ri adyeri no.
Wasangala kada wabedo manyap tekin winitye gi men. Amomiyo, wakwayo nike wibende widongi i leŋo.
Andiko gime munyo angoye bongi win; atimo ameno ni ka atundo bongi win akir ater win gi mbaka, kareno aoro men ma Ruoth omiyan ma dongo win, ma kiweno ma reyo win woko.
Onyo jowotan, kutho win! Tiri win kwo mewin; winji win gima awacho; yeyere win wiwegi, bedi win i syem; aka Were ma jamar kodi syem bino bedo gi win.
Mothere win akor gi leŋo.
Ji pa Were jye jodhiro ri win moth.
Ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu Kristo, mar pa Were, kodi riwirok pa Chuny Maleŋ wobedi kodi wijojye.
An Paulo jamoor, ma lwoŋo pere kowok bongi dhano kosa kwoŋ dhano, to bongi Yesu Kristo kodi Were Baa wan, mochierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
Jomoyeyo jye ma jo ni ka joriwere kodan i dhiro moth ri kweth pa jokristo ma Galasya:
Weyi Were Baa wan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo womiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Kristo omiyo kwo pere ru gimarecho mawan, ŋey wobothi wan kwoŋ ndir marach ma pama, i mito pa Were mawan ma Baa wan.
Dwoŋ wobedi ri Were chil gi chil! Ameno.
Adhyer kwoŋ win! I hongo machiek won onyo wijala ŋata olwoŋo win i ŋono pa Kristo, aka onyo wiluwo wach man ayino,
ma kobedo kir “Wach Maber!” Nenere paka nitye jomogo ma joruwo paro mewin aka jotemo wiro woko Wach Maber pa Kristo.
To kada obedi wan kosa malaika mowok i polo ama ofuonji win wach man mopokere kodi ma watyeko fuonjo win, weyi wothumi ri jo banja ma kidho i mach makitho!
Watyeko wacho gime chon, aka onyo odoko awacho kendo: ka nitye nyatoro ma fuonjo win wach man mopokere kodi ma wityeko jolo, weyi wothumi ri go banja ma kidho i mach makitho!
Onyo wiparo ni atemo dwaro fuoy pa ji, kosa apa Were ayin? Kosa wiparo ni atemo kisangala ji? Bedi fuodi atemo kisangala ji d'akibedo jatich pa Kristo be.
Amito ni wiŋey gime, wutimera: Wach Maber ma afuonjo dhano ama kochwogo.
Akinwaŋo wach me kwoŋ dhano, dhano ama kofuonjan; to, Yesu Kristo won ama onyuthan.
Kole wityeko winjo paka kwo paran oido nitye munyo oido amoko i din ma Nyayudaya, paka alwenyo gi kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were mongoye wor, aka atemo i royo jye reyo woko jo.
Onwaŋo atelo Joyudaya mathoth ma luse paran i mako din ma Nyayudaya. Aka onwaŋo aloyo jo gi ridho kula pa kwarere mawan.
To Were won, gi ŋono pere ama oyeran denge ma fuodi konywolan, to lwoŋan tich ri go.
Aka munyo oridho nyuthan Wuode, ŋey afuonji Jopath Wach Maber kwoŋ go, akikidho bongi nyatoro rango ryeko,
odoko akikidho Yerusalem neno joma jotelo bedo ran jomoor. To, akidho Arabya mayot, aka nyaka adwoko Damasiko.
Munyo oro okadho adek, aka nyaka akidho Yerusalem wendo ri Petro, to achowo bonge ndelo apar g'abich.
Akineno jomoor man kwanyo woko Yakobo, omin Ruoth.
Aridho ri win i waŋ Were ni gima andiko ri win me kobedo twodo.
Rumachien akidho i adech ma Sirya kodi Silisya.
I hongo no jye kitipa pa jomoyeyo i Yudeya oido fuodi jokuya an odocho.
Oido jotyeko winjo nyaka gima joman jowacho kende ni, “Jal ma yado lwenyo gi wan onyo pama fuonjo yeyo ma go oido otemo reyo woko!”
Gikenyo jopako Were ru wach ma jowinjo kwoŋan.
Munyo oro apar g'aŋwen okadho, agik Yerusalem kodi Barunaba, kareno akwanyo Tito bende awotho gine.

Akidho rupiri Were oido onyuthan nike akidhi; aka anyutho jotel Wach Maber moido atito ri Jopath. To atimo gino nyaliŋliŋ gi lworo munyo akimito nike tich paran i hongo mokadho kosa ma pama wotho nono.
Odoko nyawotan Tito, kada oido obedo Jayunani, koromi go thumirok.

Ato jomogo, ma jorendere nike jobedo jomoyeyo jowot wan, jodonjo i dyer wan, aka oido jomito ni wothumi go. Jome oido jolwi paka jopendo ka jomito ŋeyo ni syem aŋo ma wani gine i Kristo Yesu. Jono oido jomito loko wan ŋechin.
Wakiyeyo ri jo kada masisiri, ŋey adyeri ma Wach Maber wodoŋi ri win.
To joma oido itero jo paka jotel (awacho ama rupiri kikel ran pokirok moro gima onwaŋo jobedo; kole Were kinen dhano chungo kwoŋ chal mawoko), jokomedo wach moro jye manyien kwoŋ mikwenda paran.
Kuchiel, joneno ni Were oido omiyan tich ma fuonjo Jopath Wach Maber paka oido omiyo Petro tich ma fuonjo Joyudaya.
Ato Were moido tiyo i Petro paka jamoor pa Joyudaya, bende ama oido tiyo i an paka jamoor pa Jopath.

Yakobo, Petro, kodi Yohana, ma jobedo jotel, joyeyo riwo chingi jo gi wan kodi Barunaba munyo joniaŋ kwoŋ mich ma Were omiyan i ŋono pere. Wayeyere ni wan watiyi i dyer Jopath aka jo jowotiyi i dyer Joyudaya.
Joyenyo kwoŋ wan gimoro achiel kende ni wapoyi jochandi, aka meno a gima oido abende ayiko timo.
Munyo Petro obino Antyok, apyemo gine i dyer ji, rupiri banja oido loyo go kamaler.

Munyo fuodi jomogo ma Yakobo odhiro jokotundo kenyo, Petro onwaŋo chiemo kodi Jopath ma joyeyo. To munyo jome jotundo, to go dhire gichien munyo kwero chiemo gi jono rupiri go oido lworo joma joyenyo ni Jopath bende jowothumere.
Gino omiyo Joyudaya man ma joyeyo bende jochako rendirok paka Petro; ma kir Barunaba bende oido tim ago ywayo go.

Munyo aneno ni jokiwothi i yo ma ripo kodi adyeri ma Wach Maber, awacho ri Petro i waŋ jojye ni, “Ka in Jayudaya, itero kite pa Japath, ma kiweno apa Jayudaya, inyalo nedi temo romo Jopath nike jowoteri kite pa Joyudaya?”
Adyer wabedo Joyudaya i nywolirok mawan, ma kiweno Jopath ma jotimi recho.
To waŋeyo ni dhano iketho i tiro gi Were i yeyo kwoŋ Yesu Kristo, ma kiweno i timo gima Chik wacho. Kole ongoye ŋata iketho i tiro gi Were i timo gima Chik wacho.
Onyo ka watemo ni wokethi wan i tiro gi Were, to nwaŋere nike fuodi wabedo jorecho paka Jopath, meno nyutho ni kosa Kristo tiyo ma konyo recho? Kameno be!
Ka achako kendo gero gima atyeko kedho woko, meno nyutho ni aturo Chik.
Ato atyeko tho kwoŋ luwo Chik, aka Chik won ama onekan, ŋey akwo ri Were. Otyek guran wi musalaba gi Kristo;
pama onyo aŋata akikwo, to Kristo ama kwo i an. Aka kwo ma pama ani gine, nitye i yeyo Wuodi Were m'omaran to miyo kwo pere ran.
Akikwer ŋono pa Were, rupiri ka dhano okethi i tiro gi Were ru luwo Chik, nyutho ni Kristo kere otho nono.
Win Jogalasya mamiŋ! Ŋata omyeno win? Kole otiti i waŋ win won paka Yesu Kristo ogur wi musalaba!
Amito wiwachi ran nyaka gimoro achiel kende: wilimo Chuny Maleŋ pa Were i timo gima Chik wacho, kosa i winjo gi yeyo gima wiwinjo?
Winyalo nedi bedo mamiŋ ameno! Wityeko chako gi Chuny, to odoko wiyenyo chowo gi men ma nyadel ayin nedi?
Chandirok ma wityeko nwaŋo jye onyo otho nono? Adyer oido ongoye gima di winwaŋo ye?
Were miyo win Chuny Maleŋ pere aka timo giraura i dyer win rupiri witimo gima Chik wacho, kosa rupiri wiyeyo Wach Maber ma wiwinjo?
Kole ndiiko luwo kwoŋ Ibrayimu ni, “Go oyeyo Were, aka yeyo pere amomiyo Were ojolo go paka ŋatotire.”
Amomiyo, wiripo ŋeyo ni joma jonitye gi yeyo, meno a nyikway Ibrayimu maradyeri.
Aka ndiiko oneno chon ni Were d'oketho Jopath i tiro kodi go i yeyo. Amomiyo, ndiiko onyutho Ibrayimu Wach Maber chon kichutho ni, “Were bino miyo ji jye silwany kwoŋin;”
amomiyo ji jye ma joyeyo jolimo silwany paka chango Ibrayimu olimo.
Aka dhano jye ma chwire i winjo Chik meno ni gi kwoŋ ayino i kwo pere, rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Ŋata ndir jye kiwinji aka kitimi gimoro jye mondik i kitawo ma Chik meno ŋato okwoŋ!”
Obedo adyeri ni ongoye ŋata nwaŋo tiro i waŋ Were chungo kwoŋ Chik, rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Jomotire jobino kwo chungo kwoŋ yeyo.”
To Chik kichungi kwoŋ yeyo; kuchiel wacho ni, “Ŋata timo gimoro jye ma chik wacho bino kwo gine.”
Munyo Kristo olokere ŋata okwoŋ kawaŋ wan, ogonyo wan woko kwoŋ kwoŋ ma Chik kelo, rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Nyatoro jye molyer wi yath meno ŋata okwoŋ.”
Meno, aka ŋey womiy Jopath silwany ma Were ochiko Ibrayimu i Yesu Kristo, aka wanyal jolo Chuny ma Were ochiko chungo kwoŋ yeyo.
Wutimera, weyi akeli ranen kwoŋ gima kis ndelo: ka ji aryo joyeyere kwoŋ wach moro to jotimo chikirok i Ndiiko, ngoye ŋata nyalo turo chikirok no kosa medo kwoŋe gimoro.
I yo achiel, Were otimo chikirok pere kodi Ibrayimu gi nyakware. Ndiiko kiwachi ni gi “nyikwaye,” ma nyutho ni ji mathoth, to wacho ni, “gi nyakwarin,” dwoŋ mere ni ŋatachiel, mobedo Yesu Kristo.
Dwoŋ gima awacho ame: Chik, mobino rumachien ma oro miya aŋwen gi pyero adek, kinyal turo chikirok to reyo woko gima Were ochiko.
Kole ka lunjo lim bedo ru Chik motyek ketho meno nyutho ni gino kowok i chikirok moro. To Were i ŋono pere omiyo Ibrayimu gima go wolunji rupiri oido otimo gine chikirok.

To raŋo m'owodhi Chik? Owodhi Chik ru tim pa ji marecho, aka omiti ni wobedi chuka bino pa nyakwar Ibrayimu, m'otim gine chikirok. Jomalaika jokonyo i kelo Chik no kareno dhano ama obedo jathek ma chungo i dyer ji gi Were.
Aka jathek tiyo i dyer ji ma kalo achiel; Were obedo ŋatachiel ma nitye i thenge achiel.
Meno nyutho ni Chik pyemo gi chikirok pa Were? Be, kameno. Ato bedi wodhi chik ma d'okelo kwo ri ji, dwoŋ mere ni dhano d'onyal ketho i tiro gi Were chungo kwoŋ chik nago.
To ndiiko wacho ni gimoro jye ma piny nitye i men pa gimarach, to joma joyeyo jolenyalo limo mich m'ochik chungo kwoŋ yeyo Yesu Kristo.
Ma fuodi ndir ma yeyo kotundo, Chik onwaŋo oketho wajojye i twech, chuka wonyuthi yeyo kamaler.
Amomiyo Chik ama oido kuro wan paka jafuonji ma tiro wan nyuka Kristo wobin, ŋey wokethi wan i tiro gi Were i yeyo.
Paka ndir pa yeyo onyo otyeko tundo, jafuonji ma tiro ji no onyo ama kikur wan kendo.
Kole i Kristo Yesu wijojye onyo wibedo nyithindho pa Were chungo kwoŋ yeyo mewin.
Ato wijojye ma wilimo batisimo i Kristo, onyo wiruko kwoŋ win Kristo won gipi.
Amomiyo pokirok ongoye kwoŋ Joyudaya kodi Jopath, kwoŋ ŋechin kodi joma ni syem, kwoŋ chwo gi mon: wijojye wibedo achiel i Kristo Yesu.
Ka wibedo apa Kristo, kole meno wibedo nyikway Ibrayimu, aka wibedo musikin ma jobino lunjo lim ma Were ochiko.
Gima awacho ame: nyathi majachwo ma kidho lunjo lim pa bamere itero paka ŋecha ka fuodi go thin, kada go won oido a won gimoro jye.
I ketho rigo joma kuro go aka jotimo tich pere nyuka hongo ma bamere ochano tund'iye.
Meno apaka wabende munyo fuodi wathindho i gikipiny ma nyachuny onwaŋo wabedo ŋechin kareno chuny ma piny me amoido dhumo wan.
To munyo hongo motire otundo, Were ooro Wuode won, ma dhako bende ama onywolo, aka obedo i Chik pa Joyudaya,
ŋey wogonyi joma oido jonitye i men pa Chik, aka ŋey nyaka walokere nyithindho pa Were akela.
Paka wabedo wote, Were ooro Chuny Maleŋ pa Wuode i chuny wan, Chuny ma koko ni, “Aba, nyaka ni Baba.”
Amomiyo, onyo ikibedo ŋecha, to wuode, aka paka ibedo wuode, ibino lunjo lim moro jye ma Were okano ri wote paka musikin.
I ndir mokadho oido wikiŋeyo Were, amomiyo oido wibedo ŋechin pa gikipiny ma jokobedo were motire.
To paka pama onyo wityeko ŋeyo Were; kosa weyi awachi ni paka pama onyo Were oŋeyo win, winyalo nedi gik kendo bongi chuny manyap ma sisiri no? Raŋo ma wimito lokirok ŋechin pajo kendo?
Wimiyo gikipiny mogo dwoŋ paka: ndelo megi, dwe, ndir, kodi oro!
Kole chunyan raman, ipoyo ameno tich paran jye ri win onyo otho nono.
Akwayo win, wutimera, bedi win paka an, rupiri atyeko bedo paka win. Fuodi wikitimo ran racho moro.
Wipoyo ni gimomiyo afuonjo win Wach Maber kachako obedo two.
To wikichayan kosa kweran, kada two paran no oido obedo ri win tem. Kuchiel wijolan paka di wijolo malaika pa Were, kosa Kristo Yesu!
To aŋo m'onyo odoko otimere mato onwaŋo wisangala? Aka aridho ni onwaŋo winyalo kir golo woko waŋ win won, bedi nyalere, to wimiyan!
Onyo pama atyeko lokere jakwor mewin ru wacho ri win adyeri?
Jono jonyutho win mar g'atoŋa ma kiber. Gima jomito a nyaka pokan gi win, ŋey wibedi gi paro kwoŋ jo ayino, paka bende jo ni gi paro kwoŋ win.
Onyo, ber bedo gi paro kwoŋ dhano kodi atoŋa maber, aka meno apaka ripo bedo ndir jye, to ki nyaka ka anitye gi win kende.
Nyithindho paran ma amaro swa, kendo ma awinjo gi jo malith pa dhako ma nyathi ramo chuka kiti Kristo wowoki kwoŋ win!
Ani g'awanya adyeri ma bedo gi win kanyachiel, ni ipoyo d'awiroye paro m'ani gine kwoŋ win, rupiri arembo swa ri win!
Weyi apenji win ma fuodi witweyere wimito luwo Chik: kosa wikiwinji gima Chik wacho?
Kole ondik ni Ibrayimu oido nitye gi wote aryo, achiel m'olimo gi dhako mobedo ŋecha kodi man m'olimo gi dhako mani syem.
Wuodi pa dhako mobedo ŋecha onywol i yo ma kis ndelo, to wuodi pa dhako mani syem onywol i chikirok pa Were.
Weyi water gime paka agecha ri wan: mon aryo me jobedo paka chikirok aryo, achiel m'owok wi got Sinai, nyithindho pere jobedo ŋechin.
Haga chungo kapa got Sinai i Arabya; aka go obedo giranena kapa Yerusalem ma pama, mobedo ŋecha kanyachiel gi nyithindho pere.
To Yerusalem ma nyapolo nitye i syem, aka go a yoki wan.

Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Sangala, in dhako ma migumba ma nyuka chiene oido fuodi kolimo nyithindho! Galagasa gi kisangala, in ma fuodi oido ikiwinjoye litho manywol! Kole dhako moido ojala onyo bino bedo gi nyithindho madit loyo dhako ma chwore koweyo.”
Onyo win, wutimera, wibedo nyithindho pa Were ma chikirok pere, paka chango Isaka.
Paka i hongo no nyathi m'onywol i yo ma kis ndelo olwenyo kodi nyathi m'onywol gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ; apaka bende nitye pama.
To ndiiko wacho nedi? Wacho ni, “Ryemi woko dhako mobedo ŋecha kir gi wuode, rupiri wuodi pa dhako mobedo ŋecha kolunji lim pa bamere kanyachiel gi wuodi pa dhako mani syem.”
Amomiyo, wutimera, wakibedo nyithindho pa dhako mobedo ŋecha, to apa dhako mani syem ayin.
Kristo otyeko gonyo wan i twech to miyo wan syem! Ri ameno chungi win, paka ji mani syem, aka wikiri wiyey lokirok ŋechin kendo.
Winji win! An Paulo awacho ri win gime: ka wiyeyo thumirok, meno nyutho ni Kristo ongoye gi kony moro ri win.
Amito medo wacho kendo ri dhano jye ma yenyo ni wothum ni go onyo ripo luwo Chik jye.
Win ma wiyenyo nike wokethi win i tiro gi Were chungo kwoŋ Chik kole wityeko pokirok kodi Kristo; aka wityeko kir podho gi eye kwoŋ ŋono pa Were.
To wani gi geno ni Were bino ketho wan i tiro gi go, gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ pa Were matiyo i yeyo mawan; aka meno a gima wakuro.
Kole i Kristo Yesu, thumirok kosa weyo ma kothumere kikel pokirok moro; gimadwoŋ obedo yeyo ayino ma nyuthere i mar.
Kole onwaŋo wiŋwecho maber, to ŋa m'odoko ochiero win winjo adyeri? Ŋato odwoŋo win nedi?
Kiti adwoŋa no kiwoki kwoŋ ŋata olwoŋo win be.
Kole “Nyaka thow manok won ama miyo moko gipi kwot” paka iwacho.
Aka fuodi aridho ni wikobedi gi paro man mopokere, to ŋato, kada bedi ŋa, ma ruwo wiy win no, bino wodho chul mere.
To an, wutimera, kere raŋo ma fuodi ilwenyo kodan k'inen adyeri fuodi afuonjo ni thumirok yenyere? Kole meno nyutho ni fuonji paran kwoŋ musalaba pa Kristo di kikwiny jomogo be.
Ayenyo ni joma jokwinyo win no jowomedere gine; weyi jowomedere gi thumirok.
To win, wutimera, olwoŋ win ni wibedi i syem. To syem me wokiri wolokere ri win gigoŋirok ma yeyo awanya ma del dhumo win. Kuchiel, konyere win chungo kwoŋ mar mewin.
Kole Chik gi bee olok machiek i or achiel ni, “Mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere.”
To ka chale pa wikayere aka wichamere p'ogwange meno kere kure win; ameno winyalo reyere woko kichutho.
Me a gima awacho: wothi win i Chuny aka wikotim gima awanya pa del mito.
Kole awanya pa del lwenyo gi Chuny aka Chuny bende lwenyo kodi awanya pa del; jaryo me jobedo jokwor, aka gino miyo ikinyal timo gima iyenyo ni itim.
Ka Chuny ama telin, meno nyutho ni ikitudere i luwo Chik.
Gima kula pa del timo neno kamaler: neno i kidakana, koch, kodi i tim ma kiripi;
i lamo chal makichar kodi yido, bedo i kwor gi dhano, laro dwoŋ, timo nyieko, mako ŋonge, gwondo, dhawirok, tyakirok,
kigomba gipa dhano, mero, timo woro, kodi timo gikipiny man ma chale gi me. Anyutho win kichutho paka atyeko timo chon, joma timo gikipiny me jokodonji i Ker pa Were.
To Chuny Maleŋ nyak gikipiny me: mar, kisangala, syem, diyo chuny, wor, bero, genirok,
mwolo, kodi kuro chuny. Ongoye chik ma pyemo gi gikipiny paka me!
Aka joma jobedo apa Kristo Yesu jotyeko neko woko kula pajo ma del, kodi ichirok mere kodi awanya mere.
Ka wakwo gi men pa Chuny, meno bende ber wawothi i kwo ma nyachuny.
Wakiri wabedi ma waparo ni wawegi wachowere, kosa watim kisinye kosa watim nyieko gi joman.
Wutimera, komaki moro munyo timo recho moro, win ma wimaro gima nyachuny witir go; to witimi ameno gi mwolo. Aka wiwegi gwokere win, ŋey wikiri widonji i karatem bende.
Konyere win gi tiŋo byeto ma jowoti win ni gine, rupiri ameno aka wibino mako chik pa Kristo.
Ka moro paro ni go gimoro, mato go ongoye gi dwoŋ moro meno won miŋere.
Dhano jye won ripo kikaŋasa kite. Ka ber, won nyalo yumirok gi i chunye, ma kopima kodi gima ŋat man otyeko timo.
Kole dhano jye won ripo tiŋo byeto ma go ni gine.
Ŋat'ifuonjo wach pa Were ripo pokoye gi jafuonji pere gikipiny mabeyo jye ma go ni gine.
Wikiri wiwondere, ongoye ŋata nyalo miŋo Were. Dhano jye kecho gima go ochwoyo.
Ka go ochwoyo i ndelo marawanya pa del pere, go bino kecho kenyo tho; ka go ochwoyo i ndelo ma Chuny, wok kwoŋ Chuny Maleŋ go bino kecho kwo makirum.
Amomiyo, wakiri waol gi timo bero; kole ka wakijok timo ameno, ndir bino tundo ma wabino kech'iye gimanyak.
Amomiyo, hongo jye ma wanitye gi thwolo waripo timo bero ri dhano jye, to tektek ri joma jobedo jowoti wan i yeyo.
Neni win nyikuta madongo m'andiko gine ri win gi chingan won!
Joma jotemo romo win nike withumere meno joma jomito kwoto gi pakirok kwoŋ gikipiny ma nyadel. Ato jotimo ameno nike aka wokiri wolwenyi gi jo ru yeyo musalaba pa Kristo.
Kole kada jomothumere wegi bende jokimaki Chik! Onyo jomito withumere aka ŋey jowoyumere nike wiyeyo tim ma nyadel no.
To an, abino yumirok gi musalaba pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo kende; kole gi musalaba pere aneno pa piny otho ran aka abende atho ri awanya ma piny.
Ki wach moro kosa dhano othumere kosa be. Kole gima dwoŋ a lokirok chwech manyien ayin.
Syem gi wor wobedi ri joma jobino mako tyendi wach me i kwo pajo, kodi ri ji pa Were jye!
Machowe: moro wokiri odoko wojokan; kole waŋpoyo ma anitye gine kwoŋan ka nyutho nike abedo ŋecha pa Yesu.
Weyi ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo wobedi kodi win, wutimera. Ameno.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo jamoor pa Kristo Yesu gi mito pa Were, ri ji pa Were ma jonitye Efeso, jomoyeyo Kristo Yesu aka jogenere i kwo pajo,
Ŋono gi syem mowok bongi Were Bawan kodi Ruoth mawan Yesu Kristo wobedi gi win.
Were wofuoy, Baa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, momiyo wan silwany gi mich jye ma chuny mawok i polo i Kristo.
Chon ma piny fuodi kochwey, go oyero wan bedo apere i Kristo, ni wabedi maleŋ, mongoye apuse ruwaŋ go.
Mar pa Were, omiyo go oridho chon ni walokere nyithindho pere i Yesu Kristo. Me obedo fuoyo pere kodi atoŋa pere.
Meno aka wopaki dwoŋ ma ŋono pere, mich pere ri wan, ma go omiyo wan ma nono i Wuode ma migos.
Kole remo pa Kristo okelo ri wan syem, kodi chwak ma gimarecho mawan, ru ŋono pa Were moasere
ma go okonjo ri wan. Gi ryeko jye kodi niaŋ,
Were otimo gima onwaŋo otyeko chano, to miyo wan ŋeyo chan pere ma nyaliŋliŋ ma go onwaŋo otyeko yiko timo i Kristo.
Chan pa Were ma go bino chowo timo ka ndir otundo, ma kelo chwech jye kanyachiel, gi gimoro jye mani polo kodi mani piny, kareno Kristo a jatel mere.
Kole gimoro jye timere gi chan pa Were kodi paro pere; aka Were oyero wan bende bedo ji pere i chan pere ma go oridho wok i chakirok.
Meno aka nyaka wan ma wapen geno Kristo, wanomiyi dwoŋ pa Were wopak.
Wibende munyo wiwinjo wach maradyeri, Wach Maber mokelo ri win both, wiyeyo Kristo aka Were oketho ranyuth pere kwoŋ win, munyo miyo win Chuny Maleŋ ma go won oido otyeko chiko win.
Chuny Maleŋ obedo ma ridho ni wabino limo gima Were otyeko chiko wan, chuka ji pere jolim both, ŋey dwoŋ pere wofuoy.
Amomiyo chuka awinji kwoŋ yeyo mewin i Ruoth Yesu kodi paka wimaro ji pa Were jye,
akikeŋ ketho Were walwa ri win gi poyo win i kwayo paran,
aka akwayo Were pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, Bawan mani gi dwoŋ, ni womiyi win Chuny Maleŋ, ma bino loko win maryek to nyutho win Were, nike wiŋeyi go maber.
Odoko akwayo nike paro ma chuny win woyawere ma neno lero pa Were, to wiŋeyo geno ma go olwoŋ'iye win, kodi silwany madwoŋ ma go ochiko ji pere,
kendo paka men pere madwoŋ moasere tiyo ri wan ma wayeyo. Men no dwoŋ tektek,
aka ama go ooro ma chierino Kristo kwoŋ jomotho, to miyo go bedo yu chinge marachuch i polo.
Yesu Kristo dhumo jodhum jye, jodongo, jomeni, ruodhe; aka nyinge loyo nyingi jo jye minyalo miyo pama kodi i ndir mabino jye.
Were oketho gimoro jye i par tyendi go to miyo go bedo jatel ma gimoro jye i kitipa pa jomoyeyo,
mobedo delkwoŋ Kristo, aka a go won gi kululu ma poŋo kis gimoro iye jye.
I ndir mokadho oido witho i chuny win ru turo chik kodi timo gimarecho.
I ndir no oido wiluwo yo marecho ma nyapiny; oido wiluwo ruoth ma dhumo ker ma hongo malo, chuny ma pama dhumo ji ma jochayo Were.
Aka wajojye oido wachalo jo, munyo watimo gima chuny wan marecho oido tero wan iye, aka watimo gima delkwoŋ wan gi paro mawan oyenyo. Paka joman jye, di wabende walimo girachula pa Were.
To Were moŋaŋ gi ŋono, i mar pere madwoŋ m'omaro gine wan,
kada oido watho i chuny wan ru turo chik ma waturo, omiyo walimo kwo kanyachiel gi Kristo; aka wiboth chungo kwoŋ ŋono pa Were.
Aka Were ochierino wan gi Kristo, to ketho wan kanyachiel gine i kabedo mapolo i Kristo Yesu.
Otimo ama ma nyutho ŋono pere moŋaŋ moasere, munyo timo ri wan bero i Kristo Yesu.
Kole ru ŋono amomiyo wiboth chungo kwoŋ yeyo; aka me kobedo tim mewin wiwegi, to obedo mich pa Were.
Kobedo ru tim, ma moro d'opakere.
Wabedo chwech pa Were, aka ochweyo wan i Kristo Yesu, ni wabedi gi tim mabeyo, ma chango go oyiko chon ni wabedi gine.
Amomiyo win Jopath, ma Joyudaya jolwoŋo ni “joma kothumere,” aka wegi jolwoŋere ni “jomothumere” (gima mako kwoŋ gima wegi jotimo gine delkwoŋ gin) poyi win gima chango oido wibedo.
Poyi win ni i hongo no oido fuodi winitye bor gi Kristo. Onwaŋo wijokichar aka oido wikikwanere paka jokweth pa Israel. Oido wingoye i chikirok, kodi geno, kendo oido wingoye gi Were i piny.
To pama, i Kristo Yesu, win monwaŋo wini bor, onyo okel win chiegin, ru remo pa Kristo.
Kole Kristo won ama obedo syem mawan, moriwo Joyudaya gi Jopath kanyachiel. Go oturo woko chiel moido kelo pokirok aka miyo jo bedo jokwor.
Okwanyo woko Chik pa Joyudaya gi thenethene mere gi delkwoŋe, ŋey woloki nonin aryo me ji achiel i go, to kelo syem.
Tho pa Kristo wi musalaba oreyo woko dakirok; to riwo nonin aryo no gi Were i del achiel.
Ameno Kristo obino to tito Wach Maber ri win moido wini bor gi Were, gi kelo syem ri joma oido jo ni chiegin gi Were.
I Kristo wajojye wani gi thwolo i Chuny Maleŋ achiel ma kidho bongi Were Bawan.
Amomiyo, pama onyo wikibedo Jopath kosa jokichar kendo; to wibedo ji achiel gi ji pa Were; jopecho pa Were.
Wibende oger win i tyendi ot ma jomoor kodi jotuchi wach Were jokunyo aka tele ma mako tyelo ot meno Yesu Kristo won gipi.
Ot gipi chungo moriwere i go, to dongo paka ot maleŋ i Ruoth.
Wibende oger win i go, ŋey wibedi Ot ma Were bed'iye i Chuny Maleŋ pere.
Amomiyo an, Paulo jatwech pa Kristo Yesu, kamewin Jopath,
kono wityeko winjo paka Were gi ŋono pere omiyan timo tich ri win:
Were owodho nyaliŋliŋ pere, to nyuthan gima atyeko ndiko i chieko kwoŋe.
Ka wisoma gima andiko, wibino ŋeyo paka aniaŋ kwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ pa Kristo,
ma i hongo mokadho konyuthi ji, to pama Were onyo owodho gi Chuny Maleŋ ri jomoor kodi jotuchi wach pere.
Nyaliŋliŋ no a me: I Wach Maber, Jopath bende onyo jolunjo ŋaŋo pa Were kanyachiel gi Joisrael, paka adeche ma del achiel, aka bende onyo ofudi ri jo gima Were ochiko i Yesu Kristo.
Abedo jafuonji Wach Maber me ru ŋono pa Were momiyan kareno men pere tiyo i an.
Kada oido aŋata aasa thino kwoŋ jomaleŋ jye, Were odyeran ni ater ri Jopath Wach Maber kwoŋ ŋaŋo pa Kristo ma bu gike.
Kendo anyuthi ji paka chan pa Were ma nyaliŋliŋ moido opanere wok chon i paro pa Were mochweyo gimoro jye, ripere aketha i tim.
Nike i ndir ma pama, luwo kwoŋ kitipa pa jomoyeyo, Were wonyuthi jodhum, kodi jomeni machuny ma wi hongo malo ryeko pere gi thenethene mere momore.
Were otimo ama i chan pere ma bu gike, ma go oketho i tim kwoŋ gima Wuode Yesu Kristo Ruodhiwan otimo.
I go, kendo gi yeyo mawan i go, wanitye gi thwolo ma donjo bongi Were gi syem ma chuny wan odile.
Amomiyo, akwayo win ni wikiri wirembi, rupiri chandirok paran ri win bino kelo ri win dwoŋ.
Ri ameno, aguro chongan i nyim Baba,
ma pechin jye mani polo kodi i piny jonwaŋ nyingi jo kwoŋe.
Akwayo Were ni chungo kwoŋ dwoŋ pere moasere, womiyi win men i chuny win, gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ pere.
Odoko ni Kristo wolimi kabedo i chuny win ru yeyo mewin, aka kwo mewin wochungi moridhere i mar,
ŋey win kodi jomaleŋ jye winyali niaŋ kwoŋ lacho, gi boro, gi ŋawirok kodi thutho ma mar pa Kristo.
Aka wiŋey ni mar no loyo ryeko jye, aka Were wopoŋi mich pere gi bee i chuny win.
Onyo ŋata ni gi men ma tiyo i wan nyalo timo gimoasere ma kalo ma wakwayo kosa waparo.
Weyi dwoŋ wobedi ri go, i kitipa pa jomoyeyo go, kodi i Kristo Yesu, ndir jye chil gi chil. Ameno.
Amomiyo, an motweyan ru wach pa Yesu Kristo, akwayo win ni kwo mewin wobedi ma ripo gi lwoŋo mewin.
Bedi win mamwol, ma wimako gikipiny moth, gi diyo chuny, ma wikijoki gi jowoti win, kodi nyutho marok.
Temi win paka winyalo, kuro syem ma riwo win kanyachiel i Chuny Maleŋ.
Del nitye achiel, paka geno obedo achiel ma Were olwoŋ'iye wijojye.
Aka Ruoth nitye achiel, yeyo bende achiel, batisimo bende achiel;
Were nitye achiel, mobedo Baa ji jye, kodi Ruoth pa ji jye, aka tiyo i ji jye, odoko nitye i ji jye.
Dhano jye kwoŋ wan otyeko limo mich moro, ma ripo kodi ma Kristo d'onyalo miyo go,
paka owachi i ndiiko ni, “Munyo go oidho malo, okadho kodi ji mathoth monwaŋo otwey; aka opoko ji mich.”
Onyo, “Oidho malo,” dwoŋ mere aŋo? Dwoŋ mere ni go okutho oloro piny i pendi lowo.
Amomiyo, ŋata oloro piny a ŋata bende odoko oidho malo kalo pondeponde ŋey go woswana gimoro jye i piny.
Go amomiyo ji mich; go oloko jomegi jomoor, joman jotuchi wach Were, joman jotiti Wach Maber, joman oketho bedo jokwath kodi jofuonji.
Otimo ama ma yiko ji pa Were jye ri tich ma nyakristo, ma gero delkwoŋ Kristo.
Ameno aka wajojye wabino bedo i achiel i yeyo mawan kodi i ŋeyo Wuodi Were, to wategino i chuny, ma waripo gi kwo pa Kristo mopoŋ.
Wakiripi odoko bedo pa nyithindho, ma fuonji moro jye kwadho jo korin gi kocha pa koyo, kareno jomogo jowondo wan gi ryekoryeko moro kodi twodo.
Kuchiel ka waluwo g'adyeri munyo wanyutho mar, wabino dongo i royo jye i Kristo, mobedo wich kitipa pa jomoyeyo.
I chan pere, adeche mopokere ma del gipi joriwere kanyachiel gi fuch ma riwo jo. Amomiyo ka kis adech tiyo paka mitere aka del gipi dongo i mar.
Amomiyo, i nyingi Ruoth awacho ri win gime, odoko amedo ridho: kwo mewin odoko kiripi bedo paka apa jokafiri, ma paro pajo ongoye kony.
Chuny jo nitye i mudho, aka jonitye bor gi kwo pa Were ru miŋo pajo; ato wiy gin tek swa.
Paro ma chuny jo otyeko thore woko; kwo pajo nitye i kite marecho kende, aka jotimo gikoch g'awanya madit, mongoye wichkwot.
Meno k'agima wifuonjere kwoŋ Kristo!
Ipoyo kosa wikiwinjo adyeri ma nitye i Yesu maber odocho.
Kole ofuonji win ni wiboli woko kiti win machon, ma awanya marecho oido nyieko.
Paro mewin kodi chuny win ripo lokirok manyien,
aka nyaka wiruki kwo manyien, mochwey i chal pa Were, i tiro kodi leŋo.
Ri ameno, twodo onyo wongoye wok pama. Dhano jye ripo luwo ri nyawote giradyeri, rupiri wajojye wabedo adeche moriw kanyachiel.
Ka wimako nge, gino wokiri worwaki win i gimarach; aka wikiri wibedi gi nge ndelo gipi,
odoko wikiri wimiyi Jwogi thwolo.
Ŋata yado kwalo woweyi kwo, kuchiel wochaki tich, wotimi tich mabeyo gi chinge wonyal kir konyo jochandi.
Weyi win luwo wach ma ramo chuny jo, to luwi win wach mabeyo kendo kodi ma konyo joman, kende ma ripere i hongo moluwi iye no, ŋey wach mewin wonyali kelo ŋono ri joma winjo.
Wikiri wimiy Chuny Maleŋ gut, rupiri go obedo ranyuth ma Were oketho kwoŋ win ri ndelo ma both.
Kwanyi win woko duro, gi keme, kodi nge, gi dhaw kodi nyieko nyingi wadi win.
Bedi win mere ma wimako wor gi jowoti win aka wichwakere i yoto, paka Were ochwako win i Kristo.
Paka wibedo nyithindho pa Were ma kachunye, wiripo temo chalo go.
Wiripo bedo gi mar paka Kristo omaro wan to miyo kwo pere kamawan paka rachow ma ŋwe kur ri Were.
Paka ji maleŋ pa Were, kiripi ni wach ma kidakana, kosa koch, kosa woro wowachi kwoŋ win.
Kendo kiripi ni wach ma wiluwo wobedi ma kwoto wiy jo, mamiŋo, kosa kilyesa makoch. Kuchiel wiripo bedo munyo wifuoyo Were ayino.
Ŋeyi win gime ni: ongoye moro jye ma jachot, makoch, kosa mawor (kole woro chale pa lamo gima kobedo Were) m'olim gimoro i Ker pa Kristo kodi apa Were.
Wikiri wiyey moro wowondi win gi wach mongoye kony, rupiri gikipiny me jye ama bino miyo Were kigaga gi ji ma jokiwinji go.
Amomiyo wikiri wimakere gi kiti ji ma chalo ameno.
Kole chon oido wibedo jomudho, to pama onyo wilokere jolero i Ruoth. Ri ameno wothi win paka nyithidho ma lero.
Kole gima kelo lero obedo gikipiny mabeyo, motire kodi maradyeri.
Temi win fuonjirok gima sangala Ruoth.
Wikiri widonji i tim ma cholo ma kikony, kuchiel wodhi win gikipiny no kamaler.
(Temo luwo kwoŋ gikipiny ma jotimo nyaliŋliŋ kelo kir wichkwot).
Aka gima owodhi tithango kamaler nyaka bino nenere maber;
ato gimoro jye mothangi kamaler lokere lero. Amomiyo nitye wach ma wacho ni, “Chiewi, in janindo me, aka ayi ieye woko bongi jomotho, aka Kristo bino lyel i kwo perin.”
Amomiyo kure win i kwo mewin. Wikiri wibedi pa jomamiŋ, to bedi win pa jomaryek.
Wikiri winyieki hongo ma winitye gine, rupiri me ndir ma recho oaser'iye.
Wikiri wibedi mamiŋmiŋ, to niaŋi win gima Were mito.
Wikiri wimeri gi medho rupiri meno myenirok, to poŋi win gi Chuny Maleŋ ayin.
Weri win wer ma zabul kodi wer man jye machuny. Weri win gi dwondi win mamit ri Ruoth munyo wipako go i chuny win.
Aka fuoyi win Were noknok ri gimoro jye, i nyingi Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
Winjere win paka wiwinjo Kristo.
Mon jowowinji chwogi jo paka jowinjo Ruoth won.
Kole jachwo obedo jatel pa dhako paka Kristo obedo jatel pa kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were, ma jobedo delkwoŋe, aka go won a jaboth pajo.
To paka kitipa pa jomoyeyo winjo Kristo, ameno mon bende jowowinji chwogi jo i gimoro jye.
Chwo, mari win mon mewin paka Kristo omaro kitipa pa jomoyeyo to miyere ri go,
nike woloki go maleŋ kareno lonyo go gi pi kodi wach ma kwo,
ŋey wokeli kitipa no bonge motyeko lony ma bu chilo, kosa mongoye kama ojony kendo mongoye kwoŋe sandi mogo jye.
Ameno chwo bende joripo maro mon pajo paka delkwoŋ gin won. Ŋata omaro chiege meno won omarere.
(Ongoye moro ma ruman dak delkwoŋe won, kuchiel pidho aka kuro maber, paka Kristo timo ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo,
rupiri wabedo adeche ma delkwoŋe.)
Amomiyo jachwo weyo bamere gi yokimere to chwire kwoŋ chiege to jaryo no jolokere del achiel.
Me obedo wach mopondo madwoŋ swa, aka me onyo ageda ka akidho kwoŋ Kristo kodi kitipa pa jomoyeyo go.
Ri ameno jachwo jye ripo maro chiege paka won omarere, aka dhako bende ripo miyo chwore dwoŋ.
Nyithindho, winji win jonywol mewin i Ruoth, rupiri obedo gimotire timo ameno.
“Lwori benin gi yokin,” obedo or moteli medo gi chikirok iye ni,
“Aka nyaka gimoro jye bino bedo rin maber, t'iyindira i piny.”
Jonywol, wikiri wikuri nyithindho mewin i yo ma miyo jo nge. Kuchiel, fuonji win jo jowodongi i tim mabeyo kodi i fuonji pa Ruoth.
Ŋechin, winji win ruodhe mewin ma piny ka, gi lworo kodi kirin; aka witimi tich gi chuny win achiel, igani witimo ri Kristo won gipi.
Winji win jo, ki nyaka ni jowofuoyi win ka joneno win, to tiyi win paka jotich pa Kristo, ma jotimo gima Were yenyo.
Timi win tich mewin gi kisangala, igani witiyo ri Ruoth, ma kiweno ri ji.
Poyi win ni Ruoth bino miyo dhano jye kemba, kada bedi ŋecha kosa ŋata ni syem, ru tich pere maber ma go otimo.
Onyo ruodhe, wibende kuri win ŋechin mewin ameno. Weyi win bwoko jo paka wiŋeyo ni win kodi ŋechin mewin jye wibedo apa Ruoth achiel i polo, ma thumo banja ri dhano jye mongoye yero.
Machowe, bedi win ma wichwiny i Ruoth, kanyachiel gi i men pere moasere.
Ruki win gilweny jye ma Were poko, aka nyaka winonyali chungo matek gi chiro bwo pa jwogi.
Ato wakilwenyi gi ji wadi wan, to gi jodhum mogo, gi ruodhe mogo, kodi jomeni ma cholo ma piny me, kodi jodhum marecho machuny, ma wi hongo malo.
Amomiyo ruki win gilweny pa Were gipi, ŋey ka ndelo ma racho otundi, wibino nyalo chiro lweny pa jakwor, aka ka wityeko lwenyo kir i gike, bino nwaŋo ni fuodi witek.
Amomiyo chungi win matek, aka adyeri ama wobedi del mothoko pyer win, tiro ama wiruki paka kwot ma nyweny i dakoriwin,
aka yikirok ma tito Wach Maber ma kelo syem wobedi war ma tyendi win.
Medo kwoŋ gikipiny no jye, tiŋi win yeyo paka kwot mewin; meno ama wibino geŋo gi kweyo gine asere malyel mach ma Ŋatarach obay.
Kethi win both paka junga ma gwoko wiy win, aka wach pa Were paka abor ma Chuny Maleŋ miyo win.
Aka bedi win i kwayo, munyo wikwayo kony pa Were i royo momore hongo jye, paka Chuny nyutho win. Amomiyo bedi win milengela aka wikiri wilachere ndir jye, to kwayi win ri ji pa Were.
Kwayi win ran bende ni Were womiyan mikwenda ka ayikere luwo, ŋey aluwi gi miseni ka amiyo ji ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ ma Wach Maber.
Kole abedo jamikwenda ma Wach Maber kada pama anitye i twech. Kwayi win ni abedi gi miseni ma luwo wach no paka ripere atimi.
Tichiko, omin wan ma jatich ma genere i tich pa Ruoth, bino kilyesa ri win kis gimoro, to wiŋeyo paka anitye, kodi gima atimo.
Amomiyo adhiro go bongi win, wiŋey paka wanitye, aka wokweyi chuny win.
Were Baba kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo, womiyi jomoyeyo jye syem gi mar, medo wi yeyo.
Ŋono wobedi gi ji jye ma jomaro Ruoth Yesu Kristo gi mar makirum.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo kodi Timotheyo, jotich pa Kristo Yesu, Ri ji maleŋ pa Were jye ma jobedo Filipya ma joyeyo Kristo Yesu, kanyachiel kodi jotel ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo kodi jokony:
Weyi Were Bawan kodi Yesu Kristo womiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Afuoyo Were paran ri wijojye ndir jye ka aparo kwoŋ win;
aka noknok ka akwayo ri win, akwayo gi kisangala,
rupiri wikonyan gi tich ri Wach Maber wok ndelo marapena tundo konon.
Amomiyo aŋeyo gime nike: Were m'ochako tich maber i win, bino medere gine chuka orum i Ndelo pa Kristo Yesu.
Obedo gimaber ran paro ama kwoŋ win rupiri winitye i chunyan. Odoko, wiriwere kodan i ŋono ma Were omiyan me, ma bedo i twech kodi ma gwoko gi ridho Wach Maber.
Were oŋeyo nike aluwo adyeri ka awacho ni aparo kwoŋ win gi paro pa Yesu Kristo won.
Aka me a kwayo paran ri win: nike mar mewin womedere dongo noknok, i ŋeyo gimoro gi niaŋ maber i wach,
aka nyaka wibino nyalo yero gima oasa bero. Meno aka wibino bedo ma bu chilo moro jye kodi apuse i ndelo pa Kristo.
Kwo mewin bino nyak olemo ma kite mabeyo, ma Yesu Kristo won ama kelo, to miyo Were dwoŋ kodi pak.
Amito wiŋey, wutimera, nike gikipiny motimere ran otyeko konyo swa nyayo Wach Maber.
Gimowok iye, jokur jye ma chiel pa kere kodi joman jye jonyalo ŋeyo nike anitye i twech ka ru tich pa Kristo.
Aka bedo paran i twech otyeko miyo wutimere i Ruoth ma loyo thoth miseni ma medo tito wach pa Were gi derino mongoye lworo.
Iyadyeri jomogo kwoŋ jo jofuonjo wach pa Kristo gi nyieko kodi dhawirok, to joman jofuonjo gi paro maber.
Joman me jotimo ameno i mar, rupiri joŋeyo ni okethan ka ma wodho kony ri Wach Maber.
To jonicha jofuonjo kwoŋ Kristo gi woro ma kiweno g'adyeri, aka wegi jomito tiŋirok malo ayin; joparo nike jonyalo kisigila ran teko man ma fuodi anitye i twech.
To kiwach moro, asangala ayino, rupiri ji jofuonjo kwoŋ Kristo i royo jye ma nyalere, kada bedi g'atoŋa kuya mokom kosa motire. Aka abino medo kisangala,
rupiri aŋeyo ni ru kwayo mewin kodi kony mawok bongi Chuny Maleŋ pa Yesu Kristo, ibino gonyan wok i twech.
Kole ani g'awanya madwoŋ kodi geno nike wiyan kokwoti i tich paran, to ni hongo jye, ma kada pama won, abino bedo gi miseni madwoŋ ma kelo dwoŋ ri Kristo i del paran, kada akwo kosa atho.
Aka ri an, bedo gi kwo meno doŋ i Kristo, aka tho meno nwaŋo lim.
To ka amedere gi kwo i del, meno abino medo timo tich maber man; onyo akuya gima ripere ayer.
Atudere i dyer paro aryo: ayenyo swa weyo kwo me akidhi abedi gi Kristo, mobedo gimaber loyo;
to ma loyo, ri bero mewin, a an doŋ makwo.
Aŋeyo gime adyeri, amomiyo aridho ni abino doŋ. Abino bedo gi wijojye ma medo konyo win widongi kodi kisangala i yeyo.
Amomiyo ka anobedi gi win kendo, wibino bedo gi kisangala madwoŋ, i kwo mewin i Yesu Kristo.

Kada obedi nedi, bedi win gi kite ma ripo gi Wach Maber pa Kristo, ŋey kada ka anobin neno win, kosa ka awinjo awinja ayino kwoŋ win, obedi ni wichungo matek kodi atoŋa achiel, aka wilwenyo kanyachiel, gi paro achiel kende ri yeyo ma Wach Maber kelo.
Wikiri wibedi malwor ri jokwor mewin, to ndelo jye bedi win miseni, rupiri meno bino nyutho jo ni jorwenyo, to win wiboth, aka meno jye gima Were ama timo.
Kole go otyeko miyo win silwany, ki nyaka ma yeyo Kristo kende, to ma chandirok ri go bende.
Ato lweny m'onyo wini gine no a kiti lweny ma winenan munyo alwenyo i ndir mokadho aka wiwinjo ni fuodi ani gine.
Ka kwo mewin i Kristo nyalo medo win miseni, kosa mar pere nyalo dwoko chuny win, kosa winyalo riwirok i Chuny, kosa winitye gi wor kodi chwako jowoti win,
onyo sangala win an munyo wibedo gi paro achiel, gi mar achiel, kareno wibedo achiel i chuny win kodi i paro mewin.
Wikiri witim gimoro munyo wilaro dwoŋ, kosa wiyumere kichar; to bedi win gi bwonirok i waŋ jowoti win, munyo witero jo igani joloyo win gi dwoŋ.
Aka kis dhano kwoŋ win wopar kwoŋ gima jowote joyenyo, ma kiweno gima go ama yenyo.
Paro mewin ripo bedo paka ma Yesu Kristo oido ni gine:
Kada chal pere oido nitye i madala pa Were, go kotemo oro men no, kada nende go oido rom gi Were.
Kuchiel go oketho men no gichien, to kwanyo kabedo pa ŋecha, munyo onywol go i chal pa dhano. Aka munyo go onwaŋere i chal pa dhano,
obwonere aka owinjo Were chuka oyeyo kir tho: tho wi musalaba!
Amomiyo, Were otiŋo go malo i kabedo madwoŋ loyo, to miyo go nyinge madwoŋ loyo nyingi jo jye.
Chwech jye mani polo, kodi piny, kodi i pendi piny, jobino goyo chongi jo piny gi miyo nyingi Yesu dwoŋ.
Aka lew jo jye bino tucho ni Yesu Kristo obedo Ruoth, ma miyo Were Bamere dwoŋ.
Amomiyo, wutimera, paka noknok wiwinjo or, ki nyaka ruwaŋan kende, to tektek paka onyo angoye, tiyi win ri both mewin gi lworo kodi kirin.
Kole Were ama tiyo i win, ma miyo wiyeyi aka winyali timo atoŋa pere.
Timi win gimoro jye mongoye kiŋunyaŋunya kosa pyem,
ŋey wibedi ma wingoye g'apuse, ma witire paka nyithindho pa Were ma jongoye gi racho i dyer luse ji mokom kendo marecho, ma wiripo lyel i dyer jo paka michalin ma menyo piny.
Ka wichwire i mikwenda ma kwo, aka anobedi g'atoŋa ma yumirok gi win i Ndelo pa Kristo. Kole meno bino nyutho ni tekirok paran jye kodi tich kotho nono!
To kada onyo chale pa ikonjan woko pa vini mimedo wi rachow man kodi tich ma wok i yeyo mewin, jye fuodi asangala, aka apoko kisangala paran no gi wijojye.
Ri ameno, wibende sangala win aka wipoki kodan syem mewin.
Ageno i Ruoth nike abino dhiro ri win Timotheyo mayot, ŋey alimi miseni i wach ma kwoŋ win.
Angoye gi ŋat man kwanyo woko go, ma bende iyadyeri dewo kwoŋ win.
Ŋat man jye tho kwoŋ wach pere won, ma kiweno kwoŋ apa Kristo Yesu.
Aka wiwegi wiŋeyo paka Timotheyo otyeko nyutho nyalo pere, rupiri paka nyathi gi bamere, go otyeko tich kodan kanyachiel i fuonjo Wach Maber.
Ageno oro go bongi win, tekin aŋeyo paka gikipiny obedi ran.
Aka ageno i Ruoth ni awon abino tundo bongi win mayot.
Odoko aparo nike ripere adhiri ri win omin wan Epafurodito bende, motyeko tich gi lwenyo ruŋetan, aka otyeko kir tich paka jamikwenda mewin i konyan.
Go yenyo swa neno wijojye, aka chunye ramo swa rupiri wiwinjo ni go oido two.
Adyeri go oido two moido chiegin tho, to Were mako wor gine; aka ki gi go kende, to gi an bende, ŋey akir abedi gi litho mathoth i chunyan.
Amomiyo ayikere oro go bongi win, ŋey wisangala ka wineno go kendo, to litho ma chunyan mojere woko.
Amomiyo, joli win go gi kisangala jye, paka omin win i Ruoth, odoko wori win ji ma pameno,
rupiri go ojala kwo pere, aka oboth otho ru tich pa Kristo, kendo omiyan kony ma wiwegi di wikinyalo chowo.
Aka machowe, wutimera, bedi win gi kisangala i Ruoth. Gik i gima atyeko ndiko chon kijokan, aka meno medo gwoko win i yeyo.
Gwokere win kwoŋ jotimi recho, gwokere no, ma jochwire kwoŋ thumirok ma del.
Kole wan ayino ama watyeko limo thumirok maradyeri, wan ma walamo Were gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ, aka wayumere i Kristo Yesu. Odoko wakikethi geno moro kwoŋ thumirok ma del,
kada awon onwaŋo d'anyal bedo g'atoŋa ma ketho geno paran i gikipiny ma pameno. Ka moro ni g'atoŋa ma yumirok i del, ani gine ma loyo:
Alimo thumirok i ndelo maraboro wok nywolirok paran, abedo Jaisrael, anywola ma nono pa Benjamin, Jayudaya gikululu. Aka i wach ma kuro Chik ma nyayudaya, onwaŋo abedo Jafarisayo gipi;
aka i ketho kinen ma nyadin, alwenyo gi kweth pa jokristo. I bedo motire gi winjo Chik, onwaŋo angoye gi recho.
To gimogo jye ma d'akwan pa lim, onyo atero paka gimongoye kony ru yeyo Kristo.
Ki meno kende, akwano gimoro jye paka podho madwoŋ, rupiri gima di welo moasere a ŋeyo Kristo Yesu Ruoth paran. Ru wach pere atyeko bolo woko gimoro jye; atero jye paka woyo, ŋey alim Kristo,
ŋey abedi i go. Aka adoko akibedi gi tiro paran won, i royo ma kuro Chik, to pama anitye gi tiro ma wok bongi Were, aka ma chungo kwoŋ yeyo Kristo.
Gima ayenyo kende a ŋeyo Kristo, gi men ma chierino pere, kodi riwirok gi go i chandirok pere, gi bedo paka go i tho pere,
munyo ageno ni abende abino chierino kwoŋ jomotho.
Akiwachi nike atyeko nwaŋo gime, kosa ni atyeko lokirok maleŋ. Fuodi amedere gi tekirok nyuka anonwaŋi gima omiyo Kristo Yesu olokan apere.
Ato, wutimera, akipar nike adyeri oido atyeko tundo kanyago; gimoro achiel m'atimo, a weyo wiyan wowili gi gimotyeko kadho yu chien, gi temo paka anyalo tundo bothi gima ni yu wiyan.
Amomiyo aringo m'adiyo chunyan, kareno achomere kodi gike, ŋey alimi kemba ma Were olwoŋan ri go, i polo malo i Kristo Yesu.
Wajojye ma wategino i chuny waripo bedo gi paro achiel no. To ka ipoyo ruman wini gi paro mopokere, Were bino menyo ri win gino maber.
To kada ameno, weyi wakidhi yu malo gi kite ma watyeko luwo kir konon.
Wutimera, wijojye timi win paka atimo. Watyeko miyo win ranen maber. Amomiyo kaŋasa win joma luwo ranen no.
Ato paka atyeko wacho ri win gime chon dikweth, onyo ee adoko awacho gi pigi waŋan: nitye ji mathoth ma kwo pajo loko jo jokwor gi musalaba pa Kristo.
Jokidho reyirok i mach makitho, rupiri Were pajo obedo awanya ma delkwoŋ gin, aka jopakere kodi gima wiy jo di kwoti gine ayin. Joketho paro pajo kwoŋ gikipiny ma piny ka kende.
To wan, wabedo ji ma polo, aka wakuro dwoko pa Jaboth wok i polo, aka manago Ruoth Yesu Kristo.
Go bino wiro delkwoŋ wan manyap matho me, to loko ma chale gi delkwoŋe won ma didwoŋ, kareno oro men ma go nyalo kelo gine gikipiny jye i dhum pere.
Amomiyo, wutimera, amaro win swa, aka akeŋ win tektek. Ka wichungo ma wichwiny i Ruoth, merin paran, meno a kisangala paran.
Yudya kodi Sintika, mondo, akwayo win, temi win yeyirok paka nyimere i Ruoth.
Aka in bende, jatich nyawotan ma genere, amito ikonyi mon me; kole jotyeko tich matek kodan i nyayo Wach Maber, kanyachiel gi Kerementi kodi jotich jowotan jye, ma nyingi jo nitye i kitawo ma kwo.
Sangala win i Ruoth noknok; adoko awacho ni sangala win!
Nyuthi win mwolo ri ji jye. Ruoth bino mayot.
Wikiri wirembi ri gimoro jye, to i kis gimoro wachi win ri Were gima wiyenyo, munyo wikwayo aka wiywakere ri go gi fuoyo i chuny win.
Aka syem pa Were ma kalo kama dhano oŋey'iye jye, bino kuro paro mewin gi chuny win maber, i Kristo Yesu.
Machowe, wutimera, poŋi win i paro mewin gikipiny mabeyo mipako me: gikipiny maradyeri, ma didwoŋ, motire, molony, maber amara, kodi maŋon.
Kethi win i tim gima wifuonjere kosa winwaŋo bongan, ma wok i wach paran kodi i tim paran. Aka Were ma poko syem bino bedo gi win.
Ani gi kisangala madwoŋ moasere i Ruoth, ni wilimo hongo ma nyutho paka wiparo kwoŋan. Adyer oido wiparo kwoŋan, to oido fuodi wikilimo hongo ma nyutho ayino.
Aka akiwachi ama ni rupiri nitye gima ayenyo; kole atyeko fuonjere ŋiyo kodi gima ani gine.

Aŋeyo dwoŋ bedo m'achando gimoro, kodi dwoŋ bedo gi gikipiny m'ayenyo ma romo. Atyeko fuonjere nyaliŋliŋ ma diyo chunyan kamoro jye, hongo moro jye, kada ayeŋ kosa ani gi kech, kada amore gi gikipiny kosa anitye gi manok.
Anyalo timo gimoro jye i Kristo ma miyan men.
To obedo maber swa munyo wikonyan i teko paran.
Aka win Jofilipya wiwegi wiŋeyo maber ni munyo aweyo Masedonia, i ndir m'achako fuonjiye win Wach Maber, win kende oido a kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma joriwere kodan i poko kodi jolo gimogo.
Kir munyo oido anitye Thesalonika, widhiro ran kony ma kalo dichiel.
Kobedo nike arango limo mich; to amito ni womedi win magowa i migowin kan mewin.
Atyeko limo chul jye, kir gi kalo; ani gi gimoro jye mayenyo, paka Epafurodito otyeko kelo ran mich mewin jye. Gikipiny me chalo mich ma ŋwe kur, rachow ma jolere aka sangala Were.
Aka Were paran bino miyo win gimoro jye ma wiyenyo, wok kwoŋ ŋaŋo pere gi dwoŋ pere i Kristo Yesu,
Dwoŋ wobedi ri Were Baba chil gi chil. Ameno.
Mothi ran ji pa Were jye ma jonitye i Kristo Yesu. Wutimere ma jo ni ka kodan jomotho win.
Ji pa Were jye ma ka, kodhi jochiel pa Kaisar, jomotho win.
Ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu Kristo wobedi kodi win.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, ma gi mito pa Were obedo jamoor pa Kristo Yesu, jokodi omin wan Timotheyo,
Ri ji maleŋ ma Kolosai, ma jobedo wutimin wan ma jogenere i Kristo: Were Bawan womiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Noknok wafuoyo Were, Baa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, ka wakwayo ri win,
rupiri watyeko winjo yeyo mewin i Kristo Yesu, kodi mar mewin ri ji pa Were jye.
Yeyo kodi mar no owok i geno gima okan ri win i polo ma wityeko winjo kwoŋe i wach maradyeri, aka Wach Maber.
Wach Maber me otyeko bino ri win, aka nyay ka medere i piny jye, paka onyay i dyer win wok i ndelo ma wipen winj'iye kwoŋ ŋono pa Were to wiŋeyo adyeri mere jye.
Wifuonjere gime bongi Epafura, jatich kodi wan ma wamaro swa, aka obedo jatich ma genere ri Kristo kamawan.
Go bende owacho ri wan kwoŋ mar mewin mi Chuny omiyo win.
Ri ameno, fuodi wakikeŋ kwayo ri win, wok chuka wawinji kwoŋ win. Wakwayo Were wopoŋi win gi ryeko ma ŋeyo gima go yenyo, gi ryeko jye kodi niaŋ ma Chuny miyo.
Wakwayo ameno ŋey kwo mewin wobedi paka Ruoth mito, to witimo gima sangala go hongo jye. Kwo mewin bino nyak kiti tich mabeyo jye, aka wibino medere gi ŋeyo Were.
Weyi Were woloki win jomotegino gi men ma wok i dwoŋ pere moasere, ŋey winyali chiro gimoro jye gi diyo chuny kodi kisangala.
Aka fuoyi win Bawan, momiyo winyalo limoye gima Were okano ri ji pere i lero.
Kole go otyeko botho wan kwoŋ men ma mudho to kelo wan i Ker pa Wuode ma migos m'omaro,
ma walimo both i go, tichwako gimarecho mawan.
Kristo obedo chal pa Were ma kinenere. Go obedo Wuode ma kayo, aka loyo gimoro jye mochwey gi dwoŋ.

Kole luwo kwoŋ go Were ochweyo gimoro jye i polo kodi i piny gi gikipiny manenere kodi ma kinenere, kada kom madhum, kosa men, kosa jodhum, kosa ruodhe. Were ochweyo gimoro jye luwo kwoŋ go kendo ri go.
Go obedo ma fuodi gikipiny jye, aka chungo kwoŋ go gikipiny jye jonitye i kabedo pajo.
Go a jatel pa delkwoŋe, mobedo kitipa pa jomoyeyo jye, go a chakirok, okayo mopen chierino kwoŋ jomotho, ŋey go wolimi kabedo marapena i gikipiny jye.
Kole Were won ama omito ni go wobedi gi kwo pa Were gipi.
Amomiyo, kwoŋ Wuode, Were otyeko dwoko chwech jye bonge, ma nitye piny kodi i polo jye, munyo kelo syem gi remo pa Wuode mochwer wi musalaba.
Aka yado onwaŋo winitye bor gi Were, kareno wibedo jokwor pere i paro mewin kodi i gikipiny marecho moido witimo.
To pama, kwoŋ tho ma delkwoŋ Wuode, Were onyo odwoko win i tiyirok gine, ŋey go wokeli win ruwaŋe, ma wileŋ ma bu racho.

Ato wiripo medirok gi yeyo mewin, ma wiridhere aka wichwiny, ma wikiyengere i geno ma wilimo munyo wiwinjo Wach Maber. Me a wach ma wiwinjo aka otyek fuonjo dhano jye i piny, ma an Paulo, alokere jatich mere.
Pama onyo asangala gi chandirok paran ri win, aka chandirok paran i del konyan gi chowo gima fuodi odoŋ i chandirok pa Kristo ri delkwoŋe, mobedo kitipa pa jomoyeyo.
Olokan jatich ri kitipa no munyo Were omiyan tich ma kelo ri win Wach pere gi bee.
Me nyaliŋliŋ ma go onwaŋo fuodi opano ri dhano jye i hongo jye mokadho, to onyo pama owodho kamaler ri ji pere maleŋ.
Kole Were oyiko wodho nyaliŋliŋ pere ri Jopath, jowoŋeyi ŋaŋo madwoŋ man'iye, aka manago Kristo ma nitye i win, ma miyo wigeno limo dwoŋ pa Were.
Amomiyo wafuonjo ji jye kwoŋ Kristo, ka wanyutho jo royo ma gwokirok gi ryeko ma nger jye, ŋey wakel dhano jye ruwaŋ Were motyeko tegino i Kristo.
Amomiyo atiyo tektek munyo aoro men moasere ma Kristo poko, ma tiyo i an.
Amito wiŋey paka atiyo matek ri win, kodi ri ji ma Laudisya, kodi ri ji jye ma fuodi jokonenan.
Atimo ameno ŋey miseni wopoŋi i chuny jo aka ŋey jowobedi kanyachiel i mar to jolimo silwany ma niaŋ wach kichutho. Meno aka jobino ŋeyo nyaliŋliŋ pa Were, mobedo Kristo won gipi.
I go, okan'iye ryeko mathoth kodi niaŋ kwoŋ wach.
Awacho ri win ameno ŋey wikiri wiyey moro womiŋi win gi wach mothotho matwodo, kada chale pa ber.
Kole kada angoye i del, jye fuodi anitye gi win i chuny, aka asangala ka aneno miseni mewin kodi yeyo ma wiridho i Kristo
Paka wityeko jolo Kristo Yesu paka Ruoth, doŋi win i go i kwo mewin.
Weyi tyendi kwo mewin wopidhere to dongo i go, aka wimedi ridhirok i yeyo mewin paka ofuonji win, munyo hongo jye wifuoyo Were.
Amomiyo, neni win ni moro wokiri wokethi win i bwo pajo gi pyem kodi twodo masisiri, gi thenethene ma kula ma nyanono, gi wach kwoŋ chuny ma jodhumo i piny me, aka kiwoki bongi Kristo.
Kole kwo pa Were gipi nitye kwoŋ Kristo, i kwo ma nyadel;
aka wilimo kwo mopoŋ i riwirok gi go. Go a jadhum ma telo jodhum jye kodi men jye.
Kole bende withumere i riwirok gi Kristo, to thumirok me kobedo ma ji ama jotimo, to thumirok ma nyachuny, mobedo eye woko i men pa del ma gimarach, gi donjo i thumirok pa Kristo.
Kole munyo wilimo batisimo, meno kareno oyik win gi Kristo, aka bende wichierino gi go ru yeyo mewin i men pa Were ma tich, mochierino go kwoŋ jomotho.
Kada obedo ni chon oido witho i chuny win ru gimarecho mewin, odoko rupiri oido wibedo Jopath, ma jokithumere, to Were ochwako ri win gimarecho mewin jye, munyo omiyo wan kwo kanyachiel gi Kristo.
Were oreyo woko gimonwaŋo ondik kwoŋ wan marach, gi chik mere moido yenyo kwoŋ wan gikipiny kweth, to kwanyo woko kichutho munyo oguro gino kwoŋ musalaba.
Aka Kristo omayo woko jodhum gi ruodhe machuny men, to loko jo giranyera pa ji munyo tero jo paka jomomak i lweny.
Amomiyo, wikiri wiyeyi moro wokethi ri win chik kwoŋ gima wichamo, kosa wimadho, kosa gima mako kwoŋ kalima ma nyadin, kosa kalima ma dwe manyien, kosa ndelo ma Sabato.
Gikipiny no jye obedo nyaka tipo pa gikipiny moido lebino; to gimobedo maradyeri won nwaŋere i Kristo.

Wikiri wiyeyi moro womayi win kemba mewin munyo ŋoyo ni loyo win gi dwoŋ ru lek ma go nwaŋo, kareno nyutho bwonirok ma rendirok aka lamo jomalaika. Dhano ma pameno pakirok ama opoŋ kwoŋe, aka paro pere obedo ma nyadhano.
Go otyeko weyo chwirok kwoŋ Kristo, mobedo jatel mawan, ma kwoŋ go ama del pere gipi, ma fuche oriwo kanyachiel to makere, nwaŋi'ye men ma dongo paka Were mito ni wodongi.
K'inen onyo wityeko tho gi Kristo aka oketh win i syem munyo wieye woko kwoŋ chuny ma dhumo piny me, raŋo ma fuodi kwo mewin bedo paka apa ji ma piny me? Raŋo ma wikuro chik masisiri paka ni,
“Wikiri wimaki gime, wikiri wibili ginicha, wikiri wigeyi mecha?”
Kole gikipiny me jye bedo gimongoye kony tekin or jo. Jobedo nyaka chik ma dhano am'otimo aka ofuonjo.
Ato kiti chik no nenere pa giryeko i lamo jomalaika m'otyek chuko gine jo, kodi bwonirok ma rendirok, gi chando delkwoŋ gin; to iyadyeri jongoye kodi kony i dhumo awanya ma del.
Amomiyo paka otyek chierino win i kwo gi Kristo, onyo kethi win chuny win kwoŋ gikipiny ma polo, kama Kristo ni iye aka obedo yu rachuch pa Were.
Kethi win paro mewin kwoŋ gikipiny mani malo, ma kiweno kwoŋ ma piny ka.
Ato wityeko tho, aka kwo mewin onyo opan g'apa Kristo i Were.
Aka ka kwo mewin, mobedo Kristo onenere kamaler, aka nyaka wibende wibino nenere gine kanyachiel i dwoŋ pere.
Amomiyo, wiripo neko woko awanya ma delkwoŋ win paka chot, kidakana, timo gi wichkwot, awanya marecho, gi woro (mobedo lamo chal makichar).
Kole ru gikipiny me keme pa Were bino podho kwoŋ joma jokiwinji go.
Onwaŋo yado wiwotho i kwo ma pameno, munyo awanya no ama oido dhumo kwo mewin.
To pama wiripo bolo woko kiti gikipiny ma chal meno: nge, keme, awacha nyingi, nyieko nyingi jo, yeti kodi luwo makoch.
Wikiri wiwondere i dyeri win, rupiri oido wityeko lunyo woko kwo machon gi kula mere,
aka onyo wiruko kwo manyien, ma Were, jachwech mere, hongo jye loko manyien i chal pere won, ŋey wokeli win i ŋeyo go maber odocho.
Gima wok'iye, ongoye Japath kosa Jayudaya, ŋatothumere kosa ŋata kothumere, ŋata kofuonjere, jonono mogo, joma ni chien, ŋechin, kosa ji mani syem; to Kristo a gima dwoŋ, aka nitye i ji jye!
Amomiyo paka wibedo ji pa Were moyer, maleŋ aka ma go omaro, onyo bedi win joma ramere ri wadi win, ma wini gi chuny maber, bwonirok, mwolo, kodi diyo chuny.
Diyi win chuny win gi wadi win, aka chwakere win ka moro kwoŋ win nitye gi kiŋunyaŋunya gi nyawote. Wiripo chwakere paka Ruoth bende otyeko chwako win.
[Aka ma loyo meno jye, kethi win mar, ma riwo gikipiny jye kanyachiel i riwirok mochowere.
Weyi syem pa Kristo, ma olwoŋ'iye win paka adeche ma del achiel wodhumi chuny win; Aka bedi win gi fuoyo Were.]
Weyi mikwenda pa Kristo gi ŋaŋo mere jye, wobedi i chuny win, munyo wifuonjo aka wimedo jowoti win men gi ryeko jye, kareno wiwero wer zabul, kodi wer machuny ka wifuoyo Were i chuny win.
Gimoro jye ma witimo kosa wiwacho, ripere witimi i nyingi Ruoth Yesu, munyo wifuoyo Were Baba kwoŋ go.
Mon, winji win chwogi win, paka ripere i Ruoth.
Chwo, mari win mon mewin, aka wikiri wiori liwugo ri jo.
Nyithindho, winji win jonywol mewin ndir jye, rupiri meno a gima sangala Ruoth.
Jonywol, wikiri wimiyi nyithindho mewin nge, rupiri chuny jo nyalo ŋedhere.
Ŋechin, winji win jodongo mewin i gimoro jye, aka witiyi, ki nyaka munyo joneno win, ma miyo jo kisangala, to tiyi win gi chuny win achiel, kareno wiworo Ruoth.
Gimoro jye ma witimo, timi win gi chuny win achiel, pa witiyo ri Ruoth, ma kiweno ri dhano.
Poyi win nike wibino limo kemba ma Ruoth okano ri win. Kole Kristo a Jadwoŋ ma witiyo ri go.
Aka jatimi recho jye ibino chulo go tim pere marecho no, rupiri Were tero dhano jye marom.
Ruodhe, bedi win ma witire i kite ma wikuro gine ŋechin mewin. Poyi win nike wibende wini gi Ruoth mewin i polo.
Bedi win jokinen i kwayo, munyo winitye milengela ka wikwayo gi fuoyo Were.
Aka kwayi win bende ri wan ni Were woyawi ri wan royo ma fuonjo mikwenda pere, ŋey watiti nyaliŋliŋ pa Kristo. Kole meno amomiyo pama anitye i twech.
Ri ameno kwayi win nike anyali luwo munyo aketho gikipiny i lero paka ripere atimi.
Bedi win maryek i kite ma witero gine joma fuodi jokoyeyo, munyo wioro hongo ma wini gine maber.
Kilyesa mewin ripo ndir jye bedo maŋon ma ywayo chuny jo pa kado chumbi, aka wiripo ŋeyo kite ma dwoko dhano jye maber.
Omin wan Tichiko ma wamaro mobedo jatich ma genere, aka jatich nyawotan i tich pa Ruoth, bino miyo win wach jye ma mako kwoŋan.
Aoro go bongi win wonyali wacho ri win paka wanitye, gi dwoko chuny win.
Go lebino kodi Onesimo, omin wan ma genere ma wamaro, mobedo achiel kwoŋ win. Jobino wacho ri win gimoro jye ma timere ka.
Aristaruko, ma nitye i twech kodan, dhiro ri win moth kodi Marko bende, omin Barunaba. (Wityeko winjo wach kwoŋe; joli win go ka obino bongi win).
Yesu milwoŋo ni Yusto, bende dhiro ri win moth. Jadek me kende a Joyudaya ma joyeyo kwoŋ Kristo, ma jotiyo kodan ri Ker pa Were, aka jotyeko konyan swa.

Epafura, ma bende obedo achiel kwoŋ win, kendo jatich pa Kristo Yesu bende motho win. Ndir jye go kwayo ri win gi maro madwoŋ, munyo kwayo Were womiyi wichungi matek, ma witegino kareno wiridho paro ma timo gima Were yenyo.
Awon anyalo ridho ri win ni go tiyo ri win matek kodi ri ji ma Lawodisya kodi Hirapoli.
Luka, jamilerwa ma wamaro, kodi Dimas jodhiro ri win moth pa jo.
Dhiri win moth mawan ri wutimin wan ma Lawodisya kodi ri dhakodwoŋ Ninfa gi kweth pa jokristo ma chokere i ot pere.
Ka otyek kisoma ri win balwa me, neni win nike osoma balwa no i kitipa pa jokristo ma Laodisya bende. Aka wibende soma win balwa ma jo Lawodisya jobino dhiro ri win.
Aka wachi win ri Arukipo ni, “Neni ni ichowo tich m'omiyin i tich pa Ruoth.”
An, Paulo, andiko ri win moth me gi chingan won; aka wiy win wokiri wowili gi lijegere motweyan me! Weyi ŋono pa Were wobedi kodi win.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, Silvano kodi Timotheyo, Ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Thesalonika, ma jobedo apa Were Baba kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo: Ŋono gi syem wobedi ri win.
Noknok wafuoyo Were ri win, aka ndir jye watucho win i kwayo mawan.
Kole wapoyo i nyim Were mawan kodi Bawan paka wiketho yeyo mewin i tim, paka mar mewin omiyo witiyo matek, gi paka geno mewin i Ruoth mawan Yesu Kristo ochwiny.
Waŋeyo, wutimin wan, nike Were omaro win aka oyero win ni wibedi apere won.

Kole Wach Maber ma wakelo ri win, kobino nyaka i wach kende, to obino i men kodi i Chuny Maleŋ, gi ridho kichutho kwoŋ adyeri mere. Wiŋeyo paka kwo mawan obedo munyo oido wani gi win kenyo; aka obedo ri bero mewin won.
Wilokere joma luwo wan kodi Ruoth; aka kada wichandere tektek, wijolo mikwenda gi kisangala ma wok bongi Chuny Maleŋ.
Ri ameno wityeko lokirok ranen ri jomoyeyo jye i Masedonia kodi i Akaya.
Kole mikwenda ma mako kwoŋ Ruoth mowok bongi win kotundo ri Masedonia kodi Akaya kende, to wach kwoŋ yeyo mewin i Were olak iye jye. Amomiyo, ongoye gima di wawachi kendo.
Kole jokoro jye jowacho paka wijolo wan munyo walyewo win, gi paka wiweyo lamo chal makichar to wigik bongi Were, tiyo ri Were maradyeri odoko makwo,
gi kuro Wuode wobin wok i polo, mobedo Yesu, ma Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho, aka ama botho wan kwoŋ keme pa Were ma lebino.
Kole wiwegi wiŋeyo, wutimere, nike wendo mawan ri win kotho nono.
Wiŋeyo paka oido otyek timo wan marach gi yeto wan i Filipya ma fuodi wakibino Thesalonika. Kada ameno Were mawan omiyo wan miseni ma tito ri win Wach Maber ma wok bonge, kada pyem obedo madit.
Kole wach ma wakelo ma tiŋo win malo kochungo kwoŋ komo kosa atoŋa marach, odoko bende wakitemo wondo moro.
Kuchiel, ndir jye waluwo paka Were yenyo watim, kwoŋ bedo go ofuoyo wan aka oketho Wach Maber i chingi wan. Wakitemi kisangala ji, to wamito kisangala Were ayino, ma temo atoŋa ma chuny wan.
Kole wiŋeyo maber ni wakibino bongi win gi luwo ma dwoŋo win, kosa gi wach ma umo woro; aka Were obedo jakony mawan i gime!
Wakitemo rango pak bongi nyatoro, kada bongi win kosa bongi joman,
kada bedi ni nitye gima oido di wayenyo kwoŋ win g'arom paka jomoor pa Kristo. To wabedo moth munyo wanitye gi win, pa dhako ma kuro nyithindho pere maber swa.
Ru mar ma wamaro gine win amomiyo wabedo gi kisangala ma pokoye gi win, ki nyaka Wach Maber ma wok bongi Were kende, to kir kwo mawan won, rupiri onwaŋo wibedo ri wan ji mawelo swa!
Adyer jowoti wan, wipoyo paka watiyo aka wafamba! Watiyo wor g'odyechieŋ ŋey wakiri wabedi gimapek ri win munyo wafuonjo Wach Maber ma wok bongi Were.
Wibedo jokony mawan, paka Were bende, ni kite ma wanyutho win ma wiyeyo Kristo oido olony aka otire mongoye komo.
Wiŋeyo nike watero dhano jye kwoŋ win paka baa nyathi tero nyithindho pere.
Waruma win gi miyo win miseni, wadiyo chuny win, aka wakwayo win nike kwo mewin wobedi ma sangala Were, ma lwoŋo win donjo i Ker kodi i dwoŋ pere.

Aka ru wach me bende, ndelo jye waketho Were walwa. Munyo wakelo ri win mikwenda pa Were, wiwinjo aka wijolo, ki paka mikwenda pa dhano to mikwenda pa Were, mobedo ameno adyeri. Aka kole Were tiyo maber i dyer win jomoyeyo,
rupiri, jowotan, wibedo paka kitipin pa jomoyeyo i Kristo ma Yudeya jye, rupiri wibende wichandere i lweny mowok bongi ji mewin wegi, paka jo bende jochandere kwoŋ Joyudaya wadi jo,
ma joneko Ruoth Yesu kodi jotuchi wach pajo wegi, aka jolwenyo gi wan. Jokisangala Were be! Jolwenyo gi ji jye!
Jotemo kir juko wan fuonjo Jopath mikwenda ma d'okelo ri jo both. Me a gimarecho mopoŋ magike ma jotimo. Aka onyo pama keme pa Were ojok otundo ri jo.
To wan, jowotan, munyo olok wan pa nyithidho kiich, to ipoko wan gi win hongo machiek i del, to ki i chuny wan, wakeŋ win swa aka onwaŋo wayenyo gi maro mathoth neno win kendo!
Aka onwaŋo wayenyo dwoko bongi win. Iyadyeri an Paulo, atemo kir dwoko dikweth, to Sitan chiego ri wan royo.
Aka onyo geno mawan, kisangala mawan, kodi atoŋa mawan ma yumirok obedi aŋo ruwaŋ Ruodhiwan Yesu ka go odwoko?
