Adyer wiŋati wikibedo pakirok mawan kodi kisangala mawani?
Machowe, wakinyalo medo chiro, amomiyo waridho bedo kendiwan i Athen,
kareno waoro Timotheyo, omin wan ma tiyo kodi wan ri Were i fuonjo Wach Maber kwoŋ Kristo. Waoro go bothi win womiyi win miseni gi konyo yeyo mewin,
aka moro kwoŋ win wokiri wogiki chien ru lweny me. Wiwegi wiŋeyo nike kiti lweny no obedo gima waripo luw'iye.
Kole munyo fuodi wanitye gi win wawacho ri win ma ndir fuodi kotundo nike ibino lwenyo gi wan, aka paka wiŋeyo maber, meno a gima otimere won.
Meno amomiyo, munyo akinyalo chiro kendo, adhiro Timotheyo bino ŋeyo gima tho kwoŋ yeyo mewin. Oido alworo ni ipoyo jakeli karatem otyeko temo win, aka tich mawan onyo otho nono!

To Timotheyo otyeko wok bongi win odwoko bongi wan, aka okelo ri wan wach maber kwoŋ yeyo mewin gi mar mewin. Owacho ri wan paka ndir jye wipoyo wan, aka wiyenyo swa neno wan, paka bende wayenyo neno win.
Amomiyo, jowotan, i teko mawan jye kodi i chandirok, walimo miseni kwoŋ win ru winjo kwoŋ yeyo mewin.
Kole pama kere onyo wakwo ka wichungo matek i Ruoth.
Kosa onyo wanyalo fuoyo Were ri win nedi ru kisangala ma wani gine i waŋ Were mawan ru win.
Wor godyechieŋ wakwayo go gi chuny wan jye ni woyeyi waneni win aka wanyal poŋo gima yenyere i yeyo mewin.
Onyo weyi Were mawan kendo Bawan won, kodi Ruodhiwan Yesu, jowoyiki ri wan royo ma bino bongi win!
Weyi Ruoth womiyi marok, i dyer wiwegi kodi ri ji jye, womedere gi dongo to lokere madwoŋ paka bende wamaro win.
Ameno go wonyali medo win men i chuny win i leŋo, ŋey wibedi ma bu racho i waŋ Were mawan kendo Bawan, chieŋ ma Ruodhiwan Yesu odwok'iye gi ji maleŋ pere jye.
Machowe, wutimera, paka wityeko fuonjere bongi wan kiti kwo ma wiripo bedo gine aka nyaka wisangala Were, onyo wakwayo win, kendo waruma win i nyingi Ruoth Yesu, medere ameda win gi timo ameno.
Kole wiŋeyo or ma wamiyo win, gi men pa Ruoth Yesu.
Me a gima Were mito ri win: ni wibedi maleŋ aka wingoye kichutho i kwo ma kidakana.
Kis jachwo jye kwoŋ win ripo ŋeyo royo ma nwaŋo chiege i leŋo gi dwoŋ,
ma kiweno g'awanya ma timo gi wichkwot pa jokafiri ma jokuya Were.

Aka i wach me, wongoye nyatoro ma wotimi ri nyawote racho, kosa ma woor kwo pere kichar. Kole watyeko wacho ri win gime chon, munyo wanyutho win gima wikure kwoŋe, nike Were bino chando joma timo recho ma kite no.
Were kolwoŋo wan bedo i kwo ma kidakana, to ma leŋo.
Amomiyo, ŋata kwero fuonji me kikwer wach pa dhano, to kwero Were won, ma miyo win Chuny Maleŋ pere.
Kiyenyere ndiko ri win kwoŋ marok ma wiripo bedo gine ri jowot win ma bende joyeyo. Kole wiwegi Were otyeko fuonjo win paka wiripo marok.
Aka adyeri wimaro jomoyeyo ma Masedonia gipi. To wakwayo win, wutimin wan, ni medi win ameda timo ameno.
Bedi win gi maro ma bedo ma wikudere, kareno wiparo kwoŋ tich mewin kende, aka witiyi ri gima nyalo kuro kwo mewin, paka watyeko wacho ri win wok chon.
Meno aka wibino bedo gi kwo motire i waŋ joma fuodi ni woko, ŋey wikiri wibedi ma wichando gimoro.
Wutimera, amito wiŋeyi odocho kwoŋ jomotho, aka nyaka wikokumi pa joma jongoye gi geno.
Ato paka wayeyo ni Yesu otho aka ochierino kendo, meno wayeyo ni Were bende bino dwoko joma jotyeko nindo i Yesu kanyachiel gine.
Kole wanyutho win gime wok i wach pa Were, nike wan ma fuodi wakwo, aka wadoŋ chuka hongo ma dwoko pa Yesu, wakoteli chierino ri joma onyo jonindo.
Derino ma wodho or bino bedo, to dwondi malaika madwoŋ winjere, kodi dwondi gwara pa Were, aka Ruoth won bino loro piny wok i polo! Jomotho munyo joyeyo Kristo jobino telo chierino;
aka ŋey ibino choko wan ma wakwo i hongo no, kanyachiel gi jo i pondeponde kidho romo gi Ruoth i hongo malo. Ameno wabino bedo gi Ruoth ndir jye.
Amomiyo, kweyi win chuny jowoti win gi wach me.
Kiyenyere ndiko ri win, wutimera, kwoŋ hongo kodi kare ma gikipiny me letimer'iye.
Kole wiwegi wiŋeyo maber nike Ndelo pa Ruoth bino bino paka jakwo ma bino wor.
Munyo ji jowacho ni, “Syem nitye aka gimoro jye oliŋ,” gikenyo arwat to reyirok tundo ri jo. Bino chale gi litho ma dhako winjo munyo chiegin nywol, aka jokobudhere be!
To win, wutimera, wikinitye i mudho, ma Ndelo no nyalo choro win pa jakwo.
Wijojye winyithindho pa lero, odoko winyithidho pa odyechieŋ; wakibedo ji pa wor kosa mudho.
Amomiyo, wakiripi bedo ma wanindo, paka joman; waripo bedo waŋ wan odoko milengela,
rupiri joma nindo jonindo wor, aka jomamer jomer wor.
To wabedo ji p'odyechieŋ, aka waripo bedo milengela. Weyi waruki i kor wan yeyo kodi mar paka gilweny, gi geno kwoŋ both paka junga ma lweny.
Were koyeyo ni keme pere wogeyi wan, to ni walimi both kwoŋ Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo,
motho ri wan ŋey kada wakwo kosa watho, jye fuodi wabino kwo gine.
Ru wach me, kweyi win chuny jowot win, aka konyere win paka eno witimo.
Wakwayo win, wutimera, ni wimiy joma jotiyo i dyeri win dwoŋ, joma Ruoth oyero ma telo win gi fuonjo win.
Teri win jo gi dwoŋ moasere kodi mar, ru tich ma jotimo ri win. Bedi win i syem gi jowoti win.
Jowoti wan ma wamaro, waruma win ni, wachi win ri joma bedo abeda m'ongoye tich jowogwokere; miyi win jomalworlwor miseni; konyi win jomanyap; aka diyi win chuny win gi jono jye.
Neni win ni nyatoro wokiri wochuli recho gi recho, to hongo jye atoŋa mewin wobedi ma timo bero ri jowoti win kodi ri ji man jye.
Bedi win gi kisangala ndelo jye,
kwayi win hongo jye ma wikikeŋ,
fuoyi win Were i gimoro jye ma timere; kole meno a mito pa Were ri win i Kristo Yesu.
Wikiri wigeŋi Chuny Maleŋ tich.
Wikiri wichay mikwenda ma Were ama oluwo luwo i dhok jotuchi wach pere,
to kaŋasa win gimoro jye wiŋey adyeri mere; chwire win kwoŋ gimaber,
aka weyi win timo kiti recho jye.
Weyi Were ma japoki syem wolonyi win kichutho; kendo wokuri chuny win, paro mewin, gi delkwoŋ win, ma bu racho moro jye, i ndir ma bino pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
Ŋata lwoŋo win ogenere, aka go bino timo ameno.
Jowoti wan ma wamaro, kwayi win ri wan bende.
Mothi win jomoyeyo jowot wan jye akor i leŋo.
Aoro win gi men pa Ruoth, kisoma balwa me ri jomoyeyo jye.
Ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo wobedi gi wijojye. Ameno.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, Sila kodi Timotheyo, Ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Thesalonika ma jobedo apa Were Bawan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo:
Weyi Were Bawan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo jowomiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Waripo fuoyo Were ri win hongo jye, wutimin wan! Obedo ri wan gimotire timo ameno, rupiri yeyo mewin medo dongo swa aka mar ma kis dhano kwoŋ win nitye gine ri nyawote onyo medere.
Amomiyo, wawegi wayumere gi win i dyeri kitipa pa jomoyeyo Were. Wayumere gi kite ma wimedere gine chiro teko gi bedo kodi yeyo, i lweny jye kodi i chandirok ma win'iye.
Me a gima nyutho ni thumo banja pa Were otire, aka gima wok'iye, ibino kwano win paka joma ripo gi Ker pa Were, ma wichandere ri go.
Kole bedo gima otire ka Were okelo chandirok ri joma miyo wichandere,
aka bino kelo ywomirok ri win ma pama wichandere, kodi ri wan bende. Gino letimere ameno munyo Ruoth Yesu onenere wok i polo gi jomalaika pere ma jomen,
gi mach malyel, ma miyo joma kuya Were kodi joma kiwinji Wach Maber mapa Ruoth Yesu girachula.
Jobino limo girachula ma reyirok woko chil gi chil munyo okwany jo woko ruwaŋ Ruoth kodi men pere ma didwoŋ,
munyo go bino Ndelo no limo dwoŋ wok bongi ji pere maleŋ jye, kodi nwaŋo wor bongi jomoyeyo jye. Wibende wibino bedo i dyeri jo, rupiri wityeko yeyo mikwenda ma wakelo ri win.
Me amomiyo wakwayo ri win noknok, ni Were mawan wokonyi win winyali ripo gi kwo molwoŋ'iye win. Aka gi men pere, woyeŋi chuny win i atoŋa maber ma wini gine, kodi tich ma witimo wok kwoŋ yeyo.
Meno aka nyingi Ruodhiwan Yesu bino limo dwoŋ bothi win, aka win bende bonge, gi ŋono pa Were mawan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo.
Gima mako kwoŋ dwoko pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo kodi choko wan kanyachiel bonge, wakwayo win jomoyeyo, ni

wikiri wikwaki bedo gi kiganagana i paro mewin, kosa limo bwok ru wach pa jomaŋoyo ni Ndelo pa Ruoth otyeko tundo. Ato moro nyalo bino pa jatuchi wach, kosa jafuonji, kosa ma wacho ni wandiko gino i balwa.
Wikiri wiyeyi nyatoro womiŋi win i royo moro jye, rupiri Ndelo no kotundi nyuka pyem kodi yeyo machowe obedi, to Jal ma kilwor chik m'oyik ri go kidho i mach makitho kutho nenere.
Go bino pyemo gi gimoro jye ma ji jolamo kosa jotero paka were, to won tiŋere malo to jengere i Ot pa Were munyo ŋoyo ni go a Were!
Wikipoyi ni atucho ri win gime jye munyo fuodi oido anitye gi win?
Aka wiŋeyo gima fuodi geŋo bino pa jalo, ŋey wonenere ka hongo pere motire otundo.
Kole men ma nyaliŋliŋ ma miyo ji kwero lworo chik otyeko chako tich; to ŋata geŋo gino bino timo ameno nyuka okwany woko go i royo.
Gikenyo nyaka Jal ma kilwor chik bino nenere, ma Ruoth Yesu bino neko woko gi luya ma dhoke, to reyo go woko gi menyirok ma dwoŋ pere munyo dwoko.
Jal ma kilwor chik no lebino gi men pa Sitan to timo ranyuth kodi gidhyer matwodo,
kodi gimarecho madit ma wondo joma jobino reyere woko, rupiri jokwero maro adyeri ma d'omiyo jo both.
Ru wach me Were ledhiro ri jo twodo madwoŋ ŋey jowoyeyi gima kotire,
aka wothum banja loyo ji ma jokoyeyo adyeri ma josangala kodi gimarach ayin.
Waripo fuoyo Were ri win hongo jye, jowot wan ma Ruoth omaro, rupiri Were oyero win wok i chakirok ni wilimi both gi men pa Chuny Maleŋ ma lonyo win, ru yeyo adyeri mewin.
Were olwoŋo win i yeyo me munyo oro Wach Maber ma wafuonjo win, ni wilim adech ma opok ri win kwoŋ dwoŋ pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
Amomiyo, jowotan, chungi win matek aka chwire win kwoŋ adyeri ma wafuonjo win adhok kodi i balwa mawan.
Weyi Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo won gipi, kodi Were Bawan, momaro wan aka i ŋono pere omiyo wan miseni makirum kodi geno maber,
wopoŋi chuny win miseni to miyo win men ma timo gi wacho gimoro jye maber.
Machowe, jowotan, kwayi win ri wan, ni mikwenda pa Ruoth womedere nyay mayot to limo dwoŋ, paka obedo i dyeri win.
Kwayi win bende ni Were wobothi wan kwoŋ jomarecho, rupiri kobedo ni dhano jye ni gi yeyo.
To Were genere, aka go bino miyo win men to kuro win maber kwoŋ Ŋatarach.
Wani gi geno kwoŋ win i Ruoth ni witimo gima waoro win, aka wibino medere gi timo ameno.
Weyi Ruoth womiyi wibedi gi mar pa Were i chuny win kodi chiro teko paka Kristo ochiro.
I nyingi Ruoth Yesu Kristo waoro win, jowotan mamaro; eye win kwoŋ jomoyeyo jye ma jotimo nyapo, ma jokimaki fuonji ma wamiyo win.
Kole wiwegi wiŋeyo maber ni wiripo luwo kwo ma wanyutho win. Wakibedo manyap munyo wanitye gi win,
aka wakichamo chiemo pa nyatoro ma wakichulo. Kuchiel, watiyo aka waol wor g'odyechieŋ ŋey wakiri wakeli peko ri nyatoro kwoŋ win.
Watimo ama ki rupiri wakiripi yenyo kwoŋ win kony; to watimo ameno ma miyo win ranen aluwa.
Ato munyo wanitye gi win wamiyo win chik ni, “Ŋata kimiti tich wokiri wochiemi.”
Wawacho ama rupiri wawinjo nike nitye jomogo i dyeri win ma jonyapnyap, ma jokitim gimoro jye kwanyo woko riyirok i tich pa wadi gin ayino.
I nyingi Ruoth Yesu Kristo waoro, odoko wakwayo ji ma pameno jowoyiki kiti gin, aka jowochaki tich, ŋey jowolimi gima konyo kwo pajo wegi.
Aka ri win, jowot wan, wikiri wioli gi timo gimotire.
Ka nyatoro ni kenyo ma kowinji mikwenda ma wadhiro ri win i balwa me, kaŋasa win go maber, aka wikiri witiyere gine, ŋeyi wiye wokwoti.
To wikiri witeri go paka jakwor, kuchiel fuonji win go paka omin win.
Weyi Ruoth won, ma poko syem, womiyi win syem hongo jye kodi i royo jye. Ruoth wobedi kodi dhano jye kwoŋ win.
An Paulo, andiko moth me gi chingan won, aka meno a ranyuth ma aketho i balwin paran jye. Me apaka andiko.
Weyi ŋono pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo wobedi gi wijojye.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jamoor pa Kristo Yesu ru or pa Were ma Jaboth mawan kodi Kristo Yesu mobedo geno mawan,
Ri Timotheyo, wuodan adyeri i yeyo: Weyi Were Bawan kodi Kristo Yesu Ruodhiwan womiyi win ŋono, wor gi syem.
Ayenyo ni ibedi Efeso paka aorin munyo oido anitye i woth paran achomo yu Masedonia. Juki joma kelo kenyo fuonji matwodo jowoweyi.
Wachi ri jo jowoweyi kigana ma kiniaŋere kodi bol moruwo ma nyingi kwarere jo, rupiri gino kelo pyem kendekende; jokikonyi chan pa Were, ma ŋeyere i yeyo.
Atoŋa ma or me obedo mar, aka wok i chuny molony, kodi i paro motire, kodi i yeyo maradyeri.
Jomogo joloko ŋey gin ri gikipiny me to jorwenyo royo pajo i pyem mamiŋo.
Joroda bedo jofuonji ma chik pa Were, to jokuya kir dwoŋ wach pajo wegi, kosa gikipiny ma joluwo kwoŋe gi miseni.
Waŋeyo ni Chik ber ka oor i royo motire.

Aka waŋeyo, nike chik kotim ri ji mabeyo, to ri joma turo chik kodi jowichtek, ri joma kilwor Were kodi jomarecho, ri joma kileŋ kodi joma kidewi kwoŋ Were; ri joma neko bachere pajo kodi megi jo, ri joma neko jowoti gin,
ri jomodakana, ri jomokom i timo gi wichkwot, ri joma tana ji, kodi jotwodo, gi joma wodho kony matwodo, kosa joma timo gimoro jye mopokere kodi fuonji motire
ma chungo kwoŋ Wach Maber ma di dwoŋ, ma Were moripo g'apaka oketho i chingan.
Afuoyo Kristo Yesu Ruodhiwan, momiyan men ma tich me, rupiri go oteran paka ŋata genere to kethan tiyo ri go,
kada chon oido aluwo kichar kwoŋe, kareno oido alwenyo gi ji pere munyo aluwo kichar kwoŋe. To Were otimo kodan wor, rupiri oido angoye gi yeyo aka oido akuya kir gima atimo.
Ruoth okonjo ran ŋono pere moasere to miyan yeyo gi mar ma nitye i Kristo Yesu.
Me obedo wach maradyeri, ma mitere ajola gi yeyo: ni Kristo Yesu obino i piny botho jomarecho. Aka aŋata aloyo i racho;
to ru wach me Were onyuthan wor, ŋey Kristo Yesu wonyuthi diyo ich pere i tiyo kwoŋan, ŋatarach maloyo jomarecho jye, paka ranen ri joma rumachien di joyeyo go to jolimo kwo makirum.
Ri Kere ma chil gi chil, ma kitho aka kinenere, mobedo Were kende, wor gi dwoŋ wobedi chil gi chil. Ameno.
Timotheyo, nyathi paran, amiyin or me ma ripo gi wach motuchi kwoŋin chon. Weyi wach no wobedi gilweny perin munyo ilwenyo lweny maber,
aka i chwire kwoŋ yeyo perin kareno paro ma chunyin otire. Jomegi jokowinjo paro ma chuny jo, to jonyieko woko yeyo pajo.
I dyeri jo nitye Himenayo kodi Alekizanda, m'atyeko bolo jo i men pa Sitan, ŋey wofuonji jo weyo luwo marach kwoŋ Were.
Amomiyo marapena, aoro win ywakirok ri Were, kwayo, poyo joman i kwayo, gi fuoyo Were ri ji jye;
kwayo ri kerin kodi joman jye ma jonitye i adhum, ŋey wabedi i kwo mokwe ma syem, munyo walworo Were aka wabedo gi kite ma ripere.
Gime ber aka sangala Were Jaboth mawan,
ma mito ni ji jye jowobothi to jolimo ŋeyo adyeri.
Kole Were nitye achiel, aka nitye ŋatachiel ma riwo Were gi ji, jal milwoŋo ni Kristo Yesu,
momiyere ma botho ji jye. Meno obedo giranena, i hongo motire, ni Were mito ji jye jowobothi.
Me amomiyo odiman bedo jamoor kendo jatiti wach ri Jopath, fuonjo mikwenda ma mako kwoŋ yeyo kodi adyeri. (Akitwodi, to awacho giradyeri!)
Amomiyo ayenyo ni kamoro jye ji jowokwayi, ma jomiyere ri Were aka jotiŋo chingi gin malo i kwayo, mongoye nge kosa kiŋunyaŋunya.
Kendo amito ni mon joworuki nengin mabeyo ma ripo, gi gwokirok; ma jokochowo paro pajo i kedo wich ma yodirok, kosa jaŋo kwoŋ gin thiwino ma zawabu kosa atege mawelo kosa ruk mawelo ma malo,
to jowobedi gi tim mabeyo paka ripere gi mon ma jowacho ni jolworo Were.
Mon joripo winjo fuonji munyo jokudere gi mwolo.
Akiyey mon fuonjo kosa bedo gi men kwoŋ chwo; joripo liŋ.
Kole otel chweyo Adam, aka nyaka ochwey Eva,
aka Adam k'amowondi; dhako ama owondi to turo chik pa Were.
To kada ameno, dhako bino limo both i nywolo nyithindho, ka go ochwire i yeyo kodi mar gi leŋo, kodi kurok maber.
Me wach motire: ka nyatoro wanya bedo jatel ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo, go wanya tich maber swa.
Jatel ripo bedo dhano mongoye gi komo; go ripo bedo jadhako achiel, moŋeyo kuro nge, ma niaŋ maber, ma timo gidwoŋ, moŋeyo jolo ji pecho pere; go ripo bedo ni nyalo fuonjo maber,
ma ki jamero kosa jagero, to wobedi ŋatamwol ma ki jadhaw; aka wokiri womari pesa.
Go ripo bedo ŋata nyalo tich ma pecho pere maber, to fuonjo nyithindho pere mwolo gi miyo ji dwoŋ.
Ato ka dhano kinyali tich ma pecho pere won, onyali nedi kuro kitipa pa jomoyeyo pa Were?
Go wokiri wobedi dhano ma nyaka owire manyien i yeyo; ameno go nyalo kwoto gi pakirok to ithumo ri go banja, paka othum ri Jwogi.
Go ripo bedo dhano ma ji ma woko jomiyo dwoŋ, aka nyaka kochay go to podho i bwo pa Jwogi.
Jokony ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo bende joripo bedo joma kiti jo otire, ma ki jotwodo; jokiri jowobedi jomero kosa jomawor i lim;
joripo chwire kwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ ma yeyo kodi paro motire.
Iripo temo jo kutho, aka ka jotire, nyaka jonyalo tich paka jokony.
Mon pajo bende joripo bedo ji ma kiti gin otire, ma jokiwerawera gi luwo kichar; joripo bedo jomoŋeyo kuro nge kendo joma genere i gimoro jye.
Jakony ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ripo bedo jadhako achiel kende, aka jo kodi chiege joripo kuro nyithindho kodi pecho pajo maber.
Kole joma timo tich maber jolimo kachungo maber aka jonyalo luwo gi miseni kwoŋ yeyo ma nitye i Kristo Yesu.
Paka andiko balwa me rin, ageno bino nenin mayot,
to ka agalo, balwa me bino miyin iŋeyi kite ma waripo bedo gine i pecho pa Were, mobedo kitipa pa jomoyeyo pa Were makwo, siro kendo chakirok p'adyeri.

Mongoye kiganagana, nyaliŋliŋ mani yeyo mawan dwoŋ: Go onenere i chal pa dhano, Chuny Maleŋ onyutho paka go otire, aka jomalaika joneno go. Ofuonji kwoŋ go i piny jye, oyey go i piny gipi, aka oter go i polo.
Chuny wacho kamaler ni ji megi jobino weyo yeyo i ndir ma bino; jobino winjo chuny ma jotwodo to joluwo fuonji pa jwogi.
Fuonji no wok i twodo pa ji ma jorendere, ma paro ma chuny jo otho aka orere woko pa gima nyweny malyeth owaŋo.
Joma pameno jofuonjo ni nywom rach, aka jochiero ji chamo chiemo mogo. To Were ochweyo chiemo me achama, ma jomoyeyo aka joŋeyo adyeri jooro munyo jofuoyo Were.
Gimoro jye ma Were ochweyo ber; ongoye gima wochayi, to wojoli jye gi kwayo munyo ifuoyo Were.
Ato wach pa Were kodi kwayo miyo Were ketho silwany i gino.
K'ifuonjo jomoyeyo wach me, ibino bedo jatich maber mapa Kristo Yesu, modongo gi wach ma yeyo kodi fuonji ma go otyeko mako.
To weyi woko kigana ma Were ongoye iye, ma kiripere awacha. Bedi munyo ifuonjere kwo ma sangala Were.
Kada fuonjo del wobedi mochwiny nitye gi kony moro, to bedo gi kwo ma sangala Were ama nitye gi kony i royo jye, rupiri nitye iye chikirok ma kwo ma pama kodi ma bino.
Me wach motire ma ripo ajola kichutho.
Meno amomiyo watekere aka watiyo gi tekirok, rupiri waketho geno mawan i Were makwo mobedo Jaboth pa ji jye, to tektek mere apa jomoyeyo.
Wuodhi or aka fuonji gikipiny me.
Ikiri iyeyi moro wochayin ru thino perin, to bedi ranen ri jomoyeyo, i luwo, i kula, i mar, i yeyo kodi i lonyo ma chuny jo.
Ori hongo perin i kisoma ri ji Ndiiko Maleŋ, kodi fuonji nyuka anobin.
Ikiri ijala mich machuny ma ini gine, momiyin munyo jotuchi wach Were joluwo kwoŋe i ndir ma jodongo pa jomoyeyo joketh'iye chingi gin kwoŋin.
Kethi tich no jye i tim munyo imiyere ri jo, ŋey ji jye jowoneni paka tich perin kadho malo.
In won kaŋasa kwo perin, aka kaŋasa fuonji perin bende. Medere gi timo tich no, rupiri ka itimo ameno ibino bothere kir gi joma jowinjin bende.
Ikiri iay kwoŋ ŋata otegino gi gero, to nyuthi go wor paka d'itimo ri benin. Teri yach ma nyaka ay paka wutimerin,
mondongo paka megin, aka mon ma fuodi nyir paka nyimerin, gi leŋo jye.
Pari kwoŋ mon ma chwogi jo otho ma jonitye i chandirok.
Ka chi tho moro nitye gi nyithindho kodi nyikwaye, joripo kutho fuonjirok timo tich ma mako kwoŋ yeyo i pechin pajo, jowonyali konyo jonywol pajo, rupiri meno a gima sangala Were.
Dhako mobedo chi tho ma chandere, mongoye kodi jakur, wobedi dhako moketho geno pere i Were, aka ywakere ri Were noknok, ka kwayo go kony wor g'odyechieŋ.
To chi tho ma kethere yenyo girawanya meno otyeko tho, kada nende go kwo i del.
Miyi jo or me aka nyaka wongoye ŋata wopusa jo.
To ka nyatoro kipar kwoŋ wade pere, tektek mere joot pere won, meno otyeko kwedere kwoŋ yeyo aka rach loyo ŋata fuodi koyeyo.
Ikiri indiki nyingi chi tho moro ni wokwan go i kweth pa mon ma chwogi jo otho ka go fuodi kikal oro pyero auchiel. Kendo chi tho ma indiko ripo bedo ni oido konywomere ma kalo ka dichiel.
Kendo go ripo bedo ni oŋeyere ri tich mabeyo: dhako mokuro nyithindho pere maber, ojolo ji maber i ot pere, okonyo ji pa Were, okonyo joma ni teko, aka omiyere ri tich jye mabeyo.
To ikiri irwaki mon ma fuodi nyir i kweth pa mon ma chwogi jo otho; kole ka awanya pajo miy jo yenyo nywomirok, to jowiro ŋey gin ri Kristo,
gikenyo to joturo chikirok pajo marapena gine.
Medo kwoŋ meno, jonyalo fuonjere nyapo gi kula ma woth i dho udi pa ji; aka maloyo kenyo, jonyalo fuonjere kiwerawera gi luwirok kichar, gi bedo ma yilyil, gi luwo kwoŋ gima di kiripi jowoluwi kwoŋe.
Amomiyo, ayenyo ni mon ma chwogi jo otho kareno jo fuodi nyir jowonywomere, jowolimi nyithindho, aka jowokuri pechin pajo, ŋey jokiri jowomiyi jokwor mawan hongo ma luwo marach kwoŋ wan.
Kole mon megi ma chwogi jo otho jotyeko wirok aka onyo joluwo Sitan.
To ka dhako moro moyeyo nitye gi wade ma jobedo mon ma chwogi jo otho, weyi won wokonyi jo; wokiri wokeli peko ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo, aka ŋey kitipa wonyali konyo mon ma chwogi jo otho ma jochandere.
Jodongo ma jotiyo maber paka jotel, ripere miyo jo kemba ma romo, tektek mere joma asa timo tich ma tito wach gi fuonji.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Ikiri ichuli dhok mirikwa gi thach ka ywayo kwer furo,” odoko ni “Jatich jye ripo gi kemba pere.”
Ikiri iyey wach mokel kwoŋ jadwoŋ moro kwanyo woko ka ji aryo kosa adek joridho wach no.
Bwoki joma chwire i timo gimarach i dyer ji kamaler, ŋey joman lworo womaki jo.
I waŋ Were kodi Yesu Kristo, kodi jomalaika maleŋ, aorin ni winji fuonji me mongoye yero, aka ikiri itimi ri ji gimoro jye kareno idok yu thenge achiel.
Ikiri ikwakere ketho chingin i wiy nyatoro ri tich pa Were. Odoko ikiri iriwere gi moro i tim pere marecho; bedi m'ilony.
Onyo, ikiri imadhi pi kende, to bili ye vini manok ma konyo iyin gi toyo chiemo paka imaro two.
Gimarecho pa jomegi yot neno, aka bino miyo i thumo ri jo banja; to gimarecho pa joman nenere rumachien.
Meno bende apaka, tich mabeyo nenere kamaler; kendo kada jokothangere kamaler jokinyal panirok.
Ŋechin jye joripo tero ruodhe pajo paka joma ripere amiya dwoŋ, aka nyaka moro koluw marach kwoŋ nyingi Were kodi fuonji mawan.

Ŋechin ma ruodhe pajo joyeyo Kristo jokiripi chayo jo, rupiri jobedo jomoyeyo jowot jo. Kuchiel joripo tiyo ri jo maber loyo, rupiri joma limo kony kwoŋ tich pajo jobedo jomoyeyo momar. Iripo fuonjo gi tito gikipiny me.
Ŋata fuonjo fuonji mopokere aka kiyeyere gi wach motire mapa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo kodi fuonji kwoŋ lworo Were,
meno opoŋ gi pakirok kende, aka ongoye gim'oŋeyo. Go nitye g'awanya ma kiber ma pyem gi dhaw kwoŋ wach, aka me kelo nyieko, tyakirok, nyieko nyingi jo, kodi ŋicho kichar,
gi laro gikipiny i dyer ji ma paro pajo kitiy aka jongoye kodi adyeri. Joparo ni tich pa Were obedo royo ma limo ŋaŋo.
Kole nitye kemba madwoŋ ri dhano i lworo Were kodi i tero gima go ni gine paka romo go,
rupiri ongoye gima wakelo i piny, aka ongoye gima wabino kwanyo wok i piny ka.
Amomiyo, ka wanitye gi chiemo kodi ruk, meno won ripo romo wan.
To joma jomito ŋaŋo jopodho i karatem to jomoko i bwo pa awanya. Aka jodonjo i awanya mamiŋo ma kelo litho, ma tero ji i nyiekirok kodi i reyirok woko.
Kole maro pesa ama wok'iye recho ma nger jye. Jomegi jobedo g'awanya mathoth ri pesa amomiyo jopodho woko i yeyo aka jokelo gut madwoŋ i chuny gin.
To in, dhano pa Were, eye kwoŋ gikipiny no jye. Lwenyi ri tiro, lworo Were, yeyo, mar, chiro teko, kodi mwolo.
Temi paka inyalo lwenyo lweny maber mayeyo, aka inolimi kwo makirum; kole me a kwo ma Were olwoŋin iye munyo itucho maber yeyo perin i waŋ jomoneno mathoth.
I waŋ Were ma miyo gimoro jye kwo, kodi Kristo Yesu m'otucho maber yeyo no i waŋ Ponsyo Pilato, aorin
winjo gi kuro m'olony or pa Were ma bu racho, nyuka Ndelo ma Ruoth Yesu Kristo omenyer'iye.
Menyirok pere no Were won bino kelo i ndir pere, Were ma Jasilwany odoko won a Jadhum kende, Kere pa kerin, kendo Ruoth pa ruodhe.
Go kende ama kitho; go bedo i lero ma moro kinyal chore chiegin gine. Ongoye ŋata fuodi oneno go, odoko ongoye ŋata nyalo neno go. Ri go dwoŋ wobedi kodi men ma chil gi chil. Ameno.
Ori jomoŋaŋ i kwo ma piny me ni kiri jowokwoti, kosa ketho geno pajo kwoŋ gikipiny ma kigenere paka ŋaŋo, to kwoŋ Were ayino, ma poko wan gimoro jye ma kisangala mawan.
Ori jo timo gimabeyo, jowoŋaŋi i tich mabeyo, jowobedi jomiyo munyo jopoko gikipiny gi joman.
Ameno aka jobino choko ŋaŋo ma bino konyo jo i hongo ma bino, ŋey jowonyali limo kwo maradyeri.
Timotheyo, kuri maber gima okethi i chingin kuro. Eye i luwo ma kimakere gi Were kodi pyem kwoŋ “Ŋeyo wach,” mogo mamiŋo paka jomogo jolwoŋo ameno ma twodo,
rupiri jomegi joŋoyo ni jo ni gine, to gimowok'iye jorwenyo woko gi royo mayeyo. Ŋono wobedi kodi win.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jamoor pa Kristo Yesu i mito pa Were, moor tito kwo mochik ma wani gine i Kristo Yesu,
Ri Timotheyo wuodan mamaro: Weyi Were Bawan kodi Kristo Yesu Ruodhiwan womiyin ŋono, gi wor, kodi syem.
Afuoyo Were ma atiyo ri go gi paro ma chunyan molony, paka kwarere paran jotimo. Apoyin noknok i kwayo paran, wor g'odyechieŋ.
Ka apoyo pigi waŋin, amito nenin swa, ŋey kisangala wopoŋi i chunyan.
Apoyo yeyo perin mochwiny, kiti yeyo ma adhenin Loyi kodi yokin Yunisi oido jo ni gine, aka aridho nike i bende ini gine.
Ru wach no, apoyin inyali ketho i tim mich ma Were omiyin munyo aketho chingan kwoŋin.
Kole Were komiyo wan Chuny ma lworo, to omiyo wan Chuny ma bedo gi men, gi mar, kodi ma dhumo kwo mawan maber.
Amomiyo, ikiri ibedi gi wichkwot ma luwo kwoŋ Ruoth, kosa wichkwot kwoŋan, jatwech pere. Kuchiel bedi kodan i chandirok ri Wach Maber paka Were miyin men ma chiro,
go mobotho wan to lwoŋo wan bedo ji pere won, ki ru gima watyeko timo, to ru atoŋa pere won kodi ŋono. Go omiyo wan ŋono no i Kristo Yesu ma fuodi ndir kochakere,
aka pama onyo onyuth wan i menyirok pa Jaboth mawan, Kristo Yesu, motyeko reyo woko men pa tho, to kelo kwo gi kiyindira ma kirum i lero munyo oro Wach Maber.
Were ooran tito Wach Maber no paka jamoor kodi jafuonji;
meno amomiyo achandere ama. To kada ameno wiyan kikwoti, rupiri aŋeyo ŋata ayeyo kwoŋe, aka aridho ni go nyalo kuro gima atyeko miyo go nyuka Ndelo no tundo.
Chwire kwoŋ wach m'ityeko winjo bongan, paka fuonji motire aluwa, aka bedi i yeyo kodi i mar i Kristo Yesu.
Kuri gikipiny mabeyo mokethi i chingin gi kony pa Chuny Maleŋ ma nitye i wan.
Iŋeyo nike dhano jye i adech ma Asya ojwangan, kir Figelo kodi Hamogene.
Weyi Ruoth wonyuthi pecho pa Onesiforo ŋono, rupiri go omiyan kisangala ndir madit aka wiye kokwot nike anitye i twech.
Odoko tekin go tundo Roma, orangan tektek nyuka onwaŋan.
Weyi Ruoth womiyi go silwany ma limo ŋono bongi Ruoth i Ndelo no! Kole iŋeyo maber gima go otimo ran munyo anitye Efeso.
To in, wuodan, bedi gi men kwoŋ ŋono ma nitye i Kristo Yesu.
Teri wach m'iwinjan afuonjo ruwaŋ jokony mathoth ma jowinjo, aka ikethi i chingi ji ma genere, ma bende jobino nyalo fuonjo joman.
Chiri chandirok kodi wan, paka jaserikale pa Kristo Yesu ma genere.
Ongoye Jaserikale ma ruwere i wach pa ji ma kis ndelo, rupiri go mito kisangala jatel pere ma miyo go or.
Ameno bende, jaŋwech ma pyem kinyal limo kemba ka bende koluwo chik mere.
Jafur motyeko tiyo matek ripo limo pok marapena ma gima okech.
Pari kwoŋ gima awacho, aka Ruoth bino miyin ŋeyo dwoŋ gikipiny me jye.
Poyi Yesu Kristo, ma Were ochierino go kwoŋ jomotho, mobedo nyakwar Daudi. Me a Wach Maber ma afuonjo,
kendo ma achandere ri go aka onyo otweyan kir pa ŋata otimo kibenga madwoŋ. To wach pa Were kotwey i lijegere.
Amomiyo achiro gimoro jye ri bero pa ji pa Were moyer, ŋey jo bende jowonyali limo both ma nitye i Kristo Yesu, kanyachiel gi dwoŋ ma chil gi chil.
Me obedo wach motire: “Ka watyeko tho gine, wabende wabino kwo gine;
Ka wachiro chandirok, wabende wabino dhumo gine; Aka ka wakwedere kwoŋe, go bende bino kwedere kwoŋ wan;
ka wakibedo jomogenere, go doŋ ŋata ogenere, rupiri go kinyal won kwedirok kwoŋe.”
Bedi munyo ipoyo jo gikipiny me, aka wachi ri jo nyatirtir i waŋ Were ni kiri jowodhawere kwoŋ wach rupiri meno kikel bero moro, to nyieko ji ma jowinjo ayino.
Temi paka inyalo kisangala Were, paka jatich ma wiye kikwoti gi tich pere, aka fuonjo motire wach maradyeri mapa Were.
Eye i pyem ma Were ongoy'iye, rupiri meno bino miyo ji jomedere kwero lworo Were.
Gima jofuonjo bino bedo paka adhola modheth ma medo chamo del. Jofuonji aryo me a Himenayo kodi Fileto.
Jome jotyeko weyo adyeri aka onyo jomyeno yeyo pa joman munyo jowacho ni chierino pa ji otyeko bedo.
To tyendi geto mocwhiny ma Were otyeko ketho kiyengere, aka me a wach mondik kwoŋe: “Ruoth oŋeyo joma jobedo apere” kodi ni, “Nyatoro jye mobedo apa Ruoth ripo eye woko kwoŋ tim marecho.”
I ot malach nwaŋere achierin kodi atewe ma nger jye: megi obedo ma zawabu kodi feza, megi ma mbawo kodi lowo; megi aora i ndelo madwoŋ, to megi aora i ndelo ma kis ndir.
Ka moro olonyo kwo pere kwoŋ gikipiny marecho, go bino bedo achiero mioro i atoŋa madwoŋ, moketh gichien ri Ruoth aka ni gi kony ri go, rupiri oyikere woor go i tich mabeyo kendekende.
Amomiyo, weyi awanya ma thino, aka lweny ri tiro, yeyo, mar, kodi syem, kanyachiel gi joma kwayo Ruoth gi chuny gin molony.
To eye kwoŋ pyem mamiŋo kodi paro masisiri; ato iŋeyo nike gikipiny no kelo dhaw.
Jatich pa Ruoth kiripi bedo jadhawirok, to ripo bedo jawor ri ji jye. Ripo bende bedo ma nyalo fuonji kendo ma diyo chunye,
aka tiro joma pyemo gine gi mwolo. Kole nyalo bedo ni Were bino miyo jo hongo ma ŋuto to joŋeyo adyeri.
Gikenyo jobino bedo maryek to joboth kwoŋ bwo pa Jwogi, monwaŋo omako jo aka miyo jo timo gima go mito.
To ŋeyi gime: teko bino bedo madit i ndelo ma rumachien.
Ato ji jobino bedo jogwondo, jomawor i pesa, jokwoto, joyumirok, joyet, joma kiwinji jonywol pajo, joma kifuoy gimoro, joma kileŋ;
jobino bedo joma jongoye gi wor, joma jongoye gi chwak, jowachi nyingi wadi gin, jomawany kendo mager; jobino dak gimaber;
jobino bedo jokwedirok, joma kidew gimoro, joma kwot gi pakirok; jobino maro kisangala ma piny loyo Were;
jobino moko kwoŋ gima wiyewiye i yeyo Were, to jokwero men mere. Gwokere kwoŋ joma pameno.
Jomegi kwoŋ jo jodonjo i udi to jodiyo mon mamiŋmiŋ, ma jopoŋ gi recho aka awanya ma nger jye ywayo jo;
mon ma ndir jye jotemo fuonjirok to jokinyal ŋeyo adyeri.
Paka Janes kodi Jambure gin jopyemo gi Musa, ameno jono bende jopyemo kodi adyeri; jobedo ji ma paro pajo kitiy, aka yeyo odhyero jo.
To jokokadhi bor, rupiri dhano jye bino neno miŋo pajo, paka joneno apa chwo aryo no.
To ityeko kikaŋasa fuonji paran, kula paran, kodi atoŋa paran ma kwo; ityeko kikaŋasa yeyo paran, diyo chuny paran, mar paran, chiro paran,
lweny pa ji kodan kodi chandirok paran. Iŋeyo gikipiny me jye motimere ran Antyok, Ikoniam kodi Listura; Jye jobedo lweny mager ma achiro to Ruoth bothan kwoŋ jye no.
Iyadyeri dhano jye ma mito bedo gi kwo i Kristo Yesu, ji bino lwenyo gine.
Aka ji marecho kodi ma joraporapora jobino medirok gi recho, munyo jowondo jowoti gin kareno iwondo jo bende.
To in, medere i adyeri mofuonjin aka iyeyo m'ichwiny iye. Kole iŋeyo joma jofuonjin adyeri no,
gi paka wok i thino oido iŋeyo Ndiiko Maleŋ, ma nyalo miyin ryeko ma limo both kwoŋ yeyo Yesu Kristo.
Kole ndiiko jye Were ama omiyo men, aka konyo swa ma fuonjo adyeri, kipusa komo, tiro podho, gi fuonjo bedo gi kwo motire,
ŋey dhano ma tiyo ri Were wobedi ŋata ochowere maber, mani gi gikipiny ma timo tich mabeyo ma nger jye.
I waŋ Were kodi Yesu Kristo ma bino thumo banja ri ji jye, jomakwo kodi jomotho, odoko ru wach dwoko pere kodi bino pa Ker pere, aorin gi men moasere ni:
titi wach pa Were, kada ndir mere otundo kosa be, miyi ji niaŋ, pusa jo, medi jo miseni, aka fuonji munyo i diyo chunyin.
Kole ndir bino tundo ma ji jokowinj'iye fuonji maradyeri, to jobino tiyo g'awanya pajo wegi, odoko jobino choko jofuonji ma wegi joyenyo, jowofuonji jo gima ithi jo yilo jo winjo.
Jobino weyo winjo adyeri to joketho paro pajo kwoŋ kigana makichar.
To in, hongo jye iripo bedo milengela, chiro chandirok, timo tich pa jatiti Wach Maber ri joma fuodi jokoyeyo, aka timi tich perin jye paka jatich pa Were.
To an, onyo hongo otundo ran ma bedo rachow; hongo paran ma kadho otyeko tundo.
Atyeko lwenyo lweny maber, atyeko chowo ŋwech paran; atyeko kuro yeyo.
Aka pama onyo otyek yiko ran sangarya ma tiro, ma Ruoth, Jathumi banja motire, bino miyan i Ndelo no, aka ki an kendan, to go bino miyo ji jye ma jokuro go wonenere.
Temi paka inyalo bino bongan mayot.
Kole Dema omako mere gi piny ma pama aka onyo oweyan okadho yu Thesalonika. Kuresike okadho Galasya aka Tito okadho Dalmasya.
Luka kende ama ni kodan. Nwaŋi Marko ibin gine, rupiri go nyalo konyan maber.
Aoro Tichiko yu Efeso.
Ka ibino, keli ran kot paran ma aweyo Trowa gi Karupo; keli kitawin bende, tektek mere kitawo motim akwoya.
Alekizanda jathyeth otimo ran marach swa; Ruoth bino miyo go kemba ru gima go otimo.
Ibende gwokere kwoŋe, rupiri go opyemo swa kodi mikwenda mawan.
I kachako munyo alwenyo gi thyelo wach paran i kiosa, ongoye ŋata ochungo kabutan; ji jye joweyan. Akwayo ni Were wokiri wokwan kwoŋ jo recho no!
To Ruoth obedo kodan aka omiyan men, amomiyo anyalo tucho mikwenda jye ri Jopath jowowinji. Aka obothan i laki Simbwor.
Ruoth bino konyan i racho jye, to bothan ri Ker ma polo. Dwoŋ wobedi ri go chil gi chil. Ameno.
Adhiro moth ri Prisila kodi Akwila, kodi ri pecho pa Onesiforo.
Erasto odoŋ Korinthya; aka aweyo Trofimo i Mileto, rupiri go oido two.
Temi paka inyalo bino ma fuodi hongo ma piny ŋich'iye kotundo. Yubulo, Puden, Lino kodi Klaudya jodhiro rin moth pajo, odoko jomoyeyo jye bende jodhiro moth pajo.
Ruoth wobedi kodin. Ŋono pa Were wobedi kodi win.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jatich pa Were kendo jamoor pa Yesu Kristo. Oyeran aka ooran konyo yeyo pa ji pa Were moyer, gi telo jo jowoŋeyi adyeri ma kelo lworo Were,
mochungo kwoŋ geno kwo makirum. Were ma kitwodi, ochiko wan kwo me chon ma fuodi hongo kochakere,
aka munyo ndir mere otundo, go onyutho wach me. Okethi wach no i chingan, aka atito paka Were ma jaboth mawan ooran.
Andiko ri Tito, wuodan ma winjan i yeyo ma wariwo: Weyi Were Bawan kodi Kristo Jaboth mawan womiyin ŋono gi syem.
Aweyin Kurete ni itwenyi gikipiny ma fuodi oido okom, gi ketho jodongo ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo i tindi jye. Poyi ni:
jadwoŋ ma kitipa ripo bedo mongoye gi komo moro; go ripo bedo jadhako achiel, aka nyithindho pere joripo bedo jomoyeyo aka jokiri jowoŋeyere paka jomager kosa joma kiwinji or.
Ato paka go nitye i tich pa Were, jadwoŋ ma kitipa ripo bedo mongoye gi komo moro jye. Go wokiri wobedi jawinjirok, kosa jamaki nge kichar, kosa jamero, kosa ŋata ger, kosa jaworo.
Go ripo bedo jajoli wendo maber, ŋata omaro gimaber, ŋata dhumo kwo pere, motire, maleŋ, aka jakuri chik.
Go ripo chwire matek kwoŋ Wach Adyeri paka ofuonji go, ŋey bende wonyali fuonjo joman wach motire, gi juko woko pyem pa joma temo myeno wach no.
Kole jopyem mathoth bende jonitye, tektek mere Joyudaya ma jothumirok, ji ma luwo wach masisiri aka jowondo gine joman.
Yenyere juko fuonji pajo, rupiri joruwo pechin jye munyo jofuonjo gima onwaŋo jokiripi fuonjo, nyaka g'atoŋa ma limo pesa.
Achiel kwoŋ jo won, jatuchi wach pajo, owacho ni, “Ji ma Kurete jobedo jotwodo noknok, ogwange makichar, ma jowor aka jonyap.”
Aka gima ŋato owacho otire. Amomiyo, bwoki jo tektek, ŋey jowobedi gi yeyo molama,
aka odoko jokiri jowochwire kwoŋ kigana machon mapa Joyudaya kodi or pa ji ma jotyeko chayo adyeri.
Ri jomolony, gimoro jye olony; ri joma koch aka jokiyey, ongoye gima olony, rupiri paro pajo kodi niaŋ ma chuny jo oduwere.
Joŋoyo ni joŋeyo Were, to tim pajo nyutho ni jodak go. Jobedo jodakirok kendo joma kiwinji or, ma jokinyal timo gimaber.
To iripo fuonjo gima yeyere paka fuonji motire.
Wachi ri jodongo jowobedi joma dhumo chuny gin, joma ni gi kinen, jomaryek; jowobedi jomochwiny i yeyo pajo, i mar, kodi i chiro teko.
Aka bende wachi ri mon dongo jowobedi gi kite mabeyo i leŋo. Kiri jowobedi jowachi nyingi ji, kosa joma medho odhumo; joripo fuonjo gimabeyo
ŋey jowofuonji mon mathindho maro chwogi jo gi nyithindho pajo,
gi dhumo kwo pajo, kodi lonyo mongoye timo chot, to jobedo mon ma joŋeyo kuro udi, ma chuny jo beyo, ma jowinjo chwogi jo, ŋey moro wokiri woluwi marach kwoŋ Wach pa Were.
Odoko bende, fuonji yach ma nyaka ay manyien dhumo kwo pajo.
Aka in won, i gimoro jye, iripo bedo ranen ri jo i tich mabeyo, i fuonji perin, aka nyuthi jo m'iridho ni ifuonjo gimotire.
Ori wach motire ma moro kinyal kipusa, aka ŋey wichkwot womaki jokwor perin, rupiri jokonwaŋ gimarach awacha kwoŋ wan.
Fuonji ŋechin winjo ruodhe pajo gi temo kisangala jo i gimoro jye. Jokiripi pyem gi jo,
kosa kwalo jo. Kuchiel, joripo nyutho ni jobeyo aka jogenere, ŋey jowokeli bero ri fuonji kwoŋ Were ma Jaboth mawan, i gimoro jye ma jotimo.
Kole Were otyeko nyutho ji jye ŋono pere ma botho jo.
Ŋono no fuonjo wan weyo kwo ma kilwor Were kodi awanya ma piny, bedo gi dhumirok i kwo, bedo gi tiro, gi kwo molworo Were i piny ka,
munyo wakuro geno ma di silwany, gi menyirok madwoŋ mapa Were mawan madwoŋ moasere ma Jaboth,
Yesu Kristo, momiyere ri wan to botho wan kwoŋ recho jye, to loko wan ji molony ma jobedo apere won aka jochowere i timo gimabeyo.
Miyi ji ŋeyo gikipiny me, aka or men perin jye munyo imiyo joma winjin miseni aka bwoki jo ma tiro jo. Neni ni wongoye moro kwoŋ jo ma wochayin.
Poyi ji perin ni joripo mwolirok ri jodhum kodi ruodhe, winjo jo, gi yikirok timo gimoro jye maber.
Chieri jo luwo marach kwoŋ nyatoro, to jowobedi mongoye dhawirok, jomamwol, aka ndir jye jowonyuthi kite mabeyo ri ji jye.

Kole wan wegi onwaŋo yado wamiŋ, wajochay, aka oido orweny wan woko. Wan oido wabedo ŋechin pa awanya kodi kisangala ma piny; oido waoro kwo mawan ma timo ri ji racho kodi nyieko; oido wadakere gi ji.
To munyo bero kodi mar pa Were ma Jaboth mawan onenere,
go obotho wan; ki ru tich mabeyo mogo monwaŋo wawegi watyeko timo, to ru wor pere won. Go obotho wan gi lwok ma Chuny Maleŋ omiyo wan gine nywolirok manyien kodi kwo manyien.
Kole Were okonjo ri wan Chuny Maleŋ i thotho, luwo kwoŋ Kristo Jaboth mawan,
nike paka otyeko ketho wan i tiro gi ŋono pere, wanyali bedo nyithindho pere ma kayo kareno wageno lunjo kwo makirum.
Me wach maradyeri. Amito ni imedi ridho gikipiny me, ŋey nyaka jomoyeyo Were jowonyali miyirok i timo tich mabeyo. Gikipiny me beyo odoko di kony ri ji jye.
To weyi donjo i pyem mamiŋo, gi tito tyendi wat kwoŋ bol maboyo ma nyingi kwarere jo, tyakirok gi dhawirok kwoŋ Chik. Gikipiny me ongoy'iye chwee odoko ongoye kony.
Temi juko jakeli pokirok dichiel kosa diryo, aka rumachien ingoye kodi go gi tich.
Kole iŋeyo nike ŋata pameno okom, aka recho pere nyutho nike go won ochowo thumo banja pere.
Ka tekin adhiro Arutema kosa Tichiko bongin, itemi paka inyalo bino bongan i Nikopoli, rupiri atyeko yiko bedo kenyo i hongo ma pe ŋich'iye piny.
Temi paka inyalo konyo Zena japido ri chik kodi Apolo i woth pajo, aka ineni ni jonitye gi gimoro jye ma joyenyo.
Ji mawan joripo fuonjere timo tich mabeyo, ŋey jowolimi gikonyirok ma noknok aka nyaka jokiri jowobedi gi kwo mongoye kony.
Joma wani gi jo jye jodhiro ri win moth. Mothi ri wan ji jye ma jomaro wan i yeyo. Ŋono pa Were wobedi gi win.
Balwa mowok bongi Paulo, jatwech kwoŋbedo Kristo Yesu, kodi omin wan Timotheyo, Ri mere mawan kodi jatich nyawoti wan Filemon, kodi kitipa pa jomoyeyo Kristo ma romo i ot perin,
kodi nyamin wan Afiya, kodi jaserikale nyawoti wan Arukipo:
Weyi Were Bawan kodi Ruoth Yesu Kristo jowomiyi win ŋono gi syem.
Ndir jye ka apoyin i kwayo paran, omera Filemon, afuoyo Were
rupiri awinjo kwoŋ mar perin ri ji pa Were jye kodi yeyo m'ini gine i Ruoth Yesu.
Akwayo Were ni, riwirok mawan kodin paka jomoyeyo bino miyo wamedo niaŋ kwoŋ gimabeyo jye ma wanyalo timo ri Kristo.
Mar perin, omera ma kachunyan, okelo ran kisangala madwoŋ swa kodi miseni moasere! Kole ikelo kisangala i chuny ji pa Were jye.
Ru wach me, kada oido anyalo bedo gi miseni paka omerin i Kristo, ma orin timo gima ripere itim,
to akwayin ayino ru marok mawan kodin. An Paulo, jamikwenda pa Kristo Yesu aka onyo pama jatwech bende ri go,
akwayin ri wuodan Onesimo, ma alokere bamere i Kristo munyo anitye i twech.
Yu chien go oido ongoye gi kony rin, to pama go onyo ni gi kony rin kodi ran bende.
Onyo adwoko go rin, aka kadho kir gi chunyan.
Onwaŋo d'ayenyo kuro go bothan ka, wonyali konyan kaperin munyo anitye i twech kwoŋbedo Wach Maber;
to akimito timo ameno ma iwon ikiyeyo, ŋey gimaber mitimo wokiri wobedi gi mbaka, to wobedi gi paro perin won.
Kono miti oido ber ni Onesimo wokutho woeye bongin nyaka hongo machiek ŋey rumachien wodwoki bongin kichutho.
Kole go kobedo nyaka ŋecha, to loyo ŋecha swa: go obedo omerin ma kachunyin i Kristo. Go nitye gi kony ran swa! Aka go bino bedo gi kony rin swa loyo, paka ŋecha kodi omerin i Kristo!
Amomiyo k'iparo kwoŋan paka jatich nyawotin, joli go i dwoko pere paka d'ijolan.
K'inen go oido otyeko timo rin gimoro marach, kosa nitye gi giperin moro, onyo kwan kwoŋan.
An, Paulo, andiko gime gi chingan won: An Paulo, abino chulin. (D'akipoyin, ato, nike d'onyo iripo chulan i kwo perin bende)
Amomiyo, omera, mondo timi ran wor me, i Ruoth; sangala chunyan, paka omera i Kristo!
Aridho adyeri, munyo andiko gime, nike ibino timo gima akwayin, odoko ma kalo kir ma akwayin.
Medo kwoŋ meno, yiki reye kanindo, rupiri, ageno nike Were bino jolo kwayo mewin to dwokan ri win.
Epafura, ma nitye i twech kodan ru tich pa Kristo Yesu, dhiro rin moth,
kodi jotich jowotan Marko, Aristaruko, Dema, kodi Luka.
Weyi ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu Kristo wobedi kodi win.
I ndir mokadho, Were oluwo gi kwarere mawan di kweth i royo momore gi i dhoki jotuchi wach pere,
to i ndir machowe me, go oluwo gi wan gi i dhok Wuode m'oyero paka okayo ma le lunjo gikipiny pere jye, aka ochweyo piny gipi luwo kwoŋ Wuode no.

Go obedo lero ma nyutho dwoŋ pa Were; aka go obedo chal pa Were won gi kite, kendo go ama kuro chwech jye gi wach pere ma di men. Munyo go otyeko kelo lonyo kwoŋ recho jye, go obedo piny i polo yu chingi Jadhum Madwoŋ marachuch.
Ri ameno go olokere madwoŋ loyo jomalaika, paka nyinge ma Were omiyo go loyo apa jo.
Were otyekoye wacho ri malaika mene ni, “In Wuodan: Konon alokere Benin”? Kosa ri mene ni, “Abino bedo Bamere, aka go bino bedo Wuodan”?
Medo kwoŋ meno, munyo Were oido chiegin oro Wuode makayo i piny ka, owacho ni, “Weyi jomalaika pa Were jye jowolami go.”
Aka me a gima Were owacho kwoŋ jomalaika: “Were loko jomalaika pere koyo, aka go loko jotich pere lew mach.”
To kwoŋ Wuode, Were owacho ni, “Kom perin madhum, a Were, bino kiyindira chil gi chil, aka tiro ama ibino dhumo gine i Ker perin.
Imaro gimotire aka idak recho, amomiyo Were, ma Were perin, owirin gi mo ma kisangala to miyin dwoŋ makalo ma go omiyo jowotin.”
Go owacho kendo ni, “A Ruoth, i chakirok ichweyo piny, aka polo meno jye tich ma chingin otimo.
Gikipiny no jye jobino leny woko, to in idoŋ; jojye jobino ti pa nanga.
Iledolo jo pa kot; odoko ilewiro chal pajo pa nengin. To in idoŋ adoŋa paka initye, kendo oro perin kibino rumo.”
Were owachoye ri malaika mene ni, “Bedi yu rachuch paran chuka anoloki jokwor perin paka kasik ma ketho tyendin”?
Jomalaika meno ki chuny ma jotiyo ri Were, ma go ooro konyo joma jobino limo both?
Amomiyo, waripo chwirok matek kwoŋ adyeri ma watyeko winjo aka nyaka gimoro korweny wan.
To k'inen mikwenda ma jomalaika chango jomiyo oter paka otire, aka ŋata kotiyo gine i ndir no omiy girachula moripo gine,
onyo wanobothi nedi ka wachayo both madwoŋ me? Ruoth won gipi ama otelo luwo kwoŋ both me, aka nyaka joma jowinjo go joridho ri wan ni obedo adyeri.
Aka Were bende omedo ridho wach no gi ranyuth, gi men, gi giraura mopokere opokere, gi mich pa Chuny Maleŋ m'opoko paka won oyenyo.
Kole Were koketho jomalaika bedo jodhum i piny ma bino yuwaŋe.
Kuchiel, owach kamoro i Ndiiko Maleŋ ni, “Dhano bende aŋo, a Were, ma d'ipar kwoŋe? Dhanadhana bende aŋo, ma d'idew kwoŋe?
Iloko go nyaka ma hongo machiek bedo mapiny loyo jomalaika, to imiyo go dwoŋ gi wor,
aka iketho gimoro jye i par tyende ni wodhumi.” “Iketho gimoro jye i par tyende”, me nyutho ni go dhumo gimoro jye. To pama fuodi wakinen paka dhano dhumo gimoro jye.
To kole waneno Yesu, ma i hongo machiek oloki go mapiny loyo jomalaika, paka orwaki ri go sangarya ma dwoŋ gi wor rupiri ochandere i tho, ni ŋey kwoŋ ŋono pa Were go wonyali tho ri ji jye.
Onwaŋo otire ri Were, mochweyo aka kuro gimoro jye, miyo Yesu ma telo ji i both, chowo tich no gi chandirok, ŋey wote mathoth jowolimi dwoŋ.
Ato ŋata loko ji maleŋ kodi joma iloko jo maleŋ, jye jo ni gi Baa gin achiel. Amomiyo Yesu ongoye gi wichkwot lwoŋo jo ni wutimin go.
Go owacho ni, “Were, abino luwo kwoŋin ri wutimera. Abino pakin i chokirok pajo.”
Go odoko owacho ni, “Abino ketho geno paran i Were.” Aka owacho kendo ni, “Ee anika gi nyithindho ma Were omiyan.”
Paka nyithindho obedo ma del gi remo, Yesu bende olokere paka jo i del, aka nyaka i tho pere woreyi woko Jwogi, manitye gi men kwoŋ tho,
ŋey wogonyi ji moido jobedo ŋechin ru lworo tho.
Kole gime neno kamaler ni ki jomalaika ama go konyo, to paka Ndiiko wacho, “Go konyo nyikway Ibrayimu.”

Ri ameno, onwaŋo yenyere go wolokere paka wutimin i royo jye, ŋey go wobedi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar mani gi wor kendo magenere i tich pere ri Were, aka nyaka wogeŋi keme pa Were ri gimarecho pa ji ŋeyi wochwak jo.
Aka go onyo pama nyalo konyo joma jolimo ratem, rupiri go won bende olimo ratem aka ochandere.
Ri ameno wutimere maleŋ, ma bende Were ama olwoŋo, kethi paro mewin kwoŋ Yesu, mobedo jamoor kendo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, ma konyo yeyo ma watucho ni wani gine.
Kole go ogenere ri Were, moyero go timo tich me, paka Musa bende oido ogenere i tich pere i ot pa Were gipi.
Kuchiel Yesu ripo gi dwoŋ maloyo apa Musa, paka jageri ot dwoŋ loyo ot ma go ogero.
Ato ot jye dhano ama gero, to Were ama ogero kis gimoro.
Aka Musa chango obedo ŋatogenere i ot pa Were paka jatich, aka otucho gikipiny ma Were oido kidho luwo kwoŋe rumachien.
To Kristo ogenere paka Wuodi Were ma kuro ri Were ot. Aka kole waŋati wabedo ot pere ka wamedere gi miseni mawan kodi ridho geno ma wapakere gine.
Kole Chuny Maleŋ wacho ni, “Ka wiwinjo dwondi Were konon,
wikiri witimi wichtek paka chango witimo munyo ji mewin jokwedere kwoŋ Were, i hongo ma ratem i dyeri thim
kama kwarere mewin joteman iye, kada oido jotyeko neno tich paran.
Gino ama omiyo amako nge gi jono, to awacho ni, ‘Ndir jye chuny jo kelo ri jo rwenyo, aka fuodi jokuya royo paran.’
Amomiyo amako nge t'akwoŋere ni, ‘Jokonyal donjo i ywomirok paran!’ ”
Kure win, jowotan, aka moro kwoŋ win wokiri wobedi gi chunye marach ma kiyey ma eye woko kwoŋ Were makwo.
Kuchiel, wiripo kweyo chuny wadi win kis ndelo, tekin ilwoŋo ndelo no ni “konon,” ŋey moro kwoŋ win wokiri wowondi gi gimarach to lokere ŋata wiye tek.
Kole wajojye wabedo jowoti Kristo, ka wachwire matek i yeyo tundo i gike.
Me a gima ndiiko wacho: “Ka wiwinjo dwondi Were konon chuny win wokiri wobedi matek paka chango obedo munyo wikwedere kwoŋ Were.”
To kere ŋa gin ma chango jowinjo dwondi Were to jokwedere kwoŋ go? Jokobedo ji jye ma Musa owodho wok Misiri?
Kere jokune ma Were omako gi jo nge chowo oro pyero aŋwen? Go komako nge gi ji ma jotimo gimarach, omiyo jogore piny to jotho i dyeri thimi?
Aka Were okwoŋere gi jokune ni jokodonji i ywomirok pere ma kiweno joma jotimo ri go wichtek no?
Onyo waneno ni jokonyalo donjo rupiri jokoyeyo.
Onyo, Were otyeko weyo ri wan chikirok nike wanyalo donjo i ywomirok pere. Amomiyo, wagwokere win, aka moro kwoŋ win wokiri wokeŋi donjo i ywomirok no.
Kole wabende watyeko winjo Wach Maber, paka jo; to wach ma jowinjo kotimo ri jo bero moro, rupiri munyo jowinjo jokojolo gi yeyo.

Amomiyo wan ma wayeyo, wadonjo i ywomirok no paka Were owacho ni, “Amako nge t'akwoŋere ni, ‘Jokibino donjo i ywomirok paran!’ ” Meno a gima go owacho, kada tich pere oyido orumo wok chuka go chweyi piny.
Me a gima owachere kamoro i Ndiiko Maleŋ kwoŋ ndelo marabiryo: “Were oywomere i ndelo marabiryo kwoŋ tich pere jye.”
Aka kenyo odoko owach'iye ni, “Jokibino donjo i piny ma d'amiy'iye jo ywomirok!”
Joma jopen winjo wach pa Were jokonyalo nwaŋo ywomirok no; rupiri jokoyeyo amomiyo nitye joman moyey jo limo kaywomirok me.
Aka Were odoko oketho ndelo man milwoŋo ni, “konon,” ma chango oluwo kwoŋe rumachien gi i dhok Daudi, i wach motyek nyutho ni, “Ka wiwinjo dwondi Were konon, wikiri wichayi go,”
rupiri bedi Yoswa tyeki miyo ji ywomirok, di Were koluwo kendo kwoŋ ndelo man.
To paka nitye, fuodi odoŋ ri ji pa Were ywomirok ma Sabato.
Kole dhano jye ma donjo i ywomirok pa Were bende won ywomere kwoŋ tich pere paka Were chango oywomere kwoŋ tich pere.
Amomiyo, weyi watemi paka wanyalo donjo i ywomirok no. Kiripi moro kwoŋ wan chayo dwondi Were paka jotimo, to wakeŋ donjo.
Kole wach pa Were kwo aka tiyo. Bith loyo abor ma nyalewe aryo. Thumo kir kama paro kodi chuny jorom'iye, gi kama kumbo kodi more joriwer'iye. Niaŋ kwoŋ awanya kodi paro pa ji ma iyi adundo.
Ongoye gima nyalo panere ri Were. Gimoro jye i chwech othangere aka oyare i waŋe go ma wabino tito kwo mawan ru waŋe.
Weyi wachwire matek kwoŋ yeyo ma watucho ni wani gine, paka kere wanitye gi jadwoŋ mapa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, moasere gi dwoŋ mobedo Yesu Wuodi Were won, motyeko kidho i polo.

Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, mawan me, kobedo ŋata kiniaŋi nyapo mawan. Kuchiel, wanitye gi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma bende olimo ratem i royo jye paka walimo, to kotimo gimarach.
Amomiyo, weyi wabedi miseni, aka wakidhi ru nyim kom pa Were madhum, kama ŋono nity'iye. Kenyo wabino lim'iye wor to wanwaŋo ŋono ma nyalo konyo wan i hongo ma wayeny'iye.
Kis jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jye iyero wok kwoŋ ji aka imiyo go tich ma tiyo ri Were kapa jono. Go chwayo ri Were mich kodi rachow ru gimarecho pa ji.
Paka go won bende nyap i royo momore, go nyalo tiyo gi mwolo ri jomanyap ma jonyalo rwenyo.
Aka paka go won nyap, go chowere ki nyaka ri gimarecho pa joman kende, to ri gimarecho pere bende.
Aka ongoye ŋata won yero dwoŋ ma bedo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar; bedo ri lwoŋo pa Were won, paka chango olwoŋ Aron.
Meno apaka Kristo won bende komiyere dwoŋ ma bedo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar. Kuchiel, Were ama owacho ri go ni, “In i Wuodan; konon alokere Benin.”
Go owacho kendo kaman ni, “Ibedo jachwayi ri Were wi alitar chil gi chil, i chal pa Melikizedek.”
I kwo pere i piny ka, Yesu odhiro kwayo kodi ywakirok pere gi pigi waŋe munyo koko malo ri Were, ma d'onyalo botho go kwoŋ tho. Aka Were owinjo go, rupiri go oido ŋatamwol ma winjo Were.
Kada go oido obedo Wuodi Were, go ofuonjere winjo Bamere i chandirok pere.
Aka munyo otyek lonyo go kichutho, go olokere jakeli kwo makirum ri ji jye ma jomako wach pere;
aka Were oketho go bedo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar i chal pa Melikizedek.
Nitye wach kweth ma wanyalo wacho kwoŋ gime, to tek tito ri win, rupiri wibolbol i niaŋ gimifuonjo win.
Kabedo ma di wibedi jofuonji, odoko fuodi yenyere moro wofuonji win ayino adyeri pa Were michako gine! Kama di wichamiye chiemo pa jomotegino, fuodi wiyenyo chak amadha ayino!
Ŋata madho chak, meno fuodi nyathi ma kuya poko gimotire kodi gima kotire.
To chiemo manwaŋ, obedo apa jomotegino ma jotyeko ŋeyo poko gimabeyo gi gimarecho.

Amomiyo, weyi wamedere gi fuonji motegino waweyi woko fuonji machako ma mako kwoŋ Kristo, aka wakiri wagiki kendo i fuonji machako: kole wiŋeyo paka wiripo ŋuto kwoŋ tich mothootho to wimedere gi yeyo Were.
Watyeko fuonjo win kwoŋ batisimo kodi ketho chingi jo kwoŋ ji; kwoŋ chierino pa jomotho kodi thumo banja ma chil gi chil.
Weyi wakidhi yu malo. Aka meno a gima wabino timo ka Were oyeyo.
Aka tek swa dwoko jomopodho miyo jo ŋuto kendo, rupiri yado onwaŋo jonitye i lero pa Were, aka jobilo kir mich ma polo to jolimo pok pajo ma Chuny Maleŋ.
Jotyeko bilo bero ma Wach pa Were kodi men ma bino bedo i hongo ma bino yuwaŋe.
To ka jopodho, dwoko jo kendo i ŋuto bedo gimatek, rupiri joguro Wuodi Were kwoŋ musalaba kendo aka jothango go kamaler ri wichkwot i waŋ ji.
Lowo ma madho koth ma chwe noknok aka dongo gimatwi ma konyo joma jopidho ama Were miyo silwany.
To lowo ma kelo kudhin kodi doy meno bu kony: odamba ri kwoŋ, aka rumachien ibino waŋo woko.
To kada waluwo ama, merin mawan ma swa, wageno ri win gikipiny mabeyo ma both kelo.
Were kobedo ŋata chunye kotire. Wiye kibino wil kodi tich ma wityeko timo, kosa mar ma wityeko nyutho go i kony ma wimiyo i konyo ji pere aka fuodi wimedere konyo jokristo jowoti win.
Wamito ni kis dhano kwoŋ win wonyuthi kinen no kir i gike, aka nyaka gikipiny ma wigeno bino bedo adyeri.
Wakimiti nike wilokere manyap, to bedi win paka joma joyeyo ma jodiyo chuny jo nyuka jolimo gima Were otyeko chiko.
Munyo Were otimo chikirok kodi Ibrayimu, okwoŋere munyo oro nyinge won paka oido ongoye nyatoro maloyo go gi dwoŋ.
Go ochiko ni, “Abino miyin silwany ma limo nyikwayin mathoth.”
Aka munyo Ibrayimu okudere to kuro, go olimo gima Were ochiko.
Kole dhano ka kwoŋere oro nyingi nyatoro maloyo go gi dwoŋ, aka kiti kwoŋirok no chowo pyem jye i dyeri ji.
Onyo Were bende omito nyutho joma oido jokidho limo gima go ochiko, maber moloyo, nike go kibino wiro atoŋa pere, amomiyo go omedo ridho chikirok no kodi kwoŋirok.

Were ooro gikipiny aryo me (chikirok kodi kwoŋirok) ma kinyal wire, odoko ma go kinyal twodo kwoŋe, ma nyutho gino. Amomiyo wan ma watyeko limo kagoŋirok bonge wanyalo nwaŋo miseni madwoŋ ma chwirok matek kwoŋ geno moketh ruwaŋ wan.
Wanitye gi geno me paka loch ma juko yee mol, ri chuny wan, mogur piny to moko matek, aka donjo to kalo woko nanga molyer ma Ot pa Were ma polo kir denge i kisika maleŋ ma iye.
Yesu otyeko telo donj'iye ri wan kawaŋ wan, paka jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar chil gi chil i chal pa Melikizedek.
Melikizedek me oido obedo kere ma Salem kodi jachwayi ri Were Madwoŋ Maloyo. Munyo Ibrayimu oido dwoko i lweny ma go onek'iye kerin mogo kenyo Melikizedek oromo gine to miyo go silwany.

Gikenyo, Ibrayimu omiyo go achiel wiy apar ma gimoro jye moido go ni gine. (Dwoŋ nyingi Melikizedek marapena obedo, “Kere ma Tiro.” Aka go oido odoko obedo kere ma Salem, ma dwoŋ mere nyutho ni, “Kere ma Syem.”)
Kotuchi baa Melikizedek kosa yokimere, kosa moro kwoŋ kwarere pere; kotuchi nywolirok pere kosa tho pere. Go chalo Wuodi Were mobedo jachwayi ri Were chil gi chil wi alitar.
Wineno paka go onwaŋo dwoŋ? Kir Ibrayimu mobedo kwari nono jye omiyo go achiel kwoŋ apar ma gimoro jye ma go onyaga i lweny.
Kole Chik yeyo nyikway Levi ma jobedo jochwayi ri Were wi alitar choko achiel wiy apar ma gikipiny kwoŋ ji ma Israel. Meno nyutho ni jochoko kwoŋ ji pajo wegi, kada bende jobedo nyikway Ibrayimu.
Melikizedek me konywolere i nono pa Levi, to ochoko achiel wiy apar kwoŋ Ibrayimu aka omiyo go silwany paka ŋata oido ni gi chikirok pa Were.
Mongoye kiganagana, ŋata miyo silwany dwoŋ loyo ŋata limo silwany pere.
To ma mako kwoŋ jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, waneno ni Jolevi ma chango jochoko achiel wiy apar ma lim jobedo jomatho, to ma mako kwoŋ Melikizedek, ŋata kwo paka ndiiko wacho ama choko.
Wanyalo wacho ni munyo Ibrayimu ochulo achiel wiy apar, nyutho ni Levi (ma nyikwaye jochoko achiel wiy apar) bende ochulo gino luwo i chingi Ibrayimu,
rupiri Levi oido fuodi konywol paka go oido fuodi nitye kwoŋ kwarimere Ibrayimu munyo Melikizedek oromo kodi Ibrayimu.

Chungo kwoŋ tich pa Jolevi ma chwayo ri Were wi alitar ama owodh'iye Chik ri ji ma Israel. Onyo ka tich pa Jolevi oido ber, iraŋo odoko jachwayi ri Were wi alitar man oyenyere ma chale gi Melikizedek, ma kiweno kodi Aron?
Kole ka owir chik ma yero jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, meno wirok ripo bedo i Chik pa Musa bende.
Aka Ruodhiwan miluwo kwoŋe gikipiny me, oido janono mopokere; aka ongoye janono pere moro jye moido otyekoye tich paka jachwayi ri Were wi alitar.
Kole oŋeyere maber paka Ruodhiwan onywolere i nono pa Yuda; aka Musa kotucho nono me munyo luwo kwoŋ jochwayi ri Were wi alitar.
Wach no omedo nyuthirok kamaler rupiri jachwayi ri Were wi alitar man onenere, ma chalo Melikizedek.
Kokethi go bedo jachwayi ri Were wi alitar i chik ma mako kwoŋ bol ma nywolirok pa ji; go olokere jachwayi ri Were wi alitar i men pa ŋata ni gi kwo mongoye gike.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Ibino bedo jachwayi ri Were chil gi chil wi alitar, i chal pa Melikizedek.”
Amomiyo, chik machon oketh gichien, rupiri oido nyap aka ongoye kony.
Kole Chik pa Musa di konyalo loko gimoro molony kichutho, to pama otyek kelo geno maber ma miyo wan tundo bongi Were.
Aka gino kotimere mongoye kwoŋirok mere bende. Joman jye olok jo jochwayi ri Were wi alitar mongoye kwoŋirok moro.
To Yesu olokere jachwayi ri Were wi alitar i royo ma kwoŋirok, munyo Were owacho ri go ni, “Ruoth okwoŋere aka kowir paro pere: ‘Ibedo jachwayi ri Were wi alitar chil gi chil.’ ”
Amomiyo, kwoŋirok no loko Yesu paka raridh ma ridho chikirok maber maloyo machon.
Nitye kendo pokirok man: joman ma jochwayo ri Were wi alitar no, oido jomore rupiri oido jotho ma jokonyalo medirok gi tich pajo.
To paka Yesu kwo chil gi chil, tich pere paka jachwayi ri Were wi alitar odoko kikodi ri ŋat man.
Amomiyo, go nyalo botho kichutho joma kidho bongi Were kodi bonge, rupiri go kwo chil gi chil ma pido gi Were ri jo ndelo jye.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, ma kite no, ama nyalo konyo wan i gima wayenyo. Ato go leŋ, ongoye kodi kibenga kosa gimarach moro, olony, mopok kwoŋ jomarecho, aka otiŋ go malo kalo polo.

Go kichal jodongo pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar man; go kiyenyere chowirok wi alitar ndelo jye: ni kutho ri gimarecho pere won, aka nyaka wochowere ri gimarecho pa joman bende. Go ochowere wi alitar dichiel kende to ma kichutho, munyo go won omiyere paka rachow.

Chik pa Musa ketho dhano mobedo gimanyap bedo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar; to wach ma kwoŋirok pa Were, mobino rumachien yu ŋey Chik, oketho Wuodi Were won m'otyek loko molony kichutho chil gi chil.
Me a gima dwoŋ kwoŋ gima wawacho: Wanitye gi jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, ma kiti dwoŋ pere omiyo go bedo yu rachuch ma kom madhum pa Were Madwoŋ Maurere i polo.
Aka go tiyo paka jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar i Kabedo Maleŋ Moasere, mobedo wema maradyeri ma Ruoth ama ogero, ma kiweno dhano.
Kis jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar jye okethi ni wochwayi mich kodi lee paka rachow ri Were: amomiyo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar me bende oido ripo bedo kodi gi mich mamiyo.
Bedi go nitye i piny ka, di kibedi jachwayi ri Were wi alitar, rupiri nitye joman ma jochwayo mich i Chik pa Joyudaya.

Jono jochwayo i kalamo pa Joyudaya mobedo nyaka chal kodi tipo pa gima nitye i polo. Meno amomiyo ochik Musa munyo go oido chiegin gero wema pa Were ni, “Neni nike itimo gimoro jye i chal monyuthin wi got.”

To, paka nitye, omiy Kristo tich ma bedo jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar madwoŋ swa loyo apa jo, paka chikirok ma go otimo i dyer ji kodi Were bende ber loyo machon, kwoŋbedo ochungo kwoŋ chikirok ma gikipiny mabeyo loyo.
Bedi racho moro oido ongoye i chikirok marapena, di mararyo koyenyere.
To Were onwaŋo racho kwoŋe amomiyo owacho ni, “Ruoth wacho ni hongo bino, ma abino tim'iye chikirok manyien gi Joisrael kodi jonono pa Yuda.
Chikirok no kibino bedo paka m'atimo gi kwarere pajo munyo amako chingi jo t'awodho jo woko i piny Misir, rupiri jokobedo gi genirok kwoŋ chikirok m'atimo gi jo, amomiyo aeye kwoŋ jo.
Onyo me a chikirok ma abino timo gi ji ma Israel ka ndelo no okadho, abino ketho chik paran i paro pajo, odoko abino ndiko chik no i chuny jo to abedo Were pajo, aka jobino bedo ji paran.
Ongoye moro kwoŋ jo ma bino fuonjo nyawote kendo kosa wacho ri nyawote ni: ‘Ŋeyi Ruoth,’ rupiri jojye jobino ŋeyan, wok kwoŋ ŋata oasa thin tundo kwoŋ ŋata oasa dwoŋ.
Abino chwako recho pajo, aka akibino poyo gimarecho pajo kendo.”
Munyo oluwo kwoŋ chikirok manyien me, Were oloko marapena cha gima orumo tich; aka gimoro jye morumo tich aka otyeko ti, bino reyere woko.
Chikirok marapena oido nitye gi chik ma lamo Were kodi kalamo ma dhano ama ogero.
Oger wema ma Were bed'iye ama: I kisika marapena oido nitye giketho tala, meza, kodi mugat michwayo ri Were. Kenyo oido ilwoŋo ni Kabedo Maleŋ.
Yuŋey nanga mararyo oido nitye kisika milwoŋo ni Kabedo Maleŋ Maloyo.

Kenyo oido nitye alitar ma zawabu miwaŋ'iye buban, kodi sanduku ma chikirok, moum thenge jye gi zawabu. I sanduku no oido nitye atawo ma zawabu gi manu i iye kodi luth pa Aron ma boke oloth kwoŋe, kodi telin aryo mondik kwoŋe wach ma chikirok.
Wi sanduku oido nitye Chierubim aryo ma nyutho dwoŋ pa Were, ma joyaro bwombi jo kama ichwak'iye gimarecho kenyo. To me k'a hongo ma tit'iye gimoro jye.
Munyo otyek timo chan me jye, jochwayi ri Were wi alitar bin jodonjo i diro mawoko ndelo jye timo tich pajo;

to jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar kende ama oido donjo i kisika ma iye aka bin timo ameno dichiel i oro achiel. Go kidonji mongoye remo ma go kidho chwayo ri Were kwoŋ gimarecho pere won kodi gimarecho pa ji ma jotimo munyo jokuya nike oido jotimo gimarach.
Gi gikipiny me jye, Chuny Maleŋ oido nyutho ji nike royo ma donjo i Kabedo Maleŋ Maloyo oido fuodi koyaw ri ji.
Gino oido obedo chal ma nyutho ndir ma pama. Dwoŋ mere ni rachow ma mich kodi lee moido ichwayo ri Were kinyal miyo chuny ŋata lamo Were bedi molony kichutho.
Jobedo nyaka chiemo, giramadha, kodi tim momore ma lonyo del. Gino jye oido obedo nyaka chik mawoko, monwaŋo tiyo nyaka tundo ndir ma chikirok manyien oido kidho chaker'iye.

Aka Kristo obino paka jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar, ma gikipiny mabeyo ma pama nitye, amomiyo wema ma go tiy'iye ŋon mochowere aka di dwoŋ moasere (ji ama jokotimo, odoko kobedo ma chwech me).
Kristo kodonjo i Kabedo Maleŋ Maloyo gi remo dyegi kodi rochi chwayo jo wi alitar; to okwanyo remo pere won ama odonjo gine i kabedo no, aka dichiel ma kichutho, to nwaŋo ri wan gine kwo makirum.
Kole remo dyegi kodi apa thwondhe, kodi buru pa roya mowaŋ tikiro kwoŋ joma oido jokolony paka chik yenyo, olonyo jo munyo kwanyo woko chilo mawoko i chik ma nyadin.
Kosa to remo pa Kristo momiyere i leŋo chungo kwoŋ tich pa Chuny ma chil gi chil, nyalo lonyo paro ma chuny wan kalo kenyo didi, kwoŋ tim mothootho, ŋey watiyi ri Were ma kwo!

Ru wach me Kristo obedo jatimi chan ma miyo chikirok manyien wotiyi, ŋey joma Were olwoŋo jowonyali limo silwany ma Were ochiko. Kole go otyeko tho paka chul ma gonyo ji woko kwoŋ kibenga ma jotimo munyo oido jonitye i chikirok marapena.
Kama nitye'iye wach pa jatho m'ondiko, ripere bedo gima nyutho ni ŋato otyeko tho adyeri.
Ato ndiiko no ongoye kony ka fuodi won mere kotho, aka kitiy ka ŋato fuodi kotho.
Meno amomiyo chikirok marapena koridhi ma remo fuodi ongoye mooy.
Munyo Musa otyeko wacho ri ji or jye paka oketh i Chik, okwanyo remo rochi to ruwo gi pi, to kiro kwoŋ kitawo ma Chik kodi kwoŋ ji jye gi changwe m'obil, kodi lwodo ma yer rombo mobokere.
Aka go owacho ni, “Me a remo ma tweyo chikirok ma Were ooro win mako.”
I royo achiel, Musa okiro remo kwoŋ wema ma Were bed'iye kodi kwoŋ gikipiny jye moido ioro ma lamo Were.
Ato, i Chik pa Musa, chiegin kis gimoro iripo lonyo gi remo; aka gimarecho oido kichwak ka remo fuodi kooy.
Gikipiny me, ma jobedo nyaka chal ma gikipiny ma polo, onwaŋo ripere lonyo jo i kite no. To gikipiny ma polo yenyo rachow mabeyo loyo meno.
Ato Kristo kodonjo i kabedo maleŋ ma ji ama jotimo, mobedo nyaka chal pa kabedo maradyeri mere. Go odonjo i polo won kama go pama ochung'iye ri wan ruwaŋ Were.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar mapa Joyudaya yado donjo i Kabedo Maleŋ Maloyo gi remo ma kobedo apere won kis oro. To Kristo kodonjo i polo miyirok kis oro be.
Kole di go ochandere dikweth wok chuka chwey piny. To, go onenere dichiel ma kichutho, i giki ndir ma rumachien, ma kwanyo woko gimarecho chungo kwoŋ rachow ma kwo pere won.
Paka oketh ri dhano jye tho dichiel, to Were thumo ri go banja,
apaka Kristo bende ochway go dichiel paka rachow ma kwanyo woko gimarecho pa ji kweth; aka go odoko bino nenirok mararyo, ki ma tiŋo gimarecho kendo, to ma botho joma jokuro go ayin.

Chik pa Joyudaya obedo nyaka chal ma riprip mapa gikipiny ma lebino, to kobedo gimaradyeri mere won, ma gikululu ma lebino. Amomiyo kiti rachow no, mimiyo ma kikee oro gi oro, kinyal loko joma chore bongi Were molony kichutho.

Bedi kiti rachow no oido nyalo lonyo joma lamo Were ma kichutho, di ji jokoweyo tero mich ma chowo recho, kareno jokiwinji banja i chuny jo ru gimarecho kendo? Kole joma onwaŋo jolamo Were di jolony dichiel kichutho, mongoye kendo winjo banja i chuny jo.
To paka nitye, kiti chowirok no poyo ji gimarecho pajo ayino kis oro,
rupiri remo thwondhe kodi dyegi kinyal kwanyo woko gimarecho.
Ru wach me, munyo Kristo obino i piny, owacho ri Were ni, “Rachow kodi mich ikiyeny, to del m'iyiko ran ayino.
Mich awaŋa ma lee kodi mich machowo gimarecho, ikisangala gine.
Gikenyo awacho ni, ‘Anika, a Were, ma timo gima iyenyo ni atimi, paka ondik kwoŋan i kitawo ma Chik.’ ”
Munyo go otyeko wacho ni, “Rachow kodi mich awaŋa ma lee kodi mich machowo gimarecho ikiyeny.” (Me mich mimiyo paka Chik yenyo.)
Gikenyo to go medo ni, “Anika, a Were, ma timo gim'iyenyo ni atim.” Amomiyo, Were otyeko kwanyo woko gichowirok machon jye to ketho manyien.
Aka Yesu Kristo otyeko timo gima Were omito ni go wotimi, amomiyo wajojye onyo olok wan molony kwoŋ gimarecho i chowirok ma go otimo ma delkwoŋe won, dichiel kende to kichutho.
Jachwayi ri Were wi alitar mapa Joyudaya jye chungo aka timo tich pere kis ndelo aka chwayo rachow ma nger achiel di kweth. To kiti rachow me kinyal kwanyo woko gimarecho.
To Kristo ochwayo rachow achiel ri gimarecho dichiel kende to bedo piny yu rachuch pa Were.
Wok i hongo no, go onyo kuro Were wokethi jokwor pere paka kasik ma ketho tyende.
Amomiyo, gi rachow ma go ochwayo dichiel no, go otyeko lonyo kichutho joma onyo pama ilonyo jo kwoŋ gimarach.
Kole Chuny Maleŋ bende ridho wach me. Marapena go wacho ni,
“Me a chikirok ma abino timo gi jo: Rumachien ma ndelo no; Ruoth wacho: abino ketho chik paran i chuny jo, aka abino ndiko i paro pajo.”
Go odoko omedo ni, “Akibino odoko poyo gimarecho pajo kodi tim pajo marecho.”
Aka kama gimarecho me otyek chwak'iye, mich ma kwanyo woko gimarecho odoko kibino yenyere.
Amomiyo, jowotan, wanitye gi syem mopoŋ donjo i Kabedo Maleŋ swa kwoŋ tho pa Yesu.
Go oyawo ri wan royo manyien, royo ma kwo i nanga mageŋo kisika, mobedo delkwoŋe won.
Paka wanitye gi jachwayi ri Were wi alitar madwoŋ ma kuro Ot pa Were,
onyo weyi wachore chiegin gi Were, gi chuny wan jye, gi yeyo mochowere, gi chuny motyek lonyo m'odoko kiwinji banja, gi del molwok gi pi molony.
Weyi wachwire matek kwoŋ geno ma wawacho ni wani gine, rupiri ŋata omiyo chikirok ogenere.
Aka weyi wapari win kwoŋ jowoti wan, munyo wakonyere i nyutho mar gi timo bero ri jowoti wan.
Wakiri waweyi kite ma romo kanyachiel, paka joman onyo jokethere timo. Kuchiel, weyi wamiyere miseni, konda ni Ndelo pa Ruoth onyo chore chiegin.
Kole ongoye rachow man m'odoko bino kwanyo woko gimarecho ka watimo gimarecho atoŋa mato oido watyeko ŋeyo adyeri.
Kuchiel, gimodoŋ a lworo gima bino timere: thumo banja kodi mach mager mabino reyo woko joma pyemo gi Were.
Kole ŋata kiwinji Chik pa Musa ineko mongoye wor ka otyek thumo banja loyo go, chungo kwoŋ jokony aryo kosa adek ma joridho ni go otimo recho.
Onyo wiparo ni ŋata chayo Wuodi Were, to tero paka gima sisiri remo ma chikirok pa Were moloko go maleŋ, aka miyo Chuny ma kelo ŋono nge, di ripi gi girachula marach loyo didi?
Kole waŋeyo ŋata owacho ni, “Abedo jachuli kwor, abino chulo kwor,” ma bende owacho ni, “Ruoth bino thumo banja ri ji pere.”
Obedo gilworo madwoŋ swa ka nyatoro opodho i chingi Were makwo!
Poyi win paka oido winitye i ndir mokadho, munyo wijolo lero pa Were, aka wichandere i royo momore, to lweny no kolacho win.
Ndir megi oyet win ruwaŋ ji to ichando win; aka ruman wichungo kodi joma ichando jo marach ameno.
Wimako wor gi jomotwey i jera, aka munyo omay win lim mewin wichiro teko no gi kisangala, rupiri oido wiŋeyo ni winitye gi gimabeyo loyo meno, ma yindira chil gi chil.
Amomiyo wikiri wiboli woko miseni mewin, rupiri bino kelo ri win kemba madwoŋ swa.
Wiripo chiro chandirok, ŋey witimi gima Were yenyo to wilimo gima go ochiko.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Odoŋ nyaka hongo machiek won ŋata ripere bino wobin kendo kogal.
Ji paran ma jotire, jobino kwo i yeyo. Ka moro kwoŋ jo ogiki chien, akosangala gine.”
To wakibedo ji ma jogik chien to jorwenyo. Kuchiel wabedo joma bedo gi yeyo to jolimo both.
Onyo bedo gi yeyo meno ŋeyo adyeri nike wabino limo gikipiny ma wageno, bedo gi ridho ni wabino limo gikipiny ma wakinen.
Yeyo pajo amomiyo ji ma hongo mokadho jolimo pak bongi Were.
Yeyo ama miyo waniaŋ nike Were am'ochweyo polo gi piny munyo wodho or, momiyo gima nenere ochwey wok kwoŋ gima kinenere.

Yeyo amomiyo Abel ochwayo ri Were rachow maber loyo apa Kain. Yeyo omiyo go onwaŋo pak bongi Were paka dhano motire munyo Were ofuoyo mich pere. Aka yeyo ama miyo Abel fuodi luwo kada otyeko ri go tho.
Yeyo ama ogeŋo Enoka tho. Kuchiel, oter go malo bongi Were, aka moro konyalo nwaŋo go, rupiri Were oido otyeko kadho gine. Ndiiko wacho ni ma fuodi koter Enoka malo, go oido otyeko kisangala Were.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo kisangala Were ma bu yeyo. Kole ŋata bino bongi Were ripo bedo gi yeyo nike Were nitye aka miyo joma rango go kemba.

Yeyo ama omiyo Nowa owinjo wach pa Were kwoŋ gikipiny ma go oido fuodi koneno. Go owinjo Were, to geto yee ma go gi pecho pere joboth'iye. Ru yeyo pere go okwero recho moido timere i piny, aka olimo bongi Were tiro mawok i yeyo.
Yeyo ama omiyo Ibrayimu winjo munyo Were olwoŋo go, to kidho i piny ma Were ochiko miyo go. Oweyo piny pere munyo kiŋey ni laro yu kune.
Ru yeyo pere, go obedo i piny ma Were ochiko go igani jawiloka. Go obedo i wema paka Isaka kodi Yakobo jotimo, ma bende jolimo chikirok bongi Were.
Kole Ibrayimu oido kuro tindi ma Were ama oyiko gi gero; tindi ma tyendi geto mere yindira.
Yeyo amomiyo Ibrayimu olokere baa jo kada go oido oti aka Sara oido kinyal limo nyithindho. Go ogeno Were ni bino kuro chikirok pere.
Kada go oido chalo p'otho, wok kwoŋ ŋatachiel me nyithindho onywolere mathoth paka michalin ma polo, mathoth paka nyingi kwoyo ma dho nam.
Ji me jye chango jotho i yeyo. Jokolimo gima Were ochiko, to joneno gikipiny me gi bor to jojolo, aka joyeyo kamaler nike jo oido jobedo jowiloka ma chale pa jomobwok koth i piny.
Ji ma jowacho gikipiny me jonyutho kamaler nike jorango piny pajo wegi.
Jokoparo piny ma joweyo; bedi jotimi ameno di jolimo hongo ma gik.
Kuchiel, oido jowanya piny maber loyo, mobedo piny ma nyapolo. Amomiyo Were wiye kikwoti lwoŋirok ni Were pajo, rupiri otyeko yiko ri jo tindi.
Yeyo amomiyo Ibrayimu, munyo Were otemo go, ochwayo wuode Isaka paka rachow. Ibrayimu, ma Were oido otyeko kir timo gine chikirok, oyeyo miyo wuode paka rachow.
Were oido otyeko kir chiko go ni, “Ibino limo nyikwayin kwoŋ Isaka.”
Ibrayimu oparo nike Were nyalo chierino dhano kwoŋ jomotho. Amomiyo i kite ma luwo, chal pa Ibrayimu ojolo Isaka munyo wok bongi jomotho.
Yeyo ama omiyo Isaka omiyo Yakobo gi Esau silwany i kwo pajo ma yuwaŋe.
Yeyo ama omiyo Yakobo omiyo nyithindho pa Yozefu silwany ma fuodi go kotho; othenere kwoŋ luth pere to lamo Were.
Yeyo omiyo Yozefu munyo chiegin tho, oluwo kwoŋ eye pa Joisrael i piny Misir, to weyo wach kwoŋ gima joripo timo gi delkwoŋe.
Yeyo amomiyo jonywol pa Musa jokano go dwe adek munyo otyek nywolo go, rupiri oido joneno nike go nyathi maŋon, aka jokolworo chayo or pa kere.
Yeyo amomiyo Musa, munyo odongo, okwero nike wokiri wolwoŋi go ni wuodi pa nyapa Farawo.
Go ofuoyo chandirok gi ji pa Were loyo bedo i syem ma gimarach chowo nyaka hongo machiek.
Go oparo ni chandirok yet ri Kristo onwaŋo ber loyo ŋaŋo ma Misir; rupiri go oido oketho waŋe kwoŋ kemba ma bino.
Yeyo amomiyo Musa oweyo Misir ma kolworo nge pa kere; go ochiro rupiri oido neno Were ma kinenere.
Yeyo amomiyo go oketho chik ma kalima ma Kadho, gi wodho or ni wokiri remo kwoŋ thigin, aka nyaka malaika ma tho wokir woneki nyithindho pa Joisrael ma kayo.
Yeyo omiyo Joisrael jokalo Malawa Mobokere igani wi lowo mothwo; munyo Jomisir jotemo timo ameno, pi omwonyo jo woko.
Yeyo omiyo kor chiel ma Yeriko ogore piny munyo Joisrael jothoko chiel no chowo ndelo abiryo.
Yeyo omiyo Rahab ma oido tana delkwoŋe i timo gi wichkwot, oboth aneka gi joma jokwero winjo Were, rupiri go ojolo jopendo maber.
Onyo anomedere kendo wacho aŋo? Hongo kiromi ran ma luwo kwoŋ Gidyon, Balak, Samson, Jefutha, Daudi, Samwir, kodi jotuchi wach.
Yeyo omiyo jolwenyo gi piny pa jowiloka momore to joloyo lweny. Jotimo gimotire to jolimo gima Were ochiko jo; jochulo kir dhok simbwor,
joneko woko mach mager, to joboth aneka g'abor. Jo oido jonyap to jolokere jomen. Jolokere matek i lweny to jonyalo woko lwak jolweny pa jowiloka.
Yeyo omiyo ochierino ri mon ji pajo monwaŋo jotho. Joman ochandi jo to jokwero woko kir syem, to jotho i litho ŋey wochierino jo i kwo maber loyo.
Joman oyet jo tichwado jo, aka joman otwey jo gi lijegere tibolo jo i jera.
Ogoy jo gi telin; obar jo dyere to jopokere aryo, oneki jo kodi abor. Jothoko piny i pyen rombo gi dyegi munyo jonitye i chandi, olweny gi jo, to itimo jo marach.
Piny oido kiber ri jo odocho! Jolera i dyeri thim kodi wi gote, munyo jobedo i ŋungu kodi i buche piny.
Jome jye Were ofuoyo jo ru yeyo pajo, to kada ameno jye jokolimo gima Were ochiko,
rupiri Were oido oridho ri wan chan maber loyo. Atoŋa pere oido obedo nike jono bende woloki jo molony kichutho kiromo gi wan.
Amomiyo, paka onyo wanitye gi lwak jokony madwoŋ mothoko wan ameno, onyo weyi wakwanyi woko gimoro jye ma riwere ri wan i royo, kodi gimarecho ma mito moko kwoŋ wan matek,

wakethi win waŋ wan kwoŋ Yesu ma yeyo mawan chungo kwoŋe wok i chako tundo i gike. Go ochiro musalaba ru kisangala monwaŋo kuro go yu waŋe; koparo kwoŋ wichkwot ma tho kwoŋ musalaba oido kidho kelo ri go, kendo onyo pama obedo yu rachuch ma kom madhum pa Were.
Pari kwoŋ go, paka ochiro kiti teko no wok kwoŋ jomarecho, ŋey wikiri winyapere to chuny win ŋedhere.
Kole i lweny mewin gi gimarecho fuodi wikitundo i tho.
Chalo wiy win owil gi wach ma kelo miseni ma Were luwo gi win paka nyithindho pere ni, “Wuodan, ikiri ichayi girachula ma Were tirin gine, aka ikiri inyochere ka go ay kwoŋin.
Kole Ruoth fuonjo dhano ma go omito, aka miyo moro jye ma go tero paka wuode girachula!”
Chiri win chandirok mewin paka gima fuonjo win, rupiri chandirok mewin nyutho nike Were tero win paka nyithindho pere. Nitye nyathi ma bamere kimiy girachula ma temo tiro go?
Ka wikilimi girachula paka nyithindho man jye, meno nyutho ni wikibedo nyithindho pere maradyeri, to nyithindho ma woko ayino.
Aka kis dhano kwoŋ wan onwaŋo wani gi bachere mawan ma jomiyo wan girachula aka wamiyo jo dwoŋ. Onyo di waripi mwolirok ma rom nedi ri Baa chuny wan to walimo kwo!
Bachere wan jotemo tiro wan gi girachula, i hongo machiek paka joneno ni otire ri jo; to Were miyo wan girachula ma tiro wan ma bero mawan, ŋeyi wopoki wan ye leŋo pere.
Ka imiyo dhano girachula ma tiro go, i hongo no girachula no chali ri go gimoro ma kiber, ma kelo litho ayino, to rumachien, jomotweny jo gi girachula ma kite no jolimo kemba gi syem ma kwo motire.
Tiŋi win malo chingi win monudere no, aka weyi win chongi win wobedi mochwiny!
Hongo jye wothi win i royo mopyele maber ri tyendi win, ŋey kama oŋol wokiri womedi ukirok, to wochangi ayino.
Temi win paka winyalo bedo i syem gi ji jye, gi woth i kwo ma leŋo, rupiri ongoye ŋata bino neno Ruoth ma bu leŋo.
Gwokere win ŋey moro wokiri wokeŋi limo ŋono pa Were, kendo moro wokiri wolokere pa yath ma kech ma medere dongo to nyieko wadi gi kecho pere.
Gwokere win ŋey moro wokiri wolokere jachot kosa ŋata kigen Were paka chango Esau, motana woko silwany pere ma lunjo lim paka nyathi ma kayo nyaka ru chiemo dichiel.
Wiŋeyo paka go rumachien otemo yenyo silwany pa Bamere; to okwer miyo go, rupiri go konyalo nwaŋo royo ma wiro paro pa bamere, kada otemo ywako kir gi pigi waŋe.
Fuodi wikitundo, paka Joisrael, bongi gima winyalo geyo, paka got Sinai mani gi mach malyel; fuodi wikitundo i mudho gi kidisa pa piny gi koyo,
gi derino ma dwondi gwara, kosa kama di derino ma dwondi nyatoro, ma munyo ji jowinjo jokwayo ni jokiri jowowinji wach man kendo,
rupiri jokonyalo chiro gimowachi ni, “Ka kada ogwaŋ ogeyo got no, ripere wogoy gi tele chuka wotho.”
Gima joneno kenyo onwaŋo miyo jo lworo momiyo Musa owacho ni, “Kole akirin aka lworo omakan!”
Kuchiel, wibino wi Got Zayun kodi i tindi pa Were makwo, Yerusalem ma nyapolo, gi jomalaika mere gana gi gana.
Wibino i kweth pa jomoyeyo Kristo ma jobedo nyithindho pa Were makayo mondik nyingi jo i polo. Wibino bongi Were mobedo jathumi banja ri ji jye, kendo bongi chuny ji ma jotire moloki jo maleŋ.
Wibino bongi Yesu, mochano chikirok manyien, kodi gi bongi remo ma nyutho wach maber loyo remo pa Abel.

Amomiyo, gwokere win aka wikiri wikweri winjo ŋata luwo. K'inen joma jokwero winjo ŋat'oluwo munyo fuonjo jo kwoŋ gwokirok i piny ka jokoboth, onyo waŋati wanobothi nedi ka wawiro ŋey wan ri ŋata luwo mowok i polo ma mito ni wagwokere!
I hongo no dwonde oyengo piny, to i hongo ma pama go ochiko ni, “Odoko abino yengo ki nyaka piny kende, to polo bende.”
Wach me ni, “Odoko,” nyutho maber ni ibino yengo gi ŋilo woko gikipiny mochwey, aka nyaka gikipiny ma kiyengere ama bino doŋ.
Amomiyo, rupiri wakidho limo ker ma kinyal yengere, weyi wafuoyi win Were to walamo go i royo ma sangala go, gi bwonirok gi lworo;
kole Were mawan obedo mach ma rego woko gikipiny.
Medere win gi marok paka wutimere i Kristo.
Wiyi win kiri wowili gi jolo jowiloka i pechin mewin; kole nitye jomogo ma jotyeko timo ameno to jojolo jomalaika ma jokoŋeyo.
Poyi win joma nitye i twech igani winitye i twech gi jo. Poyi win joma chandere, igani wichandere gi jo.
Ji jye joripo miyo nywomirok dwoŋ, aka jachwo gi dhako joripo kurok i nywomirok pajo i leŋo, rupiri Were bino thumo banja ri jochot kodi jomaturo chik ma nywomirok.
Kuri win kwo mewin ma wikimunyere i maro pesa, aka gima wini gine woromi win. Kole Were owacho ni. “Akibino weyo win; akojala win.”
Weyi wabedi miseni, to wawacho ni, “Ruoth obedo jakony paran, akibino bedo malwor! Aŋo ma dhano nyalo timo ran?”
Poyi win jotel mewin machon, ma jotito ri win wach pa Were. Pari win paka kwo pajo obedo aka wimaki kiti yeyo pajo.
Yesu Kristo kiwire nyoro, konon, kodi chil gi chil.
Wikiri wiyeyi fuonji mopokere ma kotire woywayi win wok i royo motire. Ber ka chuny wan onwaŋo men wok i ŋono pa Were, ma kiweno i kuro chik ma mako kwoŋ chiemo, ma kikony kada joma kuro chik ago.
Wanitye kodi alitar ma chowirok ma joma chwayo ri Were i wema ma nyayudaya koyey chiem'iye.
Jadwoŋ pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma nyayudaya tero remo lee i Kabedo Maleŋ Moasere to chwayo paka rachow ri gimarecho; aka riŋo lee no iwaŋo woko ma kambi pa ji.
Amomiyo Yesu bende otho woko ma waŋkach ma tindi, ŋey wolwoki woko gimarecho pa ji gi remo pere won ma miyo ji leŋo.
Amomiyo, weyi wakidhi bonge woko ma kambi pa ji wabedi kanyachiel gine i wichkwot pere.
Ato tindi ma yindira ongoye ri wan i piny ka, to kwanyo woko warango tindi mabino ayino.
Amomiyo, weyi hongo jye wachwayi pak ri Were paka rachow mawan i Yesu Kristo, ma chali olemo ma nyak wok i dhok wan ka watucho nyinge.
Wiy win wokiri wowili gi timo bero kodi konyo jowoti win gi gima wini gine, rupiri kiti rachow no ama sangala Were.

Winji win jotel mewin, odoko bedi win ma wimwol ri jo, rupiri jo jokuro win paka joma ripo tito ri Were kite ma jotiyo gine. Ka wiwinjo jo, aka jobino timo tich pajo gi kisangala; ma kiweno gi chuny jo mochile, aka meno kinyal konyo win.
Kwayi win ri wan ma wikikeŋ. Waŋeyo ni paro ma chuny wan otire, aka wamito timo gimotire hongo jye.
Aka amedo kwayo win ni bedi win munyo wikwayo Were wonyali oran bongi win mayot.
Onyo weyi Were ma jasyem, mochierino Ruodhiwan Yesu kwoŋ jomotho, Yesu mobedo Jakwath roombo Madwoŋ ru remo pere ma ridho chikirok makirum,
womiyi win gimaber ma wiyenyo ŋey witimi gima go mito. Weyi go wotimi i wan gima sangala go i Yesu Kristo, aka dwoŋ wobedi ri go chil gi chil. Ameno.
Akwayo win, jowotan, winjo mikwenda ma amiyo gine win miseni me ma widiyo chuny win; kole balwa ma andiko ri win me obedo nyaka machiek.
Amito wiŋeyi ni omin wan Timotheyo otyek gonyo i twech. Ka go obino mapiyo, alebino gine neno win.
Mothi ri wan jotel mewin kodi ji pa Were jye. Jowoti wan ma Italya bende jodhiro ri win moth pajo.
Weyi ŋono pa Were wobedi gi wijojye.
