Balwa mowok bongi Yakobo, jatich pa Were kodi apa Ruoth Yesu Kristo, Ri nonin apar g'aryo, ma jotyakere i piny gipi: Amotho win!
Jowotan, teri win paka silwany ka wiromo gi teko momore omore,
rupiri wiŋeyo ni ka yeyo mewin otem aka wok'iye men ma chiro gimoro.
Chiro ripo chowo tich pere i kwo mewin aka ŋey winyali tegino i yeyo ma wichowere, munyo wikichandi gimoro.
To ka moro kwoŋ win chando ryeko, go ripo kwayo Were, mamiyo dhano jye gimoro ma kobuyo kendo ma koŋunyaŋunya, aka bino miyin.
To ŋato ripo kwayo gi yeyo, ma koganagana, rupiri ŋata ganagana chalo pi ma tula i nam ma koyo kwadho aka wito koro.
Ŋata pameno wokiri wopari nike bino limo gimoro bongi Ruoth,
kwoŋbedo go ni gi paro aryo, aka kiridhi paro i gimoro jye ma go timo.
Omin ma jachandi wosangala gi kabedo momiy go mamalo i yeyo,
aka omin ma jaŋaŋo bende wosangala gi kabedo pere ma piny. Kole jomoŋaŋ jobino leny woko paka ŋono pa thiwi dudi.
Ato chieŋ wok gi lyetho mathoth to waŋo woko dudi; thiwe oy woko, to ŋono mere nyiekere woko. Meno bende apaka ibino reyo woko jaŋaŋo munyo go yindin gi tich pere.
Jasilwany a dhano ma chwire i yeyo i ndir ma tem, rupiri ka go onyalo loyo tem, bino limo sangarya ma kwo, kemba ma Were otyeko chiko jomomaro go.
Ka dhano olimo ratem i tem ma chalo ameno, wokiri wowachi ni, “Ratem no wok bongi Were,” rupiri recho kinyal kelo ri Were ratem, odoko Were won kikel ri nyatoro ratem.
To dhano jye nwaŋo ratem ka awanya pere marach won ywayo chunye to tero go i ratem.
Aka awanya no medere yach nyuka nywolo gimarach; aka ka gimarach ochowo tegino, to nywolo tho.
Kiri wowondi win, wutimera.
Mich maber kodi maŋon jye wok i polo; wok bongi Were Baba, jachweyi lero ma polo, aka go kiwire korin gi korin pa tipo yath.
I mito pere won, go onywolo wan manyien gi wach pere maradyeri, ŋey wabedi paka olemo pere monyak marapena kwoŋ chwech pere jye.
Maki win wach me, wutimera. Dhano jye ripo bedo mayil i winjo, ma kikwakere gi luwo, aka kimaki nge piyo.
Kole nge pa dhano kikony go limo kwo motire ma Were yenyo.
Amomiyo, boli win woko kite makoch kodi recho ma wimore gine. Aka wijoli gi mwolo wach ma go piidho i chuny win, ma nyalo botho win.
Bedi win joma ketho wach i tim, ma kiweno joma wondere gi nyaka winjo awinja wach won kende.
Kole ŋata winjo wach to kikethi i tim chalo dhano ma ŋiyere i ndewiro to nenere paka go chalo,
to ka otyeko nenere, kadho to piyo piyo wiye wil gi chal pere.
To ŋata kaŋasa chik motire ma ketho ji i syem, aka medo ketho paro pere kwoŋe, ma kichiki ithe kende to wiye wil, to go ketho wach i tim, ŋato Were bino miyo silwany i gima go timo.
Ka nyatoro paro ni go ŋatoyeyo, to kuchiel kikur lewe meno yeyo pere ongoye kony aka go won wondere.
Yeyo ma Were Bawan tero paka yeyo motire mongoye rendirok ame: kuro nyithindho kiich kodi mon ma chwogi jo otho i chandirok pajo, gi kurok kwoŋ recho ma piny.
Wutimera, i kwo mewin paka jomoyeyo Ruoth Yesu Kristo, Ruoth madwoŋ, wikiri wiyeri ji munyo wiŋisa joman ru chal pajo ma woko.
Ka jaŋaŋo moro moruko peta ma zawabu gi ruk mabeyo obino i romo mewin, to jachandi moro moruko oselo bende bino,
to wimiyo jaŋaŋo dwoŋ ka wiwacho ri go ni, “Bedi i kom moasa bero me,” to wiwacho ri jachandi ni, “Chungi kacha kosa ni bedi piny i lowo dho tyendan ka,”
meno onyo wikibenga i kelo pokirok i dyeri win kareno wilokere paka jothumi banjin ma paro pajo recho?
Winji win wutimera! Wiparo ni Were koyero jochandi ma piny ka bedo jomoŋaŋ i yeyo, gi lunjo Ker ma go ochiko jomomaro go?
To kole wichayo jochandi! Ŋata diyo win aka yware gi win tero win i kapido, ki joŋaŋo?
Ki jono ama joluwo marach kwoŋ nyingi ŋataber milwoŋo win gine no?
Ka wimako maber chik ma Ker ma nwaŋere i ndiiko ma wacho ni, “Mari nyawotin paka iwon imarere,” meno witimo gimotire.
To ka wipoko ji chungo kwoŋ chal pajo ma woko, meno witimo gimarach, aka itero win paka joturi chik chungo kwoŋ Chik ma nitye.
Kole ŋata turo nyaka kada or achiel ma Chik bedo gi banja paka ŋatoturo chik jye.
Ato ŋata owacho ni, “Ikiri itimi chot” ama bende owacho ni, “Ikiri ineki.” Kada ikitimi chot, to ka ineko dhano meno kole ityeko bedo jaturi chik.
Ri ameno luwi win, odoko bedi win gi tim, paka ji mibino thumo ri jo banja chungo kwoŋ chik ma kelo syem,
rupiri Were konyuthi wor ri ŋata konyutho wor ri wadi. To ŋata nyutho wor meno otyeko loyo banja.
Wutimera! Bero aŋo m'obedi ri dhano ka wacho ni, “Anitye gi yeyo”, to tim pere kinyuthi ameno? Yeyo pere no won kende di nyal botho go?
Paka ranen, bedi nitye omin wan kosa nyamin wan mongoye gi giraruka kodi chiemo ma romo,
bero aŋo ma nitye ka achiel kwon win owacho ri go ni, “Were womiyin silwany, kadhi i syem aka ichiemi maber,” ma komiyo go gima yenyere i kwo?
Meno bende apaka yeyo won kende, ka tim mathyelo ongoye, bedo gimotho.
To moro kwoŋ win bino wacho ni, “Kole ini gi yeyo; aka ani gi tim.” Meno adwoko ni: “Nyuthan paka inyalo bedo gi yeyo mongoye tim; to an abino nyuthin yeyo paran i tim paran.”
Wiyeyo nike Were nitye achiel? Meno ber! Kole jwogi bende joyeyo ameno aka jokirin gi lworo.
Dhano mamiŋ! Imito wonyuthin nike yeyo mongoye tim ongoye konyi?
Kere chango oketh kwari wan Ibrayimu i tiro gi Were nedi? Kole obedo i tim, munyo go ochwayo ri Were wuode Isaka wi alitar.
Kenyo inyalo neno ni, yeyo pere kodi tim pere jotiyo kanyachiel; aka yeyo pere oridhi i tim pere.
Aka ndiiko otundo i kare ma wacho ni, “Ibrayimu oyeyo Were, aka ru yeyo pere Were okwano go paka ŋatotire.” Aka Were olwoŋo go ni, mere peran Ibrayimu.
Amomiyo wineno ni dhano iketho i tiro gi Were kwoŋ gima go timo, ma kiweno kwoŋ yeyo kende.
Apaka bende obedo gi Rahab moido tana delkwoŋe i timo gi wichkwot; oketh go i tiro gi Were ru tim pere munyo go ojolo jopendo pa Joyudaya to wodho jo gi yu royo man.
Ato paka del mongoye chuny meno gimotho, apaka bende yeyo mongoye tim meno gimotho.
Jomathoth kwoŋ win kiri jowolokere jofuonji, wutimera, rupiri wiŋeyo ni wan ma wafuonjo ibino thumo ri wan banja monuŋ loyo joman.
Wajojye ndir madit wapodho. Dhano ma kipodhi i luwo pere meno dhano motire kichutho, ma nyalo dhumo kwo pere gipi.
Ka wariwo yath moro i dhoki kayina ma miyo jowowinji wan, wanyalo miyo jokidho kama wayenyo jye.
Kosa neni kwoŋ mel i wakawaka; kada dwoŋ ameno aka koyo mathoth ama tero go, to nyaka gimathin moro ama leko go, aka kidho kama jatero mito ni wokidh'iye.
Me bende apaka nitye gi lew jo: kada thin rigo ameno, to nyalo luwo wach mayumirok madongo swa. Pari paka nyaka mach mondhilo nyalo waŋo lul mombo!
Lew jo bende chalo mach. Obedo dak gimarecho ma nitye gi kabedo i delkwoŋ wan aka nyayo recho i kwo mawan gipi; go moko mach i kwo mawan gipi, aka go won bino waŋ i mach makitho.
Dhano otyeko nyalo dhumo ogwange ma nger jye, winyin, gimamol gi kore, gi rech mapi jye, to loko jo mamwol.
To ongoye moro ma nyalo dhumo lewe maber. Lew jo obedo gimarach ma kikudere, aka thoth gi kwir.
Waoro lew wan ma pako Ruoth gi Bawan odoko waoro lew wan achiel no won ma kwoŋo dhano mochwey i chal pa Were.
Wach ma pako kodi ma kwoŋo nyatoro jye wok i dhok dhano achiel no won. Wutimera, gime oido kiripi timirok ameno.
Wiparo ni waŋ pi achiel nyalo wodho pi mamit kir gi ma kech bende?
Wutimera, makuyu nyalo nyak gimanyak pa vini, kosa yath vini nyalo nyak nyandere pa makuyu? Ri ameno waŋ pi ma kech chumbi kinyal wodho pi mamit.
Ŋa kwoŋ win kenyo maryek kendo maniaŋ? Ere wonyuthi ryeko no gi kwo pere motire, gi tim pere ma nyutho bwonirok kodi ryeko.
To ka wipoŋ gi nyieko kodi mito ich, wikiri wipakere gine odoko wikiri wikwer adyeri.
“Ryeko” ma chal ameno kiwoki i polo; to obedo ma piny ka, ki machuny, to apa jwogi ayino.
Kole kama di nyieko kodi mito ich, kenyo ruwirok bende ni iye kodi nger recho jye.
To ryeko ma wok i polo olony kutho marapena; odoko kelo syem, aka nitye iye mwolo; dewo kwoŋ ji, oasere gi wor aka nywolo tim mabeyo; ongoy'iye thumo banja mokom kosa rendirok.
Aka joma kelo syem jokecho tiro mopidhi i syem.
Kere aŋo ma kelo gorok gi dhawirok i dyer win? Gikipiny no kiwoki kwoŋ awanya ma ndir jye lwenyo i delkwoŋ wini?
Wimito gimoro to wikilim. Gikenyo wichako nekirok; aka wiwanya gikipiny to wikinyal limo. Amomiyo widhaw to wigore. Wikilim gima wimito rupiri wikikway Were.
Aka ka wikwayo wikilim, rupiri wikwayo gi atoŋa marecho: wikwayo gikipiny maraora ma kisangala mewin won.
Ji ma kigenere! Wikuya ni mako mere gi piny meno bedo i kwor gi Were? Ŋata mito mako mere gi piny meno mito bedo jakwor pa Were.
Kosa wiparo ni ndiiko ongoye g'atoŋa i nyutho ni, “Chuny ma Were oketho i wan ni gi nyieko moasere?”
To Were nyutho wan ŋono mathoth loyo. Amomiyo ndiiko wacho ni, “Were chiro japakirok, to nyutho ŋatamwol ayino ŋono.”
Amomiyo, bedi win joma winjo Were. Chiri win Jwogi aka go bino eye kwoŋ win gi ŋwech.
Chore win chiegin gi Were, aka go bende bino chore chiegin gi win. Jomarecho, logi win chingi win. Lonyi win chuny win, wijokiganagana!
Bedi win gi rem, gi geregere aka wiywaki: nyiero mewin wolokere ywak, aka kisangala mewin wolokere rembo ayino!
Bwonere win ruwaŋ Were, aka go bino tiŋo win malo.

Wikiri wiluwere marach kwoŋ jowoti win, wutimera. Ŋata luwo marach kwoŋ omin, kosa thumo ri go banja, meno luwo marach kwoŋ Chik aka chayo Chik. Ka ichayo Chik, meno kere ikibedo dhano ma winjo Chik, to ijachayi Chik ayino.
Kole jakethi chik ma bende a jathumi banja nitye achiel kende. Go won ama nyalo botho kosa reyo woko. To onyo in iŋa, m'ithumo banja ri dhano nyawotin?
Ere pawinji win, win ma wiwacho ni, “Konon kosa dikin wabino kidho i tindi moro, kama wabino chow'iye oro, to watiyo to walimo pesa.”
Wikuya kada ni aŋo ma nyalo timere dikin! Kwo mewin obedi nedi? Kole wichali tor, ma nenere chowo hongo machiek to leny woko.
Kuchiel, d'onyo wiwacho ni, “Ka Ruoth oyeyo, wabino bedo makwo, to watimo gime gi mecha.”
To odoko wiyumere aka wipakere ayin; kole kiti yumirok no rach.
Amomiyo, dhano jye moŋeyo gimaber ma go ripere wotimi aka kitim meno timo gimarach.
Aka wijoŋaŋo, winji win! Bedi win gi rem aka wiywaki ru litho ma lebino ri win!
Ŋaŋo mewin otyeko top woko, aka ruk mewin masirigi otyeko chamo woko.
Zawabu mewin kodi feza otyeko mako nyal, aka nyal me bino bedo giranena manyutho recho mewin, to chamo delkwoŋ win pa mach. Wityeko dhuro ŋaŋo i ndelo machowe me!
Pawinji win! Kemba ma wikichulo jotich ma jotiyo i ndelin mewin ichade koko ka osa win. Aka ywak pa jokecho ri win otyeko tundo i ithi Were, Ruoth pa lwak jolweny!
Kwo mewin i piny ka obedo ma noro kodi ma kisangala mewin wiwegi. Wimedo chwe ri ndelo ma tho, pa dhok mikidho thumo.
Wityeko thumo banjin ni oloyo ji moido jongoye gi racho moro to wineko jo, kada oido jokipyem gi win.

Amomiyo, wutimere, diyi win chuny win, nyuka Ruoth odwoki. Neni win paka jafur diyo chunye munyo kuro ni lowo pere wonyak ri go gimawelo. Go kuro gino modiyo chunye chuka koth ma chwir kodi ma kecho tundo.
Aka wibende wiripo diyo chuny win. Chungi win matek rupiri ndelo ma dwoko pa Ruoth orikere ni chiegin.
Wikiri wigesa gi jowoti win, wutimera, aka Were kothum ri win banja. Kole jathumi banja ni dhoot, oyikere donjo!
Wutimera, poyi win jotuchi wach Were ma joluwo wach i nyingi Ruoth. Teri win jo paka ranen pa joma jochiro gi diyo chuny jo i hongo ma chandirok.

Ato wiŋeyo ni watero joma jotyeko chiro gimoro paka josilwany. Wityeko winjo paka Yobu onyalo chiro chandirok, aka wiŋeyo paka Ruoth oparo kwoŋe rumachien. Kole Ruoth oasere gi wor aka winjo malith gi teko pa dhano.

Maloyo meno, wutimera, wikiri wikwoŋere ka witimo chikirok aka witucho polo, kosa piny, kosa gimoro man jye. Wachi win nyaka ni, “Ey” ka wimito yeyo gimoro, kodi “Be” ka wimito kwero gimoro, aka ŋey wikobedi gi banja ruwaŋ Were.
Nitye moro kwoŋ win ma nitye i teko? Weyi wokwayi Were. Nitye moro ma sangala? Weyi woweri wer ma pako Were.
Nitye kwoŋ win ŋatatwo? Ripo wolwoŋi jotel ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo, ma jobino kwayo ri go to jowiro mo kwoŋe i nyingi Ruoth.
Aka kwayo mokway i yeyo, bino botho jatwo; Ruoth bino dwoko ri go men kwoŋe, aka gimarecho ma go otimo ibino chwako.
Amomiyo, tuchi win gimarecho mewin ri jowoti win, odoko kwayi win ri jowoti win, ŋey wilimi both ma del. Kwayo pa ŋatotire nitye gi men madwoŋ aka tiyo.
Eliya oido obedo dhano paka wan. Go okwayo gi ridho nike koth wongoye, aka koth bende kothon i lowo chowo oro adek g'adech.
Go odoko okwayo, to polo konjo koth to lowo nyak chiemo mani iye.
Wutimera, ka nyatoro kwoŋ win oweyo adyeri, to ŋat man dwoko go kendo,
poyi win gime: ŋat moro jye modwoki ŋatarach wok i royo pere mokom, bino botho chuny ŋatarach no kwoŋ tho, to miyo ichwako ri go gimarecho madit.
Balwa mowok bongi Petro, jamoor pa Yesu Kristo, Ri ji pa Were moyer ma jobedo paka wendo i piny aka jotyakere i adeche ma Ponto, Galasya, Kapadosya, Asya kodi Bithiniya.
Oyer win ru atoŋa ma Were Baba won oŋeyo kichutho, nike Chuny Maleŋ woloki win maleŋ, ŋey wiwinji Yesu Kristo to lonyo win gi remo pere. Weyi ŋono gi syem wobedi mewin mopoŋ kichutho.
Weyi wapaki Were Baa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo. Ru ŋono pere moasere, go omiyo wanywolere i kwo manyien munyo ochierino Yesu Kristo kwoŋ jomotho to miyo wan geno makwo i chuny wan,
to waŋiyo yu malo munyo wakiyo lunjo ŋaŋo ma kitopi, kosa nyiekere, kosa rumi, ma Were okano ri win i polo.
Ato ru yeyo mewin amomiyo men pa Were kuro win chuka tundo ndelo ma both moyik nyutho ka ndir otundo.
Sangala win gi wach me, kada onyo i hongo me wityeko nwaŋo chandirok munyo wibedo gi rem hongo machiek ru tem momore mobino ri win.

Chandirok me obino ru atoŋa ma temo yeyo mewin. Kole kada zawabu ma nyiekere jye itemo gi mach. Amomiyo yeyo mewin ma di welo loyo zawabu, bende yenyere wotem wonen ka otire, ŋey gino wokeli ri win pak kodi dwoŋ kodi wor i Ndelo milenyuth'iye Yesu Kristo kamaler.
Wimaro go kada fuodi wikineno go; wiyeyo go, kada pama wikinen go; aka wini gi kisangala ma di dwoŋ ma kiwachere,
rupiri onyo wilimo gima wok i yeyo mewin, mobedo both ma chuny win.
Both me ama jotuchi wach ma joluwo kwoŋ ŋono pa Were ma d'omiyo win, jotemo rango tyende maber.
Jotemo rango tyende munyo jomito ŋeyo ni keraŋo ma hongo no d'otund'iye, kodi paka d'obino; ato Chuny pa Kristo i jo oido chimo hongo no munyo tucho chandirok ma go d'ochiro, kodi dwoŋ ma d'owok'iye.

Were onyutho jotuchi wach me ni oido jokitiy ri jo wegi, to ri win, munyo joluwo kwoŋ adyeri ma pama wiwinjo. Jomikwenda ma Wach Maber, ma joluwo i men pa Chuny Maleŋ moor wok i polo, ama jotito ri win adyeri me. Me adyeri ma kiri jomalaika jye jomito ŋeyo dwoŋ mere.
Amomiyo yiki win paro mewin ma tich; bedi ma widhumo chuny win, aka kethi win geno mewin jye kwoŋ silwany mibino miyo win ka onyuthi Yesu Kristo kamaler.
Paka nyithindho ma winjo Were, wikiri wiyeyi awanya machon monwaŋo wini gine munyo fuodi wikuya Were wodhumi kwo mewin.
Kuchiel, bedi win maleŋ i gimoro jye ma witimo, paka Were molwoŋo win leŋ;
rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Wiripo bedo maleŋ, rupiri aleŋ.”
Kole wilwoŋo Were ni Baba ka wikwayo, aka go ama thumo banja ri ji jye ma rom. Amomiyo ori win kwo mewin i piny ka paka joma wendo munyo wimiyo go dwoŋ.
Ato wiŋeyo gimochul ma gonyo win woko kwoŋ kwo masisiri ma winwaŋo wok bongi kwarere mewin, aka gimonyiewo win no kobedo gimoro ma nyiekere woko paka zawabu kosa feza,
to remo pa Kristo ama ogonyo win, go mobedo paka nyathi rombo mongoye gi ŋolo moro kosa waŋpoyo.
Were oyero go ma fuodi kochwey piny, aka onyuthere i ndelo machowe me ma bero mewin.
I go wiyeyo Were, mochierino go kwoŋ jomotho to miyo go dwoŋ, momiyo yeyo kodi geno mewin nitye kwoŋ Were.
To paka onyo wilony ru winjo adyeri, aka wini gi mar mochwiny ri jowoti win ma joyeyo, ere marere win adyeri gi chuny win jye.
Kole onyo winywolere ma diryo, ki kwoŋ kodhi ma tho, to kwoŋ ma kitho, chungo kwoŋ wach pa Were makwo kendo ma yindira chil gi chil.
Rupiri ndiiko wacho ni, “Ji jye jochalo lum, aka dwoŋ pajo chalo thiwi lum; Lum tho, to thiwe oy woko,
to wach pa Ruoth doŋadoŋa chil gi chil.” Aka me a wach motiti ri win.
Amomiyo, weyi win miyo jowoti win litho, kodi twodo jye, kosa rendirok, kosa nyieko, kosa nyieko nyingi wadi win!
Bedi win paka nyithindho maŋich ma nyaka onywol jo, ma wiwinjo riiyo ma chak molony machuny, aka ka wimadho wibino dongo i both mewin.
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Wityeko bilo bero pa Ruoth.”
Biye win bongi Ruoth, tele makwo ma ji jokwero nike bu kony, to Were oyero paka di kony ri go.

Ato wibende wibedo telin makwo, m'onyo igero gine Ot pa Were machuny, kama wibino tiy'iye paka jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma joleŋ, kareno wichwayo rachow ma nyachuny ma Were jolo luwo kwoŋ Yesu Kristo.
Ato ndiiko wacho ni, “Neni, pama onyo aketho tele ma tyelo ot i Zayun, tele moyer ma di welo; aka nyatoro jye moyeyi go wiye kibino kwot.”
Tele me obedo mawelo madwoŋ ri win ma wiyeyo; to ri joma kiyey obedo: “Tele ma jogeto jokwero ni bu kony ama olokere tele ma mako kindi ot won gipi.”
Kendo ni, “Me a tele ma miyo ji jochier, Kidi ma miyo jopodho.” Jochier rupiri jokiyey Wach cha, paka ochan ni jowotimi.
To wibedo ji moyer, jochwayi ri Kere wi alitar, nono maleŋ, ji pa Were won, ŋey winyali pako tim pa Were ma urere, go molwoŋo win wok i mudho donjo i lero pere maŋon makiwachere.
I hongo mokadho oido wikibedo ji moyer, to pama onyo wibedo ji pa Were; i hongo mokadho oido wikijolo wor pa Were, to pama onyo wijolo wor pere.
Agoyo koko ri win jowatan, paka jowiloka ma wendo i piny me, ni ŋuti win kwoŋ awanya marecho, ma ndir jye lwenyo gi chuny win.
Kula mewin i dyer jokafiri wobedi maber ma ka jotemi kelo kwoŋ win wach ni wirecho, jobino neno tim mewin mabeyo, to jopako Were i Ndelo ma bino pere.
Ru atoŋa pa Ruoth, winji win jodhum jye ma piny; kada obedo kere madwoŋ ma dhumo joman jye,
kosa gavana, ma go oro ma miyo jotimi recho girachula, gi fuoyo joma timo gimabeyo.
Kole Were yenyo ni tim mewin mabeyo woum luwo masisiri mapa jomamiŋ.
Kwo mewin wobedi paka apa joma ni syem; to wikiri wiloki syem mewin ma umo recho moro jye; kuchiel kwo mewin wobedi paka apa jotich pa Were.
Wori win ji jye: mari win jowoti win ma joyeyo, lwori win Were, aka wiwor kere ma piny.
Ŋechin, winji win ruodhe mewin, aka nyuthi win jo wor mopoŋ, ki nyaka joma timo ri win maber aka joparo kwoŋ win kende, to kir jomager bende.
Kole nitye kony moro ka dhano ochiro litho ma chandirok rupiri dwoko paro pere kwoŋ Were.
To bero aŋo ma wilimo ka wichiro gocho ma ripere kodi win ka witimo recho? Kuchiel ka wichiro chandirok kada wityeko timo bero, meno ama Were miyo silwany.
Were olwoŋo win ri gime, rupiri Kristo bende ochandere ri win aka oweyo ri win ranen, nike winyali luwo bathe.
Ndiiko wach ni, “Go kotimo gimarach moro, aka ongoye twodo mowok i dhoke.”
Munyo oyet go, kochulo kwor; munyo ochandere, go kopiro nyatoro, to oketho geno pere i Were ma Jathumi banja i tiro.
Go won otiŋo gimarecho mawan i delkwoŋe wi musalaba, ŋey wabedi jomotho ri gimarach to wakwo ri tiro; chungo kwoŋ adholin pere, wityeko chango.
Ato oido wichalo roombo morwenyo; to onyo pama widwoko bongi Jakwath kendo Jakur ma chuny win.
I royo achiel, win mon wiripo yeyere gi chwogi win, ŋey ka mogo kwoŋ jo jokiyey wach pa Were, kiti mon pajo mabeyo wonyali ywayo jo to joyeyo.
Kole jobino neno paka kiti win olony aka di wor.
Ŋono mewin kiripi wok i gikipiny ma wiruko kosa witimo kwoŋ win paka kedo wich, kosa jaŋo kwoŋ win thiwino mawelo, kosa ruko nengin mawelo.
Kuchiel ŋono mewin ripo wok kwoŋ adyeri ma chuny win, ŋono ma kireyere ma chuny mamwol, mokudere, ma nitye gi welo madwoŋ i waŋ Were.
Kole me a royo ma mon maleŋ, ma jogeno Were i ndir machon, joloko gine kwo pajo maŋon, aka jowinjo chwogi jo,
paka Sara owinjo Ibrayimu, munyo lwoŋo go ni Ruoth! Aka wibedo nyithindho pere ka witimo gimotire ma wikibedo gi lworo moro jye.

Ameno bende, chwo bedi win i kwo maber gi mon mewin, munyo wimiyo jo dwoŋ paka chwech manyap, odoko paka joma bende jobino limo kanyachiel kodi win, mich pa Were mobedo kwo. Timi win ameno aka nyaka gimoro kogeŋ kwayo mewin.
Machowe, wijojye, riwere win i chuny win, bedi win gi wor ri jowoti win, odoko marere win paka wutimere, bedi win gi dewo kodi mwolo ri jowoti win.
Wikiri wichuli recho gi recho kosa yet gi yet, to chuli win gi silwany ayino; kole silwany a gima Were ochiko miyo win munyo olwoŋo win.
Rupiri paka ndiiko wacho, “Ŋata mito limo kwo gi neno syem, woweyi luwo marach gi lewe, aka wowey twodo.
Go ripo eye woko kwoŋ recho to timo bero; go ripo rango syem gi chunye jye.
Kole waŋ Ruoth nitye kwoŋ jomotire aka ochiko ithe ri kwayo pajo, to waŋ Ruoth gawo joma timo recho.”
To ŋa ma bino timo ri win teko ka wiyikere timo gimaber?
Aka kada wichandere ri timo gimotire, kole jye fuodi wibino limo silwany. Wikiri wilwori nyatoro, kosa wibwoki.
To i chuny win, wori win Kristo paka Ruoth. Ndir jye yikere win ma dwoko ŋata lwoŋo win tito geno ma wini gine.
To timi win ameno gi mwolo ka wimiyo jo dwoŋ. Kendo kuri win paro ma chuny win maber, aka ŋey joma joluwo marach kwoŋ kiti win maber i Kristo, wiy jo bino kwot kwoŋ gima jowacho.
Kole ber chandirok ru timo bero, ka obedo mito pa Were, loyo chandirok ru timo gimarach.
Kole Kristo otho ri gimarecho dichiel kichutho, ŋataber, ri jomarecho, ŋey go wokeli win bongi Were. Onek go i delkwoŋe, to kareno omiy go kwo i chuny,
aka i kwo machuny no, go okidho to tito wach kamaler ri chuny moketh i twech.
Me oido obedo chuny ma jokwero winjo Were munyo go otemo kuro jo munyo diyo chunye i ndir ma Nowa oido ger'iye yee. Ji manok ma jobedo i yee; ji aboro kende, ama joboth i pi,
aka pi no obedo ranyuth ma chimo batisimo ma pama botho win, ki paka gima lwoko woko chilo ma del to obedo chikirok m'itimo ri Were gi chuny maber. Gino bothin luwo kwoŋ chierino pa Kristo Yesu,
motyeko kidho i polo aka onyo nitye yu chingi Were marachuch, aka onyo dhumo jomalaika jye kodi men jye kodi adhum jye.
Amomiyo, paka Kristo ochandere i delkwoŋe, wibende wiripo miyirok miseni gi kiti paro ma go obedo gine, rupiri ŋata ochandere i delkwoŋe meno otyeko thekirok gi gimarach.
Ri ameno, wok gunyoni, mito pa Were ama dhumo kwo pere gipi i piny ka ma kiweno awanya marecho ma del.

Wityeko oro hongo moromo munyo oido witimo gima jokafiri joketho paro pajo i timo paka kidakana, awanya marecho ma waŋ i chuny jo, mero i kalima ma nyaworoworo, medho ma kitipa, gi lamo chal makichar.
Aka jokafiri no jouro nike wikiriwere gi jo i timo girawanya marecho moasere no, amomiyo joyeto win;
to jobino tito wach ri ŋata oyikere thumo banja ri jomakwo kodi jomotho.
Me amomiyo otiti Wach Maber ri joma pama jotyeko tho bende, ŋey wothumi ri jo banja i del paka ji jye, to jobedo makwo paka Were i chuny.
Giki gimoro jye orikere ochore chiegin, amomiyo bedi win milengela kendo ma widhumo kwo mewin aka winyali kwayo.
To maloyo gimoro jye, marere win gi mar madwoŋ, rupiri mar umo gimarecho madit.
Joli win jowoti win i pechin mewin mongoye kigesa.
Kis dhano ripo oro mich jye ma Were omiyo go ma konyo jowote, munyo oro mich mopokere opokere g'adyeri.

Nyatoro jye ma fuonjo wach pa Were ripo fuonjo igani obedo wach pa Were won; nyatoro jye ma timo tich wotimi gi men ma Were miyo go, aka ŋey i gimoro jye womiyi Were pak kwoŋ Yesu Kristo, ma dwoŋ gi men obedo apere, chil gi chil. Ameno.
Jowotan mamaro, wikiri widhyeri kwoŋ tem malith ma wichandere iye, igani gima ki ma kis ndelo timere ri win.
Kuchiel sangala win nike wiriwere gi Kristo i chandirok pere, ŋey rumachien kisangala wopoŋi i chuny win ka onyuthi dwoŋ pere.
Wijosilwany ka oyeti win ru oro nyingi Kristo; dwoŋ mere ni Chuny ma nigi dwoŋ aka apa Were, nitye i win.
To wongoye moro kwoŋ win ma wochandere paka janek, kosa jakwo, kosa ŋata otimo racho madwoŋ, kosa ma rire i tich pa joman.
To ka moro kwoŋ win chandere ru kwoŋbedo go Jakristo, wiye wokiri wokwoti, to wofuoyi Were ayino ni go ilwoŋo go gi nyingi Kristo.
Ato ndir otundo ma thumo banja aka lechako gi ji pa Were won. Onyo ka kidho chako gi wan, obedi nedi ri joma jokiyey Wach Maber ma wok bongi Were?
Kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Ka tek ri jomotire limo both; onyo aŋo m'obedi ri joma kilwor Were kodi jogimarecho?”
Amomiyo, jomachandere rupiri obedo mito pa Were ri jo, joripo medo miyirok ri jachwech pajo ma genere gi medo timo gimabeyo.

Onyo paka abende abedo jadwoŋ i kitipa pa jomoyeyo, kendo paka ŋata oneno chandirok mobedo ri Kristo, odoko paka ŋata bende ibino pokoye go dwoŋ milenyutho, agoyo koko ri jotel ma kitipin pa jomoyeyo ma jo ni dyeri win,
ni bedi win jokwath pa sidwol roombo ma Were omiyo win, aka wileki jo gi maro mewin, paka Were mito witimi, ma kiweno g'arom. Tiyi win, mongoye woro pesa, to ru maro tich ri jowoti win adyeri.
Wikiri widhumi joma oketh i kur mewin gi mbaka, to bedi win ranen ri sidwol.
Aka ka Jakwath Madwoŋ onenere, wibino limo sangarya ma di dwoŋ ma kibino wiro chal to rumo.

Ameno bende, wi joma fuodi soye wiripo winjo jotel mewin gi mwolo. Aka wijojye ruki win mwolo ma tiyo ri jowoti win pa nanga; kole ndiiko wacho ni, “Were lwenyo gi jopakirok, to timo ri joma wegi jobwonere ŋono.”
Amomiyo, bwonere win, i chingi Were ma di men, ŋey nyaka go bino tiŋo win malo i hongo moripo.
Kethi win rembo mewin jye kwoŋ go, rupiri go dewo kwoŋ win.
Bedi win ma wiŋeyo dhumo kwo mewin ma wineno. Kole jakwor mewin, jwogi, riwo piny pa simbwor ma hola, munyo rango nyatoro m'omwony.
Pyemi win gine, munyo wichungo matek i yeyo mewin, rupiri wiŋeyo ni jowoti win ma joyeyo i piny gipi bende onyo joluwo i kiti chandirok no.
To ka wityeko chandirok mathin, Were mani gi ŋono jye, molwoŋo win ni wopoki win ye dwoŋ ma chil gi chil i Kristo, won bino miyo win men, to miyo wichungo ma wichwiny i yeyo.
Ri go men wobedi chil gi chil. Ameno.
Andiko ri win balwa machiek me gi kony pa Silvano, ma atero paka omera mogenere. Amito medo win men gi ridho ri win nike me obedo ŋono pa Were adyeri. Chungi win matek iye.
Kitipa ma nyawoti mewin mani Babilon, ma Were bende ama oyero, dhiro ri win moth, gi Marko wuodan bende.
Mothere win akor gi mar ma nyakristo. Weyi syem wobedi gi wijojye ma wibedo apa Kristo.
Balwa mowok bongi Simon Petro, jatich kendo jamoor pa Yesu Kristo, Ri joma i tiro pa Were mawan kendo Jaboth, Yesu Kristo, omiy jo yeyo ma di welo paka mawan:
Weyi ŋono gi syem mopoŋ wobedi gi win i ŋeyo Were kodi Yesu Ruodhiwan.
Men pa Were omiyo wan gimoro jye ma wayenyo ma bedo i kwo ma lworo Were, rupiri waŋeyo ŋata olwoŋo wan gi dwoŋ kodi bero pere won.
Ameno go omiyo wan, mich m'ochiko madwoŋ swa kendo ma di welo, ŋey ka walimo mich me wabino both kwoŋ recho ma nitye i piny ka ru awanya, to wadonjo i kula ma nyawerewere.
Ri ameno, temi win paka winyalo medo bero kwoŋ yeyo mewin; kodi niaŋ kwoŋ bero;
kodi kurok kwoŋ niaŋ; kwoŋ kurok mewin medi win chiro; kwoŋ chiro medi win lworo Were;
kwoŋ lworo Were medi win iye woro jomoyeyo jowot win; aka kwoŋ woro jomoyeyo jowot win medi win iye marok.
Ka wimedo bedo gi gimabeyo me madit, bino loko win mayil to wibedo gi kony i ryeko mewin kwoŋ Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo.
To ka nyatoro ongoye gi gimabeyo me, meno kere go waŋe neno mariprip aka wiye owil ni otyek lonyo go kwoŋ recho pere.
Amomiyo, jowotan, temi win paka winyalo ridho lwoŋo kodi yer mewin; ka witimo ameno wikopodhi i yeyo mewin.
Ameno, ibino jolo win maber donjo i Ker makirum mapa Ruodhiwan kendo Jaboth mawan Yesu Kristo.
Amomiyo ndir jye abino poyo win gikipiny me, kada wityeko ŋeyo jo aka wichungo kir matek i adyeri ma wityeko jolo.
Aparo ni obedo gimotire ka achiewo paro mewin to wipoyo gikipiny me ka fuodi akwo,
rupiri aŋeyo ni achiegin lunyo woko delkwoŋan me paka Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo otyeko nyuthan kamaler.
Aka abino temo paka anyalo neno ni kada ka atyeko weyo piny me fuodi wibino poyo gikipiny me.
Wakichungo kwoŋ kigana achwoga munyo watito ri win bino pa Ruoth Yesu Kristo gi men, to waneno dwoŋ pere gi waŋ wan.
Ato oido wanitye munyo Were Bawan miyo go dwoŋ mamalo, munyo dwondi jo mowok bongi Dwoŋ ma Malo cha oluwo ri go, munyo wacho ni, “Me Wuodan mamaro aka asangala gine!”
Wawegi wawinjo dwondi ŋato munyo luwo wok i polo, kareno oido wanitye gi Yesu wi got.
Aka, wanitye gi wach pa jotuchi wach motyek ridho. Wibino timo maber ka wiketho paro mewin kwoŋe; kole obedo pa lero ma meny kamachol chuka ndelo yawere to lero pa sulwe modikini menyo chuny win.
To ma kalo me, poyi win nike ongoye ŋata won ochwogo wach motuchi i Ndiiko Maleŋ.
Ato ongoye mikwenda pa Were motuchi mowok i mito pa dhano, to ji jobedo i men pa Chuny Maleŋ munyo jotucho mikwenda mowok bongi Were.

Jotuchi wach matwodo chango jobedo i dyeri ji pa Were, paka bende jolebino i dyeri win. Jobino rwako fuonji ma kelo reyirok, aka jobino kwedere kwoŋ Ruoth jadhum monyiewo jo, to jokelo tho kwoŋ gin arwat.
Jomathoth jobino mako royo pajo ma wichkwot; aka ru tim pajo, jobino luwo marach kwoŋ Royo Maradyeri.
I woro pajo, jofuonji matwodo me jobino chiemo kwoŋ win gi kigana ma wegi jochwogo. Banja pajo otyek yiko thumo wok chon, aka reyirok pajo bende kini bor to ni chiegin.
Kesi Were koworo jomalaika ma chango jotimo gimarach to obolo jo i mach makitho kama otwey'iye jo i mudho, ka jokuro ndelo ma thumo banja.
Odoko Were koworo piny machon, to okelo mikula madwoŋ ri jomarecho, to gwoko nyaka Nowa mofuonjo tiro, kodi ji man abiryo kende.
Kole Were othumo banja ri tindi ma Sodom kodi Gomora, munyo waŋo woko jo gi mach, aka oloko jo ranen ri gima bino timere ri jomarecho jye;
kole go obotho Lot, ŋataber, ma chunye oramo swa kwoŋ kidakana pa ji moido jokidew chik.
(Ato jal maber no obedo i dyer jo, aka kis piny moyawere olimo litho i chunye munyo oneno to winjo tim pajo marecho no).
Amomiyo, kere Ruoth oŋeyo nger ma botho ji mabeyo ma jolworo Were i chandirok ma temo jo, kodi weyo jomarecho i girachula pajo chuka ndelo ma thumo banja,
kodhi joma chwire i kiti jo motop ma kidakana aka jochayo men pa Were. Jofuonji matwodo me jonitye gi miseni kodi mikenyo, aka joluwere kichar kwoŋ chwech mani hongo malo;
mato kir jomalaika ma jotek aka jomen loyo jokikeli wach marach kwoŋ chwech no i waŋ Ruoth.
To jome joluwere kichar kwoŋ gima jokuya odocho. Jochale g'ogwange madudi ma jongoye gi paro, mimako tineko jo, ilereyo jo woko paka ogwange madudi;

ilechulo jo chandirok ru chandirok ma jotyeko kelo ri joman. Kisangala pajo obedo medho odyechieŋ ma syemo delkwoŋ gin. Bedo gi wichkwot kendo gimarach ka jobedo dhower gi win, kareno josangala i royo pajo marecho!
Gi waŋ gin ma neno gimoro gi chot, jogomba kis dhako ma joneno. Awanya pajo ma timo gimarach kikwe; jodwoŋo joma nyap, aka joŋiyo timo woro. Jobedo ji motyek kwoŋo!
Joweyo royo motire to jorwenyo munyo jomako royo ma Balam wuodi pa Beyor oluwo, monwaŋo omaro pesa ma go olimo i timo recho,
to punda pere oayi kwoŋe ru gimarecho pere. Gino oluwo gi dwondi dhano to juko tim pa jatuchi wach ma janeko no.
Jome jochalo waŋ pi modwono kodi pondeponde ma koyo waro; Were oyiko ri jo kama di mudho tektek maloyo kaman jye.
Joluwo wach mamiŋo gi pakirok, aka jooro awanya ma delkwoŋ gin ma chiiko joma nyaka joeye kwoŋ joma nitye i royo ma kelo rwenyo.
Jochiko jo syem mato wegi jobedo ŋechin pa kite marecho; ato dhano bedo ŋecha pa gima dhumo go.

Kole k'inen oido jotyeko budhirok kwoŋ men ma piny ma kelo tho, to joŋeyo Ruodhiwan kendo Jaboth mawan Yesu Kristo, aka odoko jomoko kendo i men no to nyalo jo, meno kere nyutho ni jonitye marach rumachien loyo kachako.
D'ober ri jo ka jobedo ma jokuya royo ma tiro loyo ŋeyo royo no to odoko joweyo chik maleŋ momiy jo.
Gima otimere gi jo nyutho ni agecha me otire, “Gwok odoko gik naŋo ŋok pere kendo” aka “Mbiji motyek lwoko odoko gik ŋindirok i chwodho kendo.”
Jowotan mamaro, me onyo balwa mararyo ma andiko ri win. I balwin aryo me, atemo chiewo paro mewin ŋey wichaki paro mathuth.
Amito wipoyi wach ma jotuchi wach Were chango joluwo kwoŋe, kodi or mowok bongi Ruoth kendo Jaboth, ma jomoor mewin jomiyo win.
Marapena, wiripo ŋeyo nike i ndelo machowe me, jonyiero jobino fudhirok ma joluwo royo marawanya pajo marecho gi nyiero machay.
Jobino penjo win ni, “Go ochiko ni bino, kameno be? To ere go ni kune? Bachere mawan jotyeko tho, to gimoro jye fuodi romaroma paka oido nitye wok nyuka chwey piny!”
Jotimo atoŋa igani jokuya ni chango chon Were oluwo aka polo gi piny ochwey, aka piny ochwey wok i pi, aka gi pi.
Kendo mikula pi madwoŋ ama onyieki gine woko piny machon.
To gi wach no won, polo gi piny ma pama nitye okan jo ri mach; ikuro gi jo ndelo ma thumo banja ri ji ma jokilwor Were tireyo jo woko.
To jowotan, wiy win wokiri wowili gi gimoro achiel! Ri Were pokirok ongoye i dyeri ndelo achiel kodi oro gana achiel; ri go gikipiny me romaroma.
Ruoth kigal gi timo gima go otyeko chiko paka jomegi joparo. Kuchiel, go diyo chunye kodi win, rupiri go kimiti nyatoro woreyere woko, to mito dhano jye wonyali ŋuto gimarecho pere.
To Ndelo pa Ruoth bino tundo paka jakwo. I Ndelo no polo bino leny woko gi derino madwoŋ; gikipiny ma polo bino waŋ, to regere woko, aka piny gi gima ni iye jye bino lokere moyweyere pa mbolera.
Paka gikipiny me jye ibino nyieko woko, onyo wiripo bedo ji ma chali nedi? Kwo mewin ripo bedo maleŋ ma wilworo Were,
munyo wikuro Ndelo pa Were to witemo miyo wobin mayot. I ndelo no polo bino waŋ woko gi mach aka lyetho bino nyielo woko gikipiny mani iye.
To wakuro gima Were otyeko chiko; polo manyien gi piny manyien, kama tiro bino bed'iye pa pecho pere.
Amomiyo, jowotan, k'onyo wikuro Ndelo no, temi win paka winyalo bedo ma wilony kendo ma bu racho i waŋ Were to wibedo i syem gine.
Ŋeyi win ni kudirok pa Ruodhiwan, nyutho ni omiyo win hongo ma both, paka omin wan Paulo mamaro ondiko ri win gi ryeko ma Were omiyo go.

Me a gima go wacho i balwin pere jye munyo ndiko kwoŋ gino. Nitye gikipiny mogo matek niaŋ kwoŋe i balwin pere ma joma kuya kosa joma yengere i yeyo jofuonjo kichar, paka jotimo g'adeche man i Ndiiko Maleŋ. Ameno wegi jokelo kwoŋ gin teko.
To win, jowotan, paka wityeko ŋeyo gime, onyo gwokere win aka moro wokiri wonyali wondo win gi fuonji ma k'ago mapa joma kilwor chik to wipodho wok i kabedo moido wichung'iye maber.
To medere win gi dongo i ŋono kodi i ŋeyo Ruoth kendo Jaboth mawan Yesu Kristo. Dwoŋ wobedi ri go, pama kodi chil gi chil. Ameno.
Wandiko ri win kwoŋ wach ma kwo, motyeko bedo wok i chakirok, ma watyeko winjo odoko watyeko neno gi waŋ wan, watyeko kikaŋasa, aka chingi wan otyeko geyo.
Kwo no obino ma nenere; waneno amomiyo waluwo kwoŋe, aka watito ri win kwoŋ kwo makirum monwaŋo nitye gi Bawan aka onenere ri wan.
Gima watyeko neno gi winjo ama watito ri win bende, ŋey wibende wibedi kanyachiel gi wan i riwirok ma wani gine gi Bawan kodi Wuode Yesu Kristo.
Wandiko gime ŋey kisangala mawan wobedi mopoŋ.
Onyo me a mikwenda ma watyeko winjo bongi wuodi Were munyo watito ri win: Were obedo lero aka ongoye mudho i go kada mathin.
Amomiyo ka wawacho ni wanitye i riwirok gine, mato kwo mawan nitye i mudho, meno kareno watwodo aka tim mawan ongoy'iye adyeri.
To ka kwo mawan nitye i lero paka go won nitye i lero, meno wanitye i riwirok gi jowoti wan, aka remo pa Yesu, Wuodi Were, loko wan molony kwoŋ recho jye.
Ka wawacho ni wangoye gi recho, meno wawondere aka adyeri ongoye i wan.
To ka watucho recho mawan ri Were, go genere kendo otire aka bino chwako gimarecho mawan, to lonyo wan kwoŋ tim mawan marecho jye.
Ka wawacho ni fuodi wakitimo gimarach meno waloko Were jatwodo, aka wach pere ongoye i kwo mawan.
Andiko ri win gime, nyithindho paran, ŋey wikiri witimi gimarach, to ka moro otimo gimarach, wanitye gi Yesu Kristo ŋatotire, ma pido ri wan bongi Bamere.
Go won a rachow ma miyo ichwako gimarecho mawan, to ki gimarecho mawan kende, to gimarecho pa ji jye ma piny.
Me a gima miyo waridho ni waŋeyo go: ka wawinjo or pere.
Ka moro wacho ni, “Aŋeyo go,” to kiwinji or pere, meno ŋato jatwodo aka adyeri ongoye i go.
To ŋata winjo wach pere, meno a ŋata mar pere ri Were ochowere kichutho. Me apaka wanyalo ridho ni wakwo i Were:
ŋata wacho ni go kwo i Were ripo bedo gi tim paka chango apa Yesu Kristo.
Jowotan mamaro, or ma andiko ri win me kinyien; obedo or machon, ma wityeko bedo gine wok chon. Or machon me obedo mikwenda ma wityeko winjo.
To or m'andiko ri win nyien, aka adyeri mere nenere i Kristo kodi i win bende, rupiri mudho onyo eye woko aka lero maradyeri ama pama onyo meny.
Ŋata ŋoyo ni go nitye i lero, mato go odak omin, meno fuodi nitye i mudho ayino.
Ŋata omaro nyawote ama nitye i lero, aka ongoye gi gimoro ma miyo go timo gimarach.
To ŋata odak nyawote meno nitye i mudho aka woth'iye, aka kuya kama go chom'iye, rupiri mudho otyeko kelo ri go thowaŋ.
Nyithindho paran, andiko ri win, rupiri otyek chwako gimarecho mewin ru nyingi Kristo.
Andiko ri win bachere nan, rupiri wiŋeyo ŋata otyeko bedo wok i chakirok. Andiko ri win, soye ma nyaka ay, rupiri wityeko loyo jwogi, Ŋatarach. Andiko ri win nyithindho, rupiri wiŋeyo Were Bawan.
Andiko ri win, bachere ji, rupiri wiŋeyo go motyeko bedo wok i chakirok. Andiko ri win, soye ma nyaka ay, rupiri winitye gi men; wach pa Were bedo i win, aka wityeko loyo Jaracho.
Wikiri wimari piny kosa gimoro jye mapiny. Ka moro omaro piny meno mar pere ri Bawan ongoye.
Ato gimoro jye ma piny paka awanya marach ma del, kodi awanya ma waŋ jo, kodi pakirok ru kwoŋ bedo gima dhano ni gine kosa m'otimo, kobedo apa Bawan, to obedo apa piny ayino.
Piny kodi kisangala mere jye rumo; to joma timo gima Were mito jobino kwo chil gi chil.
Nyithindho paran, kole me ndir ma gike; ato wityeko winjo paka Jakwor pa Kristo bino; gunyoni jokwor pa Kristo kweth jotyeko nenere, aka meno apaka waŋeyo ni gike ni chiegin.
Adyer ji me oido jokiripi i kweth mawan, amomiyo joweyo wan; bedi joripo i kweth mawan, di jobedo gi wan, to joeye ŋey wonenere kamaler ni ongoye moro kwoŋ jo ma iyadyeri oido joripo i kweth mawan.
To Kristo otyeko wiro kwoŋ win mo ma Chuny Maleŋ amomiyo wiŋeyo adyeri.
Ri ameno andiko ri win, ki ni rupiri wikuya adyeri; to rupiri wiŋeyo, aka bende wiŋeyo ni ongoye twodo ma wok kwoŋ adyeri.
Onyo, ŋa ma jatwodo? Jatwodo meno ŋata wacho ni Yesu kobedo Kristo. Aka ŋato jakwor pa Kristo, rupiri go kwero Were Bawan gi Wuode.
Kole ŋata kwero Wuodi Were meno kwero Bamere bende; odoko ŋata jolo Wuodi Were meno jolo Bamere bende.
Amomiyo, ridhi win maber kano i chuny win mikwenda ma wiwinjo wok chon. Ka gima wiwinjo wok chon odoŋ i chuny win, meno ndir jye wibino doŋ gi wuode kodi Bamere i kwo mewin.
Aka me a gima Kristo won gipi ochiko miyo wan: manago kwo makirum.
Andiko ri win gime ma mako kwoŋ joma jotemo wondo win.

To ma mako kwoŋ win, Kristo otyeko wiro kwoŋ win mo ma Chuny Maleŋ pere. Ka tekin Chuny Maleŋ pere nitye i win, odoko wikiyeny moro wofuonji win. Kole wiir ma Chuny no won fuonjo win kwoŋ gimoro jye, aka gima go fuonjo obedo adyeri ma kiweno twodo, onyo doŋi win i Kristo.
Ey, nyithindho paran, nere win i go, ŋey wibedi gi miseni madwoŋ ka go omenyere aka wikopondi ri go ru wichkwot i Ndelo ma go ledwok'iye.
Wiŋeyo ni Kristo obedo tiro; ri ameno wiŋeyo ni moro jye ma timo gimotire meno go nyathi pa Were.
Neni win paka Bawan omaro wan moasere momiyo ilwoŋo wan ni nyithindho pa Were, aka iyadyeri, wabedo ameno. Gima omiyo piny kuya wan obedo rupiri koŋeyo Were.
Jowotan, pama onyo wabedo nyithindho pa Were, aka fuodi kiŋeyere gima wabino bedo. To waŋeyo ni ka Kristo onenere wabino bedo paka go, rupiri wabino neno go paka go nitye won.
Nyatoro jye ma nitye gi geno me i Kristo ripo lonyo kwo pere paka Kristo olony.
Moro jye ma timo gimarach meno turo chik pa Were; aka bedo i recho nyutho kwero winjo chik.
Wiŋeyo ni Kristo omenyere ŋey wokwanyi woko gimarecho mawan, aka go ongoye gi gimarach.
Amomiyo moro jye ma kwo i Kristo kimedere timo gimarach; to ŋata medere gi timo gimarach meno fuodi koneno go, aka fuodi kuya go.
Nyithidho paran, dhano moro jye wokiri wowondi win. Nyatoro jye ma timo gimolony meno ŋata otire paka Kristo otire.
Ŋata medere gi timo gimarecho meno dhano pa jwogi, rupiri jwogi ochako gi recho pere wok chon. Wuodi Were obino ru wach me: reyo woko tich ma jwogi oido otyeko timo.
Nyathi pa Were mogo jye kimedere gi timo gimarecho, rupiri kodhi pa Were ama nitye i go; aka rupiri Were obedo Bamere, go kidoki ripi medo timo gimarach.
Me apaka wanyalo poko maber i dyeri nyithindho pa Were kodi apa jwogi: nyatoro jye ma kitimi gimotire kosa ma komaro omin go, meno kobedo nyathi pa Were.
Kole me a mikwenda ma wityeko winjo wok chon: ni waripo marere.
Wikiri wibedi paka Kain: go oido obedo apa Jaracho, aka oneko omin won. Raŋo ma Kain oneko omin? Kwoŋbedo tim pere oido recho, aka gikipiny ma omin otimo oido beyo.
Amomiyo wutimera, wikiri widhyeri ka ji ma piny jodak win.
Waŋeyo nike watyeko weyo tho to wabino i kwo, rupiri wamaro wutimin wan. Ŋata kimar wadi meno fuodi nitye i tho.
Ŋata odak omin meno janek; aka wiŋeyo ni janek ongoye gi kwo makirum i go.
Me apaka waŋeyo gimobedo mar: Kristo omiyo kwo pere ri wan; aka wabende waripo miyo kwo mawan ri wutimin wan.
Ka dhano oŋaŋ to neno omin nitye i chandi, to kidew kwoŋ omin, go nyalo wacho nedi nike go nitye gi mar i chunye ri Were?
Nyithindho paran, mar mawan wokiri wobedi nyaka adhok won kende; to ripo bedo maradyeri, ma nyuthere i tim.
Amomiyo, me apaka wanoŋeyi nike wabedo joma ni g'adyeri, kendo apaka chuny wan bino bedo gi syem ruwaŋ Were:
kis ka chuny wan nyutho wan banja moro; ato waŋeyo ni Were dwoŋ loyo chuny wan, aka oŋeyo gimoro jye.
Amomiyo jowotan, ka chuny wan kinyuthi wan banja moro, meno aka wabedo gi miseni ruwaŋ Were,
aka walimo bonge gimoro jye ma wakwayo, rupiri wawinjo or pere aka watimo gima sangala go.
Me a gima go oro wan timo: nike waripo yeyo kwoŋ nyingi Wuode Yesu Kristo to wamarere paka Kristo ooro wan timo.
Nyatoro jye ma winjo or pa Were bedo i Were aka Were bedo i go. Aka me apaka waŋeyo ni Were bedo i wan: waŋeyo kwoŋ Chuny ma go omiyo wan.

Jowotan ma kachunyan, wikiri wiyeyere gi kis dhano makethere ni go nitye gi Chuny pa Were. Temi win jo ŋey winiaŋ ka adyeri jowok bongi Were, rupiri jotuchi wach matwodo mathoth jotyeko ywoyere i piny jye.
Me apaka winonyali ŋeyo ŋata nitye gi Chuny pa Were: moro jye ma wacho ni Yesu Kristo olokere dhano meno ma wok bongi Were.
To moro jye ma kwero gima kwoŋ Yesu meno chuny ma kiwoki bongi Were. Meno obedo chuny pa jakwor pa Kristo ma wiwinjo nike lebino, aka pama otyeko kir tundo i piny.
To win wibedo apa Were, nyithindho paran, aka wityeko nyalo woko jotuchi wach matwodo, rupiri Ŋata nitye i win dwoŋ loyo ŋata nitye i piny.
Jo jobedo apa piny, amomiyo joluwo paka piny yenyo aka piny chiko ithe ri jo.
To wan wabedo apa Were, aka moro jye moŋeyo Were chiko ithe ri wan. To moro jye ma kobedo apa Were kiwinji wan. Me a royo ma wanyalo poko gine Chuny maradyeri kodi chuny matwodo.
Jowotan, weyi wamarere wini, rupiri mar wok bongi Were. Moro jye mani gi mar obedo nyathi pa Were aka oŋeyo Were.
Ŋata ongoye gi mar meno kuya Were, rupiri Were obedo mar.
Me apaka Were onyutho mar pere ri wan: go ooro Wuode achiel gachiel i piny ŋey walimi kwo luwo kwoŋe.
Me a mar: ki kwoŋbedo ni onwaŋo wamaro Were, to ni go ama omaro wan to dhiro Wuode bedo rachow ma kwanyo woko gimarecho mawan.
Jowotan mamaro, k'inen me a paka Were omaro wan, meno wabende waripo marok.
Ongoye ŋata fuodi oneno Were, to ka wamarere, meno Were bedo i wan aka mar pere bino roch maber i wan.
Me apaka waridho maber ni wanitye i Were aka go bende nitye i wan; go otyeko miyo wan Chuny Maleŋ pere won.
Aka wawegi waneno aka onyo wawacho ri joman nike Bawan odhiro Wuode bedo Jaboth ri piny.
Ŋata tucho ni Yesu obedo Wuodi Were, Were bedo i go aka go bende bedo i Were.
Amomiyo wawegi waŋeyo aka wayeyo mar ma Were nitye gine ri wan. Were obedo mar, aka ŋata bedo i mar meno bedo i Were aka Were bende bedo i go.
Ameno, mar roch i dyeri wan, aka ŋey wabino bedo gi miseni madwoŋ i ndelo ma thumo banja, rupiri kwo mawan i piny ka chale kodi apa Kristo.
Lworo ongoye i mar, to mar motire kwanyo woko lworo jye, rupiri lworo wotho gi girachula, aka ŋatalwor meno fuodi mar koroch i chunye.
Wabedo gi mar rupiri Were ama otelo maro wan.
Ka nyatoro wacho ni, “Amaro Were,” mato go fuodi odak omin, meno go jatwodo, kwoŋ bedo go kinyali maro Were ma fuodi go koneno, to kwero maro omin ma go otyeko neno.
Amomiyo, me a or ma Kristo omiyo wan: ni ŋata omaro Were ripo maro omin bende.
Nyatoro jye ma yeyo ni Yesu obedo Kristo meno go obedo nyathi pa Were; aka ŋata omaro baa nyathi meno ripo maro kir nyathi bende.
Me apaka waŋeyo nike wamaro nyithindho pa were: ka wamaro Were gi winjo or pere.
Kole me a dwoŋ maro Were: winjo or pere. Aka or pere kitek ri wan timo,
rupiri nyathi pa Were jye nyalo woko men pa piny. Me apaka wanyalo loyo men pa piny: waloyo gi yeyo mawan.
Ongoye ŋata nyalo loyo men pa piny, kwanyo woko ŋata yeyo ni Yesu obedo Wuodi Were.
Yesu Kristo a ŋata obino gi pi ma batisimo kodi remo pere. Go kobino gi pi kende, to gi pi kodi remo. Aka Chuny Maleŋ won ridho adyeri me, rupiri Chuny Maleŋ obedo adyeri.
Nitye jokony adek ma ridho adyeri no:
Chuny, pi, kodi remo; aka jadek no jye joyeyere.
K'inen wayeyo wach pa ji ka joridho gine adyeri moro, meno waripo yeyo apa Were ma dwoŋ loyo; aka me a wach ma Were ridho kwoŋ Wuode.
Nyatoro jye ma yeyo Wuodi Were meno ridho adyeri no i chunye; to ŋata kiyeyi Were, meno oloko go jatwodo, rupiri go koyeyo gima Were owacho ma ridho adyeri ma mako kwoŋ Wuode.
Aka me a wach ma ridho adyeri: ni Were otyeko miyo wan kwo makirum, aka kwo me nwaŋere i Wuode.
Moro jye ma nitye gi Wuodi Were meno ni gi kwo me; aka moro jye mongoye gi Wuodi Were meno ongoye gi kwo.
Andiko ri win gime, win ma wiyeyo i nyingi Wuodi Were, winyali ŋeyo nike winitye gi kwo makirum.
Me amomiyo wanitye gi miseni ruwaŋ were: waridho nike go bino miyo wan gimoro jye ka wakwayo go paka go yenyo.
Aka ka waŋeyo ni go winjo wan ka wakwayo go gimoro, meno waŋeyo bende nike go bino miyo wan gima wakwayo jye.

Ka moro oneno omin timo gimarach ma kikel tho, go ripo kwayo, aka Were bino miyo ŋato kwo. Awacho ameno kwoŋ joma gimarecho pajo kikeli tho. To nitye gimarach ma kelo tho, aka akiwachi ni wiripo kwayo Were kwoŋ meno mere.
Tim jye ma kotire meno gimarach, to nitye gimarecho megi ma kikel tho.
Waŋeyo nike nyathi pa Were kimedere timo gimarach, rupiri Wuodi Were kuro go maber, aka Jaracho kinyali timo go marach.
Waŋeyo nike wabedo apa Were aka piny gipi nitye i dhum pa Jaracho.
Waŋeyo nike Wuodi Were otyeko bino aka omiyo wan niaŋ momiyo waŋeyo Ŋata obedo adyeri. Kwo mawan nitye i Ŋata obedo adyeri, chungo kwoŋ Wuode Yesu Kristo. Me a Were maradyeri won kendo a kwo makirum.
Nyithindho paran, eye win kwoŋ werin matwodo!
Balwa mowok bongi Jadwoŋ: Ri dhakodwoŋ moyer kodi nyithindho pere mamaro i adyeri, aka ki an kendan, to ji jye ma bende joŋeyo adyeri jomaro win,
ru adyeri ma nitye i wan aka bino bedo gi wan ndir jye:
Weyi Were Bawan kodi Yesu Kristo, Wuodi go, womiyi wan ŋono, wor kodi syem i adyeri kodi mar.
Asangala ma kichutho ru nwaŋo ni nyithindho perin megi jonitye i adyeri, paka Bawan ooro wan won.
Amomiyo, akwayin, dhakodwoŋ, ni wamarere win. Me kobedo or manyien ma nyaka andiko rin; to obedo or ma watyeko bedo gine wok chon.
Aka me a mar: ni wawinji or pere. Paka wityeko winjo wok chon, go oro win bedo gi mar.
Jotwodo megi jotyeko ywoyirok i piny gipi; ji ma jokiyey ni Yesu Kristo obino i del paka dhano. Ŋata pameno jatwodo, kendo a jakwor pa Kristo.
Amomiyo, kure win, ŋey gima wityeko tiyo ri go wokiri wobudhi win, to wilim kemba mewin mopoŋ.
Ŋata kibedi i fuonji pa Kristo, to medere i giman ayino, meno ongoye gi Were. Ŋata doŋ i fuonji, meno nitye gi Bawan kodi Wuode.
Amomiyo, ka moro bino bongi win, aka kikel fuonji me, wikiri wijoli go pecho mewin; odoko wikiri wimothi go kada ni: “Syem wobedi kodin.”
Ato ŋata jolo go gi moth meno riwere gine i tim pere marecho.
Onwaŋo anitye gi wach madit ri win, to kiber awachi ri win i papila kodi vino; kuchiel, ageno lyewo win to waluwo awaŋ g'awaŋ, aka nyaka wabino bedo gi kisangala mopoŋ.
Nyithindho pa Nyamerin moyer jodhiro rin moth pajo.
Balwa mowok bongi Jadwoŋ, Ri Gayo nyawotan ma kachunyan, mamaro i adyeri.
Mere paran, akwayo ni gimoro jye wokidhi rin maber aka ibedi m'ilama i del, paka chunyin olama.
Abedo gi kisangala madwoŋ munyo jomoyeyo mogo jotundo to jowacho paka initye gi genirok i adyeri kodi paka ndir jye ibedo i adyeri.
Ongoye gima sangala an loyo ka awinjo ni nyithindho paran joluwo adyeri.
Mere paran, igenere swa i tich mitimo ri jomoyeyo, kada nende jobedo joma ikuya jo,
aka jotyeko luwo ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo kwoŋ mar perin. Mondo konyi jo jowomedere gi woth pajo i royo ma bino kisangala Were.
Kole jochako tich ri Kristo ma jokojolo kony moro jye wok bongi jokafiri.
Amomiyo, waripo konyo jome, ŋey wariwere gi jo i tich ri adyeri.
Andiko balwa machiek ri kweth pa jokristo, to Dyoturefe, ma mito bedo marapena i gimoro jye, kiyenyi dewo kwoŋ gima awacho.

Amomiyo, ka abino, alewodho gimoro jye ma go otyeko timo kamaler: gikipiny marecho ma go luwo kwoŋ wan, kodi twodo pere. To chalo meno jye kirom go, fuodi go kijoli jomoyeyo ka jobino, aka go juko kir joman ma jomito jolo jo to ryemo woko jo i kweth pa jomoyeyo.
Mere paran, ikiri iluwi ranen marach no, to luw gimaber mere ayino. Nyatoro jye ma timo gimaber bedo apa Were. Aka ŋata timo gimarach meno fuodi koŋeyo Were.
Dhano jye luwo maber kwoŋ Demeturyo. Aka giradyeri won ama iluwo kwoŋ go. Wabende waluwo maber kwoŋ go, aka wiŋeyo nike gima wawacho obedo giradyeri.
Onwaŋo anitye gi madit awacha rin, to akotimi ameno i kalamu gi vino.
To ageno nenin mayot, aka nyaka wabino luwo.
Syem wobedi kodin. Merin perin jye jodhiro rin moth. Ibende mothi ri wan merin mawan jye.
An Yuda, jatich pa Yesu Kristo, kendo omin Yakobo, andiko balwa me ri joma Were olwoŋo ma jonitye i mar pa Were Bawan kodi kur pa Yesu Kristo.
Wor, syem, kodi mar wobedi ri win mathoth.

Jowotan mamaro, onwaŋo atemo paka anyalo ndiko ri win kwoŋ both ma wan kodi win wani gine, munyo aneno ni yenyere ndiko ri win pama ma miyo win miseni ma lweny ri yeyo ma Were otyeko miyo ji pere dichiel kichutho.

Kole jomogo motyek thumo ri jo banja wok chon, jotyeko lwi to jodonjo nyaliŋliŋ i dyeri win ma wikineno; jokuya Were aka jokomo fuonji kwoŋ ŋono pa Were ma umo recho pajo aka jokwero Yesu Kristo, ma dwoŋ loyo kendo obedo Ruoth mawan.
Kada wityeko ŋeyo gime, jye fuodi amito poyo win paka Ruoth obotho ji pa Israel i piny Misir, to rumachien reyo woko ji ma jokwero yeyo.
Poyi win ni jomalaika ma jokalo kew ma men pajo, to joweyo kabedo pajo, Were okano jo piny i mudho, to tweyo jo gi lijegere ma chil gi chil ri ndelo madwoŋ mibino thum'iye ri jo banja.
Ameno bende apaka Sodom gi Gomora, kodi tindin mothoko jo ma chango jotimo paka jomalaika jotimo, aka jotimo chot kodi kidakana, jobedo ranen ri ji paka joma chandere i mach chil gi chil.
Ameno bende, jome lek pajo wondo jo aka miyo jotimo gimarach i delkwoŋ gin won; jochayo men pa Were; odoko jochayo jomalaika ma jo ni gi dwoŋ i polo.
Kole kada malaika madwoŋ, Mikaeli, kotemo yeto jwogi gi wach marecho munyo jopyemo ni ŋa ma d'otero delkwoŋ Musa, to owacho ni, “Ruoth woayi kwoŋin.”
To jome joyeto gima jokuya dwoŋ mere; aka gima joŋeyo timo pa lee mongoye gi paro, a gikipiny ma bino reyo jo woko.
Kidamba wobedi ri jo! Joluwo royo ma Kain chango oluwo; jomunyere i fuonji mokom ru woro, paka chango Balam otimo. Jobino kisika woko ru pyem paka chango Kora gin jotimo.

Jochalo chilo ma duwo kalima mewin, jokapakapa gi medho aka jochiemo kodi win mongoye wichkwot. Jobedo jokwath ma joparo kwoŋ iyi gin wegi. Jochalo pondeponde ma koyo lera gine to kikel koth. Jochalo yen ma kinyaki olemo kada i chwir, yen motyek fudho woko gi tyendi gin aka jotho woko kichutho.
Jochalo kitula pa pi i nam, aka tim pajo ma wichkwot yenyo malo pa bwoyo. Jochalo michalin mochot, ma Were otyeko yiko ri jo kabedo ma chil gi chil i mudho.
Enoka, nyakwar Adam ma nyatirtir i luse marabiryo, chango oluwo kwoŋ jo chon ni, “Neni! Ruoth bino gi jopere maleŋ gana gi gana,
ma thumo banja ri ji jye, gi nyutho jomarecho jye ma jokilwori Were, tim pajo marecho ma kwero lworo Were, kodi wach marecho ma joma kilwor Were joluwo kwong Were!
Ji me noknok jogesa aka jopusa jowoti jo; jotiyo g'awanya pajo marecho; wegi joyumere aka jodwoŋo wadi gin, ŋey jowotimi gima wegi joyenyo.”
To poyi win, merin paran mamaro, gima jomoor pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo jowacho ri win ndir mokadho ni bino timere.
Jowacho ri win ni, “I ndelo ma rumachien, ji jobino wok ariwa ma jobino nyiero win; ji ma jotiyo g'awanya pajo marecho.”
Me a ji ma jokelo tyakirok, ma paro pajo marecho dhumo jo, ma jongoye gi Chuny Maleŋ.
To win, merin paran mamaro, medere win gi dongo i yeyo mewin moasa leŋo; aka kwayi win i men pa Chuny Maleŋ.
Bedi win i mar pa Were kareno wikuro wor pa Ruodhiwan Yesu Kristo, ma bino kelo ri win kwo makirum.
Joma fuodi joganagana, nyuthi win jo wor.
Bothi win joman munyo wifudho jo woko arwat kwoŋ mach. Nyuthi win joman bende wor kareno wikure gi lworo; aka wiripo dak kir ruk pa joma awanya pajo ma kidakana oduwo.
Ri Ŋata nyalo thyelin m'ikipodho, to kethin ma bu racho i kisangala ma di dwoŋ pere,
ri Were ma Jaboth mawan achiel kende: wor, dwoŋ, men, kodi dhum wobedi ri go, i ndir mokadho, ma pama, kodi ma chil gi chil, i Yesu Kristo. Ameno.
Me a wach momenyere ma Were omiyo Yesu Kristo, ŋey wonyuthi jotich pa Were gima ripo timirok mayot. Kristo omiyo gikipiny me oŋeyere ri jatich pere Yohana munyo ooro malaika pere bonge.
Yohana oridho wach pa Were kodi gima mako kwoŋ adyeri pa Kristo, gi gimoro jye m'oneno.
Ŋata soma wach atucha me jasilwany, aka jomachiko ithi jo ri wach me gi ketho i chuny jo jo ni gi silwany, rupiri ndir chiegin tundo ma gikipiny me bino timer'iye.

Ndiiko mowok bongi Yohana ri jomoyeyo ma kitipin abiryo ma i adech ma Asya: Ŋono gi syem wobedi ri win wok bongi Were, ma nitye pama, mobedo chon, odoko ma fuodi bino bedo, kodi ma wok bongi chuny momakere abiryo ma ruwaŋ kom pere madhum,

kodi ma wok bongi Yesu Kristo, jakony ma genere, Wuode ma Kayo motel chierino go kwoŋ jomotho, aka obedo jadhum pa kerin jye ma piny! Go omaro wan, aka gi remo pere ogonyo wan woko kwoŋ gimarecho mawan,
aka oloko wan bedo ker, kendo jomachwayo wi alitar pa Were kendo Bamere. Dwoŋ kodi men wobedi ri go chil gi chil. Ameno.
Panen, go eno bino gi pondeponde! Aka kis waŋ dhano bino neno go, kir joma jochwowo go jye. Ji jye ma piny jobino ywak kwoŋbedo go. Apaka bino bedo! Ameno.
“Aŋata marapena kendo machowe,” Ruoth Were Majameni jye wacho; go ma nitye pama, mobedo chon, kendo bino bedo.
An Yohana, omin win ma nitye gi win i Yesu i chandirok, kodi i Ker pere, kodi i chiro teko. An onwaŋo obolan i kigoda ma pi othoko ma Patmos ru fuonjo wach pa Were kodi bedo jakony ri adyeri pa Yesu.
Hongo no oido obedo ndelo pa Ruoth, aka Chuny Maleŋ onwaŋo ni kodan, to awinjo dwondi nyatoro yu ŋeyan ka koko pa gwara ni,
“Ndiki gima ineno jye i kitawo, aka idhiri ri kitipin abiryo mapa jomoyeyo ma Efeso, Simiruna, Perugamo, Thyatira, Sarudi, Filadefya kodi Lawodisya.”
Awiro waŋan chien munyo ayenyo neno ŋata oluwo kodan; to munyo awire, aneno raŋaw talin motim ma zawabu abiryo,
aka i dyeri gikipiny no, aneno ŋat mochalo Wuodi Dhano, moruko kanzu mabor to karo i kore del ma zawabu.
Wiye kodi yewiye oido tar pa yer rombo matar, waŋe oido chalo mach malyel,
tyende oido pilin pa nyweny monyiel i kendo malyeth, aka dwonde oido chalo derino ma gorok pa pi i nam.
I chinge marachuch, go oido otiŋo michalin abiryo, aka abor mabith ma nyalewe aryo owok i dhoke, aka nyime onwaŋo chalo waŋchieŋ malyel gi men mere jye.
Munyo aneno go, apodho dho tyende pa ŋatotho, to go ogeyan gi chinge marachuch to wacho ni, “Ikiri ilwori gimoro, me an, an marapena kendo machowe odoko akwo;
onwaŋo atho, to neni, onyo akwo chil gi chil. Anitye gi men kwoŋ tho kodi piny pa jomotho jye.
Amomiyo, ndiki gim'ineno, ma pama kodi ma bino timere rumachien.

Me a dwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ kwoŋ michalin abiryo mineno i chingan marachuch no, kodi raŋaw talin ma zawabu: michalin abiryo no obedo jomalaika ma kitipin abiryo mapa jomoyeyo, aka giŋawo talin abiryo meno kitipin abiryo mapa jomoyeyo no.
“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Efeso ndiki ni: “Me a mikwenda mowok bongi ŋata otiŋo michalin abiryo i chinge marachuch, aka wotho i dyeri raŋaw abiryo ma talin.
Aŋeyo tim perin, paka itiyo matek aka ichiro teko mabino rin. Aŋeyo nike ikijoli ji marecho, aka ityeko kikaŋasa joma ŋoyo nike jobedo jomoor kere to be, aka inwaŋo ni jobedo jotwodo.
Aŋeyo ni ityeko chiro teko i nyingan, ma chunyin koŋedhere.
To kende me a gima anwaŋo kwoŋin ma kotire: ityeko bolo woko mar moido ndir no itelo bedo gine ran.
Poyi paka ipodho wok kama bor! Ŋuti aka idok'itimi gima chango ipen timo. Ka ikiŋuto kwoŋ gimarecho perin, alebino bongin to akwanyo woko raŋaw perin ma talin i kabedo mere.
To me a gima thyelin: wikwero gima jopa Nikola jotimo, paka abende akwero.
“Amomiyo, ŋata ni gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo! Ri joma joloyo ratem abino miyo jo men ma chamo yath ma kwo ma nitye i Ndelo pa Were.
“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Simiruna ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda ma wok bongi ŋat marapena kendo machowe, m'otho aka odoko onyo kwo.
Aŋeyo chandirok kodi chandi perin; aŋeyo nike ijachandi, to iyadyeri iŋaŋ! Aŋeyo recho ma joma ŋoyo nike jobedo Joyudaya mato kere jokobedo, jotimo rin; meno joma nitye i achiel gi Sitan!

Ikiri ilwori chandirok ma chiegin bino rin. Awacho rin ni, jwogi bino bolo megi kwoŋ win i jera paka ratem; chandirok mewin bino chowo ndelo apar. Bedi gi genirok tundo tho, aka abino miyin sangarya ma kwo.
“Amomiyo ŋata nigi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo! “Joma joloyi ratem jokolimi litho ma tho mararyo.
“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Perugamo ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda ma wok bongi ŋata nitye g'abor mabith ma nyalewe aryo.

Aŋeyo ni kama ibed'iye, a kama Sitan ojeng'iye kom pere madhum. To ichwire i nyingan, aka ikiweyo medirok gi yeyo perin kwoŋan kada i ndir ma Antipa, jakony paran mogenere onek'iye i tindi mewin kenyo kama Sitan bed'iye.

To me a gikipiny manok ma anwaŋo kwoŋin ma kotire: Winitye gi jomogo i dyeri win kenyo ma joluwo fuonji pa Balam, mofuonjo Balak nger ma ywayo chuny ji ma Israel jowotimi gimarach munyo jochamo riŋo mochow gine chal pa werin makichar, gi timo chot.
Meno apaka wibende winitye gi joma joluwo fuonji pa Nikola i dyeri win.
Amomiyo ŋuti win kwoŋ gimarecho mewin! Ka kameno alebino bongi win mayot to alwenyo gi jono kodi abor ma wok i dhokan.

“Amomiyo, ŋata nitye gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo! “Ŋata loyo ratem abino miyo go chiemo mopan milwoŋo ni manu. Abino bende miyo go tele matar, mondik'iye nyingi jo Manyien, ma ŋata omiy gino kende ama won ŋeyo.
“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Thyatira ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda ma wok bongi Wuodi Were, ma waŋe lyel pa mach, ma tyende pilin pa nyweny ywel morudi.
Aŋeyo tim perin, mar kodi yeyo perin, tich perin gi chiro chandirok perin, odoko aŋeyo ni pama onyo imedo tich loyo kama ichak'iye.

To gima anwaŋo kwoŋin marach ame: ijolo dhako ma nyinge Jezebel, ma won lwoŋere ni jatuchi wach pa Were aka fuonjo odoko bano jotich paran i timo tim ma wichkwot gi chamo riŋo mochow gine chal pa werin makichar.
Atyeko miyo go hongo ma weyo woko gimarecho pere, to go kimiti weyo tim pere ma wichkwot.
Kuri inen! Abino pyelo go wi kitanda ma chandirok, aka abino miyo jomoido jotimo gine chot bedo i chandirok malith, kwanyo woko ka joŋuto gikipiny marecho ma jotimo kodi go.
Abino kisika nyithindho pere bende, aka kitipin pa jomoyeyo jye jobino ŋeyo nike a jamenyi chuny ji gi ŋeyo paro pa ji. Abino chulo kis dhano kwoŋ win chungo kwoŋ gima go otimo.
“To jomodoŋ kwoŋ win i Thyatira, ma jokiluwi fuonji pere no aka fuodi jokofuonjere ryeko pa Sitan ma jolwoŋo ni, ‘nyaliŋliŋ mathuth,’ onyo awacho ri win ni akokethi peko man kwoŋ win.
To maki win matek gima wini gine chuka anobin.
Ri ŋata loyo ratem, ma medere gi timo gima amito kir i gike, abino miyo go men ma dhumo piny;
go bino dhumo jo gi luth manyweny to ŋinyo jo woko pa degi malowo, paka awon atyeko nwaŋo men madhum bongi Baba.
Aka abino miyo go sulwe modikini.
Nata ni gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo.

“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Sarudi ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda ma wok bongi ŋata nitye gi Chuny momakere abiryo mapa Were kodi michalin abiryo. Aŋeyo tim perin; iterere pa ŋata kwo mato ityeko tho!
Amomiyo chiewi, aka imedi tich kwoŋ nyaka gima fuodi ini gine, ma fuodi kotho jye, rupiri fuodi akinen i tim perin gima otire ruwaŋ Were paran.
Amomiyo poyi gima ofuonjin aka odoko iwinjo; maki gino aka ŋuti kwoŋ gimarecho perin. To ka ikichiewi, alebino bongin pa jakwo, aka ikoŋeyi kada hongo ma alebino rin iye.
To nitye nyaka ji manok kwoŋ win i Sarudi kenyo ma fuodi jokoduwo nengin pajo gi chilo. Jobino wotho kodan i ruk matar rupiri joripo gine.
Ŋata loyo ratem bino rukere i ruk matar ameno, aka akorey woko nyinge i kitawo ma kwo aka abino tucho nyinge i waŋ Baba kodi jomalaika pere.
Amomiyo ŋata ni gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo.

“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Filadefya ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda ma wok bongi Ŋataleŋ kendo ŋatobedo Maradyeri, ma tiŋo rayaw pa Daudi, ma k'oyawo gimoro nyatoro kinyali chiego, kendo gima go ochiego nyatoro kinyali yawo.

Aŋeyo tim perin. Kole atyeko yawo rin dhoot ma nyatoro kinyal chiego; aŋeyo nike initye gi men manok; to ityeko luwo fuonji paran aka ikikwedere kwoŋ nyingan. Atyeko yawo rin thigo ma moro kinyali chiego.
Ere onyo akidho kelo kitipa ma ji pa Sitan, ma jotwodo aka joŋoyo nike jobedo Joyudaya, mato jokobedo; abino kelo jo bongin to jogoyo chongi gin piny ruwaŋin to joniaŋ ni kere amarin.
Kwoŋbedo ikuro or paran ma diyo ich gi chiro chandirok; abino kurin maber i ndir ma teko obin'iye ri piny gipi ma temo ji jye.
Abino mayot; maki maber gima ini gine, aka moro wokiri womayin sangarya perin.

Abino loko ŋata oloy ratem siro ma Ot pa Were paran, aka go kodoko owok iye. Abino ndiko kwoŋe nyingi Were paran, kodi nyingi tindi pa Were paran, Yerusalem manyien, ma bino loro piny wok i polo bongi Were paran; kodi nyingan manyien won bende.
“Amomiyo ŋata ni gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo.
“Ri malaika ma kitipa pa jomoyeyo ma Lawodisya ndiki ni: “Me mikwenda mowok bongi ŋata lwoŋere ni Ameno, jakony ma genere odoko maradyeri, mobedo kachakirok ma chwech pa Were:
Aŋeyo tim perin; aŋeyo nike ichali pi ma morimor. Bedi iŋich kichutho kosa ilyeth ayino kichutho dober!
To paka imorimor nyaka masisiri, aka ikiŋich odoko ikilyeth, aleŋulin woko wok i dhokan!
Ato iwacho ni, ‘Aŋaŋ kendo anitye maber,’ kendo ni, ‘Anitye gi gimoro jye mayenyo.’ To ikuya paka ichandere; kole yenyere womak kodin wor ayino, ijachandi, initye kinyoro, aka waŋin jye otho.

Amomiyo, amiyin ryeko ni nyiewi zawabu bongan, moyik gi mach, aka inoŋaŋ. Nyiewi nengin matar bende iruki aka iumi gine kinyoro perin ma kelo rin wichkwot no. Nyiewi yen ma waŋ jo bende ikethi i waŋin, aka ŋey inyali neno.
Joma amaro, apusa jo odoko atwenyo jo. Amomiyo bedi g'adyeri kendo ŋuti kwoŋ gimarecho perin.
Aka ee achungo dho thigo agudo; ka moro owinjo dwondan to yawo, abino donjo i ot pere to achiemo gine, to bende chiemo kodan.
Ŋata oloyi lweny abino miyo men ma bedo bongan i kom paran madhum, paka abende atyeko loyo lweny aka onyo abedo kabuti Baba i kom pere madhum.
“Amomiyo, ŋata ni gi ithe, wowinji gima Chuny wacho ri kitipin pa jomoyeyo!”

I hongo me alimo menyirok man, aka aneno dhoot moyaw i polo. Aka dwondi jo moluwo gi derino paka gwara, monwaŋo atyeko winjo chon ka luwo kodan, owacho ni, “Biye ka, anyuthin gima bino timere rumachien.”
Piyo piyo Chuny Maleŋ opoŋ kwoŋan, to kom pa Were madhum i polo bino ruwaŋan, kareno nitye ŋatobediye.
Ŋata obedo no oido lyel pa gee mawelo ma nyaboke pendi pa jaspa, mobokere pa kanelyan, aka lifudu ma rangi mere oruwere kweth pa emerad oido othoko kom madhum no.
I thach mothoko kom no onwaŋo nitye kombere pyero aryo g'aŋwen man, ma jodongo pyero aryo g'aŋwen i ruk matar jobed'iye, aka joruko sangarya ma zawabu i wiyi jo.
I kom madhum no oido wok pilin, kodi derino kodi mwoch pa lithkoth. Aka onwaŋo nitye talin abiryo ma lyel yu waŋ kom no, mobedo chuny momakere abiryo mapa Were.

Kendo yu waŋ kom madhum no onwaŋo nitye gima chale pa jwom ma ndewiro, maler pa gee maminyin. Thoko kom no, thenge korin gi korin, onwaŋo nitye chwech makwo ma waŋ gin nityatya kis kamoro, yu nyim jo kodi yu ŋey jo jye.
Gimakwo marapena ochale kodi simbwor; mararyo ochale kodi thwon; aka maradek wiye gi waŋe ochalo apa dhano; aka maraŋwen ochalo ango moyaro bwombe pa winyo ma ringo i hongo.

Kis achiel kwoŋ chwech makwo no oido nitye gi bwombe auchiel, aka omore gi waŋe kwoŋe gipi kir i pendi bwombe. Chwech no jowero ma jokiliŋ wor g'odyechieŋ ni: “Maleŋ, maleŋ, maleŋ, Ruoth Were Majameni jye, mobedo chon, ma pama nitye, aka lebino.”
Hongo jye ma chwech aŋwen makwo no jomiy'iye ŋatobedo wi kom madhum, ma kwo chil gi chil no dwoŋ, kodi wor, kodi fuoy,
jodongo pyero aryo g'aŋwen no jogore piny ruwaŋ ŋatobedo wi kom madhum, to jolamo ŋata kwo chil gi chil no. Jobolo sangarya pajo runyim kom madhum, aka jowacho ni:
“Ruoth mawan kendo Were! Iripere limo dwoŋ, gi wor kodi men, rupiri ichweyo gikipiny jye, aka gi mito perin ama omiyo jokwo.”
Gikenyo aneno papila momin mondik thenge aryo jye ma ŋatobedo wi kom madhum otiŋo i chinge marachuch, aka omwon gi gimwono abiryo mothore.
Aka aneno malaika ma jameni moluwo gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Ŋata ripere gi halo gimwono to yawo papila momin no?”
To ongoye moro monwaŋere i polo, i piny, kosa i pendi lowo ma d'onyalo yawo papila momin no gi neno iye.
Aywak maloŋo rupiri ongoye ŋata onwaŋere ma oripo nyalo yawo papila momin no kosa neno gima n'iye.

Gikenyo achiel kwoŋ jodongo no owacho ran ni, “Ikiri iywaki. Panen! Simbwor ma nono pa Yuda, nyakwar Daudi otyeko loyo lweny aka go nyalo halo woko gimwono abiryo mothore no jye to yawo papila momin no.”

Aka aneno Nyathi rombo moro ochungo i dyere dho kom madhum, ma chwech makwo aŋwen kodi jodongo no jothoko. Nyathi rombo no ochalo pa monek ma chowirok. Rombo no onwaŋo nitye gi tunge abiryo kodi waŋe abiryo, ma jobedo chuny momakere abiryo mapa Were modhir i piny gipi.
Nyathi rombo no okidho to kwanyo papila momin ma ŋatobedo wi kom madhum oido otiŋo i chinge marachuch no.

Munyo go okwanyo gino ameno, chwech makwo aŋwen no kodi jodongo pyero aryo g'aŋwen no jogore piny ruwaŋ Nyathi rombo no. Kis dhano oido otiŋo tongol, kodi atewe ma zawabu ma buban opoŋ'iye, mobedo kwayo pa ji pa Were.

Jowero wer manyien ni, “Iripere gi kwanyo papila momin gi halo woko gima omwon gine. Kole onekin, aka gi remo perin, inyiewo ri Were ji maleŋ, wok i nonin jye, dhudhok jye, piny jye kodi ji ma piny gipi.
Iloko jo ker pa jochwayi ri Were wi alitar; aka jobino dhumo piny.”
Odoko aneno, aka awinjo dwondi jomalaika gana gi gana! Jochungo jothoko kom madhum, kodi chwech aŋwen no, kodi jodongo no,
to jowero gi dwondi jo ma malo ni, “Nyathi rombo monek paka rachow ripere limo men madhum, ŋaŋo, ryeko kodi mwamba, Wor, dwoŋ, kodi pak!”

Aka awinjo chwech jye ma polo, ma piny, kodi ma pendi lowo, kodi chwech jye ma nam, gi chwech jye ma piny gipi munyo jowero ni, “Ri ŋata bedo wi kom madhum, kodi ri Nyathi rombo, pak kodi wor, kodi dwoŋ kodi men wobedi chil gi chil!”
Aka chwech aŋwen no jodwoko ni, “Ameno!” To jodongo no jogore piny munyo jolamo Were.
Gikenyo aneno Nyathi rombo munyo halo woko achiel kwoŋ gimwono papila abiryo t'awinjo achiel kwoŋ chwech aŋwen cha wacho i dwonde ma chalo lithkoth ma mwoch ni, “Biye!”
Aŋiyo aka ruwaŋan kenyo oido nitye kayina matar. Ŋata obedo wi kayina no otiŋo asere, aka omiy go sangarya. Go okadho paka jaloyi lweny woloyi lweny kichutho.
Gikenyo Nyathi rombo ohalo woko gimwono papila mararyo; aka awinjo chwech mararyo wacho ni, “Biye!”
Kayina man owok, mobokere; ŋatobedo wiye omiy men ma kwanyo woko syem i piny, nike ji jowonekere; ato omiy go abor mapando swa.
Gikenyo Nyathi rombo ohalo woko gimwono papila maradek; aka awinjo chwech maradek wacho ni, “Biye!” Aŋiyo, t'aneno kayina machol; ŋatobedo wiye otiŋo rapor i chinge ma kipima chiemo.

Awinjo gima ochale pa dwondi nyatoro mowok i dyeri chwech aŋwen no ka wacho ni, “Rapor ma romo kikopo mathin ma ŋano wotana welo ma siringi gana achiel, aka rapor ma romo kikopere adek ma bel wotana welo ma siringi gana achiel. Aka ikiri inyieki mo kodi vini!”
Gikenyo Nyathi rombo ohalo woko gimwono papila maraŋwen t'awinjo chwech maraŋwen wacho ni, “Biye!”

Aŋiyo, t'aneno kayina ma dibworo; ŋatobedo wiye nyinge ilwoŋo ni Tho, aka piny pa jomotho luwo go yu ŋeye dho tyende. Omiy jo men kwoŋ achiel wiy aŋwen ma piny, neko woko ji g'abor kodi kech, kodi two, kodi ogwange mager ma piny.
Gikenyo Nyathi rombo ohalo woko gimwono papila marabich; t'aneno i tyendi alitar, chuny ji monek rupiri jotito wach pa Were aka jobedo jogenirok i wodho kony i wach no.
Jokoko gi derino madwoŋ ni, “Ruoth Majameni Jye, maleŋ aka jaradyeri! Kir keraŋo aka inothumi banja ri ji ma piny t'imiyo jo girachula ru neko wan?”
Dhano jye omiy nanga matar: owachi ri jo ni jowoywomere mathin nyuka kama welo pa jotich jowoti jo kodi wutimin jo ma bende iripo nekojo paka onek jo worumi.
Aneno Nyathi rombo halo woko gimwono papila marauchiel. Yengirok pa piny obedo madwoŋ, to chieŋ lokere machol, paka bongi morwaki i chwodho, to dwe lokere mobokere tektek pa remo;
michalin jopodho piny wok i polo, paka nyandere manumu ma podho wok wiyadhe ka koyo madwoŋ oyengo.
Polo oleny woko pa papila mimino, aka gote jye kodi kigoda lowo jye mani i dyer nam okwany woko i kabedo pajo.
Gikenyo kerere ma piny, jodhum kodi jotel ma lweny, joŋaŋo kodi jomen, kodi ji man jye, ŋechin kodi joma ni syem, jopondo i ŋungin kodi i tyendi telin ma gote.
Jolwoŋo gote kodi telin ni, “Ryewere win kwoŋ wan wipan wan ri waŋ ŋatobedo wi kom madhum, kodi ri keme pa Nyathi rombo!
Kole ndelo ma keme pajo otundo, ŋata onyal chiro ŋa?”
Rumachien aneno jomalaika aŋwen jochungo i tum aŋwen ma piny, munyo jogeŋo koyo aŋwen ma piny, ŋey koyo moro wokiri wokudhi wi piny, kosa wi nam, kosa kwoŋ yath moro jye.
Aka aneno malaika man bino wok yu Wokchieŋ kodi gimwono ranyuth pa Were makwo. Go olwoŋo gi dwonde mamalo jomalaika aŋwen ma Were oido omiyo jo men ma nyieko piny kodi nam.
Malaika no owacho ni, “Wikiri winyieki piny, kosa nam, kosa yen, chuka wanokethi ranyuth kwoŋ jotich pa Were mawan ma wamwono i nyim jo.”
Aka awinjo welo pa joma okethi ranyuth kwoŋ jo, 144,000, wok i nonin jye mapa nyithindho pa Israel.
Nono pa Yuda, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Ruben, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Gadi,

gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Aser, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Naftal, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Manase gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo;
i nono pa Simeyo, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Levi, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Isakar,

gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Zebulun, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Yozefu, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo; i nono pa Benjamin, gana apar g'aryo moketh ranyuth kwoŋ jo.

Gikenyo aŋiyo, t'aneno lwak ji madwoŋ mongoye ŋata d'onyalo kwano jo! Jowok i piny jye, i nonin gi ji ma dhudhok jye, to jochungo ruwaŋ kom madhum mapa Nyathi rombo, kareno joruko nengin matar, aka jotiŋo thith i chingi jo.
Jokoko gi dwondi jo mamalo ni, “Both wok bongi Were ma bedo wi kom madhum kodi Nyathi rombo!”
Jomalaika jye oido jochungo jothoko kom madhum no kodi jodongo no kodi chwech aŋwen makwo no. Gikenyo jogore piny gi nyimi jo ruwaŋ kom madhum no to jolamo Were
ka jowacho ni, “Ameno! Pak kodi dwoŋ, kodi ryeko kodi fuoy, kodi wor, kodi men, kodi nyalo wobedi ri Were mawan chil gi chil! Ameno!”
Achiel kwoŋ jodongo no openjan ni, “Meno jokune ma jorukere i nengin matar no, kendo jowok kune?”
Adwoko ni, “Jadwoŋ, iŋat'iŋeyo.” Go owacho ran ni, “Me a ji ma jowok i chandirok madwoŋ. Jolwoko ruk pajo to joloko matar i remo pa Nyathi rombo.
Meno amomiyo jochungo ruwaŋ kom pa Were madhum aka onyo jotiyo ri go wor g'odyechieŋ i Ot pere. Ŋata bedo wi kom madhum bino kuro jo kareno bedo gi jo kenyo.
Jokowinji kech gi riyo kendo; kendo chieŋ kosa lyetho korewi jo;
ato Nyathi rombo ma nitye i dyeri kom madhum, bino bedo jakwath pajo; bino leko jo to tero jo yu waŋ pi makwo; aka Were bino yweyo woko pigi waŋ jo kichutho.”
Munyo Nyathi rombo ohalo woko gimwono papila marabiryo, liŋ obedo i polo chowo hongo ma romo adech sawa gipi.
Gikenyo aneno jomalaika abiryo ma jochungo ruwaŋ Were; omiy jo gwarin abiryo.

Malaika man monwaŋo nitye kodi giketho chukmach ma waŋo buban, motim gi zawabu, obino to chungo chiegin g'alitar. Omiy go buban madit ma womedi gi kwayo pa ji maleŋ pa Were aka wochwayi wi alitar ma zawabu ma dho kom madhum.
Yiro mowok i buban ma waŋ, kanyachiel gi kwayo pa ji maleŋ pa Were, oidho malo bongi Were wok i chingi malaika no.
Gikenyo malaika no okwanyo giketho chuk no, opoŋ'iye mach wok i alitar to wok to bolo i piny. Gino omwoch pa lithkoth gi derino, gi pilin pa koth, kodi yengirok pa piny.
Gikenyo jomalaika abiryo kodi gwarin pajo abiryo joyikere chako kudho.
Malaika marapena okudho gwara pere, to pe kodi mach moruwere gi remo wok to oy ri piny. Achiel kwoŋ adek ma piny owaŋ, to achiel kwoŋ adek ma yen waŋ woko, to lum monwaŋo nyabokependi jye waŋ woko.
Gikenyo malaika mararyo okudho gwara pere, to gimoro ma chalo got madwoŋ, ma lyel mach, bolere i nam.
Achiel kwoŋ adek ma nam olokere remo; achiel kwoŋ adek ma gikipiny makwo jye ma pi jotho woko, to achiel kwoŋ adek ma mel jye nyiekere woko.
Gikenyo malaika maradek okudho gwara pere, to michala mombo, malyel pa mach odingili gore piny wok i polo, aka opodho wi achiel kwoŋ adek ma wakawaka, kodi wi waŋ pi.
Nyingi michala no obedo Kecho. Achiel kwoŋ adek ma pi olokere ma kech, to ji mathoth jotho ru madho pi ma kech no.

Gikenyo malaika maraŋwen okudho gwara pere, to achiel kwoŋ adek ma waŋchieŋ mukere woko, kodi achiel kwoŋ adek ma dwe, kodi achiel kwoŋ adek ma michalin; ameno cholo obedo i achiel kwoŋ adek ma lyel pajo; lero oido ongoye i achiel kwoŋ adek marodyechieŋ kodi achiel kwoŋ adek ma wor bende.

Munyo fuodi aŋiyo, awinjo ango moido ringo malo swa i koyo munyo koko gi dwonde mamalo ni, “Awi kidamba! Kidamba! Kidamba kidho bedo ri ji ma piny ru derino ma gwarin ma jomalaika modoŋ adek jochiegin kudho!”
Gikenyo malaika marabich okudho gwara pere, to aneno michala moro opodho wi piny wok i polo malo; omiy michala no rayaw ma mwombe maluth ma bu gike.
Malaika no oyawo mwombe no, aka yiro owok iye, pa yiro mawok i kendo mombo. Yiro no oloko lero ma chieŋ kodi polo ma chol.
Aka bonyo oloro piny wok i yiro no, aka omiy jo men ma chale kodi apa thwolgwok ma piny.
Owachi ri jo ni jokiri jowonyieki lum, kosa yen, kosa gimotwi moro jye; to jowotimi racho kwoŋ ji ma jongoye kodi ranyuth pa Were i nyim jo kende.
Koyeyi jo neko ji me, to miyo jo achanda kende chowo hongo ma dwe abich. Litho ma ji jolimo ochale gi litho ma dhano winjo ka thwolgwok okayo go.
I hongo no ji jobino rango tho, to jokonwaŋ; jobino yenyo tho, to tho bino yombo jo.
Bonyo no oido jochalo kayina ma joyikere ri lweny; i wiy jo jobedo kodi gima ochalo sangarya ma zawabu, aka nyim jo ochale kodi nyim ji.
Yewiy jo ochale kodi yewiy mon, laki jo ochale gi laki simbwor.
Kor gin ochale pa oum kodi kwot ma nyweny, aka derino ma bwombi gin otimo ochale kodi derino pa chawula ma kayina mathoth joywayo ka joredo yu lweny.
Jobedo gi yiw gin mani gi lake ma wodho kwir, ma chale kodi apa thwolgwok, aka jobedo gi men ma kelo litho kwoŋ ji gi yiw gin chowo hongo ma dwe abich no.
Jobedo gi kere madhumo jo mobedo malaika ma kuro mwombe maluth ma bu gike. Nyinge i Dhoyudaya bedo Abadon; aka i Dhoyunani bedo Apolyon (Dwoŋ mere ni Janek).
Chandirok marapena orumo; odoŋ chandirok man aryo ma fuodi lebino.
Gikenyo Malaika marauchiel okudho gwara pere, to awinjo dwondi jo mowok i tungi alitar aŋwen ma zawabu mochungo rowaŋ Were.
Dwondi jo no owacho ri malaika marauchiel mani gi gwara no ni, “Gonyi jomalaika aŋwen motwey jo dho jwom madwoŋ milwoŋo ni Yufurate!”
Gikenyo ogony jomalaika aŋwen no, monwaŋo otyek yiko jo kichutho ri sawa, gi ndelo, gi dwe, gi oro mere, ma neko achiel kwoŋ adek ma thotho pa ji jye.
Owach ran welo pa lwak jolweny ma joŋwecho gi kayina; obedo kiti miya aryo (milyon miya aryo).

Aka i menyirok no aneno kayina kodi wegi mere ama: oido joruko kwot ma nyweny i kor gin, mobokere pa mach, molyewa kodi ma nyatongi gweno pa salufa. Wich kayina no jochalo wich simbwor, aka i dhok gin owok mach, yiro, kodi buru salufa ma moko mach i kibirit.
Thoyamo adek me: mach, yiro, kodi buru salufa ma moko mach i kibirit ma jowok i dhok kayina no oneko woko achiel kwoŋ adek ma thotho pa ji.
Ato men pa kayina no nitye i dhoki gin, kodi i yiwi gin bende. Yiwi gin ochalo thwol, mani gi wich, aka jooro gikipiny no ma kelo litho kwoŋ ji.
Ji modoŋ, ma gikipiny no koneko jo, jokoŋuto kwoŋ gikipiny ma jotimo. Jokoweyo lamo jwogi, kodi chal motim gi zawabu, feza, ywel, tele kodi yath apaya ma kinyal neno, kosa winjo, kosa woth.
Jono jokoŋuto kada kwoŋ nek, yido pajo, kidakana pajo, kosa kwalo gikipiny pa ji.
Gikenyo aneno malaika man ma jamwamba munyo loro piny wok i polo. Go oido otwodere gi pondeponde, aka lifudu othoko wiye; waŋe oido chalo waŋchieŋ aka tyende oido chalo kasikmach mokur.
Go oido nitye gi papila momin mathin moyawere i chinge. Go oketho tyende marachuch wi nam, to ketho maracham wi lowo,
aka okoko gi dwonde mamalo mowinjere paka kihola pa simbwor. Munyo go otyeko koko ameno, lithkoth abiryo jodwoko wach no gi mor.
Tekin joluwo, onwaŋo achiegin ndiko, to awinjo dwondi nyatoro moluwo i polo ni, “Liŋi kodi gima lithkoth abiryo jowacho; ikiri indiki!”
Gikenyo malaika m'aneno munyo ochungo wi nam kodi wi lowo otiŋo chinge marachuch malo,
to kwoŋere i nyingi Were, ma bedo chil gi chil, mochweyo polo kodi gikipiny jye mani iye, piny kodi gimoro jye man'iye, kodi nam gi kis gima ni iye. Malaika no owacho ni: “Galo odoko ongoye,
to i hongo ma malaika marabiryo lekudh'iye gwara pere, gikenyo Were bino chowo chan pere ma nyaliŋliŋ, paka chango onyutho jotich pere, jotuchi wach.”
Gikenyo dwondi ŋata nende awinjo ka luwo i polo oluwo kodan kendo munyo wacho ni, “Kidhi ikwanyi papila momin moyaw ma nitye i chingi malaika mochungo wi nam kodi wi lowo no.”
Gikenyo akidho bongi malaika no t'akwayo go ni womiyan papila momin mathin no. Go owacho ran ni, “Kwanyi ichami, bino daŋo iyin, to i dhokin bino bedo mamit pa mo kich.”
Akwanyo papila no t'achamo to bedo mamit i dhokan pa mo kich, to munyo achowo mwonyo, odaŋo iyan.
Gikenyo owacho ran ni, “Iripo tucho mikwenda pa Were kendo ri ji mathoth kodi nonin, ri dhudhok kodi ri kerere jye.”
Gikenyo omiyan midole ma kipima, machalo bol toŋ, to iwacho ran ni, “Ayi malo ipima Ot pa Were kodi alitar, t'ikwano joma lamo Were iye.
To weyi woko dyedipo ma Ot pa Were. Ikiri ipima rupiri meno otyek miyo Jopath, ma jobino nyono Tindi Maleŋ tyeko dwe pyero aŋwen g'aryo.
Aka abino miyo jomikwenda paran aryo, men ma tucho mikwenda paran i hongo ma ndelo gana achiel miya aryo gi pyero auchiel, kareno joruko kutyin.”
Jomikwenda aryo me, a yen vini aryo kodi talin aryo ma chungo ruwaŋ Ruoth ma piny.
Ka nyatoro otemi kwinyo jo, mach bino wok i dhoki jo to reyo woko jokwor pajo; me apaka nyatoro jye motemi kwinyo jo ibino neko.
Jonitye gi men ma chiego pondeponde to koth ngoye i hongo ma jotuch'iye mikwenda pa Were. Jonitye bende gi men kwoŋ waŋ pi, ma loko jo remo; odoko jonitye gi men ma kelo two ndir momore paka jomiti.
Ka jotyeko tucho mikwenda pajo, ogwaŋ ma lewok i mwombe bino lwenyo gi jo, to loyo jo gi men to neko jo.
Aka delkwoŋ jo bino moyere i royo ma tindi madwoŋ, kama Ruoth pajo ogur'iye kwoŋ musalaba, ma nyinge iya agecha ilwoŋo ni Sodom kosa Misir.
Ji ma nonin jye, gi dhudhok jye jobino neno delkwoŋ jono tyeko ndelo adek g'adech, aka jokoyeyi woyiki jo.
Ji ma piny jobino kisangala gi tho pa jaryo me. Jobino rweyere to jomiyere mich, rupiri jotuchi wach Were aryo no onwaŋo jokelo litho madit ri ji ma piny.
Rumachien munyo ndelo adek kodi adech no orumo, luya ma kelo kwo owok i dhoki Were to donjo kwoŋ jo, to joay malo; lworo madwoŋ omako ji jye ma chieŋino joneko jono.
Gikenyo jotuchi wach aryo no jowinjo dwondi nyatoro moluwo malo i polo ka wacho ri jo ni, “Biye win ka!” Jono joidho polo gi pondeponde ruwaŋ jokwor pajo.
