I hongo no won, yengirok madwoŋ ma piny otimere; achiel kwoŋ apar ma tindi oŋinyere woko, aka ji ma romo gana abiryo jotho i yengirok ma piny no. Ji modoŋ jobwok to jopako dwoŋ pa Were ma polo.
Chandirok mararyo orumo; to neni, chandirok maradek chiegin tundo!
Gikenyo malaika marabiryo okudho gwara pere, to dwondi nyatoro ma koko malo wok i polo, ka wacho ni, “Men Madhumo piny pama obedo apa Ruoth kodi Kristo pere, aka go bino dhumo chil gi chil!”
Gikenyo jodongo pyero aryo g'aŋwen moido jobedo wi kombere pajo ruwaŋ Were no jokulo wiy jo piny to jolamo Were
munyo jowacho ni, “Ruoth Were Majameni jye, ma kwo pama aka wok chon go nitye! Wafuoyin ni ioro men perin moasere t'ichako dhum!

Keme opoŋ i chuny nonin; kole onyo ndir otundo ma nyutho keme perin, gi thumo banja ri jomotho: ndir ma miyo jotich perin, ma jotuchi wach, kemba pajo, kodi ji perin maleŋ jye, jomadongo kodi jomathindho jye ma jolworin. Ndir otundo ma reyo woko joma nyieko piny!”
Ot pa Were ma polo oido oyaw to sanduku ma chikirok nenere iye. Gikenyo pilin pa lithkoth, derino, mwoch pa koth, yengirok pa piny, kodi pe moasere otimere.
Gikenyo ranyuth madwoŋ onenere i polo: obedo dhako moro moruko waŋchieŋ, aka dwe onwaŋo nitye i tyende piny, kodi sangarya ma michalin apar garyo i wiye.
Go oido chiegin nywol, to litho kodi chandirok miyo go ywak.
Ranyuth man onenere i polo: obedo bulir mombo mobokere gi wich abiryo kodi tunge apar, kodi sangarya i wiye abiryo jye.
Go owaro woko gi yiwe achiel kwoŋ adek ma michalin ma i hongo to rwadho jo piny i lowo. Go ochungo ruwaŋ dhako moido chiegin nywol no, ni womwonyi nyathi pere tekin podho.
Gikenyo dhako no onywolo wuode, ma bino dhumo nonin jye gi luth manyweny. To, oyudhi nyathi no titero bongi Were kama di kom pere madhum.
Gikenyo dhako no oringo i thim; Were oido oyiko ri go kabedo kenyo, kama ibino kur'iye go chowo hongo ma ndelo gana achiel miya aryo gi pyero auchiel.
Gikenyo lweny oere i polo! Mikaeli kodi jomalaika pere jolwenyo gi bulir, ma bende olwenyo kodi jomalaika pere:
to oloy bulir, tiryemo go woko kodi jomalaika pere i polo.
Bulir mombo no owit woko! Go a thwol machon cha, milwoŋo ni Jwogi, kosa Sitan, mowondo piny gipi. Owit go piny wi lowo gi jomalaika pere jye.

Gikenyo awinjo dwondi nyatoro mokoko malo ipolo ka wacho ni, “Pama both gi men madhum kodi Ker pa Were mawan kodi adhum pa Kristo jye otyeko tundo! Kole jamisegey ma osa wutimin wan bongi Were, wor godyechieŋ, otyek wito piny.
To, jokengila go kodi remo pa Nyathi rombo, kodi wach ma joridho gine adyeri; aka oido joyikere kijala kwo pajo tundo tho.
Amomiyo, polo sangala win, kodi wijojye ma wini iye! To chandirok kidho bedo ri piny kodi nam! Kole Jwogi oloro ri win, aka opoŋ gi keme, rupiri go oŋeyo nike odoŋ gi nyaka hongo machiek.”
Munyo bulir oŋeyo nike otyek wito go piny wi lowo, ochako ryemo dhako monywolo nyathi ma nyichwo cha.
Dhako no omiy bwombe aryo mapa ango madongo ŋey woayi wokidhi i kabedo moyik ri go i thim kama ibino kur'iye go chowo oro adek gadech, ma thwol no kinyali mwonj'iye go.
Gikenyo thwol no oŋulo pi gi dhoke pa jwom yu ŋey dhako no, nike wonyali mol gi dhako no.
To, lowo okonyo dheno: oŋamo dhoke to mwonyo woko mikula ma jwom mowok i dhoki bulir no.
Gikenyo bulir nge omako gi dheno, to kidho chako lweny gi nyikwaye modoŋ, ji jye ma jowinjo or pa Were aka jo ni gi genirok i adyeri pa Yesu.
Aka bulir ochungo dho thengi nam.
Gikenyo aneno ogwaŋ moro munyo wok i nam. Go onwaŋo nitye gi tunge apar kodi wich abiryo, gi sangarya wi tunge apar no jye, gi nyinge ma luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were mondik i kis wich mere.
Ogwaŋ m'aneno no ochalo kwach; tyende ochalo tyendi arara, aka dhoke ochalo dhok simbwor. Bulir omiyo ogwaŋ no men pere won, gi kom pere madhum, kodi men moasere madhum.
Achiel kwoŋ wich ogwaŋ no ochale pa ni gi adhola ma d'oneko go, to adhola no ochango. Piny gipi obedo gi dhyer to luwo ŋey ogwaŋ no.
Ji jye jolamo bulir kwoŋbedo go oido omiyo ogwaŋ no men madhum. Jolamo ogwaŋ no bende ka jowacho ni, “Ŋa ma rom g'ogwaŋ me? Ŋa ma nyalo lwenyo gine?”
Omiy ogwaŋ no dhoke ma wacho gikipiny ma kwoto gi luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were; odoko omiy go men madhum chowo hongo ma dwe pyero aŋwen g'aryo.
Gino oŋamo dhoke to chako kwoŋo Were, gi luwo gimakotire kwoŋ Were kodi kama go bed'iye, riwo kir gi jomabedo i polo jye.
Omiy gino men ma lweny gi ji maleŋ pa Were gi nyalo jo, aka omiy go men kwoŋ nonin jye kodi ji, dhudhok jye kodi piny jye.
Ji jye majobedo i piny jobino lamo ogwaŋ no: dwoŋ mere nike dhano jye ma nyinge kondik i kitawo pa jomakwo mobedo apa Nyathi rombo monek wok i chwech pa piny.
Amomiyo ŋata ni gi ithe wowinji!
Ka nyatoro yenyere womak, ibino mako go titweyo; ka nyatoro yenyere wonek ji kodi abor, iripo neko go kodi abor. Me nyutho ni ji maleŋ pa Were joripo chiro teko kodi genirok.
Gikenyo aneno ogwaŋ man munyo wok i lowo; go oido ni gi tunge aryo paka tungi Nyathi rombo, to oluwo paka bulir.
Gino ooro men p'ogwaŋ marapena ma dhumo kawaŋe. Go oromo piny kodi joma bed'iye jowolami ogwaŋ marapena, ma adhola ma d'oneko go oido ochango cha.
Ogwaŋ mararyo me, otimo ranyuth gi giraura madongo; omiyo mach owok i polo to loro piny i waŋ ji jye.
Aka gino omiyo go owondo ji jye ma piny munyo timo giraura moyey go timo kawaŋ ogwaŋ marapena. Ogwaŋ no ooro ji jye ma piny chweyo chal ma kelo dwoŋ ri ogwaŋ moido ochwow g'abor, to odoko kwo.
Ogwaŋ mararyo me, omiy go men ma kudho kwo i chal p'ogwaŋ marapena, ŋey chal no wonyali luwo aka womiyi woneki woko ji jye ma jokwero lamo chal m'ochwey no.
Ogwaŋ no bende oromo ji jye, jomathindho kodi madongo, joŋaŋo kodi jochandi, ŋechin kodi joma ni syem, ni woketh ranyuth i chingi jo marachuch kodi i nyim jo.
Ongoye ŋata d'onyiewere kosa otana kwanyo woko ka go nitye gi ranyuth me, mobedo nyingi ogwaŋ no, kosa kwan ma nyutho nyinge.
Gime yenyo ryeko: Nyatoro jye maniaŋ nyalo menyo dwoŋ kwan p'ogwaŋ no, kwoŋbedo kwan no nyutho nyingi dhano. Kwan mere obedo: miya auchiel pyero auchiel g'auchiel (666).
Gikenyo aŋiyo, t'aneno Nyathi rombo ruwaŋan, munyo ochungo wi got Zayun. Bonge, oido nitye ji gana miya achiel pyero aŋwen g'aŋwen (144,000) ma nyinge kodi nyingi Bamere ondik i nyim jo.
Aka awinjo derino ma chalo pi ma mol piyo piyo, kendo pa lithkoth ma mor. Derino no ochalo pa wer ma jotongol jogoyo i tongol pajo.

Oido jowero wer manyien, yuwaŋ kom pa Were madhum no kodi chwech aŋwen no kodi jodongo no, aka jowero wer manyien ma ŋat man jye konyalo fuonjirok kwanyo woko ji gana miya achiel pyero aŋwen g'aŋwen (144,000) monyiew jo gi remo pa Yesu wok i piny.
Meno ji ma jokure maber ma jokotimo chot gi mon. Joluwo Nyathi rombo kama go kidh'iye jye; ogony jo wok kwoŋ ji jye modoŋ aka jobedo pa kodhi monyak marapena momiy Were kodi Nyathi rombo.
Twodo konwaŋere i dhoki jo; jongoye gi recho ma di kwan ri jo.
Gikenyo aneno malaika man munyo ringo i koyo, gi mikwenda ma chil gi chil ma Wach Maber ma wotiti ri ji ma jonitye i piny: ri piny jye, nonin, dhudhok kodi ji jye!
Go owacho gi dwonde mamalo ni, “Lwori win Were, aka paki win dwoŋ pere! Kole ndir otundo ri go ma thumo banja ri ji. Amomiyo, lami win Were mochweyo polo, piny, nam, kodi waŋ pi!”
Malaika mararyo bende oluwo marapena, ka wacho ni, “Go otyeko podho, Babilon madwoŋ otyeko podho! Go otyeko miyo nonin jye madho vini ma keme ma kidakana pere!”
Malaika maradek oluwo jaryo no ka wacho gi dwonde mamalo ni, “Nyatoro jye molami ogwaŋ no kodi chal pere, to limo ranyuth i nyime kosa i chinge,

won bende bino madho vini ma keme pa Were, ma go okonjo gi men pere motyek konjo gi men i agwata ma keme pere! Ji jye ma jotimi gime ibino chando jo gi mach ma buru salufa mobedo kidhur tongi kibirit, ruwaŋ jomalaika maleŋ kodi Nyathi rombo.
Aka yiro ma mach ma bino chando jo duny malo chil gi chil. Ongoye ywomirok, wor g'odyechieŋ, ri jomalamo ogwaŋ no kodi chal pere, kodi ri nyatoro jye molimi ranyuth ma nyinge.”
Meno amomiyo ji pa Were joripo bedo gi chiro, paka joma winjo or pa Were aka jonitye gi genirok bongi Yesu.

Gikenyo awinjo dwondi nyatoro mowok i polo munyo wacho ni, “Ndiki gime: Josilwany a joma wok pama kadho yu malo joletho i tich pa Ruoth.” “Ey,” Chuny wacho, “Jobino ywomirok kwoŋ tich pajo matek; rupiri tim pajo luwo jo.”
Gikenyo taneno ruwaŋan oido nitye pondeponde matar, aka wi pondeponde no onwaŋo nitye nyatoro mobedo piny mochale gi Wuodi Dhano, gi sangarya ma zawabu i wiye kodi pala nyangoda mabith i chinge.
Gikenyo malaika man owok i Ot pa Were to koko gi dwonde ma malo ri ŋata oido obedo wi pondeponde ni, “Ori nyangoda perin ikechi, kwoŋbedo ndir mere otyeko tundo; piny ochiek akecha!”
Gikenyo ŋatobedo wi pondeponde no owito nyangoda pere wi piny to kecho gima ni piny.
Gikenyo aneno malaika man munyo wok i Ot pa Were i polo, go bende oido ni gi nyangoda mabith.

Gikenyo malaika man ma kuro mach, owok kwoŋ alitar. Okoko gi dwonde mamalo ri malaika moido nitye gi nyangoda mabith ni, “Ori nyangoda perin ifuoni gine gimanyak i ndelo vini ma piny, rupiri vini monyak otyeko chiek!”
Gikenyo malaika no owito nyangoda pere wi piny, otoŋo vini monyak, to bolo i bur madwoŋ ma biyo vini ma keme pa Were.
Obiy vini monyak no i bur ma biyo vini ma tindi, aka remo omol wok i kabiyo vini pa mikula ma boro mere oromo mairo miya aryo, aka thutho mere obedo ma chiegin tundo i chongi kayina (futi abich).
Gikenyo aneno ranyuth man madwoŋ ma kelo dhyer i polo: jomalaika abiryo kodi thoyamo abiryo. Me ama obedo thoyamo machowe, rupiri jobedo gikipiny ma nyutho keme pa Were machowe.

Gikenyo aneno gima ochale pa nam mandewiro, moruwere gi mach: aneno bende joma joloyo ogwaŋ kodi chal pere, kodi nyinge moketh i kwan. Jono onwaŋo jochungo dho nam mandewiro munyo jotiŋo tongol ma Were omiyo jo.
Onwaŋo jowero wer pa Musa, jatich pa Were kendo apa Nyathi rombo ni, “Tich perin dongo aka obedo giraura, Ruoth Were Majameni jye! Royo perin otire aka obedo maradyeri, Kere pa nonin jye!
Ruoth, ŋata kilelworin, kosa kilemiyo nyingin dwoŋ? Kole in kendin am'ileŋ. Nonin jye jolebino ruwaŋin to jolamin. Kole tim perin motire otyeko nenere.”
Rumachien aneno munyo Ot wema ma Were bed'iye oyaw i polo.
Jomalaika abiryo ma jo ni gi thoyamo abiryo machowe jowok i Ot pa Were no; jorukere i nengin matar ma pilin, kodi del ma zawabu motwey i kor gin.
Gikenyo achiel kwoŋ chwech makwo aŋwen cha omiyo jomalaika abiryo no atewe ma zawabu abiryo mopoŋ gi keme pa Were ma kwo chil gi chil.
Ot pa Were oido opoŋ yiro mowok i dwoŋ kodi i men pere, aka moro ongoye moido nyalo donjo i Ot pa Were chuka i giki thoyamo abiryo ma jomalaika abiryo no di jokelo.
Gikenyo awinjo dwondi jo ma luwo malo munyo wacho i Ot pa Were ri jomalaika abiryo ni, “Kidhi wioli atewe abiryo ma keme pa Were piny wi lowo!”
Malaika marapena okidho to olo atawo pere wi lowo, to adholin marecho kendo malith tula kwoŋ joma oido jonitye gi ranyuth p'ogwaŋ cha, ma jolamo chal pere.
Gikenyo malaika mararyo oolo atawo pere i nam, to pi lokere mobokere pa remo dhano motho, to gimakwo i nam jye jotho.
Gikenyo malaika maradek oolo atawo pere i jwombe kodi i waŋ pi, to jolokere remo.
Awinjo malaika ma kuro pi wacho ni, “Banja me ithumo motire, a Maleŋ, ma nitye pama kendo motyeko bedo wok chon.
Rupiri jooyo remo pa ji maleŋ kodi apa jotuchi wach Were, imiyo jo madho remo; meno ripo gi jo!”
Gikenyo awinjo dwondi moro wok kwoŋ alitar munyo wacho ni, “Ruoth, Were Majameni jye! Thumo banja perin otire odoko obedo maradyeri!”
Gikenyo malaika maraŋwen oolo atawo pere kwoŋ waŋchieŋ, tiyeyo waŋchieŋ rewo piny gi lyetho mere pa mach.
Ji jowaŋ gi lyetho mager no, to jokwoŋo nyingi Were ma nitye gi men kwoŋ two ma sika ji, to jokwero ŋuto kwoŋ gimarecho pajo kosa miyo Were dwoŋ.
Gikenyo malaika marabich oolo atawo pere wi kom p'ogwaŋ madhum, to mudho umo ker pere; ji jokayo lew jo ru litho,
to jokwoŋo Were ma polo ru litho kodi adholin pajo, to jokoŋuto tim pajo marecho.
Gikenyo malaika marauchiel oolo atawo pere i jwom madwoŋ milwoŋo ni Yufurate, to jwom no dwono ma yawo royo ri kerere ma jowok yu Wokchieŋ.
Gikenyo aneno chuny mochido jadek ma jochale g'ogwal munyo jowok i dhoki bulir, i dhoki ogwaŋ, kodi i dhoki jatuchi wach matwodo cha.
Jobedo chuny ma nyajwogi ma jotimo giraura. Chuny adek me jowok kareno jokidho pa kerin i piny gipi, choko jo kanyachiel ma lweny i ndelo madwoŋ mapa Were Majameni jye.
“Neni, Alebino nyaliŋliŋ pa jakwo! Jasilwany a ŋata bedo waŋe to gwoko ruk pere, ŋey wokiri wowothi kinyoro to kelo ri go wichkwot!”
Gikenyo chuny no jokelo kerin kanyachiel kama ilwoŋo i Dhoyudaya ni Amagedon.
Gikenyo malaika marabiryo oolo atawo pere i hongo, to dwondi nyatoro maluwo malo wok i kom madhum i Ot pa Were munyo wacho ni, “Otyeko timere!”
Aka pilin, derino, mwoch pa lithkoth, kodi yengirok pa piny moasere otimere ma fuodi yado onwaŋo kotimere ye ameno wok chuka chwey dhano; me obedo yengirok pa piny marach moasere!
Tindi mombo cha okedhere didek, aka tindin ma piny jye oŋinyere woko. Were opoyo Babilon madwoŋ no, to miyo go medho i agwata mopoŋ gi vini ma keme pere jye.
Kigodin ma nam jye jokedhere woko, aka kir gote jye jokonwaŋere kendo.
Pe madongo pa telin, ma kis achiel ywayo chiegin latir miya achiel, jopodho kwoŋ ji wok malo. Ji jokwoŋo Were ru thoyamo ma pe, rupiri obedo marach tektek.
Gikenyo achiel kwoŋ jomalaika abiryo ma jo ni g'atewe abiryo obino bongan to wacho ni, “Biye, alenyuthin girachula ma jatimi gi wichkwot madwoŋ moger dho thengi jwombe madit no kidho limo.
Kerere madongo ma piny jotimo chot gi jatimi gi wichkwot madwoŋ no, aka ji ma piny jomer gi vini ma kidakana pere.”
Gikenyo to malaika no tiŋan i Chuny Maleŋ to teran yu thim, t'aneno dhako mobedo wi ogwaŋ mobokere. Kwoŋ ogwaŋ no gipi oido ondik nyinge ma luwo gima kotire kwoŋ Were.

Dheno oido oruko nengin ma rangi ariŋo kodi mobokere, aka kwoŋe oido pilin gi zawabu, gee kodi telin mawelo. I chinge, go oido otiŋo agwata ma zawabu mopoŋ gi gikipiny ma timo chot kodi makoch, gima wok i kidakana pere.
I nyime ondik nyinge ma dwoŋ mere omuŋere ni: “Babilon madwoŋ, min mon ma jotana delkwoŋ jo i timo gi wichkwot jye kodi joma duwo piny.”
Aka aneno ni dhako no oido omer gi remo pa ji maleŋ pa Were, kodi remo pa jomonek rupiri jochwire kwoŋ Yesu. Munyo aneno go, adhyer swa.
Gikenyo malaika no openjan ni, “Idhyer raŋo?” Abino tucho rin dwoŋ nyaliŋliŋ ma mako kwoŋ dhako no kodi ogwaŋ motiŋo go, ma nyawich abiryo gi tunge apar no.

Ogwaŋ m'ineno no oido chon kwo, to pama kikwo; go chiegin wok i bur mwombe ma bu gike aka bino tundo kama ilerey'iye go woko. Ji ma piny ma nyingi jo fuodi kondik i kitawo ma kwo wok i chakirok pa piny jobino dhyer ka joneno ogwaŋ no, rupiri chon oido kwo, to onyo pama kikwo, aka bino nenirok kendo.
“Gime yenyo ryeko kodi niaŋ. Wich abiryo no obedo tendere abiryo ma dheno bedo wiye, kendo jobedo kerere abiryo bende.
Kwoŋ jo, kerere abich jotyeko podho, achiel fuodi dhumo, aka man fuodi kobino; ka go obino go ripo chowo nyaka hongo machiek.
Aka ogwaŋ ma chon oido kwo, to onyo pama kikwo no, meno obedo kere maraboro ma nitye i kweth pa jabiryo marapena aka bino tundo kama ilerey'iye go woko.
“Tunge apar m'ineno no, meno kerin apar ma fuodi jokochako dhumo, to ibino miyo jo men madhum paka kerere chowo hongo ma sawa achiel, kanyachiel kodi ogwaŋ.
Japar me jye jonitye g'atoŋa marom, aka jobino miyo ogwaŋ men pajo gi nyalo madhum.
Jobino lwenyo gi Nyathi rombo, to Nyathi rombo bino loyo jo, rupiri go obedo Ruoth kodi Kere pa kerere, aka joma ni bonge jobedo jomolwoŋ kendo moyer aka jogenere.”
Malaika no bende owacho ran kendo ni, “Pi m'ineno, ma jatimi gi wichkwot obed'iye no, meno ji, kodi lwak ji, gi nonin gi dhudhok.
Ogwaŋ kodi tunge apar m'ineno no, jobino dak jatimi gi wichkwot no; jobino timo go kichar to joweyo go kinyoro; jobino chamo delkwoŋe to joreyo woko go gi mach.
Ato Were oketho i chuny jono awanya ma tiyo g'atoŋa pere, munyo jotiyo gi paro achiel to jomiyo ogwaŋ men pajo madhum, chuka wach pa Were wotimere.
“Dhako m'ineno no meno tindi mombo madhumo kerin ma piny.”
Rumachien aneno malaika man munyo loro piny wok i polo. Go oido nitye gi men madhum madwoŋ swa, aka lero pere omenyo piny gipi.

Go okoko gi dwonde mamalo ni, “Go otyeko podho. Babilon madwoŋ otyeko podho! Go onyo otyeko lokirok kabedo pa jwogi, kodi gunda ma chuny mochido joywomir'iye; winyin makoch ma nger jye ma kicham jobed'iye.
Kole go opoko ji jye vini pere ma kidakana to jomadho. Kerin ma piny jotimo gine chot, aka jomiten ma piny joŋaŋ kwoŋ kwo pere ma mito gikipiny mawelo.”
Gikenyo awinjo dwondi ŋat man i polo, mowacho ni, “Woki win kwoŋ dheno ji paran! Ŋey wikiri widonji i gimarecho pere. Ŋey wibende wikiri wilimi adech i girachula mikidho miyo go!
Ato gimarecho pere odhure pa kidho geyo polo. Aka Were opoyo recho pere.
Dwoki ri go gima rom kodi ma bende otyeko poko; chuli go diryo gima go otyeko timo jye. Poŋi agwata pere no won gi medho mager ka diryo.
Miyi go chandirok kodi rem ma rom gi dwoŋ kodi yodirok ma go oido omiyere. Ato go kwot ka wacho gi i chunye ni, ‘An abedo paka kere ma dhako; akibedo chi tho, odoko akowinji rem moro jye!’
Amomiyo thoyamo jye ma letundo ri go, jobino umo go kiromo i ndelo achiel: two, rem, kodi kech; aka ibino waŋo go gi mach, rupiri Ruoth Were ma thumo ri go banja jameni swa.”
Kerere ma piny moido joŋiyo timo gine kidakana, kodi yodirok i kwo pere mawelo, jobino winjo gi rem to joywako go kareno joneno yiro ma wok i waŋ pere.
Jobino chungo gi bor swa, kareno jolworo chandirok pere, to jowacho ni: “Awi chandi, awi chandi otundo rin, tindi madwoŋ ma Babilon ma di men! Reyirok perin obino nyaka i hongo ma sawa achiel won!”
Jomiten ma piny bende jobino rem to joywako go, rupiri ongoye ŋata onyo nyiewo gikipiny pajo kenyo kendo.

Ongoye ŋata nyiewo zawabu, feza, telin kodi gee mawelo, nengin mafuoth, kodi ma rangi ariŋo, kodi maraliri kodi mobokere; kiti mbawin mawelo maŋwe kuur, kodi gikipiny mopokere opokere motim gi laki lyech, mbawin mawelo, nyweny bangir, nyweny matheth kodi tele mafuoth ma minyin;
yath mamit, yen moregi mamoko ma ŋwe kuur i chiemo, buban, mo maŋwe kur, nger buban man; vini kodi mo, moko monuŋere kodi ŋano, dhoki kodi rombo, kayina kodi chawula, ŋechin gi jegin.
Jomiten jowacho ri go ni, “Gikipiny jye ma chunyin owanya bedo gine jotyeko leny woko; aka ŋaŋo perin jye gi noro perin joware woko kwoŋin, aka idoko ikibino nwaŋo jo kendo!”
Jomiten ma jolimo ŋaŋo wok kwoŋ go, jobino chungo gi bor rupiri jolworo chandirok pere. Jobino ywak gi rem
to jowacho ni, “Awi chandi, chandirok obedo ri tindi madwoŋ me! Go yado ruko nengin mafuoth kodi ma rangi ariŋo kodi mobokere, to jaŋ gi gikipiny ma zawabu, telin mawelo, kodi gee mawelo!
To i hongo ma sawa achiel won go onyo otyeko rwenyo woko ŋaŋo no jye!” Jotel jye ma mel kodi joma ni mel, jochiewi mel kodi joman jye ma jolimo gima kuro kwo pajo i nam, jobino chungo gi bor,
to joywak kareno joneno yiro ma wok i waŋ pere ka jowacho ni, “Tindi mene man monwaŋo nyalo rom gi tindi madwoŋ me?”

Jobino ywoyo fukefuke i wiy gin, ka joywak gi rem ni, “Awi chandi, chandirok madwoŋ otundo ri tindi mombo me! Go onwaŋo a tindi ma ji jye ma jo ni gi mel i nam jolim'iye ŋaŋo wok kwoŋ ŋaŋo pere! Aka i hongo ma sawa achiel won go onyo otyeko kir reyere woko!”
Sangala ru podho pere, a polo! Sangala win, ji maleŋ pa Were kodi jomoor kodi jotuchi wach pere! Kole Were otyeko thumo banja ri go ru gima go oido timo ri win!
Gikenyo malaika ma jameni okwanyo tele marom kodi kidi ma irego gine, to bolo i nam munyo wacho ni, “Me apaka tindi madwoŋ ma Babilon ibino rwadho piny gi derino, aka kibino nenere kendo.

Wer pa jotongol kodi jower, jokudhi madundo kodi gwarin, kowinji perin kendo! Ongoye jatich kosa jandijo moro jye modoko bino nwaŋere perin kendo. Ongoye kidi kada achiel mibino winjo ka rego moko yu perin kendo.

Aka lero ma tala k'odoko olyel perin kendo. Odoko dwondi jamweha gi mweha pere k'odoko owinjere perin kendo. Jomiten perin oido jobedo jomadongo loyo i piny gipi, aka thyeth perin ama oido iwondo gine ji jye ma piny!”
Ato kwoŋ go ama remo pa jotuchi wach Were kodi apa ji maleŋ kodi apa ji jye monek i piny onwaŋer'iye.
Rumachien awinjo gima owinjere malo pa dwondi muma ji madwoŋ ma polo munyo wacho ni, “Aleluya! Both, dwoŋ kodi men jye apa Were mawan!
Thumo banja pere otire kendo obedo maradyeri! Kole go otyeko thumo banja ri jatimi gi wichkwot madwoŋ monwaŋo topo piny gi kidakana pere. Were omiyo go girachula rupiri go oneko jotich pere”
To odoko okoko ni, “Aleluya! Yiro mawok i waŋ pere kidho malo chil gi chil.”
Gikenyo, jodongo pyero aryo g'aŋwen no kodi chwech aŋwen no, jye jogore piny to jolamo Were monwaŋo obedo wi kom pere madhum no, ka jowacho ni, “Ameno! Aleluya!”
Gikenyo dwondi nyatoro owok i kom madhum ma wacho ni, “Paki win Were mawan, win jotich pere jye, gi ji jye, jomadongo gi mathindho ma jolworo go!”
Gikenyo awinjo gima ochalo dwondi lwak madwoŋ, ma derino mere omor pa pi ma mol gi men, kendo pa mwoch pa lithkoth madwoŋ. Awinjo ka jowacho ni, “Aleluya! Kole Ruoth Were mawan Majameni jye dhumo!
Weyi wayodere wasangala; weyi wapaki dwoŋ pere moasere! Kole ndir otundo ma nywomirok maleŋ mapa Nyathi rombo, aka mweha pere otyeko yikirok.
Omiy go ruko nanga mayom matar maminyin.” (Nanga matar no meno tim motire mapa ji pa Were.)
Gikenyo malaika owacho ran ni, “Ndiki gime: Josilwany a jomolwoŋ i kalima ma nywomirok pa Nyathi rombo.” Malaika no omedo wacho ni, “Me obedo wach maradyeri mapa Were.”

Gikenyo agore piny dho tyende ni alam go, to go owacho ran ni, “Ikiri itimi ameno! A jatich nyawotin, achiel kwoŋ wutimerin ma joridho adyeri pa Yesu. Lami Were ayino! Kole adyeri pa Yesu ama gudo chuny jatuchi wach Were.”
Gikenyo aneno polo munyo yawere, to kayina matar nenere ruwaŋan. Ŋata ryemo kayina no ilwoŋo ni Mogenere kendo Jaradyeri; go thumo banja aka lwenyo i tiro.
Waŋe oido chalo mach malyel, aka oruko sangarya kweth i wiye. Go ni gi nyinge mondik kwoŋe, mongoye moro moŋeyo kwanyo woko go won kende.
Nanga ma go oruko oido orwaki i remo. Nyinge milwoŋo gine obedo, “Wach pa Were.”
Lwak jolweny ma polo oido joluwo go, munyo jonitye wi kayina matar aka joruko nengin mayom, matar, molony kichutho.
Abor mabith owok i dhoke, ma go bino toŋo woko gine nonin. Go bino dhumo jo kodi luth manyweny, aka go bino biyo vini i gibiyo vini ma keme mager mapa Were Majameni jye.
I nanga pere kodi i bat mere ondik nyinge me: “Kere pa kerere, Ruoth pa ruodhe jye.”
Gikenyo aneno malaika moro ochungo wi waŋchieŋ. Okoko i dwonde mamalo ri winyin jye monwaŋo jolekaleka wi hongo ni, “Biye win, aka chokere win kanyachiel ri kalima pa Were madwoŋ!
Biye win wichami delkwoŋ kerere, jotel ma lweny, kodi jomen, riŋo kayina kodi joryemi mere, delkwoŋ ji jye, jegin kodi joma ni syem, jomadongo kodi jomathindho!”
Gikenyo aneno ogwaŋ cha kodi kerin ma piny kodi lwak jolweny pajo munyo jochokere ni jowolwenyi kodi ŋata wotho wi kayina matar kodi lwak jolweny pere.

To imako ogwaŋ no, kanyachiel kodi jatuchi wach matwodo moido jotimo giraura ri go. (Giraura no ama go owondo gine ji monwaŋo jonitye gi ranyuth p'ogwaŋ no to jolamo chal p'ogwaŋ no.) Ogwaŋ no kodi jotuchi wach matwodo jye obol jo makwo i wakawaka ma mach kodi telin ma gamo mach mayot pa kibirit.
Onek lwak jolweny pajo modoŋ g'abor ma wok i dhoki ŋat moido ringo wi kayina cha; aka winyin jye jochamo delkwoŋ jo paka jonyalo.
Gikenyo aneno malaika moro munyo loro piny wok i polo kareno otiŋo rayaw ma bur mwombe ma bu gike kodi lijegere mombo i chinge.
Go omako bulir, thwol machon ma nyinge ilwoŋo ni jwogi kosa Sitan, to tweyo go oro gana achiel,
aka obolo go i mwombe, to chiego to mwono dhoke matek, ŋey wobedi kenyo modoko kinyali wok wondo ji ma piny chuka oro gana achiel orum. To rumachien ibino gonyo go kendo ma hongo machiek.

Rumachien aneno kombere madhum, aka jomobedo kwoŋ jo obedo joma omiy jo thumo banjin. Aka aneno bende joma ndir cha oŋadi woko ŋut jo ru ridho yeyo pajo kwoŋ Yesu kodi wach pa Were, ma jokoyeyo lamo ogwaŋ kosa chal pere, aka jokoyeyo womwon ranyuth pere i nyim jo kosa i chingi jo. Odwok ri jo kendo kwo pajo to jodhumo gi Kristo oro gana achiel.
Jomotho man jye jodoŋ chien ma jokochierino chuka oro gana achiel orumo. Me a chierino marapena.

Ji jye ma jokwanere i chierino marapena me, meno josilwany odoko joleŋ! Ato tho mararyo kibino bedo gi men kwoŋ jo, to jobino bedo jochwayi ri Were wi alitar ma jotiyo ri Were gi Kristo munyo jodhumo gine chowo oro gana achiel.
Aka ka oro gana achiel orumo, ibino gonyo Sitan wok i twech,
to idhiro go i piny bino wondo nonin jye ma jonitye i thenge aŋwen ma piny, meno Gog kodi Magog, gi choko jo ri lweny; welo pajo kareno thoth pa kwoyo ma thengi wakawaka.
Jobino wotho munyo joswana riwe ma piny to jothoko chiel pa jomaleŋ kodi tindi momar; to mach bino tukere wok i polo to podho to regarega woko jo.
Aka jwogi moido wondo jo ibino bolo i wakawaka ma mach gi telin malyel kama ogwaŋ cha kodi jotuchi wach pere matwodo jobino chandirok iye hongo jye wor godyechieŋ chil gi chil.
Odoko aneno kom moro madwoŋ matar madhum kodi ŋata obed'iye; piny gi polo joringo joeye woko ruwaŋe m'odoko jokonenere kichutho.

Aka aneno joma chango jotho, madongo kodi mathindho, munyo jochungo ruwaŋ kom no, tiyawo kitawin. To odoko iyawo kitawo man mobedo kitawo makwo. Aka joma chango jotho no othum ri jo banjin chungo kwoŋ gima kis dhano chango otimo i kwo pere, mondik i kitawin no.
Gikenyo wakawaka jye jowodho joma chango jotho i jo. Tho kodi piny pa jomotho bende jowodho joma onwaŋo ni jo, aka jojye othum ri jo banjin chungo kwoŋ gima yado jotimo i kwo pajo.
Gikenyo Tho kodi piny pa jomotho jye obol i wakawaka ma mach. Me a tho mararyo, mobedo wakawaka ma mach,
aka nyatoro jye ma konwaŋ nyinge i kitawo ma kwo, bende obol i wakawaka ma mach no.
Gikenyo aneno polo manyien kodi piny manyien. Ato polo kodi piny marapena oido joleny woko, aka nam orere woko.
Gikenyo aneno Tindi Maleŋ, Yerusalem manyien, munyo loro piny wok i polo bongi Were, moyik maŋon paka mweha morukere maŋon ka yikere romo gi ruoth pere.
Awinjo dwondi nyatoro ma luwo malo munyo wacho wi kom madhum ni, “Pama pecho pa Were nitye gi ji! Go bino bedo gi jo, aka jobino bedo ji pere. Were won bino bedo gi jo, aka bino bedo Were pajo.
Go bino yweyo pigi waŋ jo. Tho odoko kobedi, kosa rembo, kosa ywak kosa litho, rupiri gikipiny machon jotyeko leny woko.”
Gikenyo ŋata oido obedo wi kom madhum owacho ni, “Onyo pama aloko gikipiny jye manyien!” Go owacho ran kendo ni, “Ndiki gime, rupiri wach me obedo maradyeri aka genere.”
Aka owacho ran ni, “Otyeko timere! Aŋata Alufa kodi Omega, chakirok kodi gike. Ŋata riyo neko abino miyo pi amadha manono mawok i waŋ pi makwo.
Ŋata oloy lweny bino limo gime jye. Abino bedo Were pere, aka go bino bedo wuodan.

To jomalwor, joma jokoyeyo, jomarecho, jonek, jochot, jothyeth gi yido, joma lamo chal makichar, kodi jotwodo jye, kabedo pajo bino bedo wakawaka mach ma waŋ gi telin ma wodho mach kibirit, mobedo tho mararyo.”
Achiel kwoŋ jomalaika abiryo monwaŋo jonitye kodi atewe abiryo ma thoyamo opoŋ'iye obino bongan to wacho ni, “Biye anyuthin Mweha, chipa Nyathi rombo.”
Gikenyo malaika no otiŋan i chuny to teran wi got mabor tektek. Go onyuthan Yerusalem, Tindi Maleŋ, munyo loro piny wok i polo bongi Were,
ma lyel gi dwoŋ pa Were. Tindi no omeny pa gee mawelo, pa tele jaspa ma pilin, maler pa ndewiro.
Go obedo gi chiel mothoko ma kore pek aka oŋawere malo, kodi waŋkach apar g'aryo, kodi jomalaika apar g'aryo ma jokuro kis waŋkach. Kwoŋ kis waŋkach ondik nyingi nonin apar g'aryo ma Israel.
Aka obedo gi waŋkach adek i kis thenge: adek yu Wokchieŋ, adek yu Tyendi piny, adek yu Wich piny, adek yu Podhochieŋ.
Chiel ma tindi no oger wi telin apar g'aryo, mondik'iye nyingi jomoor pa Nyathi rombo apar g'aryo.
Malaika moluwo kodan oido nitye gi luth rapor ma zawabu, ma kipima tindi, kodi waŋkach mere, kodi chiel moget thoko go.

Tindi no oido nyathenge aŋwen marom; boro mere rom kodi lacho mere. Malaika opima tindi no kodi luth rapor pere no. Boro mere onwaŋo romo mairo gana achiel gi miya aŋwen; aka lacho mere, kodi ŋawirok mere, kodi boro mere jye oido jorom aroma.
Malaika no opima kor chiel, aka ŋawirok mere oido romo tyendi jo miya achiel gi pyero aŋwen g'aŋwen, chungo kwoŋ rapor ma noknok moido go oro (futi 200).
Kor chiel no otim gi tele jaspa, aka tindi won gipi otim gi zawabu, maler pa ndewiro.
Tele ma tyendi chiel ma tindi otim makichin kodi telin mawelo mopokere opokere. Tele marapena ma tyendi chiel obedo ma yaspa; mararyo safiro; maradek aget; maraŋwen emerad (ma nyabokependi),
marabich sarudonik; marauchiel karunelyan; marabiryo kurisolito; maraboro berulo; marabuŋwen topaz; marapar kurisopuraso; marapar g'achiel jasinto; aka marapar g'aryo amethisto.
Waŋkach apar g'aryo no obedo ma tele mawelo, kis thigo gi tele mopokere. Royo ma tindi obedo ma zawabu, maler pa ndewiro.
Akineno Ot pa Were i tindi, rupiri Ot mere obedo Ruoth Were Majameni jye, kodi Nyathi rombo.
Tindi no kiyeny chieŋ kosa dwe wokel'iye lero, rupiri dwoŋ pa Were ama lero, aka Nyathi rombo a tala mere.
Ji ma piny jobino woth i lero pere, aka kerin ma piny jobino kelo ŋaŋo pajo iye.
Waŋkach ma tindi kibino chiegere odyechieŋ, odoko kada cholo ma wor kobedi kenyo.
Dwoŋ kodi ŋaŋo pa nonin ibino kelo i tindi no.
To ongoye gimakoch ma bino donj'iye, kosa ŋata timo giwichkwot kosa twodo, kende ji ma nyingi jo ondik i kitawo ma kwo mapa Nyathi rombo kende ama jobino donjo i tindi no.
Malaika onyuthan bende jwom mapi ma kelo kwo, maler pa ndewiro, mamol kareno wok i kom madhum pa Were kodi apa Nyathi rombo,
aka mol i dyeri royo ma tindi. I thengi jwom korin gi korin oido nitye yath ma kwo, ma nyak gimopokere apar g'aryo i oro, dichiel kis dwe, aka boke mere obedo ma botho nonin.
Ongoye gima Were okwoŋo ma bino nwaŋere i tindi no. Kom madhum pa Were kodi apa Nyathi rombo ama bino bed'iye, aka jotich pere jobino lamo go.
Jobino neno waŋe, aka ibino ndiko nyinge i nyim jo.
Cholo ma wor odoko kibino bedo, aka jokibino yenyo lero ma tala kosa lero ma waŋchieŋ, Ruoth Were won ama bino bedo lero pajo, aka jobino dhumo chil gi chil.
Gikenyo malaika owacho ran ni, “Wach me obedo maradyeri aka genere. Aka Ruoth Were ma miyo jotuchi wach Chuny Maleŋ pere, ooro malaika pere nyutho jotich pere gima kidho timere mayot.”
Yesu owacho ni, “Winji, abino mayot! Jasilwany a ŋata mako wach pa jotuchi wach ma kitawo me!”
An Yohana, aŋata awinjo kendo aneno gikipiny me jye. Aka munyo atyeko winjo gi neno gime, agore piny dho tyendi malaika monyuthan gikipiny me ni alami go.
To go owacho ran ni, “Ikiri itimi ameno! Abedo jatich nyawotin, i dyeri wutimere kodi jotuchi wach kodi ji jye ma jomako wach ma kitawo me. Lami Were ayino!”
Gikenyo owacho ran ni, “Ikiri ipani wach motuch i kitawo me rupiri ndir orikere.
Weyi jatimi recho womedere gi timo recho, aka ŋata koch womedere gi koch pere; ŋataber womedere gi timo bero, ŋataleŋ womedere gi leŋo.”
Yesu owacho ni, “Neni, abino mayot; ani gi kemba paran, ma alemiyo kis nyatoro chungo kwoŋ gima go otimo.
Abedo Alufa kodi Omega, marapena kodi machowe, chakirok kodi gike.”
Josilwany a joma lwoko ruk pajo molony, aka ŋey jowobedi gi syem ma chamo gimanyak kwoŋ yath ma kwo, gi donjo i tindi gi i waŋkach.
To woko koro nitye gwokere kodi jothyeth, jochot kodi jonek, joma lamo chal makichar, kodi jotwodo jye, i wach kodi i kwo pajo
“An, Yesu, aoro malaika paran rin gi mikwenda me ri kitipa pa jomoyeyo. An anywola mawok i ot pa Daudi, an a sulwe modikini ma lyel moasere.”
Chuny kodi Mweha, jowacho ni, “Biye.” Aka weyi moro jye ma winjo wowachi ni, “Biye.” Aka weyi moro jye ma riyo neko wobin. Weyi nyatoro jye ma mito, womadhi pi makwo manono.
An Yohana, anyutho dhano jye ma winjo wach motuchi i kitawo me kichutho ni: ka moro omed'iye wach man, Were bino medo i girachula pere thoyamo ma sika ji mowach i kitawo me.
Aka ka moro okwany woko wach mogo jye motuch i kitawo me, Were bino kwanyo woko adech pere ma gimanyak kwoŋ yath ma kelo kwo, kodi ma tindi maleŋ, motuch i kitawo me.
Jaridhi mikwenda me wacho ni, “Adyeri, abino mayot.” Ameno. Biye, Ruoth Yesu!
Ŋono pa Ruoth Yesu wobedi kodi ji maleŋ jye.
